You can wear a regular bra, the color is very pretty, and the length is perfect; not too short & not too long. The only part of the dress I don't love is the end portion of the sleeves. They aren't too funky, as I had worried they would be, but they will dip into food or drinks on the table if you're not careful.

This dress was one of the best rentals I have ever had from RTR. I wish that I had an occasion to wear it again. The fit is very true to size. Other reviews made it seem as though the dress was incredibly long, so I only ordered the regular length. It ended up working for me because I wore flats, but if I could do it again I would order the long. I am 5'11" and the regular length just skimmed the floor. The dress is incredibly comfortable. Don't bother with a bra unless you need the extra support because the dress is well-structured on top.

I rented both the 0 and the 2, and while the 0 fit better, the snug waist caused the front pleat to kick out more than desired (probably enough to trigger the 'when are you due' questions), so I went with the 2 so the front pleat chilled out a bit, addtionally I wore a thin black belt with it, and used fashion tape to seal the pleat for the first few inches. I adored the colour and print though, and was able to wear a regular bra.
All eyes were on me the entire night! I wore this dress for prom and the process was so easy. I think I should've gotten the 4L just for some more length, but the 4R fit fine as well.
PERFECT DRESS for conservative cocktail attire.  Beautiful in person. I want to own this dress. I felt comfortable and beautiful.

Dress fit like a glove! Runs very true to size! I'm 5'2" and I got regular length and it just touch the ground with heels! So if ur taller get a taller length! Got many complements even from strangers! Got looks and smiles as well! Did show a lot of cleavage but I have a very long neck line a very little boobs :) I feel sad having to pack it up this morning and ship it back! Definitely made be feel stunning!!! Thanks RTR!!
Dress fits excellent, I was in love from the minute I saw it and I knew it was the one! It was so elegant and super classy. I felt like movie star!

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding where the dress code was 'cocktail attire.' It was in the winter, so I wanted something that had sleeves. This dress was PERFECT. I got so many compliments on it throughout the evening. The sleeves were so fun. It was tight, but true to size. If you go a size up, you may find it is a little baggy around the zipper in the back. I did not feel it was too short either, it was appropriate length even with  heals. The material was thick, but not bulky - the quality was really nice.

This looks just as it does online. No surprises :) The light and flowy fabric felt very pretty to wear and it fit very nicely. I like that it also has a hidden hook & eye closure at the front which kept it sitting nicely in place. I wore it just as it's shown in the photo, with jeans and flat black shoes. Very pretty. I will definitely rent it again!

I normally wear an 8 so I got the 8 and 10.  The 10 barely fit my hips.  If you have a buttbor hips, caution, size up.  The long was a great length for me with 3 inch heels.  No bra necessary.  Loved the dress.

Dress was great.  Great colors and nice fit.  Very comfortable too.  The size 4 fit, but I'm busty so I opted for the 6 which was a little looser.  I wore it for a bridal shower that I hosted and got lots of compliments.  I wore it with orange gladiator pumps and stacked bracelets.
Fit really well.
Everything Was Great!
Way long for my height, 5'3.  Pockets were bulky.  Would fit better on a tall and lean frame.
Wore this dress to my best friends rehearsal dinner. It was an appropriate length and great colors! Very comfortable to be in for the dinner and at the bar after. Easy to dress up or down.
Perfect fit, flowy, has pockets which were great. Great material. Will rent again.

I wore this dress to my brother's wedding in April. It was a lot of fun to wear, and I got many compliments on it. The material is not stretchy or forgiving, so be sure that you are getting the right size! This fit me fine (I'm a 14 and this was a size 14 dress) except in the rib cage area--it was pretty tight. So, "true to size" with one exception, I suppose. It is well structured and good quality. It is heavier than it looks, so if you're looking to rent this for an outdoor summertime affair, I'd check the weather first.

This dress makes younger girls look a little bit old which was completely unexpected. When I finally fit into the size bigger than I usually am, the dress turned out to be extremely unflattering. There is ribbing on the sides that makes your torso look about 2 inches wider than it actually is, and the tightness around the hips pull in a strange and unsavory way. I didn't end up wearing the dress, and I wouldn't recommend it.

Loved wearing this dress! Since it isn't floor length I didn't need to worry about it being too short since I'm on the taller side. The color is really fun and bright. It does run a little big- I usually wear a 2 or 4 in dresses and the 6 in this dress fit, but was a little big in the chest. Would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress was a replacement for a dress that came in damaged from a previous renter.  I am usually a Medium in Herve but I can fit the small- and this dress was only available in a small.  I wanted a " WOW" Herve for one night of my recent Vegas trip and this one did the job!  It is very sexy!
Was able to wear a regular bra with one of those plastic racerback clips with this dress. Love the flirty high low hem!
Fit perfect!  Herve Leger runs tight (bandage dresses) so while I was probably supposed to be in a small, I ordered a medium and it worked great!
Very flattering print and it has pockets! You cannot go wrong.
Hugs curves in all the right ways.  worn with a leather jacket, my husband could not love it more!

Normally a size 8(+), wore a 6 and loved every second of it. Work 5" heels, because the dress truly is that long, and if you plan to dance, you're going to want to not be tripping over your hem! I wore a nude bra, and while it could sort of be seen through the panelling on the back of this dress, it was complete un-noticeable. This dress is super forgiving, super moisture-absorbent, and super, super, awesome.

i wore this for my daughters first communion, which was in the am.   it was springy, formal, while conservation and very comfortable to wear for a long day.  The texture of the fabric was very nice. fyi it doesn't have stretch, but the size was perfect for me with plenty of extra room... and you can wear your reg bra!! huge plus : )
This is an amazing dress.  The fit was perfect.  Very  elegant.

Such an adorable and comfortable number! The lace overlay and the lining are very lightweight and breathable, making it very easy to wear in the summer times.  There is ample room on top and bottom, so no worries if you're curvy!  I think the fit of the dress is on the looser side - I recommend sizing down for your backup size.  Would definitely rent this again for a date or a outdoor event!

I wore this dress for my bachelorette party down the shore and it was perfect! The dress is short, as other reviews say, but runs large. I ended up wearing a 2 (normally I wear a 4) and just not dancing with my arms over my head too much. This dress was stunning and I felt amazing in it!

I loved the fit of this romper and wore it with a denim jacket on cooler days. Only thing I would change is that the bottom back was very loose and short so i was constantly holding it against myself to keep my cheeks covered

I rented this dress for a wedding but ended up wearing something I already owned. The size is strange: true to size at the shoulders and hips, but loose around the waist. It's pretty forgiving, I suppose, but people who wear a size 0 usually don't need the extra fabric around the waist.

I wore this dress to my sister's engagement party (cocktail event). I felt so elegant and received so many compliments on this stunning dress. I'm familiar with the Elizabeth and James designer and how their pieces usually run small so I ordered the size up, fit like a glove!  The dress is a little short, even being only 5'1! If I were any taller, this dress would have looked a little too scandalous for my taste -- something definitely to consider. RTR suggested that I wear a chunky necklace, but I felt it took away from the dress's details. Wore a pair of fabulous earrings with a bracelet and killer heels -- that's all it really needs! Super comfortable, no fidgeting issues whatsoever! And ladies, its definitely guy-approved! My boyfriend told me that I should go buy the dress :). Definitely the crowd pleaser and I highly recommend!

I wore this dress for both an out of state wedding and my vacation. It was very on trend with the off the shoulder sleeves and looked very high end with the fabric and print. It was full length on me, and the adjustable straps helped. I was very pleased with this dress and got a lot of compliments. Also it was easy to travel with, as it didn't wrinkle when I packed in my suitcase, which is always a plus!

This dress was snug in all the right places. I did not have to wear a bra with it, which was good because the back is sheer. It was the perfect dress for an office awards ceremony. Received a ton of compliments all day!

The amount of compliment I received on this made my entire week. The silk is well-tailored and would sit well on most body shapes. Everything about this worked for me. The length was just right for work, a  graduation, and even a date. I only sent it back to be cleaned :-) Definitely a repeat rental.

The waistline has no give at all so definitely order a size up as the back up. I also wore bra cups and  pinned the shoulder straps under the lace to a racerback because they were too long. This was my first RTR dress and I was very happy with it. I felt beautiful and got a ton of compliments!
Everyone loved it. I wore it for my bachelorette party and I honestly wanted to keep it! The dress was true to size. I wore a strapless bra with it and it didn't show, not even in the underarms area.
Beautiful dress. Heavier than expected. But well-designed.

I loved this jumper! I will rent it again for sure! I'm 5'4" and 125lbs - the XSR fit me perfectly.  The SR was a little too loose on top and didn't wear it because I didn't want anything to fall out. ;)  The length was just above my ankle so I was able to wear a cute, heal with an ankle wrap.  The V in the front was just deep enough to be noticeable but not too revealing. The back draped beautifully, not too revealing at all. I liked that there were pockets but I was only able to carry a tube of lip gloss because they were shallow.  It was a nice material and the gold accent at the neck line was nice too.

I must have wide rib cage, had to wear the larger of the two sizes but then a little extra fabric around the arms and mid section.  I didn't think it was noticeable and was more comfortable than the smaller size.
Breast and thigh were a little tight on me but the dress was so pretty. The sash didn't come with it unfortunately so I dressed it up with jewelry. I had so many compliments. Felt amazing all night.

This dress is snug in all the right places. I ordered a small (the only size available) and was concerned it would be too tight. It was definitely form fitting but looked classy and was flattering. Received compliments all night long from friends and strangers alike. I felt secure not wearing a bra while wearing it. Would order this dress again :)
Pliers are the only way we could get the zipper to go up.  Very surprising since the quality of the dress was superb.  Be sure to have someone to help zipper the dress with PLIERS!  That is key!

I was looking for an engagement party dress for my 6 month baby bump, and this one was perfect! The fabric is stretchy and forgiving, but the pattern of the fabric hides imperfections. It was light-weight enough to stand an outside party in August in Louisiana! I received compliments all night long. Pregnant or not, I would have definitely rented this dress!
I felt beautiful and received several compliments! Great for a special occasion, evening, or brunch! Comfortable and elegant if you have a larger bust.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal and rehearsal dinner.  This is one of my favorite dresses ever!  The size 12 fit much better than the backup size 14.  My bra showed the tiniest amount in the arm holes, but it wasn't noticeable enough to be an issue.  I definitely needed a bra in this dress.  The colors are beautiful, and the pattern is so fun and unique.  I got compliments all night long!  The cut really accentuated my hourglass figure.  The dress was very comfortable all night long (and it was a late night).  Definitely recommend this dress!!

I could have gone with a size 0 as the top was too big and it was really flowy, that's why I belted it. By the end of the night after dancing the beads around the neck and arms scratched a bit but as gorgeous as this dress was it didn't matter. Id rent again just in a smaller size

This dress is amazing (like all Herve Ledger dresses) but it's not good for small cup sizes. I'm an A/B and it's just not as flattering on a smaller bust.  Everything else about the dress is amazing. The fabric, like many of this designer, works almost like spanx (sucking in everything you want to hide) resulting in clean lines and a flattering figure on almost everyone.
Thankfully the dress in my size was in excellent condition. The backup size was so snagged it wasn't fit to wear (bare areas where sequins had ripped off).
I actually loved this jumpsuit. I'd love to own it.  Sadly, I didn't get to wear it because of shipping issues.  But I did try it on!

I wore this dress to a winter wedding in CA. I received so many compliments. The color is so vibrant, so I wore simple drop earrings and it was perfect. I'm 5ft 8in and wore about 2 inch heels and the length for the long was perfect. It would have been too short had I not gotten the long. I usually wear a 4 but ended up wearing the 6L - it stretches but the 4 was too tight. I wish I could have kept this dress - I'm obsessed.

I loved the side slit and the black and white was eye catching. I worn in Vegas for a night out. It was a little big on my 5'2'' 115 lbs. frame but it wasn't too bad.  The slit was sexy. It's a midi length on shorties like me but I was okay with that, much shorter and that slit would have been unseemly!

I ordered a 12, but probably should have worn a 14.  I wore Spanks, and it didn't seem to help.  I looked pregnant in a few photos because it was rather tight in my midsection.  This dress shows way more cleavage than the pictures indicate.  It was a bit much for a family wedding.  The dress was beautifully detailed.
I got many compliments throughout the night. The only issue is the dress is more orange than red.

This jumpsuit is classy with a pop of fun.  I was initially concerned with the cutout and showing sjin, but it is very tasteful and I didn't feel uncomfortable at all. I got a ton of compliments and felt very classy. I would rent again.

I am 5'3" and my biggest worry about this dress was it would be too long and look too 'corporate' for New Years Eve - but it was perfect! Just short enough to be 'fun' without showing too much. Wasn't too big on the bust (I am a 34B/32C), but wasn't super tight either. I have hips and a butt, so I chose to size up and wear the 6 instead of the 4, just so I could drink and eat that night, but the 4 fit very similarly (just a smidge snugger on the hips). The pockets are always a plus and the material was super soft (felt like a brushed cotton). It also had a stretch to it, which also added to the comfort level. The sleeves weren't too tight, also, and I have slightly more muscular arms for my size. Overall, a great dress you can wear to a work event, a wedding or a party!

This dress was SO cute! I ordered a 2 and a 4 and ended up going with the 4- the 2 fit around my hips and waist, but since I am a little top heavy and big busted, it was too tight in the chest and arms. The fabric is gorgeous in person, and it is very comfortable. I wore it with a sticky bra, but I feel like most ladies could get away with not wearing a bra at all. I wish it were a couple inches shorter, but that's kind of my problem cuz I'm short. :)
The dress fit perfectly but was a LITTLE short when i put on my 3 inch heels. I ordered it in a petite because usually long dresses are way too long but think a 0R would have been better for me.

I wasn't sure I would be able to wear this dress - the fitted portion of the top extends further down than the rib cage to just about the natural waist, which I wasn't expecting after looking at the photos/reviews. I am pear shaped so I had to do some magic shifting to zip it up. I received so many compliments on it, so I would highly recommend it, but I would caution that the fitted portion is longer than it seems so choose your size accordingly.

Jaw-dropping dress. Had complete strangers stopping me to gush over the dress. This fits VERY snug, especially the bottom half (for me, anyway!) Since I'm smaller on top, I had to use double-sided tape to keep it from gapping. But it was still fabulous! Plus, RTR sent it to me after the dress I originally rented was returned damaged. I <3 RTR!!
The thick fabric is awesome! It held me in a bit and gave me a great hourglass shape. I wore it to work and then out to drinks with my girl friends - was such a hit!

The dress does not stretch, but it does have a little give to it. The 2 fit so well, I ended up not even trying the 4 on ( I am usually a 2 or 4 depending on the bust area).  Like all of the other reviews have said, this dress is SHORT! When you are standing it looks great, just be careful where you sit down.  I probably wouldn't rent this dress for a wedding because of how short it gets when you sit down, but for the event I went to I didn't sit down very long so it was fine.  Definitely order a size up for the backup size.  It fits true to size, but a little on the small side.  It really is a fantastic dress. It is so flattering and I got compliments all night.  Photographs well!

Wore this dress for a bachelorette party in Vegas... got compliments nonstop!  The color is more pink then silver but it's gorgeous.  The dress is flattering and the sequins just draw the attention straight to you.  You don't have to accessorize too much because the dress pops so much.  Wore with bright pink lipstick and chandelier earrings and everything looked beautiful!
The dress was great and the color is beautiful, but beware the cut out when you are sitting!
I might just keep this all winter.... I get compliments on it every time I wear it. So comfortable and fun. The material is very sturdy, I always feel special when I have it on.

I got a size 6r and 8r just in case the dress was too tight, but I ended up wearing the 6r and it fit perfectly. The only problem was length, I'm 5'2" and it was little too long.. Because it was covered in sequins it was also quite scratchy under the arms and on my back when I went to sit down and lean back, Other than it I LOVED it! I got compliments left and right and it made me feel like a princess. My boyfriend couldn't take his eyes off me! I would definitely recommend this dress and I'll more than likely rent this dress again in the future!

I loved this dress and got complements all night. You will be the center of attention in it - it sparkles a LOT! I loved the way it photographs and the fact that you can rent it, I feel like this is the kind of dress that you want to wear only once! It was perfect for a New Year's eve party in DC. Thank you RTR!
The fit was perfect, I feel I did need to pull it up a few times by the end of the night, but it was very comfortable to wear.  I would rent this one again!

I usually wear a four and this dress in a size 4 fit perfectly. The red is darker in person than in the picture. It is more like a maroon or a dark wine color (which I honestly liked better). Highly recommend this dress. Comfortable dancing, felt pretty, received tons of compliments.
Loved the dress.  Got LOTS of compliments.  Wore for a rehearsal dinner w/ the chunky pearls I rented also.

Very pretty dress. Flattering to the figure. It was a little big on me, but that's because I've been losing weight and overestimated the size, but it still hung very nicely and look radiant. The color is lovely. It's stretchy fabric, sturdy construction. I wasn't hot even though the wedding was outside. I could dance in it. I wore spanx and they didn't show because the hem is nice and low. I paired with nude wedge heels and they looked great. No jewelry needed. The dress is the statement. Lots of compliments from strangers. Made me feel fancy at a very fancy wedding.

This dress was a hit! The color is gorgeous and the fabric is quite thick, and thus forgiving. I found it ran a bit large and also very long. I am 5'6" and typically wear 5" heels and rent a Long. This is the first time I've had an issue with excess length. Got numerous compliments - would rent again.

it is definitely a statement dress.  the way it fit in the chest was interesting/little weird. 

cut out for the waist was just right.

Very cute and comfy outfit, however it ran a bit large. Since the wasit tied I was still able to make it work, however the extra fabric bunched in the front. The fabric is also a bit heavy true denim not light weight chambray.

Loved the idea of this dress, but overall not for me. The open back was awesome (loved the draping) and a really cool way to show some skin, but that was the only thing that was really working for me. The straps were very thick and tight on my shoulders, and the bust was extremely small - not a problem I've ever had to face before haha! I would hesitate to try this again in a size up for fear of it slipping out of place - was quite low cut, so I wore petals instead of a bra. I unfortunately had to continually adjust while wearing, but I'm sure this would look fabulous on another lady! I definitely recommend sizing up. Still worked for a fun Sunday baby shower, worn with nude heeled sandals.

This dress completely stood out - the colors are fun and the back is amazing! Only problem I had was the shoulders were a little loose and I was scared that they would fall off if I danced too hard! :)
I would say for my torso the dress ran slightly large

This dress is my favorite RTR - I love it so much that I've rented it twice!  The size 6 fits me like a glove.  I've gotten lots of compliments wearing this especially about the back.  If you've got a fancy sparkly place to go - rent this one!
Admittedly this is not a sexy outfit. But it is one that is universally COOL, hip and fun. I had so much fun in this thing.

The dress definitely runs slightly big. I consider myself between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 fit like a glove! The color really popped with the fall colors of New England. I was comfortable and could dance all night. And the dress has pockets!! I paired it with some silver chandelier earrings and black heels. The lace sleeves were slightly snug, but loosened up as the night went on.
so cute, flattering. great for a night out with skinnies and strappy heels!

I'm 5'2, 120 with an hourglass shape.  It falls a bit loose in the midsection and tighter around the hips and thighs  (for me) but stayed in place/didn't ride up and was perfect for work.  It has a tighter fabric underneath.  The knitted design part in the front is stiff and doesn't fold so I realized it would fall open when I bent over (showing my chest) so I'd just be aware of that.  Also, the beaded detail is beautiful but is also on the shoulders so I was careful when carrying bags on my shoulder.  Overall I loved it

The dress fit true to size including being fitted in the waist. The high-low is not too high in the front which makes it appropriate for any occasion. The fabric is high-quality with a slight sheen. Would absolutely rent this one again.

I was a part of a very colorful wedding party!  My friend, the bride, wanted us in a range of colors and patterns for her May wedding.  In a group of 7 bridesmaids with different colored dresses and patterns, my dress definitely still stood out!  I received so many compliments, I did not want to return the dress after the event.  I have a short torso and wide ribcage, so it is important to me to choose dresses that add a little bit more shape and narrows the waist.  I am 5'4" and about 135 lbs, and the size 6 fit like a glove. I highly recommend this dress!  I would purchase this in a heartbeat if I could.
It was comfortable and very flattering.
It hugs around the hips and body really nicely to show all the curves.  I liked the longer dress because I liked that it dragged a little.  It made it seem more elegant and covered my feet.

This dress has a gorgeous, straight-across strapless neckline and is a rich, vibrant magenta. No necklace necessary. Would recommend pairing with gold jewelry (bangles or fun statement ring). Top was a little roomy on me; it probably fits snugly on ladies with larger busts. A wonderful option for engagement party, wedding, or other cocktail attire event. Would rent again.

Coupled with a simple up-do, gorgeous shoes, a clutch and red lipstick, this dress made the perfect outfit for a formal wedding. I was comfortable and stylish at the same time. I could have worn it for another 4 hours without a complaint.

This was my first choice for attending a beach wedding - ironically I fit in with the wedding theme perfectly - but I should've guessed - the brides favorite color is yellow and that's the only reason I wore this dress.  This is not my typical style and I don't usually wear bright colors - but I got SOOOO many compliments.  The dress was a little on the loose side, and up until the day of the wedding I was going to wear my backup (which was a little too formal for a beach wedding) but then my friends talked me out of it and told me this dress looked really great.   PROS: pockets, love the damn pockets - perfect dress for a beach wedding
CONS:  I tend to be a little flatter on top, so if I had brought a padded bra with me or if I naturally had a larger chest then I think this dress would have felt like it fit perfectly.  
One thing I would like to point out, I was under the impression when I rented the dress that this was a backless dress - but it's not (at all).  Completely fine to wear a bra with this dress - no special bra needed.  I would recommend this dress for others, but for me I will probably not rent it again since yellow isn't my color anyway :)

The sequins started rubbing the inside of my arms raw after about 20 minutes. By the end of the night the inside of my arm looked like hamburger meat. It hurt really badly but there was no lasting injury or marks, and everything was fine about 2 hours after taking it off.
Runs small in the hips, also the ruffles are quite prominent in person
This dress was gorgeous! I received tons of compliments. It was also quite comfortable.
The fit was a little large in the bust.  The lacy top had me nervous it would snag but I had no issues.  The dress was comfortable and truly looks like the photo.
I ordered the 0R and 2R. The 0 fit better. Dress seems to strech a little after you have it on
I ordered a large, but a medium would have been much better. Beautiful coat, would have loved to see how it would have looked in the right size. A boxier cut, for sure.

I rented this dress for a class reunion party in the fall. The color was great, the fit was snug but not tight, and for me, as a petite woman, it fit perfectly- even the length. There was just enough stretch to make it very comfortable. I wasn't sure what others were wearing, as it was an evening dinner and dance, and this was a great choice - simple, classy and dressy without going overboard. The arm/neck details were a nice touch and I got many compliments.  Initially was not thrilled about the long, exposed, gold zipper in the back, but it felt fine and I wore a nice pair of rose-gold earrings with a pink topaz stone that looked amazing. The size 2 was comfortable and a little bit looser, but would be great for work or an evening work event. I will definitely rent this dress again!
Absolutely loved this dress. It was perfect for a beach wedding in the Florida heat. Highly recommend.

The last time I used RTR, I wore a size 4 and I weighed 106 lbs. I weighed 8 pounds more this time, but wore my back up Size 2 and it still felt too big. So, definitely size down when ordering. That part aside, it was still a really pretty dress and I felt good in it. I'd give it 5 stars if it fit better.

I wore this on a date. I got plenty of compliments form both men and women. I'm usually a 4 and wore a 4 in a this dress, as I did not have a backup size due to a computer glitch. (Tip: I ordered using my iPhone. I don't think ordering from a mobile devise works as great as doing it from a  computer as I ordered a size 6 for my backup, but when the order completed, it was not in the cart.) The 4 fit like a glove. It would have been perfect except I couldn't take a few steps without the skirt hiking/riding up. I felt self conscious tugging it down continuously. So if you plan to do a lot of walking, dancing, etc., I would advise you to go one size up. I think I would have been more comfortable with a 6. Overall, though, this is a very eye-catching dress. Having gotten several compliments from other women, I think, proves that.

This dress is very pretty, and had I done a better  job at choosing the correct size, it would have been perfect! I usually wear a 4 and got a 6, which was a mistake. It was like a sack on me. Sent it back without wearing, but I may rent again in a smaller size for another occasion.

First, it's definitely grey and red, NOT black. (Still, black shoes are fine.) I loved how it fit! I had to wear a strapless bra since it kind of curves in so much, but it was not a problem at all. It was comfortable and flattering. The material is a little thicker, but it was perfect for an indoor summer party. LOVED it!
So many compliments. Its a great coat for fall/early winter

This dress runs true to size but it is possible to size down because the material is stretchy. The material is lighter than expected but holds shape well especially in the skirt. The pattern is not actually embroidered and does not show up as bright as it does on the model. Loved the pattern and comfortable fit. This dress is perfect for a semi-formal event or party and gets lots of compliments.

The dress is beautiful, sexy and perfect for a black tie affair.  I had countless compliments all night. I loved it so much I rented it twice in a few months!  I usually wear a size 8, but i decided to have a more fitted look so I wore a size 6 and it hugged every curve beautifully.  The 8 fit well as well, but I wanted a more fitted sexy look so I went with the smaller size.  I wore a small waist corset underneath for some added curve and to smooth out my stomach.

What a fun, easy jacket! Great for those cool-ish days and nights. No true pockets but not a huge deal in my opinion. I wanted to keep forever but returned because it's hard to wear a winter coat over and not warm enough to wear alone (brrr Chicago!). Best when a heavier coat is not needed. I'll surely be renting again in the spring!

I liked this dress because it opened up at the waist and left room in the bottom - I have a butt so I like to know that a dress has room for that. I didn't expect that the arms would be so skinny. It was a real struggle to get my arms all the way through the sleeves, but once I zipped up the dress it fit perfectly everywhere else. RTR was out of my backup size 8 and I think that may have gone a little better, but just been larger in the waist. I don't have huge arms, just regular muscles from yoga and light lifting and the sleeves were super tight. definitely for someone with a ballerina-type frame - long, thin arms and legs.
It was just perfect! Glad I got my backup (10L).  It was a hit! Will rent it again! This outfit was a hit! Everyone asked where I got it from and I gave the rtr info.

I wanted to wear this for a party. I usually wear a size 4 and I went up to an 8 because I read the reviews. 
It was so short (and I am only 5'4").

This skirt is beautiful ... the gold sequins are subtle and classy (in no way disco-ball). I wore with a black scoop-neck body suit to a formal affair and it was perfect. I received many compliments throughout the night. It does run very small, though. I usually wear a 10 or 12 skirt and the xlrg barely fit. The length was perfect for me, though, and I'm 5'10''. I will rent again.

This dress was amazing! I received so many compliments. The bust fits a little small, but everything else is true to size. Love the fact that this dress has pockets! Amazing color and great length (I'm just about 5'2") and hit mid-thigh. Accessorized with the Nicole Miller Southern Plantation Earrings and Star Light Star Bright Bracelet.
Fits larger in the body but it's intended to have a roomier fit. Will definitely rent again.

This dress has pockets!! But it also has boning...which can be sharp and uncomfortable after eating. I ended up putting bandaids over the boning on the inside of my dress so they'd stop stabbing me. Overall it's a beautiful and unique dress, but know it's very constricting in the midsection.
Wonderful sweater, would rent again. I sized down because I wanted to make sure it was cropped enough as I paired it with a pair of very high waisted green pants.
I am typically a 6/8 and 6 was perfect. 8 would have been too big. I would either get your normal size or one size down.

After my original dress was damaged, I picked this out at the last minute of the few remaining dresses for a May wedding.  I was so nervous because I don't normal wear strapless or yellow.  But  I could not have been happier.  The color is amazing.  Such a bright, cheerful color.  And the textured heavier material saves it from being to casual.  I received so many compliments and the fuller skirt is so fun to dance in.  The pockets let me keep my red lipstick and a camera with me all day and night.

The dress is very well made.  And the boning inside means you will not be pulling it up / adjusting all night (although by hour 13 it was starting to dig in a little...a small price to pay).

If you are on the fence go for it.  You still stand out...in exactly the way every girl hopes.
The dress was just a beautiful in person as it was in the picture!  Am so glad it worked for me.

This was a GREAT dress for my bachelorette party! I've had issues in the past with some of my rentals running on the shorter side, but this was the perfect length for me. I will note that the sequins were a little more rose gold than I anticipated, but it made me fall in love the dress even more. :)
The fit was outstanding.  I love the peepshow midsection and the slit; it showed enough skin to feel sexy but still be comfortable.
The fabric on this was a bit thin - better for a vacation or beach dress than everyday spring dress.
This dress is PERFECT. Beautiful, and so comfortable. I felt amazing wearing it.  I highly recommend people to rent it. I got so many compliments. Definitely a dress to remember.

I am 5'5" 125 lbs and ordered my usual 2. I ordered the 4 as my backup size and was glad I did because I ended up wearing it. The dress was fine through the bust and waist but verrryy tight through the hips and legs. It was very flattering especially if you're going for the figure-hugging look, but it was honestly pretty uncomfortable. That is why I ended up wearing it to the rehearsal dinner instead of the wedding because it would've been hard to move freely and dance. I did get a lot of compliments, though!

The colors are varying shades of purples and pinks. It's the same neoprane material that makes a canyon clover dress great - fits wonderful, molds to your body. The skirt is a slight A-line, but it will cling to your hips and stomach a bit. I like the cut, since it makes this fabric more wearable for summer. The straps are large enough that you can wear any type of bra. The dress is somewhat low cut, with 34D breasts they are "out there". Definitely not good for work or conservative environments, but a camisole would fix that. For social outings, this is a very nice dress. I've had a lot of different designer dresses now with unlimited, so I guess I'm a bit jaded, but this isn't a "show stopper". The pattern is different enough to stand out in a crowd though.

Perfect fit. I was concerned about the size since I am not 5'10 and 120lbs, but the 4R fit just as I hoped  for and more. I rec'd so many flattering compliments from so many strangers! Thanks RTR!

Tip, wear high heels for 5'3 and under.
This dress was perfect. I couldn't have loved it more. It was definitely a knock out and I received compliments all night!

I rented this for a date night with my husband and was pleasantly surprised with how flattering it was. Sometimes with boxy shirts you can loose your shape - but this one was an exception. With the buttons down the front, the stripes and the just sexy enough off the shoulder it ended up being one of my favorite RTR selections. I paired it with boyfriend jeans since it's a bit crisp here now, but I will definitely be looking to rent this again in the summer to pair it with white skinnies & shorts!
I wore this to my birthday with the BM sparkly gold crop top.  I wore the smaller backup size.  When worn at the natural waist, it hits mid calf.
Wonderful dress. Very comfortable and stylish. The color is vibrant and eye-catching.
Runs small but has a little stretch to it.
The dress ran true to size. The fit was super flattering and flared out a bit at the bottom which made it super girly and fun to dance in!!
It was very comfortable & even just a tad big.  The length was perfect with 3 in heels. I received lots of compliments.  The only issue is the front hem kept rolling up.

What a gorgeous winter dress! Wore this to a holiday party and found it to be very comfortable and practical. Firstly, IT HAS POCKETS. USEFUL, glorious pockets. Secondly, it's cozy without being terribly hot. Because of the winter-like pattern of the dress fabric, I picked it for a winter holiday party, which usually means being chilly through the event because your coat over in the coat check. Not this time! Bare shoulders and arms but still comfy- but never too hot or sweaty. The fabric has a good weight to it without being too heavy. The dress just feels substantial. It almost feels like you are just carrying a nice throw/blanket around with you all night. The bottom of the skirt poofed nicely and the bodice fit perfectly. I had my 3rd baby 8 mo ago and am never sure of my size right now, but surprisingly fit into the 10L (170ish lbs and 5'10") but I do not have a big bust or rib cage. Rented a punk rock style statement necklace to tone down the Queen Elsa vibe the dress may give off. Worked out fantastically. I felt wonderful and received many compliments from strangers (which is very nice of them).

This dress fit perfectly, and hugged my body in all the right places. It was comfortable and easy to move in. I have a larger bust and I felt like my chest looked fabulous (not to covered, but not hanging out). My only complaint would be that I had to switch shoes because I was originally wearing shoes that are glittery and they kept sticking to the dress. But other then that, I have no complaints and wish I could have kept the dress forever. Great quality, condition, everything! I would absolutely recommend this dress for anyone who wants to look and feel sexy while staying comfortable.

The fit of this dress runs small. I'm 5"4 135lbs and typically wear a size 6. I ordered a 6 & 8 and the 6 wasn't even close to being able to zip up. Ended up wearing the 8 and it was still snug. I would recommend sizing up with this dress. Cut and color are beautiful and classy. Fabric is thick and hides your flaws. Would love to buy this dress.....

I wore this gown to my husband's army ball! It had the right amount of sass and class to make me feel sexy yet tasteful. I can't even count how many compliments I got when I wore it but a ton of people stopped me and I felt fabulous in it. I originally ordered the size four and the size two as my back up. After my night was over and the dress came off I realized I had worn the two and if fit fine, a little snug but I didn't mind! I was sad to send the beautiful gown back lol! Well worth the rent! I would recommend this gown to any one!
I loved this dress! The fit was great; it was super flattering. The pockets were amazing! It ran true to size. The fabric was thick and luxurious. Would definitely rent again!

I got the size 4, this thing is literally painted on me, and I love it so much. It's hyper sexy while still conservative with the wide straps and square neck line. I have a small bust so I'm able to move my ladies around to create cleavage with this thing if needed/desired. I love the color of this dress, it's truly a stunner. I'm trying to make after work plans so I can go out and have people stare at me in this thing. Gorgeous.
Awesome dress and very flattering.  Lots of compliments.  I will rent again.

This dress was definitely too big on me; however, this was a last minute rental and my size wasn't available so I ordered a size up so knew that it was going to be too big. Despite that, I still felt pretty in it, even if I looked huge. It was incredibly comfortable and really stood out! I didn't wear the mystery bling I ordered because it was a bit dressier than the occasion demanded, so I went with my own stuff.
This top was perfect for everyday- Easy to throw on and super comfortable.
This looked great and provided an extra layer of warmth. Loved it.
I am 5'7/ 5'8 and the dress was rather short on me. I got a 6 for the extra length, which worked perfectly. The color was beautiful for a rehearsal dinner in  FL and I received a ton of compliments.

Great fitting-feeling top, the straps on the bra are a little bit of a challenge because there is a keyhole in the front and the back. I had to just sort of manipulate my straps because cross straps or Tstrap in the back shows. Worth wearing in any case soft fabric classicly modern style, feminine. My husband loved it.

This dress has a very nice fit.  The fabric is stretchy, so I suggest going a size down.  I ordered the 2 and the 4 based on other reviews and ended up wearing the 2.  

 I'm 5'0 and the length was not an issue with 3" heels.  

The shoulders were a little big, but that was easily fixed with a safety pin.
Excellent fit if you're a curvy woman.  This lays nicely across the bust, pulls in tight at the waist and flows across the hips.  The day I wore it I got compliments all day.

I wore this dress to my fiance's Black Tie work Christmas party.  Being 5'10" I always worry about dresses being long enough, but this one still grazed the floor even with 3" heels.  I'm a fan of anything off-the-shoulder, so naturally I loved this dress.  It fit true to size, was super comfortable, and I felt like a million bucks in it!  When my fiance saw me in it he said "WOW!  You look incredible!"  These aren't words he says often, so I'll give credits to the dress.  Considering renting it again for a Black Tie wedding in February.

The color was beautiful and the dress was very comfortable. It was nice and thick for a cold office. It was pretty tight in the arms and bust so consider a size up. Great for spring and summer if you are indoors with AC all day, but want to get into the season with some color.

Gorgeous, billions of compliments.  This was originally my back up dress.  But it was soo stunning and classy I had to wear it.  I liked the 12L on me because it showed off my figure, but also had a really nice hang. the size 10 probably would have fit a little better. I am an athlete, have an athletic build short torso.  wore two inch heels and the dress dragged a little but not too bad. make sure to get or make a backless bra or something.  Loved this dress, get it!

I normally wear a size 8 dress, went up to a 10 on this because the 8 was slightly snug under the bust, but my rib cage is a little bit wider than most.  I loved the length as well, since I'm  tall many dresses come up short.    I would highly recommend this dress!

I didn't end up wearing this dress. It was super cute but did not fit me the right ways - I felt like it might have been a bit inappropriate for the wedding I rented it for. The "v" in the front was low enough that, with a bra I had great cleavage (not grandparent-appropriate), but without a bra the dress was too big on the top. Maybe for a different kind of formal event where there are less family members. Also the color is really bright. If I rent this dress again I'd probably try out the blue!
It is stunning! Very picturesque. I wore with high-waisted pants and it hung out perfectly. Not too long to ruin the line.

This dress was perfect! I had wanted something I would be conformable in to go see a Broadway play with my girlfriends, and this dress was great! It was very flattering on me, I just had a baby not to long ago and still have the pouch, and this dress made me feel pretty again! It does run a little on the larger size, I have been in a size 14 post baby and I rented a 10 after reading the reviews and it fit perfect for me, but I don't think you are supposed to really "tighten" the strings on it, I think the dress is meant to be a little lose. I would totally rent this again!
This is so cute and lightweight. You'll want to wear it everyday! It is a bit see-thru though so I wore it as a coverup over my swimsuit.

I ordered the 4P (my usual size) and the 6P as a backup (in case I overate the whole weekend and needed the extra room :P)  The 4P fit great and with my platform wedges, they were the perfect length.  I suppose if it was too long, I would've tried to tape up the bottom.  The chiffon is beautiful and came in perfect condition.  The bust is very rigid and felt solid the whole night.  The pink color really stands out but still feels classy and appropriate for the early evening wedding/reception.  Someone asked me where I got it because she said that it was what she had in mind for her bridesmaids next year.  I'd be ecstatic if my bride chose this as a bridesmaid dress!  It could totally work for that or just for any semi-formal/formal event you want to rock.  Dress it up or down with hair and accessories.
This dress fit perfectly. I'm usually a size 6 and it fit very well.

This was SO comfortable.  No need for Spanx or any other special underwear/shapewear.  I had a ton of compliments.  Perfect for a long night at work when you need to look put together and dressy but don't want to feel dressed up.

The dress arrived on time but wrinkled easily. I didn't realize it until I opened the bag 20 minutes before my rehearsal, which was too late. I kept posing on an angle in hopes to hide the wrinkles. I wore the 6 instead of the 8.

This was very cute on, but not practical. It has hooks up the back so you have to have someone else to get you in and out of it. I didn't feel like dealing with that all night, everytime I had to use the restroom. Super cute though!!
perfect dress. perfect fit - comfortable. classic.

Gorgeous dress, even more beautiful in person. It did run a little big, because for me it was a little loose around the waist but everything else fit perfectly, i am 5'3" and got the 4R. Also loved that it has pockets.

I thought the dress was a bit large but as it turns out the medium was just fine. I usually wear a small. I didn't have too much trouble with the sleeves and the sequence. I felt comfortable in it and every said I look beautiful. It was dressy enough for me to be sexy and professional for the evening.

It fit true to size the length was great for me  but I'm short, the color was amazing but the material was very heavy and i was in 106 degree heat so I would have preferred something a little more light wieght. It would be great for an indoor or outdoor wedding
The fit was amazing, perfect length for a charity gala and I got comments ALL night!! I would definitely recommend for a formal event. It was super comfortable as well!

I ordered this size in the S and M because the XS was out (I would have guessed that I wore a small, and others said it ran large). It fit a little loose in the tummy area, but fit perfect in the sleeves and hips. Even though I would have liked it to be a bit tighter, it was a gorgeous dress. I got tons of compliments that night and on my picture. I even had a friend several months later ask to borrow the dress.

Dress was very nice and form fitting. The strap in the back was a different material and in no way was it going to clasp on. Hugs your hips and length was a little long for me but still in good taste.

This was awesome!!! I got so many compliments on it, and my husband could NOT take his eyes off me!! It definitely will show off the girls, so if you dont want that, dont get this outfit!! The ONLY negative, and it is why I did not give it 5 stars, was that the boning was annoying and did poke at me periodically. But it wasn't that troublesome to affect my night. I am tall, and it worked great! Fabric is light, not heavy. The seaming/ruching across the stomach is very forgiving - which is nice. Would love to rent this again!

The fit on the bust/shoulders seemed a little tight, but it's better described as snug. The fabric/material is just stretch enough for comfort, and worked great for lots of dancing. Very comfortable fit in that sense. I wore a 2 and I'm normally a 2, but it does run a little small. I'd say anyone with more than 34B might find this too tight up top.
It was a great dress.  Received many compliments.
You can dress this up or down.  Great for vacation or around the town leisure

Dress was perfect for hiding my tiny bump.  I was a little disappointed because i thought the rouching on the body of the dress.  Instead they were attached by being sown in two different areas.  The slit was a bit obnoxious when sitting at the table and looking at all the wedding activities taking place.  This is really a standing dress.
I adored this dress. It's a little thin but it looked effortless for a Christmas party. And the color is lovely!

This dress is beautiful, elegant & romantic w/ a touch of sexy. I highly recommend it! I wore the MR w/ heels that were 3 1/2 inches - I am tall so the dress came off the ground about an inch more that I would have liked. Other than that it was the perfect dress for a perfect evening!
This dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments. Sexy but not over-the-top and comfortable too! Highly recommended for any formal affair.
I usually wear a size 12 and went with the large - however it ran big.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower and absolutely fell in love with it the moment we zipped it up! I felt everything a bride should feel, I felt sexy, classy and beautiful! The dress was the perfect length, easy to move around in and sit in with out the fear of showing off something I didn't want seen (you know, the unpleasant spanks). I started receiving the compliments the minute I walked into the room! A YES for sure with this amazing dress!

This was my first dress rental from RTR and I was very pleased. The dress itself is understated, so not a good choice if you want to stand out from the crowd. I received several compliments--but the best one was from the bride herself because she is a fashionista! She said she had rented her dress for the rehearsal dinner from RTR, too! A couple of notes to share...The dress runs small (in my opinion) because it is so fitted in the bodice and hip area. I usually wear a size 6, but wore the size 8 and it was perfect. You need to buy a backless/strapless bra for this dress because the ivory lace back and inset on the front are see through. It's a sweet sexy detail, and you don't want bra straps showing! The color is a lovely muted blush rose color, and it blended perfectly with my daughters' dress (in photo). I wore this dress with Jessica Simpson nude platform pumps. Overall, it was a nice choice for this wedding event.
I wear this at to work over a blouse and look put together while feeling comfortable.

This was really easy to wear and got lots of compliments. If you want it to be form fitting you might want to size down as it has plenty of stretch. I paired it with a black turtleneck, tights and flats.
I rented this for a bachelorette party. The side cut-outs are super flattering, and the jumpsuit is very comfy. Tempted to buy this..

I was a little disappointed when I received this dress. I ordered it to attend an opera auction, and when it came I almost went and purchased a dress. I had ordered an 8L and a 10L. I am only 5’7 but I usually wear at least a three inch heel with no platform. I ended up wearing the 10L even though I typically wear an 8, because the 10 hung better. I was unimpressed with the fabric, which I felt detracted from the quality of the dress. It was a slinky mesh material, so you could see every bump underneath it. I didn’t wear any undergarments because of that. I didn’t feel the dress was overly flattering on my body type. I have a wide rib cage, broad shoulders, big chest, and small waist. Despite how uncomfortable I felt in the dress or how I felt it looked on me, I received more compliments on that dress than I have ever before on any purchase.  I had men coming up to me saying the dress was stunning. The auctioneer referred to me as the “stunning lady in red” after I won a bid. Women approached me to tell me how gorgeous I looked. One woman said I looked like Anjelica Huston and another said Jessica Rabbit. Bottom line is the dress was a show stopper and very glamourous. It is also very comfortable to wear.

The size L fit like a size 8 would.  The size M was more like a 4/6. I was a little worried about the cleavage showing too much, so I pinned the shoulders to my bra.  So sparkly.  Would rent again.  Customer service was great!

Love the two zippers - upzip the bottom if you are a place to keep your coat on. Fits a little larger because it's supposed to. It's light weight but quite warm; I was shocked. Definitely could not wear it inside but great to drape around your legs in a cold movie theatre.

This dress was my original choice but ended up wearing my backup style due to the length. I am 5'10" and pregnant, so the front pulled up slightly due to my bump. With this dress, I would have had to wear completely flat shoes and it still would have been about an inch short of hitting the ground. The zipper was extremely difficult to close around the middle band. Pretty dress, just too short for me.

Great color and print. I wasn't crazy about the fabric though.  I rented as part of unlimited so it was just something for everyday. I wouldn't rent it for a special event but definitely cute at the office and running around on a Saturday.
Great dress for a large bust

I really loved wearing this dress.  It was very flattering and comfortable too.  I am tall (5'10"), which I think worked better for this dress since it hits mid-calf on me.  I got lots of compliments and ended up referring a few people to RTR.
Had to do a bit of tugging on the hemline, and the right sleeve was a bit tighter than the left, but overall a nice dress.  Great, bright color, and I really liked the neckline (front and back).

We went to Riveria Maya for our honeymoon, and I wore this the night we went to the fancier restaurant at our resort. My husband loved it! It's such a fun and flattering dress, will definitely rent again. It is fairly snug around the chest.
Flattering Fit - casual but able to dress up or down! Comfortable.

The dress was very sexy! I got plenty of compliments the night of the banquet. It was well except for the bust area; it was a bit loose on me. The material was comfortable and the black lace shows off the body curves very well. I was really happy with this dress!

I wore this to my holiday party and it was perfect! I got so many compliments. The dress was fitted but not too tight; it flattered all of the right places. I am  5'6", 145lbs, 36D and self conscious about my tummy bulge and I felt very confident in this dress!

I ordered the 16 and the 18. The 18 was a little big on the top so I went with the 16 and with Spanx it wasn't too tight in the stomach, hips. It is a heavy dress but so elegant and you just feel special wearing it. The skirt twirls out great when you are dancing. Would rent this dress again for formal occasion.

I really liked this dress and so did my date. It's super stretchy and comfy, but even the XS was quite big on me. I could still wear it, but I wish it came in an XXS for a more form-fitting silhouette. Very forgiving style for any body type though (or if you are eating a lot at dinner - haha). The gold pattern is subdued but cute. Easy to accessorize. Unfortunately no photo but this is a cute, versatile LBD for fall/winter!

This gown is very simple to don and to disrobe. It's very fitted in the bodice. To avoid zipper battles, I sized up (lesson learned from previous Badgley Mischka gowns). The chiffon flowed with my movements despite being floor length. I'm still receiving compliments. In a sea of basic black gowns, be prepared to stand out -- beautifully.

I fit the lower portion of the XS dress, but the top was too small. So I wore the S size.  It fit in the top but was slightly too big in the skirt. It worked well enough. If I owned the dress, I'd have the skirt portion taken in a bit. I am fairly large breasted (34C), and I think anyone larger might have a hard time fitting this dress. Otherwise, it was a dream! I'd suggest a nude colored strapless bra that doesn't ride too far up under the arms. Beautiful dress that I was very tempted to buy!

This dress ran a little small on me. I typically wear a four, but definitely needed the six. Glad I got the back-up size. The six fit like a glove, and doesn't have any stretch. The dress is beautiful and I received tons of compliments. The quality, fabric, god embroidery, and tulle skirt detail were all wonderful.
I wore this dress to a bridal shower in March and it was awesome.  There's a little bit of stretch which made it so comfortable to wear all day.  I can't wait to rent it again!

There are no words for how much I fell in love with this coat.  The description does not mention that it is fully reversible, which was the best part!  I wore it with the mustard side out, so the navy showed along the collar and the cuffed sleeves.  I got so many compliments - plus with the bit of flare at the hips, the coat looked fabulous with both skinny pants and dresses. The weight of the wool jacket could not have been any better for chilly winter days in Texas.   Will rent again - whenever cold weather arrives again!
Definitely a bit short, but the overall fit was true to size- felt like a million bucks!
This is a fabulous everyday sweater to go with jeans, black skirt or leggings.  It came new with tags!!  I love when that happens.  Would definitely rent this one again.

This dress is literally amazing!  I wore it in Cabo at a resort and people complemented me all night.  I didn't take a picture in it and am kicking myself for that!  It is so flattering.  I am 5'4" and 125 with an athletic build.  I will rent this over and over!

The dress was a hit. I was looking for something dramatic and elegant -- and that's exactly what I got.  The only drawback was that the fabric of the inner skirt bunched up around me -- achem -- sizable butt. Other than that, it was perfect.

This was my first RTR dress and I loved it. I'm on the shorter, ~curvier~ side, and was looking for something colorful, cute, and conservative-ish for a pretty traditional church wedding. I love that this dress has a high neckline so I didn't have to worry about unwanted cleavage - sometimes you want the cleav, and sometimes you're in a church with a bunch of people you don't know and their grandmothers. The dress is comfortable, and the color is pretty and bright without being obnoxious. As another user mentioned, you will want a racerback bra (or no bra if you can), as the front of the dress cuts in a bit and the sides of my bra sometimes peeked through. The dress has those handy straps inside to hold your bra straps in, but there is a slight risk of side-bra exposure. Not terrible, but something to be aware of. Overall, I loved this dress and would rent again.
Fun and flowing.  Need to wear something underneath for work.
This dress was amazing, the only thing I would warn ladies about is that it's super short.  Be sure to have a pair of sturdy knickers on!
This was a dress I wore comfortably to work and social gatherings. Pretty simple and good for all occasions. The shoulders added the right touch of flair to make the dress not boring.
The fabric was a little thicker/stiffer than I expected from the pictures.

LOVE this little black dress! its a thicker stretchy material that even hid bra lines (big win in my book). the ruffle sleeves add just enough flare to feel dressier than just a plain black dress. you can see a bit of your bra at the armhole so make sure you wear a black bra. great dress, would definitely rent again or buy!

Pros: not too revealing
Cons: a little itchy
Beautiful color and loved the bow detail in the back.

I am very petite, and with heels the regular was just the right length. I wished it was a tiny bit tighter in the waist but it still was gorgeous. It was not nearly as heavy as I thought it would be and didn't feel so fragile that sequins were going to constantly come off. Amazing dress!

This outfit will definitely brighten your day and not for wallflowers. It is BRIGHT, but the silhouette is very classy. The pants run really long. I made it work for my 5' frame with some heels, and fashion tape but it was a pain getting the temporary hemming right. More ideally suited for someone tall. The crotch area also looked a little funky because of my height but the solid color hid it well that it's only noticeable to the wearer. The breakup of the top vs the pants also makes it super flattering, unlike more onesie-type jumpsuits.

I loved the material in this top, as it was very high end.  But the white part is see through and very white so it does not match any other shade of white besides pure white.  Normally, I am a size medium on the top for almost everything but the medium was a little too big in the shoulders and, sadly, the small was too small.

Love love love this dress. I wore it to an art show opening and I felt sexy, powerful and confident. The ruffle hem adds a fun little detail. This dress is very structured, so I sized up one size, but it hugs your curves great.

Fit was great.  I am not busty but still used dress tape to be safe.  I got so many compliments!  This was my first Rent the Runway experience and it was so easy and I was very happy with the results.
Great for someone with a small bust because it is nearly impossible to wear a bra with it. I loved it and got a ton of compliments on it!
Wore with black booties for a fall floral look. The dress fit well and was very flattering.
Nice rental. Hides the extra holiday weight well.

I rented this for a brunch event, but it arrived too late.  So I ended up wearing it to dinner and then again to work the next day.  I got lots of compliments at work.  The material is thick and flattering.  It was on the smaller side of a size 6, but looked good since it is A-line.  I would rent again.

I ordered the 2L as a backup size because I am usually a 4 or 6 in dresses due to my 34DDD bust. The 4L was about four inches longer than the 2L which you can see still hit the floor even though I was wearing four inch heels (not pumps).  The 4L also came without a zipper pull on top so I contacted customer service and decided to wear the 2L. The material has stretch so it hugs even the straightest of figures, I do not really have hips and my butt is fairly small, but it looked cute (I don't have a picture) I loved that I could wear a normal bra and thong with this dress. The material is high quality so it is not see through and is heavy enough that I don't recommend wearing it in the summer sun, however it is the perfect weight for inside events! I was able to dance all night, sit comfortably, and breathe in this dress without it stretching out. I paired it with sparkly drop earrings, a center French braid and slicked back pony tail up-do, and a sparkly bracelet to keep it simple. I wore lace up heels with laser cut-outs that peeked out of the back slit when I walked and danced.

Loved this dress! I actually wore the looser-fitting size 4 to work the day before the wedding since it arrived early, and the tighter 2 to the wedding itself. It was perfect - classy, yet sexy. The dress came to just above my knees, would've liked it a little bit shorter, but was still able to keep a little sexiness with the "optional" cleavage!  Was fitted in the ribs and looser in the hips for me. Great rental!
Loved the dress and overall fit, but my chest was a little too big so my boobs were spilling out of the top.  Ended up not wearing it, but highly recommended :)
The perfect rental, super unique and very memorable so you could never wear it twice. It runs very short but fits great.
Received many compliments on this dress. Fits snug, and it's a thick material so it was flattering for being a tight dress. Very nice dress I was sad to let it go.

This top was great. I got it for a concert and loved it.  The material is very thick and flattering.  The only downfall was that it would not stay off my shoulder, i had to constantly pull it down.  But overall, i loved it.

worn for a masquerade dinner and it was perfect! it wld go better with a more fitted dress instead of the poofy one i had on, but it still worked to pull the look together. the pockets were a great and very helpful throughout the evening and the cape actually kept me warm in 50 degree weather. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and have rather broad shoulders so i wld recommend someone smaller get an XS. even if you're a 4 and narrow, get the XS. NOTE - there are no buttons or zippers in the front so it stays open

It is nice quality and very warm. I wore it for Thanksgiving dinner in Park City but it was pretty big for an XS. It literally almost hit my knees it was so long. I am 5'2 and 100lbs. I loved it if it had just been a little smaller OR if you don't mind it being super long it would be ok. I felt weird in such a long one though.

Negatives first. Top was pretty tight and didn't allow me to wear a real bra. I opted for the Nu bra. Zipper was next to impossible! Definitely not something you can do yourself. 

Other than that, it was so pretty and comfortable and very lady like. i paired it with nude strappy sandals and got many compliments.

I wore this to our schools gala that was "safari" themed. Paired it with a think gold bangle (also RTR) and BAM! I loved the simplicity of this dress but it still had the wow factor. The back is stunning! I am 5'4" and it was a perfect length.
I loved this dress!  So many compliments!!

Definitely size down!  I am 5'5", 145/150lbs and a 34DDD.  I rented the 4 and the 6 based on past reviews.  The 4 fit but was very tight in the chest and the seams were visible through the material which was very noticeable.  I wore the 6 to prevent this and the 6 was a little big in the shoulders but worked.  I am very happy that I got both sizes.  Normally, I would wear a size 8.  I put a skinny black belt with it and I received numerous compliments.  My husband asked if it was possible to buy the dress.  :)  
Enjoy this dress!  It is a lot of fun to wear!
Too tight in the chest, had to pin it to keep my 36DDs in check.

I rented this as a back up dress for NYE but ended up wearing a different dress. I didn't like this dress for two reasons - 1. the back is completely different than what is pictured - it's just an opaque mesh back with a zipper - not the buttons/open back pictured and it's also much longer. My friend ended up wearing the dress and she is very tall - approx 5' 9" and it was almost knee length on her. We ended up folding the dress under so it would be a little (4 inches) shorter. Otherwise it was a nice dress and the fit was good - it's just a lot more conservative than the photo shown.

This jumpsuit is gorgeous. It runs a bit short so a long length is probably necessary for anyone over 5'7". They did not have my backup size 12 available to ship and the 10 was just a bit too tight to be comfortable all night so I did not end up wearing it. I would definitely love to try the 12 on though. It would probably be a perfect fit.

Fits true to size, very comfortable, can wear a strapless bra with it and has pockets! Love the pockets! Paired it with the Kate Spade Dress the Part Fan Clutch. Would buy both these items to keep if I had more events to wear it to.

I rented this dress for Thanksgiving dinner out with my family. I loved the length and color. The back detail and full length zipper set it apart from a regular pencil dress. While both the M and L fit, I felt like the L made more sense since I was going to be stuffing my face all night. I did find the armpit area to be a little tight but that's because I have a very broad chest/shoulder area. The only downside was that my hair was constantly being caught in the zipper, which reaches all the way to the top of the turtleneck in back.

The dress was very comfortable to wear, fit quite well except it runs a bit large, which made a portion of the zipper bunch at the middle of the back of the dress. 
Very slenderizing, comfortable, and classic option.

I received a 4 and a 2 in the dress and wore the 2. The 2 fit perfectly. It's a little shorter than it looks in the photos, and there's absolutely no give to the fabric. I had to remember not to lean over too far and was a little uncomfortable with how high it rode when I sat. The neckline is also a little lower than it looks in the photos, but with the cut and the lining, I wasn't afraid of busting out.

That said, the dress is easy to accessorize and very fun. I donned my trusty nude heels and a chunky gold bracelet for the wedding I attended. I received a lot of compliments, too! Halfway through the night, I realized the dress has pockets. I didn't have anything to put in there, but I did show them off to my friends.
I am a little busty and was able to wear this top with a regular bra which I love. I go between a size 4-6 and the Medium was perfect for me.

For me, the fit could have been a little tighter in the chest, but it wasn't baggy at all. I wore 4'' heels and the length was perfect. It was so comfortable, easy to walk around and dance it (including tromping through a park and jumping around a lot).

I did not actually end up wearing the dress.  I have a very long torso and the defined waist just hit too high up on my rib cage.  The color was bright and beautiful and i received the dress in perfect condition.  However it just wasn't the right style for my body and was lucky I had a back-up dress!
The color is darker in person. Great dress for a rehearsal dinner!

The dress fit really well. I'm usually a 2 and needed a 4 for more athletic legs. The only issue was the hanging straps kept falling down. An adhesive dot would be perfect to hold them up though. Overall, a great dress that I would definitely recommend!
Would definitely wear this brand again.
The bust does run large and since I am large in that area , fashion tape and a pin were necessary so I wouldn't flash everyone. It was very long which was great for me since I am tall.

This dress is adorable. It fits tight enough on the top to be cute and flares out in a way that is very flattering for an hourglass shape. I found the neckline to be the perfect v neck depth as well. My only complaint is that this dress is very thick. I thought I'd be able to wear it in to Spring with unlimited, but I think its too warm for that. Would rent again!
Very comfortable, beautiful dress. Received lots of complements, particularly on the back. Very glad I rented it!!!!

I can't rate this dress highly enough- it's a true show-stopper. The amount of compliments I received was crazy, but even more gratifying was how amazing I FELT in the gown. The only other dress I've ever felt so beautiful wearing was my wedding gown. 

The bust on it was a bit big, but it was a simple fix for me, where I simply basted a couple of loose stitches on the inside, which were easily removed before I sent the dress back. Or someone without sewing skills, a padded bust cup insert would have been another good solution. 

The dress was understandably very wrinkled when it arrived, but was easy to steam/iron for a perfect look. 

Another "pro" for this dress is that it's so stunning, you really don't need flashy accessories to complete the look. Strappy, nude heels and a nice pair of earrings are all you need. 

The dress is comfortable to wear, and light as a feather, so even on a hot summer night would be a great choice. 

I literally can't say enough positive things about wearing this dress. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
The pockets are great. The dress runs a little big. I would get one size down. I would rent this again ... I got so many compliments!

I received many compliments on this dress. The color and style were a great match. The dress fit well, the bottom band was a little bit tight so not ideal for a ton of movement but I was still able to dance the night away.
It wore the smaller of the size for a tighter fit. The 42 fit well, but looked more shift dress.
The jumper was a little too short in the torso for me, and as a result, the crotch tugged. Luckily I was traveling with a friend who is shorter than me. She borrowed the jumper and looked great!
Material was very comfortable and the stripes gave it such an interesting element

Just as other reviewers suggested, it was much more fitted than appears in the photo. While normally a size 4, I ordered a 6 and 8, as folks said it runs tight around the hips. The 6 was perfection. Overall a wonderful experience!

Flirty, cute, and pretty comfy. Definitely is a bit heavier and shorter than it looks (see other reviews), but I wore it in southern Spain and it was still easy/not too hot. Makes your shoulders look amazing, great color, and can be dressed up or down.

The fit of the dress was pretty true to size. I like dresses that have a tighter fit up top, but usually with that it means that it is hard to move around. With this dress, however, even with it being tight, it was still easy to move around! The only issue I had with this dress was that the zipper was a little messed up so it took a little bit of time to get on, but other than that it was great. The only thing I would mention is it was just long enough for my feet to be covered in flats, so if you like heels, your feet might show a bit.
Great fit. Comfortable. Perfect for work. Skirt is lined to so don't worry about the light fabric being see-through.

I was thrilled I could wear a regular bra with the dress.  The photo appears to have a very low back however it doesn't.  I wore 4" heels and the length was perfect.  Definitely a WOW dress if you are looking to make a statement.

Color is very bright and fun. Material is a bit thick, so it can hide some imperfections if needed. I have a large bust and did not wear a bra. I felt pretty comfortable with it. Pattern is fun and different.

Gorgeous color and the detailing makes it a very special A-line dress. Compliments throughout the night. Worked very well for my fiance's MBA program holiday party. Runs a little large in the chest; I'm usually a size 6 or 8 and probably could have fit in the 6.
The jacket was actually pretty heavy, perfect for Fall weather. I liked it, I should have sized down, it was drowning me just a bit.

Great LBD. Loved all my photos in it. 4 stars because I wish it was a little tighter in the bust. The straps fell to the sides on me a few times. I am not small chested but also not big- I am a B/C therefore I should be the perfect fit for it. I went braless- fabric is thick enough to hide everything for the most part. There is no stretch in the dress so this could be a little risky.

by design, its missing the last bottom at the bottom. i often found my self flashing people. quite embarrassing. you'll need to have a safety pin readily available for this one. also, the buttons in general are set apart. have another pin for your breast area, if you are large breasted, you will have a gap here, too.

Perfect dress for a winter wedding I attended. Unique! I loved wearing it and it fit great. It's a little roomy, but that's the style. I'm pretty short so a pair of 3 1/2 inch heels complimented it perfectly. This was my first RTR rental! I'm hooked.
I am usually a Medium but I ordered a small as back up and it fit perfectly. I was able to wear a strapless bra, it was super light and comfortable

The dress fit like a glove and with my large bust line, it actually make it appear proportional to my body which was amazing!! I paired this with a pair of dove grey strappy sandals, gunmetal crystal chandelier earrings and a bold fuschia lip. 
The dress was so amazing, my dad insisted on buying it for me so that I could wear it over and over.
It fit very well! It shows off the legs wonderfully and is a very forgiving fit.

The material had some stretch, but it is definitely a form fitting dress. It was very comfortable. The only issue I had was that the straps were VERY long. Several inches needed to be pinned for the top of the dress to stay up. The dress is definitely lower cut, but was appropriate once the straps were pinned.

Loved this dress - wish I could keep it! Was definitely tight but 1 size above normal dress size fit well.  The cutout is nice, but the dress also looked great pulled up to have more coverage.  Would definitely rent again!

Received this dress in my back up size of 20W because the dress I originally ordered (Adriana Papel Sip and See Sheath) was not available. Even tho my original dress fit in the size 18, I went with this one because I loved it so much!! It was a bit large - definitely could have gone with the 18 in this model - but as part of the wedding I attended required us to sit on the floor, I decided the larger size might be a bit more comfortable anyway. It also ran a bit long on me, but that's typical as I'm only 5'3. I got TONS of compliments on how flattering the color was! I would definitely recommend this! I'm already considering ordering it in a size down for a future event :)
I'm ordered a size 6 to be safe but could have totally worn a size 4. Very flattering dress.

I loved the dress, very cute, shiny fabric, but not overdone. However, the top fitted ok but  even considering the skirt is made to bluff out, it was really oversized for me in spite of having somewhat wide hips.
Fabric was a bit on the heavy side but other than that it was very comfortable to wear.

Ok, this dress is stunning. The fabric could not be prettier (it's a neoprene material, by the way).
