The pros are exactly how beautiful it is, that it is really warm for winter, and it has an overall very flattering fit. It is rather short by the way, so dark thighs may be a necessity. It has some cons though. The first one is that it has a weird fit in the arms. The opening between shoulder and arm is rather large, but then the fabric compresses the arm itself. So, it accommodates a thicker arm around the shoulder, but not at the biceps area. This was annoying, and I felt pretty uncomfortable wearing it because of that. Two other cons, which are no big deal: the sleeves are really long. It's ok for wearing it standing up, but if you need your hands at all you will have to bring the sleeves up, which is not very easy to do with this dress, and also loses part of  its charm. The second is that the dress is warm indeed, so you will feel hot if you are either walking a lot, dancing or just being at a warm enough venue. One thing which may interest some: I was 6 months pregnant when I wore it, and it does not compress the belly at all. I was quite comfortable there in spite of the bump, my discomfort was all because of the arms.

Runs small. Loved this top. Was disappointed that it did not come like it is in the photo online. I did not receive the piece the falls to the side as shown in the pic. Other than that, it was still a cute top and I received lots of compliments on it. I wore it to brunch.
The color is really pretty in person and definitely stands out in a crowd.

This dress is beautiful and I got so many compliments. It is form fitting, but the material is stretchy.  I found it super comfortable to wear all night and dance in. Word of warning: those with small chests take care.  I had to wear 2 very padded bras in order to hold the dress up, otherwise the gold lining fell below my breasts.  I probably could have gotten a 2 and 4, but I went with the 4 and 6, ultimately wearing the 4.  Highly highly recommend this dress.

I am a size 6, and the medium fit my perfectly. I’ve rented several RTR dresses in the past and like them all, but this one was truly the most comfortable and I also got tons of compliments on it. The fabric has some stretch to it. It fits like a glove. I would definitely rent it again.

Such a comfortable and fun dress I decided to make it work vs sending it back. I added a sheer black blouse and a lace half-camisole to offset the plunging neckline issue. 
-- Mega-stretchy so it will both show what ya got and adapt to various body types. Thick material good for smoothing over things.
-- I'd size down for backup, though broader shoulders or larger bust might fill out top ok
-- DEEP plunge to bottom of bra band on me ( I'm short-waisted so also had a little extra fabric in back)
-- Longer in the back on 5'4 me than is ideal for flattery (hit mid-calf), but curving high-low hem makes this a special dress so I left it alone
Easy to wear without a bra, comfortable and perfect for any weather.  Material is stretchy and durable.  Wore with 3.5" heels and dress came just to the floor.

Fit is very snug and the material is very nice but a bit heavy. I was unable to wear because it was a bit short and it was for a religious wedding. I did not want to show that much skin, it shows a lot of leg! However, I will be renting this for the next wedding I go to for sure!

This one shouldered black gown is so beautiful and versatile!  Running true to size, I would suggest sizing up for backup in this style.  The fabric is pretty heavy and does not allow for much stretch, and for that reason I would say this style works best for A to C bust sizes.  With the one shoulder look on this gown, I would suggest going with a strapless bra.  The natural waist is definitely very fitted, but it did allow comfortable room throughout the midsection.  I would suggest sizing up for fuller hips as that area is definitely quite fitted.  The one shoulder sleeve was definitely a bit tight on my broader shoulders, so that's definitely something to keep in mind.  At 5'7"  this hit right at the bottom of the floor without heels so I would definitely suggest a long length for women my height or taller.  This dress is perfect for a black tie wedding or gala, and I would pair it with a beautiful pair of long earrings, a shiny clutch and strappy heels.

The dress was comfortable and flattering for both a wedding and a gala. The top is "just right," not too loose, not too tight. The skirt is long and hit just below my knees. The skirt has a great lift when you spin in it (great for dancing) and covers well if you need to bend down. And it has roomy pockets! The colors are bright and the fabric is light. I wore a light sweater with it as well as the Kate Spade rose gold crystal lace necklace, which was exceptionally sparkly. Overall an excellent choice. I would rent again.

I had a love-hate relationship with this dress. I love love loved the look and got tons of compliments but this is not the dress for busy girls.  I am 5'2" 115 lbs with a 30F bust.. After reading other reviews I  decided to size up. I typically wear a 0-2 and orderd a 2 & 4. I wore the 2  since it fit my waist better but I ended up with the oh so lovely armpit boob overflow all night. My other issue was the boning. The boning ends just at your natural waist and was pretty uncomfortable so after a long night of dancing I ended up with a scab on my hip where the boning rubbed. The length was perfect with 4 in heels. Of course being so short it didn't have the same dramatic high-low look like the model but I still loved it. Overall it was gorgeous and I loved the rich fabric and cut but bust girls be cautious!!!

Rented this for a beach wedding week cocktails event, but didn't love how the peplum looked (too much layer on the side) so ended up wearing it with a fitted sage leather jacket to work instead.  Not your standard work dress, but worked with the jacket dress-up.  Got multiple compliments from colleagues.  Was cute and different but not a home run.

I was expecting 70 or such degree dresses casual for a weekend away.  This was a perfect 10 in weight of jacket and the colors vibrant din print more fun then a sweater and a nice change up from jean jacket.

I wore this dress for my engagement photos since I wanted to hide my arms - I have to say that this dress is made VERY well - the lining is really soft and comfortable, and the skirt has a fun swing to it. Highly recommended !

However, I think you need to wear no tights or nude tights with this dress - i paired it with nude heels (i felt it looks best styled this way)
Great for third trimester baby bump; very flattering and the length was good given the extra bump coverage

I liked this dress and it was perfect for a black tie fundraising gala that I attended.  However, the thin strip of material around the center of the waist was pretty uncomfortable. The rest of the dress fits true to size in the bust, hip/butt area, and thighs, but for some reason the strip between the lace sections felt tight to me all night. It's not a deal breaker for me, but take note of this and maybe consider sizing up.
This dress is amazing. It fit great and I didn't have issues with the shoulders falling down. Definitely worth it for a party or even a summer/fall wedding.
The dress is beautiful, but the sizes are weird...I tried on the 8 and my back was showing in a very unflattering way, then the 10 is okay in the back but the tummy area is too big.
LOVED this dress. So soft, great fit, perfect length (I am 5'8"). The open back is a nice touch too, and the adjustable straps make the fit even better!
This dress was perfect for the Coachella music festival. It was such a great option for the hot desert... and it was so much fun pairing it with some black booties and a wild fanny pack. :)

I rented this to wear over the weekend and received tons of compliments.  Love the versatility of getting two pieces for a single rental and the underlying dress flutters beautifully in the breeze.  Plus the overall look was surprisingly flattering considering the cut and shape.

The dress fit perfectly! I read reviews that said it ran long, so I bought 5 inch heels and it just barely touched the ground when I walked. My favorite part of the dress was actually the way it flowed around me when I walked. I would definitely recommend this dress (:

Between the color, cut and pockets in this dress, I wanted to love it. However, the back up size 14 zipped closed but the straps gapped significantly, and the 12 was incredibly tight on my chest (too uncomfortable for a night of dancing). This dress is beautiful but not meant for women with a larger chest.
Quite tight over the chest and the skirt is fuller than expected but absolutely loved the dress.

This dress is fun and just flirty enough.

This dress rides up a bit at the bottom, especially if you have a caboose like mine. However, a little fashion tape secured the hem and slip before my event.

I suggest renting this dress based upon your waist size---the open back and high neckline make this dress easy to wear regardless of bust size.
The dress fit perfectly and was made of a thick material which kept me warm despite it's mesh slit around the middle. A very classy dress!

I wore this dress for Easter church and brunch. It was comfortable and pretty.  I wore flats and it was a bit long on me. I took off one star because it had some slight pulling/loose strings in a few areas. They weren't very noticeable though.

I wore this out to dinner in NYC on Valentine's Day. I usually wear a size 8, but was not available. Good thing I ended up renting the size 10 since it was a little snug in the middle of the back. This was a little stretchy in the midsection so I had room to breathe, very comfortable. Would recommend this dress to anyone.

wore this to a wedding in Santa Barbara in November. It was unseasonably cold so the long sleeves and thick fabric were great. I loved this dress - color and fit are fantastic! Length hit just at my knees. The details were great.

This dress was beautiful! I am tall so this dress was short waisted and would ride up making a pucker above my bottom. I constantly pulled it down. I Usually wear a 6 but would have loved an 8 in this.

Getting this dress was so easy and I loved it! I do wish I hadn't let them talk me out of getting the 14, the 16 was a little big and they told me to order a 18 as my backup. Great condition! Will be ordering from RTR again!

I am 5'5 and the dress hit me right at the knee. The dress looks much shorter on the model in the photo, so it really depends on your height. The fit was perfect and I didn't even have to try on the second size option. This dress is a little on the heavy side so I would not recommend it for a summer wedding. The wedding I went to was in the fall so it was perfect to keep me a little warmer.

The only problem with this dress was the zipper - it was VERY difficult to zip up. I'm usually between a 4 and 6, but have been fitting into 4's recently. I ordered the 4R and 2R since some others said the dress runs a little big. The 4 fit me just right. I wore 4 inch heels and thought the regular length would be too short, but it was perfect. I paired the dress with Nicole Miller chandelier earrings which completely made the outfit!

LOVED wearing this shirt. I rented it for "everyday", but wore it once to work (elementary school teacher). It wasn't as light and airy as I thought it would be, but it was still fun to wear. I wouldn't recommend it if you're going to be outside in the summer heat all day, but if you've got some AC pumping, please wear this and you'll feel pretty pretty pretty!
The dress fit perfectly!  I didn't want to send it back!

This dress is simple but the color gives it style. I added a statement necklace and wore it to a "south beach chic" party. I also wore it with just a blazer to a work event. It ran true to size, and was good for my petite frame. It's a solid rental. Don't expect compliments or head turns, but do rent if you want a versatile piece that you can personalize with layers and/or accessories.
This dress was comfortable and gorgeous! The only con, you can't wear a bra but with the fit, you don't need one.

The detail of the dress is amazing.  I wore it for my daughters baptism and it was perfect for the event.  Classy yet pretty and soft.  Fit was great, comfortable and flattering, even a few months postpartum.  Fit just right.
great dress!-definitely short but got a lot of compliments!

weirdly, Slate and Willow (this second dress) in size 4 fits me although in everything else I'm a 6-8 (and, the other dress in my order was a cynthia rowley that would have fit me in size 12!). I'm 148lbs, 5'7", 34DD and 28 waist.

the V dip is supported by strong wire so the dress doesn't do any weird wrinkling or buckling. I rented it to wear to a nice work event, and thought it would look ok w/ a jacket over it, but that V part is really too low for the office, so now planning to wear it on a date.

The material for this dress was sturdy and stretchy which made its wear super comfortable.  The only con was that the zipper continuously shifted to the right side so I was constantly fixing it.  Otherwise, I would order again.

I ordered the medium and the large and both fit but I wore the large to be more comfortable for a daytime festival. I wore it with low heeled wedges. Got a lot of compliments. Also, the fabric doesn't wrinkle!
Fit true to size, gorgeous dress.

I liked the length and fabric of the dress. My only complaint was the zipper. It kept getting stuck and at the end of the night I had a really difficult time getting out of the dress because the zipper would not budge. I didn't even try on my backup dress  size 4R because the zipper was broken so I think this is an overall flaw with this dress.

True to size, in my opinion. The color is a deeper red, not maroon, but not bright red. Perfect for a fall wedding in Central Texas. The 6 and 8 were comparable in fit, so I went with the 8 to make myself think I had more room. It was easy to dance/move in, and the racer back and slit were the perfect amount of sass for the evening without being over the top. I wore no show undies and pasties and didn't have any problems. The only con was a deodorant stain on the armpit (that I didn't notice until we were on our way). I was able to clean it up well enough. Great rental.

This dress is really beautiful!  I got compliments all night!  As other reviewers said, the zipper is really tricky and definitely requires a second person to zip it up.  I had to go braless because I just could not find a bra that wouldn't show with the cut of the dress.  The dress was definitely tight - if you have hips, size up!  Because it was pretty tight in the hips, it kept puckering on the lower back so I had to keep pulling it down.  Annoying to me, but not noticeable to anyone else.  This wasn't the most comfortable dress, but it is really beautiful.
A little double sided tape solved the problem of it falling off the shoulders. I do agree with others that it was an issue. However, this is very comfortable. I felt like a work of art.

I wore this to my best friends bridal shower. I liked this dress, it was comfortable. It fit me a little weird though it was tight in the waist but loose on the top, and I have larger shoulders so that's unusual. The slit was a kind of high as mentioned in other reviews so beware, maybe bring a safety pin. Over all it was a nice dress, but not my favorite that I've rented from here.

I ordered this as a backup for my prom dress, and I didn't end up wearing it. It wasn't the fit or quality, it just didn't compare to the other dress. I had my heart set on wearing the other one, so that swayed my opinion. The 4L was too long, and I definitely could've worn a regular. It's a gorgeous dress and if this is your style I highly recommend renting it!

I'm 5'1" and 100lbs, I ended up wearing this in a size 2. This was actually a replacement dress to the one that I had originally reserved, and I was so happy with it. Great cut across the shoulders. Material is of exceptional quality, heavy enough with lots of stretch to be extremely comfortable. Paired it with some gorgeous bling earrings that I rented and a bright necklace with lots of sparkle. Wish I had a photo, the only one I have is blurry. :(  This is not the first time I've rented and won't be the last!

Fit true to size.  There is some give so the dress accentuates curves in all the right places.  I did need a backless bra (NuBra backless adhesive bra); the low back is tastefully sexy.  I wore a short slip to eliminate friction between my Spanx and the dress lining so the dress wouldn't ride up around the hips.  I was disappointed to find that my backup size was not available but it probably would have been too big in the bust area anyway even though the extra hip room  may have eliminated the need for the slip.  The scratchy sequins under the arms were a minor irritation that was well worth the way I felt in this dress!  I wore it to a holiday cocktail party and got many, many compliments!  The beautiful blue was one-of-a-kind in a sea of typically-colored holiday dresses.
great fit with full skirt.
perfect for a weekend getaway, easy to dress up or down,,, but not too dressy.  It does run on the short side, so I would only recommend if legs are your asset

I wore this for a black tie wedding in December. I wanted a dress that was conservative and elegant. This was a great choice because while it was modest and classy, there were a few details that made this a little playful and sassy: the sequins up top, the silky pleated skirt, and the crop look with illusion mesh. Some dresses make you work to wear them, but this dress isn't! It's like wearing that comfy sweater - where you don't have to worry about bra straps sticking out, sheer material for an oops moment, too long trails, etc - but you still get to look fabulous. 

For sizing, I think I could have even gone down one size as my waist is more petite, and that area is the most fitted area of the dress. However, I was happy with the size I got.

For dress length - I am 5'7", wore 3" heels with no platform height in the front. The SR dress fell about 2 inches from the ground.

I loved the cut, the fabric and color scheme of this dress. It was very comfortable and professional for a work environment. I received compliments and felt great while wearing it. I would rent it again! 

Measurements laying flat:
Bust: 18"
Waist: 19"
Length (not including long pointy panel): 32.5"

This jumpsuit is so comfortable. My best friend was sad I rented it because she wanted to borrow it later! True to size, no issues with fit; made me look really lean even though I have a small tummy pooch (you can't tell!). I received compliments all night.

I rented this dress for our Sedona, AZ elopement.  Beautiful gold and white to accent the exquisite red rock back drop.  I have received so many compliments on this dress and I felt elegant, sophisticated and feminine.  Very, comfortable dress - trudged up and down a mountain to get these shots with no issues!   This was very true to size - i am 5'9" and wore the 6L.  I also wore 3" heels in these photographs so the dress was the idea length.

Definitely fitted. Luckily, I'm pretty flat chested so it wasn't a huge deal, but I do have a big rib cage so the dress was tight. Received many compliments on the dress! Pro- you don't have to worry about eating/drinking too much as it's forgiving. I was only sent one size, so I didn't have an option, but I would order a size up just in case!

Pro: perfect length! Few accessories needed, great in photos, many compliments and very flattering!
Cons: After a few hours of wearing it, got a bit itchy, don't plan on wearing a bra, definitely get tape and rides up  just a  bit

I'm very curvy and this fit everything well. I didn't have much extra room in the torso, so while it was comfortable to wear to a theater show, I'm not sure how comfortable I would have been dancing or doing something requiring bending over, reaching, etc. without giving myself a wedgie! I needed help zipping and unzipping this, but there was a really nice lady in the bathroom who unzipped me then waited for me so she could zip me back up! The sleeves are very long and bunched up at the wrists a bit. There are no button holes, so I used the holes in the lace to push the buttons through. I played with turning the sleeves under for a hidden cuff, and that worked too. It is also very low cut and so I ultimately wore it with cami underneath (one pic has cami, the other one doesn't). I would wear it again.

The original dress I ordered wasn't available, so I had to pick this replacement quickly.  I was very happy with it.  I ordered the 2P because the last time I ordered a gown I ordered the Regular and I was stepping on it during the whole party.  This was the perfect length, and I wore two inch heels.  It was a bit snug in places, but that is they way it is supposed to fit, because it looked right and wasn't uncomfortable.  The material is heavy and stretchy so very comfortable and gives warmth at a winter party.  The slit lets you show some leg, which gave this simple dress a little splash of sexy!

The dress fit true to size. The sequins on the sleeves bothered me a little but nothing that was unbearable. I ordered the size 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 4 since it was a tighter fit.  If you want the dress to fit like the model I would recommend ordering up a size or two.  Although I received a lot of compliments on the dress, the only downside for me was that people also recognized it as a RTR favorite.

Beautiful top. I had to steam it, but it wasn't a big deal. The flow is just so pretty...and a pop of shoulder is a lot of fun. I wore to an evening affair, but if I owned this it would be my favorite work-to-night-out top because with a suit jacket, it's completely polished/professional and with the bare shoulders, it's flirty and feminine. Also, I have a long torso and the length was still good.

The dress is extremely comfortable, and it fit me perfectly. It is a classically beautiful dress with a twist, and I received so many compliments all night! I wore the dress to a wedding and it was perfect for dancing the night away. I highly recommend this dress, and I will probably rent the exact same dress again!
I wore a low back strapless bustier under the dress.  I kept the jewelry simple wearing only earrings.  You  have to take short steps as the dress is narrow and comes down below the knee.
It fit great, but I do recommend some fashion tape to keep the dress in place up top

The top strap's clamps were both broken, and it arrived a day late (after I had already left for the wedding). Very disappointing because I've been wanting to wear this ever since I signed up for unlimited!
Front pleat was adorable. I wore it a few times.  Once with a blouse and once with a t-shirt.
This dress was beautiful, but I may order a size down next time. It was very spacious around the waist- so much so that I needed to wear a belt. Loved the slight high-low.
Love this dress!  Versatile.  I wore it to work with a black blazer but you could wear this to a party, date, wedding, etc. The colors make it fun; the length makes it appropriate.
I wore a pink slip underneath because it might be a bit revealing in the chest. But as all DVF wrap-dresses go, this was divine.
The dress runs true to size and fit nicely, and it was very comfortable.  I will definitely be renting another dress from Rent the Runway!
It was cute, but uncomfortable. The collar was very itchy! Definitely size up if you have a large bust.

Usually the issue for me is that if the top fits, the bottom is too small and vice versa, but in this instance the bottom fit but I couldn't get the back strip to connect so I had to essentially wear it as a backless dress. It worked, but was not ideal. It was also much longer on me than shown on the model.
Super fun and very comfortable to wear. It is a bit long.

Badgley Mishka dresses always work well for me and this dress is no exception. I rented the longer version of this dress for a wedding earlier this year. The dress is beautiful and elegant. The top was a little large (which is unusual for me I am a a 34D) but other than that it was true to size.

I typically wear an XS/S, and rented the XSR (size small was not available for the dates I needed). It was slightly snug at the neckline and bust, but I think the size small would have been too large through the rib-cage. I loved the dress, and the print is beautiful. I got compliments on it all evening. Overall, highly recommend this dress.

The dress was fabulous. I reserved the 6 and 8 buy chose to wear the 8 because it fit my hips better. I received so many compliments. It shows a lot of cleavage so you may want to pin the top. Regarding the zipper, it was a little tough to zip up. I had a friend help me zip it up and was able to unzip it myself at the end of the night. I wouldn't let that deter you from renting it though.

As others mentioned, it was short, but for a cocktail party where you are standing most of the time it was fine.  I wore shorter heels to offset the hemline.  The dress was a great balance: showing a little skin but not too much; conservative color but fun sparkle.
The fit was great, the fabric was on the stretchier side and the fit forgives the imperfections for someone like me with more curves. It truly is a dress that makes you feel like a million bucks!!

Due to stretch in the fabric, I thought it ran a little large. Unfortunately my second size was not available for my date. The color is beautiful, more purple than burgundy.  Fit is off the shoulders so I wore a strapless bra. Faell below the kneeor me. Fabric hides any flaws. Very flattering. I will definitely rent again.

Overall fit was comfortable. Needed heels to make the shorter pant leg look more intentional. Ended up wearing a strapless bra for added support, although the boning in the dress probably would have been fine on its own. I bounce between a 6 and an 8 regularly, but the 6 fit perfectly.

I wore this dress for prom. I absolutely loved it. It was actually my backup dress and the only size available was an 8 (which I am but 10 is better for some dresses not all). At first the zipper would stop around the waist area but I got it eventually. It fit me like a glove. I received so many compliments and I really stood out. The slits added a nice touch. The only downfalls was that it was a little too long. I am5'4. Heals made it a little better. The slip underneath wasn't really a problem. I had to pull it down once or twice. I was not able to wear underwear with it and I wore a backless bra. It was an awesome dress that was very fitting and snug.

This is one of my favorite rentals of all times.  The jacket added an extra cool vibe to every outfit. Seriously - I'm buying it!  Loved the fabric which was a soft tweedy boulce but the under the length of the arms and sides were thin jersey-like neoprene.  It made the jacket very comfortable to wear.  Not necessarily super warm but great for cool days/evenings.

It fit pretty well, was comfortable, and was easy to wear undergarments with it. I think it would have looked even better on someone who is taller. I'm pretty short, but it still fit well enough that everyone said I looked great it in. :)

I love VINCE. Their material is quality and comfortable, while their cuts are flattering for my straight boyish figure. Wore this dress to work with lots of compliments. The only critique is that the bottom hem seemed to be pressed incorrectly.

I wish I could find this dress so I could buy it.  I rented this dress twice and I wish I could find it in the store so I could buy it already.  I love it sooo much and it is sooo my style.  I love that it doesn't wrinkle and it is so easy to style with any shoe or cardigan.  It photographs beautifully and it is perfect for spring and summer day parties.

The fit was perfect...not stretchy so make sure you order the correct size.  Gorgeous dress the only flaw was the inside of my upper arm rubbing against the fabric the sequins were rough on my skin but definitely not enough to bother or regret this dress

This dress ran a bit shorter than I was expecting but was a good fit overall.  I received many compliments and my fiancé was definitely happy with my choice. The material is thick and comfy which made it a great choice for a fall wedding.

Was a little big in the stomach/hip area but I do have a small frame. I still wore it and liked it but could have fit a little better. 
In my picture I am actually pulling the fabric in the back of the dress tighter. So it's not a completely true depiction of how it fit.
The fit was just not flattering.  I think it may be the "bib" on the top, which doesn't seem very bulky in photos, but it actually was.

This dress was suggested to me by RTR after my 1st choice dress was not available. I wore this dress to a daytime party with low heel sandals.  I also experimented with a dressier look with a rattan belt and wedge heels but decided on a more casual look.  The tangerine color is unique and the silk is beautiful.  Dress was in like-new condition.  I would rent this dress again!

Wore this to a fundraiser that my husband was being honored at in recognition for his involement in recruiting and registering new donors to the Bone Marrow Transplant registry. I was looking for something that would showcase the tattoo I got in honor of my daughters illness and recovery from HLH. Im not normally the flashy type, but when i put this dress on, I felt like a million bucks! It fit perfectly, without feeling tight. I'm only 5'1" and was able to wear with a regular heel (no platform/5" required). I received dozens of compliments and was dubbed "First Lady of the Gala" by the event organizers. It was the most beautiful I've ever felt. You won't be disappointed. Rent this dress and know what its like to be a star!

I love this dress - it was my first piece ordered via my Unlimited account that I wanted to keep.  I paired it with a white leather motorcycle jacket for daytime wear, and it went from day-to-night effortlessly because of the print and the material.  It fit true to size from the standpoint of it's a dress meant to be light, loose and airy, but I could see how folks might want to size down to get a slimmer fit.  At 5'7", the dress hit at my calves, same as the model picture.

The dress fit very well,had to wear a strapless bra because of the way the sleeves cut. The material is thicker but it worked well for a spring evening. Wore it out for my birthday dinner and couldn't be happier!
I'm 5'5" -- the long was perfect with 4" heels! Cant wait to rent in another color!
Some signs of wear

I like this top, although I was expecting it to be more matte than what it actually was. The sleeves are great and not as much a handicap as I thought they might be. However, due to the fabric, I would recommend this more for an evening out than for everyday.
Loved the dress! It is super soft and comfortable. I wore it to work and a date night. I would rent again!
Loved this jacket. Rented it for Thanksgiving, but ended up wearing it a couple more times. It fits true to size and is really warm, which was convenient for the cold weather in Michigan!

Loved this dress for a wedding in late May 2016. I am usually a size two and I should have sized down to a zero as it was definitely a little big. Since it was a little big, I couldn't get away without a bra. The sides under the armpit go low which meant a strapless bra would show. I got the sticky cups instead and they worked great! Overall, I was impressed with my RTR experience.

Rented this for a girls' dinner. Super cute, worn as a dress with black tights, fit loose but not in an overwhelming way. Fur sleeves were fab. Would go with your normal size, because the body fit is loose but the neck is super tight.

Cons: very warm, hard to fit in jacket sleeves, and neck is VERY tight - uncomfortably so. Also, arrived with very strong cleaning smell. Would consider renting again, but neck was just a little too much for me.

I enjoyed wearing this royal blue dress out to an engagement party.  It feels very classic.  And is more blue than the photos -- I almost didn't recognize it in the RtR Las Vegas Store!  I enjoyed wearing this dress and would consider it again.

This dress is a true Womens size.  The lining has some stretch, so it is really easy to wear.  It has bra hook thingies, but I didn't need them.

The dress was true to size. It is snug but comfortable enough to spend the entire night with it on. It does make a weird folding in the front that makes you look like if you have a small belly. I think this happened because the inside slip might have shrunk a little.  Like other reviewers it is comfortable enough to wear braless and not feel exposed. Over all I loved the dress had great comments. A great rental.
Perfect fit!

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding in May. It's ABSOLUTELY gorgeous in person - the color is so unique and fit like a glove. I'm 5'1" and I have an hourglass/petite/athletic figure. It definitely runs small and sucks you in a bit, so if you're uncomfortable in tight clothes, I'd say that's the only reason to reconsider. This is such a beautiful dress and I enjoyed every second of wearing it!
Very comfortable

Fit well - was snug to my body with an extra layer in the back to make it more wedding appropriate (and length was just above the knee). Fabric was a bit on the thick side but it was cool weather so it was great. Overall, loved it!

The dress was amazing and I felt so great wearing it. I ordered both the 4R and 6R. I'm a 32DDD so I'm always nervous about sizing/fit but the 6R fit nicely and the adjustability of the open back helped. The 4R fit as well but the straps were defective...it was one combined strap as opposed to two separate straps. You need two straps in order to loop through the back and I didn't want to cut the strap. Very odd but overall lovely dress!
Leather is wonderfully soft. Great jacket

I wore this to a wedding and would recommend it to anyone!  The fit was true to size and it was just long enough as I'm 5'2".  The fabric was light and somewhat stretchy.  Love everything about this dress- especially the open back!

It was a lovely dress and I received so many compliments all night long. Very flattering and showed up great in pictures. Fit like a glove and was on the line of almost being too tight. The neck line was beautiful but it was very tight, uncomfortably tight towards the end of the night.
I wore this with leggings. It is kind of short and doesn't sit at actual waist. It is cute and the color is quite muted. May rent again.

This Slate & Willow number was perfect for my birthday dinner & party! I've never received so many compliments in one night. Due to my figure I went a size up as the shoulders are the tightest part of the dress from previous reviews. The material is very thick, but the open back really helped especially for a summer birthday. I paired this dress with black heels, a red lip, and RTR Lotus Pendant Earrings.
Awesome dress for an evening wedding! Received so many compliments on the back!
Everything was great! I felt the dress ran a little small. I am usually a 4 and I wore the 6. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous!

It does fall down a little bit in the front and reveal a strapless bra if you're wearing one. I had to hike the top up throughout the night - however, I am very busty (30G) so that experience will only likely replicate itself if you're similarly busty. It was a beautiful, beautiful dress.

This dress is gorgeous. I wore it to a formal southern wedding and got a ton of compliments. Very lady-like. You should know that the fabric has texture and a beautiful sheen to it. Keep in mind that there is no stretch so you might want to size up for dancing purposes. Fit like a glove.
I loved this dress. The fabric was thin which was perfect for a summer day. The colors were vibrant and I loved the fabric. Very flattering.
Great dress but VERY short!

Loved this dress! However, with the dropped waist it would ride up on me (not sure if Spanx would help this). Also, the girls were on full display and there was no way around that. LOVE LOVE LOVE the lace detail and POCKETS!
Very heavy material but a beautiful dress!
It was rubbing on the shoulders and underarms, but other than that it was perfect!

This dress was snugged and I usually wear a 6 but that was too small. Luckily I ordered the 8 even though it was still a little snugged, I wore it anyways. The bust was loose but the rest of the dress was snugged so i purchased double sided tape to hold it up. Loved the dress though and I received a lot of compliments. Love RTR!!

Rented the small and medium.  Tried on the small first and never took the medium out of the bag.  Pairs will with lightweight black merino wool sweater, cuffed jeans and black booties.  Totally fun and whimsical.  A little something different for casual affairs.  Small fit well in shoulders and length.  Could have buttoned up but it loses some of the whimsy.  Fun without being childish.

The fit of this dress was okay. Personally, I think it looked better in pictures than in person. I felt sort of frumpy in it. I could not get the extra fabric on the side to hang right, even after attempting to steam out the wrinkles. Also, I did not realize the slit in the chest was so low....not really work appropriate. However, the rest of the dress, style-wise, was too conservative for a night out or a date, in my opinion, so I was left wondering where I'd really be able to wear it. Decided to return it for something else.
the vest was bright red, caught lots of attention. great for pictures
This dress fit exactly as I expected it to and just like the photo. Very happy with the choice.

I really loved this dress! The colors were even more vibrant in person. The open back was one of my favorite features....get yourself a sticky bra and you are good to go. The dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable to wear. Overall, my favorite dress I have rented from RTR!
So glam. Great to accentuate small waist. Paired with lace longsleeve shirt.  Loved this look :)

I wore this dress to Mardi Gras Ball. I felt amazing. I looked sexy and glamorous. This dress runs true to size. Actually, if you are curvy Monique Lhuillier is the way to go. I am between a 4 and 6 in the hip area.  and a 2-4 at the top. I can successfully wear a size 4 in this designer dresses and add a padded bra to accommodate the bust area. This dress very fitted  from the bust through the thigh area, with extra volume created with layers of crinoline. If you like drama and creating your moment this is your dress.
Definitely a bit on the large side so I ordered a size down which fit well. Also pockets!!

Loved this jacket! I paired it with a navy tank (yes, I didn't look close enough and discovered there's actually navy AND black accents on the jacket!), white skinny jeans and my favorite pink shoes. I was able to stay warm and feel fashionable at the same time.

I wore this jumpsuit to my company holiday party in December. As the event planner, I am constantly moving around and I am one of the people that starts dancing first so, that others would be encouraged to do so as well. The jumpsuit was a great alternative to a cocktail dress and allowed me to move with ease -- not to mention I was the only one wearing a jumpsuit so, it stood out nicely in a sea of dresses especially when paired with a statement necklace. The jumpsuit was true to size; however, the it was a little long so, heel height is key or fashion tape for the hem. The material also wrinkled easily which was a con for me. Overall this jumpsuit fits better than most and the material is most similar to crepe so, it did not add warmth, but kept me warmer than I would have been if I opted to wear a dress. The jumpsuit on the model looks more like a bordeaux color,  but in reality it was more on the purple side than  red.

This dress is STUNNING! Everyone loved this dress and even the bride told me multiple times how gorgeous it was! It fits perfectly with a Nubra. If you want to feel like you're on the red carpet, this is the dress for you. The regular just touched the floor for me and I only wore 1 inch heels.

This dress was perfect for a black tie event. I got so many compliments and it really was so comfortable. Fabric is a little weighted and physically heavy. Nice quality zipper and the fabric has a little stretch to it. I'm 5'5" so the highest point was right above my knee.
Loved this dress!

Flirty Lace byStylestalker. The dress is a beautiful color and very fitted on the bust size and will work for women A to C cup. This style is true to size and for the back up style I recommend going a size up as your back up size. This style you can wear a Nubra, I'm a 32A and with the 0R I would personally go bra-less.  If your bigger in the bust area I would reccomend buying fashion tape. I'm 5'1 with 3 inch heel the dress hit me above my knee.  I would wear this on a date and add a statement bracelet to give a pop to this dress.
Such an adorable top for summer nights - I wore it with white jeans and received so many compliments!! The bell sleeves tend to fold up so just keep an eye on them throughout the night :)

Wore this to Vegas for the 4th of July! It was flattering, glamorous, and perfect! Wish I owned it. Only thing was that the sequins under the arm start to really hurt by the end of the night, but I have sensitive skin.

My original dress I ordered in another style was lost in the mail by UPS. When I called to tell RTR the man spent 45 mins on the phone with me trying to find me another dress. After we found this one, he sent it overnight to me. It is a very beautiful dress, it's not as appealing when it's on the hanger and looks a bit mother of the bride until you put it on. I did not end up wearing it but, I tried the 18W it fit well and had enough room to move around in (the 16 may have made it difficult to dance in). Otherwise it's a very elegant and well made dress. Choose a size up from your normal size to be safe.
The fit was great. It was tight at the top and flowed out at the right spot. The length was definitely appropriate for a more conservative look.

I rented this dress for a formal event. Stunning dress; it does run small and I had to size up 2 sizes.
Pro: very beautiful dress with elegant details on the top part. The bottom flows with the wind or when you walk. Pockets that makes it easy to keep your phone, gloss etc... The length was a tiny tiny bit too long with 2 inches heels for me.
Cons: as some reviewers said, the top part can be a little bit hitchy but it was very minor. I had compliments all night long with this dress. A must rent.

This dress is beautiful. The fabric feels very luxurious. It is navy with gold accents that make the dress really stand out. The dress runs small - so thankful I ordered the backup. It drapes very nicely on the body, but recommend spanx for anyone who would feel self-conscious. The dress hit about my knee as it did in the picture of the model. I would recommend ordering one size larger than you normally wear for a better fit. You can't go wrong with this dress!

It was flowy and comfortable, I didn't feel like a stuffed sausage.  I am 5'7 and had to wear 4" heels so the dress didn't drag. I would normally consider myself an 8, but I am post-baby so my pre-baby sizing doesn't really apply anymore.
Flattering and awesome for work, day, and night
Unable to wear a bra with it because it would be shown.  Cute with white jeans.

I am usually an 8 but ended up wearing the ten. The 8 zipped up and made my boobs look better but the 10 was more comfortable. I will say the only negative is that it was very large on top. I'm a 34D and the dress didn't lay flush to my chest, it gaped out a little. Not enough to be noticeable but enough that they didn't look as "perky" as they would if it had fit properly. I didn't wear a bra and the material was thick enough so there was no nipple action. I think this dress looks gorgeous on every person here who has posted a photo. I strongly recommend it! Just get it early because there were only 2 size 8's left when I ordered 3 months in advance!!!
Very professionals and wears well.

The dress was fun and so comfortable!  Ive got a booty and never felt like the dress was being stretched by my hips/butt. Piece of advice - the back scoops pretty low so you either need a backless bra or pasties.

Wore this dress for a work photo shoot and loved it. I've worn it 4 or 5 times since - to work, on a date, to a work event. Great with leggings and ankle boots (in the winter). The top collar didn't always lay flat, but the neoprene material felt really good and hugged my body perfectly. I'm shorter (5" 1') so it came right to my knees. I got lots of compliments on this dress - including a woman at another table at the restaurant as I was walking by!

I ordered my usual sizes and neither of them fit.  Luckily, RTR gave me credit for a future rental, but I was super bummed it ran so small!  Definitely order a size UP if you're planning on wearing this!!

The smaller size (6) was the better size for me, but the zipper on that dress was extremely difficult to operate and the back of the dress had an area that might have been stretched or something because it bunched up. The size 8 was comfortable and flattering (though the top was just loose enough that I needed to pin the shoulders to my bra straps). 
The color is a rose-gold more than a regular gold. The fabric is heavy under all the sequins - it worked well for a late September wedding but I might have been hot earlier in the summer.

Great dress! I ordered it for a destination wedding and had the dress sent to the hotel. It arrived a day early and the hotel took care of shipping it back. The dress fit true to size. I wish I owned the dress so I could wear it again!
Fit beautifully!
Fits true to size, with lots of hip room and enough room for larger busts.
Very comfy. I'm 5'7" and 160 lbs and the 10 was a great fit. Wore this with a t-shirt dress and jeans and it was classy without any sacrifice of comfort. Perfect for chilly autumn or winter.

Rented this for a fundraising Gala. Loved the thicker fabric, felt warm in February. I'm 5'9 and the dress came just to my knees. The color is more of a berry - really rich, and the back is gorgeous! I didn't wear a bra with it, just 'petals' and it worked well. Other reviews say it's a stretchy dress - there's a bit of give but with the satin liner, I wouldn't say it's a stretchy dress. It's got a very slim fit that hugs your curves - the medium was spot on for me. The black liner does sometimes show from the bottom of the dress.

Great dress! I wore it as a bridesmaid in a wedding and it was true to size. I didn't have to wear a bra with it but I could have done with maybe pinning in some bra cups to the lining. Loved the length and it was super comfortable to dance and move around in all day/night. 

Only disappointment was that the second size was a different color! Like a purple-ish. Thankfully I didn't need it but a friend who rented the same dress in 2/4 complained about the same issue with the color difference for the back-up size. 

Would definitely recommend! This was my first RTR experience and it was so easy! The reviews helped with the size selection and the dress fit perfectly!

This dress was so much fun to wear!! I'm usually a 2 but had a baby 4 months ago. I got this as my back up dress and only size 6 was available but I figured I'd order it since it was only my back up and I had a few post-baby pounds left over. (I thought the 6 would be big but the dress runs small and was very form fitting. I wore Spanxx.)   I wound up returning my other dress and wearing this one. Perfect for a formal wedding because the sequin are subtle and the cut out in the back is tasteful (I'm usually super conservative so this was fun and adventurous to wear. I felt great!) I was able to wear a strapless bra with it (the first strapless bra I tried peeked out the back so try on multiple ones before you give up.) I wore bronze peep toe shoes & very minimal jewelry. The sequin did not irritate my arms like some users said. The slip does show on the bottom a little but I didn't mind. Overall, great dress if you want to step out of your comfort zone & have a little fun!
Unique and paired well with several of my bottoms

I got this for a rehearsal dinner with plenty of time to swap up a size if needed.  The top of the dress is very snug if you have a wide ribcage.  I absolutely love the dress and can't wait to wear it this weekend, just in a larger size.
This dress runs true to size, and has some stretch to it.  It does run a bit on the longer side, as I am 5'8 and without shoes it was floor length.  Overall a great full length dress!

When I put this too on, the first thing I noticed was the color! It looked beautiful on my skin tone. It was more or a salmon or peachy pink color than rose, but gorgeous none the less. I was afraid the L would be too big (only size available when I rented). However, it was perfect! The top is also pretty long, I decided to tuck it in to give myself some definition. It was perfectly flouncy and light light weight. The top also did not wrinkle very easily, which makes it great to wear all day or too a party.

I chose my backup size L because I needed the length (work conference.)  The L is flowy, but I was able to dress it up with some leather booties and look professional cool.  The neckline is a nice touch.  If this was for a regular outing, I would have worn the M and it would have still been flowy, just a bit shorter.  It's easily a causal outfit as well and would work great for daytime event or a baby/bridal shower.

True to size as far as fit goes. I was disappointed in the length of the underlay.  It was so short that it barely covered my bottom.  I wore a black slip under, which was visible but did not look out of place.  I made it work but would not have been able to wear the dress to a wedding as is.  It would have been fine for a bachelorette party or a night out with the girls but not a wedding.
Very flattering!

I do with it were a bit more accentuating at the waist, but this dress is killer.  It gave me support in all the right places.  Slit was perfect.  Not too high or low or open or closed.  Neck was a bit tight but worth it.  Color is beautiful.  I received so many compliments.  Wear it with an interesting shoe!

I really liked this dress and I loved my first RTR experience overall. I didn't give it 5 stars b/c there was an issue with the zipper where the teeth were missing right where the waist seam was so it was almost impossible to zip. If my fiancé and friend hadn't helped me I never would have gotten it on. It definitely runs a little small in the best, but otherwise had a great fit. I got tons of compliments & it was very comfortable. Some of the dots in the pattern are salmon colored which was not clear from the photo but luckily it still looked good on my pale skin. Fabric is very thick so would not be good for outdoor event in summer but was great for an indoor event in March. Overall a good dress!

This dress runs large! I normally wear a 4 and I ended up wearing the 2 but probably needed the 0. 

Pros- pretty dress, comfortable, beautiful color

Cons- runs really large and if not the right size can look baggy
I would recommend this dress to anyone! It was beautiful and the perfect length with 3" heels.  The open back was sexy yet still classy.

Loved this top. I wore it out in NYC with black jeans and silver heels - understated but put together. The fit is a touch boxy, but not as bad as some other shorter tops that I've tried. Overall, I would wear this again.
Wore this to a board meeting and it was perfect!

Perfect for a dinner cruise. You have to try it to really appreciate this dress. There are pockets that gives it a dressy, yet casual look. I just loved wearing it and received many compliments about it. There is no cons, it hides all the body imperfections and emphasizes on your best assets (If your legs and chest are the best one you have)
Cons: the dress should not be worn in hot weather not very breathable
The dress fit perfectly and was very flattering! I wore a 4R, which is still on the long side, so I wore 3 1/2 inch heels. Loved this dress and was complimented on it all night.

I wore this dress to my father-in-law's 60th birthday.  I was running super late from work and had to jump into this dress in a matter of minutes and rush out the door. I was super nervous it wasn't going to work out and I would have to find something else to wear.  Much to my happiness, the dress fit and I was out the door! The dress is stretchy, but form filling and fit like a glove.  The only issued I had was the straps were too long.  This was easily remedied by joining the straps with a small hair barrette at the base of my neck which I covered with my hair.  If I were to order again in the future, I would try out the 6.  I highly recommend this dress.  It is a beautiful color and very comfortable. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it by pulling the strap down low in the back.

I'm 5 foot 6 inches, about 165 and 36DD. I wore the size 10 and it fit perfectly, a bit snug, but a size larger would have been to big. I didn't wear a bar with this dress, but I do recommend wearing Spanx because it definitely hugs those curves!! Paired with gold shoes, clutch and jewelry.

Pros: gorgeous, love the low back & my date did too :)
Cons: as we danced, the skirt would shimmy up some, so I felt like I was constantly pulling it down.

Overall: great dress! Just be careful with the fit of the skirt. Definitely runs a little small.

This dress was amazing! I rented both a 12 and a 10 as a backup. It definitely runs large. I normally wear a 12 but wore the 10 to the show. Both fit fine but the 10 looked better. It was perfect for an afternoon at the show. The material was also perfect for a winter day in the city.  The shoulders are definitely tight (as mentioned in previous reviews) but it wasn't uncomfortable. I did NOT want to return this dress I loved it so much! Will rent again!
I loved this dress. It was very flattering, and I felt comfortable all night long. I'm 6'1", and it was the perfect length for me. It was a little big in the bust, but just a little.
Fit true to size,

Love, love, loved this dress. The fabric felt a bit heavy at first but ended up hugging my curves perfectly.  I wore it with a cardigan, tights, and boots, which ended up looking very put together.  Since it is winter, I had to add all of that for warmth, but I can also wear the dress without anything but heels and it will be a perfect dress for a spring/summer event.  very versatile & such a fun print!  That is why I immediately went searching for it online to buy, but was only able to find it on eBay.  Totally worth it!
Loved the pockets!

I am always a little nervous with gowns since I am petite and narrow and many have a tendency to overwhelm my small frame. This dress was stunning - I received so many compliments on it at the gala I wore it to and the pattern is so unique. The open back detail is also great, although I wish there had been a set off additional hooks attached to make the cross-strap tighter (it became unhooked a few times). I ordered the petite as a backup, but with 4 inch heels, it was a little shorter than I liked.

I'm 5'9" and I'm wearing 4' heels in this photo, and the was still concerned with tripping.  I'm pretty sure this was either a 12L or 14L, the British sizing was confusing when I was ordering. I did not wear this to my event since I was uncomfortable with my boobs flopping around (even with fashion tape!). It just did not look attractive to me.  Also, be sure to dig around in the bag for the black belt!  The fabric was very light almost like crepe paper. It added too much volume to my waist and hips. No go for my curves. :)

Great dress for a wedding. Fits very true to size and unique lace makes it a stand out. Can be worn with a standard bra. Length is a little longer than it appears in the photo. Perfectly comfortable for a night of celebration.
It was a really cold day...23 degrees outside.  The dress hid my 2 layers of leggings and Ugg Boots well LOL.
Paired with skinny denim, lace up  heels & a gold clutch

This is a super cute dress for the right body type.  I have had two babies and it made me look like I was 5 months pregnant again.  The bubble is very cute, but can enhance your mid section.  The pleats on the dress weren't ironed correct either, so it puffed out in all the wrong ways.  Sadly, didn't end up wearing it.
I will totally be renting this dress again, I loved the button detailing on it, and the pattern was so fresh for spring.

Be careful as this dress runs small and the waist is unusually tight. Definitely would recommend getting a full size up than your ususal so the waist will fit properly. I only rented a size 6 because size 8 was unavailable. Would rent again, but next time would get the size 8.

Searched through these rental pages for what seemed like forever. Needed something for an Ohio winter wedding. A little sexy, but still conservative enough for a church ceremony. Loved the color and the neckline was beautiful!  Unfortunately, I have really narrow shoulders and this just kept falling down revealing well... the girls. I could have gotten away with fashion tape for sure. Also, the sleeves were too long on me and pretty baggy.  I ended up wearing a different dress to the ceremony for ease. My husband still says this was his favorite.

This was my first RTR experience. I made a mistake with the dates, and customer service was very heplful and kind.  The dress and accessories arrived on time and carefully packaged.  The dress fit like a glove and looked beautiful. I'm 5'4", and I wore a 3.5" heel, which left just the right amount of train without tripping me up. It was also very comfortable and not that heavy, because the sequins are the perfect mini circles that reflect beautifully in lights. I rented the bangles too..works great with dress. My husband and I looked so chic at the event a blogger named us Hot Couple of the Evening!
The color was more vibrant in person, which was great. It's a dress that doesn't need to be very tight to be flattering. I highly recommend this dress!

I rented this dress for a car show gala and this sequin dress was perfect for the event! I wore the 2L and it was the perfect length with 3" heels. I probably could have fit into the 0L as the material is stretchy and I would have liked it to be a little tighter, but that's ok. Overall I loved the dress and would highly recommend it!

I wore the medium which was my back up size.  Both small and medium fit, but medium was a bit more comfy and the zipper on the small didn't work well.  I am petite, but not small waisted.  Small bust, normal arms and shoulders, so if you are big in arms, shoulders or bust might want to size up.  I thought it might be too short for conservative wedding but not at all.  It was perfect for a Christmas wedding.  A blast to dance in.  Lots of complements on and off the dance floor.  LOVED IT!

The length was perfect; it was not too short.  The dip in the back was a little lower than I would have liked, but that is just something to keep in mind.  The material of the skirt was thick and beautiful!

The fit was perfect for my frame. I have a shorter torso so the dress hit at just the right spot to define my waist and not over accentuate my hips. The length was a nice knee length on me. I did find the sleeves and shoulder area to be a little tight when I first tried it on, but it got more comfortable the longer I wore the dress. I wore nude peep toe wedges and simple pearl jewelry that allowed the dress to shine on it's own.
Not flattering on my frame.

I ordered both a 10 and 12. The 10 fit well; however, I was feeling a bit bloated the day of the shoot and opted for the 12. Overall I had no problems with it, the fabric breathes well and allows you to move easily in it.

This would be the perfect canvas to showcase a big statement necklace (or belt, or amazing shoes, etc). However, the dress by itself lacks pizazz. I chose this as my backup option for a wedding because the mini dress/long sleeve silhouette seems really fresh. The dress is nice quality, heavy fabric (no bra required), and not as short as the pics make it look. This would probably be a flattering choice for curvy girls, but it didn't do much for my figure.
Great fit, true to size.  Could have used the 2, but it was sold out, so I got the  4 and it still worked. Although I would prefer the 2.
This dress is snug but comfortable.  It is a thick, stretchy, soft, beautiful material that made my curves look just right.

the jumper fits great! the high belted waist is slenderizing and perfect if you are generally toned but might want to hide a little tummy (post-kids or otherwise). loved the pockets!  it is super comfortable although I will agree with others that it is difficult to use the restroom without feeling  you are completely undressed.  my suggestion is it works well for shorter events where you can minimize that issue.

Super comfortable dress! Running true to size, we recommend sizing down for backup as I did find this dress ran a little big on me. The fabric does have some stretch to it and the flowy fabric definitely gives it a boho vibe. This dress would work for any bust size however due to the front lace cutout a standard bra may show a little. There is comfortable room throughout the waist and hips. At 5'4 the regular length hit right to the floor with about 3-4" heels. Perfect for work or a casual daytime event!

The fit is true to size, except when it came to the chest area. It was particulary large in the chest area, especially for a size 6 (which was a little big on me, but still worked). I'd say this dress is great for a curvy woman with a large chest and hips. Luckily, I was able to tie the back tight enough that it pulled the chest area in for me. Had it not been for the print it would have been noticeable that it was large in the chest area. You can't wear a bra with it but because the material is printed you don't need to worry about it being revealing. Overall, it fit well, especially on my short stature of 5'3". The material was light, but had a lining so I felt comfortable in it and it was impossible to wrinkle the material.

The dress was beautiful and I received compliments all night! I had to wear my backup size (the 6- which was bigger) because the ribcage/chest area was tight. I did not wear a bra with this dress. The skirt fit true to size, but wearing the larger size didn't bother me. I was able to sit comfortably without the skirt liner riding up too far and I had no skirt problems while walking around. There is little give in the fabric so I would definitely size up to be safe.

This dress was lovely. The fabric was heavy and had a beautiful pattern that photographs nicely in well-lit locations. if you look at it in low lighting though, the pattern is darker and more subtle. The length felt long as it hit passed my knees. I also forgot to straighten out the waist, so it bunched and twisted up a little bit. The neckline plunges low. You might want to consider wearing a push-up bra to give the bust a little more shape if you are a A or B cup..

This was SO comfortable.  I rented at 14 and 16-- very true to size-- I ended up wearing the 16 because I liked it a little larger, especially with the elastic waist.  I can't even begin to say how comfortable this was.  I would say that I don't think of myself as tall (5'6"), and I wore flat sandals and it doesn't touch the floor.  I would have loved to see what a long would have looked.
There is NO give to the material, so ladies with broader shoulders or bigger arms - it's a tight squeeze with limited mobility!

The dress was beautiful--I ordered it for a black tie wedding in NYC and it would have been perfect, but unfortunately the dress was a bit too big, which made it unflattering. I'm 5'7" about 150 lbs and usually where a size 8, but for some reason this didn't hug me, it was just too large all around. I ordered the 8R and 8L thinking that I might need the long with the 3.5" heels I was planning on wearing, but the regular length would have been perfect. Next time I'll ordered the 6R!
Super comfortable fabric, conservative overall with flair of the cut out.

Loved this dress and got so many compliments! The straps are long, but you could pin them if you need to. I'm normally a 2 or 4, and the 2 fit fine (despite other reviews saying it runs small through the chest-- I'm a 32DD and didn't have a problem). 

Would love to own this dress!
I had to wear really high heels so it didn't drag, so if you are vertically challenged and only want to wear 2-3 inch heels, order the petite. I did love it though and felt great wearing it!
Con: Zipper is a little difficult to work with.

i'm typically a 2/4 but equipment runs large so an XS was perfect. i have broad shoulders and even the XS fit my shoulders well, plenty of room at waist, hits few inches above the knee. works well w tights for colder weather. loved the double layer skirt, gives it more volume, extremely comfortable. highly highly recommend, can easily be dressed down or worn to work then happy hr.

Dress runs true to size. I usually wear medium tops and size six dresses, but I wore the small. It fit perfect on top, but the length was a little long for me, even with heels. I would rent again, though!

I absolutely loved this dress. It was flattering and the sequins are subtle but eye-catching. The only issue is that the dress is very short. I'm 5'2 so it wasn't an issue, but anyone over 5'5 might have an issue.

In my opinion, the pictures don't do this dress justice. The deep V is really flattering without being too much for an event like a wedding. The material was nice and heavy and the dress was very flattering, so no spanx necessary. The dress does run quite large. I'm usually always a 16 and I wore the 14 and thought that was even a little roomy. I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments on it.

Unique- the pattern reminds me a bit of 80's pop art. Very tight throughout but not too short and doesn't show much cleavage, so still classy. I think with the white and bright blue it works for either day or night. I wore it for daytime and felt fine. Though tight I find Herve dresses to be super comfortable. The top on this was slightly big on me, and I have an average sized chest. If you are small on top, might need to add some padding- but the dress would easily accommodate it.

This dress fit like a dream and it is stunning in person.  Great quality and the beading on the upper portion of the dress really kicked it up a notch. I wore with a great pair of chandelier earrings and that was all that was needed.  Top it off with a classy updo to let the dress really shine.
Fit really well.

The fit runs small - I am a pretty solid size 6 and this was very snug. Additionally, if you are tall, the split in the front of the dress hit me in a very weird place when I tried it on (I'm 5'9"). I didn't feel comfortable in it even with opaque tights and I found the skirt very restrictive.

I love this dress so much I have rented it twice. Perfect because I can wear a normal bra under it. Very flattering and forgiving and the sequins weren't a bother like I thought they would be. The second time I rented it (same size) the bust fit a bit different so I had to safety pin it, but no one could tell. Very comfortable to dance the night away in. I have a large chest so I was nervous about this being too revealing but it was great.
Super flattering and slimming, fits snug and supportive but not too tight. Very comfortable!

Rented this as an option for a wedding, but didn't end up wearing it since the material was too heavy for the humidity and the waist/hips ran large. I'm busty and the top wasn't a problem, so overall I'd say this dress runs a little large.

Admittedly I was a little nervous that the dress wouldn't fit, but this dress was perfect! The V neck gave the elegant dress a touch of sexiness. The sequins didn't scratch me or catch my hair like I thought they would. I wore this dress for a Black and White affair at my university and i don't regret it for a second. I received so many compliments and ended up on my school's fashion page. I felt flawless. I'll definitely rent again!

This top was beautiful and generated a lot of compliments. It was flattering and comfortable to wear both to work and on the weekend. I'm only five feet tall, though, and found that it ran fairly short so taller ladies please be advised!
Fit great and was comfortable. I got a ton of compliments.
The fit is tight - needed a friend to help zip it up, but on the pro side, no need for a bra and stayed put all night.  Really fun shape and color, with great material!  Overall loved it.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress and felt comfortable in it.  The colors were beautiful.  There was a little too much exposure in the bust area if I didn't really work hard to stand up straight.  The length was good, but like other reviewers, I did find that it frequently caught on my heels as I walked.  Overall, I really liked wearing the dress and would consider it again.

This is a lovely dress but wasn't quite right for me. I got is as my back up dress to try for another event. It's eye catching and I can see why others loved it. It fit me perfectly and is very flattering. But the color didn't seem to compliment me.  Bummer because I loved the color of the dress!

This dress is very cute.  The "cape" style sleeves are an interesting detail, and overall it is a great casual dress.  I am 5"10", so I thought it was a little short for what I would be comfortable with, but I wore it anyway for a daytime event.  Probably not long enough to wear to work, though!  As other reviews have stated, there is no stretch in the fabric, so the waist seam was tight.  Definitely size up for comfort!

I am usually a size 2 or 4, but ended up wearing the 6.  The 4 fit me fine, but the 6 gave me a little bit more room to move around but was not big on me.  The inner liner was maybe a little too long and stuck out past the dress when I sat, but standing it was not noticeable.  I would rent this again.
The XS was not as snug as desired in the chest area for me.  With that said, it didn't hinder my dancing through the night!  The material is thick and high quality.  The skirt is fun to spin in!

I'm glad I read reviews from others with similar height/weight, because I changed my order to include a higher size and ended up wearing that.  The dress is gorgeous, flattering, and comfortable.  You will need  stick-on bra.

The material is really soft and comfy and the style is fun. Fit was a little small if you're big-busted, even the 12 was sliding off to the sides. Definitely has a very Michael Jackson meets Chanel vibe which is what I loved about it. It IS warm so if you'll be wondering around in 60° weather and want a sweater alternative this is a great choice.

I was so excited about this dress.  Unfortunately, it arrived in a 10R rather than the 10L I ordered, and so it barely touched the floor when I wore flats.  Not a good look.  Otherwise, it is a beautiful, classic silhouette, and the beadwork on the shoulder is stunning.

This dress was surprisingly comfortable and warm. I ended up forgoing a bra because I couldn't find a low back option with enough support but the dress fit so well it wasn't necessary. I got tons of compliments from other women and even a kiss on the hand by a total stranger. I felt amazing and confident in this dress but I have to mention that the material on one of the sleeves was torn away from the elastic band at the wrist. Fortunately, it wasn't noticeable at all except for the random sequin that fell off from time to time.

This was my backup if the short version of the dress was too short and I decided not to wear it. I am very tall, but this hem hit me in the most unfortunate spot. Sort or an inch or two above the ankle. So bad. If I wasn't so curvy in the tummy and butt, maybe it would have laid better, but it was just awful. I guess the 22L would have been better (I thought I did order the long). The short one looked fun and sexy, where as the long one looked matronly and heavy. Hated it!
Fun, preppy, and easy to wear.

Being 8 weeks postpartum, I was a bit nervous going out for the first time since having my baby. Luckily, RTR to the rescue. I had a lot of trouble with fit as I wasn't used to my "new" (and temporary) body. RTR was super helpful in getting me into the right size and even overnighting me an 8 when the 6 ended up making my girls pop a little too much for my liking. It's also long for us shorties, so get the heels ready! The dress is a show stopper and even the bride made sure to tell me how much she loved it. Don't hesitate to rent this is you don't mind getting lots of attention! ;)
This dress is so much better looking in person. It stands out against a sea of black but it less subtle than sequins.  Being petite, the straps didn't quite fit and it was a bit long even with heels

Such a fun pattern and comfy fit for casual summer days. The defined waist also gives an hour glass shape. One thing I will recommend is if you are larger chested definitely go up a size or 2. I am a size 32a and the 0 was very snug on me without a bra.
a little on the longer side, hit at or below my knee. very comfortable.

I wore this to the office and to a daytime brunch and got a lot of compliments.  It's more low-cut than I expected, but with the long sleeves, it still felt modest enough for a more casual day at the office.  The fabric is a cotton, so it's not fancy.  I wore this early in my second trimester, and, at least at that stage, it was bump friendly!
Very comfortable for the most part. My only complaint would be that the material doesn't have any stretch and a tiny bit would be nice in the arm area (I have muscular shoulders/arms).
Great fit! Lots of compliments!
The dress has the perfect fit.
The shoulder details are exquisite.

I took the advice of others in assuming this dress runs a bit small - I normally wear a 4, but the 6 fit perfectly! (By the end of the night, it was getting a bit uncomfortable around the ribs, so I can only imagine how tight the 4 would have been!)  I normally wear a Long, but wanted to wear flats, so chose the regular - it was maybe an inch too short, but worked well with the shoes I had!  I would highly recommend this dress - its very flattering & elegant!

I didn't get to wear this dress to my event as the zipper was extremely hard to get up.The dress fit fine once we got it but it took me and my two roommates to  get the zipper over the part where the bottom of the dress connects with the top.

This dress was great!  It fit really well and was very comfortable.  The only negative is that the length is a little odd so it made walking up stairs and getting into the car a little difficult.  I'm 5'3", 140 lbs and the medium fit perfectly.
I also wore this for my wedding after party.  The back is the best part.  I didn't wear a bra and it wasn't see through.  It was very comfortable too.
Great for a hot summer day!
I love this you can dress it up or dress it down ! It was comfortable for a jumpsuit and I got asked where I got my outfit all night long.
This dress was perfect for my best friend's bridal shower that was an evening cocktail party. The color popped and the overall fit of the dress was fantastic.

I got so many compliments on this dress!! I have pretty average sized hips but it hugged them much tighter than I expected. I might have worn the 6, but it was too big in the top. However, I think the tightness only bothered me because everyone else said it looked fine!! If I rented this dress again I would get a 6 long. I am 5'9" and it was just a tad too short and I was wearing flats.

This style runs a bit large, so you should size down from your usual size for your back up. It is better for larger busted women, as there is a lot of room in that area. The perfect dress for a holiday party this season. Pair with gold accessories and shoes!

I rented this dress for my son's baptism.  While modifying a previous rental, I was nervous I would need a bigger size in this dress and changed my size selection.  When I received my shipment I was surprised to see they sent me all three sizes (8,10,12).  It was a good thing they did, because I wound up needing the 8.  RTR customer service is great!! 
My only fear in renting this dress and reading the other reviews was that it would be too short.  I am 5'6 and always feel like dresses are too short on me, even when they really aren't.  It wasn't THAT short, I did get away with wearing it, I was just mindful in any movements I made.  I was able to wear regular undergarments and it was not tight on my midsection.  It was a very comfortable fit. I was happy with this rental and received a lot of compliments on it.  I just wish it was a little longer, but overall a great rental.

Both the 10 and the 12 fit me but I ended up going with the 12 because it didn't show as much chest. (There was more than enough room in the chest for even a large chested woman) 
Very nice fabric and hangs nicely. The tuxedo flap wasn't overboard and worked to help cover my problem area in the waist. Would highly recommend!
The fit was snug, but like a bandage dress, was very flattering.  It was quite comfortable to wear, and I received many compliments.
Gorgeous colors!

I had so much fun wearing this dress! It hugs your curves in all of the right places, and the black lace back is unique and sexy. I used it for two occasions - an evening at the ballet and then a daytime wedding reception. The dress is super comfy and I got lots of compliments on it. I would highly recommend renting it.
It fits great! It was loose in the mid section which I appreciated. Kinda short when I sat down. I rented this to take some save the date photos and wedding dress shopping.

Wore it to a 40th birthday party. The top is rather low cut, but with some double sided tape you are good to go. I haven't done a romper before and was pleasantly surprised with how it fit and looked, very comfortable and the color was gorgeous!

What a shame this dress was too large! My backup/smaller size was unavailable so unfortunately I ended up wearing a different dress I had rented as a backup. I would rent it again, but next time would rent one and even TWO sizes smaller! 
The website will not allow me to update my profile/size so here it is:
Height: 5"6
Weight: 140lbs
Bust: 32DDD
Normally wear size 10 dress-- the dress I ordered was a 10 and it was so loose that the fabric covering the bust fell a full inch below the edge of my strapless bra. Keep in mind the sheer fabric of the neckline and arms is very sheer. You would see a nude bra strap and this necessitates a low cut strapless bra. 
This dress is colorful, dramatic and elegant-- absolutely gorgeous.
Great fit and a very comfortable dress. I got a lot of compliments!

the dress was a little loose
normally waer a 6 and the 4 was still a little big
