I loved this dress, but it didn't fit me quite right.  Its a beautiful fabric and color.  I am usually a O or 2 and 115, 5'5 and 32C.  I ordered the 2 based on other comments.  The length and hips were great, but the waist was very snug (fit but uncomfortable while sitting) and the bodice was a little loose.

I wore this top with dressy black shorts for a night out and then with black pants for work.  Lots of compliments from co-workers.  The top is slightly heavy so with the high neck it is not great for spending a lot of time outdoors on a super warm day but otherwise no complaints.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding.  It is even prettier in person.  
I ordered the Long and am so happy I did.  I am 5'8" and wore 4" heels and it was the perfect length.  I was able to wear a regular bra. I got complements all evening. I would definitely recommend his dress!
It was a little short, but so comfortable. I wore it to a friend's wedding, and got so many compliments! I would definitely rent this again!

This dress is awesome! It was everything I had hoped it would be. I'm really glad I ordered the 4R and the 6R. They weren't too different except that the 6R had a bit more fabric bunching up right at the waistline. Unless you are a true 2 I would highly recommend getting the 4R, and the 6R as back up, depending on the size of your bust. Sometimes I can wear a 2 depending on the dress, but I don't think the 2 would have fit me. This dress is fun, photographs well (especially while dancing and twirling), and made me feel so pretty. ***Look out for the long tulle back when getting out of vehicles or standing up from a seated position. Your heels can easily catch the back of the dress and tear the tulle.

This dress is absolutely beautiful. It was the perfect amount of sexy.  I usually wear a 4-6 in dresses; depends on the brand. I ordered the 4r & 6r. I felt and looked like a sausage in the 4r, but only felt like a sausage in the 6 (thank goodness for spanx). The length was perfect, the color was perfect, but the straps kept falling and I could've gone up a size or lost weight( didn't have time for either).  Either way, I'm happy that I chose RTR ; I felt and looked great

I received lots of compliments in this stunning leather gown. I am 5'6" and the gown just skimmed the floor when I was shoeless. I liked the deep v in the front and in the back, and I ended up wearing this without a bra because the v in the back was just enough to show the strap of every bra I tried it with. It didn't matter, because the bodice fit very well and I felt comfortable all night. The dress is lined and the leather is matte and lightweight. My backup size was 6 and that fit nicely too but not snug enough up top to go bra less.

Loved the dress, it was exactly what I imagined when I rented it.  This was my first RTR experience and I was not disappointed.  I wore it to a North Carolina fall wedding. This dress is comfortable, even on the arms which was a concern.  It was somewhat restrictive when it came to raising the roof on the dance floor...but perhaps that's in everyone's best interest. :)
Great color and material. Only issue was that the 8R was so short! I'm only 5'6" and wore maybe 4 inch heels and couldn't stand the way they looked together!

I probably teeter between a size 6 and an 8 and the size  6 fit perfectly.  I didn't have to wear a bra and I was very comfortable all night.  The material is a bit thicker than you would expect and it was nice to have "coverage" and not be see through or thin.  It is a dark dark green color, but looks black.  I wore gold jewelry and black heels.  I love this dress.

I rented this dress in my usual size 2 and a backup size 4. I ended up wearing the 4  because the slip beneath the chiffon was a little too tight on the 2. If you are curvy at all on the bottom, I would recommend ordering up a size as a back up. The other reviews are correct in that the top doesn't lay flat if you are small chested. I had to get creative with some fashion tape, but it stayed in place all night. It flowed beautifully when I walked and looked great in photographs. I received tons of compliments! It's a timeless, classy dress!
It fit perfect just the smell when they arrived I had to taken them both to be cleaned. In the end the jumper was comfy and worked well with the High Tea Bridal Shower theme

I wore this to an outdoor vintage country wedding. It was perfect for the occasion!   I wore it with a jcrew necklace that made it perfect! The dress was the right length for my 5'4 frame if I was any taller I wouldn't be able to lift my arms. Not easy to buckle shoes in this dress so you may need some help:) I received so many complements and was told I looked classy and sexy!!
This dress is really comfortable. It's simple but the pattern gives it a little something extra.

It was prefect for the black tie wedding we attended. A little long though - I'm 5'9 and wore 3.5 inch heels and it was still a little long but it worked out. I should have ordered the regular not the long.

I'm on the board of a nonprofit that does an annual "Blue and Green Gala" so I needed something in that color palette. This romper was so much fun and I will have a hard time improving on it at this year's event! I tied a green scarf around the waist to pull the whole green/blue theme together and got lots of compliments. One word of warning: I'm very short so the length wasn't an issue for me but I could see it being an issue for people who've cracked 5'.

I wore this dress to a cocktail charity event and felt like the loveliest woman in the room!  This dress was exactly as pictured with one exception. I am busty, 36D, and the neckline looked very different on me than it does on the model. Lots of cleavage! My husband didn't mind though! The fit was amazing and I am curvy, the fabric had just the right amount of give. I can see it looking lovely also on a figure less so, like the model pictured. Loved the colors and the bit of shimmer. I wore it with the necklace pictured and while it was lovely and did pair well with the dress, it was a bit over the top for me personally because of the aforementioned cleavage issue but overall I was delighted.

Very beautiful dress, but watch out if you have full hips - under the sheer overlay there is a tight fitting dress that does not have any stretch.  Also, although the description says it can be worn with any normal bra, I don't agree - because the material was so sheer on top, only a strapless bra would really the best.
Overall fit comfortable. It's not long, so I have a longer torso which didn't make it as flowy on me. The back is really cute. Overall better for shorter girls.

I loved the flowy material and the way the dress moved. It fit perfectly and I wish I could own it! I'm 5'5" and was able to wearing 3.5" heels with the dress just barely touching the ground. The zipper was difficult but I was able to do it on my own. I tried to get away with wearing a regular bra but my straps kept sliding out so I recommend taking others' suggestions and wearing either a racerback or no bra at all. I got compliments on this dress all night and would rent again if the opportunity present's itself!
Super flattering! I am usually a size 6/M.  I have a DD chest and this dress was so flattering on.

I usually wear a size 0 and decided to wear the MR as it was more comfortable around the neck and chest area. I would say this dress runs small. Loved the dress. It was very easy to wear once I decided to wear the bigger size.

This was an adorable piece, I enjoyed wearing it and got a lot of compliments. My only complaint is the shoulders kept wanting to creep up, so I was constantly pulling them down and the elastic was very uncomfortable on my arms. Runs large! I wore a size down.

Not sure how the crowd was going to accept my eclectic style figured the majority of the party-goers for this event would wear black. This dress is a stand out in a sea of black dresses.  I wanted to stand out but not too much. The blue is rich, vibrant and the cut of the dress a head-turner for the curvy girl.
Loved the pattern on this dress but it was too wide around the waist. I wore a cross-body purse with it which gave me some shape but it looked a bit like a maternity dress!
Fits great. I ordered a medium and a large, and the medium fit like a glove. It was the most perfect dress I've ever worn. The arms were a bit itchy but nothing major.

Fit it very tight but in a flattering way, just make sure you are aware it will be exact so you may want to get a size bigger just in case, the straps in the back pops out a bit so make sure to keep a nice posture. After that super sexy everyone loved it specially my boyfriend so ladies it is an awesome dress to rent.

I rented both the xs and sm both fit almost identical! I ended up wearing the xs because the hem on the sm was just not laying right! 
I paired this dress with all rose gold accessories and received complements on how beautiful my dress was!
 This dress was so comfortable, elegant and did not make me hot at all with all the dancing I did

This is a very feminine, bright and fun dress for dancing all night at a wedding.  The unique silhouette and vibrant colors made it stand out.  I was at a family wedding but got lots of compliments from strangers.  It was a little short in the front, but the longer hem in the back made me feel justified wearing it to a church ceremony.

It was super hot in Mexico especially at 5pm when the wedding started. Loved that this material was heavy enough not to sweat through but light enough that I wasn't dying wearing the dress. The dress runs true to size though definitely shows any curves your body has so spanx was necessary to keep it all together! Would totally rent again. I got so many compliments and the dress photographs really well....
Hard to zip.  Did not end up wearing.  Pretty gown, but not as pretty as picture
This top was awesome. Paired it with both cut-off jean shorts for daytime and skinny dark jeans for evening.

As others have said, it runs a bit long for a shorter girl (Im 5'2") but it was classy and elegant for the conservative wedding I attended.  At first it seemed tight in the sleeves but I didn't notice it throughout the night.  The 4 was too baggy on me.  The color is unique and lovely.

I rented this for my engagment party and I loved it! Being petite the back did gap some but with some fasion tape everything staeyed in place. Since I usually flex between two sizes it was great that i was sent two sizes. The dress itself was in great conditon and it was even prettier in person. I would highly recomend this dress!

Pros:
The dress was fitted and fit great!  But, wearing a bra was not a true option.  I had to wear a stick on bra and it worked out fine.  However, perhaps clear duct tape would have been more "supportive."  The color was gorgeous, the fabric was nice and thick, so if you weren't self conscious like myself, you could go bra-less.  LOVED that I could put a blazer over it and it's an unsuspecting work dress and take off the blazer and it has tons of WOW factor.  Would definitely recommend renting this dress! 

The ONLY Con:
And maybe this was just for me - the zipper in the back does pucker a bit and this contributes to the dress riding up as you walk.  I assume most folks don't mind that...but it was a cold night - and I LOVED the elegant look of the dress at my knees.  But, truth be told - NOT a big deal at all.

This was the first time I wore something with such a deep plunge so I felt pretty daring. Between that and sparkling all over, it made quite a statement and I received many compliments from strangers. I opted for adhesive bra cups but I'm sure there are other options that would work, maybe with some creative pinning, since the dress has actual straps. The length was okay since I was wearing low heels, but if you're tall and plan to wear high heels, probably look for a long length. I'm generally between a 14 and 16 and this fit perfectly in 14. I would definitely rent this again, or one of the many similar colors/cuts from Badgley Mischka.

The medium weight was perfect for a fall wedding in Boston. I paired with a nude heel since the color was so unique. Very comfortable and flattering to wear. I did not have any issues with the sleeves being too tight but I could not comfortably lift my arms above my shoulder height because it would pull up the rest of the torso fabric in an awkward way (not really a big deal for a semi-formal wedding).
Great fit, only thing was the low plunge and having to wear a bra. In some photos you can see my bra.

This dress was exactly what I wanted for my event. As noted by other reviewers, the fabric is lighter than the average full-length gown, which made the dress breathable and easy to dance in. I loved the double slits, which added drama and movement. The fabric is thin, so it is not the best choice if you are looking for a bump-friendly dress. As for sizing, it is true to American sizing, not couture sizing, so no need to size-up. I wore the 4R but would have probably been a little more comfortable in the 2. Overall, I really liked this dress and would recommend it!

I ordered this dress for my engagement party and ended up wearing the back up dress and loving it so much more.  It was really large up top and smaller on the bottom.  If It was mine and I could alter it, I would have loved it, but with such a large top it just was not flattering.

I loved this dress! It was so beautiful and received complements throughout the night. I ordered a 0 with a 2 as my back-up size and went with the 0. The 0 was a little snug around my bottom half, but the 2 was a bit loose at the top. I could have gone with either; I just preferred to have the top fitted so that the layer under the lace wouldn't dip too low. I ended up wearing a strapless bra with this (the back is high enough that it's covered), but I also probably could have gone without one. The dress was definitely longer on me that it is on the model, but the picture I included makes it look an inch or two longer than it actually was.

As an aside about RTR, I had scheduled the dress to arrive the day before I had to fly out for the wedding, but the UPS center lost power and the dress hadn't come before I had to leave. I called RTR (in a panic), and they had the dress (in both the original and back-up sizes) overnighted to my hotel for no extra charge. They didn't have the earrings I had ordered, so they sent me an upgraded pair. On top of all of this, the person I spoke with at RTR was so incredibly kind and made everything really easy. I'd recommend this dress and RTR to anyone!
This dress was very effortless. It had more sparkle than anticipated, but it was not too much. You will need double sided tape to prevent any slips.
The front of this dress fits nicely as a shift, but the back is the real show. The length and size was great. Usually a 4, I sized down to a 2 and felt very comfortable.

Loved this dress! It photographed so well for my engagement photos. I ordered both the 4L and 6L, the 4L was too short even without heels. I am 5'8" and with 3" heels the 6L worked much better. The neckline also was cutting into my neck so I was pulling it down a lot but overall I loved this dress.
I wore this during the daytime for a picnic. Very breathable and comfortable. Loved this top and would 100% rent again!
This was such a cute pattern and fabric. I wore this to work and traveled home. It was certainly an eye catcher! I recommend belting it to show off your curves.

I was receiving compliments all night long. The dress is super comfortable and fun to wear. The shorter front makes it easier to walk, while the longer train adds the glam. The pleats and thicker fabric allow the dress to billow out too, which is lovely. I also loved the pockets. One thing to point out is that the dress is quite heavy so if you plan on dancing, be prepared to hold up your dress as people will step on your train. I give this dress a 4 out of 5, is because the dress had a bit too much room in the chest area for size 0. I am an A cup, and there was room in the dress for a C cup at least. I did read previous reviews that the dress was great for larger breasts, but I assumed the size of the cup would be adjusted for size 0.  Stick on cups were my best friends that night.

I wore it to the Met Opera and I stole the show. This dress is a show stopper. All eyes were on me, I was the center of attraction, the queen of the night and a shining star. The compliments were nonstop.
The dress fits just fine. I ordered size 6R and 8R but ended up wearing the 6R. I'm usually between size 4 and 6. The 6 was perfect. The only issue with this dress is that I wish the regular length was longer but other than that, everything was perfect. Do not waste time renting this dress, just get it now! You will be glad you did.

The dress fit nicely, though looking back I would have worn spanx as the skirt doesn't flare out all that much. The color is amazing. The dress was also surprisingly cool. I wore it to a reception dinner, outside in 90 degree heat, and stayed comfortable the whole time.

I wore this dress to a summer wine festival last August. I received a ton of compliments on it. The material is good quality, very nice and thick. There is no stretch. I normally wear a size 6 or 8 in Lilly dresses and I sized up to the 8 for this dress.

I rented this dress for a gala. Loved the stretch to the fabric and the cutout! The dress was comfortable and easy to dance in. The only con was that I felt like the dress was a little short with heels.

Great for an all day event, easy to dress up and down with different accessories. Color pops anywhere. 
Would recommend, but the drawstring can be bit frumpy on us short girls.
I loved wearing this dress. The sleeves make it very unique but still a classic. The velvet is so soft! Wore with black suede wedges for a powerful look.

Classy, comfy, gorgeous and fun to twirl around/dance in!  You can't tell from the photos, but the dress is connected with nude mesh at the midsection.  I'm 5'4 and the XSR was the perfect length with 3 inch heels.

This dress was recommended by a stylist after my original pick arrived damaged.  The stylist hit this nail on the head with the recommendation!   The dress was great for the environment- classy yet sexy.   The fabric was very nice and just made me feel great wearing it.   I would definitely rent this dress again.   I paired it with boots and it was great!

The fit was great and tight enough on top to go without a bra! The dress is heavier in person then it looks online but was overall a gorgeous dress for the outdoor tea party we went to and would be a perfect holiday or wedding guest dress! I usually wear a 4 or 6 and the 6 fit perfectly

If you have wide hips like I do it is snug in that area.  I am a size 8 and wore a large and found it very snug in the hips.  So I would say ti runs on the small side. Since when is a size 8 considered large?

Rented this dress with my $50 Pro credit to wear out for my birthday dinner. It was casual enough that I didn't feel overdressed at the restaurant, but glitzy enough that I felt special on my birthday. I absolutely love the fabric and color. The dress was a bit loose in the waist but that didn't really matter. My only complaint is that there are sequins right under the arms that ended up being a little irritating by the end of the night. For a size reference, I am usually between a 16 in regular sizes and a 14W in plus, and this dress seemed to be very true to the size chart.

I felt like a billion bucks! Loved this dress. I was confused and a bit nervous after reading all of the reviews, because I wasn't sure what to expect and didn't have a backup plan. I did have to go a size up from my  usual size, and I wouldn't have minded a bit more length and would probably go with the long rather than regular length if I could do it again. But it didn't matter that much because of the wrap-around style and short skirt in front. I wore edgy, lace-up shoes with my hair loose and bouncy to balance it all out. It definitely has a gunmetal shimmer and works well with dark silvery accessories. And at an event with 10,000 people, I never saw anyone else with the same dress on so I was happy about that. My only complaint is that it doesn't have any stretch, so it's a bit confining. But overall, I loved it and would absolutely recommend it for any black tie affair!

The dress fit very well.  I liked the sleeves as it was very cold that night (it even snowed a little bit).  I got many compliments.  I also liked to color as I wore it for a Christmas party and everyone else was in red, green, or black.  I would rent this dress again.
This was perfect for work.  I wish I had purchased it!

I wore this to my boyfriends holiday party. I ended up wearing a size lower than usual since the cutout looks better when it's fitted. The material has a little stretch and it was form fitting. I loved the color and paired it with a statement necklace and nude pumps. I recommend this dress and thought it was both cute and flattering!
I wore this for my bridal shower, and while it wasn't near as white as you're led to believe, it was even cuter than I anticipated on.
The dress looked great.  Fit exactly as expected.  The lace arms were flattering (not too tight) and the length was just at the knee...very classy and comfortable.

Very pretty dress.  Runs pretty true to size (I haven't gotten back to my profile stats post baby).  Runs kinda long (I am 5'4" and wore like 3.5" heels and maybe should have gone petite).  Also, I did not realize low back when I booked it so had to get some last minute undergarment fix but the low back ended up being fun.
I ordered a MR and LL (since ML isn't an option for this style). I'm 5'11 so the long size was a must for me. Incredibly happy with this style!

This skirt is super cute. The waistline hits at your natural waist and is not too tight to cause discomfort. Because I'm so short, the skirt hit a bit longer on me than on the model but was still above my knees.

The colors of this dress are absolutely beautiful, picture doesn't do it justice. I received so many compliments throughout the entire day, I felt like a Princess! I normally wear an 8 and this fit very well, has a little bit of "give" to the material. If I were to rent this particular dress again, I would probably get the 10 because the neckline and the chest are a bit snug. Absolutely loved this dress and so did everyone else!
A beautiful dress but a bit too formal for work so I was unable to wear it. I wish that I had an event to wear it to because it was comfortable and fit perfectly

I loved this dress! Usually mumus do not work for me- I'm on a slender build so I usually look swallowed up in them, but for whatever reason, this dress looked amazing. I think it's probably a sisterhood of the traveling dress type deal. I loved the ties around the neck and sleeve details. I wasn't sunburned but it would've been great for too much sun due to the loose fit or if on vacation you are ready for a big dinner, you won't have to worry about looking great versus eating all the seafood you can!

I felt like a million bucks! I went with the 10, even though I am normally an 8 as it felt more comfortable in the bust.  I got a ton of compliments on the dress, the color and neckline are BEAUTIFUL. Would 100% rent again and recommend to others.

Loved the black and olive combination on this dress and the shape all the detailing gave me. I went up a size after reading some reviews that this could be tight through the bust, and the S was a perfect fit. Very comfortable for work and will definitely be renting again!

I am the queen of black for all occasions, so this was a very out of the box choice for me. Loved this dress! I was nervious it wouldnt fit, I am curvy and very busty. Very flattering fit. As someone who is large chested i loved being able to wear a bra and not having to worry about any straps showing. The dress was stunning. It looks more yellow gold in the picture, but it is actually a pinkish gold. Great first experience on rent the runway!!! And I got tons of compliments, especialy from my husband.

The 4 was a smidge too big on me and the 2 was just a wee bit tight, but I wore the 2 because the fit looked better. However, after dinner I was really wishing I had the 4 in my car to change into!! :) The sleeves are very cute, but your arm range is limited. It wasn't the most comfortable dress I've ever worm, but it was really cute and different and I was very happy with my rental!

Beautiful dress.  Received multiple compliments.  Photographs beautifully.   Runs long (I'm 5'7" and wore 3 inch heels) and I had to pick up my dress to walk all night.   Granted, as it drapes beautifully, it looked nice even as I carried it.  I found it slipped on me and I spent a lot of time pulling up the dress.
I didn't order this dress and the fit was kind of weird. The front ruffle made it look a bit like a nursing shirt.
I really liked this dress, but I could have gotten a size, or even two sizes, smaller. It just hung on me, but with a belt, it worked.
Length was good with 3" heels. Back was a bit tight but I have broad shoulders. Overall, great dress. Loved the lace!

This dress is a beautiful vibrant red so perfect for the holiday season! It is elegant yet very sexy and so comfortable!! I have yet to see a designer execute that combination as well as Nicole Miller! The fabric has enough stretch for my very curvy figure, which made it easy to dance & eat as much as I wanted :) HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

The fabric is a bit stiff, which is probably why it holds a wrinkle. After sitting at my desk most of the day, the dress ended up all wrinkled even though I had steamed it before wearing. I do love the print. I'd rent this again if I knew I'd be standing all day in the dress.

Heeded the warning of some other reviews. Did not wear it backwards!

This dress fit me like a glove!  Petite friendly dress! Herve Leger never disappoints. The bandages keeps everything together and the top surprisingly did not keep falling down for me. I am usually very small chested, so I was surprised the top stayed; but I did use fashion tape as an extra measure. It is very tight, so you will definitely need another person to help you get into this dress!

I actually ordered this with the intent of wearing the 2R but because of my cup size (DDD), it didn't work. The 4R managed to accommodate my cup size without being too big everywhere else. The built in bra helped, however, I still had to tug the dress up every now and again to make sure it didn't slide down too much. 

The dress did come very wrinkled. The wedding was out of state, so I steamed it before I packed it and still ironed it before I wore it.

I wore this over a simple pair of leggings on a day I was running errands just to bump up the outfit a little bit. The top was SUPER soft and comfy but found it a little boxy and not flattering. Plus it wrinkled extremely easily so didn't look the same at the end of the day. Still a cute, versatile top though! If I were to rent this again, I would wear it to work instead

Wore this to to work and everyone loved it! Colors are cheerful and stand out. I was the best-dressed lawyer in town that day! Wore it again out to dinner at one of the better local restaurants too. It was too big but fabric was very comfortable and flattering--knit, but not too clingy, and it hung so beautifully that it still looked good. Arrived brand-new with tags on. Great pick RTR!

The dress was beautiful: the blue just as rich as in the pictures and the gold lace stunning in person. I received compliments all night. The material was a heavier, stretchy material. It was comfort, but very fitted. Because it was so fitted, I sized up and wore shapewear to smooth out reality and accentuate the right curves. I would wear this dress again.

Had to wear the larger size (I rented a 6 and an 8).  The 6 fit everywhere aside from the chest/shoulders area.  Lace does not 'give' at all and I didn't want to run the risk of ripping the dress from hugging someone or busting out the wrong dance move...LOL!
My friend pictured with me actually rented her dress as well - they were very similar in style.
Overall, very nice dress for a classy, elegant event.
It was tight around the bust and needed help zipping it up, I am a 36C - This dress has no give to it! The pleats in the skirt and the pockets made the dress. Photographs really well.
The band has no give, so don't overeat! The pockets are fantastic. I wore a sticky nubra. Quality is great and I looked amazing in the dress. Wore it for a surprise wedding anniversary party.

I loved wearing this jumpsuit! It was comfortable and flattering. Bonus - I could put it on and take it off by myself, which is a big deal when nature calls during the evening. Definitely pair a great necklace with this jumpsuit. As others have said, the snap does come undone sometimes when hugging people or dancing, but nothing that can't be fixed with fashion tape or a safety pin. I received so many compliments. Loved it!

I ordered the 6R & 8R. The 6 fit but the 8 looked & flowed over the body better. It's quite low cut so if you're not comfortable with the girls showing out, you may not want to rent this dress. I just sewed in a little stitch to keep it from being too revealing. The dress was long on me (5'1" with 4" heels) but I just picked up the dress as I walked. I got compliments all night on the dress and I felt like a movie star. Definitely would rent again!

Nice is definitely the description for this dress. I wore this for work, so that's not a bad thing! It is light and perfect for warm spring and summer days. It buttons down the front, so if you are on the busty side the buttons may strain. I did like that there was a hook to keep the waist closed in addition to the button. Many of the dresses from RTR get a "wow" out of my husband, but this one only elicited "it's nice" and "safe." Considering I was wearing it to work "nice" and "safe" are fine descriptors in my opinion. A better way to describe it would be well made and conservative!

RTR to the rescue!  Due to my zipper mishap, they gave me a full refund and I look forward to renting from them again.  

Dress was gorgeous.  Fabric has no stretch.  Small shoulder pads.  Jersey lining makes the dress a bit heavy but I'm sure very warm.  Zipper was dry and hard to zip up and down....hence, why it broke before I could wear it.
It fit perfectly even without a bra. The details were gorgeous. Received so many compliments on this dress. I am so happy that I went with this dress.

I rented this for my bachelorette party in Vegas and was thrilled when it arrived. It is truly radiant, made me feel incredibly special...and the compliments from strangers all night sure didn't hurt :) if you are a bride to be, look no further than this shows topper!
i think another reviewer said they borrowed it for Halloween to channel Wednesday Adams.  i rented it for work. flattering fit, material is thicker.  fun to accessorize with bracelets and rings.
The sheer cutouts was a plus. It was short enough to wear flats, but long enough to wear heels!  The color was more of a garnet color

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I rented this for a beach vacation (easy to pack!) and paired it with a jean jacket for a casual dinner. The material was super light and breathable - I felt very comfortable wearing this in the Caribbean heat. The back dips low, so I opted not to wear a bra, which was not a problem because the material in the bust has some gathering (plus, I'm not that busty!). The lengths of the straps are adjustable, so I didn't have to worry about pinning the front. It was roomy in the hips. The Petite length was perfect for me to wear with flat sandals. If I was to wear this dress with heels, I would have gotten the Regular length. Over 50% of the time I wear a S in dresses, but the XS fit me, no problem.
Cute skirt, fit well
compliment magnet. super comfortable. stylish without looking like you're trying too hard.
The dress was just a touch short, and slightly tight around my rib cage... But I loved the color and received a lot of compliments.

The dress fit perfectly! I suggest renting the 2nd size for free just in case, but I was very lucky the size I chose fit me well. My mom's black dress was from Rent the Runway too! We received so many compliments!!
Worked wonderful for the usmc ball I went to. Felt great all night. It was super comfortable and well made dress!
I wore this dress to a family wedding. It was very flattering, fit well and was true to size.

There was a small error with my order so I was able to pick a dress that RTR overnighted to me for my event. They ended up sending me this one and another so I wore one to the ceremony and one to the reception. RTR went above and beyond in my opinion. I loved this dress, gorgeous color. Very happy with my first rental.

I like the idea of this dress but the fit didn't work for me.  I am generally between a 0 and a 2 in all dresses, but the 2 in this dress hit me very strangely.  It wasn't too small in that I could zip it up no problem and it didn't feel tight, but it felt small in the way everything hit, ie: the waist band hit around my lower ribs and the darts at the hips  hit an inch or two above my hips.  It was almost like it was cut for petite sizing.  I also didn't like the way the cut ins at the sleeves hit, as they seemed to really highlight that little before the armpit skin squish that is no one's favorite thing to highlight.  Ended up sending back without wearing.

I had two days to find a gown for a black tie event, so I went directly to the RTR outpost in NYC. I selected this dress because of its flowy skirt and gorgeous color, and I was complimented on it all night. However, three things worth mentioning: 1) The back closure (which is low on the back) was tight for me, and I was self-conscious about my backfat 2) The cleavage V in front hits low (around the breast bone) which, for me near petite frame, also meant that the shoulders could get a bit loose. I used double-sided tape to tape down the chest area of the dress as well as the straps 3) The store only had an R length, which was just right when I wore my really tall heels (around 3.5-4 inches), but when I walked up stairs, I often would still step on the skirt mistakenly or almost trip. So beware. Overall though, I loved this dress and felt really pretty in it all night!

Super flattering fit! It did take me a second to figure out the bow, but it ended up looking perfect and I got so many compliments! I wore it with light wash jeans on a warm day. It was very flattering, despite the little flair. It was perfect for Spring or Summer and felt very high quality.
LIttle short, but still suitable for a wedding guest! Could have been a little bit more fitted in the waist area.
Usually I wear an XS or even an XXS.  The XS was way too small.  The S was a tiny bit big, but I wore it anyway.  I got lots of compliments.  Great shirt!

This dress was very comfortable and got lots of compliments.  It was definitely unique compared to a lot of the other dresses I saw at the wedding (about 3-5 girls were wearing the same/similar dress as each other's from RTR but in different colors).  The reason I don't give it 5 stars is because I felt like the waist was a little high, and it wasn't very figure flattering because of it.  I probably wouldn't rent it again, but I don't regret it for this seaside wedding because of the cheerful color.

I got this dress in-store after my original dress didn't fit.  The store was a nightmare and I never got to try the dress on so luckily it fit!  This dress was super cute, but a little short, especially wtih my heels.  I am only 5'2", so for the taller girls, I would probably not wear this unless you are looking for a short short dress!  Sadly, the pics posted are the only two taken of the full dress of the night - so not great quality...
Runs small so if you normally wear a 2 get the 4. Fabric has some stretch to it which is great. A great dress.

I originally rented a 6 and an 8, but I would up wearing a 4 because the dress seemed to run large. I wanted to be able to wear a normal bra, which I was able to do, but the dress was low cut. The dress was comfortable and I received compliments all night!
The dress would have been perfect in a size 10. I figured I would try the 8 and take a chance but just was too tight.

I am normally a 14, but I have a large DD-E chest.  I wore the 16, because the 14 didn't fit my bust.  The dress was well-worn.  There were two holes in the lace.  I wore it anyway, because I had no other choices, and you couldn't really tell they were there.  It was very low-cut, and rather short.  I am 5'6", and it was fingertip length on me.  I wore it with a gold belt, and nude wedges.  Despite the issues, I received dozens of compliments.  It was nice to stand out a bit in such a vibrant color, as opposed to the many people who wore black and beige.

Great fit with fabric that  has some give to it.  The bow adds a great feature piece to this dress without being over the top.  I got complimented on this dress so many times.  Definitely going to rent it again.
Great fit, material has a nice weight to it. Got lots of compliments all day. Would definitely rent it again!
This dress is very long. Unless you are taller than 5'8" or want to wear sky high heels, I wouldn't recommend it. With 2" heels I was tripping over the Regular length.
Absolutely love this jumpsuit!  It fit like it was altered just for me.  Didn't want to send it back and will definitely be ordering again.
I loved this dress but couldn't wear the xs this Herve  runs a little small but I reordered it in a small
The top pulled my chest together,  it fit well.
Such a sweet and flattering dress. Very well made. Everyone loved it and complimented me all night!

This is the first time ordering a  button down blouse and I ordered a Large as I have large breasts (can I just say  big boobs:)? Otherwise, I would be a medium everywhere else. I found the material to be perfect, not to light and not too heavy and super comfortable. Because I went up a size the sleeves were a little long but I buttoned and folded the cuff up in half and it looked fine. As a bonus,  it looked like a little French Cuff peaking out of my black suit jacket. I wore it with a black suit with cropped pants and it gave it a pop. Professional. I'm looking forward to wearing it with white jeans as pictured.
I wore this dress to a wedding of a friend. It was so much fun to wear with the bright colors and puffy skirt. Also, it was super comfortable. I got a lot of compliments and I felt great.

I wasn't able to wear this dress. I tried on multiple dresses at Nordstrom's and Neiman Marcus - almost every dress that fit was a size 6. I ordered this Nicole Miller dress in a 6 - it arrived and didn't fit. Unfortunately for me, the 8 wasn't available so I was risking it with 1 dress only. 
The dress arrived at 7p on Friday night- I had to scramble and head to the mall to buy a dress last minute.  
My recommendation would be to go 1 size up - and don't risk if they don't have 2 dresses to ship. 
I ended up spending $1200 on a dress since my back was against the wall.

I wore this for my brother's college graduation. While the color was gorgeous, the overall fit of the dress wasn't as flattering as I would have hoped. I really wanted it to fit more sleekly, but I have curves (especially hip and tummy area).

So many compliments! It's different enough without being too crazy. The zipper is really tough, impossible to get on/off alone. It runs a smidge tight so if you're really on the border, size up. Other than that, fit very true to size - I'm 5'6", 115 pounds and wore a 0R. I did have to wear it with 3 inch heels, 4.5 inch heels made this too short. Makes the booty look FAB :)

It was perfect! I have larger shoulders so it was a little tight there, but it fit PERFECTLY around my bottom. The fabric was stretchy and comfortable and I got a ton of compliments! I am 5'6" with a 34B and about 140 lbs
Nice and short, fit very well. Was a bit hit

This dress is well made and the fit is quite flattering. However, I did not end up wearing this dress to my event. This dress consists of two layers, and I felt that the top layer material was too 'matronly'- even for my age (I'm 43).  The only description that comes to mind is... stiff doilies from grandma's living room? I wanted to love it but just didn't.

It's very low cut, which made me a little self conscious at a work event. And I should have worn spanx to define a waist or something. But the slit in the leg is much lower than the website pic shows and was great with my sparkly triple-strap shoes.

It was my first time ordering so I got to pick a second dress option and this was what I chose.  I really loved the dress and I think if it fit perfectly I would have loved it even more but it was a little big in the upper back area.  It is definitely a dress that needs to be fitted all around or it will bunch up in the wrong places. For a little snugger fit, I'd order a size down to make sure the dress hugs you where it is supposed to. I'd say the length was was to be expected.  I'm short and had to order the regular.  It was long but with really high heels, it was fine.
Very versatile dress, incredibly comfortable. I should have tried a size 4.

I had ordered the 4R and the 2R as a back-up size. I generally tend to fit into a size 4, but the 2 fit perfectly. The length was perfect as well. I am not tall (5'4" tall), and I wore 3" heels. The dress lightly skimmed the floor. When I sat down I did tend to step on the dress when I went to stand, but that was no big deal to me. I got so many compliments, and I had such a great time wearing this dress. I was disappointed I couldn't keep it!
The only con I have for this dress was that the fabric was heavier than I thought it would be. Absolutely loved it other than that!

I love love love this asymmetrical dress. It's so beautiful and really looks amazing on. It runs small so you definitely need to size up. There is comfortable room in the bust, but it's very fitted in the waist, midsection, and hips. Curvier women should also size up. It's about tea length and can be work with any standard bra. This dress really looks amazing and can work for a range of events from dates, to parties to weddings. YOU MUST RENT THIS!

Pros: Fits GREAT, super comfortable, and I didnt have have to wear a bra
Cons: you really roll you dice with the quality of this dress. I ordered both the 4 and 6 and I thought the 4 fit better but the color was NOT blue it was disgusting and honestly a year later and Im still unsure why RTR would even think sending this dress to me was acceptable. The lace on the top part of both dresses were ripped (you could stick you fingers through the holes. THAT bad. I was able to stitch up the 6's holes enough and no one noticed.
GORGEOUS. SO flattering. lot's of compliments. Hugged all the right areas.
Cute sleeves, sweater was thin so I wore a tank under it.  The white portions of the shirt wrinkle easily, making the shirt look a little sloppy.

I would definitely recommend this dress. It runs true to size, beautiful fabric, loved the color, easy to wear. There were a few places fabric felt a little tight but it was really comfortable and was most due to the lace not having stretch. I have a 34D cup-size and this usually creates a problem in the chest but it didn't at all. I will say I didn't realize how low the chest line dips, you definitely cannot wear a bra. Because I have a big chest there was a lot of cleavage (I rarely wear anything with cleavage) but the lace tones it down. I wore to a gala and it was perfect made a statement without being to showy. I don't have a picture of me in full length but I have one from the photo booth that gives you a sense of the chest/neck line.

Conservative enough that I could wear it to a work function, but still super cute. Was tightest in waist, and poofed out in just the right place to be very slimming and hiding the gut! :) Got many compliments on this outfit. Definitely able to either wear it fancy or dress it down, depending on the occasion! Also it had pockets, which is always a plus. I really enjoyed this dress, and would definitely recommend it.

I wore this to a winter wedding and it was perfect. The reviews were right, the dress does run big. I am normally a solid 12 but wore the 10 in this dress. The bust runs very large and you cannot wear a bra with a back strap. However, the material is thick enough and structured enough that I did not need one and felt completely comfortable. I really liked the open back detail too, gave it a little something extra. Also, the length was great for a tall frame, went just past my knees so did not feel skimpy at all. Received several compliments, would wear again!

This dress is definitely a stand out.  It is quite forgiving - it has a subtle stretch.  However, it is quite short - especially if you have fluffy posterior (like me).  Despite being scandalously short, it looks very classy.  You won't be disappointed.

I didn't wear it because the straps kept falling down and the top was too low in front. I Loved the dress and was sad about not being able to wear it until I went to the event and saw three other people who had it on. I am very happy I wore another dress. The customer service was amazing and gave me a credit. I just rented another dress for my birthday party this week. I can't wait.

I normally wear a size 6, but was advised to order the Long lengths because i intended to wear heels. So, I ordered the 6L and the 8L. Ended up with a pretty short heels and so both dresses were way too long. This was a fairly easy fix with fashion tape to hem it, just wish I would have stayed true to size and not ordered the Longs. The dress itself is stunning and you won't regret this rental!
I'm 5'6 and 150lbs. It hit mid thigh for me.

the colors are awesome. the material is a touch thicker, like incredibly soft canvas. the colors are great. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and got the 4 in this dress. i have room to spare and it looked great! the back doesn't zip up all the way, but you can definitely wear a reg bra or go without. the band around the waist has no stretch. hem hit a couple of inches above my knee, still work appropriate. this would be great for a picnic, brunch, or even dinner date. just change up the shoes. i'm a huge fan of this dress!
I wore this both to work and for a Thanksgiving brunch.  I received tons of compliments!

I kept getting complements all evening! The color was perfect for a day wedding and evening reception; I wore it with nude heels and simple jewelry. The beading around the neckline is enough but, it would've been lovely with a diamond necklace as well.

Lilly doesn't disappoint when it comes to the cut and fit of their dresses! This fit wonderfully and the cut provided an hour glass shape that looks great on all shapes and sizes. You can wear with regular under garments and the dress, while form fitting, never felt tight even while dancing. I was so sad to send this one back!

The dress fell 2 inches above my knee.  The material was thick but very comfortable. The dress was a bit baggy on my petite frame - but worked well enough.  I saw a girl with more curves wearing the dress and I thought it looked better on her.  I wore it to work with a cardigan and black tights and received many compliments.  It transitioned well to an evening cocktail party.
Stunning gown! Fit like a glove, perfect length!

So many compliments from so many people! I felt great in it, and was able to dance and move without feeling uncomfortable. I loved this dress so much, I've also rented it in two other colors for other occasions! Thanks RTR, you've made wedding season more fun! :)
It fit true to size for the most part. The back was a little loose, but a little fashion tape solved that problem. I would definitely recommend!
Normally wear a size 2 and ordered this in a 0 and fit perfectly
I ordered a small, it runs true to size should have gotten the med, will re-order. very nice

Very comfortable and flattering; well made, nice material. This is a very cute  option for petite women. I wore 3" heels with no platform and could have worn slightly lower heel. Absolutely loved and would love to rent again!
True to size, gorgeous color, loved overall!
The fabric is fairly thick, so it's forgiving. However, the poofiness of the dress from waist down adds on a couple pounds. Playful and casual for spring/summer outdoor events.

I rented this dress for vacation on the Cape and it was exactly what I wanted. As a few other reviews mentioned this size 2 had a broken zipper and it was extremely difficult to zipper it. However, once I got it on, I loved it. As with most Kate Spade dresses, the size 2 was slightly tight in the chest area but not uncomfortable. This dress is also forgiving in the stomach since it flairs out a bit. Besides the zipper issue, I really enjoyed this dress.
Absolutely loved this dress! Perfect dress for my birthday celebration - received so many compliments!

I didn't end up wearing this dress- the 4 was a bit small ( I am between 4-6) and this was a backup that RTR sent me after my original order was unavailable. I wish I could have tried the 6, becasue the details on the dress were lovely! Would recommend if you can size up.
The dress was very tight and the material have little to no give. I usually wear a 4, ended up wearing the 6, and should have worn the 8!

I was excited to try this as my 2nd option but as it was fairly last minute and didn't have my typical size. I'm usually a 10 so the 8 was just too small. I love this color! The fabric was beautiful but too short for me. The black lining on the  straps was also showing wear but nothing that made it unwearable in my opinion.
The dress was gorgeous! I was a little disappointed at the added "puff" the dress gave me but my cleavage looked phenomenal!

I rented this for an office holiday party at an upscale restaurant. I've gained some weight lately and my 14's have been very tight, so I looked for a 16 to rent, and it turned out to be HUGE on me, but it ended up working out fine. I used fashion tape to gather the back and covered up the "bunchy" part under a silvery gray blazer. No one knew the difference and I got lots of compliments. The best part was, in spite of all the beautiful women in cocktail dresses, my husband couldn't take his eyes off me! I recommend this dress; would definitely rent it again if it came in a smaller size. (Sorry photo doesn't show much of the dress... our event photographer just did head shots.)
Great sweater, but the one I got was starting to unravel around the openings in the arms...
The back cut out of the dress was so cute!  I wore my normal size and still had some room to spare, probably could have gone down a size.  It was comfortable and forgiving, I would wear again!

Work holiday party. Loved wearing this dress. The size was spot on, but as many dresses like this, I found it hard to get the zipper up over the seam around the waist. I needed help. The embroidery is gorgeous, the neckline hugs perfectly and the length was so stunning with heels. The sleeves were a little itchy because of the fabric as someone else mentioned, but it was tolerable.
It was way too long and bulky for me, unless I had super high heels, it didn't look right. I wish it was few inches shorter, it would have been nice.

This dress looks amazing on. That's about it. It has a super awkward fit and while in the dress I couldn't move my arms or even zip the dress myself because of the fit. It was just super tight. To top it off, I drove for a bit in this car traveling to my event and the zipper cut my back up. I really wouldn't recommend this dress.

I could not say enough good things about this dress. The way it moved when I walked, the pattern and color - everything about this is dress is amazing. I received so many compliments about the dress, especially the beautifully colors. I did have to use some fashion tape around the top area, as it was a little big. I ordered the 2L, I wore heels otherwise it would have been way to long. I will definitely keep this dress in mind for another occasion!
Fits like a mini dress on the inside (non stretchy) with a wrapped train.  The flow of the dress is the best I have ever seen.  LOVE IT!

I love this dress and wish that I could purchase it for my own. The cut is very flattering for small breasted women like myself. Love the keyhole neckline and the open back. I wore adhesive cups with this dress since it isn't lined.
Fit perfect and made me feel like a modern day Audrey Hepburn :)
it fits true to size and looks great, very comfortable!
Just a tad long (I'm petite), so heels are a must.

This dress was PERFECT for the event.  I've rented from RTR every year for my boyfriend's formal black tie event at work that he has annually, and I've never been disappointed.  This dress kind of felt like it was out of my comfort zone when I first saw it because of the gold detailing as well as the mermail tail look at the bottom, but I took a leap of faith and I'm SO glad I did.  I typically wear a size 6, and it ran true to size (ended up getting a 6L because I saw some mention of it running short but the 6R was good for my 5'4" frame).  The dress arrived in pristine condition, and I paired it with simple black open-toed heels and I was ready to go!  It's a super flattering dress that doesn't feel constricting, but if you do a little bit of dancing it is a little more snug in the hips (nothing a little hiking up of the dress won't fix).  Overall, was SO pleased.  My boyfriend loved the dress, and I got compliments all night.  Made me feel like a PRINCESS! :)
Super flattering dress. Very feminine. The medium was too baggy through the body and the small fit perfectly. I received so any compliments at my wedding shower for this dress.
Definitely needed the Long in order to wear heels. I am normally a 2 but the 4 felt more comfortable with room to dance.

This dress has a little bit of stretch, so it's comfortable to walk, sit, and dance in. The slit makes it really easy to walk and use the restroom. I ended up sizing up to my backup size because the smaller size exposed some side boob and choked my neck. My only complaint is that the "x" shape in the back crosses a little too far up and is a bit tight around the neck.

Rented this for my rehearsal dinner and definitely felt pretty in it.  Color was beautiful.  Badgley Mischka seems to run a bit small on me around the waist.  I feel like if I would've gotten a size up though, it would've been huge on the boobs and length.  No need to wear a bra which is nice.  Wore 5" heels and length was perfect.

I loved the dress. I got a 4R and a 6R, but the 4R didn't have the built in bra with it. I ended up wearing the 6R which was a little bit big around the chest area. I found myself pulling it up often. However, I got a lot of compliments. I felt very Audrey Hepburn-esque in it. Classy. The dress fell just over my shoe, which was perfect because I didn't want it sweeping the floor. It was very easy to move in and the sleeves fit great.

I chose this dress for a bridal shower with a British tea party theme - we were to dress the part and wear hats or a fascinator. I knew I wanted something floral and when I found this dress with the floral/lace combo I knew it was it. And I was not disappointed! This dress fit like a glove and was very flattering. Comfortable to wear. The color was a yellow-lime and was adorable!  Very true to size.

I am a solid 6 in all Elizabeth and James but since almost ALL of the reviews call out that it runs small, I ordered an 8. And it was too big. Too long and too loose. Also want to call out that the color in the photo is slightly more pink hued where as the actual dress is more peach/orange tinted.
The fabric is more lightweight than I expected, although very high quality.  The fit is flattering and drapes nicely.  Perfect for a dressier day at the office or a weekend outing.

The dress fit fairly well. It is closer to a halter-type dress and I have wide shoulders, so it just looked a tad awkward but it is a beautiful dress. I absolutely adored the pockets. I'm a little short, so the dress was longer than I expected.

The lining is super soft.  The sequins are high quality.  The color is more like rose gold.  It was a little large, I could have gone down one size.  (normally a 2).  The front does V kinda low, but someone had put a tiny stitch in it before and it worked perfectly.  The sequins never scratched and it is easy to wear a comfortable wedge with the length. I wore this for my Senior Formal.

I absolutely loved this dress. I got compliments all night on it. I chose to size up from my normal size, because of my mom hips. I could have fit in the 4R, but I was worried about it being too tight on my thighs/hip area! This dress is stunning, the material isn't thin and not too thick! I was on the fence getting this dress because of the cutout, and because I am a mom of two young kids, but the slit and the cutout wasn't bad at all! It actually made me feel sexy! I felt great in it, and I will say a strapless bra will work best. Just make sure the band isn't too big in width, so it doesn't show through the cutout! :) I hope this helps anyone who is thinking about getting this dress!
Fit wonderfully especially in the chest area.

I loved this dress!  Everyone loved this dress!  I could have worn the 4, but wore the 6, as the waist area was too tight for comfort for me (I wanted to eat at the wedding!)  I received SO many compliments and definitely recommend others to rent this dress!  M
Simple, classic, comfortable!

The bust was a bit tight which caused the snap to pop frequently throughout the night, the zipper also came down a few times.  The shape was great and fit in all the right places! So fun and flowy, the length was perfect for a family wedding.

The detail on this dress is even prettier in person and the mesh is more nude than white, which I liked!  It is short and flirty but still appropriate for family! It is tight in the bust and under the armpits so I wore my backup size (6) instead of my usual 4.
This dress could not be more comfortable. Lots of compliments and easy to wear.

Depending on the style I normally wear a small or medium. I tried on the medium first but the stomach area was a little big so I tried on the small. The small was definitely a tighter but it accentuated my curves perfectly and I was still able to breath! The best part is that it zips all the way down the back of the dress so when I needed to I could just unzip the bottom a little to make it easier to walk and climb stairs. Despite it being sleeveless it kept me warm and was perfect for my boyfriend's holiday party.

This dress was really comfortable to wear and the print it beautiful. My only complaint is that my strapless bra showed in the back. It was a little chilly so I wore a jean jacket but otherwise I would have had a problem wearing a bra.
This dress is absolutely beautiful and fit like a dream. It was especially nice for my 13 week pregnant belly, as it gave it room, but didn't make me look matronly. I got tons of compliments!

The material was thick, so the dress hid any imperfections. The regular length was good for my 2.5-3" heels. I was surprised that the size 6 fit so snug, but it worked out well. I absolutely loved it!
Nice length and thick material. Bust was a little tight, but stretchy material allowed for more room. Wore to work and received compliments on the style.

This might be my favorite RTR rental yet. It's crazy comfortable, super flattering, and the back is gorgeous. I actually just bought almost the exact same dress in a different pattern because I love it so much. The colors are amazing in person!
The floral appliques on this dress are gorgeous. I wore it for Easter. I do think it was a little too long (I'm 5'4"), but didn't look bad. Flattering yet conservative.

I'm 5'7, 135 and the eight fit well, but like the reviews said, it was short! I was prepared though and it just made me feel extra sexy. This was my first time using RTR and I will definitely be a repeat customer!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous and so comfortable to wear.  The only negative is that it wrinkles incredibly easily, which was a bit of a bummer during my engagement shoot. Also, I wouldn't recommend this dress for anyone who needs the support of a bra.

I wish it would have been longer! It was too short for me in the torso, meaning that it didn't cover me appropriately up top. The inseam length in the pant was perfect for flats or a small heel, but it needed to be an inch or two longer in the torso for me to wear. Otherwise the size was perfect. Super bummed because it was so cute!
Fit was great. Only issues - tight on the bust area (I am a nursing mother) and it was long (I am short). Would have been perfect if there was a petite option.

I loved this dress! It is so beautiful yet very functional (pockets). This dress runs a bit small but oddly, only in the arms! I have very small arms but still had to go up a size to an 8. 
The quality of this dress is evident in person and the color is quite striking!  I would rent this again!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous, it has just the right amount of sparkle and flair. It fits true to size (I usually wear a 4 or 6) and was perfect for dancing. I did wear a sticky bra which I felt really helped because the top wasn't incredibly tight. Would definitely rent this again!

This dress is a thicker material so It was a little warm for a summer bachelorette party. It was also short but it was ok as long as I was standing. It was very flattering and looked great in pictures!

This dress was perfect for the event! I felt that it ran small. The dress did really cinch in my waist.  I wasn't sure if this dress would be flattering on my figure given the loud floral print, but the placement of flowers really ended up highlighting rather than hindering.
The material is super nice and a bit forgiving. Very classy. The best I felt dressed up postpartum.

I didn't actually wear this dress as it was a skooch too big and I had no suitable occasion (it was just a back-up dress). It's pretty sexy, though; would definitely be great for a dressy event or a very fancy date. I didn't love the billowy sleeves. If I bought this dress, I would take those in. All in all: B+

I rented this dress for my mom, she loved it! She ordered a 10 and a 12, the 10 was very tight on her but the 12 was too large in the bust area. Her only complaint was that the fabric did not have much give to it. However, it was a big hit at the wedding and everyone loved it! The dress is a bit on the long side, so unless you're a younger person going for a more conservative look, I would suggest leaving this for the more mature fashionistas.

It was super fun and I got so many compliments, the sparkles are really pretty and not too overwhelming.  The fit is also super flattering and hid my tummy which is a problem area for me.  I went with the medium and got the small as a backup size, the medium was a little bit big on top, but sticky boobs saved the day.  The small fit a little snugger but I found it highlighted my midsection a little more than the medium did, so I went with the medium. My one issue was that it is a really heavy dress because of the sequins, and it did get a little hot after wearing it all night but I didn't find the sequins to be too itchy or irritating.  I would definitely recommend renting this!

This is a beautifully designed and well constructed dress!! On the hanger it doesn't look like anything special, but when you put it on it comes alive- especially if you have curves!! The lace was thick, well constructed, and sewn onto the solid lining so it doesn't shift. AMAZING. The darker color and lace overlay hide body flaws pretty well, but I did pair it with Spanx to smooth everything out. I wore it with an adhesive bra as well to not have to deal with a traditional strapless (straps would be visible through the lace). If you are petite and/or pear shaped like me this is a great choice since the shift style does not have a defined waistline and there was plenty of room in the hips. I'm still in the process of losing the remaining baby weight and this dress was very forgiving while still looking sharp.

This dress was beautiful, unique and sexy. The cutouts go all the way around to expose a gorgeous bit of back! Lots of compliments! I usually wear a 4, and it fit and looked good, but I just felt I wanted a bit more room to dance so I wore the 6. The length wasn't my favorite (I'm 5'8" and the 6 went like 3 inches below my knees), but still hot!

I normally wear a 0 - 2 from White House Black Market, and a 4 - 6 from other stores. I was nervous about what size to get, but went off other reviews based closely on my height and weight and ordered the 2 and back up 4. I could have went with a 0 the night of, but that may have been too tight after dinner. So I went with the 2. 
This dress was so perfect for a fall wedding. I wish I owned it! I was debating on wearing tights, but it looked so cute with them. I also ordered the ombre earrings that others have suggested and they are so heavy you could literally see my lobes being pulled down by the weight. Luckily I had other earrings that looked just as cute. 
I would definitely rent this dress again. No issues with the condition, etc.

I wore this dress for a formal event one night and then for a maternity photo shoot the next day.  At 7.5 months pregnant, I kind of felt like a disco ball, but I got so many compliments!  When I'm not pregnant, I weigh 150 and wear a size 8, but since I gained 30 pounds already I opted for the 12L and it fit the bump well!  It was a little big/drapey on top even with my large chest, but nothing good posture couldn't secure and I liked that I could wear a normal bra.  It was very comfortable.

This is a beautiful dress. I got tons of compliments all night. The dress had a lovely weight and I'm glad I ordered the long. I'm 5' 4" but wear 4" heels so the long was a must. The dress was a little snug in the chest and didn't really do much for a larger chest.. The dress was a beautiful color...very classic red.

I rented this blindly (no reviews!) for a beach wedding rehearsal dinner, and it was perfect. I'm 5'9 and it hit me right below the knees. The fabric has a nice weight to it that provides great movement, but isn't too heavy. The scoop neckline and zipper detail and front pocket placement give it a little something special. The one reviewer mentioned it ran large, and I'd agree. I'm a usual size 8 in most dresses (though sometimes between sizes, so in this case it worked well for me) and I wore the 6 which fit great. I would size down for your backup. I also rented the necklace for RTR, and loved the two together. VERY happy with these rentals.
Fit great, felt true to size.

I wore this dress for my sorority's winter formal last year, and it was stunning ! My sister always rents her dresses for date functions, so I thought I'd give it a try, I ordered a size two and opted for the additional size four, and they both arrived the day before my formal. The size two ended up being a perfect fit, and I could wear flats without tripping over the hem, which has never happened in my life. 
The dress hugged my curves more than I had expected--well, the few curves I do have--without being the slightest bit constrictive. I could dance, run, and even somersault in this dress. There's nothing formal about formal!
Bottom line: this dress is a winner. It's subtly sexy, flattering, and classy.
Beautiful dress, I felt so elegant in this little number. Very structured, you will need Spanx as this dress is not very forgiving in terms of stretch.

This dress is fine - not bad, but probably wouldn't rent again.  I like the leather side details and although the capped sleeves are cute, what the photo doesn't show is the way they lay when you have your arms down or doing anything - unless you have twig arms, your armpit kind of shows - it looks weird.  I ended up actually wearing it under a blazer b/c I just felt like it was a bit of a "meh" dress and I didn't like the armpit look.  It was short so that made it a bit cuter.
The dress was a great fit and hid some of my "problem" areas.  It was a great color for my skin tone and a good length, a couple inches above my knee

Wore this dress for my friend's wedding and ended up loving the choice. The dress is a true sheath so although it does not do much for the shape of the body, it lends itself well to over-indulging in food and drink and dancing for 3 hours straight. I ordered both the 12 and the 14 and wore the 12. I would size down for a backup since I didn't even need to try the 14 on and I typically fall between the 2 sizes. Was very stylish while easy going, the beading was beautiful although there were a few small sections where the beadwork had been damaged it was not noticeable from a distance. The beadwork makes the dress kind of heavy but for a late fall wedding in Florida I was comfortable both inside and outside at the venue. I received more compliments on this dress than on anything else I have worn. The dress is whiter than I was anticipating, so I would suggest nude undergarments. You can easily wear a standard bra with this dress though which helped in the comfort and dancing ability. I ended up wearing metallic gold sandals with the dress that worked well. I would suggest gold or black based on the beadwork. The dress is such a showstopper alone that I just paired it with my everyday jewelry and small studs and it went over beautifully. Would definitely rent again/buy if that option becomes available. At 5'9" the dress was a nice length for church and dancing especially with flats. It doesn't show off much shape but it's not designed to do that.
Nice thick fabric allowed wear of normal undergarments. Elegant length, fit beautifully.
I usually wear a 4 and the 4L fit perfectly.  The dress arrived on time and the packaging made the return super easy.  Will definitely use Rent the Runway for my next special occasion.

Very comfortable!  Fabric very similar to Clover Canyon dresses.  The skirt is lined.  The size small fit well (for reference I'm size 2- occasionally 4 if very fitted through hips) and hit just above the knees on me.  Work appropriate- I got complements all day!

I rented this to wear to a bridal shower I was co-hosting. It was actually a backup dress but it instantly stole the show. The color, class, and ease of this dress are amazing. Only negative was it does run a bit large. My usual size is 10, but the 8 was still loose in the waist. Nothing a belt couldn't fix though. I will definitely be renting this again.
Dress is a little large, and so is not the most flattering, but the little details like the lace make this dress very beautiful.  I normally wear a 4, but wore a size down (2) and it was perfect.
GORGEOUS dress. I got so many compliments and so many people already asked to borrow it. Wish I could keep it and wear it over and over. Definitely will rent again.
This romper was roomy and casual, not form fitting at all, don't wear this if you what a sleek look.

This dress is even better in person!!!!!!!! The fabric is gorgeous, and it doesn't wrinkle as much as you'd think it would...I was a little worried it would hug my hips/bum too much (since I have large hips and booty!!!) but it was absolutely perfect and comfortable. The top keyhole can revel too much if you aren't careful, and a strapless bra is a must (but thankfully, spanx are not!). Received tons of compliments.

Pros: beautiful color and fithe
Cons: ran a bit large in the bust area

This dress was very easy to wear!  Thick, stretchy fabric was very forgiving.  Did need a strapless bra due to the sheer sleeves.  Also, be aware that there is a seam and a lot of ruching on the derriere. Made me a little self-conscious, but not a dealbreaker.
I loved this dress and felt beautiful in it! the only problem was that it looked a little worn out.

I loved wearing this dress.  I took a risk because there weren't any reviews yet but I was drawn to the style and colors and couldn't help myself.  I also took a risk with the hemline as I pretty much subscribe to the "no hemlines above the knee over 40" rule.  I was concerned it would be inappropriate for a family wedding.  However, it looked so good I forgot all about the hemline.  I received many compliments and would definitely rent this one again.  I am 5'4" and 122 lbs.   the 4 fit like a glove and stretched out just the right amount over the evening that it wasn't tight in the waist.  It also hid my little belly!
This dress was super comfortable and fit perfectly. I wore this dress for a dinner out and I would definitely rent it again!

I rented this dress for NYE and I got compliments all night! It fits perfect and was so sexy and comfortable at the same time. I danced all night long and was glittering like a disco ball from all the DJ lights. Its definitely a showstopping dress!!!

I really liked this dress, but being petite, except for in the bust, I had a little trouble with how much cleavage this showed. I tend to be a little more conservative, so I ended up having to athletic tape EVERYTHING to make my 34DDD's look a little less obscene. Either way, I ended up with a ton of compliments, and miracle upon miracle, I was actually able to dance in it!

Other than that, the dress was perfect! The fabric on both the top and skirt were thick, so I could easily go without a bra, and I even wore red underwear and you couldn't see a thing. Pockets are definitely a bonus too, they are HUGE, and I could easily carry my phone around without seeing a single lump in the skirt.

Overall, I recommend if you are OK with flaunting what you got! I received tons of compliments.

Well-made, whimsical spin on a bomber jacket, with beautiful floral embroidery and really sturdy, fun golden hardware. Perfect and lightweight for the ever-changing Chicago fall weather. I am petite and the arm length fit me perfectly. (I am also 5 months pregnant and the jacket draped open perfectly around my baby bump ☺).

This top is very casual but for every day it worked well. I think I would only wear it with leggings as it comes down quite low. I wore it with leather leggings and loafers and was a perfect casual outfit.

I rented this dress for my Executive MBA graduation ceremony. Although I was originally planning on wearing something with color for the event (since it was the middle of summer), this dress really stood out to me. The embroidery at the top is really beautiful and unique. The only thing is the material was a bit stretched out so I had to tack it in the back of my shoulder so it would lay flat. Otherwise, gorgeous fit, showed off the curves but in a very tasteful way, and really a statement dress. Got TONS of compliments! Can't wait to rent this dress again.

So comfy, didn't have to adjust/pull down all night, and the material didn't itch or irritate at all. I have a very small chest and larger hips so it's hard to find a good fit, but this completely flattered my shape and I received compliments all night!

I wanted to like this so much! But on a short, curvy girl it just did not work. The large was a little too big, but I don't think sizing down would have helped. The straps are long and not adjustable, and the bust-triangles were small yet also stuck out on the sides. It's definitely a sexy dress and it would look fabulous on taller women who don't have a lot of curves.

This is a wonderful dress for a formal affair. The cape adds drama and makes it so much more than just another red dress. Very comfortable to wear, but there is very little stretch to the dress, so size up if you are between sizes. I usually fit between a 6 and 8, and the 6 fit, but was a bit tight. I had gone down for my backup since the 8 wasn't available, and I think the 8 would have been more comfortable.  Still a lovely dress, and would wear again!
A perfect combination of elegant and sexy. The dress hugs all the right areas. The top was slightly big but still looked fine. I wore a 6 but probably could have even worn a 4.
I loved the pockets and back detail.  I worn it on the weekend and to work, very versatile.
Dress was a little loose and wasn't as fitted as I had would have liked but overall the dress is really pretty.

Fits true to size. I have a larger chest (34DDD) and wore a size 6, the neck is pretty low and I kept fixing it throughout the night, but other than that...super comfortable, loved the sparkles, got lots of compliments and felt awesome!!

I loved this dress!!! It fit perfect everywhere (stomach and butt) except the bust area because I have a very small bust. I wore a NuBra with it, which I recommend for this dress because of the low neckline and back. I am short with a super athletic build, so I wanted to show off my physique which this dress did. I received many compliments on the dress and felt sexy in it...not to mention my husband matched my dress color perfect also, so we complimented each other. The color of the dress in the picture is a little brighter than the actual color. I would call it magenta instead of pink. The 4R was perfect in length as well, with a 3-4 inch heel that I wore. Thought I would mention that I am also a mother of two kids and still have a little pooch, but this dress gave me a tight midsection look because the fabric is stretchy and added some tummy control. Overall, I loved this dress and recommend it to anyone that wants a sleek sexy look for a wedding or party.
Petite size hieght worked well for my 5'3 stature, I wore 3 1/2 inch heel and it did the trick.
loved this outfit.  My friends all said I should buy it.  Its vibrant and fun.  Not the most comfortable though.. felt a bit short in the torso.
Easy fit. Hits right at the knee.
I ordered it but didn't wear it. I'm 5'7 and it was a little too short. But it was a pretty dress.

This is a great style! The slip has sequins and combined with the lace overlay, this style is definitely a stand-out look! The lace on the sleeves is comfortable. The length is great. The material is a little stretchy, so you have room to live. The sparkle underneath the lace is subtle, but it's definitely there! I felt very pretty in this style. I would absolutely rent this style for a wedding or some other fun event!
Didn't end up wearing b/c I should have gotten a 12, but a really nice looking dress. Thick material w/ some stretch. Beautiful color and style.

Absolutely stunning dress that is one of the most flattering things I've ever put on my body. I'm so glad I rented it, since it didn't really "grab" me seeing it on the site (I err towards flashier, more dramatic dresses usually). Just trust me when I tell you that you will look and feel like a trillion bucks in this- I truly felt like a celebrity in it. Oh, did I mention it's insanely comfortable, too? Just rent it already!
Fit me very well - I have a small waist and a big butt and thighs. The fit was perfect for my body, and jut the right balance of soft, sexy and sophisticated.

Fit well- I’m tall w hips
Would not be good if you have large belly
