The dress is incredibly comfortable and well fitted. It molds to my curves. The only problem is making sure not to wear the larger size because the bust becomes an issue.
It fit perfectly and was flattering. Color was true to the picture. Return was easy.

I loved this dress. I wanted to wear something that was more on the casual side so I could match it with my navy boots and this worked perfectly for that. The dress was not too short, which is a problem I usually run into being 5'10. GREAT dress.

This jumpsuit seriously rocks! The color was perfect for a holiday party I was attending, although the style and fit could honestly even work in warmer months. I got so many compliments the whole night and I really stood out among a sea of black dresses!

The perfect delicate lace dress to wear to a day time event! There is a light-weight slip underneath this detailed lace dress, so wearing a nu bra or standard bra is necessary. The slip is a little fitted at the natural waist but flares out at the hips. At 5'4 the dress hit me just above the knee, which I prefer for shorter dresses.  I would wear this dress with pair of black heels and simple earring!

I wore this for a graduation dinner; it isn't too formal, it's a reasonable length, it's fun and summery and while the print is original it still looks classy. It's the kind of thing you can't wear often because it's so memorable but it's so nice and comfortable you want to wear to everything.
The top does run large but would probably fit someone bustier.

I rented this dress for an engagement party and it was so perfect. the straps were slightly too long but I didn't want to mess with pinning them up so I just tucked them in and wore it as a strapless. The dress hit right at the ankles so I didn't have to worry about the dress dragging on my 5-foot frame. I would definitely rent this again!

I'm one of those women that think everyone will look great on them, and then I get it home and go...wow that's a lot of sequins.  That's exactly what happened here.  It was beautiful in the bag, all golden and glittery, but when I put it on, it was just too much for me.  The fabric at the shoulder is a little bunchy, and I thought the combination of the bunchy fabric, the sequins and the color just made me look broad. 

Also, the sequins were a little chafey in the upper arms.  I just wasn't crazy about how it looked when I was wearing it.  I had full makeup and hair done, and I still didn't feel pretty in it, and that's the whole point, right?.  Sent it back without wearing it out.
Which I do not. The fabric is great - good drape and good structure. The print is deceptively complex. The fit is flattering. Unless you have broad shoulders that don't look great in a raglan sleeve.

I am an unlimited subscriber and I've tried a lot of pieces for work or going out, and this has been one of my favorites so far. I wore it to a kid's birthday party, then on a date night, then I paired it with a black cardigan for work. Very versatile. I"m always between a size 8 and 10, so I got the 10 and was very comfortable. But it moves well and the waist is stretchy, so an 8 probably would've worked too. I loved the crepe material and the pattern. It can wrinkle, so I probably wouldn't try to wear it anywhere important. But Overall, better than I expected.

Wore this for NYE 2016 at a formal dinner and afterparty at a hotel. Loved everything about this dress, from the shape, to the neckline, to the slit up the front - paired with a statement cuff, matching earrings and silver heels, and I was good to go. The lining of the dress is heavenly - such a great touch. TTS overall - be warned, though, the waistband has zero give, and can be a bit tight for those of us with wider ribcages. I think that if a 14 had been available, I would've sized up for a little more room, but I still made it 8+ hours and through a seven-course dinner without incident, and got major compliments all night. Absolutely worth it.
I had so much fun wearing this pantsuit. It was a last minute replacement for another dress that didn't fit, and I'm so glad I got it!
A bit short waisted.
The fabric is thick and has some stretch, so I found it forgiving and form fitting.  Find some seamless undergarments!  A strapless bra worked well for me.

This dress is so comfortable!  The sleeves are long (like, long), so it's great for us tall girls.  it hits at a very flattering place above the ankle.  The fabric has stretch so it has room to move.  I recommend a nubra so that you don' have to adjust a strapless all night long.
The dress fit well but was a little poofy. I was bit self conscious and kept trying to hold it down all night but people said I was being silly!

This coat is absolutely fabulous and a complete show stopper.  The leather at the neck and pockets are funky additions an an already interesting coat, and the more you look at it the more you find to love about it!  It's incredibly warm, so it's perfect for the winter season, and it runs true to size, if possibly a tiny bit large.  But considering you may want to wear a sweater or layer in the colder months, a slightly bigger coat can be preferable!  If you're looking for a piece to add a little excitement to a more basic winter wardrobe, this is definitely one to consider!
Didn't end up wearing. It was too small.

Dress fit great - went with the smaller size; loved the navy - great for the Holiday party; the sequins would occasionally catch some of the lace on the sleeves which is the only reason the dress got 4 stars; loved that the arms were "covered".

This beautiful dress fit perfectly in the rib cage, and the flared style helped hide the postpartum pooch I have left over after having my son three months ago. The low cut style added just the right amount of sexiness to the dress. Being 6' tall, I'm always worried about dresses being long enough. The length of this dress felt appropriate for a wedding, yet still young and fun.
I ended up wearing another outfit, but this dress was beautiful. It was snug in the rib cage and hard to zip like the others have mentioned. It was such a comfortable dress!
This dress is so forgiving and looks amazing on. Bonus: top doesn't fall!
I love this! Wore for work and a date night and wish I could keep it. It's SO flattering and fit perfectly.

I'm always cold at events, so the long sleeve and thicker material were perfect for me! I loved that I did not need to bring a jacket. I'm short (a bit under 5'4'') and very petite, so the shorter tight style was exactly what I was looking for, because usually dresses are too long on me.. but not this one! I loved the length. The lines on the dress were very flattering, and the dress was also comfortable.  Also, I was traveling/flying for the wedding so it was great that this is not a dress that wrinkles in your luggage. I would TOTALLY wear again, and loved the RTR experience! I received so many compliments on this dress. Thanks RTR!

This is the first time I've worn a formal-style jumper, as opposed to a dress, and I loved it!  Got compliments the entire night!!!  It was a great light-weight, flowy fabric.  I wish it came in some other color options and I'd certainly rent it again for another party or night out!  Good to note though: it is NOT black as it appears, it's a dark green.  It also does not come with a belt as shown in the photo (I had to go buy one that looked good with it).  Definitely looks a million times better with one!  Also...if you're larger-chested be careful!  I'm a D and had to use some fashion tape and a small safety pin b/c I was nervous I'd break the very delicate thread that holds the V-neck line together!  Also - don't wear this if you won't have someone to go to the bathroom with you for a re-zip-up!!!
Loved it.

Love, love, love this jumpsuit. It's so easy to wear. The only drawback is the shoulder part limits your movement of your arms somewhat as it was a little tight in that area. Other than that, great material and beautiful jumpsuit. Received tons of compliments. Perfect length too.

The dress was worn at a Black Tie event. I was a little nervous going with shorter but it was great. Snug all the right areas and has lots of stretch to it so it was comfortable all night. I wear a 0-2 and rented the XS. Would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a classy black dress!

I wore this to the office with a blazer, tights and my beloved Dear Frances boots. Removed the blazer for date night and it was a great look! Cons: this dress isn't very forgiving. You can't eat a large dinner the night before or really have anything for breakfast or lunch, if you are intent about pulling this look off. I'm not really built for this look, but I managed to pull it off by skipping a few meals. :)

I ordered this one as a backup dress. My first choice fit so I didn't wear it. It fit really well and was very pretty. It is definitely more gold in person than it looks in the picture. The insets are really pretty and it is a very classic design.

My only complaint was that the size recommendation was that I would fit in a Long dress perfectly but in reality the L was about 3 inches too long, I am 5'7.5" and wore 4 inch heels and I still had to hold the dress up all night to keep from dragging.  Otherwise the fit was absolutely perfect for me!

I ordered this dress for a formal affair in a 0L and 2L and ended up wearing the 2L for length purposes. I received so many compliments from so many people--even people I didn't know--about how amazing this dress was, and how fabulous I looked in it.

Specifications: If you're tall, this dress is for you! I'm 6'0 and even with heels on this dress still touched the ground! For some reason I thought this dress would be gold, but it's actually more of a rose (pinkish) gold, which I wore with copper shoes and earrings--no necklace.  Don't over accessorize because there is a lot going on with this dress.  It runs a little big in the top.

I loved this dress. I wore it to work, under a blazer, and then ditched the jacket for drinks with friends. I was comfortable all day and got a ton of compliments. The print is cute and makes it so the dress can easily go with a variety of accessories, and be dressed up or down.  The material was thick and flattering. I'm already planning to rent again.

I love this shirt. I wanted to buy it immediately but it's not available for purchase yet... UHG. My only con for this is that the ribbon that comes with the shirt is significantly shorter than pictured. It barely has any hanging pieces to really balance the blouse. More cons after having it for a bit... it is VERY cropped. You can't really wear it to work unless you have a very high waisted pant or skirt, which i don't have.
Really fun that its a jumpsuit... It was easy to wear and true to size.

Love the style, it is very flattering and the fabric is forgiving and high quality. I love the peplum detail and got so many compliments on it. Unfortunately the 6 had a tear in the seam right in the front. The other size didn't fit so I wore it anyway, luckily it was hidden by the peplum skirt mostly. A little upset by the condition of the garment, especially for the cost.
Color pops and though this is shapely, it is forgiving and not too tight. Highly recommend this to wow at a formal event.
I loved this dress!   It was very flattering and I received many compliments.  The staff is fantastic!

Stretchy material was very comfortable. I wore it with black tights and otk boots for Christmas Eve. Could have sized up for it to be less tight but the 2 worked. Dress was pretty low cut and there was more cleavage shown than on the model. Lots of compliments!

It was easy to move around in, only con was the sequins were a little rough on the skin and my hair would get stuck in them. But knowing that sequins do that, I was prepared for it as best I could. Loved the dress.

Thanks RTR again for saving the day again! I was 11 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress and wasn't quite ready to announce my pregnancy. This dress was fabulous in all the right places and helped conceal my growing baby bump. Beautiful dress and I would rent again when I am not pregnant (just in a smaller size).

I loved the vibrant colors and the thick fabric with stretch.  It was short, though, esp. if you have any bum or thighs.  The bust is flattering for smaller chested gals. It shows your tummy, so keep that in mind! It felt fun and flirty on and my husband thought I looked hot!

I'm usually a 2R/4R. The 4R fit but was too long - maybe an inch long even after I put on 3.5" heels. So I exchanged for a 4P, which was perfect! Lots of fabric - probs didn't even need to wear a bra but I went with a strapless. Not so great if you're going to an outdoor event in the heat, but perfect for an indoor or evening event.
fit perfectly!
Very summery & easy to wear.

I had worn another dress by the same designer to another wedding and wore the 42 but wore the 44 in this dress.  Could have gotten away with the 42 but felt more comfortable in this one.  The fabric is think and snug so it was flattering in all the right places.  I wore a strapless bra so I could wear it off the shoulder. There's no zipper so it does take some effort getting it on and off. but once it's on you won't want to take it off!
The dress was form fitting but skimmed over the stomach and provided an hourglass shape.  Very comfortable and fun.

I was hesitant to try this dress because it's so far outside of my comfort zone - but I'm SO glad I did! The pros - high quality fabric, gorgeous shade of red, a bit of stretch for ease of movement/comfort, flattering for the hourglass figure, nice length, and high style. Cons - a bit large in the bust. Compliments galore all night long - I felt like a star in this stunner. Not for the faint of heart - this dress WILL get you noticed.  I wore this with black patent pumps, a simple crystal and jet bead bracelet, and carried a black beaded clutch. Bummed I forgot to snap a pic in this one...

The dress is super cute and comfortable, loved the pattern! Wore to welcome dinner/drinks event for the night before a wedding. The fabric is heavier so if you are going to be out in the heat for a long period of time you will definitely be sweating! My only comment is that the dress looked a little "worn" was pilling in multiple places making it look worn.

This is perfect for an hourglass figure. I loved how it hugged my curves without being revealing in anyway. I paired it with strappy sandals like the model wears in the photos, and a long, sheer trench coat. Perfect spring day time look!

I loved this dress for my event! The slits on the side were subtle and comfortable. Only think was the dress was very short. I couldn't wear heels and instead had to wear flat sandals. Made for comfortable feet but I also love wearing heels!

I received compliments on the design and the colors (darker than expected) and was told I was the talk of the town (well the event)! It was a very chilly night so the heaviness of the dress kept me comfortable. I'm busty but the bodice hugged my upper body and even complimented it. I'm on the short side so I thought that since it went to mid-calf for average/tall women, that for me it'd be the perfect length for a long gown. The dress actually stopped at my ankles which at first was awkward for me but then turned out to be perfect because I didn't have to lift up my dress as I walked and it was perfectly flow-y when I was dancing. I felt elegant, classy and very attractive. It was appropriate for a ball type event like the one I attended. Highly recommend! This is the first dress I've  rented from Rent the Runway and I have to say I am impressed at the speedy overnight delivery and the helpful customer service. Will continue doing business with this great company! :)

I ordered the 2, which fit but the piping/material in the chest area was a bit wonky. I ended up wearing the "back-up" 4 which was fantastic! I'm short and blonde/pretty pale... The color was beautiful and I was so pleased! The hi/low is an awesome design, and I received tons of compliments. =) I definitely recommend this!

The dress fit perfect and was very comfortable since the skirt was full. The neckline was very flattering.  
Loved the jewelry recommended by the stylist also worn on the model in the picture!
This dress was super comfortable and sweet. I'm heavy up top and it fit me well on my 38 DDs. Dress hit me at my knees being 5'2. Can't go wrong with this one.
It runs large but its a very comfortable and plunging neck is very low, I pulled my straps up higher.
Perfect fit!

Loved the weight of this dress. It wasn't too heavy, but didn't blow up at the barn wedding we attended. I'm larger chested and I really liked that I didn't feel like my chest was smooshed or looked like a loaf, like some high necked dresses do.  I really loved the pockets, too! I'm not normally one for a high-low dress, but this one was so perfect, I'd highly recommend it!

I was worried that it would be tight but it fit perfect in the 0. It was tight in the upper portion, I was wearing a padded strapless bra, but nothing uncomfortable. The unique cut of the dress makes it so much fun to wear. The only weird part is where the asymmetrical hem meets the seam on the side, just a little bulky. Such an amazing dress.

I loved wearing this dress so much that I honestly did not want to return it! I got so many compliments and felt great wearing it all night. It was comfortable, and so unique. I wore the size 0 bc the 2 felt like the shoulders would keep falling all night. It was a little short, but I am short so it was ok. The lingerie straps kept peaking through the sleeves...I wish I had secured them with fashion tape or something. I would definitely rent this dress again - so fun for a hot summer wedding.

This dress fit true to size. It was very forgiving and did look great on me. Will I rent it again? Probably not. The fabric was a little heavy, it wasn't as long as I hoped and there is too much fabric. This was the first time I've tried Rent the Runway and while the dress wasn't perfect the service itself was amazing! I will be renting other dresses from this site.

I'm usually either a 4 or 6 in dresses like these. I'm a little wider in the chest and back area, so even though a 4 fit my body, a 6 fit my chest and back; which in the end was perfect because it gave me wiggle room without being too loose. The best part was the floral on the bottom. In the picture, you can only see the front side with floral, but it's also in the back. It was also a thicker material where a bra isn't necessarily needed. The dress held everything in place. I definitely recommend it for a special event any time of the year. Really, navy blue works for any season!

i'm typically btwn 2 and 4, usually 2 in erin. the 2 fit w plenty of room so if you're btwn sizes 100% size down. hit about an inch or so above my knee, wore a reg bra. color combo is great for brunch, showers, etc. highly recommend for any occasion that requires you to look conservative without looking boring.  great dress!
The fit, fabric and structure of this dress is inedible and the online picture does not do justice on the gorgeous color.

Fit like a glove, and was in excellent condition, looked brand new.  Wore 4 inch heels, and was a little long, but I made it work.  Received so many complements!  I would rent the other two colors in a heartbeat!
It was the perfect dress for what I needed, a day to night comfortable dress for the cold weather. Super comfortable! Beautiful color! Love the long bow in the back too.

It's hard to tell in the photos, but the dress is VERY sparkly thanks to the all-over gold sequins.  It doesn't look as "patterned" or as dark as in the photo.  This is a full on gold sequin dress, so if that's not your thing, don't rent!  It's very well constructed and extremely comfortable.  It's weight (heavy) and thickness (very thick), coupled with that great construction, make it a great dress if you're planning to eat a lot and are worried about after dinner belly pouch.  Also, you can't really wear a bra with the low back but it's not an issue due to thickness of the fabric.
Wore this to brunch, received lots of compliments. The skirt did blow up a few times in the wind....wouldn't recommend to wear it for an outdoor event

The dress is made of a heavier and more durable material. When it falls to your feet, it has a beautiful, flowy look - almost like ripples/waves at your feet. I wore it to a black-tie masquerade ball, and received many compliments. The sequins make the black dress stand out and fun without much accessories.

This dress was absolutely wonderful.  I rented this for a friends cocktail attire wedding and it was perfect for the occasion.   I thought that the stripes were navy blue and white but it turns out they are more silver with a glitter to them. It was a great length to dance in and the top was fitted perfectly so I could enjoy the food and not feel like a stuffed sausage at the end of the night.  I wore different shoes and accessories, so this picture doesn't do it justice!

I wore this to a Vegas wedding reception and it was perfect for a fun, flirty, party dress! Although, if I had owned the dress- I would have gotten it tailored. There seemed to be too much material from the waist up and it laid a little slack on my chest. It didn't look bad, but I would have been more comfortable if it was more fitted. But be careful if you are thinking of sizing down because the waist is true to size! The deep V neckline is as expected- very deep. I bought a special plunge bra on barenecessities.com that worked flawlessly with this dress. Overall, obsessed with this garment!
Perfect length, not too short!

Really wanted to love this. My sig. other even encouraged me to wear it. The fabric and accents were lovely. This would easily transition from work to night. I just could not get over the lack of structure in the waist section. I could definitely see this working gorgeously on a curvy woman. If you have an athletic or slim build, it may not be that flattering.
Do not rent it unless you have a small waist. My waist is a 34.

This was a great dress! I ordered a small and medium and went with the medium. It fit like a glove. The other reviews were accurate that the dress' fabric has no give however. Not stretchy at all. Snug in the hips and butt. I'm not terribly curvy so it worked great but if you are I'd size up!

I wore this to a work holiday party.  It was comfortable, but flattering and I got a ton of compliments.  I ordered a 10 with a 12 as a back-up.  The 10 fit fine, but the 12 was a little more forgiving and comfortable.  The dress is short (I'm 5'10"), but not TOO short.  I was able to wear a standard bra just fine.  The dress is a wonderful blend of modesty and daring with a high neckline and open spot at the back.  Great dress!

I love this dress!!! I wore it both to work and to a holiday party.  The dress is lined and structured without being overly form fitting.  It runs true to size (sometimes Marni runs big but that is not the case with this dress).  I got many compliments, as the fabric is very pretty.  Would rent again for sure!
Love the nude sequins.  Its a subtle sparkle that is not over the top.  It's very forgiving on the belly and hips.  The low cut neckline is an attention grabber but not too revealing.
Dress was damaged and it wouldn't have fit anyways. I would have needed to go up two sizes to fit comfortably. Will try again because the color is beautiful as well as the material.
The dress fit like a regular 4, but it was a little loose in the chest area.  The zipper was a little difficult around the beading, but that could have just been the individual dress.

Loved it. RTR helped me pick this out after the first dress I ordered became unavailable. The customer service was excellent, and this dress was spectacular. It hugs the curves and is so flattering. You're guaranteed to have fun in this one!

I order the 10R and 12R in this dress. Both were beautiful. I chose the 12R to give me a little more length. I am usually a 12/14 and I fit in the 10 with no problem.There's built in wiring that helps give your lady lumps a little lift. I put a cushion in to cut down on the poking. I was very satisfied with this dress and felt stunning. I got tons of compliments. I would definitely rent this dress again.

I seriously can't say enough about how much I loved this dress! I'm a tad on the busty side, and I didn't even need a bra. It held everything in where it needed to be held in. I'd rent this again in a heartbeat!

Great dress. I received it as a back up and ended up wearing it for the event. My only complaint was that it did ride up a little creating rippling in the midriff area - I think spanx might have fixed that. Overall, it was comfy, light and fun to wear.

Wore this for an August wedding, the colors were great, the back was dramatic and very pretty. Got tons of compliments. It is a little shorter than expected, but worked out great. Cannot wear a bra - others said a low clasp would work, but that would probably have shown in the stomach area. I just used adhesive cups, and that worked great.

Showstopper! Love this bright red dress! This runs true to size, but since there is no stretch we recommend sizing up if you are curvier. This is fitted at the natural waist. This hit me at the knee! This may be worn with a standard bra. Pair this with a statement clutch to compliment this dress!

I loved this dress! It is beautiful! It is thick and heavy material and hangs beautifully. The top has more detail than you can see in the pictures. It was very long on me. I wore it with 3 inch heels and it did drag the ground a little. The top was a little big but worked fine. I ordered a 6 in backup size and it would have been a better fit in length and in the top but the zipper was so worn that it was way too hard to zip and unzip even on the hanger.

I really loved this dress. I wore it for a fun weekend in Vegas. It is bodycon-ish material, so it hugs every inch. The plunging neckline was sexy as hell. I'm only 34C, so I wasn't busting out and my cleavage was tasteful. Also the cut-outs add another aspect of sexiness. I'm also tall, 5'11", and I didn't feel like the dress was too short. The length balanced out the deep neckline. I did use fashion tape, to ensure everything stayed in place. The dress was a hit with my husband!
I wore this dress for an Attorney mixer. It definitely stood out in a sea of black suits. I paired this dress with a classic black blazer & a belt.

I loved this dress! I will rent it again! I usually wear a size 4, and read that it ran small. I would recommend going 2 sizes up if you have any sort of booty, as I do. It was a bit snug through the hips (nothing uncomfortable though). I will rent an 8R next time. I am 5'4", and I did have to wear decently high heels with it. The wedding my husband and I attended was in Dallas, and it was warm that day. This dress held up great in the heat, and wasn't too heavy to where I felt warm at all. I plan to rent this a couple of times a year, as long as RTR has it in stock. It has been one of my favorite rentals!

This dress was perfect!! I wore it for my boyfriend's business school formal and got so many compliments on it!! I felt fabulous all night and it was so comfortable!! I am a tall girl and have a hard time finding dresses I love that aren't too short. I got the 4 and 6 based on past reviews and wore the 4. I could have probably worn the 2 but it was not available. Definitely size down!!! I am already thinking of another event to rent this dress for-- I really want to buy it but can't find where! Thank you RTR for coming to her rescue!
Love the color, was a little bit "used condition"
Fits true to size, very flattering around the torso, and I was comfortable the whole time!

The blue color is gorgeous, the tie on the side is super flattering and the pattern is great. Love this dress. I will say I had to re-tie it a couple of times because it came loose...but this is still one of my favorites.

The dress is absolutely beautiful. Even though it looks like a lot of fabric when you take it out of the bag, it doesn't wear like a heavy dress. It is a really light fabric and extremely comfortable and airy. The colors are vivid and I got compliments the entire night. I am pretty small in my chest so I used some fabric tape to help make sure the dress didn't move throughout the night. You could also wear a cami underneath if you are concerned about the low neck line. Overall this is one of my favorite dresses that I have rented.

I received this dress as a backup after my original backup was made unavailable. The customer service team with RTR is phenomenal, and it was super easy to get a new dress at the last minute! This fabric has a cute pattern, and the pockets were a huge incentive. However, the texture of the fabric was thicker than I expected, making the straps somewhat uncomfortable. And sitting on the cool black mesh bit at the bottom for a three hour dinner was less than ideal. Overall, it was a cute dress, but I don't think I'd rent it again.
Was not as long as I would have liked.

The dress itself was very simple yet elegant. I got lot of compliments the whole night about it. Some of my concern though is that even though the dress fits very nicely (hugged me perfectly in the right places) the length of it seemed way too long for me, so I'm not sure how well this would work for fellow short ladies out there. I had to wear 5 inch heels just to get the bottom of the dress touching at about 1 inch on the ground and I'm normally 5 ft. 3in. I mean that wasn't really a problem because by then it just looked like a pretty train because of the way it fell with the slit in the middle, but please keep that in mind when considering this dress. The fabric also held up SO NICELY. Although its stiff, it was amazing against all the moments it was touching the little bit of ground and absolutely nothing got stuck to it. 

Overall, the dress was very sleek and fitting. If you're looking for something simple but with a little touch of something something, this is definitely the one. I absolutely loved it! I felt fabulous the whole night!

Husband actually had this on his list of favorites for me, so I ordered it unsure of how I'd like it. It turned out to be great. It was romantic with a little sass on the lower half of the dress. The material was nice and inside lined.  Only its delicate and can get wrinkly in places of packed up tightly. Overall very pretty.

First time order with RTR. I ordered the 4 and 6 and decided to go with the 6 because it was a little looser in the chest Felt super comfortable dancing the night away in this. Only con was it did wrinkle easily just under the chest. I'd recommend it to a friend!!

Gorgeous dress.  I am an actress and usually can grab gowns at will - but for a last minute affair, I turned to RTR.  I was extraordinarily pleased.   I wasn't able to get the long, which I'd proffered (I'm tall at 5'9, plus four inch heels) - so I wore a 2 inch heel and the dress hit the floor at the right place.

I had the 4R and 2R sent - and while they both fit, the 2R was snug in the right place, especially where the bust was concerned.

Beautiful gown, perfect condition.  I may be obsessed.

I rented a 12, but for some reason the dress was never delivered to the RTR pick up location.... (slight freakout ensued). BUT, Nieman Marcus had a size 10 in the store, tried that on, fit perfectly! Luckily this worked out because I loved this dress!
I couldn't get the zipper past my mid-back and the length was too short (I'm 5'5'') to wear with heels.

The dress fit well, pretty true to size. I usually wear a size 12 but I am barrel chested, so I needed the 14 for my chest. Despite being barrel chested, my breasts are not really big, so I used a safety pin to stop the gaping at the base of the cleavage. I'm 5'6" and ordered the regular. However, it was a little short, so I couldn't wear my normal heels and had to opt for a kitten heel instead. You will definitely need someone to help you zip this one up if you order it. When the zipper hits the boning in the dress, it takes some strength to get it over the boning and all the way up. Overall, I felt absolutely glamorous! I got SO MANY compliments!!!

I loved this dress and it was absolutely perfect for the black-tie event I wore it to.  It's a beautiful, bright, summery shade of red and the chiffon is gorgeous.

It might run a tiny bit large - I am normally a smallish 8 but ordered the 6 and the 8 to be safe.  The 6 ended up fitting me a bit better.  It was trim (but not too snug) around my chest, plus the waist and the bodice provided great support so I didn't have to worry about a bra.  It's definitely long, I'm 5'7 and wore 4-inch heels with the 6R for it to match the length shown on the model.

It was comfortable and stayed in place (no pulling up or constant adjusting).  The only downside was that the 6 appeared to have been worn more than the 8 (though both were in great shape) and the ribbing was poking me all night.

Really excellent dress. I got it was a backup and it really delivered. worked well with my super-pale skin. I needed to jury-rig a pushup bra to fill it out a little, but besides that it was excellent.
Love the open lace detail at the top.  Great for a spring wedding.
Lace at the bottom of the dress is in such detail, and the shimmer the dress has is gorgeous!
The return package provided was barely large enough to contain the two dresses with their hangers.  I was afraid it would come open during transit.  The hanger
Fit like a glove..I usually teeter between a 0 and 2, but in this particular dress, I wore the 0. I added a strip of double sided tape by the shoulders just to ensure the dress stayed up all night.

Dress fit great and was surprisingly comfortable. A piece of the wire boning was starting to come out which could've been problematic but turned out alright. Loved that I could wear a regular bra. Dress was pretty long - had to wear 4 in heels.

This dress is super cute. It was perfect for a work party, where I wanted to stay appropriate, but special. The lines were a little too straight, so I used a belt to create more shape. I have a big bust, but this dress hid that pretty well. I'm usually between a 2 and a 4 (because of the bust) and the 2 was perfect.
Fit perfectly.
Fit tight around my rib cage
Love this simple dress. Order a size down it runs a little large.
This dress was so pretty.  I had many compliments throughout the night.  It was comfortable and was flattering to my figure.  The color was beautiful as well.  I wish I could rent again!

This dress was perfect for my bachelorette party - I generally do NOT like white dresses, so the blush underlay with white lace over top was perfect for my style.  I had worn this dress to a previous event, in a different color, so I knew it would fit, but was still blown away by the fit & quality.  It was great for a cooler night, even without a coat, due to the layers and sleeve length.  Would highly recommend!
It was not the right fit for me.  Pretty dress though.

The dress is beautiful in person. The color is very vivid, the fit is nice and generally comfortable, and the way the dress moves is really nice. It catches the air really beautifully.

For quibbles: the zipper was tough. The 8 was hard to zip, the 10 was basically broken. I wasn't sure if I would be able to wear the 10 because of the zipper, but it turned out that the 8 worked better anyway.

My only complaint about the fit is that the band under the bust was slightly tight on me, but not enough to be super bothersome. I'm 5'6 and I wore about 4 inch shoes, which worked, but I had to be careful not to step on it. Also, the back does puff a bit. I think it's intentional, it's meant to fit that way, but I didn't realize it before it arrived.

Overall, nice, striking dress for spring and summer weddings, I would recommend.
This pushes your boobs up a TON and makes them look amazing.
great for high waisted pants, otherwise too short

I chose this dress for my bridesmaids for my wedding. Over our bachelorette weekend, I rented it for them to try on for sizing purposes (I obviously HAD to try it on too). I have to say that this dress flattered each and every one of them. They are very form fitting but the color looked great with all of their skin tones and was flattering from the small chested to those even more busty. I would say to size up 1 size from usual dress size and invest in some good spanx! I highly recommended renting this dress!

I wore this to an outdoor party but didn't get a picture.  The dress is very tight in the rib cage area.  I normally wear a 10 and wore the 12 and it was still tight at the ribs.  Looks great, very slimming and beautiful color.
Shirt was tight in the chest and seemed short in terms of length. The picture makes it looks like longer fit.

I got the small and the medium as a backup. Both fit well but I didn't want to need a bra so I opted for the small. My one pet peeve was the zipper. It was a little hard to zip the dress by myself and even my sister struggled to get a decent grip on it to get me in the dress. Overall I loved the way it looked on me and the weight of the fabric was nice. Just be aware that the dress definitely highlights the girls. If you're busty or more modest it may not be the dress for you.

The dress fit like a glove and was extremely comfortable.! Wore it with a 4" heal and the length was perfect.I had compliments all night long. I have never felt so beautiful. I opted for the mystery bling and got these gorgeous Nicole Miller earrings to wear. Thank you RentTheRunway for making the evening so special.

However, I am 5'6" and the hem fell to my ankles which I was not anticipating based on the measurements--I had to scramble for shoes and ended up wearing gold flip-flops since the heels I had anticipated to wear would have been ridiculous looking with such a short pant leg. I would rent again, but maybe go up a size for length? It is possible that a previous renter had altered the leg themselves...

I ended up wearing the 10 since a 12 was not available, but it fit me perfectly fine in the chest (I am a 36DDD)
Rented the 2 and 4, wore the 4 for room for dancing. Fit like a glove! Renting again!
This dress fit perfectly usually dresses are too tight in the bust for me however this fit like it was made for me and I could still wear a normal bra with it just make sure it is black. :)

This was an amazing experience!  The dress fit perfect and I received many honest compliments. It was a chilly day and this dress kept me warm. I danced all night long and I felt great.  Rent this Dress!  You will not be disappointed!  I am 5'6 and 106lbs. I wore a size 0. It was perfect.

Perfect for a black tie wedding.  Was big on me; wished I had the 2P.  Wore with the suggested necklace from RTR and it was awesome.  It was a little long, so when I wasn't wearing my 4-5" heels, I was holding it up, but it was okay.  

Wanted to give 5 stars, but small disappointment and HUGE stresser at the time: I was in Jackson for the event, and wanted RTR to send me the 2P because the one I had was too big, but because of my location they were NOT able to send me another one.  Note for next time!

Loved the fit and flare style of this dress. I have an hourglass figure and preferred the fit in the torso area and length of the 10, but the fit in the top was too large. Was able to wear the size 8. The material is thick and the dress had a nice structure to it. Wore it to a work event and loved it!

Perfect for a Miami cocktail hour! Colorful with lots of flare - only downside was that it was a little too long for someone my height (5'0") and the top was a little boxy, but not bad just not ideal.
The shoulders were loose  and not quite off the shoulder.

Love the look, but not for me. I was encouraged by the pictures of it looking great on everyone, but ultimately the pants were too tight on my admittedly sturdy thighs to make them look right for me. On to another style!

I have pretty long legs and my proportions don't usually work for one-piece jumpsuits. This one fit like a dream, made me feel sexy and was very comfortable, too. The fabric was great, it was pleasurable to wear and I felt very polished with minimal effort. I would suggest checking this piece out if you are new to wearing jumpsuits.

This was the dress I chose for my free birthday rental as a Pro member. A great perk that couldn't be passed up despite not having any big plans. Simple dinner out with my husband was made special with the addition of this cute dress. I have never worn yellow, but quite enjoyed the color. It does have a deep cross over top and although I did not have any unfortunate wardrobe malfunction, I was wondering how it would work if you had a lot of movement, particularly leaning forward. The lining hid undergarments well, despite the lightweight material. A fun dress.

This dress was perfect for a winter wedding. As other reviews said, the sleeves are REALLY small. The 2 fit my body better but I wouldn't have been able to move my arm at all. And I have skinny arms?! Not sure who could make those sleeves work? The 4 still looked nice though and overall I was very happy with the look.

I was not expecting too much from this dress but was pleasantly surprised - I probably could have worn the XS but the S seemed better suited for a family wedding.  The lace was very soft and stretchy - very comfortable to wear but still flattering on the waist and hips.  The neckline is cut low enough to give some appeal but definitely not over the top.  The bra strap snaps were an added bonus, so I could wear a regular bra without worrying about the straps slipping down.  I received a number of compliments - would definitely recommend!

This dress photographs beautifully!  I love the way it felt on my skin.  The fabric was so smooth and comfortable.  It fit slightly big, but it is forgiving and hides belly fat while complimenting my curves.  It is a little long too, but it works for people like me that need a place to put their hands so at least one of my hands was normally busy gathering it to the front and side so I wouldn't trip on it, but it looked natural and elegant.  The zipper was a little temperamental and bunched a little under my arm where it zipped up.  This was enough for me to decide not to wear it, but when I sent the "trying-it-on" pics to my friends to help me decide, they all said I looked fierce in it and had to go with this dress.  So I trusted my friends, went with this one, loved the endless compliments I got all night, forgot about the bunching of the zipper since it's not like I had my hands up in the air all night anyway, and got great pics to always remember the event.
I wore this dress for my husband's work christmas party. Got a ton of compliments on it and it was super comfy. i would definitely order this dress again for the right event.

Perfect dress for the wedding we had in LA that wasn't quite black tie, but more formal than cocktail. I thought it looked better on that the model shown. I wore it with gold shoes and fun dangley earrings. Would rent again.

This dress fit me perfectly. I did not have to wear a tank underneath. I got so many compliments from strangers. It does run generously but the tie cinches it in fine. I can't get enough wear out of it.

Very much enjoyed wearing this dress. It was super comfortable. I am normally a size 8, but went with my backup size (10) because it was loose in the arms and waist and provided more ease of movement. Loved the pockets. Wore this to an awards dinner and I got two or three compliments. It was appropriate and modest, but still much more fun than the basic black/gray suit that everyone else was wearing. Color is vibrant. I am 5'5 and the regular hit just above the knee.

This dress fit me perfectly!  I was very comfortable and felt confident.  The only problem was that two of the hooks on the back were broken.  I made it work by hooking onto the lace.  But overall this was a winner!!

The fit was true to size. I got the regular length and I felt it was a bit short. I could only wear a very small heel with it and I'm more of a tall heel person. But definitely recommend the dress, it was perfect! I received tons of compliments.
A little short (but not too short for my 5'9 height), but "adorable.
I would recommend ordering your usual size and a size up. The seam was a little tight around the ribs, which I didn't really mind but if you want a looser fit definitely size up.

The color of this dress is absolutely gorgeous - I received so many compliments on it! The fit was very flattering as well. The only con was that I did have some serious zipper issues on both dresses. I ordered the 2P and 4P and the 2P fit me like a glove. However, when it was time to put the dress on, the zipper busted completely and I had to wear the 4 which was too large at top.  If it weren't for the zipper issues, I would have definitely given this rental five stars.

It is definitely low -cut, I probably could've been a small on top and a medium on the bottom, but they didn't have backup sizes when I ordered. The straps were not adjustable enough so I tacked them up an inch to hold into place for better fit. That said, the shorts are almost a-line and not as flowy looking as in the picture. I have a bigger bottom half than top and a small waist, so this garment was just unflattering, it was beautiful, just not flattering on my body type, it somehow managed to make me look very rectangular/boyish everywhere but the very top. Awkward silhouette. Needed more fitting through the waist, and the bottom either needed a more fitted shorts hem or more fabric to make it more skirt-like. All in all if you have a pear shape, probably not the best garment. I am usually a size 4, 6 on the bottom.  The length was perfect though had it been more figure flattering.

I wore this to work before going out to dinner for my bday, and everyone who saw me commented on how good the dress looked and how much they liked it. It's simple, but extremely flattering. And it's a great in-between seasons dress, because even though it's short sleeved the fabric is more substantial so you're not freezing cold.

I absolutely loved this jacket!! The fit and material are incredible. I'm not a fan of blazers, but this isn't a normal blazer. The leather and cut add a bit of sexiness to a blazer (if that's possible). I think this piece could be extremely versatile. You could dress it up or dress it down.
Rich  color, lined, hangs beautifully. Runs small normally wear a 6 or 8 and needed the 10.
Dress fit slightly snug - it's a fitted dress around the hips!  It was a beautiful dress, and my mom received tons of compliments.  She got both a 2 and 4, but the 4 gaped too much around the bust.

This dress was perfect. The fabric was so forgiving, any bending, sitting or folding didn't leave any marks.  I felt comfortable  the whole evening. The train did  create a few obstacles, as people stepped on it frequently. I'm 5'9" and wore 3" heels and the 4L was still extremely long. The size 6 (my normal size) looked too boxy, it didn't pull in at the waist.  The 4L fit like a glove.

Love this dress for shoulder season weather.  Flattering, got lots of compliments, super comfortable.  The medium was a little big on me which is why I said it ran large; not sure if it was just a style issue and a small would have been too small.
Have to have a smaller chest...if larger the dress will fall too far open.
I wore this to a music festival in NYC and got photographed by a women's lifestyle magazine! Loved wearing this. Great length on the shorts and the sleeves were very fun.
A bit boxy. I usually size down for Erin Fetherston and didn't in this dress because of other reviews but wished I had.
Fabric is nice and thick, and so it is a flattering piece for work.  The neckline is too bunched up and awkward to make it a knock-out, though.  Loved the color -- a nice sort of oxblood.
comfortable, unforgettable

I usually wear a size 10 in most everything, some of the dresses on here I have to wear a 12 because I am an athlete and have very broad shoulders and back and many dresses won't zip, this dress fine, I zipped it with ease and it looked very nice.  I would rent again.
Excellent quality material. I loved the fit and it made me feel super slim.

I ordered this as an outfit option for my bachelorette party.  When I put it on my friends all loved it and so did it. It's very form fitting and very sexy. The problem is it's not functional for a night out. There is no way I would have been able to unzip and zip this without the help of friends all night. The material is a bit thick as well. It's something you want to wear if it's cooler outside. I ended up not wearing this at all which is sad because it's gorgeous but it isn't worth the trouble it would be to use the bathroom.

Loved this dress and received tons of compliments all night. I felt like it ran small and I wish I would have had one size up. It has no give or stretch...good thing I was standing all night and didn't need to sit down.

Was a great fit. No bra necessary if you do decide to wear a bra you can't see it. Wasn't itchy nor uncomfortable! Colors are darker than the pic they show you. Wasn't too short and defiantly pair it with a bright necklace to give it some pop!
The dress fit well and was comfortable (and ran true to size for me). It shows a decent amount of cleavage so I ended up pinning it a bit for dinner :)

At 5'9" the long allowed me to wear 2.5" heels without tripping on the hem.  The details on the top are very pretty and the skirt (with gorgeous pleats and subtle split in the front) is simple but elegant.  I could easily see renting this dress again for a different event - it made me feel beautiful and festive.  We didn't get any good pictures due to the lighting of the event) - maybe next time!  The only caveat is that the skirt is big which would be cumbersome for lots of dancing.
Hugged my curves perfectly.  If curvy, recommend going a little bigger.

The lining was less than comfortable, especially on a hot summer night. It became very clingy and did not breathe at all. The straps were a little long too, I readjusted them frequently, especially while seated. On the positive site, the lace pattern was gorgeous. As well, the neckline was perfect, sexy yet not too revealing. Overall though, I wouldn't rent again just because of the liner and the straps.
Straps were a little long when I sat down but other than that it was perfect.  Very flattering on
Loved this dress! So many compliments! fit great to size.

The fabric and the idea of this dress are very cute.  It runs very small so size up and size or even two.  It is also very short for the tall girls out there.  I couldn't wear it.  It looked like a tight tunic.
This dress looked nice. It was a good choice for the office.

This dress was absolutely gorgeous and a perfectly unique LBD. I wore for a party cruise with friends, and received endless compliments. The material is thicker, so I didn't feel the need to wear a bra. It hugged my curves perfectly, and though it is midi length, the front slit adds an extra touch of sexiness. I will definitely be renting again!

I received a bunch of compliments on this dress, but I wasn't totally sold on it. The blue and white stripes are super cute, but it was slightly shorter than I was expecting and I thought the drop waist combined with the tie around the actual waist looked awkward in the back. The dress was generously sized, but if you have a larger bust you probably won't be able to size down as anything smaller up top would have pulled the buttons too tight.

I got this dress for prom, but ended up wearing my back up. It looked great on... once I got it on. The zipper was a pain and even without wearing it the zipper was hard to get up. I was expecting there to be some room to move, but there was no stretch or anything and was a bit tight on me. So because I was changing out of it in the middle of the night, I decided to go with my other dress because the zipper was so much easier and fit better. But it is a beautiful dress that I'd recommend sizing up if you rent it.
It was a bit tight on the bust (but I'm a 36DD).

I'm so happy I rented this dress. It fit (almost) perfectly)! The length the a tough above the knee. The top wasn't tight, in fact it was a bit roomy in the chest. The straps were a little loose. 

The best parts were the bra strap clasps on the inside of the straps meant I could wear a regular bra without the straps showing. Also - pockets!
Beautiful, comfortable dress. Rented 2x!
Unless you are standing within 10 feet of this dress, it really only look like a standard little black dress.  The cut out mesh is barely noticible.  I'm 5'7" and 135, the 8 fit perfectly.

This is one of my favorite dresses from RTR, so far. The draping is forgivingly perfect and the sleeves add the perfect touch of interest to an otherwise simple silhouette. I was able to wear this dress everywhere: to work, out for drinks after and then to family brunch.  Versatile and understated, this is probably a dress I'll keep coming back to
I wore this dress on Mother's Day! My husband and son adored it!
Tight in the right places.

I wore this dress to a Sweet 16 and it fit very well. Although the straps kept falling and it chaffed my upper arms a bit, I thought it was a very nice dress and I got a lot of compliments on it.

Note: This is my mom's account. my measurements are:
Height: 5'3"
Weight: 110
Usual dress size: 0 or 2
Body type: Petite
Bust Size: 34A

The dress was great!!! I wore it at my engagement party this past December and got compliments from EVERYONE!  It was a beautiful dress and the design/sparkles hid any flaws that existed so that the dress looked new.  I ordered both and 8 and 10 but ended up going with the 8.  By using some fashion tape that came with my order I was able to wear a regular bra with the dress as well which was a big plus for me since I have a large bust.  The only issues I had with the dress were that it was a little hard to zip up given the material.  I had to have my fiance help me zip it.  The only other problem I had was that the lining stuck out (as visible in the picture) but was easily overlooked.

The color on this dress is absolutely beautiful. In addition, the fabric is a lot thicker than anticipated, which made it look lovely... on the hanger. The straps are too long, which made the top sit funny. In addition, while it fit true to size, it didn't look nice on. I ordered this through unlimited, so had the luxury of putting in the bag and picking something else.
Wore this to work and loved it! Comfortable fit, appropriate length, not revealing on the top,  plenty of room by the under arm, and still fun with the side braid and material.

Took advantage of my PRO free birthday dress since it was on the same night as a friend's wedding rehearsal dinner. I've rented the orange version of the dress, so I was comfortable knowing the sizing was a relaxed fit and true to size. Love that you can wear a normal bra with it (take advantage of the snaps to keep your straps in place) and the color is wonderful for spring! Pair with some strappy, nude heels and you're good to go. Such an easy, fun pick that I would recommend for most body types. My only critique is that it came with a small black mark on the bottom that didn't really come out when I tried to scrub it with water on my own. It was really a speck, so it wasn't a deal breaker, but a slight blemish on an otherwise perfect dress.

I'd originally ordered another dress, but luckily RTR sent me this one as a replacement! It fit like a glove - the seams were incredibly flattering, and the length was just right with low heels (I'm 5'5''). Best of all, it was INCREDIBLY stretchy. I was able to dance all night with no shifting, discomfort, and tons of compliments. If this dress came in other colors, I'd wear it over and over again to every occasion.

I'm a solid size 4 - 5'5" with an athletic-ish build. I was able to dance and move all night. I did wear spanx as the material is a little clingy and you could see my belly button, but other than that it was perfect. The mesh cut outs were tasteful but still edged the dress up. Would love to rent again. The dress did not ride up and the sleeves were the perfect length for my November wedding. To all who rent, enjoy! :) xx

Wore this as a bridesmaid for a friends wedding and it was perfect!  Our group ranged from 00p - 12 and it fit all of us with no problems.  We took formal photos after the ceremony when the sun was perfectly at "golden hour" and the sparkle from the dress was stunning.  We all got compliments all night long.

Overall the fit was great - material is rather thick so made it perfect for a cold night. I paired it with black tights so the length was not really an issue, but I am rather short (5'3) and will say that it was on the shorter side. Very flattering and easy to wear.

I was told to wear a navy blue dress that hit above the knee and was not satin (by the bride) and this dress checked the boxes.  I'm typically a 6 but wore a 4-- even then, it fit well up top but was a bit loose around the hips (with a slight gap between my lower back and the dress). I didn't have to wear a bra which was great and it was really comfortable (I was in it for 13 hours, so this was key). For the price, this dress is hard to beat. 

As others mentioned, it's a bit tricky to get into the top (the straps cause the hole where your head goes to tighten), so be careful if you have a fancy hairdo.

This dress was so much fun to wear and definitely differed from all the other dresses at the wedding we attended. Wearing a belt helped define my shape since I have a larger bust, but it wasn't necessary. I also loved how the bottom twirled once we started dancing. I was sad to send this back! My one complaint is that the zipper was difficult to use, both unzipping and zipping up. My husband had to help me since I was afraid of breaking it.
This was a great dress for my bachelorette party The only problem I had with this dress was that it got a little scratchy under the arms as it is made all of sequins.

Fits like a glove, no need to wear a bra.   No zipper, so don't put lotion on before squeezing in to the dress!   Classy, easily dressed up or down! I wore this to my boyfriends Christmas party at Heinz Field, wore the blazer because it was freezing cold, but it really completed the look! RENT THIS DRESS, You will love it!

I wore this for my birthday, and my best friend kept telling me I looked like a princess. This dress is so great. It's of a satin-y material that's heavy enough where you don't have to worry about bra bumps or underwear lines showing. The pattern is even prettier and more intricate in real life. It easily goes from day to night with a cardigan or blazer. The only thing was I had to wear a size up from my usual, so definitely get a larger back-up size. If it didn't run small this dress would easily be 5 stars!
Wonderful fit. True to size.  Not itchy or scratchy.  Wore it with a black tuxedo blazer and open toed black heels.
I'm not usually a L but that size fit like a glove.  I didn't have the neckline problems everyone else seemed to have.

Runs a bit large - size down if in between sizes
Great color but not garrish
Wore it with mid-heal pointed toe pumps and a statement necklace like the model

Ordered for the brunch the morning after my wedding. Pretty shirt, but my large bust just made it look baggy/ like a tent. It made me look much heavier than I am for this reason and I was not able to wear it.
It runs very small, with little give in the fabric. Size up!

This was my backup dress, and when my first choice didn't fit, I was so happy to have it! The sequin pattern makes it look much more expensive than it is. The lower neckline in back adds a sexy touch, yet you can still wear a regular bra with it--great if you're a busty gal! The flashy pattern looks great on the dancefloor. My only criticisms are (1) the sequins did scratch up my arms by the end of the night, and (2) the skirt is SHORT! I am 5'2" and I had to roll up my spanx and make sure the top of my pantyhose was hiked up; I also had to be very careful when sitting and getting up. I'm curvy, so maybe if you've a straighter figure it will hang a bit longer. But I doubt someone taller than 5'4" could sit in this comfortably! But all in all, I felt I had a very comfortable, unique dress at a bargain price!
Like other reviews, the only downside to this dress was that the zipper was not easy to zip. Overall it fit well and was comfortable.

If you have the slightest bit of back fat and you don’t want it to show, go up a size. The dress is not forgiving back there. It’s also snug in the arms, but it was a great fit in the bust and butt. I am a slim, but curvy woman and the dress highlighted that very well. The color is perfect and the material is definitely high quality. It’s a good piece that I would rent again.

I ordered this for a friend's wedding and thought it was cute but more underwhelming in person than it was in pictures. The pictures make the top look conservative yet sexy and while the top was extremely sheer it was just that and you couldn't wear a bra although it didn't feel securely fitted. I went with the 8 and felt like the top could've been more fitted and sultry looking but it ended up just looking a bit baggy and matronly on my petite frame, even with my large matronly breast-milk filled bosoms (haha) which I'd assumed would make the top more fitted. Anyway it didn't really wow me or my husband and I didn't get any compliments on it--which is rare for a rtr outfit--might look better on taller women however.

I love this dress, and am very tempted to buy it from the Shoshanna website.  It is so pretty and easy to wear, super comfortable, flattering, and the hemline is fun and unique.  It runs a little large, especially the top (I'm 34C), but I was never concerned about it falling down either.  It is so well made, and the navy color is stunning - a great alternative to black.  I would definitely rent again for another event.  One of my all time favorites!
Need help pulling zipper up tight around bust

I think I wore the long, but I am 5'4 so the regular would have been perfect. I stepped on it from time to time, but nothing crazy. I wore casual wedges to dress it down, as opposed to heels. With heels the long may have been perfect. I am not usually a 0, I'm more of a 2, and it was still very flattering.
Perfect dress. Do yourself a favor and rent it!

I wore 5" heels because I'm short but overall the fit was exquisite. Hugs in all the right places and it's stretchy and really shows off your figure. The lace details is gorgeous and really stands out with the nude underlay. I was able to dance in it all night with no issues.
I am 5'9" and a 38C or 36D and this dress showed side boob on me so I didn't wear it and sent it back same day.
Good if you want to show off you arms and shoulders

I am 6'1 and struggle to find any dresses that are long enough. After reading the reviews, I decided to give this dress a try and I am so happy I did! I absolutely loved the dress and got so many compliments. I ended up wearing the dress bra-less, as it was struggle to find a bra that worked with the low cut top.

The dress(es) arrived just as stated. I was impressed by the shipping bag that they arrived in. The dresses were on hangers and in bags. The size 2 fit perfectly. This was worn by my daughter for her Homecoming (Freshman in High School). It was just the right pick! She is 5'0" and it hit her right at the knee.

Not my favorite. Cute idea for a dress (beautiful fabric, interesting cut), but just not that flattering of a fit. First of all, ran small. I probably could have worn my usual size, but ended up wearing the 6 for comfort since the zip was quite tight on the 4. The skirt flares out awkwardly from the stomach, and I felt like it added unnecessary bulk there. The sleeves were a little high maintenance and I had to keep pulling them up all night. Difficult to dress down, which was my intent.

The dress runs small and is difficult to zip. Highly suggest undergarments for a more slimming look. Dress can become uncomfortable as the day goes on, but photographs great. Super cute dress, pockets a plus!

This dress is stretchy and very form fitting. Very comfortable and the length was great for how tall I am. Only minor issue was me having to pull the inside lining down after getting up from sitting down. I'm sure I would have been more comfortable in the medium with that.

The dress was comfortable, simple & really added a pop of color to the room.  Once I had it on, I really felt like it needed a necklace, but that's not a bad thing!  Just something to consider.  I would say this dress is very true to size.  I ordered 3 different size 8 dresses this weekend, and this one fell right in the middle (not too tight, not too loose).

i thought i ordered the small but i  got the xsmall it fit me a little short but it was just right , the arms were a little itchy but nothing to major, definitely a dress to wear if you want to stand out
Gorgeous color! Dress was very comfortable, and easy to dance in. I got lots of compliments throughout the night.
So comfortable but I probably did not need the long and I am 5"7. No zippers it just hugs every where.   I got a zillion compliments.  It a head turner.

This dress is available in gold and rose colored gold. I selected the gold dress. Although there was another woman it the same event with the rose colored dress, I was the belle of the ball! My date and I were best dressed. I didn't think the size 6 would fit but it was perfect. I'm 5'7, the long length was perfect for my high heels.

the fit was like a glove. i ordered a 2 and 4, i was hoping to squeeze into the 2, i actually may have but i stuck with the 4 because it was fairly comfortable. i'm short, about 5'1" so i was worried about the length but with heels on it was the perfect length. the dress hugged all the right parts. i was heartbroken to send the dress back!

this dress is absolutely gorgeous!! I got so many compliments on it. I wore it to a black tie wedding in Santa Monica, CA and felt very comfortable in it. When it arrived I tried on the 4 and it felt tight, so I ended up taking the 6 with me. I've worn ML dresses before from RTR and have always been a 6 since they run pretty small, but when I wore it the day of, the 6 seemed very big on top. Besides, my own fault for taking the wrong dress, I'd recommend the dress, as it is so gorgeous!

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. It was my first rent the runway experience and I was nervous about fit. I actually found this dress in stores and tried it on in black. I tried on a 4 in the store and it fit ok. When ordering I was nervous to order my second size choice as a 6 or a 2. I went with the 2 thankfully and it fit perfectly even better than the dress in the store. The pepblum covers the tummy area nicely so if the dress is more fitted in a smaller size it accents the curves better. I absolutely loved everything about this dress and would rent it again in a heart beat! However, I am 5'7 and wore about 4 inch heels and the long was still a little lengthy when dancing and walking.
Super cute top.  It is a loose fit which I love, but if you have a small bust I recommend going down a size.  Super cute with white denim shorts or jeans!

While I love the color and style of this dress, I could not wear it because it just did not fit right and was not flattering. I should have sized down 2 sizes. Unfortunately this was my first RTR order I did not wear for the planned event, but it will not stop me from renting again.
This dress was a great option for day to night. Wore it to work and then out for drinks!

The color of the dress was a beautiful deep green that was perfect for the occasion.  The material was thick and did not wrinkle when packed in a suitcase.  The cutouts were edgy but classy.  I was able to wear a normal bra with it which made everything a little easier.  Some simple jewelry would have looked nice but the dress did not need any accessories to stand out.
Perfect for a black tie wedding or formal occasion. Great for dancing and very  true to size. Highly recommend!
Very well made. Stitching is beautiful!

Because I'm more of a pear shape, it wasn't flattering on me. This is a more natural waist style, although the dress was very pretty just wasn't as flattering as my back up style that I ended up wearing.

Overall, I loved the color and style of this shirt, BUT I didn't realize when I ordered it through Unlimited that it has a huge keyhole/slit down the front. It really took away from the rest of the shirt, and showed my strapless bra no matter how I adjusted it, because it came down so low, and kind of off center. Wish it didn't have this keyhole, because otherwise it would be a beautiful shirt!

This is an absolutely stunning dress. Very comfortable and runs true to size. I was able to wear it with a strapless bra and the bra did not show on the back. The dress is stretchy and easy to walk around in. I loved both the color and the cut and could not have been happier with my choice!
This top was an easy, flattering option for work. I styled with black ankle length pants. The black part is a lightweight knit which made it comfortable and easy fitting. Will rent again!

I wore this dress to a summer baby shower. It has two parts, a peach slip and the lace dress. The colors are vibrant and bold. The fit was very comfortable. The dress was very easy to wear. Both the slip and the dress have stretch so it accommodated all my curves. Everything about this dress was perfect! I got so many compliments.

I wore a 8R but could have probably gone one size smaller (my pre-pregnancy size). The neckline is perfect. NEEDS a statement necklace.
The regular was a tiny bit long. I recommend heels and the zipper was hard to zip.

I really loved this dress -- it's a show stopper. Perfect for a dressy evening wedding with silver shoes. My only complaint is that the zipper was REALLY difficult. It gets funny right where the beaded belt falls and is very hard to get past when zipping up. Both my husband and I had a lot of trouble with it. Once you get it on, it's totally worth it -- but you've been warned!

This dress was unbelievably comfortable! I rented it for a work event where I was in the car for three hours, then sitting at a lunch event. I couldn't have picked a better dress for a lot of travel and sitting! Great color, fabric and selection for any occasion!

This dress is sexy! A little too sexy for the wedding I was at. It has some stretch, and the material is pretty thick which was nice. I chose to wear the 12 so I had some extra room and length.  It was still a little short (I'm 5'9"), and the cutouts would have shown quite a bit of my bra, so I wore sticky cups - even then I had some side boob. Luckily it was really cold, so I wore my jacket most of the night.

Really liked this skirt. I was worried it would be small in the size 4 because it looks tight and tiny. It was actually very forgiving with some stretch but still was not too clingy- no weird panty lines, or belly button indents. :) Really liked it- went with many things in my closet

Wore this for the Salesforce holiday party as my boyfriend's +1, and then out to the bars afterward. They go ALL out for this event (5000 people, tons of food from around the world, and a live band). I was nervous to be over or under dressed, and I wanted to be elegant, flirty, yet professional. This dressed nailed all three and calmed my nerves the minute we got to our pre-party. Couldn't be a better dress for a holiday party. Received many compliments! The fuller length adds class, while the low neckline gave me a fun amount of cleavage without me popping out. (I'm a smaller cup size - 34B, and with no bra, I felt secure and supported in the size SR dress!)

Other positives: easy to dance in, doesn't drag on the floor like many full length dresses, flattering to my curves, sat on the hips nicely without bunching up fabric or squeezing my thighs. 
(I just wish my nude pumps didn't have a broken heel plate because black shoes were cute, but nude would have better haha.)
Con: no pockets..? haha just kidding - not really a con. I just love dress pockets.

I can see why this dress is popular.  It's incredibly well made.  Thick fabric that still hangs so nicely and is great for cooler weather.  This isn't a summer dress. 
It's not black but a darke blue.  It is fitted in the chest.  If you don't like showing your arms or legs - it hit me just above mid thigh but was still work appropriate -  then this isn't the dress.  It's arm revealing and leg revealing.  If that's your thing, you will love the way this dress fits.  The only down side is the crew collar can feel a bit snug around the neck.  I wore it to work several times and then the weather turned warmed.

The fit was great. I would have liked the dress to be a little shorter because I'm so short, but it still looked cute and fit my waist perfectly. The dress hit just above my knee. The fabric is beautiful up close and it's plush.

Rented this for a rehearsal dinner. The sweetheart neckline worked perfectly with a strapless (I did have to pin it to the dress to make sure my bra didn't show). I paired a satin black belt with it. The color is a pretty blue-green jewel tone which I loved. This worked perfectly with my curves, except that my bra showed, but a little fashion tape fixed it!
Cuts in a little too far on the top, so it you are sensitive about arm chub you might need a sweater
Dress length was perfect with heels.  Snug but comfortable around the ribs so I didn't feel the need to keep pulling it up all night.
Fits very snug but cute and still modest.

I wore this dress to a formal work party.  I am usually a 2 but went with the 4 because the top was unusually tight. I am a size 34b and the 4 was even a little too tight. The downside is that with the larger size the skirt was bigger! The gold in the material makes for a more formal feel along with the high/low hemline.  The dress has pockets, too which is always a plus.  I would recommend this dress but pay close attention to the reviews regarding sizing!! Sadly, I did not get a full picture of me in the dress to share!

Shorts are flowy, waist band a bit tight for a medium (normally wear a small) and was able to wear without a bra due to the high neckline. Overall a great piece for a night out or cocktail party. Felt very comfortable all night!

the cutout was the perfect subtle detail. Gorgeous fit and fabric. hit a bit lower than expected (a few inches below the knee), but it was super flattering.  Could have worn an 8, but went with a safe 10.

This was my backup dress and I'm so glad I ordered it.  I received many compliments from people I haven't seen in years. 

Pros: amazing color, stretchy material, great length, perfect for hugging curves, would look great with a variety of shoes

Cons: the layover in the back laid weird because of my large butt. As a result, I was constantly checking to make sure it was pulled down and laying as flat as possible.

I wore this to my second Marine Ball. The fit was perfect, i got 2 sizes, the 2R and the 4R. The 2R was very fitting, but decided to wear the 4R just because it gave me room to breath. But the overall fit was perfect. Very comfortable, and i will definitely be getting more dresses from this site!
Fit really well and got so many compliments.  Went with the 14 because the bust was kind of small.
This dress fits incredibly but it runs small, so definitely size up. High-quality fabric. I got so many compliments on this one and would rent again!
Lovely dress, fits great, flattering cut, very feminine. Ideal for hot days.
A true shift, I wore it belted in order to create a more feminine silhouette, however I quite liked it as a shift as well. The pattern and colors are beyond lovely, so spring-y, came new with tags.

I liked it - it fit nicely and it's a good transitional item for the mid-September heat wave we are facing. Wouldn't rent it again as it didn't come off as anything "special." I have other off-the-shoulder tops in my closet I'd reach for before this one.
fit really well and color was gorgeous

Was a little hard to dance in because of the limitation/tightness of the sleeve - but the dress overall was an excellent fabric quality & thickness (i.e. went bra-less) and style made a great impact on entrance. Paired with a ridiculously savage crystal choker and my Val's.

The dress was oh-so flattering and such a beautiful color. I wore it to my high school prom and got so many compliments! I usually wear a four or a six, but I ordered a six and eight because of all of the comments saying the dress runs small. That was not the case for me at all; in fact, I almost wish I had got the four because the six could have been a little tighter, but the six still fit beautifully. My only complaint is that I thought being 5'5" getting a regular length would be fine, but even in my four inch heals, it was a little too long.

I really liked this romper. I'm a true pear shape and the fit was perfect for me. I was a little worried the netting at the top would be itchy but it was actually really soft and it didn't bother me all night. Would definitely recommend for a date night!

I had actually ordered another dress and RTR informed me one of the sizes I had ordered would not longer be available for the dates I needed and so I had ordered this dress as a backup.  Once I tried on my original dress and saw it was a bit too long for me I tried on this dress and it seemed perfect!  Throughout the night my only issue was when I had to ascend stairs because the slip kept getting underneath my feet.  But the dress fit wonderfully and I got many compliments.

Fit my pregnant body after I gained 20 pounds. Wasn't expecting a medium would fit. I Had previously rented the copper version of this dress before, which I liked better. Ended up getting this as a backup for the Trina Turk origami orange dress, but loved that one so much more!  This one was nice and fit well, but the modern style of the other dress was more appealing and more flattering on my pregnant body.
I love this dress.  I would keep it if I could.  It is both sexy and classy.  Perfect for the summer wedding I went to.

My mother is the one that rented this dress. She is 5'2 and and wears a 42C bra. She loved the dress and said it was comfortable. It did run a little small because her size is a 16 and she had to wear the 18.
It ran a little smaller than I expected and was lower cut. Very comfortable.
Cool dress but the sleeves are quite long and when you sit down, it is a little too short when you sit down. I wore tights and was fine.

I wore this dress (XS) for my friend's bachelorette party. We went out dancing for hours and this was the perfect dress for that kind of scene. I loved the lace sleeves and I wore a nude bra underneath. My only issue with the dress is that you constantly have to pull it down because it rides up. Not sure if something could be worn underneath to prevent that. Other than that, the dress is a cute, fun, sexy number.
