I wouldn't have rented this dress for any other occasion since it is very short. It was a great last minute order!
Fits true to size, would suggest some sort of control bottom, is very low cut, and definitely shows off curves.

I am 5'7 1/2 and did not wear heels and the dress fell perfectly to the ground with the 8R. If I had worn heels, I would've needed to go with the 8L. The fit around my waist was perfect and this dress was extremely flattering and comfortable. I would definitely encourage wearing a necklace with this dress, as it looked too plain without one. The fabric was beautiful and felt light but expensive. I gave this dress four stars instead of five because there was a stain at the bottom of it. Overall, I was very happy with the dress; it was modest but very beautiful. The cut around the shoulders flattered my arms and my waist looked tiny. I could move in it and felt comfortable sitting and standing and did not have to wear a bra. It was the perfect dress for this occasion.

The lace sleeve on the dress is incredible! I caught myself staring at it a lot. I had to add a skirt to the dress because I am really tall and the dress was barely covering my butt! This problem is probably on the rare side however. I can see this dress definitely working for a shorter girl. Anyhow, the dress was beautifully made and I received a lot of compliments for my outfit. I got lucky finding a skirt that matched perfectly, but the dress looks very good with black tights if a skirt isn't an option. Since the dress is pretty basic besides the lace sleeve, accessories are a must! Finding a good necklace or earrings will make this dress work so well. Basically, besides the length problem, this rental was a success and I would love to rent from RTR again. It was really easy!

The reviews were all correct. To make this fit in XS, I needed to be about 6 inches taller.  Im little, and the waist fit perfectly, the length was above the knee, but the top needed a long torso with smallish (B cup) top to keep the fabric laying flat.  On me it was open to almost my waist and wanted to slip off my shoulders.  Double stick tape just made it look bunchy.
Beautiful fabric and color if you have the shape for it,

I would buy it and would def wear it again!
I'm more of a pear shape so my lower half usually determines the cut of any thing I wear and the top on this dress was a little big and revealing but nothing a safety pin couldn't handle! I got a ton of compliments, I recommend it if you want to stand out a bit more in the crowd.. very sparkly under the lights at the reception but I loved it all!

I love this dress and received so many compliments all evening. The dress is very comfortable and the back detail is very fun. Definitely order the Long size if you're tall. I'm 5'9" and with 3" heals the dress was just long enough.

Fantastic romper for everyday.  Cool and comfortable - great fit.  Easy to accessorize - I wore a bandeau top for more coverage since the V neck was rather deep - but overall great.  I wore it many times!

I tried this dress in both the 6L and 8L. Both fit, but as would be expected, the 6 was more fitted and the 8 more flowy. For this particular occasion, a less fitted appearance was the way to go. This dress made made me look curvaceous and glamorous. The weight of it made it hang nicely, although the underskirt was too long and I had to tack it up by several inches. The dress was also starting to show its wear with some small pulls and spaces opening up in the lace; fortunately, the venue wasn't too brightly lit and I doubt anyone really noticed. It was long enough for me to wear 3" heels. I wore a strapless bra and had no problems with the sleeves slipping. I got many compliments and all in all, would highly recommend this dress.
I love, love, loved this romper! I was so sad to have to this one back. The lace was gorgeous and the romper was very comfortable. I danced the night way in it! I highlight recommend this beaut!
Was comfortable. The complicated silhouette added flare to the everyday outfit!
Super cute - perfect for a summer party!

I love this dress so much!!  It's fancy with out feeling like you are trying too hard.  The color and fabric are my favorite part but I also loved the length.  The only issue I had with it is the arm holes are a bit low but I was able to use fashion tape to fix that.  I am considering buying this dress because it is just too cute!  Just add cute heels and you are ready to go!

I ordered this dress as a back-up for another dress in case it didn't fit. I didn't end up wearing it, but since it was so pretty, I had to review it. The dress is a gorgeous off white lace with silver threading and accents. I loved how it was backless as well-it was sexy without being too over-the-top. There were a few downfalls though, and those ultimately led to me choosing the other dress. I've got longer legs, so the dress was pretty short on me. The material also rode up a little bit, so I would have been pulling it down all night. If you're bigger chested, you'll need to wear a sticky bra as there's no support in the dress. Overall, I felt gorgeous in the dress and if it were for a less formal party (this was a military cocktail party), I probably would have chosen it. Now I know how it fits though and will definitely be ordering this dress in the future!
LOVE this dress.  I wore it for my engagement shoot. The pictures were great. I usually wear a 2 but I wore the 4 in this dress since I wanted the dress not as tight.

I was so pleasantly surprised that this dress worked! I rented it in a 4 and got a 6 as a backup because of other reviewers' comments about it running small. For me, it definitely ran big in the chest and shoulder area which rarely happens (I'm a 34D). I wish I had rented a 2 for a backup although the 4 definitely worked (and encouraged me to sit up straight all night!). The big negative of the dress is that the lining is too long and shows when you sit down. All in all, it's classy and sexy - a perfect summer party combo.

This fit really nicely and was very flatering. However, the look is a bit more unique than it seems in the picture (maybe in a bad way). It is a thick sort of suiting material, which is very forgiving but makes it a more costumey piece than you might be thinking. I was imagining thinner fabric.

The fabric is AMAZING. Bright, vivid colors on a thick, soft fabric that hold its shape. I got the 4L, because I wanted it to be floor length when I was wearing 3 inch heels (I wore it to a formal gala) and it was perfect. It fit perfectly in the waist, but was a little loose in the bust area (I have a small chest, so most things are), but with the design of the fabric and the great fit everywhere else, you didn't even notice. I received SO many compliments and felt like a million bucks!
The color, the fit, the length, everything was perfect.

I ordered this dress in a 14 and a 16W. Since I've recently lost quite a bit of weight, the RTR stylist granted me the ability to order the same dress from the regular and plus size collections. The 14 fit amazing but the arms were too snug and I wanted to be as comfortable as possible. The 16W fit ok as well but the middle was a little baggy. Luckily, the ruching of the dress made that nearly undetectable. Also, the lining peeked out a few times and I had to put my boyfriend on watch for the hanger straps. There are four and they kept coming up as well. Overall, I was comfortable the entire night and got many, many compliments. This dress is the right amount of conservative, glam, and sexy.

If you are looking for a dress that makes a statement than this is it! I wore this dress to a company event and received so many compliments. It does hold you in and camouflage. This dress is meant for any curvaceous female.  The color is rich and so is the quality. I will defiantly be renting this again!

I ordered the 2 and the 4, both fit well enough, but the sleeves are definitely a little slim, so I feared a stretch in the wrong direction could be a problem in the 2 and decided to wear the 4.  The lace in the neckline was very pretty and the fitted top with the looser skirt made for a comfortable dress all night long.
The dress is super cute! I wore it wine tasting over fourth of july weekend. Wish it was a little bigger in the hip region, also a little on the short side. I would not wear it to work.

The color of the dress is beautiful. I wore it to a seaside wedding. It stood out in a crowd of black. The lace is lovely. However this is not a dress for busty women. It really is for smaller c cups and smaller. It felt pretty normal throughout the hips and waist.
I liked the look and generally wear a M/L - I ordered L and it fell too low on my shoulders.

I. Loved. This. Dress.!!!! It definitely runs small and tight but due to the material it supposed to be that way. If you size up you can wear spanx underneath but since I didn't there was no way spanx would have fit but I felt perfectly fine without it! It definitely holds you in and i felt like it accentuated my curves in the best way although it was a little restricting! I was able to wear a regular strapless bra I just made sure to pull it down in the back and I had no problem with it showing. The length made it very classy as well. Would definitely rent an Herve again

I ordered this rental about a week before my event, and I thanked my lucky stars that a 0L was in stock - but not a 2L, so for my alternate size I got a 4L knowing for sure there was no way it'd fit me. The dress came 2 days early, and it fit perfectly. The dress looked exactly like it did on the model, and I was ecstatic with the fit and length (I wore 4 inch heels, and the dress hit the floor perfectly. It looked like it had been tailor made just for me.). The only issue I had was that the bust was the tiniest bit loose so I did have to pull up the dress throughout the night. Like some of the other reviewers said, the clasp at the top of the zipper jabbed me throughout the night as well, causing some discomfort. But alas, beauty is pain, right? The clasp was also bent out of shape when I recieved the dress, so that probably played a factor in the poking as well.

This dress made me feel like a moden Oscar statuette, and I got dozens of compliments all night long.

This dress looked amazing on the website and didn’t disappoint in person.  It made me feel sexy and elegant, hugging my curves in just the right way.  The back of the dress is spectacular and I could even wear a regular bra with it, which is always a bonus.  Things to bear in mind: keep a good posture (shoulders back) to ensure the gold part at the top doesn’t look buckled in the front. You'll want to keep it laying flat against your chest for good photos!  Others had mentioned that the arm holes were a little tight and I agree (I had a little redness by the end of the night where they had rubbed against my skin but it was totally worth putting up with for the glamour of the dress).  The zipper was very stiff and I doubt I could have zipped it all the way up without assistance.  I am 5’5” and could not have worn heels with the 4 Regular so I recommend renting the long if you are of a similar height and you like to wear heels.  Despite these minor issues, I can honestly say this is my most successful rental to date.  I’ve rented many dresses from Rent the Runway over the years but this one resulted in so many compliments I lost count.  Thanks for making my night unforgettable!

I ordered the 6 and the 8 and ended up wearing the 8.  I probably should have had a 10 but my date was able to help zip it up.  I have a large chest so someone with a smaller chest would probably been fine with their normal size.  Material was heavy but hid flaws.  I didn't have room for spanx and it didn't seem to matter.  I wore 4 inch heals and the material still swept the floor and I'm 5'6".  I was comfortable most of the evening but couldn't eat much food.  Easy to dance in the dress as well.

Oh my gosh. This dress was a blast to wear, and it was super comfortable. It is short, so if you're planning on doing a lot of dancing, you won't be able to lift your arms above your head (I'm 5'4 for reference). I wore an 8, because the 6 was too tight in the bust. The lining is a little bit tighter than the material on the top layer, so if you're busty, keep that in mind (I was pulling the lining from bunching above my boobs all night). Lots of fit in my hip area, and loose around the midsection.
Nice fit everywhere, flowy at the bottom.
The fit was perfect for this dress! I ordered a Medium after reading all of the reviews and it fit just right, wasn't too tight and wasn't too loose! I would definitely rent this dress again.

Was a little nervous about this dress being too tight on top, as I have very broad/muscular shoulders and I didn't want to have a shoulder muffin top. I went with the slightly bigger size and it was perfect! My arms had a great range of motion and I got a million compliments.
Fit well, a bit long, but I am only 5'3", so I wasn't surprised! I wore 2-3 inch heals and still was able to walk and dance!

Fit true to size, has plenty of stretch so you don't feel like a sausage - (being bigger than I usually am made me a bit insecure). It looks lovely, better than the pictures show. Has a very distinct, strong but beautiful feel. I would wear it for anything from a board meeting to a dinner at a nice place.
This is my third rental and honestly, I don't think I will ever buy another dress, other than casual basic dresses. It is so easy to use and I cannot begin to say how incredibly wonderful the service is! 
I can't wait for party season to come - I am really hoping for another really formal one this year. I have a major event in April and I am already working on choosing the dress and dropping the "stress eating" pounds so I can do a dress justice. 
Thank you, again, RTR, for making what used to be a huge pain in the backside to something really fun!
Perfect for a formal event. Not too much of a ball gown but just enough. Fits great.

I am a pear-shaped size 4-6 in most dresses, so I ordered this in small with medium as my back-up. The small looked better on my top half as it was more fitted, but I decided to wear the medium because it was looser and more comfortable on my bottom half. In the larger size, I found it to be a very forgiving cut, and perfect for going out to celebrate a birthday with a big meal! The fabric is a heavy knit, but not very stretchy. The print is fabulous, just as pictured. I wore this dress on Saturday night with tan riding boots and a denim jacket for a casual dinner out. I wore it again on Sunday to church with a cardigan and dressy cognac boots. I liked how this dress looked and received a lot of compliments, but I would only recommend it for casual use. It is not dressy enough for most events.
This dress was a pleasure to wear -- so comfortable.

I rented this for my petite daughter: 5'2", 32B.  I sized up for her by ordering the 2, but as this dress runs true to size, I should have gotten her a 0 .  It was big in the bust, and the straps were long, but the length was appropriate for church, and the bigger size looked rather boho chic on her. Pros: festive coral lace with pretty nude lining, well-made, and pockets!! Cons: None! (I'll just order the right size for her next time:) )

I adore this dress so much that I tried to find it to buy or rent again. The yellow color is gorgeous especially with a nice summer tan. I wore the 6, but in hindsight should have worn the 4. Both fit, but I think the 4 would have been little more flattering. The lining is short than the lace overlay, but since it's skin toned you don't notice. Got lots of compliments,  wish I could keep it!

I ended up wearing the Medium although it was rather large. The Small (my backup size) was just too short so I had to go with the Medium to feel more comfortable. Pretty color but not that flattering on the shape.

I didn't have much planned for my birthday, since it fell on a Sunday this year, but was still able to wear this beautiful maxi dress to brunch. The pattern and colors are stunning. The length was perfect on my 5'3" frame and I simply wore sandals with no heal to them. The open back is not so open that you can't wear a strapless bra with it. I had no difficulty with the strapless bra staying hidden. You do have to put this dress on over your head and there is a size zipper that I was afraid I wouldn't be able to zip up all the way; however, I have historically had issues with my rib cage apparently being broader than average (or something). There is no give or stretch built in to this dress. The reason why this dress gets one star knocked off is because it is cut pretty narrowly around your arms, meaning I felt like at times I had a little of that armpit fat showing. All in all, great rental.
When I first put it on I thought it was a bit too big and loose, but then I started to love it. It's so comfortable. It's nice being so comfortable and stylish at the same time!

Everyone wanted to know where this dress was from, and it looked great on. I wore black and gold pumps, as the color is more cobalt than periwinkle (it looked purple on my browser). The fit of the bodice and skirt are very flattering. It came to just at my knees. 

I'm usually between a 4 and 6 for dresses, and I wore a 6. The sleeves were very tight, as others said, and I had to get zipped into the dress because I could raise my arms up that high.

This dress was wonderful!  The material is very light and smooth, and the dress even had pockets.  Easy to get into and comfortable to wear.  I had to iron it when it arrived, but overall I really liked this dress.

I received so many compliments on this dress! I loved the material and how it made me feel. 
I normally would wear a 4L or 6L in a maxi, but only the 6R and 8R were available for my dates. Both sizes fit, but I ended up going with the 8R to give myself a little more length, since it didn't look much bigger elsewhere.

This was the best party dress for a wedding! Be aware that it does come with a deep v-cut in the chest and shows lots of cleavage! The length was perfect. I received compliments all night long on how great it looked. Overall - awesome dress, and comfortable too!
Rented this for the office using my unlimited subscription. It is fitted at the waist so keep that in mind. Worked well and looked great all day long (fabric does not wrinkle!).
This dress is very comfortable and very slimming!

The lace was beautiful and I loved the color. I am 5’5” and the end of the hem hit at about my ankle. I almost always wear an 8 but the 6 was still slightly big in the waist, but it still looked nice. My only complaint was the straps inside the lace, used to hang the dress, could be seen under the lace. Normally I would cut these out, but with it being a rental I couldn’t. Other than that it was a lovely, comfortable dress.
It was short which was perfect since I am petite.  I wore it for work with dress slacks then wore it out to dinner with friends with jeans.  Great jacket for everything!
I was unableto wear this dress but I did try it on and it looked amazing. It hugs the body just right. The material is thick so it will hide any imperfections.
It fit perfectly for my body type. It was sexy yet sophisticated and it was very comfortable to wear.
No cons - look great, felt great, fit great

Pros:  Loved the way the dress fit and looked.  I wore it to a ball and received compliments all night long.  I'm 5'7" and went with the 4L.  The dress just brushed the floor with a nice pair of heels on.  The fabric was a nice sturdy materials and the dress had pockets!!!  Any dress with pockets is a win in my book.
Cons:  Was a little disappointed that I didn't have a bra to wear with it since the cut in the back is too low for a standard bra.  I also didn't like the fact that the hang tags in the dress are bright red!  I was constantly worries that they would be visible whenever I lifted my arms.  Since I wore this to a ball dancing was involved.  Every time I stepped back my heel would catch in the lace detail at the bottom/back of the dress.  Made it slightly difficult to dance as I was trying to take care and not damage the dress.

The dress fit great and was very comfortable.  The only problem I had was a few loose strings and sequins that pulled on other parts of the dress.  I could tell I wasn't the first that this had happened to, and it never ripped anything so it was fine. Hopefully the dress will get a little TLC back at the RTR warehouse.

Dress runs small and is tight in the rib cage area. The wide skirt is very flattering. The pockets are awesome and very deep. You can put a phone, notes, lipstick etc and no one will notice. The boatneck is very flattering as well. Received many compliments. The element I disliked was the back zipper. It was obviously replaced and not as nice of quality compared to the back up size dress. Not a deal breaker though.

Loved everything about this dress.  Wore it to a batchlorette party and it was spot on.  The sequins are pretty bright but I didn't think they were over the top.  The dress was not too short either which was a concern.
This dress was beautiful! Definitely revealing, but I was going for the flat chest/proud of it look.  Highly recommend.

It fit perfect, the material is stretchy and really flattering. The boning in the dress helps give a nice shape. I didn't need any special undergarments, I just wore it as is. I was able to dance and I felt really comfortable and classy in this dress.
The color was gorgeous, and the material was thick and fairly stretchy. It was low, but the neckline was supportive and I got away without wearing a bra.
Tight in the bust.

I wore this to a wedding rehearsal dinner.  The dress I was wearing to the wedding the following day was black, loose-fitting, and short, so I wanted to go with a very different but still classy look for the rehearsal dinner.  I absolutely LOVE this dress.  I got a ton of compliments and wish I could wear this everyday.  This is never something I would think to try on, and I'm so glad the RTR stylist suggested it to me.  As I busted the bank accessorizing my look for the actual wedding day, I paired this with jewelry and shoes I already had.  Sorry, this is kind of a crappy photo.

I wore this to my friends' wedding. I was officiating so I wanted something formal enough, but I also wanted something that I could dance in afterward. This dress was fabulous. I also recently had a baby so I wanted something comfortable, this dress was it! The open back means no bra (which is doable since this dress is snug and stretchy) or nu-bra. I ordered the XS and the S. I ended up wearing the S (if I wasn't officiating I would have worn the XS) but it was nice to have that extra inch of material at my knees for the ceremony.

Fit: A bit long in the sleeves, but short in the torso, almost seems cropped. A bit boxy. 
Pros: Pretty, stars are some sort of glittery thread. 
Cons: Super hot material, kinda scratchy. Odd fit. 
I wore it to the farmers market in the morning because I didn't want to waste an item in my shipment. It was too short to wear to work, which was the original purpose of the item. It was too hot to wear past 9 am.
Great dress, looked great on me - lots of compliments.
Great dress. Only downside was the zipper. It was also a little warm for the evening out in the summer.
Dress fits perfectly in all the areas! Just simply gorgeous and comfortable as well.
The fit is loose so depends on whether you like this cut. The color is beautiful though and it's a comfortable dress.

Wore this to a baby shower and a baptism and got lots of compliments.  Length was perfect and overall the fit was great.  The only issue was that the armholes were a bit big so you could see a tiny but of my bra as things shifted around.

This has to be one of the most comfortable dresses I've worn in awhile.  Fit is great! It'll work for any body shape.  Love the arm detail.  The color is amazing.  Really pops.  Great date night dress.

I got this dress for a wedding in January and I was pleasantly surprised that the dress is a heavier material. The pattern itself is much darker and pronounced than in the RTR picture but it's beautiful. I wore the 2 but changed into the 4 as my underarms started hurting from the tightness of the dress. I paired the dress with a tangerine cardigan and black tights and heels.  

Cons
Because the dress is heavier and more quilt like, it bunches when you sit down. If I hadn't had black tights on, some folks might have seen my underwear when sitting. The pockets on the side were great but it also made the bottom half of the dress balloon out. This wasn't a huge deal since my hips are small but could make someone with larger hips or a butt seem bottom heavy. I also recommend sizing up since the stiffness of the dress doesn't give much room to move or eat fully without feeling a bit uncomfortable.
This dress fits amazing, not too short, not too long. I didn't want to return this dress!
It is tight! I did not wear it out because it would have been too hard to dance.

The dress is a stretchy material so it fits great.  I ended up going with the size 8 because it was longer than the size 6.  Both fit!  I was able to wear a strapless bra underneath it.  Would definitely rent this dress again if I had another formal event.
I LOVED this dress. It was low in the back so I wore a sticky bra but the quality was great, fit was awesome and it was very flattering. I highly recommend it.

I rented this as a back up dress for a wedding.  I ended up wearing the other dress and chose to wear this while out and about in San Antonio the next day.  I loved this dress.  It is true to size, the right length, great quality and it gave me the appearance of having cleavage!  I imagine the top would run small for those with larger busts.  Overall, an awesome dress!  I would rent this again in a heartbeat!

I ordered this dress for a fundraiser gala and I was originally a little nervous about how it was going to fit.  I normally wear a medium/large and I noticed that almost everyone reviewing this dress wore the small!  I ordered the large and the small as the back up size because the medium wasn't available at the time.  I was happy to find that the large fit perfectly!  Nice little stretch to the material and I didn't have to wear a bra or spanx.  I thought my underboob was going to slip a couple of times but it never did, maybe if I did a lot more moving around it may have.  Your booty will pop in this dress too!  Also love the slit in the back of the dress.  Only downside was the stupid buttons on the back but not a deal breaker, just hard to undo.  Overall wonderful experience with RTR, super easy and convenient!  I would definitely rent this dress again (wish I owned it) and will be using RTR for future events!

Great summer wedding dress! I used tape in the chest area to keep it from opening. I think the length would have been a little too long, had I not been wearing 4 inch heels. The clip underneath is very small. It had a little stretch, but for someone with wide hips and a big butt, it was way to small. The rest of the dress fit perfectly.
this dress was so perfect for my casino royale themed party. i felt incredibly glamourous. but for those with bigger busts, it's quite tight at top and i had to size up to accommodate this.

the dress fit perfect to size, it's a unique cut but probably too long for short people like me (the long edge of the skirt went down to about the middle of my calf, not like the model where it goes to her knee while the short edge went to my knee, not my upper thigh)

Runs true to size. Full skirt, a little fuller than it looks on the model. The lace/tulle is a little stuff, but may be bc I was the first to wear the dress (it still had a tag on it). Beautiful dress, beautiful color. Very feminine and classic.

I rented the 4 & 6 and the 6 ended up fitting better in the hips.  It was a bit balloon-like in the top and midsection but overall was a fun dress.  Stunning design, fabric and colors! You can wear a regular bra and the cap sleeves were a great touch, not tight as other reviewers mentioned.  I wore with pearls and nude heels.  Definitely enjoyed my first time using RTR and would rent this one again.

It was very comfortable, but the neckline was too low for a regular bra without using fashion tape.  And it kind of gaped a bit when I sat down.  But the fabric is nice - a bit heavy, but not too bad for a breezy day in July.  I would likely rent again.
Had fun wearing this dress at the party I went to. Not too short, the arms fit a little long but other than that the dress was perfect

This dress was pretty perfect for a fancy brunch or garden party type of affair.  I've never seen this dress anywhere before and that is what really interested me in using it.  Got more compliments on it than I do with most things I wear.  Most importantly, the dress was beautiful, made me feel that way, but also feel comfortable and like myself so I could get to the business of entertaining!  The dress is incredibly well made and substantial.  Translation- it would be pretty hot in 90 degree weather in the sun.  Would rent it again in a minute for the right occasion.

This dress is great. It's a great dress to show off your body - and it's going to show everything. So consider Spanx. All E&J dresses fit slim (good for me because I'm small), so maybe size up for backup dress. I'm 5'3 and it hit just above my knee. Got a bunch of compliments. I didn't originally order this dress, but my first pick was damaged and RTR sent this as a backup. I never would have picked it myself and originally thought the color was awful... but once I tried it I loved it. Def recommended!

This dress was super comfy and the perfect weight for an outdoor wedding when it's 80 degrees out! The fit was nice, I wasn't sure if I would be a M or L, but the L was unavailable so I put all my eggs in the M basket. The L definitely would've been too big, the M fit everywhere except the bust area where it was too big but I just used some fashion tape to ensure that my strapless bra didn't show. The dress was SHORT. I am 5'7" and it did not touch the ground when I wore flat sandals. This worked for me because I never wear heels but consider getting the long if you want to. Got a lot of compliments - the colors are beautiful and it's a flattering dress.

I wore this dress to the office and with all of the layers, it was an appropriate length with a bit of fun added. There is a short black layer as well as a high slit so you are covered but it does show a bit of leg when seated. Only issue I had was that the dress is pretty sheer so you definitely need to wear nude underwear or else it showed.

This dress is so easy to wear. The fabric is stretchy & accommodating! Very flattering deep V neck, cute cap sleeves, & the skirt isn't too short or too long. The color is fantastic. I was comfortable all night - I felt just a tiny bit of scratching from the sequins under my arms, but I got no marks. I'm carrying 5-7 extra pounds right now so got the 6 as a backup, but I'm glad I tried the 4 as it was more flattering & fitted. I got so many compliments! That said, my chest was definitely prominent, so make sure you're comfortable with cleavage if you want to wear this dress!

This runs true to size and looks amazing on.  I am wearing it to work and after.  The bow does not tie in case you were wondering.  It is already tied and sewn into the dress, so you cannot adjust it.
Classy and feminine. Thanks RTR

I'm all about tops this season  and with my Unlimited, there is a vast variety of options. I typically don't go for the white button down because I have what some might call a swimmer's back, ie. 'broad shoulders'. This blouse has the cold shoulder and the ruffles but yet still easy to work in and surprisingly comfortable. I received so many compliments! I had a bit of a hard time figuring out how to put it on, but once I figured it out, it was a piece of cake! =) I highly suggest for those who have smaller chest. I don't have the most toned arms but the decorative shoulder frill covers that area. I wore with a NuBra and it was fine. Not sheer at all.

This dress fit perfectly. I loved that it had slight shoulder pads that gave me a little more width on top. The length was a tad short when I sat down, but I was under a table most the time so nobody really noticed. It seemed light a tight fit at first, but I was able to dance and move in it all night. It did look a TAD worn when I opened it up, but the condition wasn't that bad, and nobody could notice once I had it on. Can't wait to rent another dress!!!
This dress was a perfect alternative to a LBD. Looks and feels expensive. Will definitely rent again, Wish I could buy!

I ordered both a 6 and an 8.  They both fit - the 6 perfect on top and a little tight through the thighs and the 8 a little large on top but perfect elsewhere.   I ended up choosing the 8 and used fashion tape just to ensure the top wouldn't move too much throughout the night - and that worked great!   I absolutely LOVED the dress and would rent it again in a second. It was elegant & comfortable & fun & not TOO formal, which is exactly what I was looking for.

The fit of this dress was accurate but a little long for my liking. On me, the dress went past my knees. The material of the dress was not too thick or thin but I felt as though this dress would be better in the fall or winter. This dress would like great with or without tights and booties. I wish I would have gotten this dress earlier as the weather now where I am is in the Middle 60s.

This dress is absolutely beautiful. I splurged a bit on this one as it was for a formal wedding and I had a discount as a first time RTR user. I am so glad that I did! I received compliments all night long; this dress is definitely one of a kind. It runs small in the chest area (and I have no chest), so I had to go with the size up from what I usually wear. The regular length is perfect for  someone of average height (I am 5'6") with a small heel. However, the train did get in my way throughout the night, especially when dancing, as it got caught in my heel several times. But it was worth the annoyance to wear such a stunning dress!!

RUNS SMALL! The dress was sent to me overnight after my original order was cancelled, and the backup didn't work. Customer Service was SUPER great. The dress itself was great and hugged in all the right places. The material was a slightly heavy which is great it you have any unflattering areas. Downside is it runs very small. Since this was a rushed overnight dress, I was only given the option of 1 size so I went with what I normally wear. There is absolutely no give in the dress. A size up would have been perfect. Definitely go with the Long as well.
I wore this dress to an April wedding. I think I got more complements about this dress than I did in my own wedding dress. The fit is flattering, the color is stunning.
I liked it, but felt it was a little matronly. Also, the bust area on my dress was stretched out and didn't lay flat. Some gapping created an unflattering fit.

I absolutely loved this dress.  It fit me like a glove and stayed in place all night.  I received so many compliments and felt like a beauty queen.  I would never have been able to wear a dress like this without Rent the Runway.  I am hooked!
If you have hips, size up.  This dress was way tight around my hips.  I typically wear a size 6-8, more consistently a size 8 on RTR dresses.

This dress was beautiful and I loved the pattern and detail of the fabric but a few warnings:  
- The back has stretch so while I am usually a solid 6R I ended up wearing the 4R.  (As a reference I am 5'8" with 34B chest and was able to wear a bra as well as 3 inch heels)
- The dress is popular and after so many wears the wiring boning has started to slide out of the bodice.  This was much worse in the 4R and I ended up begging the photographer for tape in an effort to try and keep it in the dress.  

Regardless I felt beautiful and highly recommend it!

The dress fit like a glove! I have a smaller waist and larger hips and bust, definitely an hourglass. I wore this dress for over 8 hours with no comfort issues whatsoever. The 10R fit but it was a bit too snug for me in the chest so I went with the larger size. I received so many compliments, including one from my best friend's CO! What a night!
Everything was great about this dress--including the pockets! Would definitely rent again.

This was my first RTR experience and I loved it. My only complaint was the flowers on the dress needed to be ironed. The dress was true to size for me. I have a larger bust and didn't have any issues with this dress. I wore a nude strapless bra and it did not show in the back or under the arms. I wish I didn't have to send it back!
It wrinkles VERY easily, like as soon as you sit down its creased all over the front. The colors are beautiful though I got lots of compliments on it.

The skirt is full and it has pockets. The material is very high quality and not one bit flimsy. The dress came on time and in perfect condition- it did not look worn at all. I am a 34D chest and I would recommend that bustier girls size up as a backup just in case. I think it runs true to size but definitely not small so for the backup- go a size up.
I didn't wear it because it was too big on me. I am 120 lbs, size 32D, and the 2R was too big. It looked fabulous and it was gorgeous, wish the size 0R was available
oversize fit.

I wore this to a wedding. It has the classic LBD look, elegant, but the leg slit provides a little sexiness. My girlfriends really loved the dress, my boyfriend felt like the slit may have been a little high for a wedding. I think the girl's opinions trumped. I felt very sexy and classy in it, not at all uncomfortable, or overly concerned about the slit. I did feel like it ran a little large, I think the 0 would have been perfect. It has stretch to it so I would go down for the backup size.
It is a shift dress, so definitely runs big. I ended up wearing the L because the M was sold out. The color is bright, but perfect  for a fall wedding.
This dress had an absolute great fit and accentuated all the right curves.

Open back means no bra (which I usually never do since I'm a 38D) but just used some pasties and fabric was thick, so I was good to go! I'm 5'2 and wore with 3in wedges, pretty much the perfect length. Loved this dress and would definitely wear it again!

This dress fits all shapes and sizes perfectly.  I ended up wearing the S and belting it, as I thought the style as is was not flattering for my body.  Just throw on (no zippers, or buttons), and go!  Print is great and soft for fall.  Material is midweight and silky.  I can easily see this dress being dressed up or down, depending on how you accessorize.
great daytime skirt. wore with a black shirt tucked in and gold pumps. fits TTS, very soft and flowy. would wear again!

This dress is an easy fit in a nice color. It's nothing overly revealing or flashy - so it works perfectly when you need something as a wedding guest. I've worn a 2R in every dress I have rented from RTR so far, and this fit just as expected.

I rented this for a christening and it was great ! I went up a size to a 10 because it was snug at the bust. I would also say if you're stomach is a bad area for you this dress camouflages well, plus it has pockets. I am 5'4 and wore 4 inch heels and the dress hit just above the knee.I also chose to wear dark nude heels. I rented this last minute so had very little choice, but would definitely recommend this dress ! The color is a very pretty periwinkle blue and would be flattering to most everyone .
I loved this dress so much that I bought it! It runs a little small, so definitely size up (I normally wear 4 and wore the 6 which was snug). Overall the most perfect LBD.
Soft and comfy fabric. Fits nicely and looks great. I totally recommend this dress to sort and curvy women. I was able to use a baby-pin to cover the cleavage area.
Great for curves without too much cleavage and not too short so completely sexy while leaving a reasonable amount to the imagination. Such a great dress!! So many compliments and neck snaps!!
Fit perfectly, hung nicely and very forgiving!
I loved the cut of this shirt. Very flattering on my arms and chest. No cons.

This jumpsuit was prefect for my senior prom's circus/carnival theme, and I received so many compliments! I was worried about the top portion because I am very flat-chested, but i bought some padded bra inserts and stuck them into the jumpsuit with fashion tape but it did not look odd at all. I was also concerned about the length but 4 inch heels worked great with my 5'3" frame. Overall, this was an unforgettable outfit and I will definitely rent it again!

Loved renting this dress! It fits true to size and was just as gorgeous in person as it is on the RTR website.  The fabric made it hard to zip at times, but overall there were no issues. The seam at the bottom of the dress before the mermaid flare is very fitted, so make sure you're okay with taking shorter strides and not going up too many stairs.
Slim fit - comfortable.

I have a short torso so this sweater fit me but if you have a normal size torso it would probably be a little cropped looking. The color was great and I liked the shoulder detail.  Casual but slightly unique for everyday.  It was a tiny bit itchy but I got use to it pretty quickly.
I wore this to a wedding in South Carolina. I received so many compliments about this dress. I loved the back of it. It was a tight fitting dress that shows off your curves.

I have looked at this dress so many times waiting for the right event and here it was. I ended up wearing my backup size of 0L which fit like a glove. I'm 5'5", 119lbs with a 26" waist. I have an athletic build so was concerned my back wouldn't fit. Luckily it forgiving, and unlike other reviews, I did not find it irritating under the arms. The downside for me was that the dress arrived ripped along the bust area. The RTR team gave me the options available but none involved the dress I had wanted for so long, so I ended up doing some small stitches to hold it together. Its such a beautiful and unusual dress, I promise you will have endless compliments and feel classy and glamorous!

I loved this dress and received many compliments.  It is a bit brighter than in the stock photo but I thought it was still professional in my work environment.  I am a bit pear shaped and it was a little snug in the hips when I sat down but still was able to wear it without needing spanx.  I would definitely rent this again!

I really loved this dress!  It fit well, it ws flattering, and it was pretty comfortable.  The tulle make it a little warm, but it was not too bad (and I don't typically wear tulle).  Because of the pattern, not many accessories are needed.  I would recommend this dress for sure.

I LOVED this jumpsuit and was so sad when I could not wear it!! I am 5'8 and it was too short with any of the heels that I have. I likely could have gotten away with it, but I figured I would be worried about the length and it would take away from the fun of the night. It is a gorgeous dark green color.

I enjoyed wearing this HOT dress that showed off curves perfectly!  I felt like Jessica Rabbit in this one!  Note that I wore my back-up size of size 4, as opposed to the size 2, and it was a bit tight in the legs, but luckily, I had very little walking too do - small steps!  I comfortably stood during the cocktail party and sat at dinner.  I will add this to my list of potential repeat rentals, but perhaps try the size 6 as a back-up to  see if is as flattering, but move more easily.
Overall, beautiful dress!
I ordered the 2 and the 4 and the 2 fit perfectly. If you are bustier, I could see the 2 fitting well everywhere else, but needing the 4 due to the room in the chest area.

This was such an awesome rental! I wore it for my best friend's bachelorette party and got so many compliements - It's so comfortable! The only issue is that it rides up a bit when you lift your arms and the front only has 1 snap and is pretty loose. I would absolutely rent this again!

Very bright pink! Picture online makes it seem more barbie pink, but it's definitely more neon.  Received compliments all night long.  The 4 fit, but I sized up and wore the 6 just for a little extra room.  I didn't have spanx with me and as other comments say, you can see everything in this dress so I just wanted to be a little more comfortable all night long.  Still a great dress!!!

I rented this sweater for apple picking and spending the weekend doing fall things. I thought it was very warm and didn't need a coat over it. I found that the small fit perfectly, I'm typically a size 4.

The dress fit great.  I opted for the smaller size of the two I got so that it fit tight and hugged every curve.  I got tons of compliments all night on the dress.  It was super comfortable and stretchy and perfectly showcased my 18 week baby bump.  I didn't wear a bra, just petals and I'd suggest something thicker like the silicone reusable petals.  Like other reviews said, with no zipper it was a little tricky getting over hair and makeup but not impossible.  I may have long arms, but the sleeves felt a little short on me but not a deal breaker.  The dress didn't touch the ground with my 3 in heels, but I think the L would have been too long.  Overall I felt amazing and confident in this dress!

As others have described, the top is very tight - even with a small chest.  The larger size was way too big everywhere else but was snug in the chest. The size that fit in the body is really tight in the chest.  The mess that goes over the shoulder is very long.  Had to tuck it into the top for it to lay nicely.  Fortunately, since the top was tight, it held beautifully all night without the need for pins.

Very pretty and light-weight. It was a touch large in the chest for me, but nothing crazy. I wore flats and the dress brushed the floor but I didn't step on it much. My one complaint isn't a complaint as much as a personal taste: I took a chance on dress that had that fabric drape over my arm. And it's pretty in the photos, but I found it a little annoying when I danced.
this dress was a last resort when my rental was damaged, so I wish I could've worn a smaller size. the stretchy material meant it  still worked though. the color is amazing

The coloring of this dress is so unique and the short sleeves are a fun change from the other long sleeve lace styles. It was slightly snug in my hips, so if you are a little curvier I would recommend sizing up for that extra room. Would definitely recommend!

I ordered the size 4 with the size 6 as a backup.  The size 4 had all broken clasps so I couldn't wear it even though that is the size that fit.  The size 6 fit ok but was frumpy.  The bottom of the dress is a tad big and long for a 5'3" woman.  I am a D cup and the lace up top was still a little loose on me.  The dress was beautiful though and I received lots of compliments, perfect for a conservative wedding.

This is my all-time favorite dress! The sleek silhouette offers a delicate yet edgy look. Running true to size and being fitted at the waist and hip, we recommend sizing up for backup. However, if you’re curvier, especially in the hips, you may want to consider sizing up for your primary size. With some stretch in the fabric this piece is great for any cup size and may be worn with your standard bra. The open shoulder and bell sleeves ensure a trendy and chic look for your party or night out on the town. Pair with statement jewelry and bag with black or nude heels and you are ready to go!

I wore this dress to a boxing match at the Barclay Center.  The fit was jaw dropping but the length lent an air of sophistication.  You cannot wear a normal bra with this dress and honestly is probably best for those that are A, B, C or smaller D busts.  Also, fair warning the fabric and design at the back side is not kind to bulges (back fat).   The dress wore well for several hours and was very comfortable but please size up at least one size!

This coat is so beautiful and perfect for every occasion.  The fur collar is detachable, but I would never detach it because of how much I love it.  I think this coat can be dressed up or down, it has a loose fit but it looks very chic and stylish.  It is not super warm, but with another later underneath or a scarf can be comfortably for a NY winter night.

I ordered a size 8R with backup size 6R. I was concerned the bust would plunge too low so I went to the local RTR boutique and tried the dress on. The 6R fit much better; flattering my waste and I could comfortably wear a bra without feeling self-conscious. I loved the way the dress flowed - I had so much fun dancing in it! The cobalt blue was stunning and I got so many compliments. I couldn't help but brag about RTR and its customer service. I can't wait to rent again!

As previous customers have said the fit is slightly bigger, so those who wear a size 12 could probably fit into a size 10 as I did. The dress is pretty but I would definitely dress it up with a nice necklace as it is a little plain. I was going to wear a shaper underneath, but I didn't needed it as the dress had some give in the midsection. I loved the fact that you could unzip the sleeves and found it added an extra flare to the dress. The arms were a little snug but not uncomfortable and when the sleeves are unzipped it gives a little extra room. I would recommend hanging up the dress as soon as you get it as the back end wrinkles pretty easily.

The stretchy material allowed me to wear those strapless sticky bra and still hold up the girls. The open back was so sexy. The dress was pretty light so easy to move and dance in. I usually have to go with petite dresses - but the regular length was a perfect fit. Highly recommend this dress!
Not the dress that I originally rented, it came as a surprise in the package. It was a bit slim in the waist so I had to watch how much I ate, but it was really comfortable.
I really liked the dress! It seemed to be a bit too large in the bottom and a bit small in the top though just to keep in mind.
I wish I had a nice necklace to go with this dress. I just used super large and blinged out earrings to set the dress.
I'm a petite from shoulder to waist so the dress was a little long waisted but with the drop waist anyway, it worked. This is the second time I've rented. That's how much fun it is.

This dress was a real eye catcher and so unique!  I wore it to my work Christmas party and got a ton of complements:)  If you want to stick out, this dress is perfect for that since it is not your typical LBD.  The dress was a tad short, I'm 5'7 so if your taller than that I would be careful ordering this dress.  The fit could of been a bit tighter, I typically wear side 6-8 and ended up wearing the 6.  I have a large chest and this dress allowed me to wear a bra which was nice.  The negative about this dress was that the zipper pull on the dress I chose to wear was broken so it was a challenge zipping it up and also the fabric itself was more worn out and frayed than the other size I had ordered.  You couldn't tell in photos or in person unless you looked closely so I wasn't too disappointed.  Overall I am very pleased with my rental and will be renting with RTR again along with telling all my friends about it!!

I ordered both the 6 and the 8 in this dress. I am 5'2, full chest, and more of an athletic build. I was pleasantly surprised at how well the 6 fit. It hugged my natural waistline and gave me a great shape. I love the tulle not he bottom of the dress. It was the perfect feature for the shower. The dress was gorgeous and I received so many compliments! I was so sad to send it back.

I wore the 4L, with 4 inch heels at 5'9" the dress was just off the floor and just the toes of my shoes peeked out.  The waist is pretty fitted, I was able to get it zipped with no problem but the 2 definitely would have been too tight.  I don't think the dress would work for someone with a very big bust - the material does not have a lot of give.  I paired the dress with long gold earrings and a gold and black cuff and got a lot of compliments on the the outfit.  Would rent this one again.

The sequins didn't rub nor hurt arms all night. Very booby, and you could see my bra, I needed to safety pin in the front, took about 10 tries to get it right, and needed to keep an eye out so you didn't see the pin all night.  Would rent this dress again. Recommended to get a spray tan before so you don't look washed out.

For people who have a curvier body, I wouldn't recommend this dress. It will make you look like a sausage. It is very tight to fit into. But if you have a slimmer, more athletic body, wear this. Trust me. Very complementing to certain areas.

i'm typically btwn a 2 and 4, usually a 4 in bcbg, but this dress in a small was MASSIVE. the gap in the back was huge, not at all the way it looks on the model and the entire dress was just large. i'm only 5'3" so i cldnt wear the dress w flats, needed a 3" heel to keep it completely off the ground, no biggie, but if you plan to wear with flats you need to be at least 5'5". at my height i wldnt rent this again because it looks and shld be a super casual dress, which is harder to pull off if you need to wear a heel. order at least one full size down. you can wear a reg bra

I have a large bust and a small waist, so I usually need to size up for dresses. I'm usually a 10-12, but I got a 12 and 14P, to be safe. The 12 had a small gap at the top of the zipper, so I went with the 14P. It was a great length in heels, but a smidge long when I took my shoes off after a night on the dance floor. Still, I got a ton of compliments and felt great all night. It really is a wonderful dress, and I'll probably rent it again in any of the other available colors

This dress was perfect to throw on for work. It's light weight, not see through and it fits conservatively (does not hug you). The only area it's a bit snug in is the arms. Wrinkles semi-quickly but would definitely rent again!

Fit was perfect.  Stretchy and forgiving.  Beware there are stripes that run vertical all over this dress that are see through when stretched.  I wore a black bra and opaque black tights to keep it modest.  Looked super cute with booties and big earrings. Would totally rent again!

Comfort and class go hand-in-hand in this jumpsuit from Parker. I tried it for a business cocktail party to see if I like these, since I find rompers laughable for anyone over 20. The jury's still out on jumpsuits in general, but this one wins. (Even my husband changed his opinion from a strong "no way" to a "you look nice." LOL) 

The elastic waist is wearable, even if you're wont to stuff yourself at the buffet. The pants were a bit long for me (5'2"), but still worked thanks to the ruched, tapered ankles. The overall size was large on me, but doable because of the halter neckline. I could see this dressed up with Louboutins or dressed down with gold gladiators. I took the middle road and paired it with some elegant Ivanka lace-up flats.

Gorgeous dress! It was my first time renting and RTR is totally awesome. The fit is fantastic but it does run large, so I recommend sizing down. I ordered a 0L and 2L (normally a 2 and I'm 5'9).  The fit of the 0 was perfect but it was about 2" too short in front but the train hit the floor. The 2 was very large and there was a lot of room in the chest even though I am fairly busty (30E) which isn't ideal for a strapless dress. However, it was super long! I ended up wearing the 2L (for the length but consequently I was pulling it up all night, I should have just stuck with the smaller size and wore flats) and 5'1/2" heels to eat up some length but there was still about 3" - 4" of train on the floor. The difference in length the between the two dresses was astonishing. The fit wasn't nearly as tight and flattering in the 2 but oh my the 0 looked so good! Maybe it's better suited for someone a littler shorter who doesn't have a problem with the length of dresses. Also, the fabric is a nice, thick material with the right amount of weight to flow beautifully. Either way it was still fantastic and I would definitely recommend it!

Loved the dress, felt it was true to size. I am 5'2 and wore a size 2 and it was perfect. Length is also appropriate. I received tons of compliments and definitely recommend this dress! I wore it to a wedding but think you could really wear it to any fancy or fun event!
Fit great in all the right places

I rented this and another dress for a ballroom dance weekend at a nice resort/hotel. I wore this one on the "more formal" of the two evenings as the lace lent a nice elegance to the dress. Although it was a shorter dress, it worked for the formal night and allowed me to dance without stepping all over a long gown. My only complaint was that the torso, which was quite fitted, creeped up repeatedly as I danced, being that my arms were raised to shoulder height. Assuming most people wouldn't be in a dance frame all night, this wouldn't be an issue!! I have a larger chest/ribcage, and the 10 fit very well, not too snug at all. In the 8, the sleeves were too tight for my arms as it is lace (not really any give) and they come to the elbow. The dress was otherwise quite comfortable and breathed quite well for being fully lined. And the pockets are ALWAYS a bonus for me in a dress.

I rented the XS & S...both fit great but I went with the XS so it could be a little shorter (I am only 5'0)
This romper is really a show stopper!! Another fabulous RTR experience!!

I am 5'5 and this dress in regular was about 3 inches too short for me. I normally wear between a size 10 and 12 and had to wear a 14WR in this dress. The 14WR was short so I asked RTR to overnight the 14 long and it that ended up being too big, too long, and was made totally different from the regular. The long is a sheath with no boning or support, and has straps. It would be great if RTR would specify exactly which sizes are made with the boning and which sizes are only a sheath. I would not have worn this dress had I not been in a wedding. A couple of positives: The dress was super comfortable, although it was very worn, and customer service was AMAZING at overnighting me the longer size, even though I ended up not using it in the end.

This dress was really comfortable, and flattering for girls with bigger hips.  I was going to a black tie event for funeral directors and really looking for something with long sleeves to cover my tattoos.  This dress was perfect.  It is a little "Morticia Addams" so make sure you're okay with that.  But that was PERFECT for the event I was attending.  Very simple, elegant dress that can you can go crazy on the accessories with.

I thought the jumpsuit ran a little large. I opted for the XS over the S because it fit better in the hips so the pockets didn't stick out as much and the neck was more secure. I got lots of compliments wearing this  on NYE.

I have pretty large hips for my size, so a sheath shape is hard for me to pull off, so it wasn't the most flattering, but it was still very fun.  I wore this to my bridal shower, which it was perfect for. It fit well in the shoulders and thighs, but was a bit too big in the waist.  The bow on the back is cute, probably a bit much considering it's already a pink lace dress, but hey, that's lilly.  I wore it with pink polka dot lilly shoes.  I really liked it overall, it just didn't fit me particularly well.

The buttons are the worst on this dress.  Make sure you have someone to help you get dressed because you will not be able to put it on alone.  Once it is on the dress fits amazingly.  I was hesitant on wearing this dress at first because I thought it was too plain, but all night I received compliments on how great the dress looked.

Fit very well, it cinched in at the waist which was very flattering.  The lace sleeves looked even more beautiful in person than in the picture online and that was my favorite feature of the dress.  I'd suggest wearing your hair pulled back to show off the gorgeous V shape on the back of the dress.

Rented this for an October wedding - super cute fun print.  But it was a bit short for my taste - hit about 3-4" above the knee.  Not quite long enough for comfort for me.  Light weight material also made it feel a little shorter.
Wore to work instead with leggings - super comfortable, wonderful material.  Wish it was a bit longer.
Fit true to size!

I loved this dress, it really is very pretty and sophisticated.  I had a formal work event that I needed something of with an appropriate length and sleeves.  This dress was perfection.  I got both the 4 and the 6, and like other girls have said, the top part has no stretch.  While the 4 fit me better through the waist and down, it was very restraining through the chest and arms, so I wore the 6 and I think it worked out perfectly.  I had more range of motion to move, and I just added my own belt to give myself more of a waist.  My favorite detailing was the dip in the back of the dress.  Very classy!  I would definitely recommend this dress!
True to size. Comfortable in the shoulders and throughout. Perfect length with heels.

I rented the dress for a new years party at a fancy hotel. I got tons of compliments and I have to admit- no one was having a better dress. The only hard part was the zipping up- there is no way you can do that alone. Also I am wearing usually size 12. read that the dress runs small and ordered 14 and 16. I did fit in 14 but it didn't look right. You can see from the picture that wearing size 16th makes me slimmer. Very happy with this purchase!

The dress was a little bit long (even with 3 inch heels) but it wasn't a big issue. I had to order a size up to accommodate my baby bump and growing waistline. The zipper was a little tricky, my husband had to help me zip it up... I wouldn't have been able to do it myself. I received so many compliments on the dressOverall, I was very happy with the dress and would love to rent again in another color.
This was cuter on than on the hanger, but I still didn't love it. I like the texture a lot, but the shape just was hard to pair with other clothes. Overall cute though.

The dress was fairly true to size. I would say a little snug on the hips but I'm an hourglass-to-pear shape and this was more of a shift dress than an A-line, which would have been more forgiving. I wore with black tights, normal underwear and normal bra (it's always awesome when you don't need any special undergarments!). Got loads of compliments all night long.

The dress definitely fits true to size. It sucks you in, in all the right places and is form fitting through the waist and thighs. I loved the off-the shoulder look, but if you plan on dancing and doing a lot of arm movements in this dress, you may have some difficulty. Otherwise I loved the look!
Perfect but be careful with the zipper. :)

The dress itself it cute, but for my height and frame i felt it was too boxy on me and I did not like the double layering of fabric in the midsection of the dress. I chose not to wear it for my party and ended up wearing my back-up dress.

wore this for the amazing royksopp / robyn concert with my date. i got compliments from complete strangers left and right. the romper is really comfy and i can see the tie top accommodating small and large busts alike. i was dancing all night, and the outfit was easy-to-wear enough; after a long night there was a tiny bit of sequin irritation between my legs and there's some boning wires that poke out a little. but overall, it wasn't less comfortable than any other sort of party outfit—and this one boasts total and secure coverage! i felt like a million bucks. accessorized with a gold vintage necklace, a black leather jacket, and black leather booties.
I FELT LIKE I WAS HEADED TO BREAKFAST AT TIFFANY'S IN THIS DRESS. SO CUTE!

I kept this jacket as part of my unlimited subscription for over a month before returning and wore it everywhere!   It is fitted without being too tight or constricting and was a great length.   I wore my normal size medium.    Overall, a great, classic, quality piece that I would love to own!

Very comfortable and can be worn literally ALL NIGHT. I am 5ft tall and it hit me right above the knee, I can see the dress being a lot shorter for someone a few inches taller then me.  I usually wear a 6, I ended up wearing the 8 to have a little bit more breathing room.

This dress had so many pros! This was my first RTR experience and I was really nervous. After having a baby, I never got back to my pre-baby size and wasn't sure how this would hug my stomach. I'm 5'7'' and full figured but with some help from spanx, my stomach was decent. I also have the biggest arms ever, seriously its so hard to find things that fit them. The black lace fabric didn't stretch, but by the grace of God- it fit! I forgot to pick up a nude strapless like the other reviews said, but my nude regular bra worked fine. I did have to adjust the top a few times to pull it up because it kept sinking to show my bra. I needed help zipping and unzipping the dress, so maybe ask a friend to help. The long was really long and got snagged on my shoes a few times, but I wore 2 inch kitten heels, so that's probably why. The dress was a little worn in its condition and upclose looked used, but I still felt amazing nonethesless.

This dress was amazing! I wish I could of kept it. Got numerous compliments throughout the night, very classy and elegant. The color really stands out and the detail on the dress is awesome. Can't say enough good things about this dress.
Substantial fabric but not heavy. Dress barely moved despite how snug it was.

This was my backup dress- I thought it was a bit showy when I saw it on the website, but I felt so amazing in it I had to wear it- and in person, it is really classy. I received compliments all night, and it was comfortable as well- the boning is not restrictive in the stomach, so sitting down to a full meal is not a problem.  I wore the long, with 2" heels, which was perfect at the beginning of the night but seemed to get longer as the night went on.  I understand the comments about the sequins chafing, but it didn't really bother me.  I am usually unhappy with my pear shape but loved how I looked in this dress.
Dress fits well, but I would say a little bigger than true to size.  The color is a lot more darker than pictured, don't expect fire engine flowers.
The leather is supple and feels great on - the detailing is perfect, not too little and not too much. The jacket fit me perfectly and is proportioned for a more petite person at the size XS
Great fit....runs true to size.
Form fitting as usually but still able to move and dance.

Wore this dress for a wedding which I was the MOH for.  This dress was a show stopper!  The sparkle was just beautiful.  It is the perfect length for a wedding and not to mention super comfortable.  I dance with it on all night!

I'm 5'7" and ordered the long and even with the long I had to wear shorter heels than I was originally planning on wearing but my feet were grateful. The dress looked great and I got a lot of compliments. The con: the neckline. Previous reviews said it was tight but that it didn't bother them. Well, it bothered me. I was tugging on it all night long. Overall I'm still glad I rented the dress - it looked great and I got a lot of compliments. But it's a good example of why it's great to rent - I wouldn't put up with that neckline more than once.
Did not fit!

I wore this dress for a June outdoor wedding, and it was perfect. It's a very flattering dress and a fun one to accessorize. I paired it with a silver skinny belt (can't see it in the photo) and a silver necklace. It's lined which is nice, too. The greatest thing about the dress - it has bra strap snaps under the shoulder so your bra will never show! I would definitely recommend this dress.

This dress was gorgeous! I loved the color blocking and it fit like a glove. I was in between the two and four, but unfortunately when I received the dresses, the four had a black stain on it - I couldn't get through the RTR phone line so I ended up wearing the two. Not the best dress to dance in since it is so tight, but it definitely slayed in the best dressed department.
Great dress, fabric is thick and my event was outside - little warm. Great dress all-in-all.
love it. Not too low cut, strapless bra works. Too short for work.

I used my Unlimited to try a dress for a wedding this fall. This is a beautiful piece. The fabric is more matte in the black and has a lovely sheen on the roses. It is fitted in the bodice, no stretch, but allows for a generous bust. The arm cutouts are flattering, and yet I will likely wear a small bolero anyway--I don't have great confidence in my arms. The higher front allows freedom of movement while the longer back is elegant. The pockets are a bonus, and don't add any bulk to the silhouette. I wish I had a reason to wear it out this week, but I don't!
I had so much fun wearing this dress at my bachelorette party - it fit really well and looked amazing. Very comfortable and well made - was the perfect length. It goes with so many shoes as well!
Not for petite bodies, or for full busts.

Usually, I were an 8 in most dresses to fit around the bust.  The fit was fine through the waist and hips, but not enough room in the bust...oh, it zipped alright, however it was very uncomfortable around the arm holes...way too tight.  I had welts the next day from where the sequins were digging into me. It was probably the least favorite gown I have rented from RTR.

The long sleeves and loose fit made for a very comfortable yet flattering dress.  There were quite a few loose threads and beads but not enough to be obvious so I wore it. It's short but not too short. I have broad shoulders but the dress fit ok across my chest. Wonderful dress overall!
The dress was shorter than it appeared online, but it was appropriate for the event that I went to. The dress did not feel like it would slip off my shoulders. That material was great.
Was the perfect length with about 3.5 to 4 inch heels.  Fit me like a glove.
I loved this dress but could not wear it because it was too short waisted.  I am 5'7"

Since the reviews said it ran small I ordered in a 6 and 8...and ended up wearing the 8. The 6 was fine but I was feeling a little chunkier than normal so I felt better in the 8. It was pretty comfortable, a little tight on the lower back, but the length was perfect. I'm a D cup and the top fit without being tight or giving uni-boob...but there was definite side boobage happening on me. I tried fashion tape but the fabric is very thick and didn't want to stay. It ended up being fine, I just embraced it and no one seemed to mind. But if you're not into that you might wanna rethink this dress.

As previously mentioned the dress could definitely be a shorter length - wish it came over the knee!
The color is beautiful in person and you don't need to wear a bra with this dress which is great!

THE DRESS WAS GORGEOUS AND I WAS SO EXCITED TO WEAR IT BUT BOTH SIZES DID NOT FIT ME.  I TYPICALLY WEAR A SIZE 4-6 BUT THE 4 WAS WAY TOO BIG AND MY BACK UP SIZE WAS A 6 AND THAT WASN'T GOING TO FIT ME.  I HAD TO SEND IT BACK.  ALSO THE DRESS WAS VERY LONG AND FOR SOMEONE THAT IS 5'2, IT WOULD NOT WORK EVEN WITH 5IN HEELS.

I got a lot of compliments on the dress but the zipper was a huge pain. The dress fit great just a little uncomfortable for a long night of dancing based on where the boning hit me. Would recommend to friends for a night out.
Fits well, not a heavy skirt. It was a little loose in the chest, but the underarm fit snug enough that it wasn't gaping. It was perfect for a black tie wedding!

this was my first time using RTR and i am SO relieved i did! this dress was absolutely gorgeous. i went out and bought the shoes AFTER i received the dress and am happy I did that because it definitely runs long. my backup size dress was actually a BRAND new gown! i was so bummed i wasn't a bigger size (FOR ONCE) because i would have been the one to take the price tag off!! but other than that, it's a gorgeous dress, very flowy, and photographs perfectly! will definitely be renting again! the entire process was SO stress-free!
Super thick fabric makes this bandage dress flattering - I didn't end up wearing for an engagement party, as it was a little TOO sexy, but would rent for a bachelorette.

I like how it flows around the calves. It's fun and flirty. I ordered a size bigger and I'm glad I did! My chest barely fit in the XXL. I didn't end up wearing it. I'd recommend it for women who have a smaller chest, like an A or B cup size. My D's were squished.
This dress is awesome. It looked beautiful on and the peplum is just enough (not too big) to add detail but still showcase your own figure.
The dress was beautiful, it made me feel like I was from Alice in Wonderland. It was a little big around the waist but I easily fixed it with a mid-waist belt. Adding a cute look to it.

On trend yet classic this black Marchesa is a show stopper.  In a size 2 I fit perfectly on bottom but the top was a little too loose as I couldn’t wear a bra with the sheer paneling. Running true to size I would say size down for backup as it had a comfortable fit throughout the midsection. If hips are your problem area this is a great dress. At 5’ 7” this was definitely the right length as it hit just above my knee. I would wear this gown to a winter sorority formal or a wedding. The sheer paneling is straight off the runway and doesn’t need much more than a pop clutch and simple heels to wow your date and your friends at any event.
I felt super comfortable in this dress. You will feel like a princess when you wear it.
Dress was perfect! Just enough wiggle room to drop it like it's hot at a fun spring wedding! :)
Runs large so size down but so cute! Lots of compliments.
great fit.
I wore 4 inch heels, I am 5'2" and needed hem tape.
Very comfortable, fit well..nice length for a short girl!
Fits well and eye catching.
Fit great!

This dress is beautiful, there is no question about that! It just was not comfortable at all to wear. The lace on the neck and back isn't lined, so it got very itchy and I kind of felt like the neck was choking me. The skirt has a very stiff hem that gives it its poofy shape, but that made it hard to sit close to people in the church, my skirt took up space for another person on either side of me. I ended up changing between the ceremony and reception because I didn't think I could be comfortable dancing in this dress.  The red lace also felt a bit too "holiday" for me, not really appropriate for an August wedding.

I got the 4 and 6, the 4 was a little tight around the waist but the 6 was too baggy on the chest area. Good thing I decided to go with the 4, the hem on the 6 was ripped and the stiff stuff that gives the skirt its shape was sticking out.

Wore this dress as part of a Wednesday Addams costume. It is really comfortable and cute. I would advise sizing down since the material is a little stretchy. It was a little longer than I was expecting. I am only 5'2" and it fell at about mid-knee. Overall great rental!
Super flattering dress. Husband loved it for date night and I stayed warm on a winter night. Love!

I absolutely was in love with this dress however I didnt end up picking it since it was too large in the top. I have a 38B chest and I didnt even come close to filling it out. I also agree with some of the other reviews since it was tight around the ribs where the band is. I was bummed it didnt fit but if you have the right build it would be an amazing choice!

Loved the colors and patterns of this beautiful artistic dress!  Fit was too short in front for my height, but it worked with tights. Back of dress is stunning with different pattern than front.  Clover Canyon quality fabric makes you feel wonderful when wearing their designs.

I just LOVED everything about this dress! I wore it to the Beyonce concert so because of the length I had to be very careful not to raise my arms too high. It's short! The colors and fabric are beautiful. I received several compliments and felt absolutely gorgeous.

Fit and flare style wasn't for me! The bottom part of dress flares out quite a bit and made me look at least 2 sizes bigger than I am. Very unflattering fit for me. However, super cute dress in general. Was bummed this just didn't look good. Would try on first.
This is a beautiful coat with a cool vibe but it runs large and that combined with boxy style just didn't work for me. I sent it back without wearing because I was drowning in it.

Great fit, comfortable fabric, no bra necessary (medium bust), spanx friendly, hits curves in all the right places! I usually wear a 14 if it's a tight dress, but the 14 had looser fabric hanging, so the 12 fit pretty well. I would order a backup size one down just in case you are feeling pretty confident!

I wore this dress for a formal work function at a seaport museum. The dress was perfect for the occasion and the compliments - oh my goodness, from the moment I zipped up until the moment I (very begrudgingly!) took it off - just poured in! This dress made me look and feel like I walked right off a runway. I'm petite so the size 0 was a bit large (if I owned it I would have it taken in the bust/waist slightly) but otherwise fit well. I'm 5'7 without heels and did wear high heels with it so it was definitely on the shorter size but nobody, particularly my boyfriend, seemed to mind! The material under the embroidery is heavy, I would caution against it perhaps during the summer but I'm always cold and for an evening event along the water it was ideal!! I wish I never had to send it back :-)

First of all, I am a whopping 5 feet. I was worried that the dress would be too long despite getting the petite size. Luckily, the petite size perfect for me. There was still a bit of a train but it was nothing to be concerned about since it was still easy to walk without getting caught in the dress. My heels were 2.5 inches. I went for a sticky bra in order to work with the low back of the dress. I also wore shape wear in order to have everything sucked in, just so the dress would be flattering from every angle. I loved this dress so much and I recommend it to everyone :-)

I'm really glad I got the 0P. The length and fit were perfect. I'm 5'3" and length is always an issue for me. I have a super narrow ribcage and basically no chest so strapless and I just don't ever work out, but I heard great reviews so I thought I would try it. It wouldn't stay up. I thought about wearing a padded bra and pinning it to the inside of the jumpsuit so it would stay put, but that wasn't going to work so well when I had to take the whole thing off every time I peed. I was worried it would be too light of a pink, but it was actually the perfect medium blush color. It's gorgeous and I wish I had the chest to fill it out!
