Loved the fit, hugs you in all the right places. The length of this dress runs short, so I would recommend a long. I'm 5'5 and with heels a 2L dress barely touched the ground. I am usually a 4, but since I don't have big hips to fill a dress, a 2 fit perfect for me! Definitely recommend!!!!!

Dress feels elegant - lots of fabric and folds in the front fall nicely.  Fits best with small waist and small bust but great to cover that small belly and hips.  Length requires heels.  No fancy jewelry necessary - pattern speaks for itself but not too bold.  Wore to work during a summer day, then to evening out door cocktail party - great transition dress

The first thing that surprised me was actually the fabric. I was expecting something more structured but it was comfortable so I was fine with that. The 6 fit great in the body and bust but was wayyyy too short, so I went with the 8. You can't really wear a bra with this so if you have to size up, make sure you have enough shoulders/chest to hold it up. All in all I loved the dress and got a lot of compliments on it.

Lovely dress!  The color was so fun!  Unfortunately, it was very tight up top and I looked like a lady of the night.  I mean, it was really sexy but not wedding appropriate.  If my chest was a little smaller it would have looked much better.  The fit in the hips (as someone stated earlier) is a little loose.  Doesn't look bad, it's just a little more fabric around the hip area.  Everywhere else is tight!  I feel like an 8 would have been too large.

This dress fit great and was super comfortable on... so long as I was standing up. I only noticed one other reviewer mentioning it being tight in the collar, so maybe it has to do with my height + dress size combo, but when I sat down in this dress it was *very* tight across my neck. So much so that I don't think I could have worn it to a dinner (which is what I had planned to wear this to). It really felt very normal when I was standing up, though! So, this dress was a dream that could not become reality. Still, the dress was a beautiful color, lovely fabric, and was classy with a hint of sexy.
Wore this to watch the horse races. The dress is quite flirty! I did have to wear shape wear underneath as it was a little tight and there is no give to the fabric, but it looked awesome!
It's s bit short in length, I wore a tank underneath

I wore this dress after my wedding reception to go down to the bars. I'm usually a 0 or 2 but ordered the 2 and 4 based on other reviews. I ended up wearing the 4. I'm 5'5'' and the dress was mid-thigh so definitely on the short side. It's comfortable but pretty tight i.e. isn't very forgiving and shows every lump and bump. Overall, it was a great choice - comfy, cheap, and looked super cute with cowboy boots!

The fit was lovely. I would recommend using fashion tape on the bust line though. The straps easily concealed my bra straps -- a must for a busty lady! The dress was truly stunning. I didn't find the sequins itchy at all. It was bold enough that I didn't need much jewelry -- an updated classic. I got so many compliments! I recommend wearing your hair up with this dress so it doesn't get caught in the sequins. Also, don't worry if the zipper is a little tough. I had to wiggle mine a little, but it went up easily after that!
Runs large. Too loose. I have a large bust (42 DD) and it was still loose. Beautiful dress. Kind of vintage feel. Berry color. Very comfortable.
Wore this to my rehearsal and rehearsal dinner - it was a perfect fit and a cute, flattering cut. Not too tight or too short.

The sleeves are not really sleeves - lots of breezy room for outdoors.  It's synthetic material and it smelled a bit funky from others' body odor.  I hung it up outside for a day to help with that.  Also discovered a bit of a food stain on the hem/lap area :-( .  Overall, it was a great dress for two conferences.

This dress was fabulous. I rented it for a friend's rehearsal dinner and received countless compliments on it. The dress fit true to size--a perfect fit! The amazing pattern and blue color were perfect for this summer occasion! I highly recommend this dress and am considering renting it again!
Loved it! The stylist at the Vegas store picked it out. I didn't think I would like it but it fit perfectly. Loved the mesh areas, made it more unique.

It's a struggle to say good things about this dress. The fabric was heavy, so it made the whole dress heavy and bulky. Fit was true to sizing, just felt very large due to poofyness of the bottom. I didn't like the way it looked...   I rented for Easter, and this dress was sent as a replacement for a dress that wasn't available. Totally different than the dress I rented, but I tried it on anyway. I didn't wear it for the event due to fit, and style.

This was a backup dress, so I didn't end up wearing it. I very much liked the sash and the skirt on the dress; they were very pretty and exactly what I'd hoped. But the top was a little odd...something about the cut of the shoulders and chest, I think. It makes it very tricky to wear a bra of any type and yet without a bra, the top of the dress is not going to be flattering.

Great fit.  Great style.  Great length.  The only problem I had was with the sleeves.  My bra straps kept falling down for some reason.  Teeny tiny issue though.  I'd hardly even worry about it.  I'd rent this one again.
Great dress, ran too large but because of the from overlap I was able to pin the sides so that I could still wear it at least once.
Wish I owned it.  My boyfriend said I should buy it.
The dress is heavy.  I ordered a 2 and a 4 and I wore the 2 so im glad I rented the smaller size.  It is gorgeous and so flattering on any body type!

Lovcd the color and the fit! Got lots of compliments on the color and the sexy back. Would recommend a latch for the lower zipper, it slipped down an inch two a few times when dancing/sitting at a wedding. slightly worrisome, but definitely loved the dress. came out great in pictures.
I'm glad I got the long size, the length was perfect with 2" heels.

I usually wear a size 12 and this dress fit me well. I have a larger rib cage/bust area but narrow shoulders. This dress fit great. I would recommend going a size up if you have a large bust. It gives you some room. The material is not super breathable. I was at the track (read: outside with no ac) and it was a little warm but not worse than any other dress. It also did not wrinkle from sitting all day and in the car. It was a fabulous dress for the event.

This dress fits true to size and has a very forgiving skirt area.  you may need to secure the bustline with garment tape if you are chesty.  Conveniently, they send you various forms of the tape with the dress if you need it.  One important note: RTR documentation says to drop the packaged dress in any blue USPS box.  My local post office (Long Island , NY) said if I were to have done that the dress would have been shipped back to me.  They pull out any package over a certain amount of ounces (11?) and for security reasons do not allow it into the mail system.  They ship back to the sender (me).  This package was 2 pounds.  Glad the post office counter was open.  Just a FYI.  That said I would definitely rent from RTR again.

This was my first RTR experience and I'll definitely be back for more.  Unfortunately the lace around the collar was curled under so I had to steam it and then put heavy books on them to flatten it out.  Luckily it arrived early enough for me to have the time to do so.  The beige lining also showed half the time at the bottom of the dress, but that didn't bother me too much.  Other than that - the dress was gorgeous and I received a ton of compliments.  I would definitely rent again.

The fit was perfect, I rented the 8 regular because I did not wear heels. This dress stayed up through hours of dancing and I did not have one worry about pulling it up/adjusting it. I wore a necklace as a belt to spice it up a bit. Great and classy prom dress!
So many compliments and the dress fit really great.  Highly recommend for any wedding!

I really liked this dress! I would have given it 5 stars except the material tends to rise up (especially when dancing!). The best part was the midline ruching - which hides any flaws! Very simple dress, but classic and timeless! I'm 5'9", 140ish and ordered a size 6 which was perfect!
It hit the floor perfectly with a pair of heels and hit my curvy figure at all the right places

I wore the 0R and it was VERY long. Overall the dress was a perfect fit! The top was perfect and I felt very comfortable in it. The emerald green is such a gorgeous color. I definitely recommend this dress!

The dress fit really well. I was able to wear normal undergarments and it was very comfortable. The only down side was that the neckline was really low and needed to be pinned to lay right.  I actually see this as a plus for the dress as it can be adjusted based on chest size and still work.  I also needed to wear 5" heels for the L length to work (barely).

The dress is so amazing, especially for dancing. There is a lace design on the back, which I wasn't aware of, but thankfully had a fun black bra to wear it with the dress. The dress flows so much more than I had expected, and it was such a great dress to wear for a graduation party. I was pleasantly surprised by how awesome this dress was!

The neckline is high, so it felt a little constricting. It's also an extremely form fitting dress, which is helpful to know going in. Generally, if you're a comfort over beauty kind of person, this dress could feel a little restricting. But It really is stunning and worth it for a few hours!

Loved loved loved this dress! I am 5'7" and 128 lbs and I wore a 2R. I got a 4R as the backup and could have worn that, but the 2R just looked better. I wore it for my sorority formal and was so glad I did! The fabric is nice but has a stretch so I was able to bend and move comfortably. The slit in the back also made it so easy to walk in. I thought it was definitely true to size. If I could do anything different I might have gotten a 2L to see if I liked that better because I sometimes had to pull the dress down in pictures because I didn't like how my toes stuck out. I got so many compliments and it was so flattering! I would definitely recommend this dress.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower and it was perfect! However, I was bit disappointed how tight the top was. I'm not busty by any means and still could not wear it with a bra! It worked out okay without one though. It is a very flowy dress but the lining is also very snug if you have any hips at all! Anyway, I received many compliments and felt very pretty wearing it.

The dress was a great weight and quality so it hung well and was very flattering on my generally curvy body. It is long so I needed to wear pretty high heels (I'm 5'4") but it wasn't impossible. I would recommend for a classic, flattering look.

This dress worked out perfect!  I wore about 3"heels, and I felt that the length was just right.  The dress was form fitted, but I felt that I had plenty of extra room.  The material is thick and durable, with a silky slip under.  The red was a really rich color.  Such a classy dress!
Everything is perfect about this dress

This dress is very well made. The fabric is thicker, but for a hot southern day it wasn't stifling. I normally wear a 2, but also ordered a 4. I went with the 4 because the 2 didn't zip. Definitely runs small! I was worried about the length sizing up, but it was perfect. Definitely would rent again.
Wore to a fall wedding. It is the perfect combo- conservative enough to wear in the church and fun for the reception.
A bit more shiny in person then expected. A blue/silver color

This dress runs large. Size down, size down, size down. Typically a 4 in dresses but always worried about length I felt comfortable ordering this as a bridesmaid's dress in which I knew I would be wearing 5 inch heels. This puts me over 6 feet. This dress was the perfect length with the heels. Without, it was a mess and too long which is a luxury that I never have. The 4 would have worked but the 2 fit like a glove and I knew I could move comfortably without worrying about dancing and the bridal party photos. My dress needed a really good steaming after I received it before I could wear it.

This was sent as a backup for a damaged dress, and based upon the photos I was very disappointed by the stylist's suggestion - but I loved it! The blue is much brighter and the gold much more pronounced when you see it in person. Fit was very flattering, creating a smooth hourglass figure with no Spanx required. I did end up purchasing a bra that had a full front but stick-on sides and no back, as the (gorgeous) detailing on the back does dip a bit low - though nothing indecent by any means.

It felt completely appropriate for a black tie holiday party for my company at an art museum - very attention-getting without being over-the-top colorful or embellished, and I felt comfortable in it all night.

I am 5'9" and wore ~2" heels and it was just a smidge too short.

Beautiful, flowing material. Running true to size with no stretch to the fabric I'd recommend sizing up for backup. The bust, waist, and hips fit loosely and the overall slip silhouette has an effortless look to it. I'd say it's meant to have a more loose look. I would typically wear an XS in VINCE., but preferred the size small for the fit. Great for every day or even dressed up at night.

The dress fit perfectly. I ordered a size 0 and a 2. I ended up wearing the 0. The red detailing is closer to a maroon than a red. I wore this to a firefighters ball and it was perfect for the event. I would order this one again!
Omg this dress was everything! It fit perfectly, it was elegant yet slightly sexy, and hugged my curves in all the right places! Probably my fav dress from RTR.

This is a cute top but is very flowy and runs large, even the XS. The sides are also open so if you wanted to wear this to work you would need to wear a tank top underneath. The color and concept is great, just wish the fit was better.

This dress made me feel gorgeous. It is incredibly sexy without actually showing anything. It runs small and very tight around the knees making it very difficult to dance in. I rented the size 2 and 4. The 2 did not come close to fitting but I also noticed the red skirt bleed onto the white collar making it pink. Luckily I wore the 4 but for the price to rent, both dresses should look great. The fabric is a quality weight making me feel supported.  I would only recommend this dress for small busted women. I am a 34B and wore a strapless bra just for shape.

The length was a little long but I was expecting that from the other reviews I read.  I tucked the bottoms under to make the outfit shorter and it worked.  The thing I did not like was the extra fabric in the front near the hip area.  It was a little baggy.

I never would have tried this on, as it's not my typical style, but a stylist at the Chicago location picked it out for me. I'm only 5'3", and while the dress is supposed to be knee length, it was more of a tea length on my short frame. The waist is the smallest part of the dress, and thankfully for me, that's the smallest part of my body so it fit great at my normal size 4. I have a smaller bust as well, but I was able to wear a nude bra with the dress, and then used fashion tape to secure the bra in place to be sure it wouldn't show throughout the night. My event was a hospital fundraiser, so I thought this dress was fun and flirty, while still being age and event appropriate. I received many compliments throughout the night and would definitely recommend this dress if you are looking for something a bit different than your average LBD!
I never ended up wearing the dress. It was so tight that my fat squeezed out the sides and I'm a 0! It runs very small. I wish I knew to get a size 2.
I think I would have liked to see what a 42 looked like. I'm petite and curvy so its not really a proper shift dress on me. It is extremely comfortable but does wrinkle very easily.

I wanted to go with a black dress for my friends wedding but didn't want something boring so this was a great option. It was flattering and comfortable. Only downside was that it was a little long even with heels (I'm 5'9) and the lace occasionally got stuck in my heel when walking if I didn't pick up the dress. Besides that I definitely recommend this dress with a pop of color statement necklace!

Really easy dress to wear to work.  Has a tie around the waist and you can adjust it to make it bunch in different places.  Is silk, but it didn't wrinkle at all during the day until I wore it to a baseball game in like 700 degree heat and that's when things went south for me.  I'd buy this.

The dress itself is gorgeous, the fabric and the color are amazing, the fit is flattering, and it's comfortable. However, as others have mentioned the zipper is so bad on this dress that I had to size up to get it closed. I was disappointed that I had to wear the larger size (wanted to wear the 6R) but overall it looked great. I did have to pull it up a bit throughout the night and it was long when worn with flat sandals. Overall I was very happy with the color and look of this dress and would recommend to anyone who has a person available to help zip them into and out of it.

I am 6'1" and tend to worry about length.  This dress hit mid thigh and was a great length.  Normally I wear a size 8 but I found that the 6 fit more comfortably and was more flattering.  I also don't have a large chest so the 8 had too much fabric in the chest and would have fallen and revealed my bra every time I moved.  Both zippers were a bit sticky but with my husband's help, we got them up.  On shorter women, expect this dress to hit around the knee, still pretty, but I think with all these sequins you'd be going for a sexier look.

This skirt does run small. I usually can size down in skirts due to a smaller waist vs thighs, but needed the larger size with this one.  It hit me right at or slightly below the knees.  It is slightly "poofy" so it add a little volume to your lower half, but paired with a slimming shirt I think it is fine. I wore this to an Easter egg hunt party.

I rented multiple sizes as these dresses were used for a bridal party. The overall look of the dress is 5 stars and they fit true to size, however I am only giving 3 stars due to issues with the length of the 18L received. The girl that wore this dress is 5'8 and the dress was significantly above her ankles. We ended up having to safety pin her dress so that it didn't look absolutely ridiculous. She was the maid of honor, so the fact that her dress was different actually worked out. Another bridesmaid who wore a 10L couldn't wear heels otherweise the dress would have looked to short on her, so she wore flats Maybe the dress we recieved was not truly a long. Just from what I saw, if you're 5'8 or taller this dress may be an issue length wise.
The details on the dress take it from a well fitted everyday black dress to a unique and memorable piece.
Only "complaint" is that it was slightly short waisted on me in both the 6 and 8. But I'm 5'11..it happens. Gorgeous dress!
Looks very professional, fits well but not too tight.

The material is very similar to corduroy.  It also made the dress ride up.  I ordered a size 10 and 12.  The 10 was way too small and the 12 was just uncomfortable.  It definitely runs small and not for a woman with curves.
got tons of compliments when I wore this dress.  fits well, true to it's size, comfortable while dancing.  light enough for hot weather
This dress was absolutely beautiful on the hanger and on me. Unfortunately it was a little bit small. I'm hopeful to rent again in a size or two bigger.
A little tighter in the waist than most other pieces from this designer. However still wearable and the print/color are so vibrant. Definitely recommend.

I wore this to a wedding when I was about 6 or 7 months pregnant and it was very comfortable and showed off my bump without being too tight. I had to pin it in the chest to add more cover to my large bust but the fabric was very forgiving and easy to manipulate. The fabric was lightweight and flowy.
Fits true to size without too much give, so make sure to pay attention to your measurements. Plunging neckline is super flattering and the detailed embroidery is gorgeous!

Very comfortable fit w/ standard bra. Length was quite short even on my 5'2" frame, but the capped sleeves and semi-relaxed fit kept it classy. This is the only dress I've worn that received just as many compliments from men as women. It's the perfect RTR dress because the retail price is too expensive and it's memorable (so can't be worn too often).
I did not wear this piece, it just did not look flattering from shoulders to bra line, it was too loose in a frumpy way, unfortunately. Pretty fabric.

The perfect spring dress for any day time event! This dress is a great combination of a periwinkle and pistachio pastel color palette. You will need to either wear no bra or a Nu Bra as the back of the dress is sheer on the top. AT 5'4 the length was perfect on me with a  3 inch heel. I would recommend sizing up as this dress does not have much stretch to it and runs small. You can complete this look with a pair of nude heels and fun earrings!
Great dress, but ran big through the chest area and also was too short on me wearing flats!

Pros: gorgeous plum color and the earring that the stylist recommended was a perfect fit.  Material was thick and the gathering on the side was very pretty
Cons: TOO LONG :( I'm not so tall and the end of the dress was way past my knees.  If it landed at the height of the picture would have been perfect.

The gown was exquisite. I was VERY sad that I could not wear it as I ordered my size based on these reviews. Is was VERY large in the waist. I am not a tiny woman. I shold have ordered a size 6, which I never fit in.

I'm 5'7 and saw that someone who was 5'10 rented this and got a size 12. wellllllll that girl must not have had curves. The dress did fit but goodness if I bent over for anything I would show the world my hello kitty. I returned and went with a dress I already owned

I love Clover Canyon dresses and this one did not disappoint. The fit was accurate to the size chart provided, but I did size up a bit for a little bit more breathing (and eating) room. I chose to wear spanx to smooth things out a bit, but didn't think I really needed to. The pattern camouflaged a lot. Overall this dress was comfortable, unique, and sexy. I felt great in it. The only drawback was that the skirt did ride up all night. That might have been partly due to the shapewear, but the skirt is definitely a leg hugger so it will slowly creep up all night.

It was really comfortable, even after I ate a very generous dinner! Flowed well and looked great on the dance floor. I'm about 5'5", 34C, and can't wear heels because of a foot injury and this dress worked really well across all of my criteria.

I loved the color, material and it fit true to size. However, it was very long even with heels. I'm 5'2" and the dress touched the ground with heels on. Overall a very comfortable fit and the 2R actually fit me too. Great choice, highly recommend!

Perfect for a fall or spring wedding. I got lots of compliments. The colors are vibrant and it photos beautifully. My only complaint was that it was super long on me (I'm 5'6 and wore wedges and it was still long) and that the zipper is really hard to get over the seam (both on and on the hanger). Overall great dress!

the box arrived and i immediately put it! it is fabulous ... 
cannot wait to wear it out for the evening with the hubby and friends 
bonus ** has not been rented before so the tags are still on it 
the bottom half of the dress is sheer and the back is open (not sure you can tell that from the photo)
I am petite and the dress and the sleeves were just the right length.  The color and lace details are perfect for a holiday party.  I cannot say enough good things - wish this dress was in my closet!
Ran a bit small

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was perfect! There were a few snags and such in the tulle but nothing noticeable. I got so many compliments on it. It runs true to size. Definitely recommend this dress for any wedding or gala.

I usually wear a size 6 but was chose the size 4 as they both fit but the 4 hugged my curves a little better. Very comfortable fit and perfect for the black-tie optional wedding. Easy to dance/move in and I would absolutely rent the dress again and recommend it to other people. My one issue with the dress was some of the flowers did not lay flat due to how it was cleaned recently. It was only noticeable to me, but it was something I noticed initially.
Make sure to order a size down as it does run large. It also looks great with tall heels since the back makes it a tad more modest

It runs big and I probably could have sized down another size. I wore a black tank because it gaped a little in the back, but it was perfect to cover a bit of the very deep V in front. I added a belt from my wedding. This was a statement gown and I loved the pockets!
fit true to its size.  So well sewn.  Warm, xoxoxo.  Fells like quality.  Cn be so professional, but with a pair of jeans, you feel like a million bucks.  Its a closet keeper :)
Perfect for a holiday party. The 0 was a bit snug but the 2 was way too large on me, so I squeezed into the 0. I would recommend this.
Fit was true to size, I could wear a regular bra with it. Pockets came in handy! Very classy and the material and color was beautiful.
Would have liked it if the collar held it's shape better but it didn't affect the look at all.
Length still a bit long, even with 4 inch heels

Wore this dress for an afternoon wedding. It was a little on the short side but still a great dress. The color is great and you don't see it often. Received tons of compliments. Loved that it was loose fitting. The 42 was extremely tight in the chest area so I wore the 44. Would rent it again!

I wore this to an event where I was photographed. I didn't love the dress on me for full body shots, but the color and pattern was amazing for closeups. The bow doesn't stand out well. Comfortable and easy. Chic.
Wore this dress to an early spring wedding.  I wore the large as the medium was tight around my bust (I am a 36D). I got tons of compliments on the dress and it was super comfortable all night long.

I rented this dress as a bridesmaid dress for a wedding in AZ. Everyone LOVED our dresses. They were a great rose gold color that shimmered so nicely in the sunlight. I would say this dress was a little tight around the rib cage (all of the bridesmaids expressed the same sentiments), but otherwise ran true to size.  I sized down for my extra size, but if I were to rent again, I would probably recommend sizing up just to be safe. I am 5'4''ish and the dress came right above my knee.  I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress, which made it even more comfortable.

I rented this for my bridal shower. I am not short, but this dress certainly made me feel like I was. It was beautiful and flowy. My best friend said she wanted to put me in front of a fan to watch the dress move. It was very comfortable once I had heels on and wasn't concerned about tripping because I stepped on my dress when attempting to walk.

I actually got two uses out of this dress in one weekend, which I was super happy about. It was stunning and I received so many compliments! The 0R fit perfectly as expected. My only cons are it was difficult to get on and you definitely need someone to help you tie the back. There was also sharp wiring around that kept poking me in my waist, but I put a bandaid where the wiring was and it seemed to solve the problem. I recommend this beautiful dress!
Easy to wear and flattering. Nice dress. Fun and light.
Tight fitting, short (but not too short)

I can't even describe the ways in which I love this dress.  I love it so much that immediately upon returning it, I sought it out and bought it (seriously, within 10 minutes of dropping the package in the return box - I needed to own it).  I felt like a million bucks in it. 

I've had three kids and have been up and down in sizing, so wasn't sure how this would fit - but the 14 was perfect, it fit like a glove.  The fabric has just the tiniest amount of stretch, which I liked.  The fabric itself is heavy enough to lay really well, but I wore it to an outdoor spring wedding on a warm day, and it definitely wasn't too hot.  I think the stripes are much prettier in person, the blue is vibrant and rich.  

The skirt is a little fuller than in the picture (fun for dancing!), and the bodice is on the tighter side, but those things made it fit me even better.  It's great if you have hips you want to hide.

Loved this dress for the holiday season! Wore it both for a Hanukkah dinner and a Christmas Eve celebration. It was perfect with black tights and black booties. Definitely runs large though – had to use a safety pin to accentuate my waist a bit more.

Great casual dress, perfect for traveling and roaming around a city or day on your feet. Fits true to size, and isn't inappropriately short. I wasn't given the option to buy it for some reason in my shipment, but I had I been I might have considered. Really flattering and great staple.

This dress was perfect for my wedding shower! The dress covers your chest so I was comfortable bending down to open gifts, and it was long enough in length so guests didn't get a panty peek. Awesome detail in the back and the tulle adds a pop to the dress!
It is a little thicker material but the other reviews mentioned this. It was very expensive looking and I got at least 4 compliments.
Loved every thing about this dress. It os a little thick so probably not best for warm weather
Fits true to size.

I really liked this dress, but the person who rented it before me did not return their dress on time, so I had to wear a size larger than I probably would have. Either way, it was really comfortable, forgiving, and I got a ton of compliments all night long!

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding and received numerous compliments throughout the night! Overall, I felt the dress fit true to size and it was comfortable. I'm 5'6'' so the 6R was a perfect length for the 2.5 inch heels I wore. I was slightly concerned about the top since I'm a DD and couldn't wear a bra, but everything stayed in place, even while dancing... luckily the the dress wasn't stretched out from previous rentals. I wouldn't recommend this dress for anyone with a large bust.
The dress is very pretty.  The color is bright and summery and the pattern in the fabric adds dimension, but it runs large.  I recommend sizing down for a backup size.
I'm tall (5'10") with long arms & a long torso and this jacket fit like it was tailored to me.  I loved the heavier material and it was perfect for work. Will definitely rent again.
The zero was a little big but still really like the dress for a holiday party.

This dress fit so well. It was super flowy and fun and got all sorts of attention at the beachside pre-wedding brunch. It is a little heavy but I didn't mind. I would wear this over and over if I owned it!

This dress was PERFECT for a wedding!  I wish I could have kept it.  
I usually wear an 18, but I could have worn the 16 or 18 for this night.  I choose the 18 just so I could move and dance more, but I think the 16 could have been a little more flattering.  The fabric is beautiful and the way it falls is extremely flattering.  It's form fitting in all the right places, while hiding anything you don't want people to see.  I would highly recommend this dress.

Overall, I enjoyed wearing this dress! It fit pretty well and was a fabulous color and shape and quite comfortable. I gave this dress 4 stars out of 5 because of a few cons: it's not possible to wear Spanx because of the mesh on the side, so if you want a little extra smoothing, that is not an option. The v-neck was very low cut, which prevented me from wearing a bra; it ended up being fine, but I think this differs from previous reviews of this dress, which say that wearing a bra is possible.
Comfortable, classy, and unique.  A great find.

Such a beautiful dress however I could not wear as it was ridiculously large and long on me - I looked like a little girl playing dress up in her mother's clothing.  That being said, the dress and beautiful was gorgeous and I know that this would look absolutely amazing on my friend who is 5'10 (or really anyone over 5'6).  Figure flattering and so wish I could have worn this one.
This dress was great! Super lightweight, great for transitional dressing. It does have a ruffled skirt, which I couldn't tell from the photo, but I still really liked it. Would wear again!

This dress is so beautiful!  I think it could easily be worn to work, on a casual day out or even out at night and dressed up with heels.  I wore it to work with wedges and it was SO comfortable.  The waist is elastic which gives extra comfort.  I think I may keep this around to wear again on an upcoming trip with some flats.
The length was perfect with heels ...  I got a lot of compliments !! Material is heavy and is good quality ... great formal affair dress.

I received this as a last minute backup when the dress I had ordered was suddenly unavailable. It was more casual than anticipated due to the sweater-like fabric. It was very fitted on be, but I would have been way too hot to wear this thick dress and shapewear. Oh well. Very pretty though.
Fit is large.  Recommend going down a size.
Dress ran true to size, but was a bit long even with heels on!
Loved the fit and feel of this dress. Not too short, either!
Normally wear size 2 top, size 4 bottom. Went with the XS. Little big around the waist, but has a little give in the fabric. It's very short when sitting down.

This sweater is perfect for the cool to warm transition. It fits very true to size with comfortable room in the bust. The detail at the bottom is the perfect touch. I wore this to work with jeans and booties and looked and felt amazing all day.
The fit was perfect!! The arms were a little snug but it didn’t bother me!  This dress is stunning in and on the hanger!!

This is a little lower cut in the bust than I normally wear, but the dress was snug and I was not afraid of revealing too much with the wrong dance move. The midsection is forgiving, who doesn't love a little rouching?! The sparkle lends some glamour, and it works well for a fun formal event!

I love the little flecks of bright colors in this sweater.  I didn't notice them in the pictures online and you have to be really close to see them in person, but they give a bit of whimsy to an everyday gray sweater.  I love the details on the shoulder and the wrists, but the sleeves were way too long for my short arms.  Very flattering!
The colors on this dress are much more vibrant in person then in photos, definite plus. It also runs a bit short and a bit small so size up one. Perfect for most spring time events

I wore this dress for my friend's wedding.  It was unique and everyone was complimenting me on it!  The sleeves were a little tight but overall the fit was great.  I would definitely rent this dress again.
I typically wear a size 4, but from other reviews I wore the size 2 and it fit great. The dress does stretch a bit throughout the day so a smaller size may be a good idea. Very fun and flattering!

This is such a cute and fun little dress. The colors are really bright, and the dress is perfect for the summertime.  The bottom portion was a little on the tighter side, so I went with the 4 instead of my usual size 2.  I was happy I sized up! Also, the mid section is really loose, so this dress is great if you want to hide your stomach. Overall, it was really comfortable, cute, and a great dress!

This is to date the most favorite dress I've ever worn. The color was a dark navy blue and the dress fit perfectly on me.   Wore to a black tie wedding and received compliments galore.   Rent this dress, you won't regret it!

I can't really say too much about fit, since this is not a maternity dress and I was 29 weeks pregnant. The fabric has little to no stretch but there is ample room in the skirt for your belly. The waist band was tight and somewhat uncomfortable but I expected that. I normally wear a 0 in dresses but needed a 4 here so that the clasp would close and my pregnant boobs wouldn't escape! With lots of fashion tape and a little help zipping up I felt fabulous all night and didn't spend a fortune on a maternity dress I'll never wear again! I call that a win!!

This dress was REALLY pretty. The color was perfect. The material is THICK. Feels like jeans-thick. It's basically like spanx and really slims you out in all the right places. The problem I had was that on the back of it, there appeared to be a tag that someone sewed on there and tried to cut off? It was about 1-2" in length right near the back zipper where my bum was. So although this dress was really nice, I didn't end up wearing it because of it. The back up size M was just way too big on the bust area for me. Note - you definitely can't wear a bra with this one.

Beautiful thick material for a fall day wedding. Perfect length and very comfortable to dance all night. The dress was a little tight in the chest but otherwise was true I size. Received many compliments! Would definitely recommend!

This jumpsuit was amazing. It was so comfortable and incredibly flattering. And very easy to take on/off by yourself when going to the bathroom! It did get a little warm in the legs by the end of the night - but it was so worth it. I seriously considered not returning this to RTR! I will definitely rent this again!

This fits true to size. I am very petite on the top and have a butt, so this was a flattering fit. I could not wear a bra with this but that was not a problem for me. The color was divine - a vibrant lilac and it was a huge hit at the party. It has small cutouts on the front waist-line and a very open back with a unique back detail - that I loved. The bottom as fitted at the hip and loose but tailored to the knee.
It fit perfectly!  I wanted to try the 14W but that size was not available.  The 16W was great and very comfortable!  I will definitely rent again!
I wore this for a job interview, and I felt really sharp (even though I didn't get the job).
Fit true to size had an extra clasp on bust so no need to wear a bra. Not a ton of give to the dress but still fit nicely! Def would rent again!

I got so many compliments, both in person, and all over my social media accounts when I wore this dress! I'm 5'2'', and wore the dress with 4 inch heels, which was the perfect length for me. The dress looks better in person than in pictures, and the real color is a bit more of a rose gold, than yellow gold. The color is very suitable for many, many skin tones, even my pale complexion. It was quite comfortable and light to wear. My favorite part of the dress was how it was cut - there's a subtle curve to the dress to help emphasize the waist, and a small widening of the bottom of the gown that lets the dress move/sweep along with you as you walk (rather than a straight cut that limits how wide a step you can take, like with a column dress).

I ordered this for a work trip... very packable and didn't wrinkle which was great! I love the length - I am 5'5" so it hit just below my knees for that "midi" look which I love. The dress is form fitting but very stretchy - I would probably order a 4 next time around. Material is very thick and sturdy, so it didn't show lines, etc.
I thought this dress was tailored for me!  I've never had a dress fit so well.  It was heavier than I expected but was very comfortable.  I danced all night long with no problem!

I wore it to a "resort casual" wedding reception during the day and kept it on for a friends birthday in the city. I got several compliments at both events. The dress is short but comfortable. It was a little big in the chest/shoulder area for me, but I needed the 6 to comfortably fit my hips. Overall great dress.

I wore this dress for my engagement party in January. Since it was cold, I added tights and some suede black wedges. This dress fits true to size and is very comfortable. Although the arms were a little tight when putting it on, it did not bother me throughout the night. My favorite details of the dress are the lace neck line and small dip in back. It also has pockets--so I could carry my phone with me! Another plus.. did not have to wear a bra with it! I really wish I didn't have to return it!!

I'm in between sizes (10 and 12) and the 12 on this was a perfect fit.  I typically don't like going sans bra but had no issues with this dress.   I didn't have to constantly lift the dress either which is a usual problem for me with strapless. The length was appropriate as well.  Overall a great rental as RTR never lets me down but probably wouldn't rent it again, due to personal preference. I'm not a big fan of strapless dresses.

This was my first time trying rent the runway. I was very impressed with how easy the process was and well everything worked out. I had a few questions and the support team was awesome answering all my silly questions. This dress was absolutely beautiful! I wore it for my Holiday Work Party.  The detail and vibrant blue was stunning! Received compliments all night. It was comfortable to wear all night. I usually wear a size 8 but after reading the reviews saying the dress runs small, I went a size up and the 10 fit perfect! The dress was very flattering. The only thing is that the zipper was a little hard to zip up. Also, there was a little snag on a piece of the blue embroidery and a long piece of blue string hung from the bottom of the dress. It wasn't noticeable but I knew it was there. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous!
I received a ton of compliments on this  dress.  The color and the fit were both beautiful.  I felt classy, elegant and sexy all at the same time.

This dress was sent to me as a backup and I didn't end up wearing it as it was not a good fit for me. It fit around my waist but was very tight. Then the top of the dress was very loose on my boobs. It was actually uneven on top too, one side sticking out a little bit more than the other as you can see in the picture. Mostly, I just thought the overall look was very unflattering. It was longer than I thought it would be too and hit at an awkward place right above the knee instead of looking like a voluminous mini skirt. I wish it looked the way it does in the picture, but it didn't on me.
the belt is a little tattered but it was fine
It was a lovely dress- boobs on display and almost too sexy for me.
Perfect for a warm, summer day. The off-the-shoulder look is super cute, but I wish the fit was better on my petite frame. The shirt flares out just a tad bit much and it makes me look a little wide.

I loved this dress.  It was a nice structured fabric, and I loved the seam detail that was all over the dress.  I am fairly small busted so it was nice that they had a strap on the inside of the dress that helped hold it up.  I received a ton of compliments on this dress, and would definitely wear it again if I had the chance!

It fit pretty true to size-  it was a both sexy and elegant dress. I am short so even with heels it was a tad long. The  only thing is that I wore a strapless nude bra and it showed a little bit in the cut out area of the stomach.  Otherwise I loved the dress and it was perfect for a black tie!

I rented this dress for an out of town wedding and had it delivered to where I was staying...one less thing to pack!  I rented my usual size and a size down and was surprised that the smaller one fit better!  Very comfortable as its not too form fitting...allowed for easy movement.  Wedding was in a warm climate and having a more loose fitting dress was much more comfortable in the heat.   Bead work was just the right amount of texture without being flashy. I got TONS of compliments!

Such a flattering fit-- it does run a little small but not so much that I couldn't eat or dance. I wore it with a chunky gold necklace and received a lot of compliments. I highly recommend this dress!

Ordered an 8 could have gotten a 6. Was not happy with the wide zipper on the back. Did not wear for this reason. Seemed comfortable. Has built in lining. You wouldn't need a spanx if you don't need to wear one.

Wore this dress at 9 and a half months pregnant to my husband's best friend's wedding. I am usually a size 4 and the size 12 fit me perfectly at this point in my pregnancy. I had ordered the 14 as a back-up. My bust was the only part that could have fit slightly better, but it worked great. Got tons of compliments.

I wore this dress for a bachelorette party. It was the perfect color (we were all supposed to wear pink) and I loved the lace. The cut of the dress is not normally one I wear...the seam was in an interesting place, but it did create a fun flair to the bottom of the dress. I got many compliments on the lace and the color of the dress. As always, the renting process was easy and I love the new bag the dresses come in! Such a great idea eco-friendly idea! :) LOVE RTR!!!
nice material. Keeps you cool.
I had the chance to try the dress on at the Georgetown location before renting.  The dress had a better fit when I tried it on than the one I received.

I wore this dress to my sorority formal and I've never gotten so many compliments in my life! I wore four inch heels, which makes me pretty tall so the 6L was a must. The neckline was absolutely stunning and I was wicked reluctant to return it! The whole process was very easy and I will definitely be renting again!

This dress is very shiny and made of a scuba-like material.  I ended up wearing it to an afternoon theater performance and it was fine.  I thought I would wear it to work, but decided to return it an get something else from unlimited instead.

At the time I wore this dress, I was very self conscious about my midsection.  Because of the fabric and the fit and flare nature of the dress, it hid every bump I was worried about.  I have a small bust but the way the neckline was cut, it actually made it seem like I was more endowed than I really am.  I received a number of compliments that night! I highly recommend this!

We attended a red carpet event and my dress stole tbe show. Heads turned towards me wherever we walked. You can't be shy and wear this dress because everyone will notice you. People literally stopped me for photo ops. I felt as if I was the guest of honor. My fiancé loved that my dress was such a hit. Lol. I think this dress works best for curves.  The upper part was a tad bit too big for my chest. But overall it stayed on and I had kept it pulled up...so no wardrobe malfunctions. I weighed 166, 5'8" and the 8L was perfect for my stilettos. Without my stilettos the dress would've dragged.
The dress runs true to size and the print is beautiful. Lots of compliments, I highly recommend.

I rented this dress for a formal NYE 2016 party and could not have been more happy with my selection! The dress was the perfect length, and fit amazingly! I did not have to worry with any pulling or tugging, the gown fit like a glove and was incredibly comfortable.

This is such a cute top!!  The color and the style are everything! It runs true to size but feel free to size up for a back up size.  It is fitted at the natural waist and has not stretch.  A strapless bra works best because the shoulder section is lace.  2 thumbs up!!

Absolutely LOVE this top. The fabric is light weight and very comfortable and can be worn in a variety of ways and for a wide range of events. I recommend dressing this up with heels and statement earrings for a work to cocktails look!

I rented this dress for a holiday work party and loved it! I was new to the office and wanted a more conservative dress. This dress was perfect. It fits true to size ans is great for staying warm in the winter months while showing off some skin. I was sad to return the dress.

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and the material was very nice. I went a size up than what I normally do since it's a little snug around the hips but is super flattering. I did not feel self conscious once all night. I received tons of compliments. I have a smaller bust and wider hips and I felt this fit perfectly. If anything a little room in the boob area but I wore a little extra padded bra. I went with the R instead of the L since my heels weren't super high. If I wore higher heels it might've been too short. Overall I LOVED this. It was really hard to give it back!

Ended up with this since my 1st choice didn't fit, I wore this on a cold night although it was short sleeve (& the shoulders were a bit constricting) because it was a thick material. Understated sexy.
This dress fit true to size, great for an evening wedding. There is maybe a little too much fabric in the skirt for shorter legs, but overall really nice.

The XS fit me perfectly and I'm usually a 4; on the curvy side. Great for me, not for someone thinner. At 5'2" the length was long but I anticipated this (everything is long for me). 

I felt well dressed for Thanksgiving with my husbands family and super comfortable. I received lots of compliments on the color and would love to keep this one! 

The one bummer is that my fashion tape didn't want to adhere to the fabric blend. It worked for a bit but not for the whole night.
Perfect for a tiny waist, wider hips and thighs. Super flattering. I'm between a 4-6 and a 4 fit perfect.

This dress was comfortable, elegant and just so PRETTY. Worn for a memorial service and dinner, it was requested that we wear color to celebrate life, and this felt just right. The embroidery is lovely, the only thing I would have changed is perhaps stiffening the collar so that it lays right. But a minor thing on such a great garment - just make sure the nude under slip arrives with your dress, mine was missing and had to be overnighted. (Without it, it would be a very different look!)

The fit of the gown was pretty true-to-size. Usually I wear a 6, but took the RTR stylist's suggestion was to order a 4 for my back-up size, which was the size I ended up wearing (thank you, stylist!). I didn't have any complaints, except the color in the RTR website picture is much brighter; the dress is a deeper navy.

I'm 5'4", 125 lbs, so the 2R wound up best and worked for me.  The fit was tighter than I thought it would be.  It hugs you around the waist/hip area, but I could still move and dance around it.  The only real con was that my size came with some holes/damage prior, which I hadn't noticed until a day before my event (barn wedding)*.  So, wound up wearing that one anyways and hoped for the best.  Still, after the event I let Rent the Runway's staff know about the damage and fortunately they were super helpful and even refunded me a portion of the costs.  Overall, still a beautiful dress that I believe is one of those dresses that is flattering on most.

Comfortable and easy to wear, ran true to size, arrived in great shape, fit beautifully —no pinning or tucks needed. Arrived on time, easy to return, very affordable. and oh yeah, I looked amazing. I could have worn the 0 (it fit better because that's my usual size) but they only had a 0L and it was too long. So I opted for the 2R, with a padded bra, it worked just fine.

I'm 5'9" and this was good with heels (long length).  There wasn't a ton of difference between the M and the L except the band around the middle - I went with L but could have worn either.  Tons of compliments, loved the dress - didnt have to worry about any part of it.  Distinct and fun for a summer mountain wedding.

I rented this dress for a formal gala.  I did not end up wearing it, but it is a beautiful dress.  I chose not to wear it because I felt that it was not flattering for my body type.  I do not have much of a natural waist and my body type is relatively straight up and down.  I think this dress would look fantastic on someone with curves. The dress is really beautiful though and has nice detailing at the bottom.

This dress is fabulous. I actually wore it on a date and to work. For the date I wore it with no bra (there are cutouts in inconvenient places for bra straps), black sneakers, and a black leather jacket. Very comfortable but I still felt very sexy. For work I wore it with a black velvet blazer, polka dot tights, and black flats (would have preferred with black pumps but my back is out right now. Very versatile dress, would definitely purchase if I had more money!
Brand new dress with tag still attached sent! Dress was snug around rib cage so it forced you to be a lady all night, as I should for a work holiday party.

This is the most gorgeous dress I've ever worn. I got a million compliments and I felt so beautiful on my Valentine's Day date with my boyfriend. My only issue with the dress is the zipper. I had to get my mom to help me zip it because the zipper is just awful. Every time the lace changed the zipper got stuck. Once we got the zipper to work The dress fit beautifully like it was made for my body.

I am large busted, so the dress was snug around there.  I should have gone up a size, but my waist is a 6 so it always makes it hard to order dresses for me.  But I loved this dress, got tons of compliments and the color is great!
Beautiful beading, lace and all features are exquisite. Just did not like the shape of the dress, it very much flares out at waist. Also, the top does no favors for the bust area.
Dress was on snug size I wore 4 which is my normal size but dress was too wrinkled to wear.

My sister-in-law decided to have a formal wedding, so I thought it would be a great chance to try out Rent-the-Runway, and I'm so glad I did! I loved the style and color of this dress, but the 4R was already sold out, so I took a chance and ordered the 4P and shipped it directly to my destination. The dress fit perfectly! I don't like to wear tall heels (only about 2 1/2"), so the length was perfect, and the color was beautiful for a sunny, fall wedding. The dress is pretty form fitting, but I wore it for about 12 hours, and my husband commented multiple times how comfortable I looked all night. So happy with my experience!

I loved these pants! I got them in a size 8, which is my typical pants size, and they fit me perfectly! The color is perfect for Fall, and surprisingly easy to match with! I wore them to work and out to dinner after, and they were super comfortable all day!
I felt so good in this beautiful dress!  Very form fitting, yet comfortable. This dress is truly a show-stopper- I was complimented all night!
Tight around waist.
For a short girl, its a lovely length. the skirt does flare out a bit more than how it looks in the RTR photo.

The quality of the sequins (the full-length arms are amazing) and general construction of the dress is great. I knocked off 2 stars for the ruching. I feel like it looks artfully scrunched in the model photo, but at my height and curves, I felt it made me look much thicker around the waist. I don't think sizing up would have helped because the ruching would have still hit me at the level of my stomach. My hips/butt definitely pushed more of the folds up, but it might have just had something to do with my medium height and proportions (40-27-42). Wearing stockings/tights/nylons is impossible because the sequin hem will shred them. 

I would have adored this dress and never given it back if it would be the same sequins/arm/neck, but with a body-con or or more tailored body with zero ruching.

Great dress, definitely fits true to size.  They only had a 4 available for the day I needed it and it worked out very well.  The color is definitely more of a neon yellow rather than a pastel color, it worked for me but just as an FYI.  Also, i'm only 5'3" and the dress fit well, however if someone was a tad taller, I can see the dress length being an issue.  All around, a great dress and I would definitely rent it again!

The sequins do have a bronze patina on the opposite side of the silver. To remedy for less just run your hand over it to flip the sequins to the silver side. I am 5'11 and this dress was short ( fell just under the bum line)! Easily fixed with black shiny leggings (stockings will snag). I have an hour glass shape and the medium fit it just right. The fabric is stretchy so if your arms are not in the best shape you don't have to worry. Arms are not lined but it was not too itchy. My favorite part was when a little girl saw sequins for the first time and couldn't stop rubbing the dress with big eyes saying 'pretttyyyy.' It's the little things folks. But trust me, you will look fabulous!

The dress fit perfectly through the hips and waist. The shoulder straps where a little loose, so once the dancing started I wished I'd thought to secure them with some fashion tape. The dress is very low cut, which showed off plenty of cleavage, but perhaps a little too much for a work shindig. I attempted to tape the front with fashion tape, but sequins don't adhere very well, so about an hour in I gave up the fight against busty-ness.

I absolutely loved this dress. I have never been able to find a dress that is long enough for me. I'm 5'10" all legs and this dress was perfect for 2-3 inch heels. If I had worn my 4 inch heels, it would have been just a little short, but totally acceptable. Highly recommend!!

After renting but not being able to wear other HL dresses, I was nervous for this pick. However, I ended up being blown away by how much better this dress looked than comparable LBDs. The material hugged my curves without being too tight to continue wearing after dinner, and remained form fitting yet comfortable even after dancing all night long - truly a standout dress!

Absolutely beautify gown! Very classy yet chic. I felt like million bucks and got lots of compliments :) 
And few words about customer service… It is refreshing to deal with company that not only offers amazing service but is willing to help you out when something is not as you wanted it, and still be super nice. It's my 3rd time renting from RTR and each time I love RTR more and more. I can't wait to look for my next dress!!!

The dress is beautiful. Was comfortable to wear, except under the arms at the end of the night where the sequins hit. Draped well and was the perfect length for a small kitten heel. I switched to flats after a few hours and i didn't have to carry the dress (except on stairs). Easy to pair with accessories. I did have to buy a new bra that was low cut; and the dress itself is very busty. The size up also fit, but had too much material in the bust and needed to be clipped in order to not expose myself.

I rented this dress for a December wedding. As recommended, I ordered a size down and it fit perfectly. Sequins weren't scratchy and gave the dress enough structure so that it was slightly forgiving in the midsection. Only con is that the hem is a bit fitted, making it difficult to pull the bottom down over the thighs, resulting in a bit of wiggling in the ladies room (I didn't want the sequins to catch on my hose). I received lots of compliments and the dress is all over sequins without looking like a disco ball. Would definitely recommend.
It gets hair and fur on it easy. Lint roller required.

Love this dress. Got so many compliments. The fit was true to size, if not a little smaller. The bust is forgiving because it ties, but the waist was a little snug. ...just a warning: if you're tall, this might not be the best choice. the picture shows it as a floor length maxi - I'm 6 foot and the dressed needed to be another 4 inches to hit the floor. It was more like a calf length dress on me. But otherwise, the colors are gorgeous and the fabric is very light weight for summer!
I wore this out to dinner and drinks with friends. It's cute but didn't blow my mind. The bottom portion was a little sheer but the fit was nice and it was comfortable.

It was absolutely perfect! I am normally a size 0 but all they had left for my date was a size 2. It fit like a glove! It was so beautiful and different than any other prom dress. I got compliments all night!

It had a really loose fit that was comfortable but the midsection bunches around the waist giving you a heftier silhouette than ideal. Otherwise, under a leather jacket and over slim jeans it was the perfect dress/tunic to run around in. Had a beautiful ethereal quality to it, but not so precious that you can't do everything you need to do to get through the day. I wore it to work, then to the car shop, grocery store and then to a playdate with my girls. It surprisingly survived everything. Fabric doesn't snag and given all the intricate details..this was impressive!
I couldn't wear this dress because it was way too tight in the chest.  But I absolutely love it and am trying it in the next size.

Even though it was lined with satin, this was a light, beachy dress that was still formal enough for this casual beach wedding.  It's  backless though, so you can't wear a bra, and because the neck is such a scoopneck, it makes the neckline a little strange if you have a chest and don't wear one.  I ended up getting one of those stick on bras, and the dress looked much better.  It's much pinker than the model picture, which was a pleasant surprise.  Pretty dress, comfortable, just a little awkward fitting in the chest area if you have anything larger than an A.  Buy the stick on bra!

I rented this dress for a wedding but did not end up wearing it. The color was great, but the dress seemed very plain especially around the waist. A belt or sash around the waist may be the best way to wear this dress. I am short-waisted also, so the straps of the dress were a little too long, making the whole top appear too large (despite my 32F chest.)

I ordered this dress for a formal wedding and I absolutely loved it!!! I am usually a size 8 but wish I would have ordered a 10 - the zipper and top was very tight and hard to get up but it did loosen up as the night went on.

I got so many compliments on this dress and would definitely wear it again - plus it comes in so many different colors!

I really liked this dress in pictures and on the hanger, but when I put it on it just didn't fit right throughout the torso.  I did not wear it to my event because the back kept bunching up, and it did not look flattering on my frame. I had bit of extra length between the bodice and the hips that would make the zipper bulge at waist height on the back.  I believe this dress could be beautiful on someone of my height if they have a longer torso than myself.

I got this as a back-up dress, but ended up liking it. It's very fun and unique. But, the top is a little big - I had to have tape. Also, the sides have a sheer portion - so you need to wear a sticky bra. However, a nude bra is probably fine.

This dress runs a little large so I wore a 0 when I normally wear a 2 or 4. the neck does fit tight, however, with the use of a clear rubber band you can extend it so that it fits more comfortably. The dress was long on me (hit right at the ankles), but it still looked great with heels and I received a lot of compliments. I also used fashion tape to keep the front of the dress from popping open when I sat down, which i recommend.

I'm usually a size 8 but the 10L fit perfectly, so be aware that the dress runs a bit small. Also, there is a short fitted slip underneath the skirt so if you have wider hips you might want to go up a size. On another note, be prepared to have people think you're getting married / moving into a castle with a prince... not necessarily a bad thing but just a heads up. Other than that I have only wonderful things to say about the dress! It poofs out in a flattering way and was the perfect length to the ground. Very happy I rented it.
I love this dress. It's sexy without showing a lot of skin. I got so many compliments.

This dress fit amazingly! The slight stretch made it comfortable, but the thick material was so luxurious and hid any lumps/bumps that normally would require spanx. This was about 4 inches too long on me, even with 3 heels on, but I fixed that with safety pins and wore it all night.
Great cut, great fabric, great color. Bought it!
Dress was amazing loved it. Perfect color as well.
Really pretty shirt (I liked it so much I actually bought it!)  great colors (with gold flecks to jazz it up a bit) and can be worn casual or more dressed up.  Loved this one ~ 5 stars!
roomy and cute.  super warm - only for cold weather!

I wore this dress to work in February and froze my butt off! It is VERY sheer!  The fabric is flows and moves however you do. It’s more for the Fall than Winter. I wore this with patterned black tights and received so many complements.

The details in this dress didn't do themselves justice in photos, but I received many many compliments in person!  More importantly, I was extremely comfortable thanks to the weight and (lack of) stretch in the fabric, and felt beautiful all night long.  Great dress!

I rented this dress for a wedding this September, 2016.  I cannot tell you how many compliments I got on this dress!!!  I would have normally rented the regular size, but it was sold out so I went for the long.  The long was completely fine with the 3-inch heels I wore.  Like all the other reviews here, I would say that fashion tape is your friend with this baby!  No need to wear a bra, but I did use the fashion tape to make sure I wasn't falling out of it or flashing anyone ;-) Could not recommend this dress anymore, along with the overall RTR process!  This was my first time using the site, and it was so wonderfully easy and fun! Go for it ladies!!

It fit very well, though it did ride up when I walked. Maybe I could've worn the 6 but that dress had a paunch that could accommodate someone with a belly. The 6 was oddly baggy in front. Overall, I felt very pretty and confident. Good pick!
I wore it under a jacket that I never took off so I didn't have to deal with a strapless bra. The fit is the perfect middle ground between tight and flowy.
Wore this dress in Vegas. Received compliments, especially on the cleavage. Material is stiff but comfortable.

This dress is a nice thick material and the cut is perfect.  I love drop waist dresses.  I wore this to a reunion in winter, hence the tights.  I am very petite and could have gone with a size 0, as it was a teeny bit loose in the bust/arm area.  I ordered a 2 & 4 though.  There is a subtle print on the white skirt.  It gave it a more sophisticated, classy feel.  I wore a statement necklace, as the dress calls for it.  Super comfortable and never had to adjust it.  For a $30 rental, you can't beat it!!  It was perfect for the event.  I usually like a little more of a wow factor in a dress, but the event was for a Catholic school reunion, so I kept it clean.

The color stands out. Its the most beautiful shade of mint green. The bust area is a bit confining if you are full busted but overall I enjoyed wearing this dress and found it to be a fresh take on a spring look. I would rent this again...in a heartbeat!!!

This was my first time renting from RTR and I would absolutely do it again! My husband and I had to attend a black tie charity event for his work and I wanted a dress that was simple yet elegant. This dress checked both of those boxes. It was absolutely perfect and I got so many complements throughout the night. I ordered a 6R and the 6L as my backup size. I am sure glad I did because I actually ended up wearing the 6L because with heels the 6R was just a tad too short with my heels. I will 100% be using RTR again!
Fits well, true to size. The slip is navy but the dress is black. Comfortable and cute with boots. Try it out!
I got this dress as a back up for my civil wedding. Wow! once I put it on I did not want to take it off. I got many compliments. Its comfy and true to size. loved it!

I loved the color - looked exactly like the picture. The sleeves were a little snug so I had to go up a size. I'm usually a size 0 but the size 2 was definitely a better fit. The length was perfect; just above the knee. I received a lot of compliments. My sister actually told me about this site and I am so thankful she did. Perfect dress!!!
This dress was adorable and just the right length. It was not fitted around the waits but tight around the chest. It still gave a "Fit and Flare" look. I would for sure rent again.

Loved pairing this shirt with black jeans and black heals for a dinner party. The dark navy is a great color and it was very flattering and sex yet classy and the best part is that it is easy to wear - it's not a shirt that you have to "fidget" with the whole time you are wearing it. I would definitely buy this shirt for my own closet and will do my darnest to wear it again before I have to return it!

This dress fits like a glove. I normally wear size 6, and did so for this - it worked, because I was wearing it in a professional environment. I would probably get a 4 next time if I was wearing it out to fit tighter around the waist. I wore it on-camera reporting, and the bright red looked incredible! It's a dress I would wear again, and even buy. Definitely recommend it for on TV, or for a night out. Works for both!

I liked how this dress wasn't just flat, boring black. It has a cool textured fabric! The straps are super loose, but otherwise I think it fit very true to size. You can't wear a bra with this dress because of the back, and the fabric does have some stretch. I'd recommend sticking with your typical dress size, but sizing down for backup!

The bartender said to me, "I see dresses every Saturday. But THIS..... now THIS is a dress!!" It was perfect for an outdoor wedding. I am a little disappointed though because both dresses I received did not have the belt that ties at the waist. Not a deal breaker though. My fiance thinks I should purchase this dress!

I wore this during my college roommate's bachelorette weekend. We were in Vegas, and it was crazy hot, so this airy, breathable dress was a godsend. The off-the-shoulder look is super flattering, and the length is perfect. The color is also gorgeous. I loved this dress so much, I wore it again to work when I got back! Would absolutely wear this again (and again, and again).

I am 24 weeks pregnant and I was able to wear a size 2.  The fit was great for a girl with a bump and a booty; however, it was short for work/church which is where I wore it.  I wore the dress with black stockings and black boots to offset the shortness.
I was able to get it on, but it just wasn't comfortable... a little too tight. Wasn't as cute in person as the photo. Didn't wear it.

Rented this for a Bill Burr concert downtown. It's a beautiful dress, but it didn't flatter my body. I wore the 42. Before RTR, I would've sworn I was a size 6, but I keep choosing the size 4's they send as b/u. Vanity sizing, I'm sure. ;)
My body: 5'5" - *very* short-waisted - 32DD - 130 lbs - curvy hips. I like to accentuate my shoulders, my butt, and my stomach. This dress kinda camouflages all three of those areas. The shoulder fit looked more sleeveless that strapless. The extra fabric in front and back bunched up and just didn't work for me. It looked almost like a mistake.  
That said, the pictures of other women wearing it show a well-fitted and beautiful dress, so I think it was just me, or maybe my specific dress. IDK. Likely's Red Carolyn dress was a much better fit for me.

Love the fun print on this dress!  As with all ML Monique Lhuillier styles this dress runs true to size however I do recommend sizing up for the backup size. I am typically a size 4/6 however I definitely would have preferred the size 6 in this style to support my wider rib cage/bust. There is a built in bodice so you can definitely go braless with this style. For me, this style was very tight at the waist however due to the full skirt (tulle underneath) there is comfortable room for the hips. At 5'5, this style did hit about knee length on me. Due to the bright print I would pair with simple accessories!
Sucks you in in all the right places. Can wear eith or without a strapless bra. I'm 5'4 160 and the 8 was perfect.

The size 4 was true to size for my usual size 6 dress size.  It was a tad short but beautiful!  I rented a 2nd dress and did not wear this one.  I would definitely rent it again and get the 6 as I'm usually a 6 and the 4 was a bit too short.

The dress was in in perfect condition. I ordered the size 6 and 4 and the 4 was a much better fit. The length was perfect for my height.  The fabric is stretchy which added to the comfort of the dress. The dark green/ blue sequence added richness to the dress. I would definitely recommend this dress. This was my first experience with renting a dress and was completely satisfied. I can't wait to do it again.

This dress is so stretchy and comfortable! It would be easy to dress up, though I just wore it with a sweater and flats for church. You can see I had room for a three month bump in a size medium :D I loved the fit of this dress and would rent something similar again!
I'm 5'4" and it was short enough to be sassy without showing too much.  Taller women might feel that it is too short.  Overall flattering and comfortable.
I recommend going up a size. Loved the dress, hated giving it back!

Loved this dress!! I wore it to an outdoor wedding in August. It was absolutely perfect for the occasion and I received so many compliments. The material is thicker but I wasn't too hot in the dress. It is such a fun, cute dress and I felt so stylish in it! I might have to rent this one again I loved it so much!
This was beautiful, but it was kind of heavy.

It was for my music video... Amazing under the lights! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQ5pfrJitiA  I honestly can not say enough good things about this dress! I am usually between a 6 and 8, The 4L was perfect, with room to spare.

I'm a 32DD (my profile is wrong)  and didn't need to wear a bra!  Had to wear 3" heels with a 4R so it didn't drag on the ground.  Would totally recommend this dress.  Got tons of compliments and it is a nice stretchy material.

I rented this jacket for a quick weekend trip with my boyfriend. This piece took me easily from the airport layered over a comfortable dress, to walking around thrown over a tank and jeans, looked fabulous over a cocktail dress at dinner, and added the perfect tough-girl edge to leggings and boots on the return trip home. The cropped length hit me perfectly just below the waist, and the material was very soft and supple. Great rent!

I loved this dress. I wear a size 0, and it fit true to size. The material has some stretch, and the length on a petite girl is perfect. The gold at the bottom makes it a perfect black dress. Will rent again.
fits very nicely and great design
It fit perfect for my height and shape.  My upper arms were a little itchy with the sequins, but not terrible. I would definitely recommend this dress for a formal occasion!

The dress was gorgeous but unfortunately I was unable to wear it due to some quality issues, which the Rent-the-Runway Team was excellent at handling.  I would recommend going up 2 sizes from your usual dress size if you have a larger bust.  It also runs on the long side, I'm 5'3 and even with 3 inch heels it dragged a little too much for my preference.  The colours are rich and true to the picture. The fabric is forgiving when it comes to wrinkles so it's a dress that travels very well!

This dress is beautifully proportioned and has a great look with the strong shoulders and short skirt. The fabric is thick and supportive. The lining is pretty heavy, and not satiny, so I wouldn't wear this to a party with dancing. I'm short so the length was perfect. I found it comfortable, flattering, and cute. Only thing I didn't love: that little soft bulge between your bra and armpit might show because the sleeves are so tiny in the armholes!

I wore this dress to a Jazz age themed lawn party last week. I also rented the pearl necklace from RTR, which was also very fitting for the event. The dress fits true to size. I really liked my dress but the only thing was that you could tell this dress has been worn quite a lot by others. There was a slight rip in the back near the zippers
but it wasn't a huge deal. It is slightly heavy due to the sequins and it got quite hot wearing it outdoors in June 80s weather. Overall, it's a great dress for your next roaring 20s party! #gatsy

This is a great shirt! I ordered a medium and it was still loose enough and looked over sized to wear with skinny jeans and lounge in. I wouldn't go a size up or you would be swimming in it. The shirt has a very silky touch and the colors pop
Beautiful fabric and pattern.  Will likely try a larger size.  I think this could work for day with some nude wedges or in the evening with a more dressy shoe.

The size 4 was not available at the time I reserved the dress; thankfully, the 2 fit nicely. Though I was a little wide in the shoulders for the 2, the relatively open keyhole back meant that the fit was flexible. I wore it comfortably without a bra. The dress that I received did look quite well worn upon arrival, and some trimming of loose threads and very patient ironing of the roses was necessary to fix it up. The roses that were not completely attached were curled up, and took quite a bit of low-heat ironing to lay flat again. I suppose this may or may not be an issue depending on the condition of the dress you receive. The dress does picture slightly lighter than it looks in person; it is a dark red and nude color. Overall, I loved it and felt beautiful!

First of all, I'm so happy RTR has plus size now. I've been wanting to rent forever, but nothing would ever fit me. I ordered this dress in 20W and 22W, thinking I'd definitely be wearing the 20W. Ehhh wrong, I ended up in the 22W. I normally wear a 1X in shirts and a 22 in pants, so when I wear dresses, they are always a size 20 - this was my first 22, but I was just glad one of my dresses fit. The arms are kind of tight, but I wouldn't be concerned because I have pretty big arms and they were fine. Also, the dress is a little on the short side, so if you're a bigger girl and your legs aren't your strong point, you may want to consider a different dress or wear black tights (I wore the tights). Overall, this is a beautiful dress. The color is much more gorgeous in person and I got a lot of compliments. It's heavy and well-made and it was so nice to wear a dress I really loved rather than settling for some Lane Bryant dress that I only bought because it fit.
Love this dress.  Classic Vince.  Soft, casual, flowing and elegant.

No give whatsoever in the fabric - curvy girls size up - I'm 5'2" and it came to my knee which was a shocker since i thought it would be longer but boy was i pleasantly surprised!.  This is a figure hugging gorgeous dress that will break necks all night!
This dress fit true to size for me. Very comfortable, flirty length but not too short for tall people. The back is fun and easy, especially since I could wear a regular strapless bra!
