It was pretty- definitely a daytime dress and very conservative. Not appropriate for what I rented it for, but nice all the same! Not a showstopper by any means, but the embroidery was well done.

I love this dress, it has a great fit and a nice stretch to it! It is about the length on the model on me. I would prefer a bit longer so I may do a size 8 next time. I'm wearing this to work right now but It would be great for a lot of different things!
Loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it. I think the color was really beautiful. The open back detail was really fun too.

I have rented the same cut of this dress just in a different print and LOVED it so was excited to try this dress but when I received it the sizing was smaller than the previous dress in the rib cage area.

Amazing material just suggest always sizing up.

I rented this dress for my boyfriend's Military Dining Out this Christmas season. The festive red color is stunning!  I loved the ease of this dress; just slip it on and add some statement jewelry and you are ready to head out the door.  The material is soft and doesn't wrinkle even after driving an hour in the car.  My only regret is that I ordered a 2 and a 4.  The dress is not very fitted in the waist.  I wish I could have ordered the 0 and the 2 just to see if the 0 fit closer.  The 2 ended up being great though because I could move comfortably in it and required no special undergarments.  Overall, this is a stunning dress.  My boyfriend wanted to buy it for me so I never had to give it back! Get ready to stand-out in a sea of little black dresses this season and take their breath away!
Elegant for any type of occasion.

This dress was stunning and fit very well - true to size (I wore the 4L). I typically wear a size 4 or 6 and the size 4 fit perfectly.  The cut of the dress is very slimming and I think works for a variety of body types. If you're on the curvier or bustier side though I recommend going up a size since the built-in corset fit was a bit snug. The lace detail is very delicate and pretty and garnered a lot of compliments. Would definitely recommend!

This dress was beautiful and heavy material which made it perfect for a formal event. I have a larger bust (34D) and had to pin the opening at the bottom so the girls were not hanging out. Besides that, the dress was comfortable and looked great! Love the slit on the bottom.
Fabric has stretch and is thick enough to cover flaws. Was comfortable and easy for dancing.

Loooved this jacket. I've put on a few pounds in recent months (hello, freshman 15 all over again) and I've had a hard time finding clothes I like on my new frame but this jacket was fantastic! The cut was insanely flattering and it added a WOW factor to even my most mundane looks. The jacket is made out of a thick, stretchy, material. Because it is stark white, it does show every bit of dust and dirt. In other words, don't turn your head too far right or left if you're wearing make-up and want a clean collar. I was unable to zip the jacket over my DDDs without exerting quite a bit of effort but I preferred the casual open-look anyway. I would definitely rent this jacket again!
It was a little tight on top and I tried to get the regular length, but it wasn't available.  the L worked with the heels that I was wearing.

The dress was very comfortable and flattering. Got complements all night. I'm only 5'2". I wore 4" heels and the size 6 petite length was perfect! I also got the 4R in case but that was a bit long. I wore a racerback bra which worked fine.  I would totally rent this dress again.

I wore the 4R. It was more fitted than the pics I saw in the reviews, but I liked that. I am 5'4" and 130-135 lbs, and it fit me perfectly. If you are full-chested, you may want to go up a size. It was pretty fitted across my 34B chest. You will want to wear high (4") heels, because it is long. I will likely try to find this outfit somewhere to purchase it!

The dress was a perfect fit!  Loved the simple lines, and sophisticated styling. The navy color stood out amongst the many black dresses that were worn to the event.  I love this dress - the fabric, the flair, the peplum - it was perfect!

I can't praise this dress enough! Beautiful, outstanding color. I walked into an upscale restaurant in Houston and felt all eyes on me. If you're a little chesty, this dress flatters the décolletage, and the fabric is stretchy and forgiving if you eat too much. I wore it for a first date and pretty much got a marriage proposal. My cousin later rented it and had the same dazzling effect. Get this dress. Get noticed.

I rented this dress for a "Winter White" themed cocktail party and could not have been happier. This dress fits true to size: I'm between a 6 and an 8 and, due to the neckline and sleeves, went with the 8 to fit my broad shoulders. The dress is lined so no slip needed and the fabric is divine and so well structured.  I highly recommend this dress for your event.

I have a long torso and slightly wider shoulders so the cami was a little short, and the shoulders a little tight but it looked fabulous with a fair of black pants and kitten heels. I got so many compliments.

This dress was incredible! For my first time renting from RTR, I was more than happy with everything. I ordered a 6, with a 4 as my backup. My typical size is 6 and it fit perfectly. I wore the dress off of the shoulder - it was the perfect combination of sexy and elegant. I have another wedding this weekend and am tempted to rent again... yes, I loved it THAT much :)
Run a little large and was a little worn out but worked out.

I was so excited to wear this dress. Im in between sizes so I ordered a size up to ensure the proper fit through the cut outs. I should have ordered this at least 2 sizes larger. I consider myself to be lean through the midsection area, however the cut outs served as  pockets that highlighted my fat as it squished out of both sides. I also ordered the long which was still pretty short. Overall this dress runs small and in my opinion is really only for those with small B cups or A. 
The fit for me was so bad that no matter what I did there was no way I was walking out of the house with it on. 
Its beautiful but beware

LOVED this dress for my Vegas bachelorette party!  Perfect white dress to wear out with a little sparkle without being too short or form fitting.  The dress doesn't have much give so I sized up just to be comfortable which was perfect.  I received tons of compliments all night.  I would highly recommend this dress!!

I got lots of compliments when I wore this to my friend's baby shower.  The color is REALLY bright and beautiful (much brighter than the photo shows).  The peekaboo back with the bow is also incredibly sweet.  The reason this 4 out of 5 stars is because the poofy bottom is just too poofy and not slenderizing.  Please note that it runs really big, and that wearing a bra is not possible due to the backlessness.

I wish i would have ordered the small and medium.  I would have liked a tighter fit.  I wore this to s black tie optional wedding and was worried it wasn't fancy enough.  However the wedding was outside and had a somewhat casual feel so it ended up being perfect!  The material is very comfortable and giving.  I'm tall and this was the perfect length for me.
About to rent this one again.  It needed ironing as the material easily wrinkles.  But this outfit is SO flattering.  I wore it with a nubra.  Got compliments all night.
Straps on the back were slightly large, buckled at the sides a bit. A bit baggy in the bust, could have gone with a smaller size.

Fit like a glove, hugged in all the right places, bottom is super flowy (perfect for dancing), and the color was sooo pretty in person! I didn't wear a bra due to the neckline, so that might be an issue for someone who needs/wants to wear one. Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better bachelorette party dress :)
Fits true to size. Perfect length and just the right tightness. Material is thicker, so it was perfect for the early spring type of weather.

I thought that the dress fit wonderfully however a little tight in the bust. The small (my normal size) fit best in the bust, however seemed to be a big loose everywhere else. Great dress for the party. Received many compliments on it!
I didn't wear this dress, but it was beautiful.

This dress is amazing! It was so unique and eye-catching. It photographed beautifully, and I received compliments on it all night! This is by far my favorite rental so far - I did not want to send it back!

The dress was very comfortable and looked great.  I did not read the reviews carefully enough though as I missed that it was backless.  I ended up using a wrap all evening to compensate, which worked out fine as it was a bit chilly anyway!
dress was brand new with tags. definitely good for cooler fall days as the material is very thick.

This was PERFECT for my friend's Gatsby/1920s-themed party. The fit was right on and it was comfortable. I was sad my fur wrap didn't come from RTR in time to complete the look, but the dress was perfect on its own. The sequins and beading are right on par w/ the era and I added black stockings topped w/ a bow and cap-toed pumps to match! Add deep black eyeliner, a feather headband and pearls and you're good to go!

Rompers are always hit or miss for me since I'm 5'11' but I gave this one a try--it is super cute, very well made but unfortunately it was too short waisted for me and didn't look right.   The overall fit seemed true to size though.

Nice deep navy color.  Fabric wasn't overly dressy so I paired with contrasting bottoms  (narrow leg in grey). Collar rides up in back and snug to back of neck so shoulder length hair would probably get caught in it.

Simple but elegant! I wore this to a black-tie gala that I hosted for a charity fundraiser. It was a little big in the waist but still looked great! I loved it. I'm renting another fun dress for a formal party on Oscar night. LOVE RTR! So easy to wear and return!

This hybrid sweater/sweatshirt is so comfortable. It is a nice weight for the Fall or Spring in the Pacific Northwest. I like that it is a little longer on the sides to cover your hips but shorter in the back so it shows off your tush. I think I might have to buy this one!
The top was very cute but, unfotunately, I couldn't wear it. I hoped by sizing up I could accomodate my larger chest size (34DDD) but it did not. Definitely meant for smaller chest.
This dress was perfection.  Super light, comfy and fit like a dream. Got so many compliments all night long. I am large chested (32D) and still fit, although I did pin it just in case!

This is the perfect dress for an athletic pear-shaped figure! I'm a 4 on top, 6 on bottom so dresses are usually too tight around the hips/quads or too baggy and shapeless through the shoulder and midsection, but this one is a real winner! It fit perfectly on top, and had plenty of room to move in the bottom without looking big and sloppy.  The length was work-appropriate without being frumpy. I loved that the material was thick enough that the dress didn't need a slip/liner...they create too much static cling in the winter when worn with tights, but not too thick that it couldn't be worn in fall/spring as well.  And those pockets... they are awesome and the dress still manages to be sleek despite them. I was hesitant about the color when it first came...it's definitely more of an orangey tomato red than a true red...a color that doesn't usually look good on my pasty complexion, but it did look nice since my skin is tanned from a recent vacation. If this came in blue or green, I'd have to buy it despite the hefty price...it's that close to perfect!!!

I ordered this for a girls weekend night out. I am a 10/12 on top, about 5'8" and the size L was perfect - it has a beautiful drape, is a little longer and looked great with skinny black pants and sandals and delicate jewelry. I didn't want to return it! The v isn't low - I have a D chest and I was covered. I would definitely rent this again!
Loved this fun little dress - it was perfect for a more casual rehearsal dinner.

ML dresses just fit my body perfectly. I'm smaller in the bust ( B cup) with a bit of a tummy. This dress offered enough support to go bra-less (and I rarely feel comfortable enough to do this!) and forgive my problem areas. The color is vibrant and the open back detail is stunning.

With such a unique neckline and print, this Trina Turk dress is so flattering and chic! The cut of the sleeves are also fashion forward yet in certain positions are rather tight. Therefore, running true to size, we recommend sizing up for backup and if you’re curvier or have a fuller bust to size up for your primary size as well. It is fitted at the waist and the hip with no stretch in the fabric. At 5’5, the hemline hit me between mid-thigh to knee length. Pair with nude accessories and strappy heels to work or your daytime event!

It is body hugging so if you don't like a little va-va-voom I wouldn't recommend it. It had just the right amount of cleavage for me but if you are bigger busted you might want to get one size bigger than you think.

This dress is perfect for a night out. I wore this dress out in Vegas for a fun night out at the casinos and it was the perfect number. The material also has a little bit of give in it so you don't feel like you're trapped in a dress.

I read a lot of reviews saying it was short, it definitely was.  If you aren't walking a lot its totally doable.  We walked around a lot and i was pulling it down constantly.  That was the only minor flaw.  Other than that it was super comfortable, very very flattering.  I didn't want to give this back.

This is the ultimate in figure flattering.  If you're at all self conscious about your middle section - DO NOT RENT or be prepared to enlist shapewear.  I got several compliments on this dress and felt like a million bucks in it too.  I slipped it on from the bottom up as there is no zipper.  The bust is also very fitted so be aware as you order.  I selected the smaller size as it laid nicely across the top whereas the 40 gapped.  I paired with 4 inch black heels and simple clutch.
This dress hugged me in all the right places. Even though the dress covers up well on top, the one sided sling look is really sexy, showing just enough skin.
This shirt is a heavy material and has a really fun pattern. It's great for events or a night out.

Pros- Very classy and sexy, not to heavy
Cons- It was tight around my arms , and the bottom kept catching on my heels
The slit is pretty high, doesn't show off any cleavage. Sophisticated, but maybe a little too boring. Needed great earings or necklace

I'm 5'2" and it will drag the ground if not worn with very high heels. When walking it has a nice train effect flowing out behind you. It's very easy to tie in a knot like most maxi dresses if you must wear flats. The slits on the side will show some side-boob so beware if your event isn't friendly to that. Overall I loved this dress and wish I would buy it. The colors are much more vibrant in real life and the pattern is awesome. I wore it probably 10 times because I liked it so much.

This dress fit me how I wanted to, but some may find it to be a bit snug. I did wear control top hose to smooth things out. Careful with what you choose as one pair made my skin showing in the cut-out unflattering. With a high heel, the length was perfect. Great dress!
Great lovely summer look. Better on vaca as the wrap does not cover a large chest! True to Rebecca Taylor

I got so many compliments on this one.  Very well made and perfect for Fiesta in San Antonio!  It runs a tad short - came just to the top of my jeans so you will show your belly unless you have higher waisted pants on but don't hesitate to get this one!  Super cute!

This dress fit beautifully! It was comfortable, I didn't have to wear a bra (score!), and I loved the back.  It was easy to move around and play in.  The only downside was that the length was super long so we had to hem it with safety pins. Thanks RTR for a great experience!

I LOVED this dress. It's something I never would have thought I would wear, but a friend talked me into it. It fit perfectly in my normal size 6. I am not confident about my tummy, and I was worried this dress would be tight and unflattering, but it's not. The bow hides a lot, and the material is stretchy and hugs curves in a nice way. I got a million compliments on this dress and felt like a million bucks all night. My only complaint is that I had to pull up the dress a few times, but if I had slightly bigger boobs it wouldn't have been a problem.

I loved this dress and got tons of compliments at the wedding I attended.  I ordered a size 4 & 6.  I'm about 130-135lbs, definitely a 4 up top, but my hips/butt are more of a 6.  The 6 was way too big.  The 4 fit but was a little tight in the hips.  There is a slip underneath the dress which was tight in the hips, but the outer material was not.  The top part was a little big and I had to secure it under the arms with double-sided tape.  It was very comfortable to sit, stand, and dance in.  Pockets are always a plus!
I love the coat in the picture, but in person the bottom is much fuller and the coat looked childish on me. I think it would work better on a taller person (I'm 5'3").

I loved this dress. The fit was stretchy and flattering, and felt extremely comfortable all night. It was a little different than anything else I've ever worn, as I don't usually wear bold prints, but I wound up loving it. I was worried about it being too hot on the dance floor but it was actually great to dance in as it didn't move very much. 10/10 would rent again!
I'm a little short so it dragged a bit but heels helped. Overall the secret pockets and the entire dress was extremely flattering.
Size S is too big for me.

Absolutely stunning dress. Rich red color with a nude underlay which adds a very muted, classy element. 

Both sizes fit, they just fit very differently. The 2 was a bit more comfortable length-wise and in the arms. However, I felt like the wow factor in this dress was in a fitted bodice and in the lacy neckline. For that reason I went with the 0, as it was a much better fit around the middle.  I did have to sacrifice some comfort and a LOT of length, especially sitting. I'm a bit curvy, and I wonder if it might be a little dreamier on a straighter body type.

As stated in other reviews, this is a popular dress and the lace was a little beat up, especially around the neck. It did bother me on the hanger, but actually not noticeable once the dress is on.
 Great experience with RTR, as usual.

Really true to size but the flowing skirt really left enough room for my hips (which is great for my pear shape). I have slightly chubby arms and the sleeves were snug but not uncomfortable The bodice is structured enough to feel secure and supportive but there's still enough give for you to be mobile and to dance. I'm on the shorter side but this dress was a good length with 3 in heels.

Stretchy - lots of give.  Very long, as you can see from picture. The petite version was not available. 
Glamorous. I did need a strapless bra and a little shape wear as it was stretchy material.  No issue on the arms - the gown did not fall down at all, even when crazy dancing.
if only this dress is in a petite size, then the cut would be perfect. But because it was meant for longer torsos, it kind of accentuated my tummy. I still got compliments, though.
A bit itchy since it has wool. Runs large.
Can be worn in warm (with sandals) and cold (with boots) weather.

I wore this to work all day and got away with the sheer panel (not very noticeable but give it JUST enough edge), then to a formal cocktail affair in San Francisco. No wrinkles; it wore very well for some 10 hours total! The hemline is just gorgeous -- very unique. I wore my hair up & changed in to sparkly earrings to make it a bit more formal and it did the trick.  A woman told me I was the best dressed person there... and this was a high society event.  Would definitely recommend.
I rented one size up to be more comfortable.  Loved this one!! Endless compliments and it photographs great!

Quite form fighting, hugging every curve. Tight in the bottom, petite was perfect length, need to make sure the ruffles are properly lined up in the front to not look distorted. The bodice is high quality and makes wearing a bra very unnecesesary, even for me (30E!). Heavy material. Was an incredible dress! Highly recommend for a black tie type event. I wore 2" pumps and didn't have to worry at all. The Regular was way too long for me (5' 0")
wore it with skinny jeans to work - an easy fit, but I imagine it would be tight for larger busts

I wore this for a dance competition. No regrets. It had some wrinkles that were easily removed with steam. It was true to size. The fabric was pretty light weight. The shorts were a perfect length. My legs looked lovely in this suit.
True to size but definitely not as fitted as it appears on the site. Longer than expected - probably better for someone who is a bit taller.
Great drape of fabric ..High slit in front ..paired w knee high boots..great winter look :)
fit perfectly
Definitely too low-cut for work wear, but made for a cute date dress.

I wore this to my best friends bridal shower down the shore. The fit was absolutely perfect and spot on! It does cut low in the front, but the adjustable "x" straps in the back help with that. The length was perfect, and it hugs you at the waist but in a flattering way. Will definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone!

Got so many compliments on this dress that I wore for my bridal shower.  It runs large, I usually wear at 8 and the 6 fit me and maybe could have done the 4..  Loved the material!! The bottom is swingy and has some structure to it.  Great for full bust, hourglass, pear shape.  Wore a regular bra too. A+++

I received a lot of compliments on this dress! The overall fit was pretty good. The top was a tad big and a little too much cleavage for my taste but it was easy to pin.  I ordered a 10 and an 8 and the 10 was pretty  much perfect. The only thing I would change was I wish it was about an inch or two shorter. I realize being a shorter woman, this is why it was a bit longer than I would have liked. I was very happy with my rental and had a great experience with RTR!! I will definitely be doing this again. :)

I felt super comfortable all night in this dress, and contrary to other reviews, I had no trouble with the neck clasp. I will say that while I never felt that the dress was tight around my neck, I did have a very distinct line around my neck at the end of the evening from the neck line. Other than that, I really enjoyed weraing the dress and was able to dance all night without feeling exposed or having to constantly tug and pull on it. I was glad that I ordered the 4L as my back up size. I am 5'8" and since I was planning on wearing heels, the 4L was definitely the way to go. I definitely recommend this dress. It is fun, flirty, and extremely flattering!

I loved this dress! I ordered the 2 and 4, but didn't even try the 4 on. The 2 was a little tight around the arms/neck, but not uncomfortable. The dress is pretty long, so I wore 4 inch heels with it and that worked really well. The dress is stunning - probably my favorite dress I have rented. Highly recommend!

This was an emergency replacement dress, however it was the perfect dress for me. As a replacement Long was my only length option. This eas a barefoot gala and I was concerned about the length, but in the end, it didn't matter I never tripped over it. Thos dress also accentuated my curves. You definitely are able to wear a strapless bra if you feel the need.

I felt extremely glamours and received many compliments and turned many heads!
a bit tight in the bust

I was surprised upon receiving this dress bc it has a cape. I was unsure about it at first but it was so flattering on my curvy figure. The front of the dress is form fitting but the cape hits just right flattering your hips/rear. I was so comfortable in this dress all night.  It runs true to size but I may also suggest sizing down for your extra dress as the size 12 was a bit big in the chest area for me.  I received tons of compliments and felt beautiful in this dress.

I'm inlove with Alexis! All this designer's lace dresses are just so classy and feminine! With the off shoulder look, not only is the design in season but how it falls is just lovely! I'm bloated when I wore this but the size still gives me room to move and very comfortable! I paired it with nude strappy heels and a statement necklace from Nocturne! A must rent!
The fit was a tiny bit snug but it's fun to wear and so easy to match
I rented this with unlimited and wore a white button up underneath for work. Cute and comfortable!

Loved the back of this dress! Loved the lace detailing and length. If you have a shorter torso and/or carry your weight around your middle, it can be a big unflattering on the waist. If empire waisted things look good on you though, you're solid! I played it up with pearls and red heels.

So I was very skeptical, since this dress seemed to look best on small sizes (0, 2) and I'm in between a 6 and 8. 5'4", 135 lbs. The 46R fit me perfectly, including the length with 4" heels (no dragging or danger of tripping). I wore this for a black tie-optional work event and I felt very comfortable talking to colleagues, bosses, and bosses' bosses--the lace overlay camouflages any cleavage--yet I could truly enjoy how much the dress flattered my body and felt SO BEAUTIFUL. The ruching hides quite a bit and the fabric is nice and thick, so you can get away without Spanx. I was truly sad to take this off at the end of the night and stuff it into the return bag. Btw, it's actually pretty easy on/off; just step into and out of it. The only thing is that the sleeves tend to travel on your shoulders. The model wears the best look (like an off the shoulder type style) so...just avoid wild gesticulating. That's it! If you are on the fence, rent this dress and you will not be disappointed!!!
Feminine , work chic look that would fit any body well. A must rent!

Loved this dress but it runs VERY long, and due to the 2 layers it cannot be taped up. I wear only a 2" heel at most, but even with 5" stilettos it would have been on the ground. I returned it for another dress that fit perfectly including length.
I expected this to be flannel.  It was ok.  I didn't like the static factor but it was cute with jeans and fit true to size.
Great fit.

This dress fit well!  I tried both the size 2 and size 4 and could have worn either one.  Very comfortable dress and easy to wear. I absolutely loved this dress!
Update: I rented this dress a second time for my husband's work party. At 125 pounds the size 4 fit much easier!  I really wish this would be available for purchase!
I usually wear a 10 but the 8 fit great! Wore a strapless bra because you can see the straps through the lace.
Thought this ran small.  Medium was too snug & too short, not how I like my sweaters to fit!  But it is very pretty, was bummed I couldn't wear

This was originally my 2nd choice, however, the 6R fit like a glove and I'm pleased I chose it as a backup! I'm 5'5'', 135 lbs., and have an athletic build. The material was stretchy, making it easy to move. The way it was cut in the waist was flattering. The length was just right when I wore 4 1/2 inch heels. Even when my feet hurt from dancing, I switched to flats, and the length didn't hinder me from walking or dancing. This dress was slimming, modest, yet sexy.
I love this jacket for any occasion.  Can be dressed up or down.  Has a great fit with beautiful details.
The fit was very flattering however the cut was waaay to low. I had to sew it a little to make it more presentable otherwise I would never have worn it.

I am completely in love with this blazer! It is tailored to perfection and looks good with just about anything.  I have paired it with jeans, a skirt, wide leg pants and a dress. It has worked with every single outfit and is so much fun to wear. I have gotten a ton of compliments on it - so much so I don't want to return it!
Loved it
The xs fit perfect.  I'm quite petite so hard to say if it ran small or not. It was a snug as is intended for this type of body con fabric, which somehow ends up being super flattering

I'm 5'9" and ~130 lbs.  I have a relatively thin, athletic body and it was very comfortable and flattering.  The back is gorgeous.  I got lots of comments about how beautiful the dress was.  I got a 4R and could have used the 4L.  It has a small train in the back (small) so if you back up, be careful :)  I'd recommend this 5/5 stars!
A little long even in heels, but it was still a great dress.

I don't know that I loved it but it was a decent dress for a fall wedding. I had to size up due to the tight sleeves but other than that it was fairly flattering (I'm a bit twisty in the photo so it's hard to tell).
It felt HUGE. The lace up part seemed really large and in the way. It wasn't the style I thought I was going for. I would suggest you order a size down or your smallest size.

Tons of compliments, I'm pretty short (159 cm) and it was a tiny bit long, but I'm also busty and the coverage ws great. 
It's perfect for daytime. I paired it with red lips and buttoned it all the way for a whimsical look :)

Wore this to my best friend's brother's September wedding in Connecticut. Dress runs small and is a snug fit (but so flattering!), so I wore the 8 instead of my usual 6. The 8 had some open stitches in the back slit - someone must have moved too much and ripped a few - but I was able to quickly stitch them. I wore shapewear underneath for my own peace of mind, but it wasn't completely necessary. Didn't need to wear a bra, which was an unexpected perk! Great dress in comfortable, medium-thick fabric in a seriously flattering color.
so cute, very comfortable fabric.

I wore this jumpsuit to a Bachelorette party in Miami, FL.  We were asked to all wear black and I wanted something different.  As expected, most girls wore a LBD and one other girl wore a romper.  My jumpsuit stood out as different which I wanted.  I typically wear a 4/6 so I ordered the 6 and 8.  I tried on the 8 first and it fit.  (I wondered if  I had tried on the 6 though, how it would have fit.)   I am in a post-baby phase (baby is 6 months) so things don't fit like the normally do.  I typically wear a size 4 but my current body is a 6.  I  wanted something that would show off areas that looked good (my arms and upper torso) and this romper did not disappoint.   It was nice/snug fitting on the top. The bottoms had a little more space.  Jumpsuits are usually questionable from the backside and I thought this one fit better than most.  It was not tight, but did not give you that droopy but look either.  I did cuff the bottom of the pants so it fit at a desired length since I am only 5'4".  Since this fabric was much heavier than I originally imagined, the cuff stayed put throughout the night. Overall felt confident. Happy with purchase.   Other girls gave me compliments. :)  I am quite the dancer and was glad I was able to dance without worry.  Only issues is the bathroom disrobing...but expected.

This dress was surprisingly low cut. The lace, sleeves and length are all really sweet and feminine but the low-cut front makes it decidedly sexy -- too sexy for some occasions! I wore this for an anniversary dinner with my husband, and he commented on my visible cleavage and obviously liked that, but it made me a little uncomfortable while out since I'm not used to showing that much. I would not have worn this around family or colleagues. The straps are long and that makes the front even lower; if I'd owned the dress, I could have shortened the strap and it would have been more tasteful, but obviously that's not possible with a rental. A bit of the lining on one side of the bust kept rolling over and showing slightly over the edge, which wasn't a big deal but it wasn't perfect. The dress definitely runs a size small; I normally wear a 6 and ordered an 8 based on reviews. I wouldn't have fit in my normal size, but the 8 was great. The dress is well-made and the fabric is lovely. I would recommend if you're OK with showing off some cleavage.

This was a back up dress sent by the go-to girl as the dress I wanted was not available.  I loved it!! I do think that I am more of an 8 although I wear a 10 in  anything that is tight around the bust.  I am 151 pounds, 5''6", 36C, and I normally wear a 6 in pants and an 8 dresses.   I could have worn the 8 in this dress as the straps were loose.  This dress is stunning and I honestly did not get a photograph that was good enough to post.  The fabric is beautiful and shiny.  My entire RTR experience was perfect and am ready to do it again!
comfortable and flattering

I had some problems with the zipper, even on the hanger it was very tricky to zip up. I had plenty of room for the fabric to close on my body and it was extremely difficult to zip up on the body and on the hanger. I also thought it was a touch long. I am 5'5' and had 3 + inch heels on and ordered a regular, it was a little long and i needed to lift it some when tackling stairs. Other than that, I loved the dress. I dont normally wear strapless much but the sweetheart cut works great.

I was worried this dress would be too short, but it turned out to be perfect.  When I put the whole outfit together, I felt like I looked exactly the way I wanted to for NYE!  I felt amazing in this dress, but only gave it four stars because I didn't think it photographed as well as I'd hoped.  It seemed especially unflattering around my midsection (below my waste/above my hips) in photos even though I thought it looked great in person.  Still, a fabulous dress!  Just make sure you suck in where you need to for photos :)

This dress is super tight!!! It rides up while I walked but I didn't mind (I just kept pulling it back down). I loved how snug it was at the top because it made me comfortable enough not to wear a bra. I would rent again.
Fit wonderful!!! Not stiff or tight, just right.
A little long otherwise perfect.
stand out dress!

I RENTED THIS FOR MY DAUGHTER'S HIGH SCHOOL GRADUATION CEREMONY.  I LOVED THE COLOR OUT OF THE BOX - SO SPRINGY AND FUN!  THE LACE WAS JUST RIGHT, TOO - NOT OVERDONE, BUT DRESSY AND PRETTY.  THE FIT WAS A LITTLE OFF FOR ME - THE 8 WAS TOO TIGHT IN THE RIBCAGE AND THE 10 WAS BIG UNDER THE ARMS AND THROUGH THE HIPS.  I WORE THE 10 WHICH MEANT I WAS COMFORTABLE ALL AFTERNOON.

Wore this beauty to an outdoor wedding in Texas. The dress is a little thick for Texas heat, but wasn't terrible. I ordered a size 8....it was huge and had a tear in the back of the dress, and the size 6 was a little loose as well, but I made it work. The pockets were perfectly placed and so convenient to slip my phone into in between pics when I was away from my bag. I wore blue satin heels and carried a purple clutch which made the subtle purple in the dress pop!!! The dress is perfect for curves and hides any and all imperfections. I will rent it again! Love!!!

Fell in love with this dress. I wore it to a gala event, and I received SO many compliments! It fit perfectly, and it made me feel flawless. I highly recommend it! It's tight yet stretchy. If you plan on wearing high heels get the Long.
no cons yet....so far just pros
The dress runs a bit short. I am usually size 4 but I had to wear size 6 because of the length.

The dress was stunning in pictures! I received so many compliments on the dress and the amazing color. In a sea of dark dresses, this stood out in a classy way. The dress stretched out slightly and I had to pull it up a lot towards the end, but it wasn't too bad. Would definitely rent from RTR again!

I liked this dress overall. The fit was a little off for me - the hips were tight but the bust was a little loose in the medium and sizing up to the large made the bust and arms baggy so I stuck with the medium. The dress wasn't constricting which was great for dancing.

Loved wearing this top. It's a beautiful pattern with a great construction. I was surprised by the fact it is just a cotton material.. nothing too fancy. But I would wear it again. Not my current situation, but this would be a PERFECT top for someone who is in the early stages of pregnancy and trying to hide it. The construction gives the shirt a sort of A-line silhouette and doesn't touch your belly - but still very flattering.

This Kate Spade dress is adorable!  I'm a shorty, but with 4" wedges, the length was good, hitting at the knee, and though there is no stretch through the bodice, the 6 was comfortable, with room to breathe.  The color is amazing, and the full skirt made me want to twirl.
I'd like to wear again. Fit great!
No cons to this dress.  It fit perfectly, did not look worn at all, and I got compliments all night at my sister's rehearsal dinner!
The size 22 fit perfectly because I have big arms. I normally wear a size 18 or 20, but overall the dress fit perfectly but just a little short because I'm 5'9.

Loved the look of this and was eager to wear it. On me, however, it might have come across a little too "farmer's daughter." I think it would work better on, frankly, a slimmer, more petite woman. The fit was spot on, but it felt like I was trying a little too hard. I still give it 4 stars because I feel like my reaction is totally subjective, and the dress is cute, summery, and fit well, so I don't want to deter others.

I chose this dress as my last option because all my other options were already
reserved. But I can tell you I couldn't be happier. The fit was perfect, the dress
received a ton of comments.
I'm always happy with whatever I order from Rent the Runway.
Again Great Choice!
(Sometimes zippers on all seem to be difficult to zip, maybe from useage?)
Fit was true to size,  bottom was a little heavy but nothing a 3 inch heel couldn't fix!

The dress is beautiful on the site, not so on me. I'm between 14-16 sizes, so I got one of each. I actually fit into both, but they were both regular and I should have ordered a long. The fabric is heavy, but I liked it because it flowed over my curves. Definitely needed a backless bra. I didn't wear it after all, but I wish I could have. I returned the dress and have a credit on my account for a future rental.
LOVED this dress! Wish I could've kept it. Very flattering. Easy to eat, drink, and dance in. I used temporary hem tape to shorten the dress about an inch, since I am only 5'3. Highly recommended!

My original dress did not fit so this was the "panic" dress. I can't say the fit was my favorite but I did love the pattern and the material. The 10L probably would have fit better but it was not available. This dress literally arrived 3 hours before my event. 
There is a lot of material on the top and I felt it made me look larger than I already am. If I had some prep time, I think double sided tape would have done the trick. The length was good even with inch heels and that never happens when you're my height!
this was my favorite dress that I have rented from RTR.  I loved it and wish it was hanging in my closet.  I wore it with black heels and red jewelry.  LOVE this dress!

I just had my son, and then 4 months later I had this black tie wedding. I loved this dress because it had a nice stretch to it and the pattern was very flattering. Before my son I wore a size 10R, after my son I wear a size 12R, this fit perfect with a little wiggle room. (I am a 36DDD and hips I am a 12 in jr. jeans) 

Con- the sequins under the arm itched a little but nothing that caused an issue.
The waist fit a little loose but with the ruching, it was not noticeable (and very comfortable).

This is the perfect everyday jacket! It is so easy to wear and it is so comfortable! If anything, it runs a little small, but I'd say stick with your typical size. It is just a plain matte black so it's really easy to match with, which is so great. It's pretty light, so this isn't Winter-wear, but it's perfect for a chilly Spring/Summer night or a warmer Fall day. I see myself renting this lots of times in the future!

I wore this dress to a family friend's wedding and it is an incredible dress. The color is gorgeous, and perfect for fall, and the shape is super flattering. I ended up wearing the 4R rather than the 2L because I liked the length better  (I'm 5'7" and was wearing 3.75" heels, you could see my toes peeking out), but the 2 fit as well. Would recommend sizing up as a backup, especially since the waist is not stretchy. Highly recommend for a black tie event.

I didn't wear this as I am not into the western wear look, I didn't really get that from the picture but it really wanted me to own cowboy boots!  Fit was very flattering, fitted mermaid, I got the 8 thinking I'd need it for the bust but 6 would have been fine, seems true to size with room for a chest.  Probably better for a date or evening than day wear.

pretty, nice heavy fabric. runs almost 2 sizes too big, however because i usually wear a 8-10 and wore a 6L, it was slightly short in front and too long in back.  was still slightly loose in the bust, would not recommend for small bust.
It fit perfect and I had no problems. It was comfortable and sexy.

This dress was gorgeous! It fit so perfectly, the train wasn't too long, held it at times to dance, but not a problem at all! Pictures come out great in this dress because of the metallic sparkles! Definitely recommend :)

The pockets are perhaps the best feature of this already incredible dress. I actually saw another girl wearing it just this past weekend (different event) and she looked great it in as well. I think it would probably look good on anyone who tried it on. I've never received so many compliments! Most people kept telling me to buy the dress and not return it, haha.

I'm 5'7", 34A-28-35, and long-waisted.  Dress was big on top and a bit stretched.  The sticky and elastic didn't hold great, so the over the shoulder hold was very helpful.  Tight on the hips, so I'm glad I went with a 4 instead of smaller to fit chest.

This dress definitely makes you stand out. I would say that this dress accentuates your curves, so it's probably best suited for girls who need to create that illusion. I am already curvy and muscular, so I was a little disappointed that it made me look heavier. The plus side is that it is very comfortable and easy to wear. I had no problems with the sequins scratching or catching my hair.

I loved this dress! It was a bit too formal for the wedding I was at, but I just rocked it and it was fine. Keep that in mind, though, when choosing it. It also was too long, so I should've gone for the petite as the back - up, being only 5'4". The dress was amazing and I'm pretty sure I was a walking/ talking ad for this website haha. These are just some tid bits, but should not discourage you from getting this gorgeous number!

This dress was perfect for a work event - simple and easy, and weather appropriate for a cool spring day (it's quite thick and wooly).  The one I got had a kind of uneven hem - it wasn't sewn quite straight and I also had to use some fashion tape to make the lining stay under the hem of the fabric.   Fit appropriately loose but was on the verge of being too short - wore flats and had to be careful bending over.

I chose this dress because I wanted something different than your typical LBD. Also, I'm 11 weeks pregnant so I wanted something to hide the little pooch I've developed. I'm at that stage where I don't look pregnant, just bloated, and this dress hid it! And because of the cut, I was able to wear my normal size 4.  I received tons of compliments!
Fit perfectly, sleeves were a great addition, nice material, great neckline

I didn't end up wearing this even though it was great. It fit perfect other than in the upper body. If you have a tiny chest then it probably will show more of your skin versus looking flattering in the top. Everything else fit good, but I chose a different dress

I went with the smaller size because the dress fits like a glove, however, seemed to bunch up around the midsection so the smaller size seemed to be less fabric. I usually order petite but true to the other reviews, the length was shorter so the regular size fit better lengthwise than the petite ( if you're a shorter lady). When wearing a 5-6 inch heel, you're going to need the regular size. I felt absolutely comfortable and fabulous in this dress all night! I cannot say how much more I am in love with this dress!

I wore this dress for my son's 8th grade graduation.  Both the floral pattern and the fit of the dress just made me feel happy, which is exactly how I wanted to feel on this occasion.  I had been eyeing this dress for a while because I loved the pattern and was waiting for the right occasion to rent it, and this was definitely it.
I am pear shaped/small chested, so I did not experience the tightness in the chest area as reported by other renters. Would totally recommend this dress!

Go 1 size down so that the top fits snug; bottom is stretchy so it will fit.
I would buy this dress; I loved it.

I LOVED this shirt and wish I could buy it. The fabric, color, and print were all beautiful. Only issue I noticed was it was cut a little large and billowy for my personal taste. My chest is 32E/F depending on the bra but I had plenty of breathing room in the medium, would have preferred the small.

I absolutely loved wearing this dress and received many compliments on it. From the color to the fit, I would highly recommend this dress to any woman who is looking for something that will make you feel glam and curvy! I'm glad I got the medium, as this dress is meant to be form fitting and on the tighter side. I couldn't even get the small past my thighs, so go a size up if you're undecided. It also kept its shape all day and night and didn't stretch out like other dresses I've worn.  I didn't wear underwear or a bra, but did wear pasties up top. The dress fits tightly enough that I knew "my girls" weren't going anywhere! Some other reviews said they wore a regular bra with this dress, but the back was too low for me to do that. Paired with some nude heels and you'll be set.

I ordered this dress for a black tie optional Christmas party and it was the absolute perfect choice for that type of party.  It's formal enough without being over the top.  The fabric and color were beautiful, especially for the holidays!  I am 5'6" and ordered a 0R. I wore heels just slightly lower than 4 inches, and the length was great, just skimming the floor.  I am smaller busted and I will say that if you have a larger chest, either size up or consider a different dress because it is tighter in the chest and especially around the rib cage.  The overall experience was absolutely wonderful and I wish I could keep renting this dress in different colors!
Fit VERY snugly, and I probably could have used a size up, but it wasn't available. I made it work with some spanx. Had a tendency to ride up a bit. Overall the dress is very comfortable!

At 5'5 (almost 5'6) I was nervous that since the 0 L wasn't available that this dress would look silly with my heels. I like VERY big heels and the dress looked perfect! I was comfortable, don't remember any itching  and had no issues with the dress. It was very clearly a well worn dress by other ladies, but who cares- less for you to have to worry about. And you couldn't tell unless you're actually staring at the dress up close. I ordered my dress last minute & there was confusion about my backup- RTR sent me a third back up free & expedited it AND sent chocolates for their error which was really super minor and understandable a week or so prior to NYE. Absolutely amazing customer service & dress across the board!
I wore it with bigger earrings rather than any jewelry on the dress. Very slimming!

Oh my!  This dress made me feel so glamorous and truly beautiful - it fit like a glove.  Being 5'2" I was surprised to find that the 0R and 2R both only required a 3 inch heel.  I was planning on wearing my taller shoes because gowns tend to be way too long on me, but without shoes it just grazed the floor. I ended up going with the 2R because it just felt more comfortable - I tend to be between those two sizes in other clothing as well. At the end of the night, we changed into Halloween costumes at the wedding and I was actually sad to take the dress off.  If you're considering it, rent this dress!
LOVED the Color!!!! Definitely a smaller fit and not as much give in fabric as other dresses. So many compliments though and was comfortable to dance in

This dress was perfect for a Valentines Day wedding in February.  It was different but not to different.  It fit true to size.  I am 5' 3" and 125 lbs and I wore a small.  It is a little warm when you start to dance though!  My only other feedback to while sequins look amazing that got caught on everything.  I stuck to myself and my sister (who also rented a sequin dress) all night!  But overall I am very happy with my first rental!
Great fit; buttons down the full front; tie cinches the waist as much as you'd like. The lower half has a lining. Loved to wear it with flats and later on with heels.
So comfortable and cute - got lots of compliments, and didn't require a bra!
I couldn't wear a bra based on the cut of the straps so I didn't have the support and felt a little flat. I did get lots of compliments though.

Wore this to a nice dinner celebrating my 5 year anniversary with my fiance. Not only was he blown away, but 2 people stopped me on the streets of NYC to complement me on it. My fiance insisted that people were staring at me the whole walk to dinner. Super comfy jumpsuit too. I couldn't love it more.

The dress (size 4) fit perfectly! Very comfortable, and allows for dancing. I have an athletic build and am usually concerned dresses won't fit up top (they are usually too big), but this dress was fantastic. Loved it, and received tons of compliments.

First of all, RTR contacted me the day this dress was supposed to ship and said it was no longer available. They suggested I select a different dress, but of course being the day before my rental was to start the selections were very limited and nothing looked right or exciting. I had really been looking forward to renting this dress. That was frustrating, but they did agree to send my backup size anyway since it was available. Thankfully (?) I'm a bit bigger these days and the backup size fit perfect. 

I agree with the suggestions to size up for backup. The dress has no stretch. The bodice is tailored, fitted and very flattering. The skirt starts at the natural waist and is really cool. I loved the galaxy print, it's really pretty in person. 

I was a little concerned that the front of the skirt would be inappropriately short, but it wasn't. I was very comfortable sitting and did not have to cover my lap. Overall, this was one of my favorites I've rented and I would rent again (if it wasn't so $$... got it at a discount).
I loved this sweater. Soft and fun. I just wish it were a liiiiittle less cropped, because even with very high waisted pants, I was showing a bit of skin.
The green color of the jacket is really elegant. Paired well with casual outfits, but I could also see it dressing up nicely for a party. www.kayleighharrington.com

I wore this dress to my fiance's Barristers Ball for his law school and I got so many complements in this dress! It's the perfect color of red, and won't wash you out even if you're fair skinned like me. I went bra-less in the dress and didn't have any issues with it being too sheer (even in pictures with flashes) or when it got colder in areas where it mattered. On the sides (under the armpit and towards the back area) it was slightly more sheer, but still not problematic. It was perfectly flouncy and flowy and just the right length. I wore Jack Rogers with it and it had just the tiniest bit of drag on the bottom, so if you're shorter you could definitely do heels with it.

The dress is gorgeous. I got compliments on it all night long. My beef with the dress is that the zipper sticks. It stuck on both sizes, in the same spot - even when I was not wearing the dress. I had a panicky 10 minutes when my husband tried to zip the dress for me right before we needed to leave.

This dress is incredible. It's comfortable, beautiful, unique, and moves wonderfully on the dance floor. Someone even asked me if I had it made for me. I was able to wear a normal strapless bra with it, although the bodice does fit snugly. Excellent for pears because their is ample room in the hips.

I love this dress from the moment I open the delivery satchel. It is much more gold in person and is covered and pay yet. The color is true gold. This was perfect for my 007 casino royale party. I got tons of compliments because if it was like a glove. Are usually wear a size 12 and the actual large gave me room to dance. There is no give in this dress and it can be a little warm because it is lined, but with spanx it was perfect!! Tons of compliments. Wish I could buy it.
Great little top.   Runs pretty full. Color is actually a little off white.  It does wrinkle easily which was a surprise based on the material.  I would rent again for a casual evening out.

I rented this dress to wear to a family Christmas party and to the ballet a few days later. It arrived with tags still attached! This was a perfect dress for winter, the fabric was thick and warm. I received so many compliments on this dress. I wanted to keep it!

I ended up not being able to wear this to our annual house party due to weather, but it is stunning. The color is perfect for summer and the shape made my body look incredible. The just was perhaps a little large but there's no way I could have sized down in the waist. Definitely recommend.
It was also incredibly comfortable, but if you're anxious about your stomach area, you might want to add spanx. I did and felt awesome all night.

herve leger dresses are my very favorite, as they always fit so beautifully and feel so good.  the fabric is heavy and the dress is weighty.  it goes on very tight, but once the material warms up, it stretches perfectly to fit my body, and is so easy to wear.  no spanx, no bra -- this dress just holds everything right where it should be.  the ombre greys are gorgeous, and having the darkest color at the waist is brilliant.

Wore this to my graduation gala. The dress is SPECTACULAR - the color is vibrant, and the fit is sexy yet class (hugs to curves). It's a little long, but I just wore my mega-heels and was just fine. Everyone complimented me on the dress, told me it was the best one of the night! I felt like a goddess in that dress, was so sad to let it go.

I am a true size 0 and this dress ran big. I had to wear it with a belt for a more flattering fit. I love the scalloped lace on the neckline, but it was a bit frayed/bent due to normal wear/tear. I am 5'0'' and wore it with 4 inch heels, but it was still a bit longer than I had hoped. Overall, I would recommend it for a girl that is a bit taller and bustier!

I loved this dress so much, I bought it! It is fitted through the top and is very flattering on the bottom with the flounce. It is a tad shorter than I like to wear to work and I felt self-conscious sitting in it in a room full of people. When I wear it again to work I will wear it with tights. Overall, I highly recommend it.

dress was beautiful! received several compliments! it was a little longer than expected - good w  4" inch heels....
will definitely rent again! thanks RTR!!!

This dress is beautiful and super comfy. The material is THICK but I didn't sweat more than others did at a hot mid-July wedding. It's very stretchy so it's good for various body types (i'm between a 12/14). My only issue was with the off-the-shoulder flap around the arms riding up. You may want to pin it down to avoid it riding up OR just tuck the flap under your arms for dancing. Lots of compliments and very fun/different!

I've been renting from RTR for my daughters various appearances as a Texas state teen title holder and haven't missed a delivery date or been unsatisfied with our choices yet! There's always something appropriate for her to wear on RTR. Other's always comment on her dresses and can't wait to try RTR for themselves when we tell them about it.

The color really popped, and the ribbon in the back was a cute touch.  It was a little warm for a party in July in Florida outdoors, but it was a beautiful dress and I loved wearing it! There is no stretch to it, so the sleeves have no give, nor does the dress so I would recommend getting 2 sizes.

I had initially an unfortunate shipment in that both of my items had a tear!   RTR made it right however, by over-nighting a perfect piece just in time for the wedding!!!  I got a ton of compliments and felt very pretty all night!!  Necklace was rented too!   Thank you!!
loved the style, chic.

The dress was so beautifully crafted, and felt so classy and elegant. The two was a little big on me so I wore the zero. It was the perfect color for an outdoor summer wedding. I loved this dress and didn't want to give it back!

i'm into the shape of the top. it is tight around the chest, but flares at the bottom and is a little longer in the back. it is v figure flattering. i'm usually a 4 and the small fit me fine. if my chest was any bigger it wld start to pull at the buttons though! the one i received looked worn. the white is no longer as white, which happens over time. this particular one may be ready for retirement, otherwise, highly recommend!
Great dress.  Looked really nice (didn't look cheap at all) and recieved compliments during the night.  HIghly recommend for something a little edgy at a formal event.

Score - this dress arrived with the tags still on it!. It is so comfortable and flattering, I don't know if I will be able to part with it. It's the perfect summer dress that can be dressed up or down. I hesitated to rent because based on the model's pick, I thought it might make me look thick through the middle, but it actually looks better on my curvier body type.

This dress does not have a lot of give and tends to ride up. The back has an interesting rectangular open shape but it gaped on me at hte bottom unless I yanked down hard on the skirt to keep it flat. I didn't end up wearing this dress because I was going to be sitting at a wedding and it looked bad from the back.

The front abdomen area also sagged on me but the pattern made it hard to notice. I don't know if this was because the dress is worn out or it's a design flaw. It doesnt seem like the kind of dress that's supposed to have movement. It looks GREAT in photos from the front.
Wore this for my bachelorette party and received SO many compliments!! The material is thick so it was great for a fall evening. I could not have been happier with this dress!
I wore this my first night in Fort Laurderdale. We went to a low key patio bar event. This was an easy piece to dress up, comfortable and stylish.
The fit was perfect

I wore this dress to my birthday brunch in NYC. It is fun and very girly. My husband said the colors reminded him of Christmas lights which I thought was great! As with other Badgley Mischka's that I have rented, I found that it ran just a little small. I mostly noticed it in the arms. Unfortunately, they did not have my backup size available, but I was able to make my size work. I loved it and would definitely recommend! Lots of compliments.

Sticky zipper that required some effort to close without catching loose threads, but a stunning dress! I agree with those who said it was long on them. Despite ordering my usual size, I was definitely tripping on the hem and had to hold it up a bit. The lining is the right size, but the outer chiffon layer is longer. The bones do their job and I didn't need a bra at all. A great rental!
Lovely cozy sweater coat that was perfect for throwing over fall outfits - the overall weight of the thing is rather shocking. It is HEAVY. Loved the leather piping and big front pockets.
This dress looked much better in the photo than in person, at least on me. It was slightly loose and looked unflattering and dowdy.

Rented this dress for a party. I got an 8 because there was not a 10 available. I usually wear an 8 in BCBG, so I though it would be perfect. This dress was in perfect condition and absolutely beautiful, but tiny. There is zero stretch in the material. I had RTR overnight a new dress and it too was beautiful. They were very helpful with the return.

Beautiful fabric and rich navy blue color! Lots of compliments when I wore it for my 30th birthday party. I'm 5'8, about 140 lbs, and the 6 was definitely a little short in the back for my liking without tights. I wore it with black tights and it was perfect, though! Love the comfortable but stylish fit of the top and the faux-wrap.

Overall, the fit was great. I am 5'2, so it is difficult for me to find jumpsuits that aren't too long. I have a short torso, so the straps were a little long and I had to keep pulling them up. That was minor though compared to how great the jumpsuit looked! I didn't wear a bra, but you could definitely wear a regular bra if you need more support. Would definitely recommend!!

Overall the dress fit well and was comfortable enough to dance in for the whole night. However, I did not like the length of the dress. I'm already 5'7" and it went to my shins, which I felt was very awkward. Also, with it being a full sequined dress, it may scratch your arms a bit by the end of the night.
A little tight in the hips (but I have hips!)--very comfy, good length, love the color! Already rented again :-)
I have an athletic build and this dress is extremely flattering for that body style.  Got tons of compliments.

The dress fit amazingly. I received lots of complements. It's a little too low cut in the breast area, definitely needed tape to hold the girls in. It ran smaller than expected. I ordered size 12 and had to wear the backpack size 14. My only complaint is the stitching on the zipper was coming apart and I didn't know until I was at the event and someone pointed it out. I would definitely rent this again!!

Negatives:
The dress is beautiful.  the tulle should have been a bit pouffier, but it was kind of flattened at the bottom.  Also the zipper was stuck and I had a really hard time getting it zipped.

Positives:

GORGEOUS, CLASSY, ELEGANT Dress - got many many many compliments.  Fits true to size, and very figure flattering.
Nice fit, Very low and a bit revealing, Straps were either stretched out or just too long. The material sucked everything in. Very flattering.

I wore this dress as a bridesmaid for my friend's wedding and was very happy it worked out so well. The color was wow, the fit/length was perfect (I'm 5'9" and wore 3.5" heels), and I felt sexy- but not inappropriate for the special occasion. Would definitely rent again given the right occasion.
The material was nicer than I expected. Looked great on. Loved it!

I was a little nervous because the only size available was a 10, but it fit perfectly. I received a ton of compliments and really loved the color. The lace on the dress is more of a gold and it looks really delicate in person.

I wore this dress to a formal & loved it! This picture was unfortunately the best I got for the night, so it doesn't really do the dress justice. I felt comfortable dancing in it and didn't have any issues with sequins snagging. The only thing is that the shoulders of the dress aren't very snug. They would slide down every so often, but it wasn't a huge issue and could easily be fixed. I definitely recommend renting this, I would again.

I'm 5'5" and with my 4" heels I wished I ordered the 8 long in stead of 8 regular. The tips of my toes and some shoe were showing and I like my dresses to hit the floor. Tight in the thigh area so to get in the car I had to sit down first them spin in. The mesh parts were not that revealing as a small busted person.  Overall, a winner of a dress. Tons of compliments. Really makes you feel sexy.

There is a seam right at the waist that made me look pregnant, not to mention i couldn't wear a bra (I am a C cup and the ladies would be flopping around) and it was very very short!  Beautiful dress, but not a good fit.
I asked for and 8L but it was damaged and they sent me the 10L. It was very comfortable and pretty, but way too big at the hips.
I wore this to a black-tie optional wedding last May and it was beautiful.
Fantastic color, appropriate wedding length - not too short when sitting - flattering fit.  I got lots of compliments.
Loved this dress! It was incredibly slimming and the length worked perfectly. One tiny thing - the arms were quite long, but I just rolled them in and it was fine. LOVED!
Can be awkward with sleeves underneath the sleeves so better wear sleeveless underneath

I ordered the 8L and the 6L. I am about 5'10" and I have an athletic build. Weirdly enough, the 6L fit better than the 8L on me. My only issue was the zipper. It got caught on the track and it took several people to get the last inch or so up. The sequins rubbed on my underarms a little bit, but it wasn't too uncomfortable. The dress fit tightly right under my bust, but fit fairly loosely from there down. This was my first RTR rental and I will definitely be renting again. All in all, the dress fit great, and I would 100% recommend renting it! You will turn heads and your date won't be able to take his eyes off you!
Loved these, but I never thought I could pull off a size XS. These are large, and boxy, but so cute!! Size down, for sure.
The dress fits well and is flattering. It is a tad long. At 5' 7", I wore 3" heels and it was still fairly long. Definitely was worth the rental though, I loved it!
This was just a fabulous fit and oh so pretty!  It honestly couldn't have fit any better.  I am 5"6 and the long fit perfectly with 2 1/2 3 inch shoes.  The color is a very deep navy (almost black).

This dress was beautiful. I rented it for my NYE party. I received a lot of compliments. My fiance loved the color. The dress is almost a rose gold, so my peachy-hued fair skin looked good. Now, for the issues, I'm curvy on the bottom but not large at the top. I didn't get the fashion tape, which now I wish I had. Because of my smaller cup size, I could have actually gone down a dress size to a 6, and it would have been a better fit. I had to safety pin the panels together, so as not to flash my guests. All in all, I would rent the dress again, but go down a size. Gorgeous color and those sequins sparkle so beautifully!
Not a good fit for larger busted women, especially petite.

I was starting to get anxious, because it was only two nights before prom when my dress came in the mail.  As soon as I put it on, I knew everything about it was perfect: the length, the fit, and it was super flattering.  When the big night came around, I felt like the star of the show.  It seemed like I was famous with the amount of compliments I was getting.  One mom even told me that I had "won best dress"!  I couldn't have imagined a better night, or a better dress.  10/10 would recommend for everyone (especially girls with a few curves ;) )
Beautiful dress by DVF that fit me perfectly. Hugs your curves in the right way, but the fringe detail on the bottom hides any problem areas.
Honestly fit great, and was very comfortable. Got tons of compliments. Couldn't wear a bra but wasn't even an issue. Definitely my favorite dress I have rented so far

Fits very tightly. The 4R and 2R fit similarly besides length. I am very petite and have a full bust and this dress held everything in while being flattering. A little long but was fine with tall heels. Slit is just the right amount!

I received this dress as a free backup because one of my previously selected styles became unavailable. Fortunately, but also unfortunately, I did not need to use this dress. However, I did try it on and loved it! The fit was amazing...I almost made my husband take me out again just so I had an excuse to wear it! Only complaint is that the lace looked EXTREMELY worn, to the point that it looked dirty, almost. If the fabric was brighter and looked newer, this would probably be the perfect dress. However, because of the worn look, I'm not sure that I would pay to actually rent this dress again--bummer!
My friend was going to wear this for her bachelorette, but went with the alternative dress because the other one was a bit more festive and fit her better. Cute, though.
This is the ultimate vacation dress. I wore it to brunch with sandals and to a nice dinner with heels. Highly recommend it.

I have only good things to say about this dress and my first experience with RTR. Every other girl who wore this dress looked stunning, so right off the bat I was convinced it was a winner. The shimmery bronze-y color really made me stand out at the fall wedding I went to, and the cut was sexy but not risque. In certain lights there was a purple tinge to the fabric but I love that aspect of it. Obviously, the pockets are a huge plus, too.

The top part fit great and was very flattering, however, the bottom is very loose & baggy on me and comes to right at the middle of my knees (not a flattering spot) .  I know I'm short (5'0") but on the model it's showing the dress hitting waaaay above the knee.  If it was a little more fitted on bottom and a little shorter, I would love it.

First off, this is such a fun dress and is absolutely gorgeous. I had a ton of compliments from complete strangers the entire night.  I am smaller on top and larger on bottom. I am 5'3'', have a 34 inch bust, 28 inch waist, and 39 inch hips and the 2 was almost too big on the top. I would definitely size down if you are a "pear" with a smaller bust.  It was such a fun dress and I loved wearing it!

It was just too big for me - I'm usually a size small, but the small hung like a sack on me. I'm petite but very hourglass, and if a dress doesn't show my curves, it just looks like I'm a block. For reference, I'm 32D, small waist, normal hips.

Runs small on the back/waist which made my stomach and back look larger and lumpy. However, the shoulders and the neckline felt tight. Not the most flattering dress on me so I had to exchange it for a different dress. I am crossing my fingers the other dress looks great on me if not I am out of luck!
Great fit! Very cute!
Amazing color- so vibrant. The fit is very flattering. I was 10 weeks pregnant at the time that I wore this and it covered my mini bump perfectly. I got so many compliments on this little number
But it runs large, especially the waist.

I wore this dress to my friend's bridal shower and it was a hit! Love the shape and colors of this dress! Also, pockets!! The fabric has a linen/cotton feel to it and worked great for this daytime event.

This dress is really beautiful the pictures don't do it justice. I didn't realize it was neoprene which made the skirt full and perfectly standing.
I got so many compliments on the dress, even men were asking where they could buy this dress for their girlfriends.
Worn with green YSL tributes, it was the perfect pairing!
True to size, very flattering.

I love this romper, I have rented it several times. It's perfect for a vacation because it travels so well. I find that it runs bigger up top and I typically size down to  accommodate that. The only tough part is that the buttons in the back require a friend. Pictured is me wearing it super dressed down to a sporting event, which I then changed my shoes and wore to dinner later on.

The dress fit really well and was beautiful in person. It ran true to size, the only issue was that the straps were WAY too long. I had to safety pin them down to keep the dress on, and had to deal with that all night. Otherwise loved the dress and got a lot of compliments on it at my work holiday party.

I didn't wear this blazer because it was too tight on me. I couldn't move my arms.  I usually wear a 4/6 and ordered a size 6. If I ordered again I'd go up 2 sizes to a 10. 

Its a beautiful jacket with great texture.
Fit just a bit small, I usually wear a 2!

I wore this to a work holiday party with a pair of tights and I was comfortable all night. Loved the high lace neck, open back and color of the dress. Looks just like the picture on the model. Fits true to size.
Arm holes were a little large, but other than that, pretty true to size.  I liked it so much I had to buy it!!
The dress was a little big up too, but that's normal for me. It was still wearable. It fit great and was true to size. I felt so glamorous and got several compliments.

This is a beautiful dress, however I would need a petite in order for it to fit properly.  The size was ok, I probably could have used a 4, but the entire dress is made for someone with a taller frame.  And the straps are quite chunky because of the gathered sequin fabric.  I did not wear this dress.

This dress definitely runs on the small side. I have a 34DD bust, am 130 pounds and usually wear a size 2 dress. All the reviews that I read said this dress runs small, so I wanted to get the size 2 and the size 4 as a backup. Unfortunately, the size 4 was sold out so I had to get a size 6 as a backup which would've been way too big. The size 2 fit me, but it was really, really tight, especially in the chest/stomach area. You don't need to wear a bra with it which is nice. The 4 probably would have fit me perfectly but I was able to get away with wearing the 2.

This dress was perfect for my 30th birthday party! It was comfortable, fun, and even has pockets. It was short enough to be sexy, long enough to be functional. The bodice is really flattering and also comfortable. I wore it with a multi-colored statement necklace and it worked out great.

Pros: luxe fabric and details. Eye catching print that's even better in person. Lovely colors for fall.

Cons: just not flattering on me. Sleeves were baggy and v neck seemed to aging. The tennis skirt was a little short for work but the rest of the ensemble wasn't good for a night out. Overall beautiful quality but not practical or special.

This is a great fabric. I'm 5'6" (almost 5'7") and the high waist and low hem were just a little too much for me. I still loved it, but think it would have fit better if I were just a little taller. When sitting, the skirt can open a lot--there is a slip underneath but you may be more comfortable with tights. There is NO give in this fabric. Wear it to a standing cocktail party, but don't plan to wear it to sit all day at work or at a long luncheon or dinner. (I was uncomfortable between the opening in the front and the very tight, high waist. I got this as part of unlimited so did not have a back-up size, but the 8 would have fit better (not sure if the length might have been a problem). This is an absolutely fantastic skirt, but be prepared for a tight waist.

Fun and flirty!  This blouse was A-MAZ-ING!  It ran true to size and it did not have any stretch.  It was sleek and sophisticated.  I would absolutely recommend a strapless bra.  I felt very comfortable in this, even though it was strapless.  I wasn't constantly adjusting or pulling it up.  A statement necklace would totally complete the look!

Loved this dress! Material was thick and I thought the cut was flattering. Wore with black tights, booties and a long necklace. The thicker material was great for a colder event in December. Would rent again.
May run a bit small - I vary between a 4 and a 6 in dresses and the 6 fit me perfectly. Fabric is fairly stiff (jacquard), flattering and comfortable. The cap sleeves make it special.
Very comfortable! Wish it was longer, with my height and heels the dress just hit my ankles. Wore  spanks under but no bra as it has extra lining and support in the chest.

I rented this for a schmancy date night/birthday dinner with my boyfriend. We went to a brand new jazz club in town for dinner, drinks, and jazz and wow! I felt like the star of the show! I got so many compliments on my jumpsuit!

It fit perfectly - I have hips, a butt, a chest... Everything for a curvy girl and wow did this fit perfectly! It was so flattering and hit everything in the right spots. The fabric is very soft and initially felt very heavy, but the way it is cut allows for good breathing room and as well the weight of the fabric helps it hang perfectly when you stand up, or move. 

Additionally, and this was a big one for me, it was very easy to get in and out of by myself! I do wish the zipper itself was a bit longer for easier gripping, but once I had the jumpsuit on and the fabric warmed up, it was very easy for me to get to in and out as needed!

I absolutely loved this and would 100% wear it again... and again and again!

Rented for a birthday weekend getaway. This was my first time renting, and this was the perfect choice! Dress did run larger than anticipated. I wish I would have rented a size down, instead of up for my back up size, just to compare the 8 to the 10. Overall, fantastic dress and will be renting again soon!

You have to keep your arms at your side mostly, and i'm used to bending my arm for photos, so i had to adjust that.  Otherwise, it was comfortable and i got soo many compliments!!  Pretty long though, I am 5'8 and wore 5 inch heels.
Wore this to work in the summer. The fabric is high quality, light, and breathable. The length is appropriate for the office and i got a ton of compliments. Would rent again!
Heads up, the shirt is a little thin so you may want to wear something underneath if you're not comfortable. It fits really well and the tie looks great!
I LOVED this look!
Wore to a wedding in VT. Beautiful dress, fit great, was comfortable & received so many compliments! Highly recommend especially for petites as it is a good length - not too short or long.

I rented this dress for Easter Sunday. I got so many compliments. My boys (husband and 8yr old) and I wore shades of blue and this was perfect. I have a full bust with a curvy bottom so the fit n flare style always fits great on me. I loved the design and the color is gorgeous. I wore it with a strapless bra otherwise the strapes will show. I wore tan/camel colored wedges and switched to cute black and gold sandles later in the day so there's lots of options for shoes: wedges, black or nude strappy heals, cute sandles or flats. I wore really cute long playful earrings that I also rented; I didn't want to over power the look with a necklace because the design on the dress was so pretty, I wanted the focus to stay there. I'd rent this again for sure. My mom said I should buy it.☺️ I loved it.

This dress is so perfect for layering! I wore this while I was trying on lots of sweaters and coats and it looked perfect with almost all of them! It's basic, but flattering! It does have some stretch, but I'd say it runs a little on the smaller side.
Perfect dress! HIGHLY recommended
The dress is beautiful! I wore a size 0. The material is thick, and I was comfortable on a relatively cool Arizona night.

This dress was the real star of the party - beautiful silhouette, color and shine. 

I usually wear size 4/S but this dress is running a bit small (I wasn't able to zip it up completely), so I had to resort to my backup dress which ran in M.
