Overall it fit great, however, the deep plunge was a bit tricky since I don't have a full bust. Wearing a regular bra didn't seem like the best idea, but a silicon bust enhancer helped. What is really great about this dress is that it was successfully able to cover my "apple" tummy (I'm a skinny apple though, so most of the clothes can do that). No spanx needed!
I wanted to love this one, but it fell a bit short of expectations. There's nothing wrong with it, but there's no wow to this. It's just a nice, fairly ordinary top.

I wore this to a banquet dinner for my husband's work and all the wives were sporting the plumes! I really loved this dress though. It felt simple to wear but was not ordinary. Sometimes,  you just like to wear red to stand out a little and this dress was a successful tool. Very comfortable to wear and I didn't need any special bra or anything.
Super Comfy and Cute! Easy to wear and could dress up or down.

I ordered this to wear for Thanksgiving and was very happy with the dress. I am currently pregnant and found this dress easy to wear early in my second trimester. It is short as others have mentioned. I wore it with tights underneath and would have felt uncomfortable without them! Adorable!

It is a beautiful dress! The rose gold color is stunning! It is comfortable to wear and you can wear a regular bra & panties with it.  I wore it at our country club for a formal party after my husband's golf tournament.  It was a hit! I recieved so many compliments! I would rent this dress again and again!

This dress was very short. The fabric would ride up when walking etc. The 6 fit better but the 8 was a teeny bit longer so I went with that dress. Overall I wouldn't rent again as I felt I was trying to pull it down the whole night. Great print, but just too short. Ps I'm 5'11".

I rented a completely different dress that became unavailable, so the stylists at RTR chose this as a replacement.  When I first saw it, I was horrified (I avoid peplum like the plague).  But then I tried it on and was amazed at how great it looked on me!   I wore it to a work event and then didn't even change before meeting friends out because I felt so good in it.  And it got tons of compliments too.  One woman even had me unzip the back enough for her to make a note of the designer!  This is a very slimming, flattering dress.
The dress fit great overall.  It was a little loose in the chest but you couldn't tell! It was a great length for tall heights it hit me about mid calf. I would highly recommend for any shape.

I needed a fun, fashionable, but comfortable dress to wear to a fashion show fundraiser that I was running.  This dress fit the bill.  I was able to wear it with flats, since I was running around, and it still looked cute and put together.   The stretchy top made it easy to move around it, and there was a lot of bending, lifting, carrying and running.
slit up the side added a sexy note to an elegant dress. got compliments all night. boning in mid-section helped keep everything in place.
I wore this to a Halloween wedding and it was perfect. I got compliments all night and will no doubt rent this dress again.
Got a lot of compliments on this dress.  Was very comfortable and concealed problem areas.  Highly recommend.
Cute, but runs very large

I wore this for a black tie wedding.  Being on the short side at 5'2 and having to pick up the dress in the city I was traveling to for the wedding, I didn't want to risk a dress being too long.  I HIGHLY recommend this for shorter people!  Typically wearing a 2 in nice dresses (in general an XS or 0/2), I ordered a 0 and a 2.  Because of the way the fabric folds in the back along the zipper, the zipper was very difficult.  We couldn't even move the zipper on the 0 and luckily the 2 worked.  I did have to pull the dress up through the night, but the size 2 sure worked (and I fit a strapless bra underneath).  It was perfect and stunning!  Looked more full length with my height.

I rented the 4 and the 6. I was sure I was going to wear the 4, but when I walked around in it at home I noticed the under arm area was slightly constricting. I sized up to the 6 and felt a lot better. All night I recieved many compliments on the dress. I was happy to have chosen this dress, not only because it looked great but it was so comfortable.

I'm glad I got the larger size because it fit perfectly. I usually wear a 0 dress and this one could have worked but was just a little to tight in the arm holes and a little too short for comfort. Size up! It was a timeless style and I am considering renting it again in the blush color for a different event!

Great dress with a stunning color. I got a ton of compliments and loved the pretty lace! Some of the lace was fraying at the bottom of this dress which was a bummer but really nothing that anyone would have noticed besides me
GREAT color! Show stopping shape! Gorgeous neckline and enough to show off your shoulders. Was a little short for the cut in the back (dress hung a little too low) but overall a great wear!

I ordered this dress in sizes 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 4 because it was more flattering. The waist detail is nice and accentuated my narrow waist. I'm heavier at my thighs, but this dress covered it right up and just highlighted my hips instead. The flower overlay is really beautiful in person and also allowed some airflow on the hot summer day.

Loved this top. Super simple but cute. It runs a bit large, even with larger busts. It's also really long, so make sure that's the look you're going for. I paired with jeans and wedges to dress down. You can also dress up very easily to wear to work. Super light and perfect for summer weather.
I should have gotten a size down - the small was way too low in the front, and the fit was baggy. Beautiful color and details.

A size 6 fit me perfectly, just snug enough to be flattering, but with plenty of room to move, breathe, and all the other essentials.  Somewhat flared skirt accents waist. Material is lovely, very soft and silky. The pattern and color are both beautiful - subtle but with enough detail to make it interesting. I'd definitely recommend this dress!

I KNOW its a shift dress but goodness its a bit tight in the hips/tush area. I'm glad I went with the 12. I felt like it was maybe a little loose in the waist and chest but all in all it was great. Perfect sleeveless dress for one of the first warm days of the summer.

I rented this dress for my birthday and LOVED it. (One of my friends told me I should just keep it and buy it.) It was classy for a late fall/ winter celebration yet still was sexy. The colors in the skirt part are bolder in person, making it gorgeous.

I wore this dress to a funeral--yes a funeral.  I had been feeling down and wanted a pick me up to  just lift my mood for meeting and greeting tons of people over the course of a very long day.  This dress was simple yet stunning in its detail and fit. The 4 was the only size available when I ordered and when this dress is on and zipped up it fit perfectly.  However, ladies beware of your hips and your chest when putting this dress on and, especially, when taking it off.  The dress is tapered at the waste and that's exactly where the zipper ends.  If you have curves of any kind, you will want to order one size up to help prevent a panic attack (no you will not get stuck in it for life). :)

Beautiful dress and true to size. I am 5'9" so ordered the long. However, I barely got away with 2 inch heels in this dress which was very surprising to me. The material doesn't scratch your skin, something I was also worried about. The dress doesn't "cling" to you so it is very flattering. Overall, very happy!

Rented this to wear to a friend's rehearsal dinner.  I'm about 110 lb and 5'3," but shorter on the torso side and this fell around my knee same as the model.  Another reviewer wrote that she needed double-sided tape for the front wrap  piece which I used to help my tie it in the right spot but then removed it.  It's definitely not something that should keep you from renting it if you're on the fence.  The sleeves are silk chiffon and very light, it's flowy, so it's lovely for summer (I wore it in early August during heat wave and was fine).  The fabric through the mid-section and waste are a tad thicker so undergarments don't need to be too particular.
The neck hole is decently tight, so I would size up one. If you have a small chest, you can get away with no bra (always a plus). The pleats are so fun and I got tons of compliments.

I ordered a size 4 and 6 as a backup. I wore the 4 because of how flowy the dress was and it worked well. Like other reviewers stated, the neckline is a little tight so beware but otherwise great dress! I don't normally wear pink or print but I ended up really loving the dress.

Beautiful gown. Felt like Beyoncé at the Grammys the whole night! 

It was too long for me at 5'0 with 3 inch heels.
I sized up and it looked perfect.
Had a hard time giving it back! Really flattering.
Wonderful fit - true to size.  Received tons of compliments. The shipping was easy and my consultant was helpful and genuine.
True to size and a very beautiful dress. Elegant, stylish.  I felt like a princess in it. Perfect for Easter celebration
This is a fun dress! It was comfortable and a good fit, I am 5'4" and it was a good length! I could wear it for any occasion! Will rent again!

Fit: Ran a little large. Even with DD breasts, the top was still pretty loose. I had to have a friend tie a ribbon around the straps to tighten it. Without it, there was a bunch of extra fabric underneath my armpits. Once it was fixed, I felt classy and sophisticated. 

Fabric: Heavy and well-made! It was beautiful.

Overall, I loved this dress! I received a ton of compliments. The halter style was sexy without showing too much skin. Loved the open back detail!

This dress should just be renamed "Vegas" because it was perfect for Sin City.  I wore this out and received compliments, looks, etc. but still felt SO comfortable. I felt more comfortable wearing the stick on bra, but I wasn't able to hook it in the front - it still worked just fine and once this dress was on, nothing moved.  Classic Herve and I am so glad this dressed lived up to my expectations!

I loved this dress. It was perfect for winter with the long sleeves and the fabric had a nice weight to it. It was great for my small bust (32B), and it really accentuated all the things I like about my decolletage. The size 2 fit perfectly - I didn't even bother trying on the size 4. The sleeves were a bit snug and required some adjusting to make sure the seam was in the right spot, but once I got that right, I didn't have to adjust the dress at all for the rest of the night. Also, the length was perfect for my 5'3" height with the addition of 4" heels. I'd highly recommend this dress!
I typically wear a 6 but the 4 fit better.  Comfortable. The lace shoulders didn't fit perfectly and it winged out a bit.
This fit very well and I loved the color and fit!  Would rent again

I normally wear a six, but I wore a 4 in this dress. Even though I am only 5'6" the long was the right length. LIke the description says, the dress does not have any give - you'll need to have the right size for it to fit. I have a relatively straight body shape and this gave me curves!! I got so many compliments on the dress throughout the night - I felt like a movie star!

I loved the lace and scalloped straps! Very feminine. I wore this to a friend's 4th of July wedding and got a lot of compliments. Only con was I should've worn the 2 instead of the 4 - it felt a little loose in some areas. Other than that, it was a beautiful dress!
I have an hourglass figure. I could have easily done a size 10 in this and maybe even an eight.
the dress hugs you and give you a rest shape without being too tight and uncomfortable. color is vibrant and beautiful. I will rent it again
Loved this dress because it was bright and cheerful.  I'm tall, but it wasn't too short

I wanted to wear this dress to run errands and meet up for lunch. Unfortunately, the length didn't cut it. I usually do a "bend test" before heading out of the house, and this dress failed. For reference, I'm just under 5'8". Because the piece is on the casual side, I'm finding it difficult to figure out when would be a good occasion to wear it. I might be sending it back without actually wearing it, or accessorize it with a pair of capri leggings.

I rented this dress as well as the black one just like it. I ordered the 4R and 2R in this gold one. Before I left to go to Florida before the ball I tried on the 2R and it didnt fit my boobs so I figured I would have to wear the 4R which was a little too long but at that point I didnt reallly have an opition since the black one I ordered was also a 2R. Well the night of the ball I put on the 4R and it felt a little bit bigger than i remember from 2 nights before when I tried them on but I decided to try it out for a little while....10 mins later I went up and tried the 2R to see if maybe it would fit and to my pleasent surprise it DID!!! I wore the 2R for the rest of the night and the length was perfect and I didnt even have to pull it up at all like I was having to with the 4R. Towards the end of the night I really wanted to put on the black one as well just so I could wear it because it was SOOOOO Gorgeous!! I will definately be getting this dress again. My boyfriend is still talking about how great I looked that night. Also I introduced a couple other girls to this site while at the ball and they are super excited to try yall out as well!!!

This was actually a back-up dress that had to be sent because the dress I rented was sent back damaged.  This is my third time renting from rentherunway.com and definitely will not be the last.  Staff was great and supplied the most fabulous back-up dress I could hope for. 

Dress was perfect for black tie gala.  Compliments all night long. Very flattering. I wore a 0L.  I am 125 lbs and 5'9.  It was tight in the waste, not room to give at all - but it fit great. Amazing dress.  I may rent it again for a wedding next month.

I will post pictures once I get them from venue!

It has quite a bit of stretch so I wore the smaller size. I did wear spanx under for my own comfort and confidence, but I don't think it's totally necessary. The neck line is a little bit high so I'd definitely pair it with an amazing statement necklace.

Great experience and easy to ship. I rented it for a wedding. The fit was perfect. The dress hides the tummy thanks to the design on the dress. The fabric has some stretch to it. The bride sent me a message days after the wedding to let me know she loved my dress.
I absolutely loved this dress. Gorgeous color and fit so well!
I got a 38, which I thought would fit but was a bit too tight in the hips for me to feel comfortable wearing it out. I really do love this dress and will order one size up so I can wear it to work.
Very flattering fit, even on my 34DDD boobs. I got so many compliments, both from attendees at the event and people who saw my photos on social media. The dress was perfect!
The only problem I had was getting in and out of a car. The length of it didn't allow my legs to separate enough to step in with ease.

The dress was true to size.   Order for your bra size as opposed to hips since it is fitted at top.   I wore this to a Mardi Gras ball, it was extremely comfortable and although fitted, was easy to sit, move around and dance in.   I got more compliments from this dress than of anything I have ever worn.  If you want something classic that will turn heads, this is it.

I rented the romper for my sisters bachelorette party in NYC at the end of April. I wore the 6 because the 4 was REALLY short - I'm 5'7" and probably would've felt uncomfortable wearing it if I weren't in a dark restaurant and club that evening. I received tons of compliments and really enjoyed the entire rental process. Would wear it again to a similar event!

I'm so in love with this dress that I may treat myself and buy it! It's very comfortable and the material is nice and heavy but still moves well. It definitely runs big, but since it's loose fitting to begin with the size didn't look off. It's a classic fit and can easily be dressed up with heels and jewelry or kept fairly casual for something less fancy. It was perfect for a work event, not too short or flashy.
I got a lot of compliments.  This is stunning on.  THe sleeves and the hemline are fun and flirty yet classy!

Rented this for engagement photos, since our wedding colors are blush and gold. The coloring on the dress looks WAY different in photos than it does in person.(I personally think it photographs better than it looks in person.) Given that the point of renting it was specifically for photos, I'm not mad about that. The pink is very bright, while the gold bounces a lot of light.

I loved the fit of the dress. It was snug to my figure without being too tight - just had to be mindful of whether people could see up it when I was sitting down!

My first RTW and I'm hooked! Comfortable and flattering. Fitted up top, loose in the waist--perfect for my apple shape. I wore this to a fundraiser gala and it was perfect. Loved that I could wear my normal bra.  If you are smaller busted, definitely size down in this dress.

Loved the bottom of the dress and I adored the menswear inspiration—but the waist is very small (with no give/stretch) compared to the rest of the cut and I couldn't zip it up. My fault for not ordering a backup size! The overall quality and material is nicer/heavier in person than what I expected from the pictures.

Absolutely adore this dress! It has such a unique silhouette and the color is so vibrant. Red heads - this dress will really make your hair color really pop! It is perfect with simple high heels, since the dress does a lot of speaking for itself.  Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for backup. The inner fabric is short and fitted. The belt is a bit tricky, but once you've got that, you're good to go! I suggest wearing no bra or a NuBra, and sizing up if you're larger in the chest. Pair with delicate jewelry.

I had originally ordered the 8 and the 10 and ended up wearing the 10.  The 8 seemed to dig into my ribs a bit too much, so I figured I would be a bit more comfy.  The pockets were awesome and so was the color.  I had a hard time sending this one back!

if you have a true hour glass shape and tend to be a little heavier in your hips, maybe this dress isn't the right fit for you. It's beautiful, but - at least for me - was not slimming because of all the roushing in the front and hip area.
Darling dress and true to size. But, beware of the zipper. It will take two people to zip up the dress! It gets stuck in the center.

The dress was beautiful.  I was stopped by many to tell me how much they loved the dress. I talked with style consultant to feel comfortable about getting the right size.  She was wonderful; very nice and courteous.  Answered all of my questions.
The fit was impeccable. I ordered a 2R and 0R and the 0 fit! Which made my day obviously. Hard to find shoes that matched its glamour honestly but that's the only con.
Fit perfectly in all areas. The neckline was pretty tight and could potentially be bothersome, but I thought it was manageable.
Beautiful dress, great quality. The sequins did not scratch, as many sequin dresses do.  I'm 5' 10" and wore 3" heels--the length was perfect. Very classy dress.

it fits snugly in the chest but the rest is perfect.  I wore 5" heels and so the dress hit the ground perfectly.  However, the one problem (as others pointed out) is the zipper, which is virtually impossible to get zipped once the dress is on (and it wasn't just because it was snug!)  I needed two people to help get it zipped!

I loved this dress. Especially because of its pockets. I bought literally every type of bra, stickies to see what worked and for a larger chest (I am double D's) I was amazed by Tidetell Strapless Deep V Wing Breast Pad Push-up Invisible Silicone Bra from Amazon.  It kept me perky all throughout the night and we danced all night.

I got this for a square dancing event and it was perfect! I loved the dress fabric, especially the white tigers.  I gave it 4 stars because, while it was perfect for a country themed event, it felt too costumey to wear elsewhere.  The denim on the shoulders and the large buttons were kind of overwhelming.
I typically wear a size 8 and these fit low around the hips; if I were to order again I'd size down to the 6 so they fit a little more high waisted

I always struggle with rompers as I have a very long torso, and this one was borderline "fitting right" vs "the dreaded camel-toe"...and the pleats are not overly flattering (tends to add a few lbs to the look of your waist.  With that said, the romper received several compliments & the top of it is SO super cute.  Recommend, but tall gals beware and maybe size up one for length.

The ruching across the middle and dense sequins are really flattering. When combined with Spanx underneath it camouflages everything! FYI the dress has no boning of its own, so a super-supportive strapless bra is necessary if you have a bigger bust.

This dress got so many compliments and was perfect for an outdoor California wedding. The color is a beautiful deep orange/coral (not quite as coral as my photo suggests, but deeper than the RTR model photo). The elastic helped ensure a nice fit on the waist. My only challenge was with the back - it's open with a bar of fabric that snaps across. It's supposed to cover your bra band, but it did not fall quite right since the top runs large. Safety pins would have fixed the problem, but I didn't have any on hand at the hotel. I loved that this had pockets, but be aware that you really can't put anything in them without it being very obvious.
Conservative with the high neck while flirty with the peek-a-boo flower detail. Flatters the waist. Fun to twirl. Comfortable for a summer wedding.
Bold pattern, but very comfortable and fun. I loved this dress and almost purchased it except that it will be hard to wear over and over without it being noticeable.

I wore this dress to an outdoor spring wedding with gold shoes and accessories. The cocktail length and vibrant color was perfect for the occasion and also perfect for dancing. The color is closer to red than orange. The top half was very fitted and feminine. I liked the fringe around the bust and shoulders. The bottom part was like a tulip, so it was very flattering for my pear shape. I also didn't have to worry about sucking my tummy in the whole night. I didn't really use the pockets, but I love that they were there. I wish I didn't have to ship it back.
I wore this dress for my birthday event. It fit perfectly and the open back added some extra fun to the dress. The front was a little plain so I added a belt but it worked perfectly!
Loved this dress for a winter wedding.  Wish I owned it!  Fit great!

The Fit: This dress has a little bit of stretch to it, so while I was afraid a 12 might be too small for me, it fit really nicely! It runs a little bit large.  
Pros: This dress is incredibly comfortable. I wore it around NYC for 7 hours and never felt like I couldn't move naturally. 
Cons: It is a little bit short when you sit down, but I used the cape to cover my legs.

Wore this to an engagement party i was hosting. Non stop compliments. Material is a little stretchy, fabric wasnt too thick, but good dress for a fall or even winter event. We were indoors and it was a little warm at times. Runs true to size, i wear an 8 and got a medium. Dress gives the illusion of huge boobs ! Lol overall, very classy, comfortable and would highly recommend. Only thing id recommend is wresting a darker bra. With flash pjotography you could see my lighter bra  in pics.

This dress was perfect. The fabric is thick and comfortable, and was perfect for a cold conference room. The blueish green in this dress is really pretty with the cream, black and grey. Right after I sent this back I was wishing I had kept it.

I loved this dress so much more than I expected to! It did fit a little on the snugger size since it doesn't have any stretch, but I wore it in my typical dress size and I thought it was perfect. It was exactly how I expected it to fit. It was a little longer on me than on the model, but it is still a little short for work in my opinion. Other than the length, it reminded me of a suit dress. It'd be perfect to wear under a cute jacket or sweater.
Wore this for a military ball... Such a gorgeous dress and received lots of compliments. True to size but a little short for me.
gorgeous jacket, doesn't peel. Can dress it up or down.

I love Free People in general so had to try this one. The fabric feels very high quality and love the double layer wrap. I found the fit on this to be a little weird but probably because I'm short-waisted and only 5'3". The top portion of the dress was a little long for me and kind of fell over at the bustline rather than standing up like it does on the model. The ties were also comically long on me no matter how I tied them. The skirt fit perfectly though so I'd say this one is true to size. Overall super cute dress, maybe better for taller ladies.

The dress was great! Only hiccup being the top/bust was too big, but I knew that would happen from the other reviewers. It wasn't super noticeable & didn't really bother me throughout the night. Overall - I highly recommend!

The silk looked a bit worn-out on the shirt I received, but overall I still really loved this shirt. It was comfortable, and has somewhat of a relaxed fit, but it looks extremely polished with high waisted jeans. I'd rent again!

This was a no for me. The coat doesn't have any shape to it so it just seemed to swallow me. I'm shorter so it was way too long as well. It was really a beautiful coat. It was not heavy but the material is still enough to keep you warm.  This is a well made coat. I think on the right person it works, just didn't work for me.

I would have never bought this on my own, but it was a surprisingly flattering fit and cut.  The material is a thick, almost jacquard like material, and the cut is great for petites.  The length was fine with higher-waisted jeans, but may be short on taller ladies.  Perfect for transition season.
Slimming, sexy, extremely flattering. I am in love. So comfortable, felt amazing all night. supportive enough to wear no bra. Love. Love. Love. Does not disappoint. Will rent again.

I am very indecisive and critical, which makes picking a dress impossible. But everything about this dress is perfect. I am 5'8, ordered 4L and love to wear high heels. The length was perfect. The dress fit very snug , but I say that in a good way: grabbed all all my curves perfectly. BUT while it held everything in,  it also had an incredible stretch to it that allowed me to walk freely, take giant strides if I wanted to and dance. Rent this dress, it will not disappoint

Don't know if I've ever felt more attractive than when wearing this dress.  I just float around in it feeling amazing.  Rented it twice now.  Very comfortable to wear, never was worried about wardrobe malfunctions.  Cutouts are very flattering!  I wore this around London and Paris and Italy.  This dress is extremely versatile because if you bring a sweater with you, the sweater can cover all the non-conservative parts of the dress and instantly turn the dress into something very conservative.  Might consider sizing down if you are small-busted and on the fence between sizes, because if this dress is too loose for you on top, you might have to constantly fidget with the top.  It worked great for me, though.  Very comfortable, not tight.

i didn't end up wearing this dress because it didn't arrive in time and there wait a hole on the bottom, but i did try it on. the waist area was fine, but i found the chest area to be a bit large. i did not wear a bra when i tried on this dress. I also noticed i could get away with 4 inch heels.
Loved the fit, I added a belt because I wanted more of a shape. Overall I would recommend this dress as a blank slate to accessorize!

Just like everyone says, it does run a bit small in the bust but it was still a great dress! I have something of a booty so it was a bit shorter in the back than I would have preferred but didn't seem out of place on a hot summer day!

Loved this dress and will re-order.  I'm 6" with a wide rib cage and small bust (36 A/B).  I am 10-12 in dresses normally and wore the 10 (snugger, more flattering fit in the torso).  It is on the short side.  It hit mid-thigh and was great as long as I didn't bend over.  I wore it for 12 hrs - from getting the bride ready til last call - and it was almost as comfy as my yoga clothes.  Got many many compliments.  I recommend pairing it with a blingy statement necklace in the gold/clear glass category because it is dark. Wore it with nude patent heels.

I am typically a true 6. I ordered the 6 and a 4 as a backup. I ended up wearing the 6 as the 4 was a little tight in the chest. The sequins are prettier in person as they have a pattern and aren't just randomly placed on the top of the dress. The fabric of the skirt is beautiful. It poufs more than I expected but it's still very pretty. And it has pockets. I received so many compliments on my dress! The only downside was my underarms got scratched a little from the sequins. It wasn't unbearable but it did happen.

Great flirty skirt but very short! 
Fitted enough in the body and top to ensure no wardrobe malfunctions- overall a great fun outfit!
The chest was too big (i'm 34DD) and the skirt was somewhat bubbly. Not what I expected at all. I have a bit of a belly and it showed every flaw.

Beautiful sleeve details and rich color. Rented a 6 which is my usual size and it was way too short for a work event and it pulled in the hips. I am more pear-shaped, so I would recommend sizing up if you have hips.

I loved this little jacket! It definitely runs small, so size up if you can. I wore it to the airport on my way to vacation and it kept me warm on the plane, but wasn't too heavy. My only concern was that the material itself looked dull, like it had been worn and washed a few too many times. Overall, great to throw over a casual airport outfit, or dress up for date night!

I wore this dress to a wedding this past weekend and it was a hit.  I paired it with some dark plum lip and the Ella Carter Phoenix Choker and it was just the simple touch the dress needed.  The dress was more sparkly than the pictures lead on to believe so it was fun to be out on the dance floor under all the lights.  Another review said the dress hemline looked unfinished but i'm assuming that is just how the designer wanted the dress to look as it is a little more contemporary than regular dresses and it was more than appropriate for the wedding. The only downside is that if you're a dancing machine, like I am, you will get hot in the dress because of the fabric BUT i'd highly recommend this dress for someone willing to take a risk and wanting to keep up with the trends.

This dress is a show stopper.  Only, I am top heavy and it was a tight fit.  I was afraid I would not be able to get into the dress.  Wished I had gotten a 12 as well. The 10 (my normal size) was very tight.
So flatter, the color is beautiful, and the material is really nice and substantial so I didn't have to worry about wrinkling. Wore all day and night and got lots of compliments.

This was not my first choice, but I was excited that they were sending it as my back-up. The fit was perfect, and the poofiness on the bottom of the dress made it a great silhouette. The only downfall was having to purchase a bandeau bra because it was super low-cut, and because I have a large chest, this was definitely needed.  Also, the cap-sleeves seemed a bit tight, but could be easily moved up for dancing.

The dress was true to size but actually really long and I'm not that short!  I had to wear 4" heels so it wouldn't drag on the ground.  It would have been nice to wear flat sandals with this dress instead of heels.  Overall this dress was gorgeous though, I would definitely rent again!

This dress definitely fits like other clover canyon dresses I've worn with that thick material. I really liked the slightly longer length on this one, especially being more low cut. It made it perfect for an October wedding. I will say it felt a little tight for the formal church ceremony, but was perfect for the reception! Both the small and medium fit, but the small was more flattering.

This dress ran very true to size for me; it fit like a glove! If anything it may have been a little snug in the arms and shoulders which made lifting my arms more constricting, however nothing that was really bothersome throughout the night.  Length was great! Hit right above the knee for me.
Awesome dress that made me feel like a million bucks - great for large busts/small waists. Would totally rent again!

I love this Trina Turk! This dress is so comfortable and roomy. I wore a size 6, so it is true to size but I would suggest sizing up for back up as well. There is a comfortable amount of room in the hips and bust of this dress. It is not very fitted and the fabric has some stretch. The style would work great for any cup size, but you will have to wear a strapless bra or NuBra. At 5'10", the length was mid-thigh. You can pair it with a fun colorful clutch and earrings to wear to your next party!

If you are curvy and have a booty but lack in the boob department, this dress fits a little funny. The upper back was kind of sagging off of me and my chest looked completely flat but the rest of the dress fit tight and was flattering.

this dress is a stretchy material, so I wore the smaller size and it was still a bit big. Still felt great and looked great, but definitely gives room to breathe! I wore the 8 and I'm about 6'0" and 155 pounds.
I'm not too big in the bust (34B), so this was pretty big - I had to use fashion tape. But as others said, I was able to wear a normal bra, so that was a huge plus.

I thought the dress ran small and ended up wearing my backup size.  The zipper was hard to zip but once on it was a showstopper. You may need a second set of hands for the top buttons as well.   It was perfect for my work holiday party.

LOVE this dress - the second I tried it on I loved how it looked. The top is a little low but nothing too terrible. I was worried it may run small, but I found it to fit true to size! The material is light and great for summer.
This dress was so gorgeous! It was very tight and the material was a little heavy but I absolutely loved it. I wore it to a little black dress bachelorette party and I got so many compliments.

This dress ended up being an upgraded replacement since what I originally order was not going to be available, and I ended up really liking this dress!! I ended up wearing it to a church service since it was a bit too dressy for casual Friday at work.  It worked great with my pink pearls! The fit up top was great for my chest size. The skirt is a bit poofier than I normally wear, but I liked it. The skirt also hits a bit long. I am 5'5'' and it hit below the knee.

This post has been a long time coming. I rented this dress (along with the blue version) for my bridesmaids, and holy moly, it's almost a year later and I still get asked about these dresses. Renting these dresses for my wedding was so easy and Rent the Runway's customer service is always amazing! 
In regards to this dress, they are truly stunning. My ceremony was at night time and these dresses sparkled in the lights. They are a lighter gold color as well. The waist band is true to size though.

I got a bigger back up size assuming I would need to wear the 12, but the 10 fit!!  You might want to bring a safety pin to get the front, but I was in Vegas and wore a black bra.  The dress material sort of clung to the bra, but in a more conservative atmosphere, you might want the security of a pin.  It comes all the way to the knee and was just tight enough on my ribs to hold it all together.  I really felt amazing and invincible in this dress. I walked down a busy road and people parted for me like the Red Sea. My two girlfriends from college and I had a reunion trip in Vegas and all wore different colored sequined RTR dresses.  DANG did people notice us!  SO SPARKLY.  We did a photo shoot and we all looked so amazing, I really enjoyed this dress. The sequins DO sort of irritate your arms, but I just tried to stop swinging my arms around so much (I can be a dramatic story teller).  Comes all the way to the knee, can be worn with a bra, unfortunately no pockets but that's literally the only down side.  Effortless!!

I wore this to my engagement party & received so many compliments! It accented the bust, showed my waist, but covered my hips! I wore nude pumps, & paired with matching necklace & earrings & a bright red clutch.
Did not like the fit on the cap sleeves. It also stuck out on one hip.  Bummer....great looking dress.

I wore this dress for NYE this last year (which also happens to be my birthday!).  It was everything I expected:  very shiny and sparkly, so much so that everyone was making fun of how much I stuck out!.  I rocked it with a fur shrug and tights since it was freezing outside, but I thought it looked great!  My only complaint was that this dress was really SHORT!  I had to be very careful when I sat down in it because I am really tall.

I wore this dress for my birthday dinner at an upscale French Quarter restaurant and it was a show stopper. I received compliments all night and the blue is very vibrant, it looked great against my brown skin! A few sizing tips: I am usually a size 4 but the dress sleeves are unforgiving and if you have breasts larger than an A or B cup the top will be rather tight. I wore the size 6 for comfort, although the 6 visibly had more wear and the hem had been redone (not perfectly). Overall, I loved the dress so I overlooked the flaws in the size 6 and had a wonderful birthday dinner!

Having a long neck and being tall really helps with this dress. I wore it out the day after my wedding all over Miami from salsa clubs to downtown to wynwood and everyone loved it. Comfortable though it doesn't look it. Easy to wear, sit, and dance in. Didn't feel quite as conservative as it looks.

I wore this to a charity breakfast and got tons of compliments. Everyone wanted to know where I got it and kept rubbing my arm to feel the lace. It fit perfectly and I didn't need anything special underneath. It was so comfortable. I'm planning to wear it for future events since I felt so great in it.

I wore this to a wedding and it was very comfortable. Fits true to size and has the perfect amount of detail on the high-neck. I paired it with some silver earrings and stacking bracelets. Very happy with this one!

I wore this to a beer tasting event. It was my birthday rental, so it's not something I would have normally rented for, and I was just looking for a trendy daytime outfit. This romper was exactly perfect. The back is open, so I went braless, and it has pockets. Sadly, there aren't any pictures of me wearing it.

This dress was one of my favorite rentals.  The skirt has a nice swish to it.  The color and the print are fun without being too flashy.  You could dress it up for something formal or dress it down for something casual.  The one downside is it is quite low cut.  However, it was easily remedied with safety pins and tape.
The ribbon around the middle does make the dress a little snug.

This is a fun shirt with unique details. The top fits boxy and cropped. I like the colors, goes with everything but at my height, this top was a little too short, I had to wear high waisted jeans and a white tank underneath.
Go for it.
Stunning and accentuates curves. Sexy and elegant at the same time.
I felt this dress skimmed the body but wasn't too form-fitting - what I would expect from a shift style.  The color was really beautiful - much more stunning in person and everyone loved it!

This dress was amazing. It fit like a glove, the material was so comfortable and extremely forgiving. I was so happy it came in a long. I'm 5'10" and wore 3 inch heels and the dress perfectly hit the ground.

This is the second time I have rented this dress, just in a different color. The red is very bright and vibrate; definitely good for a holiday or perhaps Valentine's Day. I'm small chested and didn't need to wear a bra, and the top is tight enough that it actually gave me a bit of cleavage, which was nice! I'm very short, so you can see that it was a bit longer on me than the model, but with the top totally open, it was a nice balance.

I wore this for my husband's company Christmas party. I receive a ton of compliments but the dress does run a little big and the dip in the front is deep as many other reviews have said. The zipper also stuck a little but overall great dress!

I wore this a bunch of times with jeans rolled up and flip flips. Fun casual top and if you are better busted, it's very flattering. It was a great summer top to wear out and still feel dressed up without trying. Would rent again.

It's a great fit and the length is so fun because it's a little short!  It is a little narrow in the torso area so you might want to try two sizes.  It is fun to wear something different then a boring dress

This dress was such a hit! My only complaints are the size 14 (i have wide hips) was loose in the bust for a large b cup, and the sequins were scratchy under the arms, but I got used to them. Also - this dress is HOT and HEAVY, so keep that in mind.

This dress is sexy yet comfortable, classically beautiful with a creative flair. I would buy it if I could afford it. I am 5'4, wore a size 0, and it fit well on my body, except the shoulder straps were too long. I made loose knots to shorten the dress. I didn't mind, since the dress has so much texture and motion to it that you could hardly see the knots.

Wore this to the Derby party! Huge hit! What a great dress for vacation, dinner, date night, summer party.....super comfortable, and forgiving while being sexy at the same time. Wear with or without bra. There is one built in so I didn't wear one. Can't go wrong with this dress..... colors are bright and vibrant. No necklace needed with it either due to the amazing neckline.

I wore this dress to my friends wedding and I LOVED it. I have never received so many compliments on a dress. It runs pretty true to size. The medium fit fine but I opted for the large because I carry my weight in my stomach and I didn't want it too tight in that area. It was a bit big in the back though. It was also super light weight and comfortabl, perfect for a summer wedding. The material also doesn't show sweat marks, which was a god send for a 2pm wedding in the blazing heat. I would definitely recommend!

I LOVED wearing this dress. The quality was really nice and I received many compliments. The dress itself is pretty thick which I actually liked for the winter wedding I attended. I am typically a true size 2 but I ended up wearing the size 4 because of the arms. The size 2 fit, but I could not lift my arms AT ALL. Since I was going to a wedding and wanted to be able to eat/dance/hug people - I went ahead and sized up. Overall though, I would definitely order again.

I LOVED this dress, and I got a ton of compliments when I posted in on Instagram & FB too:) I am normally a size 8 in everyday clothes, but often have to wear a 10 in formal dresses because of my bust. But the 8 fit perfect. Unfortunately, the second time I tried it on, the zipper broke. The zippers on both dresses were different, which shows they've been replaced a few times. So be extra careful with the zipper. I had to wear the 10R, which worked, but wasn't as good a fit as the 8. I'm 5'3", and the R length was perfect with 3-4 inch heels. Loved the shape because I didn't have to wear Spanx, and I was able to wear a strapless bra, which is a necessity for me.

I rented this for a wedding in July in VA. It was very flattering dress and I received many compliments on it throughout the evening. I usually wear a 4, but the 6 fit better. I am short - 5'0" and the dress was a great length, just above my knees. Only set back was that arm range was a bit constricted - I couldn't reach my arms all the way up. Also I was lucky because the wedding I was attending was indoors. I wouldn't recommend this for an outside summer wedding. I also appreciated that the lining covered everything except the arms. The lace is thick and sturdy, not going to easily rip if you accidentally get caught on something. Highly recommend this dress!
Fits on the smaller side, but the 00 was perfect for my 5'3 110 lb frame. It is short and tight, so just be prepared for that!
Tons of compliments. Was a bit big in the bust but fit great everywhere else. Would definitely  rent again.

My husband could not stop laughing at me when I tried to do things while wearing this. I couldn't drive, carry my own purse, etc without lifting the whole poncho. I wore it for a late summer concert by the bay. It was a great layer to throw on as the sun went down but definitely not practical for trying to do anything. 
As other reviewers have said, keep your eye on those buttons! Mine fell off and I had to hold them on with safety pins.

I selected this dress for a December Phantom of the Opera wedding. It was the perfect fit. I am 5'11 so I ordered the long and was still able to wear 5 inch heels. The top of the dress has a bustier feel to it which I loved. While the rest of the dress compliments your curves without being so tight or clingy. Overall,  I found it to be a very classy and tastefully sexy dress.

I was apprehensive about renting such an unstructured dress, but it hung nicely.  For the cold airplane, I paired it with a scarf and denim jacket for the flight -- adorable.  Once we landed, I lost the extra gear and wore it with wedges.  My plan was to change into something a little less casual for dinner, but it was so cute, I wore it all evening, too.  Pretty colors.  Nice fabric.  Fit well.  I'd rent it again.
I usually do not wear "green" great, style received many compliments!

Nice silky material, but tight in the shoulders for those with wider shoulders. To wear for work, I needed to wear a sweater over it as the back has a line of small cutouts which you would see a normal bra strap through.
I felt very comfortable in it and got loads of compliments.  I would like to OWN this one!
It was perfect for a bachelorette party! Was true to size- a little tight in the rib cage.

So many compliments and just fit like a glove with a little give for feeling free on the dance floor and able to eat. Its the perfect go to black dress for formal affair/wedding. It was fun when dancing, the bottom kind of floats. OVERALL recommend 1000000000000%.
This was tight, so for comfort I went the size up so I could breathe easier and forgo Spanx.   I loved the length and details.
The dress fit great and was very comfortable. I was able to dance in it all night!

Dress was fitted nicely at the waist but definitely made for someone taller and with a longer frame. It hit at the middle of the shin and the shoulder part of the material actually stood up about 1 inch higher than my actual shoulders. The material feels great but just isn't the right fit for petite people.

This beautiful chiffon gown was the perfect dress for my formal wedding event. The structure of the dress was ideal as I was able to wear it without a bra (34D), which is a rare occasion for me. I got so many compliments on the color and it was the perfect length with a 4" in pair of heels. You should note, this dress runs long (normally I would require a Tall with heels, but the regular was perfect).

This dress was overnighted to me when the other dress I rented didn't fit. The 6R was about 3 inches too long so I had to hold the dress while I was walked, but other than that the bust fit really well and even hid the food/alcohol baby I had by the end of the night :) This is a safe rental in terms of it being true to size and hiding any imperfections you may not be comfortable with (belly for me). If I had fashion tape it would've been a perfect dress!
Loved this dress. It did bunch up a little in the back when I would walk but it was too comfortable yet sexy not to wear.

Length was perfect for my height, little tight under the armpits; the fit is big and flows which is to be expected with the cut.  The pattern is pretty and material is nice and light for a hot summer day. I only gave 3 stars because it seemed to me an underwhelming dress, comfortable but no wow factor.

8 months pregnant for a black tie wedding
Usually wear a 4 - 6R, but this dress (10R) fit perfectly. This was actually a backup dress as my original dress came damaged, but ended up working out. Top was a little big, and low back didn't make it possible to wear a bra- but I would attribute that to sizing up to fit the belly.

I sized up one as it's tough to have a wrap dress fit a large bust and be modest, but overall fit was great. The cut is beautiful and it's a great classic look for work or a party. I would say in person the coloring is different than I'd thought - background is the same hot pink as pictured but up close it's red and yellow flowers on black lattice. I didn't think the colors up close look great together which is the only reason I didn't rate it higher.

GARMENT TAPE IS A MUST.  It doesnt lay at all like is hows on the model (as others have mentioned) so i took their advice and used garment tape on it. Wanted to love it - while it fell flat, it definitely grew on me.  I wore it to a formal rehearsal dinner in Chicago in November.  I paired with strappy black heels and a black choker.
The fit was perfect! I'm in between a 10 and 12 and the 10 fit well on me. The sleeves were a little right but definitely wearable. I loved this dress!!
I read other comments and sized down to a small and I am glad I did. It was loose, but flattering and was so comfortable! I wore it with flats and a leather jacket.

I found out last minute that I was going to the Red and Black Ball for the premiere of Mad Men. I picked out this gown and it got here practically overnight. It fit beautifully -- I am really slim and sometimes O's run too big, so I was glad that it fit with comfy breathing room. I wore 4" heels and am 5'4 1/2; the dress was about 1" too long. I did have an small issue trying not to step on the dress, and other people stepped on it too! I don't know if the petite would have been too short. It was absolutely gorgeous, and the response I have gotten from pics on FB has been nuts. One friend thought I should buy it! I'd re-rent for sure.

I rented this dress for a Vegas bachelorette and wanted to love it! Unfortunately the elastic band across the bust was super stretched out and draped awkwardly even when I tucked in cups. I would recommend for bigger-busted girls!
This dress is gorgeous and is made of thick high quality material. My only issue with this was the zipper. It was extremely tough to pull up (not because the dress was too small).

I loved this in the photo and wasn't sure if I could pull the look off myself.  I actually wore this to work (which was a little aggressive) then out to drinks.  It definitely stands out and I got a bunch of compliments but I did feel like it was a little short for work.  It's very boho chic, I wore it with heeled brown booties and felt put together, if a little casual/trendy for my office.  Would recommend.  Very comfortable, didn't wrinkle at all.

This dress was seriously amazing. Although I did not wear heels, I easily had enough length to do so (I didn't want to tower over the bride!). I also got the 4L, but opted for the 6 because the neck on the 4 was a little too tight. The fabric was very forgiving, and I didn't need to wear spanx underneath it. I was complimented on it all night long, even by other ladies who were wearing RtR dresses! I would definitely rent this dress again!

I rented this for a week along with other max dresses for a week by the lake. I am a 34DD so I need to wear an 8 or 10 on top. The dress was great, light, and airy, but it is long. I did not try it on before my trip so it needs to be worn with some heals, I wore flat sandals.

I rented this as part of my unlimited plan. I normally wear either a 2 or 4, depending on the style. This dress fit very well. I will most likely rent this dress again in another color, and will go down a size.
Dress fit true to size on the smaller side of a 6. Ultimately, I didn't wear it because it was tight and I wasn't super comfortable. But the color is really pretty.

Great dress. Fits true to size. It was a tad long on me, but that's only because I was only wearing 2-inch heels (I'm 5'4). It was a big hit - got lots of compliments. You need a bra that goes down super low in the front, otherwise you'd be able to see it with the deep-cut v-neck. The material is stretchy so I didn't have to worry about bloating and it getting tight throughout the night, which was nice. I did, however, need someone to zip/unzip it for me at the beginning/end of the night - it's one of those zippers that needs a lot of force to close.
Fit a little snug but that was the only problem. You can't wear a bra with it, but you don't need one. Besides that it's comfortable and a nice thick material. Perfect for a bridesmaid dress!
I usually wear between a 2 and a 4 in dresses and opted for a 4 and it fit perfectly! I would not have gone a size smaller or a size larger.
Loved this dress. It fit amazing and I got tons of compliments!

Love these! The red is a great shade. The tie detail at the waist was very cut. Would have loved to keep these. Wore them to dinner with a silk blouse then to church with a ivory cashmere sweater, very similar to the stock photo.  High waisted, very flattering.
Needed help with the zipper, but otherwise fit perfect.

Wore this dress for a bachelorette party.  Pain to get on but once it was on, it fit like a glove. Dress Came to right above the knee. I felt like the cut of the shoulders was not the most flattering.  Fabric was thick and sucked you right in. No need for spanx.  Although worn to a Bach party, this dress was formal and conservative enough for a wedding or such like event. I would def rent rvn again.

I went with the larger size because I was a bit bloated and under the weather and comfort was key.
Pros fit in art the cocktail event without being tho dressy or under dressed.  Has a great level of stretch and felt super soft. The top layer did not snag on anything.

Loved this! I have big thighs for my size and loved how flattering this was. No armpit fat rolls either. Received tons of complements too. Would definitely rent this one again! 

There was a bit of extra space though, I think someone with a larger bust and hips could wear the Medium easily, but it stayed up just fine for me regardless.

Beware of the bra you wear... my straps were sticking out at times.... but know that there is a button to hook in your bra straps on each shoulder... I didn't know until my friend looked. Nude shoes go well. I kind of liked it better without a necklace because it was a higher neck.

I loved this dress, but I feel like the photos just didn't do it justice!  The fit is VERY flattering...I looked like I had a tiny waist and it shows a decent amount of cleavage (nothing too scandelous)!
Dress fabric was perfect, gives curves where I dont have a lot of curves, love the 2 sizes sent which had me at ease in case of a wardrobe malfunction I had a backup to change into:).

The dress runs just slightly small, but at least for me the biggest problem was that it cut off in a weird place on my body. It is just such a stark difference between the top and bottom that if it hits in a weird place it just looks awful.

I was very worried about this dress being too form-fitting and not working with my hips, but it fit beautifully.  It was a little big up top but not so much that I couldn't wear it.  It was a little long for me too, but I am short.  I might try the petite next time.  LOVED this dress!!!
For a pear figure, size down. I rented the 2 and 4 and wore the 2 because it fit better in the chest.

This is not a dress I would normally choose for myself - I don't usually like strapless dresses on my body and pink isn't always a color I gravitate toward - but this dress was absolutely beautiful and flattering in every way.  The fabric is sturdy and structured, and the shape of the dress is incredible!  I discovered the pockets after receiving the rental which was awesome at a wedding.. I got compliments all night long, I cannot say enough about what a successful rental this was!

I ended up wearing the size 0 rather than the 2. Both would have worked just fine, in the end the 0 was a more snug fit on the upper half, which is helpful when with a small bust. I wore this dress to our company party that I organized and hosted, so I was on my feet bending, twisting, and moving most of the night. It fit perfectly and the shoulders stayed put despite the open back. I received so many compliments about what a classic yet sexy look this was.  The only con is that the zipper was a little sticky and took some time to work up/down. Overall LOVED this dress!

I am 5'8 and 133 lbs. I got both the 4L and the 6L. Both fit great, but the 6L was longer so I went with that one. 

I wore it for a fancy NYE dinner and received a lot of compliments on the dress. The dress is beautiful and comfortable. It gives you a great shape, and I didn't have to worry about eating too much and popping out of the dress, haha. 

Very easy rental process too, loved it!
Amazing dress and beautiful print, but runs VERY short. The neckline makes wearing regular bras difficult, even with the keeps in the straps.
It fit really well, and the cutouts were in the right places. I did have to steam the top because it was really wrinkly out of the bag.
This was the perfect dress. I looked better than the bride! ;) I am 5"9 and was about 180lbs when I wore this dress.
Just fit super funky around the neckline, and didn't breathe as well as I'd hoped it would.

The material is not very forgiving and really hugs the body. If you're a fan of spandex you'll want to wear them just to smooth everything out. Otherwise, I loved the dress and received lots of compliments.
After reading the reviews I ordered the 6 and the 4 (I usually wear a 4) I ended up wearing the 6 as the 4 was too tight in the bust area.

This is my first RTR and I am very pleased.
I wore this dress to a black tie gala.  I was concerned that the sequin might be too much but it was gorgeous.
I am usually a size 12 and a 14 for back up but 14W was all that was available so I went with it and crossed my fingers!
Bodice was a little big - but nothing a pin couldn't fix!
After that - perfection.
I would NOT rent again because this is so memorable I wouldn't want to wear again.
Perfect dress for the perfect night.

I'm glad I sized up, but the 8 fit perfectly. It was comfortable, flowy, and flattering. I felt good in it all night long, and it was really easy to dance in. I would gladly buy this dress to have on rotation for future summer wedding seasons!
great color, very comfortable and flowy.
This was the perfect dress for my holiday party.  I received tons of compliments!

This dress could have and should have worked, but something was way off.  I'm a pretty solid 2 - ordered the 2R based on reviews and it was just wrong.  The sleeves and midsection were big and felt stretched out.  The rouching did not hit my natural waist...if I yanked it up to hit that mark, it made the length way short in the front.  I'm not even 5' 5".  When I spoke to the super helpful go-to girl, she understood, said the dress probably needed to be retired, and sent 2 replacements overnight at no additional fee.  Talk about UNREAL customer service.  Not to say I wouldn't rent another BM, but I def would not try this one again.  A positive - another gal was wearing this dress at my event anyway, so it all worked out.

I wore this to a christmas party with red strappy heels. The dress was very comfortable, but like all dresses by designer, it runs a size small. I am usually a 0, 2 but always have to go with the 2. Here the small worked perfectly and i got both the petite and the regular--for anyone around my height get the petite!!!! Even in heels the regular was way too long. The petite in heels just barely touched the floor on me.

Got so many compliments! Wore it to the boyfriend's brother's wedding, where I'd be meeting his extended family for the first time. The front was modest but the back still said I was 22 years old, so it was a great piece. I recognized what others were talking about with the underskirt layer, it is funky, but manageable. I left the dress hanging in the bathroom while I showered and let it steam to relax it a bit, and it looked just fine.

I rented this dress for a quintessential Massachusetts summer rehearsal dinner event and received quite a bit of compliments about my dress. This dress runs true to size and was extremely comfortable.  I am 5'8" and the length was perfect just above my knees. I probably could have gone down a size but went for comfort. I paired it with simple gold wedges and was ready to go with the fun gold piping down the front. You won't regret this rental!

The lace on this dress is gorgeous although I received it brand new so it was in pristine condition. (Love being the first to wear a rental lol). There is an ivory slip underlay that is attached at the bust so it stays in place and the straps on the slip are adjustable. There is also a little bit of crinoline under the skirt. There are buttons on the sleeves which is a nice detail. Overall, though, I found the silhouette of this dress to be super boxy on me. I have no hips, though. I sized up so maybe I would have been better off in a smaller size.   It's classy and fun but does run short if your all leg like me. Sitting offers lots of leg view if your on a date but could keep you tugging down if you're at a wedding or family event.  Very safe dress.
Such great fit, and comfortable. I got complimented all night.
This jacket was really cute in theory but ran about 2 sizes too large and felt cheap for the price.

This dress is very comfortable.  The material is slightly stretchy and gives a little.  I think it is very true to size.  I am 5'2", so the length was perfect for work-hit right above my knees.  The leather top and pockets added a nice edgy look while remaining appropriate for work.

This designer in general runs small and I am glad I read the reviews before getting the size up.  My particular dress came with what looks like a watermark right in the chest area, so I didn't wear it for too long.  I went out that night with it and the place wasn't very well lit so that worked out.   All in all, the color is great and it fits like a glove.

LOVELY dress.  The color and cut make this a real stand out.  It's perfect for a business elegant event... except that it's a little more form fitting than it appears in the photos.  It doesn't have any stretch, and it's not really a sheath as shown.  Rather, it's curve hugging in the extreme.  Although the 8 (44) fit true to size, I decided it was a little too close for comfort for a professional event.  I'm planning to rent again and size up for my next event with the hope that it will be more professional appropriate.
Wore this for an average day at the office through unlimited. Comfortable, flattering and classy.

I ordered this dress in sizes 12 and 14 but ended up wearing the 12 because it fit me so much better. It hugged my body in a way that showed off curves I never thought I had and covered all spots I am insecure about.   What I liked about this dress was the fact that I stood out among the sea of the usual prom dresses usually worn (exhibited by my friend in the white strapless dress) and was still able to hold out on my own with the "out there" red dresses that made grand entrances (exhibited by my friend in the red dress and fur shawl). The stretchy sequiny fabric of the dress covered my tummy and waist while the slit offered a sexy twist to the dress.  I did have trouble zipping myself up but my amazing mom (who paid for everything in my spur-of-the-moment decision) helped me and was able to zip me up without any problem. The sequins didn't bother me at all the whole night. I wore a regular bra, and just removed one strap then crisscrossed the other. I wished that I had just bought a strapless bra because in some pictures, my bra strap showed. It might have been possible to go braless, given the thick material of the dress, but I wasn't brave enough to even entertain that idea. This dress made me feel confident the whole night. People, even strangers, stopped and complimented me the whole night. Some of my classmates didn't even recognize me! This dress certainly made my prom the night high school built it up to be!

This dress was perfect for this occasion! It was so comfy. It was slightly loose on the top but in a comfortable way. But because the dress is stretchy on top I could have easily worn a size down. But over-all a gorgeous dress. So many compliments. Felt very glamorous in it while feeling really comfortable. The only time it was a small issue was with the length on the dance floor. I kept stepping on the dress but not too bad. That didn't stop me from dancing!
Loved everything about this dress, it did ride up a little when dancing.  Dress is thick so you don't need a bra just buy those sticky boobs.
I wore this dress to an Inaugural Ball and received so many compliments! It's very comfortable and perfect for any formal occasion.

This dress is BEAUTIFUL!!!  The color is stunning (much prettier then the photographs) and it fits very true to size.  I kept on getting compliments all night long from complete strangers.  I am 5'6" and am 130 lbs.  I always wear a size 4 in dresses, however, I ended up wearing the 6 in this dress.  The 4 fit fine, but the lace on top is a little restricting so I went with the 6 soley so I could dance the night away.  If you are debating on the length to order - DEFINITELY order the long.  I ordered the regular and it barely brushed the floor when I was barefoot.  I ended up having to find 1 inch heels or it was too short.  I do feel like the dress was very flattering, however, cap sleeves, although lovley in person, don't always photograph the best.  Over all I would absolutely order this dress again.  I almost wish it was mine to keep.

Loved this dress. Was the first dress that's worked out for me on Rent the Runway. Got the 4L and 6L and went with the 6 just because it was slightly more comfortable though the skirt did hang a bit. Wore it with 4 inch heels and it just hit the ground perfectly. 
Dress has a lot of give and light material so it was extremely comfortable. And worked great with a larger bust. Definitely wanted to keep it at the end of the night. Highly recommend.

I wore this to a Halloween Party where I was dressed as Kate Middleton. I felt the arms were rather tight so I sized up from a 6 to an 8. The rental fee is appropriate for the dress... and overall I was pleased.

Vcry open in the top-I had to get wardrobe tape 
Fits well, good color

This dress was a beautiful darker apricot color (darker than pic). It was, however, a bit too long for me at 5'3". It came down much lower than the model pic. It hit about mid shin. Still, it was a great deal for the price. Another complaint--a little loose in the bust area.

This was my first rtr so I was super nervous right up until I got the dress. The iPhone app was very buggy for me and the customer service call center was hit or miss - I had one person who didn't know what she was doing while two others were helpful. The delivery tracking feature on the app is pretty bad. It basically only shows the tracking number and time when delivered. A number of the other features (e.g. text notifications and link to customer care) didn't work at all.

Like I said, I was super nervous about getting the dress since I was having it delivered to my hotel the day I was checking in. Once I got it though, it was smooth sailing. The dress is awesome! Great color and nice, thick material. It fit pretty true to size although the shape is straight and narrow. I have a small waist and wide hips so the 2 was tight around my hips but fit perfectly in the waist. The 2 was also very short (I'm 5'6.5). I have a long-ish torso and wouldn't have been able to put my arms up without some indecent exposure. I ended up wearing the 4 which was looser around the hips and  slightly longer making it easier to move in but there was some extra material in the waist area.
Beautiful dress; but I'm 5'10" and there's no way I could leave the house in this dress.  It barely covered my bottom.

It was too short wasted for me so I couldn't wear it. If you're tall consider sizing up or choosing something else. The fabric is really nice and I love the color. Even if it fits through your torso, the shorts/skirt part is really short.

The dress is beautiful from the lace , to the color, and the open back. I got tons of compliments all night long and my boyfriend asked if I could buy the dress to own. I would definitely wear it again. I thought the length was perfect for my height but the fit was bugger than I was hoping for.

I wore the 10R bc 8 long was not available and thoguht it would give me more length (which it did) otherwise was a bit big in the shoulders (but I think the 8 would have been fine)

Just be careful of scratchign from the sequins under your arms!

I wore this to a fall wedding. The color is amazing - brighter in person than in the picture. I also loved the cut out design of the back. I'm 5'10"/130lbs/34D, and the size 4 was perfect. My only complaint was that the backup size 2 was not the same quality. The fabric was a slightly different color and pattern and looked worn out. Luckily, the 4 fit better anyway. Loved this dress!

Loved this dress! I rented it for a formal work event being held at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. It was PERFECT. Great color, beautiful fit, and very classy looking. I felt very comfortable in it all night as it was perfectly suited for my event. Would recommend this to anyone!

Side note- my colleague is wearing another RTR dress by Badgley Mishka in the photo. She loved her pick as well!

I wanted to match my boyfriend's jacket, and this color dress was the perfect match. Everyone at the wedding thought we were the most stylish couple!! The fit was great, though a little roomy in the chest for me.  This was my 2nd rental from RTR and I will keep coming back. :)

As many other reviewers mentioned, this dress runs large and is not fitted in the middle. I paired it with a brown belt to cinch in the waist a bit, and brown cowgirl ankle boots to match. It was very flattering and I felt comfortable and stylish all night! This dress is great for dancing because of the full, lacy skirt.

I wore this romper for a bachelorette in Las Vegas and it was perfect! I received many compliments! It is true what other reviews have mentioned regarding the length in the back being short...but if this is for something fun and flirty, go for it! But I will say the top fit me well, it was not baggy/loose as others have reviewed.

Highly recommend if you are seeking a comfortable and unique piece to wear out!
Super comfortable and flattering. I wanted to keep this dress!

The lace and color of this dress are beautiful in person! Also great quality. This dress does I believe run true to size, but I didn't really care for the way it fit me. I'm a pear shape, I have a small upper body and tiny waist with full hips, and the bottom of this dress got weird and bunchy whenever I would move. The only time I loved it is when I was standing still and could smooth it out! Also I wore a strapless bra and it kept poking out a little of the bottom of the top part. Still gave it five stars because it was beautiful, just don't think I had the best body for it!

I wore this on Easter.  I was a little nervous about wearing all silk since it's typically not a forgiving fabric, but I thought it fit really well!  The neckline was interesting and trendy.  I love floral prints, so I really liked this dress... great for spring!

Loved this dress.  Extremely comfortable, can wear a normal bra.  Size 4 fit fine, there is tightness around the band area that might make a size up necessary for some. Otherwise, all other areas of the dress were forgiving.  Had to wear heels to prevent dragging on the floor.  Beautiful embroidery.  Turns heads ... very classy.
Great fit & details.  Looks nice with tights & boots.

Perfect dress for a warm summer wedding. People kept coming up to me to compliment me. I personally did not have a problem with the straps hurting, or the chest gaping, but I have a very narrow rib cage, with large-ish breasts. Back hit me exactly right with the long length, and stayed in place all night through dancing, toasts and general merry-making. I am tall, and wore about 3 inch heels, so the dress didn't hit the floor, but be warned that the top layer is very flowing and I tripped a few times going up and down stairs. I kept all of my accessories and my hair sleek and simple, as the dress is stunning enough. It is the perfect dress.

The dress fit fine but the skirt was definitely fuller than I anticipated. I have a short waist and in the end the weight of the fabric overwhelmed me. Beautiful quality and for the right person this would be a great dress.
Very cute dress but very short! I am only 5' 5 1/2" and this was very short.

I loved this dress! It did run a little large though, bunching up a little at the top in the back. However, I received multiple compliments throughout the night. The fabric was nice and thick, but never hot as I did attend an outdoor wedding. Overall a great rental!

I loved this dress!!! LOVED! So adorable and comfy - does run a rad small, so order up. Perfect for my rehearsal dinner...I got a million compliments. I was almost as excited for this dress as I was for my wedding dress the next day! Will rent again if I can find a reason to!

I wore this for engagement photos. The lace was gorgeous, and the skirt draped beautifully. My backup size was a 2. I could have worn either, but decided to go with the 4 for more comfort in the waistband. I would highly recommend the dress, and I definitely plan on renting more dresses for other wedding events!

True to size on the fit. I am petite and it came to the top of my knee. The main downside with this dress was that my arms were very red and chafed by the end of the night after rubbing on the sequins.

I rented this through the Unlimited program. Based on other reviews I knew this was a knit dress and a bit boxy. The cut was flattering and I liked the pattern. It was a bit short for work, but black tights and tall boots made it work. The one thing that bothered me was that because it is a knit, the other colors show through the predominant color. For example,  you can see bits of pink and black in the white sections. I wore it once and then returned it.

I'm 5'6 and the 0R was the perfect length for flats; heels wouldn't have worked.  It was a little snug at the top/neck, but not uncomfortable.  You can easily get away with not wearing a bra, as the back has a gorgeous cut-out.  Easy to dance in.  Received tons of compliments.  Didn't disappoint, rent it!

Everyone on here said the dress ran short so I ordered a 0L and a 2L and when I got the dress I was swimming in it. Even with heels there was no hope and I'm 5'3" 105lbs. I called customer service and they were wonderful! Sent me a 0R the very next day and it was perfect!  So many compliments on this dress. It was great because it's young and fun but still dressy enough to wear to for a formal occassion. Highly recommend!
I love this jacket. Its easy to throw on and really spice up your outfit with some effortless chic.

Appearance-wise, this dress was just what I wanted. It was pretty and fancy. Functionality-wise it was decent. It was comfortable and I was able to wear a regular bra, but the zipper was tough to maneuver by myself - I had to recruit my friend to help. I ended up wearing the larger size because the zipper felt like it was going to break when trying to zip it up on the smaller size. I don't believe that the dress was too tight either, because my friend could easily gather the fabric at the zipper - it was odd. But not wanting to ruin the dress, I opted for the larger size. It fit okay. I don't think many people could tell it was too large because of the pleating and the cut of the dress, so I think I pulled it off.

The top part was way too big on me. I had to use safety pins on the sides to close the gap. 
Debated whether or not to still wear, but the rest of the dress fit so nicely... and loved how the back was longer than the front. The dress flowed so gracefully when walking. And also the cutout back was a nice detail.
This dress was absolutely stunning. It has quite a bit of stretch to it, though, so I wish I had ordered the 0L to see if I liked the fit better. Overall, I'd definitely wear this again!

Because there is no give to the fabric of this dress, it can fit large in some places and tight in others. I found that it was tight around my middle but way too big around my chest (so I ended up wearing a more padded bra). I loved the way it looked and enjoyed wearing it for a holiday party!

It is a great dress, and it made me feel great.  It is fitted and white, so you have to wear the correct underwear so it does not show through the dress. Wear it with neutral color panties and bra and that should do the trick!  It is simple, but it makes a great statement.  It is a beautiful dress!

This particular dress was a perfect fit.  I have wide hips and a big bum, so I was nervous to try a style that looked more form fitting, but it fit great around those areas without feeling too tight.  My only complaint is that the lining inside the dress kept riding up and creating a crease across my bum that you could see through the dress. A little annoying when you've gone to great lengths to hide those panty lines.  I have a small upper torso and that was accommodated very well in this dress too. Overall, the dress seems like it would suit a number of body types: larger bust, smaller hips... and you can for sure expect to get some great compliments. I wore this dress with the Kate Spade Fame and Flowers Necklace, also available through RTR.

I loved this dress! I read the reviews and ordered a few sizes down.  I am usually a 12 but ordered the 6 and 8 and ended up wearing the 6, which was even a little big.  I received so many compliments on this dress, some people telling me I should buy it because it fit so well and looked great.  I will definitely be renting it again and would recommend it to everyone!  It was so comfortable to wear, sit and dance in!
It was perfect, the color was beautiful and I would love to wear it again.
This I wore to a birthday and it fit great! The dress is beautiful and you will not be disappointed.
I did not wear this only because I chose a more form fitting dress.
