This dress was PERFECT! I was super nervous to order online with out trying on, but this website seriously rocks! The slip under the dress was a little small though, I have a large bust and big butt so I had to wear a different slip, which turned out to be the slip from my back up dress! I got so many compliments and I wish I could keep this dress forever!! Highly reccomend for any occasion!

Fits snug and comfortably (as it should) around the cut outs and waist.  I'm busty and this dress really hid that. Length was good in the regular size.  I'm 5'6" and wore 4" heels. Dress just touched the ground. Great quality and weight to it.  I was able to wear a normal bra (with the tie in the back to make the straps more halter). Fully lined too.

I did not end up wearing this dress. I loved the color & concept but it was SO SO SMALL. I rented the 12R which is my normal formal dress size but I am not even convinced the 14R would have fit. If you have a big chest I would  not recommend this dress. I ended up renting another dress which was even more perfect for the Emmy's than this dress. So I was very pleased with the overall outcome.

I loved this dress.  It's probably too over-the-top sexpot-ish to have in my closet, but it was great to rent.  I wore it for my anniversary dinner.  My husband loved it, and I received compliments from other women at the restaurant.  It is super-stretchy.  The length ranged from mid-calf to below knee on me depending on if it was bunching up at the waist or pulled down.  I would recommend wearing spanx with it, and I wore a standard bra.  I rented the large for my free birthday rental, it was loose at the waist, so if you have a narrow waist, don't get the large!
true to size - comfortable but fitted...not very forgiving may want spanks

Rented for girls night but decided to save it for date night instead and my boyfriend loved it. It's UK sizing so the 8 was a little snug on me (I'm between an 8 and 10 in UK sizing) but it pushed the girls up and held everything in :) Will rent again but will probably try the 10 so I can eat a little more a dinner.
fit is form fitting, waistband I thought would sit a little higher but sit right on my hips which made me look hippy.

I absolutely loved this dress.  It was very forgiving and the material was thick enough to hide flaws rather than emphasize them.  I received a ton of compliments - the dress was easy to dress up or down and really comfortable.  I will definitely rent this again!

This dress was great for my engagement party and worked well with the Kate Spade necklace I rented with it. A great colorful statement necklace is just what this dress needs. The fabric is a nice thick texture that I think would make the dress great for fall too with tights and booties. Does run small so size up! I usually wear a 4 but  went with the 6 which was still snug, but not too tight.

It fits very nicely and is flattering because its a thicker fabric that keeps everything in place. The ruffles help if you have a little belly. The only negative comment I have was the way this dress smelled when it came in. It smelled a little musty.

Fits like a comfy glove. Knit fabric keeps you warm without the need for a jacket in the Fall weather. I paired it with black ankle boots one day then black tights and black ankle boots for a business trip.  As I was boarding the plane, the woman behind me complimented me on the dress. Packs well and does not wrinkle. Would definitely rent again!
I unfortunately was unable to wear this dress as it did not zip beyond my bustline.
Dress is very pretty and different in a great way!

I loved this dress. It was classy enough for an evening outdoor wedding, but the length made it perfect.  The dress has a lower cut than I expected, but I loved it.  On my body, I did not have to wear a bra as it was snug in the bust line, so I did not have any bra issues as posted on the other reviews.   I'm glad I ordered two sizes as the 2 worked for me this time.

This sweater is so cozy and perfect for chilly fall/winter days.  I loved wearing it and the fit was actually flattering despite it's chunky knit.  I'm extremely sensitive to wool and it really didn't bother my skin at all which was great.
Fun romper, easy to wear...if you're busty and small, expect for your bra to show in the back. Wore it with Rebecca Minkoff black and gold flecked calf hair 'Demure' cutout ankle boots.
A little low in the front, wear with a camisole
It is a great jacket, true to fit and is extremely soft.
A little long if you're not wearing heels.
The dress is true to size and an elegant black dress.  All of the reviews are true and it fits perfectly.  The top is just right and your arms will look good.

Beautiful dress! Flattering neckline, comfortable fit, the texture didn't rub my underarms at all. I wore the Long size and it was literally six inches too short, even when I wore half inch wedges instead of the heels I had planned. Ironically it was short enough to look almost deliberate, which is good since I didn't have any other dress options so I wore it anyway, but I can't believe it's supposed to be floor length (as in the pictures on RTR) and came up that short on me at 5'9". Tall girls or medium height ladies beware.
The actually dress was not tight but underneath my chest and across by ribs was suffocating. Did not wear. Pretty print though.

Based on stylist notes to go one size up for backup (because I wanted to be comfortable at a dinner party), I selected size 42. I normally take a 40 to accommodate a large bust, and probably should have gone with a 38. While the dress is form-fitting, the fabric is very stretchy, almost like high quality swimsuit material. Built in bra cups and a waist-length liner means you can go braless, but I wore with a strapless for more support and security against nip slip. Would rent again.

Love this retro style! Definitely gave me 70's vibes, and I loved the button details on the sleeves. This dress runs true to size and we recommend going down one size for your backup. There is comfortable room throughout, but if you are curvier you should definitely size up. This may be worn with a standard bra. Pair this with the Layered Plate Hoops by Eddie Borgo to complete this look!

The dress was generally true to size, I was surprised to find that the chest area was not tied at all since usually it is if you have a larger chest. The blue was beautiful and really stood out in the light and it was very comfortable. I did get a few compliments and loved the way it looked.

This fit exactly how I hoped it would! The back is beautiful and elegant without being too sexy. I wore stick on boobs, but you could probably go bra-less in this dress too. I chose to style it with a statement necklace, but may have done earrings if I would have worn my hair up. I wished I could have kept this dress! Very flattering. Loved it.

the zipper was extremely hard to zip up a the fitted gathered waistline. A larger size would have been easier but it was not available.  The color was perfect.  I usually fit right in between regular and tall so I was nervous about the length.  I was able to wear flats with my 5' - 8 1/2" height.

LOVED this dress. Would order again - I rented it for my brother's graduation and it was perfect. The pockets are everything. The length was just right. And I was obsessed with the detailing over the chest. I have a larger chest and rarely am able to wear anything backless, let alone braless. The material of this dress was thick enough and the fit secure enough that I didn't have to worry about any potential faux pas. 100% would recommend!

I got a million compliments on this jumpsuit, but it definitely wasn't a "slip-on-and-go" kind of outfit! The boning keeps you sitting straight up and it was barely long enough for my torso. I'm so happy I got it, but it was such a relief to take off at the end of the night.
Runs large in the bust. Midriff more tight fitting.

Pros: It was long enough for my 6'0" frame.
The shape was flattering.
It was true to size.
It has pockets!!
I was able to make a strapless bra work with the dress with body tape.

Cons:
I needed to pin the crossed straps in the back so the dress didn't bulge in the front, but I didn't and I kept pulling them to keep them straight.
Loved the dress - perfect fit and not too tight through the mid-section.  The vented sleeves are a fun touch.  Great pop of color!

I wore this dress to an after-work party (also wore it to work) with a cropped black leather jacket over the top. It was appropriate for both work and party, and the print is beautiful. I had wanted to rent the midi version of this dress (wasn't available) and was pleased that the short version isn't too short. Fit is true to size to slightly small.

Honestly, I smelled a hint of BO on this dress upon arrival.  You couldn't smell it when wearing it because I asked my boyfriend when I tried it on.  Only time I could smell it was when I was putting it on and taking it off.  Otherwise it was an effortless experience.

This dress is gorgeous and photographs really well! That said, the dress has very little give and was tighter in the bust than I expected, so I had to leave the very top open and improvise with some fashion tape. If you're a bustier lady, be sure to size up! Other than that, it was super comfortable and I received compliments all night!

I wore this for an engagement photoshoot in SF and it was just what I was looking for. It was great length-wise and the long sleeves made it special. The tail in the back was the perfect detail and created a great silhouette for multiple angles!

It's the little things! Love the sleeve detail. The fabric is a substantial jersey with enough stretch that sizing could be true to size, but you could size down if you're on the cusp. The arms fit comfortably despite some other reviews, although I have smaller arms. Would rent again!

Overall ran a little small .The 16 (which is larger than I usually wear) was just a little too tight, so I wore the 18. It was super comfortable but it was a little large in the shoulder/chest area. I absolutely loved the dress though and got amazing compliments all night.

I wore this to a fashion show at my university. Great fit! It was a tad short but not bad. My only complaint is that there are little shoulder pads and I thought it made me look funny. I loved the two toned sequins and I was getting complements all night. Best feature was the back of the dress hands down!
Nonstop compliments, pockets are great, but tight sleeves mean sizing up.

Such a pretty dress and the metallic threads really push it over the top. Unfortunately it was a bit big, so the open back gaped open quite a bit. I fixed this by lacing a string around the straps and tying a bow, which preserved the look of the open back while ensuring the dress didn't fall right off of me. The material is a bit on the stiffer side, so it will make your hips and butt stick out a bit more than they usually would. The dress has pockets, which is awesome. I would rent this again but go a size or two smaller.

you would need a special bra for this dress. I liked how it looked more on the hanger than it did on me because it didnt hug my curves in any way. the stomach portion on the dress had too much space, which made it seem like i had a gut there, of course i hated that. I got it in the 6L becasue i was warned by previous reviewrs that it would show your shoes if you got the exact fit and i was happy with that decision. Overall i'd defintely rent here again, i just wouldnt choose this dress

Personally it was too conservative for me (and I'm by no means a risque person). Because I'm pretty short the hem went to the bottom of my knees, and the dress looked almost frumpy. I'm usually a 2 or 4 and in this case the 2 fit perfectly
It was a little big at the bottom, seemed stretched out but was fine for work.

I wore the blouse to a party where guests were in everything from jeans to dresses so I wanted to feel dressed without feeling over dressed -- this top was perfect for that.  Easy to wear and very comfortable, but the neck band adds enough pizazz to make it 'evening'.  Like others, I pinned the neck at the back for a tighter fit.  It's not absolutely necessary but looks a lot better.  You cannot wear a racer back bra (as I had planned) because of a keyhole cut out in the back, but a normal bra works -- I pinned the straps so they wouldn't slip / show.  There was ample room in the chest and the arm holes were the right size.  It's lined, drapes well and is not too sheer.  I was very happy with it.

The fit is good, true to size.  The fabric is VERY thick, so it adds a good half inch to your silhouette. I thought I would hate it on, but I really really liked it!  It was my 10 year olds idea to belt and and I am glad I did.  It dressed it down for work!
It was perfect. The length was appropriate and it was form fitting in all of the right places.

This dress fit like a dream, and was perfect for my 5'1'' frame. I fit into the small as well but the medium was just a bit more comfy. I did wear Spanx but the thick and sequined fabric was super flattering.

Loved this dress and it was perfect for my James Bond-themed black tie gala. My coworker and I were both pleased with our dress rentals. Definitely size down on this one. I typically wear a 6, but do have some 4's in my wardrobe. I rented a 6 and 4 and didn't even try on the 6 since the 4 fit perfectly. The dress is fabulous for larger chested women and l particularly enjoyed that you can wear a regular bra. Agree with other reviewers that it's on the long side, but it hit me just above the knee and worked well for a formal affair.

I wore this to my Sorority's annual Diamond Ball and from the second it arrived and I tried it on I never wanted to take it off. It is form fitting but I was still able to bust out all of my dance moves on the dance floor, which I would say is ideal for a dress!

I know this is all in the description and I rented too fast because I fell in love with it, but the skirt is navy, not black, and it's not leather but vegan leather. Having said that, the vegan leather is very nice, very soft, very thin and very comfortable to wear.
I wore this skirt and I liked it alright. However, I think this looks good high-waisted, and therefore would look better on women with a thin waist.
Wore this dress for a club night out in NYC for my Bachelorette. Runs small, or I am just too tall for the dress. It was very comfortable, but one size up would have made me feel perfect.

The skirt didn't even touch my feet. If you are 5'6" or taller get the longer length! I expected a bright royal blue from pictures and more sequins but the overall effect was plain and matronly. Thank goodness for my backup dresss!
The fit was excellent. I rented the size 6 and it was a little bit large on top, but RTW was out of the size 4 so I couldn't rent 2 sizes. Everything was perfect!

I love the Fifth Avenue Showstopper Dress so when I was contacted that my selected dress was not available after all this was a nice back-up. Slimming and very flattering, this pretty dress was a great dress for a large busted girl like myself to wear to a company holiday party!
I think it would be great for the beach or a pool party, but that's about it.  It looks neat and put together on the model but I had a hard time making it look nice.
Super cute dress, easy, comfortable and a nice transition piece into the early Fall.

This was actually my back up dress and was so grateful for it. Fit was perfect and was true to size. Quality was excellent and I received a ton of compliments. The only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars was that the hook and eye clasp behind my neck kept coming undone.

The dress fit like a glove. It's true to size and was snug in all the right places. The sequins are beautiful and does make the dress a little heavy, but it's properly lined so that you don't feel any of the sequins. The one downside is that the length of the dress is a bit shorter than I'd like with heels on. I wore 2.5 inch heels and the dress did not touch the floor. It just rested right above my toes. Overall, very happy with it!

This dress was absolutely amazing! The material was so comfortable and the dress fit great. I would of liked to have had the 12L as I am really tall but the regular worked too.  I had compliments all night long!

I wore this dress to a barn wedding in NC. It definitely runs a little big in the chest area,  but it is gorgeous and so comfortable. I thought the skirt had gray in it, but it is actually more nude. Its a perfect dress for a spring or fall wedding!

I loved the this modern spin on a classic shape. It's something a little different, with lovely details. It was appropriate for a daytime church wedding, but the fun shimmer and edginess carried the look all the way through the after party. 

I got a lot of compliments on this dress. As is usual for me, I was a little between sizes. The 0 fit better in the waist, but was rather tight in the arm holes and across the upper chest, and felt a little on the short side. That said, the 0 worked and I was happy to wear it, but I might have chosen the 2 if it hadn't had a strange odor.

Other than the one funky smelling dress, I was impressed with the overall experience from RTR and will likely rent again.

Perfect dress for a fall black tie wedding in warm weather! The seams and thick fabric helped suck in a post baby body and led to many compliments all night. Regular length was perfect with 4 inch heels and with a 5’6 height.
Great work dress. Flattering but appropriate.

I got so many compliments on this dress throughout the wedding. I loved the pockets and the bow detail in the back. The dress fit great and made me feel very beautiful. The bride loved the dress as well!

So many people loved this dress, I got complimented all night!  I wore the 8 even though the 6 fit because of the lenght...the slip was a tad short for me (downfall of having a big booty!).  Over all it was comfortable, beautiful and fun to dance it.  Will definitely rent again!

I loved this dress.  It's stylish and comfortable....one of the most comfortable dresses I've ever worn.  I think it runs a bit big.  I ordered a 4 and 6, wore the 4, and probably would have worn a 2 if I had it.  Thankfully the straps are adjustable, so the 4 was fine.  I wore a Nu-bra with it, which was perfect.  I received many compliments and may rent it again for future events!
It fit so well. Wish I would have thought about belting it to keep it closed while outside. But I thought it was perfect for the event I had!

My wedding dress was very fitted/beaded - when I was looking for an outfit to wear to the rehearsal dinner I was hoping to find something completely different then that. I saw this skirt on RTR I knew it would be perfect. I ordered the small and a medium as the backup, both fit nice but I ended up wearing the medium. The waist band is elastic and tight so I wore the larger size to avoid it being too restricting at any point in the night. Overall LOVED it!

I normally wear a size 2, read that the sleeves run tight and ordered a 4 and i couldnt even get the sleeves all the way on. unless you have very very thin arms order 2 sizes up. Its a shame i didnt even get to wear this.

I ordered this dress as my back up; though it was the one I really wanted but my size was alreay gone so all I could order was the 10L and I was hoping it would fit.  I ordered the Long; it was a little too long with 4" heels.  The dress actually had 2 seams on the lower back at base of zipper that were unstitched and since I didn't get the dress until 8PM the night before I couldn't have it repaired before I had to leave at 6AM the next morning for the wedding.  So RTR, PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU NEED TO HAVE THE AREA AT THE BASE OF THE ZIPPER SEWN UP.  I RECEIVED IT IN THAT CONDITION.  Otherwise, I thought this dress was gorgeous and would have loved to wear it.  I would have love to try on the Regular length as well just to see if it was too short and I really wanted the 8 not 10....though I could have gotten away with the 10 if it wasn't kinda bigger up top and too long.  Really pretty dress otherwise.  Would like to try it in other sizes in the future.  Peplum really did a beautiful job of hiding my "pooch" and it was a fitted dress but in a nice way that looked elegant not tight.

I wore this dress for a fancy dinner-date and loved it. I ended up wearing the 6 as I felt the mid-section was a bit baggy on the 8. The 6 squeezed my ribs a little bit, but overall it was comfortable. I loved the flow of the skirt and the neckline. Definitely would wear again!

The colors are super vibrant and beautiful, and the length was great with a pair of 2 inch heels. It was a tight on top but the sheathing allowed for me to go without a bra (the back makes it a little tough to wear one). The only minor issue was that the clasp on top occasionally popped open, but I had a friend press it down firmly and it stayed for the rest of the night.

I rented this dress for my friend's rehearsal dinner, the dress was fun and easy to wear.  It's backless so it definitely needs a backless bra, I highly recommend it to anyone looking for something affordable and fun to wear for a wedding or rehearsal.  The dress fit very well and it accentuates in all the right places.  The length is perfect too, it hit right above my knees.

The fit was nice, very form-fitting. I did wear Spanx underneath to make me feel more more comfortable with the fit, which worked well. My only complaint was that there was a tear in the seam below the zipper on the back, so it was a bummer that I got a damaged dress.  I still wore it though, and would consider renting it again.

While I would rate this dress highly for how flattering the cut is, the size that ended up fitting me was very over-worn and I hope RTR retires it from the rental collection! Many of the sequins, especially on the top half, had been worn down and were bright silver instead of dark navy, making the dress look uneven and cheap in person. Comparing the dress in the two sizes I ordered made it very clear that this is NOT how the dress is designed; it is a result of too much wear and tear. Luckily the silver just made it look like the light was always catching the dress in the same place when I wore this to an evening event, so I wore it anyway since I didn't have a plan b and the fit was very flattering. The top, however, runs quite large and I had to tape it to myself in about 8 places to keep the straps from falling down, even in my smaller back up size. I will say this dress is very flattering, but I hope RTR will do stricter quality control in the future and take the more heavily worn dresses out of its inventory. Overall I would recommend this dress assuming the dingy one I received was the exception and not the rule. Definitely order a size down for your back up, and have fashion tape ready if you are more pear-shaped than full-busted or true hourglass.
Very comfy and flattering simple knit dress. My only complaint is that the waist is kind of low (almost a drop waist). I would definitely recommend for a long-waisted person.

This dress was beautiful and perfect for a fun October wedding! The color was gorgeous, and a bit darker than it looks in the stock photos (more deep purple compared to mauve). The fit was a little tricky... I have a small bust and a wider midsection. I usually wear a size 8, which fit well in the bust but was very tight at the waist. The 10 was perfect in the waist but very loose in the bust. I ended up pinning the straps to tighten them and using fashion tape to keep everything in place. With these little adjustments the dress fit well and looked beautiful! I would definitely recommend this dress, just be sure to read the reviews to figure out the proper sizing, and keep some pins and fashion tape near by!
The style of dress is such that it is loose, so going with the small was perfect. If this was available, I'd definitely purchase it to keep!

I rented this dress for my sophmore prom. I loved how the color looked true, and the fit was perfect! It was not too long, or short either. I was so happy with this rental, it made my prom that much better!

I rented this dress for my engagement photos as a second look. The color and material was a perfect summery look. The skirt flowed beautifully and looked very feminine. The waistline fit perfectly, but the top was extremely loose, on both the back and front. I had to safety pin it shut so I wasn't flashing everyone. I don't normally have that problem with dresses.
Easy to wear and very comfortable.  The fabirc is great for outdoor events in the summertime.

How I styled it: black scoop neck bodysuit, gold watch, thin black velvet chocker, black pumps.
Pros: interesting cut and fabric, well-made.  Honestly can't decide it I love it or not though.  The split isn't quite enough that the underneath skirt shows.  The pockets are a bonus.  
Cons: doesn't really enhance the shape--the fabric is cut to hang in an A-Line shape so I personally felt that my shape got lost

Pros: fit was perfect, length was long enough to cover my shoes, but short enough that I was able to wear flats - bonus! 
Cons:  dress was slightly see-through, but with appropriate undergarments, this was unnoticeable. Also, dress was a little tight at the clavicle.

Overall, damn near perfect.  Couldn't have asked for a better dress!
I got size 6 and 4 . I wore the 4!

The dress is comfortable and a very flattering cut. I am tall (5'9") and usually short dresses fit too short. This dress was just fine, hit me right at the knee. I've never gotten so many compliments! One person told me that i just sparkled! I highly recommend this dress, you'll get plenty of compliments :). My skin is fairly light so I was worried about the color but the rose really pops out of the gold in this one. I think I'd wear my hair up to show off the back more.
Great pattern.  I found the elastic around the cuffs uncomfortable and it was way too short for work.
Of all the dresses I have rented this may have been my least favorite simply due to the fabric.  Didn't feel like a well made dress but rather flimsy.  Didn't wear it.

The dress was big for me, but still wearable/cute.  The inside was missing the button to keep the dress secured shut, and the tie waist (understandably) wasn't foolproof at keeping the dress fully wrapped.  I think it would have been fine if there was the inner button and if a smaller size was offered.  I wore this to a family brunch and looked nice despite the verging nip-slip.
The dress is bright pink and the fit is nice, stretchy all over.  The fabric is like a thin neoprene, so the hem is just cut, not hemmed up.  Very cute overall.

I went up a size because the white is unforgiving through the midsection. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous! I got so many compliments on it. The fabric was thick and I didn't have to worry about wearing a slip or spanx.

I ordered both the 4R (which is  my normal size) and the 6R and I'm almost certain I could have gone with the 2R, but all in all, everything turned out fine.  The dress was fairly long on me; therefore, I had to wear a 5 1/2 in heel with a 1 1/2 platform if I didn't want my shoes to show.  I wore this dress to a Mardi Gras ball and received tons of compliments on it.

My pictures don't do justice to the pretty pink color of the rich, brocade, satin material of this dress.  It feels so good on and makes you feel like a million bucks.  My 11 year old thought I looked like I was wearing a curtain but I received many compliments from many adults.  The length came to my knee caps.  Other reviewers said they had trouble sitting down because of tight lining...I did not have that trouble.  Others said the cap sleeves were restricting...I did not have that trouble except a little when dancing and waving my arms in the air.  I thought it gave my arms  a nice look!  I felt very pretty in this dress and surely had a better time because of it.

I ordered this dress for a party and when I tried it on it was SO short.  I wanted to be able to dance and would not have been able to do anything in this dress!  Too bad.  I ended up wearing my backup dress which I loved.  It was also by Badgley Mischka.

This dress was gorgeous, and all night people were stopping me to say how much they loved it. I rented the 8L because the 8R was unavailable, and the fit was perfect, but I did have to use some hem tape to make sure I could walk in it. This actually gave the dress a bit of a train in the back which looked very nice.
I lived in this sweater for a week. I was a perfect cardigan. The color was a little pinker than I expected in the photo, but that was a pleasant surprise.

The fit was nice in the arms and neckline, but i thought the silhouette could have been slimmer.  I ordered the XXS hoping it wouldn't look too much like a parachute, but it didn't really work on my smaller frame

I wore this to a black tie optional holiday party and it was the perfect choice.  It was fancy, but still young and fun.  The sequins were not itchy and the neckline was perfect for a work event.  Also, pockets!

I rented this last minute for a wedding in Florida.  It was dressy enough for the wedding but I loved that it was a romper so it was a bit more casual.  I am a size 8 but got the size 6 as a backup but didn't even try it on as the 8 felt comfortable.  I was nervous that it may be a bit short, but I am short 5'4" and it was the perfect length.
I loved the color, material, fit of the dress.  It was beautiful and very slimming.  You can wear normal undergarments.  My only caution would be the slits, which are a bit revealing.

I wore this to a friend's courthouse wedding and casual reception. I was looking for something that respected the formality of the affair without being too over the top. This dress was perfect. I got a million compliments. The color and texture make the dress unique. It fits pretty true to size - I am usually a size 4 in dresses, this one is body hugging which usually makes me size up to a 6, but this dress fit fine in the 4. One note would be that if you tend to carry your weight in your butt/thighs, this can definitely get a bit tight after hours of wear so wear spandex or something to keep your legs from becoming chafe city.
This ran true to size. I wore it to a nice outdoor wedding and felt beautiful in it. It is very short but I never felt that it was inappropriate.

I wanted to love this dress so much, but it just didn't work with my body. The shoulder pads made me look like Lady Gaga and it was extremely form fitting, and not in a good way. I should have ordered a Medium, maybe that would have been a better fit for me. Also, it was long on me. Luckily, I rented a different second dress that I loved. This dress is gorgeous, but just not on me!
True to size

This dress ran a tad big, so I was able to fit in the 0.  I had issues with the size 2, and the zipper wouldn't even budge, although I had plenty of room to zip it, so I ended up wearing the 0 due to the zipper.  This dress is great for someone who is smaller on top, but needs more room in the hips/butt/waist!  My shoulder/bust are typically a 0, but my bottom is usually a 2/4, so this gave me more room on the bottom to wear the 0!  This was a very comfortable, classy dress for my event.

This dress was beautiful and I received many compliments throughout the night, however there were a few issues: the dress ran smaller than I anticipated, but the clasps in the back were loose the whole night and kept coming undone. The short sleeves on the dress were also quite frayed. Other than that, the dress overall looked great and I felt great in it!

I loved the way this fit!  It hung very nicely, good thick fabric that didn't cling without being hot.  I'm 6.5 months pregnant and still had a little room in the large.  One thing is the sleeves were a little tight around the cuff of the arm.  I had enough room, however I think had I gotten my pre-pregnancy size, the sleeves might have been too tight, but overall great fit and really liked it!

This was so fun and comfortable to wear.  I ordered it as part of my unlimited subscription and although it is more suited for winter given the high neck and long sleeves, it wasn't too hot.  I would order again!

I'm 5'4" and the 0R was still a little long on me which made it difficult to dance in, etc. The waist however fit perfectly. Overall it was a great dress for a beach wedding - so many compliments and it was very comfortable all night long.
This was my first choice and it was very right on my arms. No room to lift up. Decided to go with the back up dress.

This top is great. It is simple and chic and the cape style is unique. It is more cape-like than the pictures suggest. I felt great in this top and got a lot of compliments. Since it is silk, just be careful with wrinkles and cling. Overall fantastic piece that I would love to own.

Maybe it's my "pooch" hang up, but this cute little dress emphasized my 50+ year old middle. I thought the gathered fabric would visually DE-emphasize my middle but all it did was add to my girth. how sad, pretty dress if you have a flat tummy. Also was not fond of the sequins rubbing on the inside of my arms. oh well, fortuantely for me, as a first-timer, I rented 2 dress styles and the 2nd one was fine.

i love this dress. it's perfect for fall. i am usually a 4, but have a large waist so sized up to a 6, but didn't need to. the dress is loose around the waist and more fitted at the base of the rib cage. i had plenty of room all around so the 4 wldve been perfect. the ruffles around the dress are awesome. it doesn't look overwhelming. the color is a very deep plum. hit a touch above the knee. i really can't say enough about how great this is for day to night.
I rented this but ended up wearing my back up dress. The sparkle in the fabrics was VERY sparkly. Would be much better for a holiday party than a fall wedding which is what I had rented it for.
I got multiple compliments on these pants! Fit and length were perfect. Fun for work or for a night out!

Loved the fit and color of this dress. Hugged me like a glove. Only downfall was the bottom hem that puckered and rode up quite a bit. It was like that one both sizes so not just a one dress flaw. Plus the shoulders were a bit big even in the smaller size.
Fit perfectly, but it a bit longer on someone under 5'4"

The slits on the side of this dress really sass up what is a very great (but foundational) dress. It fit very well and accentuated my waist, while leaving my hips (problem area) a little room. Cute and classy.

I desperately wanted to love this dress.  I watched Christian Siriano on Project Runway and was thrilled at an opportunity to wear one of his designs, but was a little disappointed.  The material rubbed around the arms, chest, and back, and would not zip completely -  I had to pin the back to make it look like I'd zipped it up all the way.  I wore it with a little black belt and black pumps.  I received a lot of compliments, even one from the bride!

I loved this dress from the second I saw it. The pictures do not do it justice. We were invited to the event last minute and Rent The Runway made it so easy. I ordered a 12 and a 14. Both fit beautifully. I ended up wearing the 14 because it had a little more room in the arm area and didn't feel like the sequins rubbed under my arms as much. I felt amazing all night and received compliments all night. my husband couldn't take his eyes off me all night.

The shirt fit great!  It was long enough for my long torso.  The buttons didn't pop open like some shirts do.  In other words, I didn't have to pin it shut to keep the girls in.  It was a more casual approach to work- and I loved it. :)

LOVED the dress so much, made me feel incredible glamorous. It fit very well it wasn't too tight at all, and I was comfortable in it moving around dancing and walking. Despite all the sequins it was pretty light, but I did have some roughness under my arms.  Overall though, I wish I actually owned this dress! It's not pure white, more of an ivory.
The dress was super comfortable for a fun evening. The material is similar to a wetsuit material but not as tight.

This dress is fitted throught, yet stretchy. Go one size up for back up. Will probably work better for A-C cups since the bust is fitted. A sticky bra and fashion tape are needed. The straps on the back do not always lay flat

A stunning dress, perfect for a corporate black tie affair where I couldn't show too much skin or cleavage - that tricky elegant-meets-sexy-and-I'm-still-a-professional crossover.  It is forgiving, too - I'm a nursing mom and this fit comfortably without a bra - even as the night went on (nursing moms know what that means). I wear a size 2 in Theory suits and the 4R fit comfortably but not too tightly - probably good for the kind of event I was at.  The material does not have stretch, but I think the cut is forgiving on different bodies anyway, and it is lined so would probably be forgiving over lumps and bumps. The fishtail is fun and elegant, would work for dancing or just dinner & cocktails.
Loved this dress! The top definitely scooped a little lower on my chest than the model pictured, but nothing too scandalous. Was the perfect mix of classy and fun for a black tie optional wedding.

I felt like a Bond girl at the black tie wedding I wore this dress too. It's sexy as heck, but it almost a covert way--a peek of the leg, a hint of cleavage, a bit of side-boob, and the low cut back. The dress will come with adjustable snap buttons on the halter you you can adjust it however you need. The stomach and hip portion hold you in nicely with thick fabric, so I didn't need Spanx with the dress at all. I got compliments all night, and the dress photographed beautifully. I'd recommend wearing some double stick tape along your side boob area to keep feeling comfortable and confident all night. I was so sad when I had to send it back because I loved it so much. I recommend wearing your hair up with it so the dress does all the talking.

I felt glamorous in this dress. At first, it seemed that it might not have too much pizazz. But when I put it on and added the accessories, I thought the dress was beautiful. I received many compliments throughout the night and it was perfect for the formal gala I attended for work.  

I was scheduled to wear the size 2 but the zipper broke and the waist on this dress kept digging into my body.  I wore the 4 and it fit perfect through the waist, but I have a small bust, so I did double up with a nu bra and then my strapless bra over that.  It worked out just great.
I didn't end up wearing this dress- It was not long enough and hugged the wrong places.
Rented for out of town event. Dress does wrinkle but fits very nicely. It definitely runs large, so certainly order a size smaller than you normally would. Great color!

If you have a larger bust, then you'll want to make sure you get a large enough size to be comfortable. The fabric has very little stretch, so I suggest going larger. 
I loved the pockets and the flow of the dress.

The color and material are lovely! I ended up not being able to wear this out because it was too cold but would have loved to. It is very tight around the waist area as you can see in the picture - I also have a big booty so that could have been the issue. I would not have felt comfortable eating a lot in a dress that form-fitting. If you have the body for this dress, I highly recommend it - just be aware that you will not be concealing anything  ha:)
This is really cute, there is a pattern on the fabric you have to zoom in to see on the picture but it's very subtle. Sleeves are so cute, great with a statement necklace!

Little tough to get the zipper on solo, but was able to get it on and it felt very secure.  Wish they had the long, since the regular length barely skims the floor when I'm 5'9".  Gives the appearance of a small waist.

I wore this dress twice-- once on a date with black flats and a leather jacket and also to work with opaque tights and OTK black suede boots.  Complements galore and VERY confortable.  It is, however, a little bit short-- I'm only 5'5.  Taller ladies may have a hard time pulling this off without showing too much.  I would definitely rent this again.
Dress worked great for the daytime charity event. Fabric was a little thin, I had to wear black spanx under it. Other than that, it is a great dress.

Great dress- fits true to size.  I recently had a baby, so it was great to disguise a little extra in the tummy area.  It's really a fun, stand out fabric- looks expensive.  I got lots of compliments on the dress!  I would definitely recommend it.
Beautiful dress. I didn't wear a bra and the dress stayed put all night. It was the perfect length for flat or small heel shoes. It was so comfortable and flattering.

This top is super cute to wear with jeans with the right amount of flare to feel dressed up. The sleeves feel a little tight in the arms, but as you wear the top it seems to loosen to your body. Super cute and comfortable to wear.

The color and fit of this dress is amazing! The side bows are adjustable, which is nice because it runs a little big, so you can cinch it more at the waist if need be. Fabric is great, too! I wore this out and about mid-summer and wasn't too warm in long sleeves. Love!

Dress is thick and very stretchy. The cut and the stretchy-ness make it easy to eat a big meal, and still hide the belly :)
To me, this seems to run small. My shoulders are wider than the sleeve seams, which rarely happens to me. I think I will rent again, but maybe go up a size next time to see if the shoulders fit better.
Very comfortable dress, true to size.

I recommend getting a size smaller because it fits like a big shirt. It is comfortable. I wore a size four and I am usually a size six and fit perfect. I worse this not only for a wedding but for my bridal shower photos.

I wore this dress for a friend's wedding and then also for a dinner party a few days later. I had a baby 11 weeks prior to wearing it and was really self-conscious of my belly and bust. I got a ton of compliments. The waist line hit just above my belly so it was well hidden. It also fit my bust line very well (not ideal for nursing/pumping but I felt pretty so I didn't care that I had to take it off to do so). I wore it with spanx so the 8 fit fine. But without spanx I would have worn the 10. The arms are a little snug, as other reviewers have mentioned. It is also completely lined (including the sleeves). This was great for smoothing lines but it could be very hot in the summer. Make sure you are going somewhere cool or air conditioned if you wear it.

wore this for Christmas Eve. great dress, fit perfectly, even the sleeves (sleeves are usually too long on me), and it got a lot of compliments. it obvious does have a plunging neckline, so make sure you have the right bra. mine didn't fit exactly right and I had to adjust it periodically. but with the right bra, this dress is stunning. 4 stars instead of 5 because the dress I had was slightly stretched out on one side.

Dress was super flattering and gorgeous material.  Wore on vacation for a dinner date. It does run a bit small I feel -- I'm always an XS and it was a challenge to zip-up. Also would be hard to wear a bra, so larger-chested women may have a hard time.

Unexpected bonus was the built it bra like support with slight padding. I'm a 36 DD so I had to wear a black bra but the straps looked like part of the dress so no prob. I think most people won't need to wear a bra with this dress and still look supported. Modest due to coverage but still sexy in such a great way. Beautifully made. Wish I had Laboutins to go with it. The red soles would make the outfit to die for. Great as is though.

Great dress for a cocktail party, wedding, or other formal event.  Very comfortable, easy to move and dance in, and very stylish and fashion-forward.  The gold thread running throughout is a gorgeous detail that doesn't show up very well in pictures, unfortunately, but is very evident in person, so make sure you have gold jewelry to go with!  Loved it!

Two negatives:

1. Kept having to pull the dress up; but that's a given for any strapless gown.
2. The inner lining right at the top of the bust area kept folding outwardly and was visible to others.

Sadly, I dislocated my knee the morning of the big event I was going to wear this to:(. However, this dress was so beautiful, it made me soldier on and I toughed it out to the event, Knee brace under the dress and all- thank God it has good stretch! I am only 5ft tall and I couldn't wear heels, and it was still a beautiful length. I wore a sticky bra with it to fill it out a little more too. I felt like a total knockout, this is a classic, chic, sexy dress I wish I could own!! It is so flattering on so many different body types, and is just daring enough to catch attention. A MUST RENT!
The dress fit true to size.  The waist area was a little snug but not uncomfortable.  I am 5'2 and rented the regular length.  It flowed well with 4in heels.

I have so many dresses I have bought for formal events, worn once, then never again. So I decided to try rent the runway. I got size 0 and 2 as I'm usually size 0. I've gained some weight recently so I ended up wearing the size 2 to avoid underwear lines. I didn't need to wear a bra, I'm a 34a. The fabric was nice and thick. The length was just below the knee for me and I'm 5'2". I usually buy only petite sizes so I was a bit nervous as rent the runway does not have petite sizes, but I liked this length, it was very appropriate for the event. I wore it with my hair up and dangly earrings and 4 inch heels I love.  I was very comfortable all night. (Well except for my shoes) I really like the off the shoulder look and it fit well and there was no danger of this slipping off.  I definitely looked classic but modern. I would rent this again.

I absolutely adore this piece. It fits perfectly, in all the right places. It's comfortable. Extremely flattering, especially on taller woman. I got a ton of compliments and I felt like a million bucks. The deep berry color is beautiful, especially with a tan. I wore this in Vegas but it can really be worn anywhere, especially a date night. Your significant other will be drooling.

This is really fitted in the seat, which made the dress extra flattering even with the loose top. Love the little frill at the bottom too! Comfortable and easy to wear. If you plan on wearing a bra, you'll need a stick on strapless. Would definitely wear this again!
Very flattering for my figure, I've got hips and stomach but it made it all go away (well along with a shaper). Loved how beautiful and feminine it looked. Like a watercolor!

It has pockets!! This dress fits perfectly. It is true to size, loose in the hips and tight on top. The scalloped top is beautiful and takes the dress from simple to elegant! If you have a larger bust, we recommend that you size up. The material is luxurious and smooth. There is no stretch and there is boning on the top half.
Absolutely love this for date night!
Everything was great!
Rented for a wedding but didn't arrive in time. Will definitely be renting again! Like all dresses in this brand, you NEED to size up. But the fit is great and the color was really pretty in person.

I will never love another dress the way that I loved this one. I'm really not kidding. I wore it to my sorority formal, and I never wanted to take it off! It was incredibly comfortable and can be worn easily with a simple strapless bra. The color is AMAZING and it fell perfectly to the floor with 3 inch heels. I wish I could have it in my closet! I would recommend it to anyone!

As soon as I saw this dress on the website I knew it was the one. I wore it to my boyfriend's Military Ball for OCS. I received so many compliments on it and the ladies couldn't believe that I had rented it. It was the best decision I could have made! I hated the idea of buying a dress that I may never wear again. 
I was pleasantly surprised that the 0R fit as well as it did! Literally fit like a glove. Originally I thought it was too short but as the night went on I realized the length was perfect! Literally everything was perfect. So happy I discovered RTR! I WILL be a repeat customer!

This dress was so flattering, comfortable, and autumnal. I loved wearing this and would absolutely rent again. The fabric has a nice amount of stretch to it so I was able to wear the 2 despite being larger in the bust area. The cut is perfect so it accommodated my bust but was baggy around the waist. Nice, thick fabric, too! Highly recommend.
The dress fit well and was a good length for a petite size.

I usually wear a 12 or 14 but because of the reviews I read and the full skirt I decided to order a 10 and an 8. I could have worn either but went with the 10 for a little more length. Very comfortable. The fabric is absolutely gorgeous!!!

Arms were a little tight and the dress was a bit difficult to bend over in. Not too short and comfortable (and supportive) enough not to have to wear a bra or worry about popping out anywhere. The zipper was a bit broken and there were a few holes in the lace. It was a beautiful blue color and a great dress for the occasion and weather. I would still recommend and order again.

This dress is SO easy to wear and I got ENDLESS compliments. I wore it for a day out on Martha's Vineyard during my friend's bachelorette party. It is light, breezy, and super flattering. I would wear it every day. It didn't photograph super well on me, but I loved it regardless. I would rent again and highly recommend.

I thought the dress fit very well! The style seemed very unique to me and definitely different from what other people at the wedding were wearing. The color of the dress in person was more dull than what I perceived in the pictures, but I thought it was still a pretty dress.
Very roomy, comfortable and fun.
Loved this dress! It was light and comfortable. The pockets were a great touch. It ran a little large but I think it is meant to fit very loosely. I added a gold belt.

This dress was fun to wear! The neckline was a little higher than I would have liked, probably could have worn the small. The cotton fabric was super lightweight, but the pattern kept it from being see-through.
The dress was great except if you have a little more booty and thighs like me you have to use double sided tape to hold it down. It kept riding up as I walked. But besides that it fit like a glove.
I think runs true to size and fabric is pretty forgiving.

This dress fit wonderfully! A little long but a boot with a small heel helped me not to trip. I wore this 4 times over about 10 days, both for work and casual events. I dressed it up with a big chunky necklace or furry vest. Will definitely rent again.

This is a beautiful cotton top in person.  It's got little pom poms all over and is simply adorable.  It's a tailored fit and seems true to size.  The zipper is on the stiff side so you have to have very flexible arms to get it all the way up by itself.  Perfect for hot summer work event or even a day time date.

The fit was fantastic and made my hourglass look spectacular. I'm 5'2" and with 4" heals it swept the floor nicely. Beware of the super plunge! If your looking to show cleavage, this is the dress you. :)
The drop waist made my hips look large so I was a little self conscious. I got compliments on the dress though.  It was heavier so it's definitely not a summer dress.

Got lots of complainants! And absolute beautiful color. have a straight body type, read some reviews and went for the 8 instead of my usual 6. It fit more comfortably. Definitely a no bra dress which was fine with my small bust. The dress was structure but light enough for a summer wedding. The slip underneath is strange with some netting at the bottom, but didn't bother me! The only issue was the plastic part of framing for the bodice poked at me, but I was able to bend down.
Love how versatile this jumper was! You could rock it for summer or winter. It was slightly boxy, which is why i decided to belt it. Fit was true to size. Overall a great rental!
Wore these pants to a concert in Vegas and they're perfect! Blingy AND comfortable! Would absolutely rent again!

I'm in between the height requirements for the dresses - I'm 5'6.75". So I rented the long, and figured with the extra height from my 4.5" heels I'd be fine. Not so. I still had a tiny train and of course I was paranoid about that. The built-in corset was clutch. I also wore some extra-strength Spanx underneath - it's the type that goes up to just under one's bra, and it wasn't visible at all. 

I will say, I got some hips, and with the corset and Spanx and tight, I felt like I could not breathe. I felt like I could have gone with the 8. But everyone assured me I looked fine in the 6 and should wear it, and I definitely could move. (I didn't rent the 8 as my backup. S-M-R-T) People came up to me and complimented the dress so much. (whether that's the dress wearing me, or just that I looked awesome and the dress was great too, you decide) It's really just as lovely in person as it is online.
Dress for great and the sleeves never feel while I was dancing. I did have to wear a back lace bra. Only down side of the dress was that it pulled a little at the hips (this was minor).

I rented this matching set for a destination wedding in Mexico. It was great for beach formal attire. I got a ton of compliments on the outfit and felt great wearing it. The one con about this dress is that the top of the zippers do not have clasps so I had to keep checking to make sure the stop of the skirt stayed zipped to the top and didn't fall down. High quality, thick material. You don't need a bra. Great outfit- highly recommend.

I originally ordered a Lhuillier gown in 2 sizes (8 & 10L).  The 8 was too small, the 10 would have fit but the zipper seemed damaged and would not go. Got in touch with customer service on Friday morning, and they hooked me up with this one as a replacement, which arrived Saturday morning, in the nick of time for my Saturday night event  I got tons of compliments, loved the pockets (if you've ever worked at a formal event, you know what I'm taking about).  I'm 5'7" so with 3" heels the hem just brushed the ground. 
I have another formal event in the spring and will definitely rent again.

All night long I was getting compliments on how great this dress looked. It is a beautiful color and has a great fit. I am very bottom heavy (pear shaped) and the dress did not look vulgar or too sexy. It was just right. Being as how I have a smaller bust and torso, I would strongly suggest using some double sided fabric tape to avoid any nip slips.

Wore this dress for Valentines Day dinner with my fiancé. I loved the high neckline, long sleeves and fitted top. It was  very comfortable. My only complaint was the sizing ... This dress does run a little big as I usually wear a 4 but ended up going with the 2. The waist was a little loose, yet it was very fitted across the chest and arms (and I am extremely small chested).  Overall I was happy with it and recommend - just make sure you order a size down.

This dress is STUNNING. It was super comfortable and both sizes (2R and 0R) fit my body like a glove. The dress does run long, however, so the smaller size was more conducive to the height of my heels. The drop-back was the most flattering part, so ladies - wear your hair up or to the side with this dress! Also, this dress makes a statement all on its own, so the less jewelry, the better. I went with one sparkly ring and tinted gold cubic zirconia studs. 

This was my first time using RTR and I would HIGHLY recommend this for ladies who want to stun, but don't want to invest on adding another dress to their closet. I also wanted to note (after a return blooper on my end) that the customer service is FABULOUS.
It fits perfect! I ordered a 2 and 4. The 2 fit fine, but I went with the 4 so I could be comfortable and move around
Runs true to size. I received so many compliments! The fit is very flattering and the color is stunning.
True to size
Classy, but unique. Got a ton of compliments and was comfortable all night.
Really beautiful well made top. I paired it with skinny jeans leggings. Would be a great staple in anyone's closet.

Don't be mistaken the color of this dress is red-orange. I'd call it lava.  It looks great with a suntan or darker complections.  I think it would wash out the fairer skin tones. The only fit you really have to worry about is from your belly button up, so if you have narrower shoulders this dress is probably true to size.    I have more athletic shoulders so I sized up.

The dress fit true to size. I'm typically a 4 or a 6, and the 4 fit me better (the 6 was a bit too loose). I have a smaller bust and wider hips/big butt, and this dress was super flattering and hugged my curves. Didn't need to wear a bra, but a strapless would have worked too. In pictures the top looks bright silver, but in person it was more understated. I wore earrings and 3 inch heels and called it a night! This dress was comfortable and easy to dance in, and I'd definitely rent it again!

Tight in the arms.  Elegant. True to size. Great vibrant color.  I wore this to a fundraiser luncheon that I was speaking at. Pictures do not show whole dress sorry :(  This was my first rent the runway experience.  Absolutely loved the dress and would like to buy it but can not find it being sold anywhere online!  Other reviews of the dress were very accurate.
This dress was amazing and I got compliments the whole night. The dress does run a bit small but I felt comfortable in my actual size and did not have to go a size up.

First of all, this dress runs small. I usually wear a 0 or 2 based on the brand and as long as the material has some stretch, my larger chest fits. The 2 of this dress was way too tight on the top because there is no give in the material. It's a very durable dress, but it doesn't stretch at all, including the skirt part because I had to hike it up to go to the bathroom. Otherwise, the 4 fit perfectly and I got so many compliments! I wore the sticky cups to have a little more support, but it would also be okay without. I especially like that the back strap has two options for how tight you can make it. I went for the tighter one, but if you're worried about back fat the looser one is a great backup.
It fit true to size. It is very body forming but is still very flattering. I had so much fun in this dress!

I rented both a size 0 (my usual size) and a size 2 (backup). The 0 fit perfectly everywhere except the bust- this dress is probably better suited to someone with a more petite bust since there is no stretch in the fabric. If you wear anything larger than a D or DD cup I would definitely recommend going up a size larger than you think you'll need. I ended up gong with the 2, which was a little loose everywhere else but didn't squish my chest. However, the fit-and-flare shape does do a great job of showing off a smaller waist. I wish I could have kept this dress!

Pros:
-fabric was a beautiful shimmery grey, and was obviously high quality
-v-neck is very flattering

Cons:
-very heavy, was a little hot in Southern California heat
The dress was fitted but definitely not constraining. The pattern was really eye catching and the thicker jersey type material on the inside made it extremely comfortable to wear.

Dress was fun to wear- watch out for the train- don't forget to pick it up, when outside.
Top is tight- so size up for larger busts.

Lovely dress, sexy in a conservative way. The sleeves are fun and unique and the sheerness of the top balances out the high neckline and long sleeve. Needs a strapless black bra. It other than that, super easy to wear. I have a 3 month old so have the empire waist that wasn't tight worked well for me.
This dress fit well, looked great and was comfortable!  Loved the ease of this process!

This dress was great! I could have gotten away with the 4 (my usual size) but it felt a little tight in the hips and was also a little short for a wedding so I decided to size up to my backup dress which was a 6. Unfortunately the 6 came with a rip in the side seam. It seemed like RTR knew about this and sent it anyway because the dress had a piece of blue tape on it and a red piece of paper stapled around the arm. I removed those and did a quick fix in order to wear it that night. The dress itself does run a little small and the bottom is kind of weird - it's like a modified bubble hem and it looks a little uneven/sloppy. Other than that, the dress is great and was the perfect mix of fun, sexy, and easy going for an upscale backyard wedding.
So I ordered this dress for dinner, but it was way too short and them hem on the dress was completely unsewn so it looked awful. I don't recommend this dress for a curvy girl!

So I didn't realize it till it was too late that I could call to exchange for a different dress the night before my party. I'm a size 14 and RTR sent a 14 and a 16, which was amazing! Totally love that they do that! I tried on the 14 and it just didn't fit, I tried on the 16 and it fit but the zipper was pulling and it was lumpy in places it places it shouldn't have been. My mom who is a 10, tried on the 14 and it fit her the same way the 16 fit on me. The next day was my graduation party and I needed something to wear and I found a cute dress, size 14 that actually fit a little loose on me. I wish I could have worn this one because I loved the sequin design, but it made me look much more "hippy" than my figure and I think it made me look older than 26. Next time, I know to pay for the extra days to rent and to read all the notes it comes with so I will contact renttherunway.com to send over a different dress.

I kept reading conflicting reviews on here about how long the dress was (some saying even the R was plenty long), so I ordered the 4L and 6R. I'm between 5'8" and 5"9 and the L was definitely necessary if you want to wear heels (I had on ~4" heels). I could have worn either the 4 or 6. The 4 looked a bit better in the way the bottom draped, but the 6 was a bit more comfortable. I ended up wearing for 4 for the style and the length. Overall, the dress was wonderful. The zipper tends to get stuck, but don't fret. Just be patient, squeeze the zipper, and it'll work itself out.

I got this dress when my original order wasn't available at the last minute.  I ordered the medium and small as a back up. I have a larger booty and thighs and the small was a bit tight for that, the medium fit great. It slipped down a bit and I had to pull it up a few times at the top, some tape would have fixed that problem. The color is beautiful and I received many compliments. I wore a strapless bra and it didn't show. Wish I owned this dress. Loved it!

This dress was so flowy and gorgeous!  I did a size 0R only because the 0P wasn't available.  This dress was extremely long on me---I'm 5'2 and 1/2 and even with 3 inch heels I had to pick it up whenever I walked---but it otherwise was a good fit and was not at all baggy.  I loved that I was able to wear a normal bra with this one, and I definitely felt that it flattered my figure.  My sister wore it another night on our cruise (she's 5'4 and about 115 pounds) and it looked amazing on her too.  Love this dress!

I'm a true size 4 and this dress fit like a dream! It was comfortable, beautiful, and was the perfect dress for a work function/gala. I didn't have to worry about straps or coverage all night and still felt like a million bucks (I wore with a sticky bra and had no issues). Highly recommend!

I am small on top, so the top was large and I had to pin it, but the dress is stunning. The length is perfect. I would rent it again, and I would recommend it to a friend. I received SO many compliments!!

top is a sweatshirt like material, bottom is dress shirt material. there is a split, but i nvr found it to be indecent. i'm typically a 4 or 6 in carven, wore a small  and it fit perfectly. if my chest was any larger i would actually go up a size. the top is the only part that is fitted so if you're smaller than a 34C you can def get the small. this doesn't run small like most carven dresses. highly recommend for any work event!

While these pants fit rather loose in my typical size, they still looked good and were very comfortable. I think they are intended to fit that way. The fabric is very thick with a lot of stretch. I may try these again in a size 0 (which I never wear) to see if I like the fit better. The stripes are navy but they appeared black with my outfit choice. I'm relatively short so I paired them with heels.  I could see wearing these with some boat shoes and a white sweater for a more laid back look. I enjoyed them.

This dress fit well, I usually wear a six.  I am a B Cup with an athletic build and it seemed the dress would have looked better with someone who has more curves.  It was classy and dressy.  I wore it to a Masquerade Party on a Latin Dance Cruise.  Overall a great dress for a fun, fancy occasion.  The slit is pretty high in the front.  I had to use dress tape to keep the top from coming open.

This dress was a bit outside my comfort zone (usually go for black), but I thoroughly enjoyed wearing it. It throws some serious sparkles so be prepared!  I ordered a 2L and 4L, the latter fitting the best. Zipper was a bit tricky like mentioned before but not an issue as long as you have an extra pair of hands to help. I wore 3 1/2 in. nude heels, and the dress grazed the floor.  The enclosed double sided tape helped tremedously to keep the cleavage on the PG level ;). Overall, it was a fantastic first experience with RTR, will certainly be back for more!

This was my backup dress and I loved it so much I wore it!  The beading gets a little scratchy by the end of the night, but that's to be expected in this kind of dress.  Otherwise, comfy and a good fit.
This dress was perfect.  I did go to the local lingerie store for the right bra with clear straps.  The dress is lined, is well-constructed and the skirt falls beautifully.  I would buy this dress!

I originally ordered another jumpsuit, and this came as a back up. I fit perfectly. As a shorter person, the legs hit where pants are suppose to with heels on (instead of ankle length), and the other jumpsuit was too long. The cape was great for the mid-spring cooler weather, I only wish it was detachable when I hit the dance floor. Overall would recommend!
Neck area looks like it needs some stitching or something. The stars on the sweaters are cute, but it just looked weird to me because of the way the neck area is not well structured.

The dress fit true to size and was really flattering. It was fairly long. I am 5'5'' and wore 2.5'' heels and I had to grab the dress a few times to not trip on it. The boning in the top was digging in to my skin a bit toward the end of the night.
It fir great!!  If I rented again I might get reg versus long cause it was really long other than that it was perfect ;)
You can't go wrong with a LBD! It fit great and also had some stretch to it. The only con is that I had to pull up the strapless side a few times throughout the night.
Dress has pockets, what else do you need?  A bit low cut, but great length.  The sequence did not bother me like other reviewers mentioned.

This is the first dress I've been sad to send back! I've rented some other great ones, but this one was gorgeous and extremely COMFORTABLE which is a rare combination! The lace is so soft and the under layer is silky and skims the skin, unlike many other dresses (where it's often tight and stiff). The color is beautiful and the giant lace is so pretty...I got compliments all night. The tea length made dancing a breeze and I didn't have to worry about any mishaps. My only "fix" would be making the straps adjustable but it was fine for the night. If you're on the fence about renting, just commit...I don't think you'll be sorry.

Amazing quality and very flattering. It didn't droop on me or need too be tugged up often like some dresses. Usually a Long works for me but in this case it was just too much fabric for me to walk confidently. I think a Regular would have been perfect in this particular dress. The color is as pictured, a beautiful bright red.
The material and cut of this dress were perfect for a beach wedding.  I highly recommend it!
The  dress fits true to size , tends to run up a little  when waking but no big deal
I wore this to the AHA Heart Ball. Perfect dress, lots of compliments, and great experience. It was not my first choice but that option did not fit so RTR overnighted it and it was perfect.
I loved this shirt dress.  It's super comfortable and the cut out shoulders give it a bit of an edge.  I wore it with tights and boots on a cold night out.  I'd probably buy it.

This dress really is a magnificent dress. It was very comfortable all night, and I never had to worry about it being too short (I'm 5'9" and was wearing 3in heels). The pockets held my phone, id and cash, and a rollerball perfume and you couldn't even tell they were full. I could have easily fit more in them too but I didn't have anything else I needed. No problem with the under arm scratching as other people suggested. Really just a flattering dress that catches the eye. I paired mine with shoes very similar to the picture and an updo.

The dress was amazing. It was comfortable and fit like a glove. I ordered the 2R and 4R but went with the 4R. I am petite and was scared the regular was going to be too long but with heels it fit perfectly.

I rented this dress initially for a wedding ceremony, but had another dress I also rented for the same occasion so I ended up wearing this for a brunch.  Dressed it down a bit with boots and a black scarf but I still felt a little overdressed for the occasion.  This is a GREAT dress and fits really well.  If I have another occasion I would rent this dress again in a heart beat and wear with black heels.  Highly recommend!

Although this dress was adorable and I got a lot of positive feedback, the sleeves were VERY tight.  I would say I have average sized arms, maybe a tad big, and these sleeves seemed to be made for stick figures.  I couldn't lift my arms above my head all night, which was fine, but not the most comfortable.  I loved the style, though, and the length was excellent.  Overall, I was quite pleased with the dress.
I really needed a size 16, however, I pulled it off with the 14.

I rented this dress to wear to a fundraiser supporting the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation. Our 2.5 year old was born with CF. (Please learn more at cff.org) Purple is the color of the CF Awareness ribbon.

The shoulder straps of the dress were very loose on me. There was one to two inches of fabric that I had to safety pin up in the back to keep the dress up and avoid a wardrobe malfunction. The sticky tape that RTR sent with my order did not help as it just stuck to the inner lining and made the lining show. This could be due to the fact that I have virtually no boobs from breastfeeding two kids. But it is worth noting that it did not fit on top. I do agree with the sequins being very scratchy! I would not recommend this dress to ladies with my figure, with nothing to put in the top of the dress. Also, the alternate size 8L was so big that it would have shown my whole chest area had I worn it. Just noting that also. The rest of the dress fit great, very flattering

Every Elizabeth and James dress I've worn fits like a glove, and gets compliments nonstop. I saw JoJo the Bachelorette wear this and I had to have it. Their dresses are so comfortable and flattering (my friend is also wearing E&J) and the color was to die for. Another satisfied rental.

The dress was beautiful.  It was too long for me but I am only 5 ft tall.  My only complaint is the way it is cut it makes your hips look a little wider than they actually are.  It's still a gorgeous dress but if you have a curvy figure be ware.
I liked wearing this dress, it was very girly and fun! Good SOLID black Dress!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was perfect! Everyone gave me compliments all night long! The dress was true to size and the pockets were amazing! Sleeves were a little tight like everyone is saying but after I put the dress on I completely forgot about the sleeves. The dress is a little heavy and the wedding I attended was an outside wedding so I was kind of hot but I didn't care because the dress was beautiful! I really really really wish I could have kept this dress!
I am normally between a small and a medium, but how this dress is not fitted, a small fit me perfectly. It is a little short, especially when I sat down. Beautiful color and not baggy.

I wore a bra to fill out the bust a bit more; other than that, the dress fit well. To add a little emphasis to the waist, I did wear a small nude belt. My information isn't loading below; I am a 5'1", athletic, short, 36A person, for reference.
The dress fits true-to-size. I am 5"7 and had to wear this with heels so it wasn't dragging on the ground but the dress was easy to wear and the cut-outs made it a ton of fun!

Simply sexy, the cut out and the open back were subtle ways to spice up the typical little black dress.  I am very upset that I don't have a proper picture of me in the dress...I felt so beautiful and confident and had so much at the wedding!

If you don't look good on peplum shirts you won't like this. Top was large and I am a 32D waist is not for girls with hips . Top was to baggy and the color is more of a yellow cream. I sent it back. Tall girl dress!

Loved the pockets! Bust is snug- but has built in corset so no need for a bra. 

Fabric is incredible. Felt so fancy all night!

Loved the fit of this dress, it was extremely flattering in the waist and true to size. The adjustable straps were awesome. The cutout was a fun detail but felt a little awkward. The material for the back panel was kind of casual and loose-fitting, which is very different from the skirt (more formed fitting). Overall a beautiful dress, I felt great in it all night long! Super easy to wear with a strapless bra and definitely easy to dress up or down.

My phone photos do not do this dress the justice it deserves.  It is so perfectly well made of a pseudo scuba fabric but softer. The color is more of a plum/hot pink than what presents here. The fit is perfect for my petite frame and the length hits at mid calf on 5'3". I received a lot of compliments on it's flattering silhouette. I would highly recommend renting this for work or if you are presenting at a conference. The color alone demands attention. I wore this with a black ankle strap pointy toe heel.

The dress fits true to size & the top is beautiful. I read a bunch of reviews so I knew the dress was long before deciding to rent this dress & sadly it didn't work out -- however, I didn't realize that there was just so much fabric on the bottom that the dress dragged all around me even with 5" heels on (I'm 5' 3"). I desperately wanted to like this dress but not at the cost of having to worry about tripping/tearing the dress during my whole evening so I ended up returning the dress & RTR was able to overnight me a different dress in time.
Great dress! I wore it to work and then to dinner. Beautifully made, with flattering details in the fabric and cut.
With 4" heels the L was about .5" too long- and I'm 5'6".
Fit perfectly. Only minor issue was that mY heel kept getting snagged on the bottom of my dress
This item is NOT for women with a full bust!! I had to return it and replace it with a new item because it wouldn't fit over my chest -- definitely be careful with sizing.
The dramatic back but the covered up front was beautiful and appropriate. The dress sat perfectly and the length was just right with a heel. I would wear it to all occasions!!!

I rented this for my best friend's fiesta-themed bridal shower that I hosted. I was concerned the off the shoulder would be limiting with movement, but the dress was so comfortable and easy to wear. Also a standout when others typically go for solid color dresses. The dress is pretty loose so not all photos are super flattering, but I felt skinny and fun in person!
DVF is always a good choice. This was the perfect work dress, hit right above the knee and is so flattering.  The fabric is light, and the dress would probably work well for any season or event.
Pros-so sparkly and pretty cons-it was too big up top

Great outfit to make you feel great. Material is cute and comfortable - pic is hard to see the detail. 

My body type - I am average height and did a regular, fit good. All my weight goes to my stomach area, so I try to stay away from outfits that focus on that area. This outfit does focus on this area, but I didn't feel like it clung too much. The outfit comes tighter in the stomach and then had form fitting pants - this helped give me a bit of a butt, since I have none. I also have small boobs, making the shoulder straps a little loose - but not to the point of falling off the shoulders. It felt great under the armpits. Also, the V neck cut wasn't too low in the front or back to wear a bra with the outfit. Lastly, threw on a little shaw to give it a pop of color. Hope this helps - happy renting!

First off, the shipping. I received the dress two days before my scheduled event date (which made me super happy) so that was great. We were a bit skeptical about RTR at first, since it's an online rental service, but everything came through smoothly!! The first size I ordered was a 4R... which was a mistake. I thought to myself "Well, high end brands have smaller numbers than not high ends brands, so I may be a 4..." WRONG. COMPLETELY. AND UTTERLY. WRONG. Thank goodness I ordered a 6P as a back up. And I HIGHLY recommend ordering a backup; you never know, you may need it. Also, while the dress fit nicely, I still had a bit of a problem keeping the dress up. It was just a slight problem though, my bra fell more often than my dress did, if that tells you anything. I believe it falls a bit because it's rather heavy and has so many sequins, but don't let that keep you from getting this dress. It's a slight annoyance, but TOTALLY worth it. It is seriously the only con, but that comes with just about every strapless dress out there. Secondly, despite what the page says, I HIGHLY recommend ordering a petite size if you are shorter than 5'5. I am 5'3, and the petite was barely short enough to keep from getting caught on my 4 inch heels. Also, as for jewelry (if you are thinking about renting jewelry... I didn't, but here is just some advice) brassy golds don't go very well with this dress, instead, go for lighter colored golds. I have also noticed that diamond gold earring tie everything jewelry-wise together, so I recommend getting your hands on some of those. ANYWAYS, this dress was absolutely wonderful and Rent the Runway is probably the best deal you can get out there.

This shirt was really uncomfortable. It was extremely tight around my wrists, forearms, and biceps (and I don't have huge arms). The other parts fit fine, but getting my arms through the sleeves was very hard and once I got it on, it felt like it was cutting off my circulation.
