I wore it out to dinner and immediately took it off when I got home.
Gorgeous dress and super flattering. I originally choose this dress because I thought it looked good on everyone who reviewed it and it definitely did not disappoint!

Overall great choice. Good fit, tue to size, and moderately weighted fabric. The size 8 was a tad blousey on top, but the skirt portion fit just right. Although it was a bit short (hitting mid-thigh on a 5'4 frame), it was not inappropriate for a daytime event. The only downside, I felt the dress didn't photograph as well, and came across a bit boxy.

I am 5'1 and a TRUE hourglass (petite). I have a 32-34dd bust, 26 waist, and 36 hip. I took a 4R and a 6R. They both fit true-to-size (if you have an hourglass figure). I would not recommend this dress for someone with no curves. The size 6 was okay, but a little loose in the armpit and hip. The 4 fit like a glove. The zipper did get stuck, and I couldn't get the dress off after initially trying it on, and the zipper bowled out from the bottom (which turned out to be a major catastrophe). I called RTR in a panic. They couldn't send me another one in time, but they were very active in trying to help me find a new dress and told me I could come to their "off limits" Soho location and pick anything in my size at no cost. They were really trying to help-which I appreciated, but I just couldn't get my mind off this dress! I insisted on wearing it-even if I wore the bigger size. At last, the mgr megan offered to have a local seamstress replace the zipper at no cost to me. I was SO relieved to see that the zipper was replaced in under 3 hours on the DAY of my event and that I was going to be able to wear it after all! It turns out that the manager credited me for the whole thing b/c a tooth on the zipper track was bent, and it was what caused the problem. They felt bad for the inconvenience and made up for it-which is exactly the great kind of customer service I was looking for! *If you ever have a problem-just ask for a manager right away (I had tried a few customer service girls a few times before I found one who knew what to do-which was annoying) but thank you to Megan and Talia for using their heads!
This dress was actually very comfortable to sit in for long periods. The dress would've been too long, but I wore a 5 1/2 inch heel with it. (So if you're petite and don't like huge heels, get the petite size.) The fabric loosens up after wearing it a few hours. I felt like this dress was designed for me. It looked absolutely fabulous!

What a feminine number by Nicholas! This is such a cute and comfortable dress for every day! I would recommend that you do size up, at least for the backup size, since this dress does run a little small. This dress definitely does work best for A to C cup sizes and I found it to be a little tight in the arms because there isn't a much stretch in the fabric. At 5'6, I did find this dress a little short for my liking! However, with a pair of black tights and booties, I would love to wear this to my next dinner with my girlfriends!
Dress ran large so I went down a size as it was more flattering on me. Looks great with a cute pair of wedge shoes.

Cute top that was a perfect length (I'm 5'8 with a long torso) but the cap sleeves were a little large, and I would have liked it to be a little more fitting around the waist, but the top wasn't too large that anything peeked out, but I should have rented the small. Overall, a cute top that was perfect with blank pants and heels.
You cannot wear any Spanx, underwear under this as you can see all lines so no bumps or bulges can be seen.  Loved this dress!

As my first Herve, I absolutely LOVED this dress and didn't want to return it! Obviously, it's very fitted, but I was surprised that it wasn't sausage-casing tight. I liked this dress because it came to just above the knee and I didn't have to worry about it being too short and revealing. Since I am small chested, I didn't bother wearing a bra, this dress fit like a sports bra and held my little girls in no problem, no slipping (no tape either, but I don't have a lot to lose either). I'm a pretty athletic build, but I was happy that the dress gave the visual illusion of  nice curves. I can't wait to try another Herve, I felt like a goddess in this dress!

What a gorgeous wrap dress--the fabric is GORGEOUS, and the open back is sexy. Both the 4 and 6 fit, but I opted for the 6 to have a bit of extra coverage for my larger bust. I wore without a bra, and needed one safety pin for the girls. :) As other reviews noted, the slit on the bottom is high when sitting, but again, all you need is a safety pin to rectify.

Rented this dress for my sisters graduation, was very comfortable the whole day. People stopped me everywhere to tell me how much they loved the dress. Even after graduation and a family dinner, I was comfortable enough in the dress to change into converse sneakers and wear it our with my friends, and it still looked cute.  It was heavy which is a sign of being well made, was worried I would be too hot in the Alabama heat but I turned out to be very comfortable. Would consider buying this dress.
Great dress, very comfortable!
If you are a taller girl, I suggest ordering the taller size, I'm 5'5" and this regular was perfect length with heeled shoes.

This was very comfortable. Both sizes 8 and 10 fit however I opted for the 10 because I wanted room to eat and dance. This was a NO fuss dress and I didn't even have to wear a bra. I would recommend it but make sure you order a size larger than normal.

I'm 5'10, but the regular size dress fit me perfectly!  It was long enough to wear with 3-inch heels. I'm usually a 4/6, but I went in the story and the 2 fit perfectly, which has never happened to me before in my life -- it definitely runs a little bigger than most 2's. The back is gorgeous/a little sheer, but my black strapless bra didn't distract from the dress and was very hidden (I was worried about finding the right bra).

I rented this dress for an annual conference my company runs. The material quality was great. Lots of stretch. If you are wondering if it is black with brown or green, it is green. I wore Spanx with it, which helped, but I would say if you have a tummy, this dress does not cover it well.
The sleeves are a little tight but they zip and I kept them unzipped all night.  Comfortable dress to dance in and a great color!

This dress was effortless! It did run a little big, so I got the SR which worked really well for me!  I threw on some gold bracelets and was good to go!  Definitely would recommend this maxi if you are looking for something fun and super easy!
Great for work. The fit was sculpting and flattering.

I wore the R instead of the Long size. I'm about 5'8 and with 3 inch heels it still hit the ground - so it definitely runs long! I usually sit between a 2 and 4, so I'm glad I got both sizes. I am not busty, so I sized down. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because I found the sizing a little tricky, an in-between size would have been perfect. Otherwise, it's an awesome dress to accessorize however you want!
Cute dress but ran a little big, especially in the hips. Wish I had sized down.

The dress was too large in the bust area like everyone has said. Everything else fit true to size. The bust was very hard to adjust but it worked out. I would recommend this dress, it got me so many compliments and I definitely lit up the dance floor at prom.

Wore this for the gala for our annual work convention. Had initially picked another dress but it was unavailable at the last minute. RTR went above and beyond to get another dress for me in time. Best customer service I've ever had. Got so many compliments on this dress all night long! Comfortable to dance in as well. Very happy with the whole experience. Would highly recommend, both the dress and RTR. Thanks again!
This is a great jacket.  I rented it with a white dress for work, and it looked very professional and fashionable.
I wore this dress to a christmas party and got lots of compliments on it. It was comfortable and warm for the weather. The fit was good and it wasn't too short.  Loved the dress.
Just okay. Didn't wear.  A little worn
This sweater dress was so cute. It was very comfortable. It fit very well. I wore it with tights and black boots. It is very slimming and a great material. I would definitely rent again.
Sequins are hard to wear in general, but felt accessible in this dress. Got a lot of compliments and felt great!

If you are a curvy gal you'll rock this dress, but MAKE SURE you get the right size. I ordered a 4 (I usually wear a 4) and I actually should have ordered a size 6.  To sum it up, It ran a little small but was a beautiful dress.

I feared this might be the sort of dress that only looks good on tall, willowy women, but I have to say it was very flattering! I am wide and heavy in the hips and thighs, but this emphasized that in a good way. I'm currently 160 lbs at 5'3", and I wore the 10. It was tight in the hips, yes, but it needs to be for the right fit. I definitely had extra space in the waist and bust, but the dress didn't show it. Got lots of compliments! It's low but not too low cut, and I could wear a regular bra which I love!

I LOVED THIS DRESS! I felt like Taylor Swift in her music video about Romeo and Juliet...minus the body, crimped hair and hot guy.

I wore this to a family wedding (sister on the right wore another sparkly RTR that was gorgeous), and felt elegant and beautiful- received lots of compliments. The dress has pockets and was very functional for phone and lipstick. The style and fabric was perfect for the fall indoor/outdoor wedding because it was thick enough when cold and exposed enough skin when hot. I did have to grab it up off the dance floor once my heels came off, but that made it all the more fun :)  I was nervous about the size, because I sometimes need a size 14 and it only came in 12, but it fit perfect! I have a smaller waste (in proportion to my booty and legs) and after reading the waste ran smaller in other reviews, guessed correctly that it would work. The 10R fit as well but was a bit more snug on top and I liked the length in the 12 better.  I did pin the top to keep my cleavage at bay...did I mention there was lots of dancing? The back was surprisingly supportive, and I wore a lower backless bra for some support. I hope whomever wears this next feels as beautiful as I did!
Glad I had the 8 because the 6 had some lace pulled:(  they both fit...the 8 was slightly looser.

I wore this dress to my senior prom. The fit was amazing. After a while it started to fit a bit loose in the bust area so I found myself readjusting it up every once in a while. That was such a small detail, so it did not matter. The dress is gorgeous and perfect if you are going for a simple and elegant look.

If it was true to size, a little tight in the chest if you have a bigger bust. There was a small snag on the left-hand side in the front, but you couldn't notice it once it was on. The color was beautiful, it popped!

Really no cons - received a lot of compliments from people I didn't know, especially women! 
It's very sexy and elegant at the same time.
Fit me like a glove
I really wanted this dress to fit because it is so classic and pretty. However it was just too tight/short. I am going to return it and size up to see if that works!
Everyone loved it. Fits quite snugly, if I had gone up a size it would have been too large.  It was very heavy, too heavy for a Florida wedding.

Loved this dress. I'm typically always a size 4, however I went with the 2. The 4 fit me better in the rib cage, but the a line shape on my more hour glass figure just didn't look as flattering. It made my bottom half appear larger. Tthe more fitted size 2 with less dramatic of an A line shape was a better fit for me. It fit like most size 2s in the rib cage as it was a big snug, but since I wore a sticky bra and not a normal bra, I could get away with it here.  As for the color, it is a bit more orangey than pictured, but definitely still red. The second picture I put up I think shows the true color more, excuse the wind blown hair. I never really go for reds, so it was a nice change of pace, and I felt like I stood out among the other dresses at the wedding. The quality of the dress was beautiful, thought that I would have a bigger problem with wrinkling but I didn't really notice or care. Would definitely recommend renting!
The long was a little too long, but I didn't wear heels. Regular would fit most.
The dress fit really well, but as mentioned in other reviews, the arms are somewhat large & loose.
I loved this dress.  The fabric is very nice, it can be dressed up or down.
I got this dress for a wedding and it was a big hit.  I wear a 4 or a 6 depending on the brand and dress and ended up wear the 6.  The fit was perfect, classy and just a little bit sexy.

Great fit, but probably looks best on hourglass shapes. I looked very wide in it because of where the waist hit. The lace quality is ok, I've noticed this brand really cheaps out on the lace they used compared to similar styles and brands for the same price, like Self Portrait. I got another dress from the same line and the lace was terrible. But this one, being black, can get away with it. The back looks great, but again probably best for hour glass, it cuts you in half at the waist.
dress runs true to size.  lots of compliments
Easy pants for transitional weather and go with so much. Can dress up and dress down.
Fit is a little snug/unforgiving, but the shape and the pattern are super cute!
This dress didn't make sense to me.  The front slit was at an odd angle and the side slit looked like a loose piece of fabric.  Do not rent this dress.

This dress was waaaaay too small. I usually wear a size 6 and got a size 8 and I had to get two friends to help me zip it up and it was so small my chest basiccally disapeared. If I had gotten the right size it woud have been a very nice dress, the fabric was nice and it was very elegant, just maybe order two sizes up.

I got this as a backup dress because after an order that didn't work out I always have a backup style just in case.  This dress was great just not for me.  I am on the shorter side and it was a bit long for my taste.  It made me look shorter also.  My hair got caught on the sequins just when I tried it on for 5 minutes.   I would recommend an up do for this dress if you are renting.  Other than that it was comfortable but a little big overall.  It depends on how you like dresses to fit but I would size down when renting this because it does have a significant amount of stretch.

This was my first experience with Rent the Runway, and boy was I impressed! I received a call from a representative two days before the dress was to arrive, checking in with me to see if I wanted to change my size or add anything else to my purchase. I recieved my dress the day before the event (as told), and it fit perfectly.

This is a true to size dress. If you are a curvy woman, and want to show off your curves, this is the dress for you! I felt sassy and classy. If you are tall like me, you will want to go with the long.

My only grip that I have, was that there were a few bumps where the zipper is located on the hip. Other than that, the dress was great.

Tibi is changing the game on day to night dresses! Even though this dress is 100% silk, on my 5'4 138 pound frame, I found it to run a little on the large side. If you are bigger in the bust and smaller in the hips, you would love this little number.  I also loved the Estrella Printed Silk Skirt Dress because the detailing is actually stars not polka dots! As if finding something to wear to work isn't hard enough, you don't have to worry about any special undergarments here.Highly recommend this dress!

I usually wear size 6 but went with size 4 due to my smaller chest not filling out the 6 well which made the front of the dress longer than the back with the larger size.  Not too flattering in pictures at the midsection due to the way sequins captured the light.  Very comfortable to wear.  Sequins being itchy was not a problem at all for me.  Lots of compliments.

I am 5'7 and this dress hit about two inches below the knee. Really pretty Teal Green color. The off-the-shoulder style makes the dress. Thick-thick material fyi, no Spanx required, but it was heavy/hot for an outdoor wedding.
Very pretty, classy dress. Pretty heavy though and slightly itchy fabric. I'm very busty and could wear it without a bra (bc of open back). I usually wear a 16w or so and the 20w fit perfectly.
I am 5'11" and the dress was just long enough in the back, but an inch or two short in the front, my flat shoes showed the whole time.

This dress worked perfectly for a black tie event at a resort in the fall. I am short (5'2) and don't always love the idea of the high/low dress for my height, but this one was worked well for me. Comfortable and pretty!
Fits very well it's a little small and make sure to order longer than usual it runs short but even with it being short it was still a gorgeous dress#valentinesparty

Fun fabric, sparkly but not too much.  Skirt has a great, flattering shape.
Would rent again.
Fit like a glove, forgiving yet sexy. The back is amazing. It was super comfortable, fun to dance in, all around perfect. Big fan.

I loved this gown!  The color is beautiful and the material is very forgiving.  Details like the square neckline, lace sleeves & back, and double slits in front make this gown amazing from every angle.  I ordered the 6R and 8R.  I didn't see much difference; I wore the 6.  I'm only 5'3", so I wanted a dress that I could shorten with hem tape.  I ordered the tape with my gown and it did the trick beautifully!  I have a large chest, so I purchased the Braza strapless backless bra and it worked perfectly.  The lace on the back is lined with a light nude fabric which helps conceal anything that you may wear under it.  I received compliments all night and felt like a million bucks!  Highly recommend!

I'll preface this review by saying I have about 44" hips and a 29" waist, so keep in mind I was trying to fit my pear shape into a "straight and narrow" dress, but this barely came close to fitting, and I'm a very true size 6. It was also that '70s era polyester type material and was duller and more peachy than the picture. I could barely squeeze it over my hips and it showed EVERYTHING (I could see my belly button), but you can't wear any "slim-wear" because of the open back. It's also very short, but I do have long legs. The perfect body for this is under 5'5", no hips and no fat on your stomach. If that's not you, then size up, maybe twice... Or rethink your selection. The skirt on this, though... I was a little iffy because it was cape-like, but it was actually so beautiful in person!
Loved this dress! It fit perfectly on top and was comfortable throughout the entire night. The only problem was that the zipper on both dresses was very hard to get up.

Gorgeous rich color, nice thick fabric, fits tight like a glove, hugging the curves. I have small chest and wide hips, but the fit was amazing, Really beautiful dress, i loved it so much, i want to buy it now. Got a lot of compliments. Fits true to size, maybe a tiny bit snug on the hips, but was still very comfortable. Ladies, this one is a winner.

This came as part of my Rent the Runway At Home Trial.  It fit great and was super cute.  The lace gives it a flirty, sophisticated look.  I plan to rent this for an upcoming baptism.  You could change the look with accessories - dainty jewelry and shoes for a more upscale look or chunky jewelry and wedges for a more casual look.
#rehearsaldinner
Difficult to zip, but I'm sure that is normal. This dress is not too low-cut and is flattering even with a smaller bust.

This dress was perfect for my black and white gala. I loved how it fit and flattered all the right places. The length was perfect with heels and the slit made the dress sophisticated sexy. I am actually a 32G and this had enough room in the bust, the fabric stretches nicely. I wore spanx but I don't think I needed to. I paired it with an incredible Oscar de la Renta necklace (also from RTR).

This ran large.  I am usually a 4-6 in dresses (more often a 6 when it comes to fitted/no stretch dresses due to the rib cage/chest area) and the 4 was even large.  The straps ran a bit long and are not adjustable.  I was still able to wear this without fashion tape.  I just had to be mindful of my posture.  The length was longer than intended, but even at 5'3" I was still able to wear this.  I wore a 3" chunky nude heel and I would wear this height at a minimum.

The first thing I noticed when I took both sizes out of the garment bags was that the fabric on each was different. They were both bright blue lace, but the pattern of the flowers on the size 4 was more spaced out, and the size 6 was closer and also had some white in it (you can see the comparison in the third picture). I thought that was kind of strange, but not a deal breaker. I ended up wearing the larger size since it was warmer out than I was anticipating and the liner on this is pretty solid so I wanted a bit more breathing room. I would suggest wearing a belt with this, since the pattern and style together can be a bit overwhelming, and I found that my shape got a little lost. But, I got a lot of compliments on it, and would totally recommend this one - just maybe when it's a little cooler out.

Overall, I didn't like this dress as much as I thought I would. The color is not like the dress shown in the picture is much deeper like a maroon. The fabric is thick and tight like a body con dress. Maybe if I had a bigger size I wouldn't have felt so uncomfortable.
This is a party dress - I rented for a work meeting and couldn't wear it. Cute dress tho. Just know that the gold is sparkly.

I would have loved this dress for a wedding event if it weren't for the fact that it bunched up a lot at the top where the bodice lining attached to the lace.  If I had bought the dress, I could have altered it and made it work, but under the circumstances, I just had to go with it.  I had it delivered to me out of state because the first dress I ordered didn't work for me, so I really didn't have a suitable option.  Fortunately the dress fit, and it was a beautiful color, and I doubt anyone even noticed the malfunction of the dress except me, but being the perfectionist when it comes to clothing, I was less than comfortable with it.
I don't know why but this dress reminds me of raspberry sherbet...which is delicious, just like this dress. Haha. Comfortable and gorgeous.
The fit was amazing, I got tons of complements and felt great.  Highly recommend!  I usually wear a small or xsmall, went with small on this one.

I got the 2 and the 4, and wound up wearing the 2. Both sizes fit similarly in the waist, but the top of the 4 was too big- the straps were falling off my shoulders. I got lots of compliments on it- would definitely recommend it!
fit perfect, did not wrinkle, so easy and felt beautiful!
The fabric is not silky, as it looks in pictures, but it fits wonderfully. Once you squeeze yourself in, it holds everything in place and looks fabulous. I got so many compliments!

Thankful that I ordered 2 sizes smaller than my normal size as by backup size. I am 5'6", 135 pounds, and wore a size 4 for the first time in 3 years. Do not order big on this one! Overall the dress fit really well and I got tons of compliments on it. I did use tape under the dress just to keep it in place all night.
Loved everything about this cute comfy dress. Great for every day wear.

This was a great quality dress with pops of color.... I did not wear as it did run large and the sleeves were too long for me to adjust for a rental... Would be a great rental for a candidate that is tall!

I loved the dress so much, I wish I could keep it forever! It did run a little big, but I wore it anyway. It was a backup for a dress that ran super small, so I felt I needed to order larger sizes, but Marchesa runs a little big I guess. I could have worn the 6L for sure. It requires a steam before wear as it wrinkles easily, but it doesn't matter because it's sooo beautiful. 5 stars!
Loved the floral fabric and pattern along with the mesh detailing. Unfortunately, I was unable to wear this dress because I could not get it over my wide hips. Total disappointment.
The top ran a bit big, however it was not as long as I thought it would be. I usually would wear a Small but the X-Small was a good fit..definitely not too tight! Light fabric, good quality!

Most of the reviews I read about this dress said that it ran big. I thought the opposite. I usually wear a size 8 and it fit but it was tight. Luckily, I didn't order the size 6. Other than that, the dress was amazing! It was comfortable and flattering. Overall, RTR wins again. Love it! This is my second time ordering from RTR and I loved both of my experiences so far! :)
This dress hits all the marks. It's flattering, the fabric is a great weight, it's comfortable, you can wear a normal bra. Just overall extremely easy to wear.
So it may just be me, but the dress was itchy near the back I think bc of the material; I liked the dress though and wore it and it was great to wear to work with tights and boots!

Wore this to my bridal shower when my original choice wasn't available.  I was glad they sent this one though as I did want to wear it, I was just nervous it would be to hot for my July shower.  Luckily I was inside in the AC all day so it wasn't a problem.

Like other reviewers said, its tight in the rib cage and my C/D cups were a little squished, but nothing terrible.  I carry a lot of weight in my stomach and hips so I was a little bulgy there, but spanx helped.

Overall I loved this dress and got lots of compliments.
fit true to size, sleeves a bit tight but I have large arms. overall very comfy and figure flattering. my fiancé loved it!

I wore this to a gala where I wanted to look chic but professional. It was the perfect dress - very Claire Underwood. The fabric is stretchy and forgiving. The bodice is structured and although the sleeves are off-the-shoulder, there is some sticky fabric that helps them stay up. It runs slightly large, so I'd order down a size. Great dress!

Great website to rent from, was so easy...arrived on time, affordable, easy to follow directions on how to mail back and everything came packaged nice. Dress was so beautiful, I absolutely loved it. Runs true to size.
I think I actually could have gone one size smaller as it ran a bit larger through the midsection, but that also made it incredibly comfortable throughout the night.

I was so happy I chose this dress for a friend's wedding. It was definitely a standout because of the bright blue color and I felt great. I couldn't wear a bra with this, which would ordinarily be a problem for me, but the dress fit so well that it wasn't a problem even with a larger chest. 

I felt great and got a ton of compliments and I was comfortable all night on the dance floor. 

One thing I have to mention that another reviewer commented on is that the colors vary based on dress size. The size 6 was definitely a brighter (and prettier) blue than the size 8 backup I ordered. I would have been a little disappointed with the color if I had had to size up. Luckily it wasn't an issue for me.
Perfect fit, size 0 was true to size. I love this dress!
The lace around the neckline is a nice detail but it is delicate and folds over a bit.

Runs a little big, kind of tricky zipper. This dress had a good opaque lining. Plenty of room in the bust but it wasn't too cleavage-y. Just overall a very flattering cut. I wore it with nude pumps, but if I had more of a tan, I probably would have worn black.
Very bold piece, should be pieced with subtle accessories and light makeup.

This was my first time ordering from RTR; it was such a great experience! I must have read hundreds of reviews before ordering because I was unsure of sizing. I wanted to find something that was comfortable and elegant because I was attending a black tie event and I'm currently 28 weeks pregnant. The dress fit perfectly. I'm usually a size 2/4 in dresses and ended up wearing the 6.

The only trouble I had was that my B-cup size left the front a little loose, luckily I ha my super VS bombshell bra with extra gel inserts lol and then everything filled out nicely. So if your larger than a B cup you may have no problem, if your A-B you may want to prepare fill it out ;)

The fit was perfect. The fabric is holds its shape well and isn't like saran wrap on your body, so you can shamelessly over indulge in comfort food without anyone else knowing. The hem line is definitely short, but that's exactly why I picked it. It was perfect for a summer birthday party. It's a fun and put together. If this dress were in my closet it would 100% be my go to dress for most occasions.

The 8L was perfect. I did not wear a bra or anything with this. Its fit beautifully and clung without being skin tight. Completely gorgeous. I loved it. I wanted to keep it! I received so many compliments. The length was perfect and I wore anout four inch heels. 

You will not regret this one!!!
I am short but have a large bust, so dresses are usually too long for me! The fit was perfect, it was just too long! So I actually temporarily pinned the hem and no one knew.
It was a nice top I wore with a bodycon skirt. It is loose fitting, but still sexy. I love tops like this and it is hard to find such a combo - i bought it!

I wore this to a cocktail attire holiday party. I got lots of compliments for wearing "winter white" (there was a snowstorm so it was even more appropriate). I usually wear a 0 but the 2 fit like a glove. I thought it was a bit short even on me (I do lean towards a bit more length on my 5 foot body). I was not able to wear spanks but control top hose worked well without showing below the hem. Wore a normal bra. I paired this dress with bright red pumps to make it more festive.

This was the third dress I got from RTR.  My first one was damaged, the second had a horrible fit so this one was sent Friday night and arrived Saturday morning for a Saturday evening wedding.  Thank goodness it fit.  The color is gorgeous and the beaded bodice with a low back makes the dress more elegant.  The skirt even has pockets!  Be warned -- the skirt if very voluminous and I felt a little like I was wearing a hoop skirt so something.  Definitely a do for an evening wedding.
This is just your average sheath dress. The beading detail is nice but it's not super dressy.

The fit was great, and very comfortable.  I thought the sparkles would be annoying but they were not, it was easy to sit and move in.  I was able to wear a bra and it was not too revealing, which I was worried about it.  Overall it was great!!

Such a fun jacket for a rocker vibe. I paired it during the day with black skinny jeans, white t-shirt and for a night out with  black silk drapey paints and a silk tank, with the gold lariat necklace from RTR. So versatile and super warm.

I rented this dress for my sister. I usually wear a 2 to 4, the dress is a 6, and it still fit me beautifully. It even has small snaps under the shoulder area to hold in bra-straps.  My sister ended up wearing it (pictured, usual size 6 to 8) and she looked like a million bucks. Very flexible, light-weight fabric that stretches without looking strained. Easy to dance in, great length. Highly recommend.

I wore this to a concert at MSG.  This romper is very stylish and so bright! I loved the pink! The size 8 was terrific! It's blousy on top and slightly fitted in the hips and bottom.  My hips measure at 37 inches.
Love the dress!  The back is adorable and unique and the fit is very flattering.  Got tons of compliments.
Slightly small in the waist, but fabric has some give.
This dress fit just right. I really loved the zipper on the sleeves.

I love this dress!! I am pretty curvy and was worried that it would be too loose in the waist and too tight in the hips/bust, but this is a hourlgass dream! I'm usually not a fan of any sort of mermaid dress because of my hips, but this dress begs you to embrace them.  I'm pretty conservative, so the only problem I found was that it showed off my ladies a little more than I like. I am a 34DD, and pretty much everyone knew it once they saw me.  (ahhh!!) But I truly loved this dress and I think it will look good on anyone.

This dress felt like a silk glove on me all night! It is so nice and comfortable. I felt flirty, fun, and not concerned with my tummy trouble area because of the A-line skirt. I would definitely recommend it!

I rented this for work and wore it to the office on an un-seasonally warm day. I rented XS, which is my usual size, and the fit was perfect.  There was an under-skirt which I found somewhat distracting as I walked, and which was shorter than it perhaps should have been. The dress works well for a semi-conservative work environment but it could also be great for after work drinks.
it's short, no doubt about it, but fits in every way.
Beautiful dress but the zipper catches easily on the sequins when zipping up. Definitely needed an extra set of hands to help zip it up.

I wore this for an outdoor summer wedding and got tons of compliments. Even after two children, it fit and wasn't overly clingy to trouble areas. I wore the size 8 as it fit better around my waist and hips, but the size 6 would have fit better in the bust. It was a strapless dress that I didn't have to pull up all night and it fit well over a strapless bra. Would definitely rent again!

This was my first RTR order and I was really pleased with the process.  I had a baby almost 7 weeks before I wore this dress, so my body is not quite where it used to be.  I'm not even sure what my current size is.  I was unsure what size to order, so I went with an 8L and a 10L as a back-up.  After reading the reviews from the red and black dress that matched this style dress (since this dress didn't have any reviews yet), I decided to go with the long instead of the regular.  Once I received the dresses and tried them on, I realize they were just too long.  I was going to have to wear 6 inch + heels and I didn't want to do that.  Also, the 8 was too tight in the rib cage and the 10 was too big in the bust.  I contacted RTR and requested to have an 8R overnighted to me.  I also watched what I ate the day before my event, hoping that would be enough to make the 8 a little more comfortable around the waist/rib cage.  Luckily, it worked!  The 8R was perfect!  I wore 3 inch heels with the regular length and the dress nicely skimmed the floor without being too long.  Just for reference, the tightest part of this dress is right at the highest part of the waist just at the rib cage/just below the bust and the measurement at my rib cage right now is 31.5 inches.  The 8R gave me a tight fit but was not uncomfortable.  The 10 was a little too big for that measurement, especially since I couldn't fill out the bust.  There is no stretch in this fabric so keep that in mind when ordering.  The pockets were a huge plus!!!  Plus, my husband loves the idea of me renting a dress instead of buying one and having it take up more space in a closet.  I would definitely recommend this dress and RTR!

Dress runs slightly large.  It is a very flattering shape for hourglass figures.  I wasn't impressed with the look of the fabric.  If you're renting for an event I would go with the similar styles by Halston Heritage.

Pros:
Great length
Warm for a fall evening

Con:
Maybe they can offer an XL, it fit me like a glove but if I was a lb over I would have had issues
This top was so fun and different - the back is so cool, I got a bunch of compliments on it! I wore with black pants which worked because the top definitely has a peplum vibe. I wish I owned this!

I loved the fit! I loved the dress in general! It was slightly longer than I expected. It went to right above my knees, which I didn't expect being 5'10" and wearing the size 2. I could not get a regular bra to work, the straps showed. I instead used a silicone stick on one. But by the end of the night I took it off and you couldn't tell. It WAS NOT itchy, even with the sequins. I loved everything about it, I wish I could have kept it! Absolutely stunning, and SPARKLY.

I love the way it ties closed, and how soft and comfortable it is. I often find sleeves are short on me, but these were perfect. I'm a 2 or 4 in blazers usually and ordered the 4. The fit was fine and comfy, but I think I'll get a 2 next time for a slimmer fit.

Typically I wear a 4-6 depending on the fit. I opted for the 4 in this since it was meant to fit a little more loosely. It came and I couldn't have even worn it. I am not sure the 2 would even have been small enough. It was cute and great quality, I just wish I would have been able to wear it!

I wish I could've purchased this romper. It is extremely flattering, the color is rich and it's beautifully made. A few things to note that weren't problems for me, but could be problems for someone else. If you are any taller than 5'8/5'9. I wouldn't rent. It's very short in length (especially if you're tall) and if you are in any way self conscious about the back of your legs/rear, it may make you feel a bit uncomfortable. Additionally, the collar and sleeves are very fitted with very little wiggle room given the lace and lack of elacticity, so keep that in mind when sizing. Also, it's difficult to tell from the model photos, but the midsection is very sheer. It is VERY flattering and beautiful, I promise, but definitely sheer. Overall, I absolutely loved it so please don't let the above deter you! I will DEFINITELY be renting again!

It was longer than I thought it would be, but I really enjoyed wearing it because I felt really pretty going to see Hamilton. The information below is my mom's information so it is not accurate, if you're looking to see how it would look on you, I'm 5' 7", 140 lbs and usually a size 4-6.

This dress was definitely out of my comfort zone as I have never worn anything like it before. It took some coercing by my friends, but I am SO happy I went for it.  I have never received so many compliments before! It was very fun and flattering (hiding problem spots). Looking forward to renting it again (in another color) for future events!  I also didn't have any problems with my hair or tights snagging on the sequins.

Regarding sizing: I went with the L because the XL was not as fitted throughout the waist and bunched in the back. It does take some maneuvering to get into though... but once you are in with the right pair of tights... awesome.

This dress will always be special to me because my fiancé proposed to me while wearing in front of the entire brigade at the Military Ball! I was frantic looking for a dress at the last minute in April (Prom Season) and was not really sold on this dress. I rented a second style with this order. I did not like the way the other dress fit and when I tried on the size 0R, it fit me like a glove!! I felt extremely sexy and elegant at the same time. The top of the 0R was a little worn and the boning started to dig into my chest as the night went on. The bottom flows so nicely and it is an extremely light dress. I am so proud to be wearing this dress in all the pictures and videos that were taken. I also liked that the sleeves fell more off my shoulders than what the model shows. LOVE THIS DRESS!
This dress was comfortable, true to size and eye catching. I received compliments throughout the night. You cannot go wrong with it! Best dress I’ve rented so far and I use RTR for every wedding.

I've never received so many compliments from strangers as i did wearing this dress. it was a great choice for a graduation party! i have a petite but hourglass shape and it was actually slightly large in the waist. very hard to tell though, i would think no one noticed. it was a very comfortable fit, not too tight. the only thing is when i sat down, the slit went really high. i could put my legs under the table though so again no one would notice but me. I would definitely recommend this dress, but if you are any smaller than me i would think this dress may be too large for you.

As other people have mentioned, the bust is large. I wish I had some double sided tape. There were also a couple stains on the dress but because of the layers, they weren't that apparent so I still wore it. I received lots of compliments!!

It was pretty loose, and the top was sliding off a bit. I would have worn the 6, but it was too tight around the booty to be comfortable. I decided to just go with the baggy and it was great - so comfortable, fun, great movement in the sleeves and the color is fantastic. You'll definitely stand out! My last couple rent the runway dresses have been a size 10, so the fact that I almost wore a 6 says something. But for a comfortable, beachy, FUN dress - this is fantastic. I want to own it.

This skirt is fantastic. It's true to size (and even if it ran a tad small, the waistband is elastic, which always helps!) and quite comfortable. I'm very short, so on me it came to my ankles, but I liked that look. It's not itchy or too heavy. It does get a little static clingy though, so that's something to keep in mind. I got compliments on it all night long!
I wore this for a work dinner and it was perfect.  Great emerald color, good length (sometimes things are too short on me, this was right above the knee).  High quality.  Debated keeping this one!
Medium fit much better. The cut out in the back was too big and didn't lay flat with the large. The lining is like a spanx skirt so it is very stretchy and holds you in place.
I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner, and it was such a big hit.  We had a Southern BBQ, and the color just looked astounding in photos.  I would highly recommend.
Great fabric and fit.
Love this dress. Very flattering in all the right places and super comfortable. I didn't want to return it!
get a size down as the extra size.  this runs big and yes the straps keep falling off.  it's forgiving, very hot, and i think it can fit many body types.  but beware, you might look a little trashy.

I got this romper for a girls night out in Vegas. I'm usually between a size 2 and a 4 but I felt more comfortable in the 4. I've tried on many rompers before but this one fit the bat by far...would definitely recccomend it!
It was a little short when sitting down, but besides that I was very pleased with this dress!
It fit perfect. The only con is that I wasn't sure what bra to wear with it because that showed a little on the sides.

I'm between a 6 and an 8. Both fit, but 6 was a little tight in the bust, so I went with the 8. I was impressed with how the dresses arrived in such good condition. For a girl with a bigger bust, the neckline was a little low for me, but I got over it and everything about this dress was great.

I wore this to my sister-in-law's bridal shower.  It was a nice daytime dress but not something I would probably rent again.  This is definitely a dress made for someone with no curves.  Not so flattering for an hourglass figure.   I was a little surprised that though it looks free flowing it was still fairly fitted at the hips. The picture online makes it look like it is a loose fit, but it was definitely a little snug. Sizing up is a good idea.
I rented a 12, which is usually a safe size for me (I sometimes size down to a 10), and the bust on this dress was way too small. I think I would have liked it if the bust had been big enough.
The dress is true to size, but I would go down a size for your back up.  Very comfortable and nice to be able to wear a regular bra.  Great, flattering fit.
the chest area was a little tight, i had to wear a strapless bra. the dress was AMAZING!!

This dress runs true to size, however size up for back up. It works best for A-C cups and is fitted in the waist. Hips are a bit straighter and curvier women should consider sizing up for back up since the fabric has no stretch. It's about knee length and should be work with a NuBra or no bra due to low cut and cutout in the bust.
Huge! Not fitting. Also weird side slits. But pretty details around the edges and nice soft fabric.

This is a twirling dress, no doubt about it. So much fun to wear for my rehearsal dinner! 

The only issue was that the skirt lining on the size 2 seemed to be a little worn out and took a decent amount of ironing to stand out the way it was meant to. The cut of the dress seems meant for someone who is relatively flat from shoulder to hip -- it was snug at the bust and loose at the waist for me.
Because the dress was a 'shift' it was easy to wear. Looked very glamourous, too!
Awesome fabric and print.

I wore this to a firefighter's ball and it was so comfortable. I rented a 0 and 2 and wore the 2 because the sleeves were really tight on the smaller size and I felt like I wouldn't be able to move - the rest of the dress fit the same in both sizes pretty much. I liked that the dress had snaps for your bra straps so I didn't have to worry about fixing them all night. My fiance loved this dress and I got compliments on it all night.
I thought it was a bit snug on the hips and I didn't see a huge difference between the 4 and 6, but it was very beautiful on. I got a lot of compliments on the dress.

I felt so sexy in this dress. Maybe it was because I didn't wear a bra and maybe it was because everyone thought I was wearing a completely see through dress, but it has a perfect drape with the perfect amount of peekaboo panels. The art deco style is simply gorgeous. It's an ideal weight with a high quality, lightweight but substantial fabric. I highly, highly recommend this dress.

Fit very well! Heavy material, which means you don't have to worry about your underwear showing through.  Not the best choice for an outdoor or hot event--but inside I was fine. Very flattering for a pear shape.
Great fabric and fit.
This was an awesome little, black dress for a night out with the girls. Its definitely short but its comfortable and looks exactly like the pictures!

Pictures don't do it justice. It was so beautiful and detailed in person. Very comfortable and the material was an amazing quality.  The only issue was the zipper... even off the body, it was almost impossible to zip up over the skirt, so you will definitely need assistance!

This dress was simple and professional. I usually wear a 4 - the 4 in this dress fit but was a little tight, the 6 was a little big but I decided I'd rather be comfortable. I wasn't in love with this dress at all, but it was completely fine for my work reception.
Loved this dress! The length was perfect for me when I put on 3.5 inch heels, otherwise it does run a little long. I received compliments all night and it was super fun and comfortable to dance in!

This romper was perfect for a birthday outfit! The color is beautiful and it is extremely comfortable. You can easily dress it up or down so it can be worn to any occasion. It runs true to size and the side panels make it flattering on most body types.

This is a cute dress with gorgeous colors. Unfortunately I didn't love the cut on my body. I felt it was a little too long to be flattering (I'm 5'6") but long parts of the hem ended around mid calf on me.  I also seem to be between sizes (133#) and the M was a little loose in the chest but I suspect a S would have been too tight for my preference.  The dress is well made and will be gorgeous on someone else. It's thicker and lined, so probably not a summer day dress but great for nights out.
Got tons of compliments on this! I'm really busty so was worried about the fit, but it was perfect. Great for a date night.

I usually wear a size 4, but they didn't have a 4 so I ordered a 6 and an 8. The six was loose around the tummy but tight on the hips, the 8 was loose all over and looked way better. I still looked magical

This dress is great for travel, and I will most likely rent it again. It doesn't wrinkle, is so comfortable (feels kind of like wearing a nightgown), and looks elegant. It worked well for an event in Venice as well as for walking around, exploring in Rome. I probably could have worn it every day of my trip.

RTR does it again! Loved this dress, received compliments all night long! It fit perfectly, I was a little worried about how the draping around the hips would look, but it did not add too much there. I have a little junk in the trunk (not a whole lot, but enough that I have to be careful the type of dresses I get), but it still fit and laid perfectly. I'm small up top, but was still able to accentuate what I have. Fit nicely through the waste. Didn't need spanks for smoothing, the lining was really good. I have on platform shoes and it just hit the floor with those, I'm 5'6", with shorter heals I would have been tripping all over myself. Overall, definite winner, classic Badgley Mischka.

Stunning take on the classic black gown! Waist and hips are very fitted with no stretch so I would consider sizing up for extra room in the midsection or if you are pear shaped, like me. The regular length was comfortable for me in 3" heels, but I probably wouldn't go any taller or it would be too short. This gown will be tough for ladies with a larger chest as it's super fitted up top and you cant wear a bra - will have to go with petals or nothing in this dress!
The colors really pop and the pattern is eye-catching! If you have a fuller bust then the chest can be a little tight but besides that it is great!
I rented a gray and black sleeveless dress and paired it with a turtleneck and this coat.  Nice combination.

This is a great dress, very flattering, and very comfortable.  But it does run small and it is very short.  I would suggest ordering a size larger than you normally wear, and a size larger than that as your backup.  I usually wear a 6, and I ordered a 6 and an 8, but I ended up wearing the 8.  I would have liked to have the option of a 10 as well.

This dress was perfect for my work holiday party and Christmas Eve church service. Classic DVF wrap with glamorous lace and a beautiful, delicate lace fringe around the hem and sleeves. It's navy blue and black but looks more black. I would happily wear this again!
Pros: fits like a glove, nice material

This was my third rental experience so I was familiar with the easy rental process. It was also the second time I rented this dress- the other time I rented it in the other color. So, I knew "what, how and when". I was prepared for a very smooth transaction and didn't worry about when I would get the dress until...."super storm Sandy" blew into town! 

I  couldn't believe when I received the notice that my dress had been shipped on Saturday before the requested arrival day of Thursday. I immediately knew that RTR was working double-time to ensure that my rental would be terrific even though they were facing a tragic situation. I watched with great anticipation as I had reconciled myself to the fact that I wouldn't get the dress. I did have a quick email chat with a consultant right before the storm hit who assured me that they would do everything possible to make sure I got the dress (and, quite honestly when I was watching the tragedy unfold I was not all that worried about my dress). RTR didn't see it that way, they not only got me the dress on time, I got it a day early and have received a few promotional offers because of the storm. I just can't say enough about this kind of service. I am now an even more loyal RTR (if that was possible!)

I tried it on in the store, I'm usually a 6 but only a 4 and a 10 were available- I opted for the 10 since this was for work.  I recommend sizing this up just because it's pretty short otherwise, and then it fits more like a shift dress- loved it!
Very comfortable and figure flattering.
The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because the material stuck together at the bottom and made it seem like it was bunching together. Otherwise it was great.
Sizing is true to size, but short. I am 5'11 in heels and used the bigger backup size for extra length. I wore a strapless bra pulled down slightly which was fine.

Simple but sexy length showed off legs nicely. 
My arms were very snug  could have worn size up

I had to pin the neck line to make this dress more appropriate - this dress is better for small chested women. I am 5'7" and wore the 4R - I wanted a long dress so I didn't have to worry about heels for a backyard reception. This dress has almost too much fabric. Very pretty when it moves but quite unflattering in some pictures (too billowy). The color is lovely and I didn't even notice the slit most of the time.

The dress itself was beautiful, especially the color. The sleeves were also fun and different unfortunately the dress was tight around my hips and had I gone up a size, it would of been too loose around my waist :/ I ended up wearing the dress though, I just had to constantly pull it down as it rode up my hips all night long.
Great fit. Received a ton of compliments. Sexy, but classy.  Only complaint, the feathers really shed. I left a trail everywhere I went.
The dress was a bit worn. The area around the bust was a little frayed, though it was only  noticeable to me!I ended up wearing by back up size (4), though the 6 fit me well, too!

Rented this for our engagement photos on the beach. Our photographer thought the white tulle would look gorgeous in the late-day lighting (she was right!). I read a TON of reviews and decided to go up a size, since I tend to be curvier in the boobs and hips - was glad I did. Definitely not a bra dress, and it's tight all the way through the mid-thighs. No give to the fabric at all, which is OK as long as you have the right size! 

The tulle is a bit see-through, you can definitely see my legs in a lot of the pictures. Not mad about it, I think it actually looks beautiful, just something to be aware of ahead of time. 

Also, the dress I received definitely had some tears/holes towards the bottom of the tulle, but you couldn't tell at all in photos. It's hard to avoid snagging tulle on things, so I totally get it. Again, just something to be conscious of ahead of time.

I usually wear a 4 in dresses, and the 4 fit really well (not as tight as I usually like at the bust, but I'm also a small cup size).  Loved the extra room in the hips.  4R was plenty long, even in regular length my heels would sometimes catch the back hem.  Stayed in place all night with no need to pull up or adjust like some strapless dresses.

I am almost 5'10" and I weigh about 140lbs.  I usually wear a size 4 for shorter dresses but tend to go with a 6 for longer dresses, just for that added bit of length.  I ordered the 4L and 6L, and ended up wearing the 6L because it was more comfortable in the arm area and gave me just a touch more length.   The back of the dress is actually longer than in the front, so when I wore 3" heels it looked perfect from the back, but looking at my feet from the front the dress was just a touch too short.  I ended up wearing the heels anyways because I didn't think it was that big of a deal and still looked fine! If you are 5'10" or taller though I would say you'd have to wear heels shorter than 3" or wear flats possibly.  I am definitely glad I went with the L size.  

I did get compliments all night though and I LOVED this dress.  Would definitely recommend!! :)

I am tall 5'8" and even the long wasn't long enough which i figured it would be after reading all the reviews. So it was a real bummer to wear kitten heels instead of my sexy stilettos... its a curve hugger so if you have any they will be displayed, but i loved it! What was great was I could wear a regular bra with is, which is helpful since i have a rather large bust.

This dress looked great on and felt terrific too. It is surprisingly thick and a heavy... beautifully made. I wore this to a winter party where I'd be both inside and outside during the event. This dress was great. I received lots of compliments on it and it fit great too. It was very comfortable too. Might order again.

I got a L and M and ended up wearing the M. The large was longer and sort of bunchy in the waist. The M was slightly tight in the arms, but MUCH sexier and a better fit overall. Such a fun dress...very flattering.

This dress was a knockout. I felt like Scarlett Johansson in that red dress at the Golden Globes. The material had just the right amount of stretch to be supportive without being constricting, and the stretch coupled with the high center slit were great for ballroom dancing (which is why I rented it). Note: you can't really tell in the photo because of the way I am angled, but there was a LOT of boob showing. In a good way though, as long as you aren't shy.  The only reason I knocked off a star is because the straps slip a lot (for some reason one shoulder had much more trouble than the other, and I don't think I'm that asymmetrical lol) and it's so low cut that this is a Janet Jackson moment waiting to happen. The material is sort of heavy too and it rolled right off my fashion tape. In sum, if you're not going to move around a ton and you're good with a lot of attention, this dress is a show stopper!
The dress fit like a glove.  EVERYONE complemented me and asked if I could buy it from RTR :-)
Loved this dress.  My husband said it was all time favorite!  Would love to buy...

Since the dress itself is slightly heavy I was worried I would be pulling it up all night long but the "sticky" band around the top of the dress prevented that from happening which was a huge plus!  The dress was a little too long for my liking as I'm on the shorter side.  The petite size probably would have fit better length wise but it was unavailable when I was renting the dress.  Great dress for a formal affair!

I have bigger hips and a smaller top, so it fit better around my waist and the top was a little loose. I tried wearing it without a bra, but it didn't stay very well, so bra was necessary. I wore a 12. The length was perfect, hit right above the knee. You could tell it's been worn before because the front fabric was a little stretched out, but only I could tell. Received compliments all night. Couldn't have picked a better dress to wear! Perfect with a big pair of earrings.
I loved the design and the material, but the arms were very tight on me - so I found myself a bit uncomfortable most of the day. I'd love it sized up!
A little more low cut than expected, but overall the fit was true to size.

The dress runs true to size. The dresses I received were a little worn down and were missing some sequins. The dress photographs really well and the back isn't too low so you can still wear a regular bra with it!
I felt like the shoulders ran small and the fabric was thicker (more like a quilt) than what I originally expected.

I was so pleasantly surprised by this top! The print is more red/pink than orange, giving it a classic, romantic look. I thought it might look a little "soccer mom" but it's really refreshing and cute. Styled it with white jeans and got a bunch of compliments.
Fits true to size, and can easily move from day to night. A little tight in the arms if you are athletic, but otherwise a good fit.

fit wonderful, felt great in it.  A little big at the top but my bottom is big so the L looked better and not as tight.  I had to pull it down through out the night because it rode up a little but that didn't bother me.
A little loose in the top part of the dress.  If I were a little more busty, it would have been perfect.

I rented this for a weekend in Traverse City and I adore it! I really liked the one shoulder look. A little sex appeal, but still classy. It was very warm and very comfortable. I will definitely rent this again. It's cozy and baggy, so I'd recommend going down a size if you want it to be fitted to your body more.

I wore this for a girls' night out in the city - I typically am pretty modest but felt very comfortable in this dress. I fit into the 4 but the 6 was more forgiving on my hips (true pear). The slit is very high but I felt comfortable with how it is placed. I loved the neckline and racerback and really wish I owned this dress! I can't recommend it enough.

This dress is really fun.  The shape is very flattering and the dress in incredibly comfortable.  The pattern and color are beautiful.  It is short but didn't ride up while dancing or sitting.  The fabric is thick and really keeps its shape throughout the night.
The cut of this jacket is generous.  It is also very warm...perhaps it doesn't breathe well.

This is definitely a stand out dress as the color and print are so bold! Have to give only 4 stars because it's a bit tighter in the hips and loose in the stomach area making it an odd fit. Still a comfortable and cute dress, I'm just not sure I'd rent again as I'd prefer a more flattering shape.
I have wide hips so it fit a little odd there. Overall very pretty.

Loved this dress. I could maybe have worn a 6 but it was more comfortable with the 8. The neckline is pretty low, but not gaping, so I felt more secure and less exposed than I sometimes do in higher-neckline dresses.

I got the 6L and 8L, at first I assumed I would have to wear the 8L but when I tried it on it didn't quite hug my body. It was a little lose and the peplum made by hips look wider. I tried the 6 on and it made a big difference. The only negative was that the dress was slightly too long, I am 5'7 and got the recommended length for my height but found that even in heels it was a little long, as you can see in the picture. All in all a great dress.
Loved the dress. It's way more purple than the picture shows. I loved how classy but still fun the dress was.
Gorgeous color and material, way to short!!

I should have ordered one size smaller, but to be safe, I ordered the bigger size. The length was perfect with a small heel. The dress offers great quality material; it's a great choice as an unique, elegant dress without sacrificing modesty or comfort.
The dress is comfortable and sexy for a fun night out. It does not stretch though so something to keep in mind! However, I didn't feel like it was too tight and I wore my normal size.

Dress fits nicely on most figures though bigger busts may struggle. Consistent with previous comments, the zipper is hard to get up and could use a helper as it is at an awkward angle. Dress does wrinkle in transit, and could almost stand a light starch. The wrinkles came out easily with just a steamer ,though it did not look perfectly pressed and crisp as I think it is meant.  Very full skirt (not for windy days!) but cute and flattering fit. Not too short.

I love the way the lines on this dress create an illusion - not just your ordinary dress with lines.  I also love the way the dress poofs out at the hem a bit and how it cinches in your waist (not sure this was intentional, but it felt a bit like a corset on me - I possibly could've ordered a size up because it took a few extra minutes to zip but, once it was zipped, I felt FABULOUS).  I would love to own this dress.

This style is great dressed up or down! The open sides on the skirt make this look really unique and the bust area is great for all bust sizes. If you do have a smaller bust, I would recommend sizing down in this dress as there is a lot of fabric on the top. I liked that I could wear a standard bra and that the look was a modern spin on an understated black dress.
I wore this dress for a holiday party that had a casino theme. It was sexy with the keyhole back and sheer paneling and really flattered my curves.

It fit like a dream. Such a flattering design with the see through lace and capped sleeves on top, to the way it hugged the body and then opened up on the bottom. I wore 2 1/2 inch open toed camel colored strappy heels, which was perfect. I ordered the 2L and was nervous because there was no 4L available as a backup, but the fit was absolutely perfect. I received SO MANY compliments all through the night and even the next day! The dress is the perfect mix of elegant & sexy. I wish I didn't have to send it back!
The dress was great, but I'm 5'5" and the regular was a little too long. Hopefully they can make it in a short/petite version soon. I had to wear VERY high heels so that it wouldn't touch the floor.

This dress was great for a formal/semi-formal 30th birthday party I recently planned.  Dress is cute, flattering and I got lots of compliments.  I'm sure you are see from the photos and other reviewers that yes - the dress is pretty short.  But I am 5'9" and it was do able.  I could stand in it.  I could sit in it.  But you have to watch the transitions from sitting to standing.  Despite the shortness, I felt the dress was true to size and didn't have any stretch to it as others have noted.  

Overall - loved the dress, glad I picked it an got tons of compliments all night long.

Fabulous and vibrant style! Running slightly large, we recommend sizing down for back up.  There is comfortable room in the bust, waist and hip area, being a shift style. Given the cut outs, it should be worn with a strapless bra to avoid any bra straps peaking out.  There is no stretch in the fabric of this style. Pair with nude heels for your next day time event or party!

This was my first experience with RTR and I am quite pleased with the experience.  Beautiful dress - received a lot of complements.  Difficult to zip around the ruching and needed to pin it at the neckline as it was a little big on top.  I am 5'8 ordered the 14L and it was perfect length for me to wear 2.5 inch heels but wasn't too long when I needed to change into my flip flops.  I would definitely order this dress again.
And if you have curves, forget it. I didn't end up wearing it, as it wasn't flattering omg a muscular build.

I read the reviews that it ran large but the XS so out so I went with a S. Although it ran large-it still worked. I wore this as a bathing suit cover on vacation in the Dominican Republic and the loose fit was great for the humid weather. The colors also looked great with a tan. This could have easily been dressed up with cute sandals as well.

I like the cut of this dress; I usually wear a 10 and found that I had room in the 10, and could have worn the 8. (I'm smaller on top, bigger on bottom). The cut was flattering and the dress looked elegant and tasteful. I was sad to send it back.

Indian Summer in Chicago, went to work wearing this then wore it to a dinner out with friends - next day flew to LA for a friends show and wore it to brunch & 2 parties. Comfortable dress, but lace makes for a fussy zipper so make sure you have a friend handy to help you zip up if you are not a contortionist.

I'm short - only 5'0" - and this dress still worked! It was a bit long on the arms (the ends reached mid-hand), but it wasn't a huge deal. It was comfortable and I was able to dance and eat as much as I liked! True to size.

I loved wearing this dress to a formal charity dinner.  It was very form fitting but the fabric was thick enough to smooth out any lumps or bumps.  There's a pretty big slit in the back that makes it easy to move around in. The length was mid-calf on me. I was able to wear a strapless bra with a low back extender.  The sleeves were a few inches too long on me but I just tucked them under and you couldn't tell.  If you're looking for something special, this dress could be the winner.

The Size 2 fit well. It was tight around the waist, but I think the Size 4 would have been too large on me. It is low cut, but was very fitted so I did not have to wear a bra.  The length was a tad on the long side for my short frame, but I just wore my tallest heels. Overall, it was an amazing dress!

This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended, where a little black dress was most appropriate but I wanted to add some pizzazz.  It fit perfectly, and the gold bottom was eye catching and paired well with gold jewelry.  The neckline, for me, is a little blah, but easy enough to dress up with a statement necklace.  Overall I thought the dress was comfortable, and I didn't worry about dancing in it.  Some underarm chaffing was noted, but I do have sensitive skin.  It was also a bit heavier than I expected, which would have been fine had the day not been 92 degrees and ungodly humid.

I wish I never had to mail this dress back!  I chose this dress to wear to cover the red carpet for the 2014 Miss USA Pageant as an official social media ambassador and it helped make my night unforgettable. I got tons of compliments, even from the head coach of the New Orleans Saints who said it was the perfect game day dress! This was my first experience with Rent The Runway and I will DEFINITELY be coming back!
Beautiful dress!! The color is stunning!!! Loved the pockets!!!

The dress was amazing and perfect for the height that I am. I'm 4'11 so the  dress was right at my knees. The sleeves were a little baggy along with the upper area near my neck was baggy. Do not wear when the wear is warm since the material is thicker. Other than that, they size fit perfect. Attracted a lot of attention since it was different.

I wore this dress to the 2014 Marine Ball in Brooklyn. It fit in great with the general formality. (There are always some girls wearing cocktail dresses, but among the girls/women in gowns, this dress held its ground) I did get compliments all night, which is always nice!

Fit: The fit was pretty true to size. I have a smaller waist than my dress size, so there was some room there, but that shouldn't be a problem for most women. The regular length was fine with medium heels--3 inches or more on someone my height (5'6") would need a Long, I think. 
As a side note, I'm a pear shape and walking up stairs was a bit of a challenge, but that was the only fit issue. Since it was only situational, it wasn't a problem.

Color: The picture is true to the dress' color in person--black and emerald green. 

Cons: There was one issue with the dress, which I find to be true with several dresses with sequins--any part of exposed skin that will come in contact with the sequins will become increasingly raw and red over time. These sequins are very scratchy! Be warned.

I have never received so many compliments. This top was beautiful and fit well. That said, it was not very easy to move in - it's so structured that I couldn't lift my arms up to adjust my ponytail! Beautiful top, but don't wear it if you're planning on dancing or moving around a lot.
Gorgeous, head-turning dress. Super clingy though so I was most comfortable in a larger size. Fabric is thick but comfortable so no need to wear any spanks etc!

I rented this as bikini cover-up on a boat tour.  It was perfect for that!  As some of the other reviews mentioned, in windy conditions this skirt can cause a major wardrobe malfunction.  But as a cover-up it worked great!

This top was a hit at a wedding rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments on this top. Even the next day at the wedding, people were still approaching me to compliment that top. It's true to size. It is cropped, so if you want to show midriff, you can wear regular or low cut bottoms. I didn't want to show much, so I wore a high waisted skirt. It has cute cut - out detailing below the ruffle, but it doesn't really show. Good for small breasted women. I didn't have to wear a bra with this.
The dress fit well, and was actually long enough for me (5'7" with 4" heels on). I thought there were minor signs of wear, but that's to be expected to some degree.

I loved this dress! I am short (5'0") and wore 5 inch heels with a size 2P and the gown just hit the floor. The material was light enough for a spring wedding, without being too hot at the reception. I got compliments all night on this dress! Note: The blue in the dress is more vibrant than in the photo.

I rented this dress on a stylist recommendation at the Vegas store to see Penn & Teller.  Wasn't sure about it at first since it wasn't what I would normally pick.  It's like a magic trick in that the dress is really snug, but surprisingly moves when you do -- I could sit down and stand back up as if I were in casual clothes.  It's sexy while still being classy since the mesh on the top balances the bra-like solid piece across the chest.  Only downside is the arms were a little tight -- hard to lift my arms higher than shoulder height (not like I needed to at any point but worth noting.

The best part of the night was getting chosen to go up on stage with Penn & Teller for their rabbit out of a hat trick!  The dress as you can see photographs well and I felt comfortable in it in front of all those people.  Overall a fantastic dress for an amazing night.

Pros: I liked the overall fit of the dress, I found a way to wear it with a bra with straps, and the material was very comfortable. Went great with thick black tights to pull together a nice winter outfit. 

Cons: The dress was a little tight on top. When I tried it on with a strapless bra, it clearly showed it was a strapless bra (that weird thing where it kind of bunches). It was a little extra tight around the armholes but I think it was not noticeable to anyone but me.
I wore this to a party and was inundated wtih compliments. I added the belt as my own touch. The fit of this pantsuit was perfect and it was very flattering and slimming. I simply loved it.

The fabric is very stretchy and it was larger than expected. Even the size zero had at least an inch of extra fabric around my waist and hips. I wore it anyway but it was less flattering than I had hoped. The colors were great and the dress was very comfortable and appropriate for a company event- professional and fun.

Loved it! The cuffs were so pretty and didn't get in the way of working on my computer at all. I received many compliments (and passed on RTR info to all!) Make sure you wear a nice smoothing bra if you're bigger on top like I am (34DD) as the material shows any "bumps" or "rolls" (which can be so unavoidable, right?!). The top is a nice length. I wore it untucked over a pencil skirt with tights and shooties and -- I must say -- I looked fabulous! :)

I could've worn a 4 or 6. I chose 4 because the bust in the 6 was just a bit loose.I'm about 5"6 and pear shaped. The dress is a little longer than I thought but I loved it and the color was fabulous.

I felt beautiful in this dress and received many compliments.  I was tired of wearing the same black dress to each wedding and was glad I found this option.  The sleeves were a touch tight, but not uncomfortable.  Loved the cut of the dress.  As a pear, it highlighted my smaller waist while camouflaging my larger hips and thighs.  The pockets were an added bonus.
Fit is true to size.  I am a bit on the busty side and this dress is perfect for a bigger top and smaller waist.  It was super comfortable and I got compliments on it all night!
Overall was a good casual shift dress. Nice fabric and color, although the buttons looked a little cheap.

This jacket fits a bit big but is very comfortable because of the satin lining. I LOVE this jacket and might just decide to buy it! Tons of compliments. The fur collar looks a little cheap in my opinion but overall the jacket as a whole is adorable. LOVE IT!
The dress was great- got many compliments. Looked beautiful om! Definitely really hard to zip.

Perfect fit! I am 6 feet tall so I was not expecting it to fit, but the 4L was absolutely perfect! I also have a somewhat small bust, but I did not have to keep pulling it up all night, which was great!

Rented this for my friend's bachelorette party. My first RTR, and I loved it!! I felt so sexy and stylish! I'm between a 6 and an 8 in dress sizes; the 6 was snug, but the 8 fit really comfortably. Can't wait to get my next RTR dress!

I wore this dress to a black-tie optional office holiday party. This dress was really comfortable to wear.  The material had a decent amount of stretch to it, which also means that it hides nothing.  I didn't use spanx (if I owned a pair, I probably would have), but I can definitely see how they would come in handy here. The dress has nice detailing on the shoulder, which adds some color and a little weight to the dress. I ordered both the 0R and 0L.  
The downside to this dress was the length. When I tried the 0R on with my 3" heels, it was several inches off the ground.  The 0L was much better, but was slightly too long.  I ended up wearing the 0L.  I found myself having to pick up the dress sometimes when walking, and I had to be careful when dancing.   It was definitely better to have the dress run slightly long than very short.
I received many compliments from both partners and associates (the 20-somethings). Many commented on the beading at the shoulder. The material was heavy enough to be comfortable in the cold December weather. Overall, I enjoyed wearing the dress and would recommend it to anyone looking to wear it to a more formal occasion.
Dress was a comfortable material for a long night.
The dress is absolutely beautiful and fit like a dream. I'm glad I ordered the long because it was too short for the 3.5 inch heels I planned on wearing and had to switch shoes at the last minute.
fits great in the chest and hides the unwanted middle

I loved the stiffer fabric of the skirt, it kept its full shape. The sequins on the top bothered my arms toward the end of the night, but it wasn't a big deal. The length was great-I'm 5'7" and the front hit me just above the knee, with the back a little lower.  The top was a little blousy, but not a huge issue. I'm a 36D. The dress has NO give in the ribcage area, so if you're in between sizes maybe size up. I got many compliments and felt beautiful at my husband's formal work Christmas party!

WOW is this dress amazing. Lots of spandex-like material keeps everything tucked and hidden, and yet SO comfortable. Plus you don’t need to wear a bra (36DD/E thanks to breastfeeding, and I was comfortable all night. Cons: Dress was just long enough for my 5’10” frame plus a low heel, despite ordering a long. Pulling the dress back down after using the restroom was no easy task. Otherwise, 10/10. I continue to get compliments months later!
Very flattering fit! Material is stretchy and easy to move in, was comfortable all night. I found the length to be a bit short, I wore flats. I got so many complements on this dress!

This is dress fit me great! SUPER CUTE!!! Though, it is really hard to reach for my drinks in this dress  lol dress does not stretch which did bother me much.  Other than that this is one of my favorite from Rent the Runway

Beautiful, thin material that makes it a perfect dress for a hot, summer wedding outdoors.

Note: You can't wear a bra with the cutouts on the side. Only pasties.
The top and skirt seem to fit true to size.  The slit looked like it had been patched up a couple times, but was only noticeable upon close inspection.

I rented this as a back up for a Labor Day wedding in Maine. The dress was fairly heavy, with a lot of underlayers underneath. I think this would be a great pick for sometime later in the fall - but it was much too warm for it on Labor Day.
