I loved this dress!  I wore it to a fundraiser, and loved that I was colorful in a sea of black.  I wanted to keep it!  It was very comfortable and the color was fun!  The sleeves were a bit snug, but not unbearable.  And I loved the pockets!  I would rent this one again!
nice fit but definitely not for a short person
Fit was spot on...nice detail on the bottom and back

This is my favorite dress I've ever seen or worn. I wore this to my sister-in-law's wedding and it was stunning!! The bridesmaids wore navy blue so I wanted to look different and boy did this do the job! It was elegant and comfortable and the color was just radiant! 

Pros: very light fabric, no sleeves, very complimentary cut, vibrant and stunning color, comfortable and easy to wear!

Cons: zipper has a sticky spot at the very bottom (maybe just on the dress I got in particular) and for my cup size the dress fit a bit tighter than some size 12 dresses.

Overall: Will definitely rent again! Favorite dress ever!

Of course, this dress is a classic and looks great for work.  It made me feel professional and put together.  The only issue with it is gaping.  If you work in a conservative office like I do, make sure to wear a cami underneath or use dress tape.  I don't like the look of a cami so I used Nordstrom brand dress tape strips, one on each flap of the wrap and then one where they connected at the bust.  No problems all day, and I could move around and talk to people without worrying that my bra was showing.

This dress was shipped to me as a replacement when another dress in my order was unavailable. At first I was bummed because it seemed so plain, but when I saw it in person I loved it! The dramatic angle in the front is unique and the fit is super flattering. It is tight, stretchy, and fitted so consider sizing up. It is comfortable, chic, and the perfect shade of navy! I rented this dress to style for my blog.

True to size. Comfortable. So fun to dance in. I received compliments all night long. It's the perfect dress for a wedding. I ended up wearing the 2 but could've probably fit in a 0. Either way, amazing dress!

Such a stunner!  I  wore the size 6 although it ran a bit large in the chest on me( 34b) so had to readjust/pull up throughout the night but besides that it was perfect! I was worried about the high slit being too much for the church but it was fine!  I received so many compliments just LOVE rent the runway. HIGHLY recommend this dress!
I wore this to an outdoor wedding and received so many compliments. The length is great and could be worn to black tie optional. I would highly recommend! Great quality and great price!

I ended up going with the 2, a smaller size than I typically wear, as it hugged my body better. The larger size provided less of a shape.  Either one would have worked, though.  The arms were a little tight in the 2, but I could still dance and move around.  I would definitely recommend this dress.  I wore it to a more formal wedding, and felt right at home.

I rented this for a casual Friday at the office, so it was good for that.  I should have gone with the Small because it was a bit baggy on me.  I liked the details on the sweater.  I liked this but didn't love it.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It was a little bit short but not too bad - it hiked up a bit when I would sit down but otherwise I felt comfortable in it. Because of the low back I went with a stick-on bra but it wasn't too low and bra strap extenders would've worked as well. Overall it was an awesome dress and I wish I owned it!
The material was great for a summer wedding in a hot city. I've rented a few dresses, and this was probably the most 'worn'-looking one I've received, but I would definitely rent it again.
True to size, I could have worn a size 4 just fine but a size 2 was only available.  Would rent again, got lots of compliments.

We rented this dress for my daughter's Homecoming.  She normally wears a 0 and it fit really well (slightly big through the chest).  She also said the waist band was snug but not uncomfortable.  The skirt was very full but she loved it!

Loved the look of this dress when I put it on. Thought the fit was comfy, but a couple of hours into the evening, my husband pointed out that it had given me dozens of scratches and rashes all over my arms, wrists and anywhere on my body that came into contact with the sequins. It took days for them to stop hurting/itching. If you have sensitive skin (and even if you don't realize you do), look elsewhere.
This is one of my favorite tops ever - after renting three times, I finally bought it. It's great with white jeans in the summer and dark jeans in the winter and it's flattering on all shapes.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. On top of it being extremely comfortable throughout, it is such a great unique style! The asymmetrical skirt is very flattering for any body type. I wore a size IT 44/ US 8 and was definitely true to size, however I always recommend sizing up for a back up size. The one thing I loved about this dress was that it did have a little bit of stretch to the fabric. Even though it is fitted throughout, it was also extremely comfortable. I am 5'3" and it was about mid thigh for me. Loved it!!!

Beautifully well-made dress, with nice thick material. I usually wear a 0 or a 2, and I found the 2 was a little big. I would have preferred if it was a bit more nipped in at the waist, but the loose design makes it a wonderful dress to wear out and be comfortable. I wore it to a dinner party and it was perfect, but it would also be a lot of fun at a wedding because of the full skirt and movement. The stripped detailing on the bodice and skirt is not as pronounced in person as it is on the model. It just looks like a solid blue dress. I would definitely rent it again if I needed to go to a fall wedding!

I am normally a 4.  I am not super large busted so I went for the 2R.  The 2 was also a better length for me.  (I'm 5'4).  It is really difficult to zip and unzip on your own so make sure you have help!  I would totally get this dress again. I wish they had a petite size because I had to wear super tall shoes to make it fit.

I had a lithe baby bump when I rented this and this dress looked awesome.  It's not fitted, but doesn't look like a sack either.  The material is good quality.  I'm definitely going to rent this one again.
Fit very well, very classy yet still sexy feel to it!!
a little tricky to put on but very pretty once on!
This dress fits true to size and was very comfortable to wear!

Happiest RTR experience I've had to date.  I got so many compliments on this dress.  I got a petite because I'm 5'3.  I actually needed pretty high heels (3.5 inches), which I planned to do anyway, and with that the dress was a perfect length. But, if you are as short as me and don't plan to wear super high heels, this may not work.....

This dress was not only gorgeous, but it was unbelievable comfortable.  I received compliments all night.  I received both the 2 and 0 in regular and both fit perfectly.  I ended up going with the two because it was a shorter in length.

I ended up not liking how much of my back showed, even though I wore a backless bra (ladies with a large bust, DD and above, I recommend the Oolala Miracle Bra). Wasn't feelin' how much my back rolls showed :( But I really wanted to wear this jumpsuit cause the length and fit was superb, so I paired it with a blazer and added jewelry to give it a less "business women" look. This was my first time wearing a jumpsuit and I felt great in it all night.

The lines are very tailored and gives the dress an expensive look. However, I should have gone about two sizes down instead of a size up. 
All in all love the dress.

I rented this dress for a romantic castle/dinner in Switzerland and it was perfect! 
I was  looking for a piece that is high up on the list of current  fashion trends yet conservative as the Castle tour was a work related event for my husband. 
While  I am fairly tall (5'7) and thin  I do have a large bust & the dress still fit perfectly!
Be prepared for a night of complements and questions because you will hear time and time again "I love that dress where did you get it".
Fit is as pictured, loose and flowy.  It's not clear from the picture that there is actually a low V cutout at the neck, but it is basically hidden by the bow and ties, so still appropriate for work.

This is a stunning head-turner of a dress. It is long, and at 5'6" I had to wear 4" heels to avoid stepping on it. The arm holes also came too low for me to wear a strapless bra, but the dress is opaque and a stick on bra worked just fine. I wore this to a black tie gala at our club and was absolutely thrilled with this choice. My boyfriend was also a big fan!

I love Kate spade dresses and own several of their color block dresses. I had never worn one with this cut before. Its very flattering, but could be a little tight if you have larger hips - it flares out below your butt. While the very top of the dress looks white in the picture, its actually gray. Still cute, but i thought it was going to be white. I did end up keeping this to add to my collection!

The store did not have the 4R in stock, but the dress was so amazing that I decided to go with the 6R, which ran on me. The 4R would have been perfect. The slit for the leg is gorgeous and I highly recommend this dress to anyone who is looking for a fun, yet elegant dress for a formal event.
Perfect.

The dress fit perfectly and was incredibly comfortable and flattering. I ordered a size 6 and it felt great. I'm 5'5" and weigh 128. I received many compliments on the dress. It is backless, but an adhesive bra worked great.

I rented this for a weekend trip to Vegas. The dress looks stunning and received many complements - BUT - the sequins are very scratchy. After trying it on I looked I was malled by an animal. The night I wore it out I used runners body glide on my back and arms to protect my skins against the cutouts.
I didn't really love this. The neckline is higher than it appears in the picture. The dress doesn't really do anything and hit me at a weird spot on the bust.

The dress is very pretty! I got both the medium and large and just felt more comfortable in the large. However, toward the end of the night, the dress became lose which then I wish I would've worn the medium. The material is thick so perfect for a winter/fall event.

This dress fit perfectly and was a classy bridal look for my engagement party. I rented the necklace as well, and it looked awesome with the dress. Many reviews say the dress ran big, but I thought it fit true to size. The color was a great "winter white" (more of a cream), and the flowy, pleated skirt added a fun, feminine touch. I was super happy with this rental!
The top is very short so make sure to wear it with something very high waisted.

It fit well and I received a lot of compliments however it didn't look shorter in the front and longer in the back like on the display model.  Also, it doesn't photograph great.  It's hard to see the details of the dress which are beautiful in pictures.

Fit me well! Was able to have fun and have no insecurities with the mid section! (which can stress me out!) Paired with a necklace (also from RTR) that got tons of compliments. Would wear it again. Will always look to rent Elizabeth and James dresses!
This shirt is super flattering. I wore it to work and out day drinking on the weekend. Lots of compliments, and it photographed well. Nice, silky material that didn't wrinkly easily.
Love the flowy bottom and fit around the neck!
Lovely weight, but having a bit of a bum (unlike the model shown) definitely made the dress shorter in the back...
A little tight around the waist but perfect length

I loved this dress. I thought it ran a little large, so I would suggest ordering a size down. I am usually between a size 6 and 8, but I wore the 6 and could have maybe gone smaller. I am really tall (5'11") and even with a 3 inch heel the dress came to the top of my shoes. It is a stretchy, but thicker material that I think is really complimentary. Also, there is no zipper, but that just proves that there definitely is stretch in the material. I would recommend this dress for someone with an hourglass body shape.

Wore this to a black tie wedding reception and received nothing but compliments from friends and strangers alike.  The picture taken in the hotel room makes it look gold, but it's really champagne gold.  Beautiful and stunning.  I'm only 5' tall, so it was a bit long, but it worked out.  Instead of knee-length, it was like wearing a pencil skirt (but with stretchy fabric).   It was comfortable to wear - not at all scratchy - as well as dance for hours in.  The drape in the back is the absolute best part of the dress (I wore a sticky bra to give the front of the dress some shape on me).  I would totally rent it again!
It fit true to size, but was definitely very form fitting. It was tough at times to keep the over the shoulder straps in place. It was so comfortable though and I would wear it again!
This coat wore me instead of me wearing it. I  am petite and it was just too big on me. Maybe if the shoulders were a bit slimmer and the arms a bit shorter, it would have worked.

Way too short! I could have worn this as a tunic with leggings!  I would have been very self conscious of my behind hanging out had I worn this.  Pretty color and good fit for a petite person perhaps?
I loved the snug fit on top and it flared out just enough to give me a nice waistline.. Very comfortable and I loved the pockets!
the "deep v" in the back was low enough to show some skin, but high enough that I was still able to wear a strapless bra.

I am a size 6, and it was true to fit.  I am 5'7", 138lbs, athletic build, bra size 32D.  The dress was perfect with high heels, and super comfortable.  I wore a stick on bra, because you could see bra straps through the lace fabric.  Up do, for this dress.

Great color but like most jumpsuits, it was not made for long torsos.  I even tried to size up hoping that would give enough extra length in the torso area and it did not.  Also, I found the top of the dress to run on the larger size and the bottom (waist/butt area) of the dress to be small.

The only reason i did not give this 5 stars is the straps. Like some other reviewers have said the straps are long so they slipped off of my shoulders often. Besides that, great dress. I would probably rent again even with the strap issues.
Material was thin, but not see through. Fit really well in the chest. Buttons were perfectly placed so there were no gaps (busty ladies, you know what I'm talking about!). Loved it. Would rent again.

I ordered a S with a back up of a Medium. It runs on the larger side. I'm 5'7" / 145 lbs / 34C, and I typically wear a medium in dresses, but ordered the small because of the other reviews. The Small was even a little loose on me, which seemed weird to me. It is a deep cut dress, so if you want to wear a bra (I didn't) keep that in mind--it would have been easier if it was tighter with going bra-less, but it ended up okay. It's completely covered in sequins, so it is a decently heavy dress, but not to the point that it was unwearable. I was worried about the sequins scratching my underarms, but it didn't. It goes a little past mid thigh, but that was helpful for when it spun out during dancing so my butt didn't show (haha).  It was fun to be sparkly all night, would recommend!

My sister wore this as a bridesmaid dress for my wedding.  My only complaint was, again with Badgley Mischka, that the "long" size is too short.  She's 5'9" and wore 4" heels.  Long sizes that are formal-wear should account for heels.  The gold is perfect.

I LOVED his dress but wound up selecting my alternate selection. I will defiantly rent this dress next time. It hugged all of the right places and sparkled when I moved. I wanted something a little more low key for this occasion but this is a really beautiful dress.

This dress is very flattering and fit well up top but it fell a little short on me. I'm 5'7 with wide hips and a big butt so this happens pretty often. Not something I'd wear around family but it should be fine for new years with some tights

This dress was one of my favorite rentals to date. The dress fit perfectly which is often hard to find with my petite frame (5'2" 105 lb). Even though the dress was fitted, I was still able to dance and move freely.
Order 1 size up...I normally wear a 12-14 and the 16R fit just right.
This dress was awesome!  It felt amazing, nice and tight and the material was super thick so it felt like it held you in at all the right places.
love it! Want to buy!

Great fit!  As the other reviews say, this is a short dress.  It worked well for a business formal work environment, transitioning well into the evening cocktail.   Always a fan of Milly, will rent again!

I had been in the dress for less than 3 minutes before I stepped into an elevator and received my first compliment from a complete stranger!  I order a 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6 because the arms were a bit tight, so if you have an athletic build I suggest ordering a size up.

I've been renting through RTR for a few years now, and this is absolutely my favorite rental to date.  This gown is beautifully structured and wonderfully made.  The material is high-quality and doesn't wrinkle, and the cut seemed like it was made just for me.  The bottom part of the mermaid skirt moves regally when you walk, and I felt like a freaking starlet in this.  So classy!!  If I ever rent this again (which is likely), I'd switch to the petite length (I'm 5'3).  The regular length *just* worked with five inch heels, but it did drag the floor a bit in the back.   In short, absolutely rent this I looooooooooooved it. <3

I wore this to a gala and I liked it a lot. The 0 petite was rented out, so I got the regular. The regular was verryyyy long!! I wore 4-5'' heels with it and it still dragged a lot. I had to hold my dress up a lot while I was walking around, but no biggie. I could have probably sized up to a 2P because of my bust. I am a 34D and I was popping out a little bit. Overall I really liked this dress!

This dress was a perfect look for mother of the groom.  Very flattering, received numerous compliments. As others indicated the arms are a little stiff when you lift them up over your shoulders. It was absolutely what I wanted for this special day. I thought it might be a little long, but the length was ideal.

I really loved this dress. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner. The colors are lovely, the cut of the top of the bodice and sheer shoulders make things interesting but it's nothing overwhelming. Fitted in the waist, otherwise somewhat relaxed - I probably could have gone up to an 8 and been comfortable after eating and sitting down a long time, but the 6 was fine.
It fit well, but was a little long, even in my 2 inch heels. I'm 5'6". I went with the recommended length, but would choose a shorter one with two inch heels. The dress is very comfortable, too!
This dress is so soft and breezy! I wore it to a Christmas brunch with OTK boots. I am so sad to return it, I want to keep it!!!!
Hard to dance because legs have to stay close together. Other than that, everything was great!

This dress does run small. Although I could have gotten away with the medium I was more comfortable in the large and honestly there wasn't a lot of different. I did wear spanks but easily could have gotten away without them. First time using rent the runway and had a great experience!
Tight, but not constricting

For me, I'm always small up top and sometimes a size up on bottom, this was the perfect proportion for me.  The wide leg gives you wiggle room for the fit on the bottom and I just used a little bit of fashion tape up top to keep everything appropriate.

Overall, I'd recommend this dress to anyone needing something fun for a special occasion. The vibrant blue color and unique hemline really make this dress stand out! Fit true to size. 

The only thing I didn't like was that the print appears screened onto the dress rather than sewn or part fabric itself, which up close makes the print look a bit odd and cheap looking.

I'm only 5'2" and usually wear size 22 and my only fear was that the dress would be too long -- but it was perfect!  Just to my knee.  Everything fit like it was made for me! The bust was a tad roomy, but I preferred that to being too snug.  The dress just draped over my tush and hips.  I felt great and my sons ( in the photo with me)  told me I looked great!

I wore these for work and into an evening event - they were super comfortable and the waist is elastic. I could have gone XS or S, but only the S was available. I think the smaller size might have been better for the back, but overall they fit and were roomy. They are also super breezy chiffon material - it was 90 degrees today and felt great, but could also be good for fall.

I wore this to my boyfriend's dad's holiday Christmas party. It was the perfect mix of formal without being too formal, but other reviewers are not lying when they say the waist is small - it definitely helped me avoid the snack table! It was a little sad because the top was baggy, but there is no way I could have gone smaller due to the black waist section. I don't have a full body shot, but as a 5'11" female the end of the screen part came to my mid calf.

This top has a great, slim fit unlike other off the shoulder tops that are too blousy. We are having  a warm fall so this top is perfect to wear seasonal colors but not roast. I have not returned it yet since I have kept finding opportunities to wear it again!

Loved this dress! Very comfortable, unique, and beautifully colorful. I received many compliments on this dress and would even venture to buy it, if I could! The only problem was the bust area - I would have loved some double-sided tap to ensure my dress stayed in the proper place while dancing!

I have a long torso so I’m always nervous about rompers.  I sized up anticipating this would be a shorter rise, and I’m glad I did.  This is a very, very comfortable outfit that is quite stylish.  It does wrinkle easily, so if you are going to be sitting somewhere hot, expect the shorts to wrinkle a ton.  The top has quite a deep V, but I didn’t need to wear a tank under.

Such a gorgeous jacket and so cozy. It kept me comfortable on a day when the weather ranged from below 40ºF to above 60º. I got a ton of compliments. The color is perfect! Would definitely recommend renting.
Everybody loved this dress! My only regret is that I can't go out and buy it for myself. It was definitely a hit -- I got so many compliments!

The dress was so beautiful and elegant! It was not too big for me, even though I had to constantly pull up the straps because my bust was not that big. The slit in the back is not too high so it is also very nice.  The upper waist area was a bit baggy but overall it fit very well on me. Would rent again!

I was looking on RTR for a dress that would be different then anything I'd seen, yet also fit the "Midsummer Night's Dream" theme of my annual fundraiser. And I found it - this dress is unbelievably beautiful and flows so gracefully. I want to buy it, that's how much I enjoyed it! Although I am a bit shorter, the dress lengthened me and made me feel like I was really walking the red carpet!
This skirt is everything. Love, love, love. It is pretty short though (I'm 5'8) so I could only wear flats with it. Still, I would have bought if it weren't so expensive. Definitely rent!

I wore this dress for a little black dress party work function and it was perfect. I usually am between an xs and s I went with a small to provide a little more room and it was easier to get it. The detail is beautiful and I received compliments all night long. Will definitely rent it again!
I was actually so comfortable the whole evening I could have kept on going if my shoes weren't killing me!  It was so beautiful and the fit was perfect...I can't find one thing that was a negative...
This dress has a simple structure but the fit was so perfect. Classy with a fun print.

This dress was really cute and made of quality material! It felt very expensive. It was a comfortable fit, it was not tight under the arms and not too short or too long. I probably would not rent it again, but only because I did not like how big my bust looked in all of the pictures taken that day (I'm a 34D).

The dress was beautiful. Fit nicely. The length was too long for me by just 2 inches or so. I left it long and it still looked nice. It wasn't tons of fabric at my feet. I wore tall heels and was able to get away with it. Of course when I was close to people it tended to get stepped on. But all in all I loved the dress and cut. It really looked great.

The dress was stunning. When I pulled it out of box, I knew I had picked a winner. It was a bit of a challenge to get it on with a full face of makeup and not ruin the white top, but with a little creativity, I managed fine. The only takeaway was the gaping on sides when the dress was on, but a little bit of double-sided tape did the trick. Many compliments were given. One of the best dresses I've rented, by far!

I love the neckline. key hole,  and print of this dress. The shirt tail hem is great for shorter and petite bodies.  Can be worn with a nu bra or fashion tape. The fabric is nice and soft feels like your in your PJs!

The color was perfect for a day event in the spring/summer. Ran slightly big but the extra room felt appropriate for an event during the day. The dress was a great balance of covering problem areas (stomach/waist) while giving shape. I would definitely get again!
this dress fit perfect! I wore it to a charity event...it was comfortable, beautiful and I got quite a few compliments.  Thank you RTR!
It was the perfect dress the black tie event I attended.  The dress was comfortable, true to size, had pockets and could easily be dressed down for a less formal event. Highly recommend!
Fit great, but I am heavy chested and had to wear without a bra. However, I got so many compliments all day!

I rented this dress for my bridal shower and I received tons of compliments. I usually wear a size 4, and based on other reviews, I ordered my normal size and one size down. The 4 was a little loose, but it's a shift dress, so it looked fine. The size 2 also fit, but it was a little too short for a bridal shower. Overall, the dress was very comfortable, but you do need to wear a sticky bra since the whole back is mesh. Definitely a unique dress!
fit like a glove! was so fun and stood out A LOT. compliments galore! the sequence scratched the under arm a little but but not really a big deal. i def recommend this dress ;)
I was not able to wear the dress because it was too small. It was very lovely in person, but all dresses run small in these designs.

LOVE this dress, but super tight around the arms/chest area. I probably should have sized up, but then it would have been baggy around my waist. There is no way I could have zipped this up by myself or done the YMCA as I could not lift my hands over my head LOL

I wore this from prom, the theme was Hollywood. I wanted to tryout renttherunway for a year now and this was the perfect opportunity. When I was looking for dresses, I wanted something that would standout from everyone else. I felt amazing in this dress, it was easy to move in, and not to big. Everyone complimented me and said that I look like I belong on the red carpet or that I looked like a young Whitney Houston. This dress is absolutely gorgeous!
Very attractive top, great quality. It might show your belly button

With the help of a customer service rep, I ordered a regular length instead of petite.  I was afraid that a petite length would be a smaller fit (more like a 10 instead of a 12).  My back up was a 14.  The 14 ended up being slightly too big in the bust, so I opted to wear the 12.  I am so glad I did.  It fit like a glove and I had no worries at all about it slipping.  The length ended up being perfect with a pair of 5 inch heels.  I have a pretty curvy figure (hips, butt and a bit of a belly) and this dress hid everything that it should have and accentuated all of the good.

I really wanted this dress but it was only available in a 16 and a 20. I usually wear a 16, but this one was definitely not zipping on me. I could fit in the 20, but it gaped pretty badly in most places. I managed to wear it for a formal award dinner, but I definitely did not feel comfortable in it. If it would have fit, I probably would have really liked it.
Really added a great funky element to my outfit.  Super trendy.  Very comfortable. One of a kind piece.

The fit was fine, although small...I'm normally a 6 but the 6 was very tight on my rib cage so opted for the 8 so I could be more comfortable. I didn't really notice much difference between the 6 and 8 in the skirt.

The fit was spot on!  It was snug, yet comfortable.  The length was perfect, the slightly higher hem in the front made the dress  classy, elegant, AND sexy.  In the picture on the internet,  the dress looks quite plain, and I don't think that I would have considered renting it.  I was, however, in the shop at the Cosmopolitan in Vegas and the sales associate put the dress in my dressing room. The dress did not jump out at me when I saw it on the rack, but as soon as I put it on, I knew that it was the one!  There was much more detail than I originally gave this dress credit for.  I did not wear any jewelry, but I would have totally paired the dress with some chunky jeweled necklace or bracelet and I think it would be perfect for New Years!

After being a RTR member for two years, I finally took the plunge and rented this number for an anniversary dinner.  My boyfriend and I were going to a very formal dinner, followed by a show and I wanted to look elegant but still sexy.  This dress fit the bill.  I ordered my normal size 8, and it fit perfectly.  The fitting in the bodice worked to my advantage, as I felt it held the girls in well and I could go braless.  For the record, I'm a size 36B, so bigger girls might want to be aware that there will be a bit more cleavage going on than I had.  My only complaint on the dress (and it could have been a fluke?) was that the seams through the waist and bust were a bit itchy.  Not something I couldn't live with, but it did make for a slightly uncomfy evening.  Other than that though, I loved this dress and will be renting again.

This was honestly one of the most beautiful dresses I have ever worn. I fell in love with it the moment I put it on. It flattered my figure and was comfortable. It was perfect for my fancy Valentine's day date! The top is a bit fussy though, the shoulder bit doesn't like to stay put for long! It will stay though and it really frames your collarbones and face. I chose to wear a big gold bangle as my only adornment and that was perfect. I will probably rent this dress again.
Great end of summer color and classy pattern, with a comfortable and flattering fit. I felt pretty and everyone else thought so too!

Favorite RTR to date! I wore this for a bachelorette party and it was perfect. First off, it was comfortable b/c it can be worn with a traditional strapless bra. It was sexy b/c it shows of your legs and a little bit of your mid-section, while still keeping it classy. I want to rent this again or buy it b/c it's that good.

I am very leggy, so when I put this dress on, I was immediately terrified, but because the dress does not come in at the waist, I feel like it is really necessary to have that sexy length.  Loved this dress, but definitely would only rent because the lace it way to scary.

Cute jacket for wear with jeans or to dress down a navy dress or pants for work.  I thought the fit was true to size.  It was slightly snug in the forearms but not enough to bother me once I started wearing it.  I would rent this again because of the versatility.
The dress fit perfectly, not too tight but not loose. It was long enough to wear for work and I loved the pocket detail. The zipper was a little tough to get zipped. Other than that, loved it!
This dress is stunning. It's a thicker marterial, but so beautiful. I wish it came in another color so I could wear it again!
Just a Perfect Jumpsuit! Fits perfectly!

I received a million compliments on this jacket and all from strangers.  I wore it on a night out in the meatpacking district, a super trendy area.  I had people on the street and in the bars coming up and giving me compliments left and right.  I'm pretty tall and sometimes jackets don't always reach the end of my arms, but this fit like a glove and looked like it was tailored just for me.  So in love with this jacket, I don't ever want to return it!

I rented this dress for an evening garden wedding and it was perfect.  I paired it with a grey blazer because it was unseasonably cold that evening.  The top is a bit small and this dress does not have any stretch, so for that reason, I can't say it was the most comfortable for me because I have a large bust.  The flair of the skirt is perfect and the length was great for my height (5"4').

This dress fit okay, but it did not flatter my curves. The fabric is gorgeous but very heavy and a bit itchy, with irritating bones inset through the bust.  I'm 5'5" and about 125 with a fairly slender figure and I thought the mermaid shape would be flattering, but it actually made me look rather short and stout.

The dress is pretty, bold and form fitting.  I received lots of compliments wearing this dress.  Based on the comments, I ordered a 2 and backup size 0 thinking that I would definitely be wearing the 2.  To my surprise, the 2 was a little baggy around the hip and the 0 fit perfectly.  I recommend ordering a size down.  
The only negative comment would be that it's a bit long for someone who is petite.  As you can see from the RTR picture, the length of the dress should hit right above the knee.  Unfortunately for me, being 5'2 it hit just below the knee. It didn't look bad with heels on, but of course it would've looked better if the length was shorter.  Otherwise I would have given this dress 5 stars.
Dress ran short, the sequins irritated my arms
The color is amazing and I received many compliments!  Loved the pockets!  Would rent again!
Rented for my birthday! Gorgeous dress that hugged my curves. I would recommend.

The fit is great, the dress hugs you in all the right places. I love the deep v but had to pay extra attention when sitting down to make sure I wasn't showing too much cleavage. I'm 5' and the length was perfect with heels. Simple, elegant and sexy dress for a formal event.. I highly recommend this dress!!
Fit was true to size, and underarms were less scratchy than expected after reading the reviews.  I got lots of looks and compliments; loved the dress.  Wish I could have kept it!

The fit and flare was flattering, and easy to wear. I picked a normal strapless bra which didn't show in the back. This is a simple dress, but with enough nice design features to make it interesting (pockets, criss crossed back straps, frill on skirt). Was not see through, and can accesorize with countless options. Honestly no cons, fit as expected.
Found it to be a little long, and loose through the middle so I belted it and it was perfect.

Fits very well and is stretchy, the only con is that the metal boning had come through the rental that was sent to me and it was scratching me up all night which hurt.  As long as the boning is in place this is a great dress for any formal occasion.
Wonderful dress. Fit well. Fit my bust absolutely perfectly, which is a rarity. I wore 3 inch heels and it skimmed the floor exactly as I intended.

I got so many compliments on this dress!! I thought that the sequins would be scratchy under my arms all night, but they surprisingly weren't! It is very flattering for any body type.  Best thing is - I won an Emmy award the night I wore this dress! Cherry on top of a fabulous evening!

I wore this to an awards banquet in December.  It was just the right amount of coverage and class for the occasion.  The dress was stretchy as the other reviewers mentioned, so I felt comfortable sitting all evening.  The solid color with a little bit of interest in the hemline made it easy to dress up or down.  I would definitely rent this dress again and think it could be worn to a variety of functions.

I wore this dress to my company's Christmas Party.  I wore it with nude heels and some simple gold jewelry.  I got tons of compliments.  I'm 5'9", it came just above my knees so appropriate for a work event.  It was fitted but not too tight.  If you have a little extra to love in the mid section, it will show, may want to consider gettings spanks.  l

I selected this dress months before my son's bar mitzvah. I tried it on and liked it, but I ended up wearing my backup dress. This dress was long on me and the hem hit mid-calf. I'd worked for months to be sure I was in shape for this dress because, as other reviews note, it shows everything (abs, posterior). I liked what I saw in the mirror and will keep it in mind for another event.
general loose fit all over- i front tucked it into my jeans to give more shape

I rented this dress as a backup dress but I ended wearing this one to the wedding.  This dress looks amazing on.  People gave me really nice compliments and I was really happy.  The only thing I would say is I usually wear a size 12/14 but I have a really wide hip so I usually don't wear anything that is hip hugging and the dress looked very fitted in the hip area.  I should have rented the 14 because the fabric has some nice stretch and the bust of the 16 was large.  Nothing I was not able to fix with some pinning but just thought I would share.
I loved the shape that the sleeves gave me. I am not a fan of sleeveless.
No stretch, so glad i went for a 4 so i had breathing room, (im usually a 2). Gorgeous dress! Good quality! Looked brand new, perfect for my senior pictures!!

I received this dress as my backup since the original dress I had chosen was unable to be sent to me. I was a little nervous about the fit and showing my tummy too much but it ended up being an amazing dress! I had a 6 and an 8 to choose from and both fit but went with the 6 because it showed off my curves a little better and the top was a bit large on me in the 8.  I received so many compliments and felt so confident and pretty in this dress! I would definitely recommend it! I am 5'4" and size 6 for reference.
I though the dress might be too hot for a summer night, but it was fine.  There is no give in the fabric, so I ended up going with the 6 for a little extra comfort.

This dress was amazing for the fall wedding I wrote it to. Classy and sexy at the same time!! The slip underneath the lace would sometimes ride up but it was no big deal to pull it down. I'm very tall, this dress came right above my knees, prefect length!! I wish I could buy this dress!!

This was SO cute. I wore it to a brewery on a hot day. It was adorable, however it seemed very worn. It was pretty stretched out, and there were tons of picks on it (I had to cut some thread off). The color was also a little faded, probably from lots of wear and tear as well. If it was brand new, would have been 5/5!

I wore this dress to work - paired with sandals on an unusually warm spring day. It was perfect for the chillier AC office and great for outdoors. Received lots of compliments. The stitching is flattering, even though the dress is not form fitting. Definitely recommend!
Wore this dress for a gala. Definitely a show stopper, could have been a bit longer.

This skirt was beautiful however it was much fuller than I anticipated from the picture and a little too poofy for me.  I had hoped to wear this for a date night but it would almost be better for a prom look.

This dress fit snug  with little give. It is very comfortable and wears very nicely. I paired this dress with a pair of nude stilettos and a pair of turquoise marbled Kendra Scott earrings. I also chose a summer tangerine lipstick for an extra pop against the dress. I kept my eyeshadow neutral. I am on the short side, so the dress goes past my knees, but I feel like that adds to the drama. The cutouts and net fabric are very nice and are elegant and not at all too much. Great dress.
Wore this to a girls night out.  The fabric is warm, so perfect for a winter out.  The color is a very deep wine, so it doesn't really stand out among black dresses.  True to size and great fit!

I recently wore this dress to a friend's wedding, and I felt absolutely amazing in it! It's super flattering with its tight top and flare out skirt (which was a bit poofier than I was expecting but looked great). The see-through detail on the bottom of dress adds just the right amount of fun. The wedding photographer complimented my dress and my husband said it's the best thing I've rented so far -- so awesome dress all around :)
Dress fit was great but a little heavy.  Wedding was outside in June, very warm and dress was pretty thick for an outdoor wedding.  Other than that, comfortable fabric and fit!

This was my first RTR experience. I don't usually wear short tight dresses but chose the Berry Lola for my bachelorette party because I wanted to stand out. I ordered a Medium and a Large (I normally  - the seams on the large were kind of funky, probably from lots of use so I ended up going with the medium even thought it was a little tighter than I normally prefer. I wore spanks to help with this. The dress did not ride up when i walked and the sequins were not bothersome at all. Overall, I was very happy with this choice and can't wait to rent again!
The 10R fit like a glove!!! I absolutely loved it and got a lot of compliments.
I was sent this dress as a replacement for my backup size. It was terrible for my bottle. I felt like it cut in the wrong places and felt too tight. Maybe the M would have been better.

I rented this dress for New Years Eve and I adored it. The color is beautiful and it is demure yet sexy. I am very small in the bust area so I was able to wear it with out a bra, but I"m not sure that larger chested women would find this dress comfortable. Overall I loved it and received many compliments!
couldn't wear it, too big.
Listed above

Love this dress, looks great, but was comfy for a fun night out.  Love the color and I am a size 4 but got a size 6 and it fit great.  RTR is wonderful and will be using it again for weddings I have this year

The detailing of this gown along with the dainty sparkle...I'm in love! This dress runs true to size, and we suggest sizing up for backup due to being fitted throughout the midsection.  The fabric also has no stretch.  Although fitted, I felt that the halter neckline with keyhole detailing looked very flattering for my bust size.  Since I'm 5'1",  it fell about 3-4 inches on the floor, so my fellow petite ladies will need hem tape for this one.  Pair this dress with simple studs to complete your look!

The fit is perfect. I thought it was a bit loose in the shoulder straps, and the staff was very helpful in showing me how to double tape them or to put in a stitch that could easily be taken out. But then I tried simply pulling the whole dress down, which made it fit perfectly and allowed for a tasteful amount of cleavage. It was very easy to wear. Because of its shape, you don't need anything special--no Spanx, no nothing. I wore a strapless bra, but you could get away with wearing a regular bra. This dress is such a show-stopper that I felt like a movie star.
The dress fit true to size.  I wore a 4L with a pair of black heels resulting in a little bit of a train, which I loved.  People consistently stopped me to compliment the dress.
The dress was gorgeous and fit me like a glove.
Loved it
It was a very tight fit around the waist.

This dress looks amazing! It has a great pattern that is bright, but sophisticated. My issue was with fit - it was very boxy on a petite frame. The shoulders didn't hit well, and the beautiful fabric just looked awkward on my frame. From a stylistic perspective, the dress is amazing! It just didn't work out for me.
Fit true to size and flattering. On the shorter side - watch out for flashing!

I loved this dress! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I had to go up a size for the waistband to fit my ribcage, which made the chest a little too big. This wasn't a huge deal, though, I just used some fashion tape to keep it attached to me. I'm 5'6" and this was the perfect length with 2.5" wedges. Loved the pockets too!

I loved the color and shimmer of this dress! This is a classic version of the oh-so-sparkly version of a New Year's Eve dress. The sleeves have elastic at the wrists which made it great for leaving all the way down or pulling up to my elbows. Super comfy and tons of compliments all night long!

The dress fit perfectly, the fabric was relaxed enough that it showed off my figure but hid the dessert I had after dinner. I was able to move my arms with ease. I would recommend ordering a longer length,  the dress was a shorter than I anticipated. I received compliments all night long!

It's a fun party dress, but not too dressy for The Bold Italic Winter Wonderland party in San Francisco. I am on the petite side, so the proportions were a little off... a little big in the shoulders and bust (and I'm a D cup), and little long for the waist. It still looked great, but it was not as flattering on me as it could have been.

I was really happy with this dress! I typically wear an 8 but it wasn't available for the weekend that I needed it so I ended up going with the 10. It wasn't quite as fitted, which was mostly noticeable in my midsection (as you can see in the photo), but other than that I don't think it looked too big. If I rented it again I would go with the 8 though. 

The RtR photos of the dress make it look like there's a sheer panel in the mid-section, but the dress I rented didn't have that. I'm 5'11" so I loved that it was a little longer (it hit me below the knees) but with the sheerness of the lace it didn't look too mature. The sleeves weren't tight or itchy either, which I was really happy about! 

Another great Rent the Runway experience!

I wore this dress to a wedding, the picture does not do this dress justice, especially the color, it is bright and beautiful cobalt blue. Fit well, sleeves are a bit tight because the lace does not have much give but wasn't too uncomfortable, loved the pockets, looked great on and would rent again.

This was my second choice (after my first choice the BADGLEY MISCHKA BLUSH MARIA DRESS didn't meet my expectations), and I was very glad this one worked out! The dress fit like a dream. It was a cold NYE for us on the riverboat, and I was very glad to have the long sleeves to help keep me warm. The lining overall kept me pretty cozy and comfortable. The only con to the dress is that the bottom stop/retaining box for the zipper was low and protruded slightly. The design of the dress hid this for the most part, so I wasn't uncomfortable walking around. I got soooo many compliments from the photos I posted. This is a definite win.
This dress fit me perfectly. I was scared because I didn't know how the top would fit, but it did. Everyone kept telling me how gorgeous the dress was.

LOVED this dress!  Very comfortable to wear all day and night minus a few scratches from the sequins.  I got SO many compliments from both men and women about this adorable dress that's sexy while still quite elegant.  As many have already said, I would recommend going with the smaller of your sizes if you're between two.  Another awesome RTR experience!

This dress is adorable- classic, pin-up girl style with a flirty cut-out. I wore it to San Diego Pride festivities and received many compliments! Was perfect for the fun occasion. Loved the pockets. My only complaint is that the colors were kind of faded, likely from many rounds at the dry cleaner, but that barely took away from the cuteness.

Pros: It really holds you in
Cons: I had to keep pulling the bust section up all night and the inside straps was broken.
The arms were pretty roomy but across the hips is very tight. The fabric doesn't have any give, very pretty though just didn't fit at all.
It was a little longer than I thought it would be but still looked great. I normally wear a 2 but the 0 fit me with a little room to spare.
I really loves this dress, fitted perfectly.

I was called a modern day Marilyn Monroe. I felt so glamorous and the dress was so comfortable. I wore 10R and the dress is true to size however I wore it with 4inch heels and it just skimmed the floor so it was on the longer side.

Loved this dress. Will definitely rent again for my next cocktail /formal affair. Lots of sparkle. Love the color and it stretches so there is lots of give. I think it would be flattering on MOST body types.
Beautiful lace overlay!

I liked the IDEA of this top, but I just couldn't get over how dowdy it looked on me. I'm a 34B and had to wear a tank underneath because it was low cut. That probably added to the dowdy factor. Ha! It was a very nice blouse, well made, and the right person could pull this off!

The dress fits very true to size. It sparkles so much more in person! I didn't have a problem with the back gaping open like others did but it could be because the dress fit like a glove! This event was black tie optional and I fit in perfectly with this dress. The length was very appropriate for someone of my height. The fabric is also more on the thick side so I wasn't left cold in those dreary banquet halls. If you are someone of my size and shape, definitely get the size 2. Wasn't too tight but also wasn't baggy at all. Get this dress!

This dress,overall, was a hit.  I will say though that it tends to make your shoulders look broader than they are. I have a very petite frame and the majority of the pictures take in this dress cause me to look wider at the top.Otherwise I loved it and definitely recommend.

It definitely fit a little small and a lot short. I am 5'6" and wasn't sure about ordering the long based on other reviews but if you are taller than 5'4" and/or plan or wear tall heels you'll need to get the long. My heels were very short and it hit just above the ground. It was a good length so I wasn't tripping on it but definitely wasn't too long. They didn't have a 6 or I would have gotten that - I think it would have been more comfortable. But the 4 worked. I will also mention that if you have a small chest (like me) the top is a tad loose so just in that regard I think the smaller size worked better. But all in all it looked beautiful and I felt like I fit right in at the black tie gala!

Cute dress! Although I don't think I would have chosen it though if I weren't pregnant. It definitely has a little pouf at the belly area that works great for a pregnant woman or if you have a little belly you want to cover up, but maybe not so great if you're naturally lean. Customer service on the dress was great though...
Loved the fit and the pattern  - the buttons at the wrist were subtle and beautiful as was the tiny writing of  'marni' in the flower print on the sleeve and dress.
Very comfortable. Not super flattering on my shape body but I still really liked it!

Such a unique and understated jungle pattern.  The crop top is awesome - the size 8 fit me perfectly w/o a bra (despite my small chest).  I didn't end up wearing the skirt because the size 8 was too small - definitely size up on the skirt.

Another great rental. Great quality (no snags/issues with the lace which was impressive). Really nice structure, good length. I normally like things short and this was just a tad longer than I'd normally opt for, but good for a wedding with a bunch of friends' parents present. Fun skirt to twirl in, fun back, very subtle cleavage situation with lace mostly covering that area but a tiny bit of skin showing through. XS fit but was pretty restrictive since the material has zero give. Went with the S to be more comfy eating/dancing.

This dress was absolutely fantastic.  I loved it very much. I wish it came in petite because i thought the length could have been an inch or two shorter to fall where it falls on the model, but that was a minute detail that didn't really matter.  It is definitely a TIGHT dress, but holds in decently.

1. IT HAS POCKETS!!!!!!!!!!! PTL. My phone didn't come close to falling out.
2. I usually range from 0 and 2 and the 0 fit snug as a rug. The bodice is firm and has the no slip grip lines in it so my small chest didn't have to worry about it falling down between dancing and walking around a lot. Didn't need to wear a bra, but I did because I'm weird about that. Just wore a normal strapless one.
3. Super comfortable
4. We were in 40 degree weather which to me is freezing, so you can bet that I wore leggings underneath. The line of the leggings didn't show and I was the only girl that wasn't freezing her butt off.
5. I'm 5'3" and I thought wedges would help with the length. Nope, you are 100% going to have to tuck it in and fashion tape it to itself on the inside to make it shorter so you won't trip and bust your butt. Took me about 5 mins to get the length right and to fashion tape it all the way around. Didn't have any problem with it becoming unstuck throughout the night.
6. Perfect cherry red for Christmas, most compliments I've gotten in a very long time.

100% recommend

Super flattering and cute.  Definitely business on the top and nightclub on the bottom.  If you are tall, it is SHORT.  Not unwearable, but it would be too short for work, if you are tall.  But with nude heels, I loved it, was conservative but also sexy with the length.  I am keeping this for a while :)

This dress fit true to size. Like many of the other reviews, the top was a tad bit loose on me so I just threw in a quick safety pin and it was fixed. Compared to other all-sequin dresses, for me - this one didn't scratch my underarms as much as some others I've worn. 

Overall - I loved it!! It was absolutely gorgeous and perfect for the occasion.

This romper was a great addition to my vacation pieces. It fit great and could be worn either on the shoulder or off the shoulder. I paired it with espadrilles for a boho look but could easily be worn with white sneakers and a baseball cap for a more sporty look. This is slightly sheer so I recommend wearing on a day that is out in the sun with a strapless bra for the most comfort.

I work at a 4 diamond resort and needed something to wear for a group event I was hosting. It was a perfect mix of professional and pretty. The rainbow behind the lace gave it a pop of color, and the length was just right over my knees. I paired it with the Double Dagger Drop earrings and some floral heels. The dress was also a nice material that didn't ride up as I moved and I never got overheated running errands. I received many compliments in this dress and I even had a date night the same night so I didn't even have to change!

I would definitely rent this again for any number of occasions!

I ordered the medium and a small as my back up dress. I ended up wearing the small. On a scale of 1-10, I would give it a 5. The positive – it is very unique. I also love the scuba material, but the pattern is not the most flattering. Also, when sitting the dress bunched up at the waist and just looked bulky. I was trying to smooth it out throughout the night, which made me uncomfortable. The dress was tight around my chest and I couldn’t wait to take it off. This isn’t my most favorite RTR dress; however, I don’t regret trying it!
Color was not quite as vibrant as expected but still a great looking pattern.
Versatile and stylish. Amazing jacket! I just might keep it. :)

This dress fit great! It was the perfect length, really flattering and I got a ton of compliments! I think other people have commented that it is a bit darker than the picture appears, but still beautiful!
The dress fit well over all. The only con was the loops inside the dress kept peeking out. I would highly recommend this dress.

Fun, beautiful.  Great for small waist and bigger bum.  I belted it with a thick brown leather belt.  Went to just above the floor on me (5'3).  Loved the sleeves.  Wore several times and would rent again.
I love this dress and will rent it again. Lots of compliments. I wore it with black tights and flats but easy to dress it up for after work.
Fits true to size
wore 3-ish inch heels. the 2P fit fine, but the 4P gave me just a little bit more room to eat

Loved the way the dress fit! I went with the 2 over the 0 because it was slightly longer. Slightly being the key word! This dress is very short, but definitely not a deal breaker. The material is comfy and the back is so pretty. I would definitely rent this dress again!!!

The stretch in this dress was perfect because I have a small bust size. I needed to go down a size in the hips so that I could cover my top and dance all night. I had to wear fashion tape to keep the top from moving but I felt so comfortable in this dress.

Rented this dress from the Las Vegas store and wore it to dinner while on vacation there. I got a size 6, which is my usual size, and it fit okay, but I would've probably fit a size 8 better. I have a full bust (34D) and it fit pretty tight in that area and around the arm hole. While this dress is pretty true to size, I would recommend getting one size up just to be safe, especially if you carry your weight in your upper body like I do. Loved, loved this dress! Didn't wanna take it off at the end of the night.
This dress is pretty long but very beautiful. The only downside is the way the material feels but other than that I would definately wear it again!
The black lace creates an even more exaggerated hourglass figure.

This jumpsuit fit like a glove. I know I definitely wear a size 10 due to my hips. The material was very thick and comfortable. The length was perfect because it was very fitted at my ankles which made my heels stand out. It also look great taking pictures which is always a plus. The cut outs on the side of the jumpsuit made a statement as well. Overall it was a great fit.

Beautiful dress! Has a gorgeous mermaid silhouette that compliments any shape. The ruching of the fabric is very forgiving across the mid section too. I got so many compliments that I didn't want to send it back!! It looked amazing on! It also works for any top heavy girls too. One caveat, it is hard to pull over your head because its stretchy but once you get it on it's very comfortable.

I wore this dress to a Roaring 20's party. It was perfect for the theme.  The lace and sequins were perfect for the time period.  The dress was also very slimming.  Everyone told me I looked great and perfect for the theme!

This dress is beautiful and was a nice bold & colorful change from my ordinary, monotone choice of dress - but it was still feminine and conservative enough that I didn't feel at all uncomfortable standing out a bit. :) 

I ordered the XS and S. Although the top was a bit tight, I went with the XS as it fit much better everywhere else. I couldn't wear a bra with the dress otherwise the top buttons would come undone. This wasn't too much of an issue for a date night in the summer, though, because the pattern was busy enough that it wasn't noticeable. The length is a bit long, and while the S fit better on top, the bottom half seemed to overwhelm my short legs. The high slits on the S were also just a bit too flowy on the S given the additional fabric and room.

As always, got lots of compliments on this RTR dress! Even the owner of the restaurant we went to for dinner commented on it!! This dress is super cute & easy to wear :) I noticed lots of the other comments mentioning that the arms were super tight, so I did size up for my backup size. I didn't find the arms to be too constricting in the 8, though there was definitely more room in the 10. But ... the 10 had a lot more room everywhere else, too so I went with the 8 for the evening :) I think a belt helps give this dress some definition. And I could totally also see this being adorably dressed down a little with a jean jacket & some cowboy boots! Overall: another successful rental!
Great dress in terms of well designed.  Love the built in bra- tight on top and a bit loose in the hips for my body type. Color pops and I wore with the straps which are optional.

I loved this dress!  It is a dark navy, very comfortable and hides the upper arms with style!  My husband is not a fan of these flapper-style shapeless dresses, but likes me to be comfortable.  It can be paired with leggings and boots too, perfect for autumn.  Nice substitute for the LBD.

Great dress! I'm 5'8", about 135 and very athletic, and it fit perfectly. I did NOT wear heels and got the regular size, which was still a touch too long (I held it up quite often throughout the night). But other than that, no complaints! I received many compliments. Beware of wearing this to outdoor weddings in the summer, as it is lined and can be HOT. Also, I'm a 34b, and I did NOT have to wear a bra (which was fabulous).

This dress fit beautifully, I ordered the 8R and 10R, I had to go with the 10R. The 8R fit but it was snug the 10R was more comfortable and flattering. The color of this dress was gorgeous. One annoying thing was the very long hanger loops that were on the dress...I wish they were cut off, I don't think there is a need for them and I felt they showed through the fabric.  I wore the Nu-Bra with this dress and it worked out great, I needed the bra to fill out the top of the dress that otherwise would have been a smudge too big.
Loved this blazer!  Was great with jeans, t-shirt and statement necklace for a casual look and with  a lacy shell blouse for a more dressy look!  I will definitely rotate back into my wardrobe!
Too Baggie in the stomach area and too tight in the armpits.

This dress fit well and even a little bit. The material felt nice and zipper was discrete. The lace sleeve added a sexy, yet formal feel. Great length and easy to accessorize this dress. Would recommend!

I wore this dress for a friends bachlorette party and it was super cute and perfect for the occasion, the material is thick and comfortable but I would say it runs a little small. It fit pretty snug around my chest area but I managed. Great first time experience with RTR!

Very comfortable. But overall a little too slouchy for me. They are navy which was nice but I definitely thought they were going to be black and white. Very long for a short girl if you don't wear heels.
It fit great but i didn't realize i was all lace
Really cute, fun shift dress. Casual and perfect for work or weekend. Great color, lightweight soft fabric.
Roomy, comfy.

Rented this through my unlimited subscription and will likely rent again.  The fabric is very thick and textured making this one of the heavier blazers I've ever put on.  That being said, it lays perfectly over a variety of different shirt styles and gives a refined look to the otherwise ordinary business suit.  Fit is true-to-size for the most part ... the arms were perfect for me (including length which means if you're not short - eh-hem...petite - like me, then expect the arm length to be on the shorter side), and the length of the blazer overall was nice.  The cut was rather boxy however, making the overall fit feel a bit large.  In fact, it looked a little awkward when buttoned ... BUT, in the "pro" column, if you're my size and trying to conceal a 6, 7, or 8 months pregnant belly then this blazer will certainly do it for ya!  Knowing that, I would still rent again (and plan on it) because I typically don't wear my blazers buttoned in the front anyway.  Overall, excellent quality and good fit with limitations.

I loved, loved loved this dress! The structure up top provided the perfect silhouette. I wouldn't recommend if you're larger than a C cup. I just had enough space for mine. The color and pattern is beautiful and delicate. Felt like a mermaid!
it's a snug fit but a heavy enough fabric that it creates a smooth shape. I'm 5'3 and the length came down to my upper shin.
Fit was slightly looser than strictly necessary, but worked well for all the dancing. Was very light, and perfect for a late summer wedding!
The top half is tighter than the bottom. It was difficult to bend my arms in this dress. The bottom half is forgiving without being loose.
The dress was nice and fitted at the top, but comfortable and flowy.  Perfect for an outdoor wedding!  I'm 5'4" and the regular length worked perfectly with a 3 inch heel.
This dress was a little loose, even thou I am a busty gal. But the effect was great. The skirt flows when you walk, the fabric is great and lightweight.
This dress is amazing!  I wish I could of bought it.  People couldn't stop complimenting me.  I felt like a movie star! Also, there are pockets which makes this dress even better!

This dress was very pretty and sweet!  Fits true to size, and loved that it was forgiving in the hip area.  Lots of compliments all night long!  Was more sweet than sexy, but that's ok for a nice winter wedding!

Its definitely meant for girls with a little bigger chest. I definitely needed to wear a bra with it not because I had to but because I needed something to fill out the top part of it. Other wise was super comfortable.

fit a little big, but was doable. I rented the regular length due to the reviews stating that it ran long, and the length was a bit long. The color is more of a dark blue and black design that glares some green tint, wore it with black and silver accessories and it worked for me.

I typically wear a 6/8 but will choose a 10 for comfort. The 8 was perfect. The 10 might have been a bit roomier, but the extra space in the hips was too much. I got multiple compliments (in New York city, no less) on what a fantastic and flattering dress I was wearing. We walked quite a bit, had tapas, saw a show and then stopped for cocktails. I was totally comfortable all night. Great choice!

I ordered a size 8 and 10. The 8 fit but of course more form fitting. I wasn't looking for a fitted look since the event was for work so i wore the 10.  I really enjoyed the dress, I got plenty of compliments and I felt comfortable during the whole night in it.

I rented this for a bachelorette party and it was the perfect amount of glam without being too much. They are thick and kept me warm from bar to bar in 40F temperature. I recommend for a little bit of fun!
I was a tent on me. It was not flattering

This dress fits great! The dress overall fit is proportional in the shoulders/busy to the hips. It has a little bit of form and the material is on the thicker side. My particular dress did have a lot of wear to it though. Luckily the pattern and material masked the wear/dry cleaning.

Loved this dress! I definitely want to buy this. I wore this to a holiday party. The cutouts are sexy but not too much (though women with larger breasts, be warned of potential under boob). Did not have to wear a bra, but still felt very secure.

I wore this dress for my 30th birthday dinner. I felt very comfortable in this dress and despite the cut out and the high slit I felt covered and sexy. It does run a bit small. I usually wear an 8 (6 occasionally) but I wore this dress in a 10. Truth be told I would have loved a size somewhere between an 8 and 10 but the 10 was totally manageable. The dress is well made, interesting, and easy to wear. I would recommend it for a "grown ups" night out or sexy date night.
I loved this dress but couldn't get it zipped past my ribs (32DD). I would have sized up, but I was worried to would be too loose in the waist

Very Chic option. The material is thick and one thing to note is the arm holes are slightly odd to navigate into. The dress itself is more of a shift option as well. This dress is very short, even at my 5'4 height, however the high neck allows a standard bra to be worn, For fall and winter, I definitely recommend adding tights. I also recommend adding a necklace for a pop of color.
The dress was awesome! Very comfortable and thick to hide any bra lines.
I loved this dress, super easy fit. I'm 5'6 and it wasn't too short on me. I wore it work and will probably hold into and wear it for weekend as well.

What I thought was going to be a boring white dress was actually really cute and very flattering! Sometimes I'm afraid dresses like this are going to be potato sack-ish, but this dress had a nice shape! It can be worn with heels for a brunch or day date, or it can be worn with flats and simple accessories for work or everyday. This dress is perfect for those in-between weather days before Spring kicks in! It's very stretchy too, so it's super comfortable!

This outfit is made out of some pretty thick and sturdy material. For whatever reason, looking at the photo I assumed it would be more light weight. The material works because it holds the shape of the outfit together. The design is very elegant and beautiful. My only compliant is that it's not meant for the "vertically challenged." The legs hit a little lower than mid-shin, instead of just below the knee. It still worked when paired with some nice heels.

I wore this dress for a wedding and it could not have been more perfect. The open back was my favorite part!
However the open back is too low for a regular bra so I suggest sticky boobs (or if you have small boobs like me just go without one)!

Y'all. This dress. It's a knockout. I wore it to work and I've never received so many compliments on an outfit in my life. The crochet-type fabric wasn't constricting, uncomfortable, or itchy - as I thought it might be. Rather, the dress is surprisingly comfortable and flattering. My only complaint - and its a tiny one - is that the zipper in the back of the dress was a little difficult to get up and down on my own.

The dress fit great. It was a little short but standing and dancing it wasn't a problem. Overall the dress was true to size and I received complements all night long. People couldn't believe it was a rented dress
The only thing I will say about the dress is I received two different colors. I ended up wearing the dress that was too big because it was more navy than the other dress.
Very beautiful and fun dress! Really comfortable and fit well.  If you are on the taller side, beware....I was afraid to lift my arms up very high on the dance floor because it's so short (I'm 5'9")!

Love, love, love this dress ensemble; so classy for a two-piece. I wore it to my senior homecoming and received so many compliments; this dress is so different from the basic hoco dress everyone always wears. 
I wore it with gold accents: gold heels, arm cuff, body chain, and earrings. 
Top fit well, but the bottom was large in waist and long in length ( even with 4in heels.) Since it was too large it wouldn't sit on my waist, but slipped to my hips which made it drag even more. 
Highly recommended this to anyone who wants to do something different and stand out at a formal event.

Such a beautiful dress!  Dont expect much in the way of stretch, but the dress is somehow form fitting and forgiving at the same time!  I wore it with the Oscar de la Renta necklace for my best friends traditional Chinese wedding!  It was the perfect choice and I felt lovely!

This dress was super comfortable and durable. I had to run around and be on my feet for hours and this dress was easy to move around in! The pockets are everything! This dress also made me feel super slim.

Great top for work or play! Running a bit large, we recommend sizing down for backup you're smaller framed. Plenty of room in the bust area so really great for almost any cup size. Minimal stretch to the fabric overall but shouldn't be an issue since it's meant to be oversized. Keep in mind the fabric wrinkles pretty quickly especially if you are sitting. At 5'6, this style hit right around mid-thigh. Pair it with your favorite sneakers or booties - the possibilities are endless with this one.

I reserved a 6R and a 10R (all other sizes were taken.)  The 6R fit everywhere but around the rib cage, so we went with the slightly too large 10R.  I had to wear 3" heels to accommodate the dress' length, but being almost 5'3", that's to be expected.  The dress was phenomenal, I felt like a princess!

This dress was amazing and I felt so beautiful in it.  This is probably my favorite dress to date!  It fit me perfectly.  I wore the 8 to have just a little more room, but I could've fit in the 6 if I didn't want to eat. :)  I just can't say enough good things about this dress.  I wish I owned it!

If I owned it -- I would have it altered to fit. Cute style and love the print. But very low v-neck and just floppy all around. I was swimming in the small. It looked sloppy on me so I didn't end up wearing it
Fits perfectly. Glides over curves and flatters. My mother felt like a queen. Had her red carpet moment.

I love the way this dress looks when I walk around. This dress is fun and cute. Make sure you size up! I usually wear 2, but ordered 4. I was able to wear long sleeve inside (cuz of cold weather) and looked great. I wore it to work and got tons of compliments! This dress is definitely made of quality material. I will probably rent it again.

The dress was super comfortable and I received a lot of compliments on my dress that evening.  I ended up going with the medium because top part was a little tight in the chest. Length wise I had a couple times going down stairs I had to lift my dress but the rest of the time I was good with the length.  (I did wear 4inch heals). I also really like that the short part of the skirt was attached to the long lace part. So, didn't have to worry about it riding up. All and all, I would wear this again. I would love to have this in my closet!!

I wore the size 6L. I tried on the 4L but the bust was very snug. I didn't gain hardly any room in the waist between the 4 and 6. They were both very hard to zip. Many reviews say the arms holes or bust is big. I found this very accomodating to my 32DD bust. The fabric is thick and no need for nipple shields. The pockets made the dress for me. I had on 4" heels and the Long length was just skimming the floor and perfect. I liked the earrings I rented more than the dress. They were the finishing touch. Anton Heunis- Crystal Leaf Earrings.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress.  So much so that I looked online afterwards to see if it was still available to buy!  The dress was very comfortable to wear.  I was concerned when I saw it on RTR that it might be warm for a summer night (72 degrees) given the longer sleeves, but the material is lightweight so it was very breathable and comfortable to move in.  I got a number of compliments and thought it was a perfect summer dress for a dinner being held outside.  Would rent it again.

I was skeptical about getting this dress on time because my prom was coming up and i did not want anything to go wrong . Anyways i emailed and called to make sure everything was going well and rent the runway deff did take care of me . They were very understanding and patient with me when i wasnt . Onto the dress though . It was AMAZING ! I could not find a convertible bra so i had to wear my normal bra and stuff the first layer of the dress in . It looked normal and flowed with how the back of the dress was suppose to be . The shoulders did not bother me  and the dress was very comfee , I will say that if you have a big chest not overly big the dress will fit tighter on you if your a petite person but it will look really well that way . Throughout the night i felt like a movie star and the dress had me feeling beautiful . I am very veryy pleased with how everything and how it turned out . Thank you rent the runway

Material is cotton that is lined. I loved the silhouette, darling. The only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars is because the lines don't match up along the seems, that would have made it perfect.

I loved this dress! It fit true to size. It was a heavy fabric that made it great for a formal winter event. I wore it with a black fur-edged shaw and gold jewelry. It did have major zipper issues. My husband nor my mother-in-law could not zip it though it was not tight. I had to forcefully turn it around on me and zip it myself using a few tricks. One other flaw was the hem. There was a crease in it that made the dress fall in a weird way. It could not be ironed out. I enjoyed my night in this beautiful dress.
my arms are not my strong point, so i love dresses with some sort of sleeve. these were a little tight.

I received so many compliments on this dress. The color is so amazing and it looked fabulous on my skin tone. I would suggest that if you wear a spanxs and plan on dancing, you may consider otherwise. The lining kept rising due to the spanx I wore underneath my dress. Other than that, I would definitely order this dress again.
Comfortable fit with a little Stretch material, not heavy at all.  Beautiful piece
I would order a size down if you are smaller in the bust just so the top doesn't gape.

Dress fit great, I got  an 8R it was a little too long for me , stepped on  the dress a few times while sitting. I was able to dance in the dress and received lots of complements. Overall it was a great dress for the event

This dress is short, fun, but classy. I felt like it really complimented my frame and the the size was right on. It was also made with a jersey/stretch type material in the inside so I was very comfortable.
The only thing that was horrible was that the zipper kept getting stuck! Other than that it was beautiful! I just had a baby 6 weeks ago and this dress was so perfect and comfy. Loved it

I ordered this to wear for some business headshots. Although it fit alright, somehow it just didn't look great on me, so I didn't feel good (or confident) wearing it. It wasn't all that flattering. I thought it would be more interesting in person, but it was just OK. I'd probably wear it to work but it's not special-event worthy.
Cute dress,but less formal that it looked in the picture, a bit of a "juniors" style
Flattering through the hips/thighs; stunning open back; vibrant color on a beautiful lace fabric. Would definitely rent again!

I really wanted to wear this dress, but sadly it was far too short. I am about 5'9, 140, and this dress barely covered my bottom - perhaps two inches. I am pretty long-waisted, so that might have been the issue. However, the color was great, the fit was great, and aside from the length it was a pretty perfect dress.
The material and style is very nice, but size down, especially if you have a smaller chest.

Start of your summer right with this cute romper by Saylor! It definitely shows some skin but is comfortable and breathable on those hot summer days. The fit does run a bit small in the waist so make sure you don't neglect the side zipper to make putting this on easier! I was able to wear a strapless bra underneath to help the top stay up and be secure throughout the day. I would recommend sizing up if you are curvier in the hips and this style would be best for A to C cups. I honestly didn't want to give it back!
