Ended up wearing a different dress that fit better...arm holes were as described, tough to fit and get the straps to stay up. Beautiful color, and had the straps been slightly smaller, would have fit fabulously.
I didn't feel comfortable wearing this for a date. The material is very comfortable, light, breathable cotton. Good for a casual BBQ-type event or a brunch with friends.

I felt like the dress was a little more low cut than I am usually comfortable with for day wear, and had to adjust the front to keep it from slipping and showing more cleavage but I should have expected that with the style.

This dress was fun, sexy and I got a ton of compliments but I have to say it was anything but comfortable. It was VERY tight- no stretch at all. It also is a little scratchy under the arms because of the sequins. It is very flattering though and is sexy without being too revealing- great for my husband's gatsby themed work party!
The fit was great, very comfy!
Perfect LBD! Accentuates the girls nicely. Wore a sticky backless & strapless bra. The asymmetrical ruffle was very slimming.  Perfect for my new mama figure. Would order again in a heartbeat!
really pretty and great pattern. A bit tight if you have a large chest.

I wore this for my bachelorette in Savannah, GA early March. Very body hugging, but it did run a little small. I received lots of compliments all night. I recently had lost some weight from being sick. I might would have ordered the S to have as back up. Overall, I would rent again.
fit perfectly for my first fancy event post baby, got lots of compliments and felt fab! the color is beautiful!

Loved this dress! It's a great dress for the winter. I wore it with opaque black tights and black suede booties. I wore it to a birthday luncheon and received many compliments. Didn't want to take it off after the event!

This is a beautiful and flattering dress, which great detailing. In person, the blue is very vibrant. The black detailing is not beading, though it looks like it in the pictures, but is more along the lines of embroidery with shimmery threads that add a little bit of glitz. The description recommended ordering a size down for backup, which I did, but I ended up wearing my typical size anyways. The smaller size fit but was on the snug side. The great thing is that the fabric of the dress has a lot of give, so if you're stuck having to order a smaller size than you wanted, you might still be okay. My only negative comment (and the reason for 4 stars instead of 5) is that it chafed on the fronts of my underarms, so if you're going to be doing a lot of dancing in the dress, be prepared for that. Otherwise, this is a great dress, and I'd definitely considering renting it again, or even buying it if it ever popped up in the sale.
Dress is beautiful but runs very large, I should have gone a couple sizes smaller, lots of nice compliments on dress color, sequins, and cut - had to share my rent the runway secret :-)

I highly recommend this jumpsuit! It is a winner! The color is beautiful and it's super comfortable. The top slide kept getting loose, although it was not really an issue for me. If you do not wish to stand out, don't wear it. I had many people asking me for the brand at the event I was at. It really stands out. I chose this one, as my job is not standard and it was a perfect match with our brand. I am usually a size 6/8 (38 EU), but 6 was out. So gambled that 8 or maybe even 10 would be a good fit. 8 was a perfect fit. Even for my larger cupsize which often is an issue for me. I think a 6 would have been too tight. 
I recommend this jumpsuit! Felt like a million bucks!

I wore this dress for my graduation-it was perfect!  The material is thick and it is a very high quality dress.  I got so many compliments.  The length was perfect for my event-very classy and elegant.  

The dress does run a bit on the larger size-I usually wear a size 6 but but my backup size 4 fit me perfectly.

The medium was actually a better fit in the top but pretty snug on my hips. Since this was a company Christmas party I opted to wear the large and have it not be so form fitting. A good pair of spanx kept everything nice and smooth and I wore an extra padded push up bra to fill up the top. The dress was a little uncomfortable under my arms where the sequins rubbed but it wasn't a big deal. I got a lot of compliments on this dress and felt like a million bucks!

I ordered the 6, but it was WAY too short so I ended up wearing the 8 so that i felt like it covered my a**. Was really comfortable and easy to wear for a night out in Vegas, but I don't think I'd be comfortable wearing it anyplace else because of how short it is.
Beautiful detailing! I received a ton of compliments. The dress is very classy but the only down side was that the opening around the arms was tight/ichy. Other than that, I highly recommend!

I wore this dress to a spring wedding. It was perfect and I got so many compliments! I am usually a size 4 but ordered the 2 and 4 and the 2 fit better, probably because I have a smaller chest (34B) and am on the shorter side (5'3). The lace neckline is gorgeous and dramatic without being too revealing, and the pockets are extra fun. I felt pretty and flirty and even fell asleep in the dress on the bus ride home - it was that comfortable.
This dress was very flattering and comfortable. I didn't have to worry about how much I ate or drank all night. Lots of compliments. Only scary part is worrying about spills!

I loved this dress! It was perfect for a wedding. The red color would flatter anyone, and the frayed lace was a nice touch. I ordered a 2 and a 4, and the size 2 felt a little tight in the chest area. This dress is comfortable and fun to dance in. I wish I could wear it to everything.

This dress was everything I imagined it to be!  Beautiful shape, the back is breathtaking, and the front is simple but complimentary.  We were at a wedding in Newport, RI in November and thankfully the dress is on the thicker side so taking pictures outside I wasn't freezing to death.  Definitely a winning dress and I wish I owned it!
Oh man this dress is GORGEOUS.  It's incredibly flattering, especially if you have strong, athletic shoulders and arms.  I loved everything about it and would absolutely rent it again!

This dress was quite easy for the every day work environment.  The blue and white accents are lovely, adding a bit of flare to the typically black sweater dress.  The material is lightweight, and I found it did lose it's shape a bit after a wear.  It became a bit boxy.  I would suggest to size down as a result.

Great dress. It's definitely form-fitting, but the material has a good stretch to it. The cut-outs add good detail and it was comfortable to wear all night long. It is a little tight around the knees, so just something to keep in mind!

Such an amazing first time RTR experience! I was initially very reluctant due to the time constraints and the risk of the dress not fitting properly so close to the day. All my fears were laid to rest when this captivating dress arrived. I was looking for something beautiful but covered up at the same time because I'm a slightly conservative dresser. My backup was the 4R because i thought it would be too tight around my derrière, but it was perfect. Form fitting but not overly so, and the material draped beautifully on the bottom without dragging. I wore 4" heels and a backless pushup and it made it all work.

I LOVED this elegant dress. The fabric felt thick and luxe, it was beautifully made and the cut of the hem made me feel like a movie star. I chose the 8R because the 6R wasn't available. I had to fashion tape it to my bust, and it was a little bigger than was ideal, but it still worked for me (I'm pretty tall). I wore it with simple black heels and my mother's antique earrings, and it looked excellent. Tons of compliments that night! A very flattering and special dress - highly recommend!

Loved the material, stretchy! I really stood out in this black tie wedding (most guests wore black). The color complimented my skin color . The ruffles made me look like I had curves. I am busty on top, but narrow hips .. pretty straight/athletic build. Only problem is that I had to keep pulling it up, otherwise I would have gave it 5 stars. Got lots of compliments!

I felt so amazing in this dress. I did have to go a size up to fit my waist, which left some room in the chest with no bra (which is the only way I can wear these dresses). I knew this would be an issue and had fashion tape ready. With some taping and contouring, I was feeling HOT. The dress was super comfortable, but definitely revealing. All eyes will be on you, so be ready to gain everyone's attention. My experience with RTR was great as always. I will, of course, be back.

Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner. I wasn't quite sure about the dress when I first tried it on, felt a little big and my strapless bra showed a bit through the top of the lace, but then I put the 4 on and it felt much better and couldn't see my bra. I absolutely LOVED the pockets! I received tons of compliments and felt very sophisticated in this LBD. Loved the lace up top, gave the dress a bit of sexiness without being too over the top.

Really did not want to return this dress. Was nervous about renting in, as I do not typically rent this style dress but it could not have been more flattering! My fiance told me it was the best dress I've ever worn. Dress was very comfortable and perfect for a wedding. Received a ton of compliments.

I love RVN! This is my second RVN rental and they are quickly becoming my go-to designer.  Perfect for curvy, hourglass ladies.  It hugs and sucks everything in in all the right places.  As with the last RVN rental, the M and L fit pretty much the same.  But because I am so short, the M fit better length wise because the L would have been too big.  Fabric is thick and stretchy but comfortable and not hot.  Worn on a night out to a club in Miami for a bachelorette party weekend.  I cannot tell you how much guys had to grab their jaws off the floor.  Wear with caution ladies, hide your boyfriends!

I rented this dress with the hopes of wearing it to work but it was a little too scandalous for the office... The mesh areas are not subtle so it makes for a better going-out dress or could potentially be worn with a blazer.
A bit small on top.

Knit dresses can sometimes feel and look cheap, but not this one. The design create a terrific hourglass shape and the length is a nice break from all the very short dresses I seem to keep renting. I would say the dress runs about a half size large - I don't think I would have liked a medium instead, but there is ample breathing room. If you are a small size 8 ordinarily, I would recommend the medium. 

The fabric can be a touch unforgiving, so if you are someone who cares about an errant bulge here and there, you'll want your shapewear, but the silhouette is quite flattering.

Great fit through the chest and waist.  The zipper was a little old so getting it off at the end of the evening actually required assistance - the zippers was slightly rusted at once point probably due to dry cleaning.  The material lays flat and is thick but does not oveaheat you in any way. I'm 5'3 and it was right at my mid-thigh.

this dress fits very true to size.  I have a fairly small waist and narrow shoulders and it was perfect.  Lots of compliments on the style and the lovely color.  The fabric has a nice weight and holds shape well.  The cut-out area is not risqué at all...Definitely recommend for an elegant party or wedding.
This dress was very comfortable,  true to size.  I was able to wear a strapless bra and could conceal it.
Dress is very form fitting and flatter for flatter shapes. Great color. A nice combination of wedding appropriate and sexy.

It was a beautiful, delicate dress. I loved it & really wanted to wear it; however, the seam of the cups cut across my chest & looked too small. I am a 36D so I would say if I was a small C or lower it would've been great.
Vintage classy

This dress was amazing! I received multiple compliments throughout the night. The detailed neckline is gorgeous and very appropriate for a black tie or formal get together. The slit is playful and shows enough leg; I would be aware how you sit though, as the entire leg does become exposed. The dress was slightly long, but I had to wear flats (was on crutches), so I imagine that a 2 - 3 in. heel would have made the dress an appropriate height if renting a regular. The dress is a bit snug around the mid section, but the floral gold design down the sides hides a "pouch" or bloated stomach quite well. I paired the dress with very simple gold drop earrings, a bright red lip stain and oxblood colored nails to complete the look.
This dress was a winner.  Complements galore.  Very nice movement with the skirt.  Love the high/low thing.  Would rent again but...what's the point of renting the same thing twice?  :)

All reviews prior to this are right on.  I wanted a dress to wear to a NYE wedding to be something different than I'd ever worn before.  The weight (not too heavy), the details (high chest and open back) and sequins made me feel glamorous- however I pondered if I looked like I was going to prom-  A strapless bra from target and a high cut thong were perfect... A bit short, I like my heels to be high, but 3 inch heels were fine and ultimately more comfortable. If you want something different- this dress is for you:)

First, the dress is lovely. The color is gorgeous, the fabric is rich, the cut is classic.( It was big on me, but I'm 5'2" and 100 pounds, so most things are!) The length was perfect, the pockets were fun and the quality is fine. Here's the "missing star"... So, I wore this at a black tie event on Halloween weekend... and EVERYONE that commented on my dress mentioned that I looked "just like a Disney princess!" ugh. Honesty, that WAS the first thought I had when I put it on, but I didn't like my backup dress, so I had to wear this one. With the off-the-shoulder sleeve caps, fitted waist and full skirt, it is _very_ princess-y. Which might work for some people. But not for a 42 year old woman at a very fancy business event! Oh well.... 

On a side note, the dress was HORRIBLY wrinkled when it arrived. So bad that I started a chat with a stylist to see what to do. After nearly an hour of back and forth, they offered to reimburse me to have it professionally dry cleaned at the hotel. The hotel dry cleaner wasn't able to get it turned around quickly enough, so they graciously brought me a steamer from the hotel boutique! (Five stars for the hotel!!) It took me 30 minutes to get all the wrinkles out, which was stressful while trying to get ready in time. I think the new "garment bag" shipping (rather than the garment boxes RTR used to ship in) don't work for dresses like this one. It was just crushed. :(

I rented this for the 3 for the price of 1 deal over Thanksgiving and ended up wearing it just out for drinks with friends. It's a nice thick, stretchy but definitely casual material so its great for New England Fall/Winters. The neckline was awkward at times but I did enjoy the visual interest it brought to an otherwise ho-hum dress
If you're unsure on sizing definitely size down as I could have used a bit more waist definition, or maybe the size 8 was really stretched out? A great conservative, not too dressy or fancy dress but the bottom flare/volume was a lot of fun to spin around in :)

The dress fits really well. I've gotten larger through my mid-section recently (studying :-)), and was a bit afraid that it would hug too tightly and show. However, I was pleasantly surprised. There is a little stretch in the material that gives you some wiggle room. I'm 5'9, so I got the tall which also worked well. My heels were about three inches. Also, I'm a pretty busty girl, but the dress hid and showed just enough to be sexy without overdoing it. Great service!!

I wore this dress for New Years Eve because I wanted to go all out with something sparkly, and I got what I wanted and more. The material was very comfortable and somehow the sequins weren't heavy and I didn't feel weighed down. The 8 fit, but since I don't exactly have a toned middle it created some unseemly um, rolls around my midsection. The 10 was a tiny bit looser but only in the top-- I have a short torso so If this was my dress I would have taken the shoulders up by a smidge, but it wasn't noticeable nor was it uncomfortable. The neckline was so low, but it was somehow so, so flattering. I felt incredible! Thanks for making my night, RTR!

I wore this dress to a Charity Event/Valentine's Party. It was so classy and sexy. I felt amazing!! I normally wear a 0 or 2 in dresses, the 0 wasn't available so I ordered the 2 and it fit perfect. The 2 wasn't snug and I had some extra wiggle room, but that was good because that means I could indulge in the food and beverage a bit more :)

This was a great dress, but the size I really wanted a 4 (had been damaged the night before the part).  RTR was helpful and said I could get any other dress, but I was set on that dress and just wore it in a 6.  It was a bit big (especially in the chest area), but it still worked out stupendously.  Every girl complemented me and said they wish they owned the dress.  I'm thinking of buying it, only in the size 4!

We used this as our bridesmaids dresses and they were super comfortable and so much fun to wear.  We could not find shoes that matched so we ended up glittering our own, you may chose to get a longer dress in order to hide shoes.  Beautiful back but you cannot wear a regular bra with it, you either need tape or a backless adhesive bra.

I ordered both the 10 and the 12 of this dress; both sizes fit but I chose the 12 simply for comfort. Overall it fit very nicely and I felt beautiful. If you have a smaller chest, take caution when ordering this dress because the V dips very low. I used two small safety pins to prevent the fabric from gapping and it was perfectly fine. Also the zipper on this dress was quite difficult, but with someone to help me it worked out.

This dress is much brighter than it appears in the photo and the silver threading was a nice touch. The waist and below fit well, however as others have mentioned the bust is extremely tight. I was able to zip it over a bra with zero padding, but it was so tight it almost felt like a sports bra. I also felt like the sweetheart neckline should have come up a half inch higher or so because it wasn't quite enough fabric.

BCBG seems to design dresses for with women with model bodies and no curves, and this dress was no exception. Overall it was very pretty but I wouldn't rent it again.
I liked these culottes but the overall shape of them is overwhelming on a shorter girl.

The dress fit perfectly. The material was heavier than I expected. The zipper was hard as I read about in many prior reviews but it was not impossible. The cut in the front was a deep V. Where I was going to a wedding I wanted to make it more appropriate. I tried using double sided fashion tape. The inside material of the dress is a bit silky and the tape would not stick. Instead I used a pin. Overall I loved the dress, it was easy to dance in and received many compliments.

This is a great dress- good weight to the fabric, nice bright pigment, and a metal zipper (the plastic ones are the worst). I didn't feel as covered up top as I expected to, especially while sitting down; it forces you to sit very tall if you are large busted to not show off too much cleavage. Wearing a strapless bra made it worse; I ended up taking it off between the wedding ceremony and the reception! Peplum was great coverage in the midsection, and the skirt was the perfect combination between flowy and fitted. At 5'6", I wore 4 inch heels with the long length and it was perfect! Definitely order the long length if you are 5'4-5" and plan on wearing heels- it looked too weird with the regular length.
fit perfectly....draped beautifully....
This dress made me feel like a million bucks! It hung up top where I need the extra support for my large chest and made me look I have hips! Overall, I loved the shape and style of the dress.
Cute dress, but it looks different on the site than in person. for me, it was too conservative for what i was going for.
My first experience with Rent the Runway and I'm pleased. Fit true to size ,Wore this dress to "White party" and it was perfect!
I wore 4 inch heels and honestly no one ever saw them! :)
fit true to size, comfortable, short and sassy but elegant - I recommend a strapless bra or black bra - not extremely form fitting but flattering
Provided coverage for a fuller figure yet still very flattering.

I rented this for 1st Communion mass and it was spectacular!  Beautiful print and the sequins were an added plus.  The pockets were an added bonus.  Fabric was just the right weight to hide any bumps, so NO spanx were needed!!  Will definitely rent this one again.

I pretty much created an event to which I could wear this once I saw it on RTR. I wore it to a black tie wine tasting/dinner and I could not have been happier with this dress. I am definitely pear shaped -- my thighs are totally out of proportion with the rest of my body -- so I was a bit worried about how the skirt would look. It was definitely tightest right at the saddle bags, but the slit hit right about the same area so the 6 still worked. The only thing that baffles me is the length. All the previous reviewers (even girls around my height) said they had to wear like 5 inch heels with it in order to get it off the ground, so all I had with me when getting ready were 4 inch wedges. Turns out it barely grazed the ground when I was barefoot. Whoops. I think it may have been because my natural waist sits quite high? Wore the wedges and rocked it anyway. Paired it with the matching top (size small), Kendra Scott abalone earrings, French Connection bag, and aforementioned target wedges.
Love the fit!  It was tight in the chest, but I really like that. It was flirty without being too showy. My first RTR dress!

I really liked this dress. Patterns and bright colors are not typically my thing, so I felt a bit like a neon sign at first (totally my issue - not the dress!), but once people started telling me how much they loved it, I relaxed. I DID use tape to secure the dress to have a higher neckline than it would have been otherwise, and I am not sure how the model in the picture could have that neckline without tape - the dress would have hung down too low for my liking.

I only received the size 8 because of another order mishap before mine, but it fit great as I was looking for something not super tight. I am just entering my second trimester and not showing but also not wanting a confining dress.

Though I did not love the "scuba suit" materialat first it proved to be flattering and comfortable for an early fall outdoor event. The open back added extra ventilation. The dress was perfect for a wedding elegant and sexy without being over the top
Cute zipper on the back!

Typically a size 4, I ordered true to size. Overall the dress was too big about an inch in the waist, an inch and a half in each strap, and an inch or two on length. While this did not prevent me from wearing the dress, it required perfect posture to keep the bust from opening.

Pro:
- Beautiful light blue, lilac color
- perfect for a day time wedding

Con:
- Tight across the hips ( I have a larger butt/ hips. If you are a girl with a small waist and big butt ( you always get the "jeans" gap, this will probably be tight across your hips and butt)
- no slit up the back which can be inhibiting to movement.

It was fitted around the bust and arms, but if I had gone up a size it wouldn't have looked the same. Lucky for me, I have a smaller bust, but the tightness made the dress uncomfortable in the armpit area. It was just a tad itchy, and I didn't have any tape to combat the problem. Still an elegant dress that made the night great!

It was very tight and runs small.  I was not able to wear any undergarments except a strapless bra to avoid lines.  I am almost 5'7 with long legs so I ordered the long but it was too long. I shortened with double sided tape.  It was a little out of my comfort zone since it was SOOO fitted but I got lots of compliments and ultimately it was one of my faves.  Really special.

I wore this dress to an audition and received tons of compliments.  The shade of blue is definitely striking.

The arms do run a little small.  It was kind of uncomfortable and I should have sized up to the 6 just to fit my (I think average-sized) arms.
had to wear tall heels because the pants were long

I don't typically wear jumpsuits but I am glad I wore this one! I wore it as an alternative to the LBD and really stuck out in the group. This was also my second choice outfit, my first was damaged by the renter before me so customer service was amazing and helped me get a new outfit. It does run large, I rented the small and medium but probably could have gone for the XS with the extra room I had in the small. It definitely depends on how tight you want it to hug your body.

The reviews are true, this dress runs large, but it was a fantastic dress! I rented for my friend's NYE wedding and it was perfect. The sparkles gave it that NYE flair but the length let it be a little less formal. I usually wear a size 10/12 so after reading the reviews are ordered the 10 and 8, the 8 fit perfectly. The chest runs into a pretty deep V, while I was able to wear a normal black bra, I would be ready to have some cleavage showing. I got tons of compliments all night long on this from wedding guests, hotel staff, and other guests that I passed in the halls, so it was definitely a keeper! This dress has great flow on the dance floor when you spin it gives you a very fun and flirty feel. The best part though? The POCKETS, this was great because I usually put my phone down and get no photos, the pockets let me carry it around hassle free and I was able to get some great candids. I would 100% rent this again.

Loved this dress, I felt so great wearing it. It was flattering yet classy - perfect for a black tie wedding. I received several compliments on the color. The length was perfect with 3ish inch heels. I wore it with a convertible bra with crossed straps, but you could also use a strapless.

I wore this to a wedding just before Christmas. Had to add a pashmina to cover up in the church, but the dress was great for the reception, dancing, and going out after!
They didn't have a back up size available for me, but the 10 fit great! I have a large bust (34 DD) and the dress was a little lower cut than I would have wished, but it still looked great. I liked pairing it with a larger necklace (this was from a vintage consignment shop), and would recommend planning to do so (because it is low cut). Best part, the dress has pockets too!

It's a deep navy, but I paired it with black tights anyway. The pictures make it look lighter than it does in person (and this flash is obviously a little over-enthusiastic washing out skin as well) due to the sheen-ness of the material. The dress is well structured, and the flaring has such good structure at the hem that it will keep it's shape all night!

I love this dress. I wore it to a symphony. Perfect for the holidays. The reason I say this dress runs a bit large is because I know I have gained some weight and I fit into the 2 perfectly. There are so many pro's to this dress. It's delicate and elegant. It really is good for bigger bust sizes even without a bra. For someone like me with no hips it gave me a good balance. The only con's about the dress is its itchy if you sit too long, and the lining of the asymmetrical skirt is plastic and kind of bends when shipped, but it steams out so its ok. I definitely recommend this dress for the holidays.
This was hard to make work for me; sleeves were great, but V cut very low and wide.  Ended up returning without wearing

I wore this on a vacation in Mexico. The romper fabric feels very nice, and the fit if flowy and comfy. Not the most exciting piece of clothing, but stylish enough and the deep V gives it a little something.
Great and versatile style for the office.
Didn't wear. It looked matronly, and made me look heavier. And I am TINY.

This dress fits like a glove.  I am small and slender and I worried that it would be too big in the chest but it has a little stretch and would fit many types of bodies.  The lace overlay is beautiful and the blue is soft and powdery pastel.  Very feminine cut and color.
This dress runs small and is pretty tight in the hips. I ended up going with the bigger backup size but overall enjoyed it. Great color, comfortable, and conservative.

I rented this dress to spruce up my otherwise casual work wardrobe. I got many compliments but found that the material felt a bit heavy and restrictive, and the sleeves were slightly itchy (FYI in case you're sensitive to that).

This dress was PERFECT for my bachelorette party! It was sexy and attention grabbing but still left something to the imagination. Definitely listen to the other reviewers and order a size up! I usually wear a size 6, but the size 8 fit perfectly (I ordered a 10 for backup, but the back was too loose).

I LOVE this dress and I am so sad to say goodbye. This dress was perfect for a cocktail attire wedding. It fit very nicely and even the bride gave me lots of compliments :) I felt very sexy and every picture came out great.

I wore this to a charity ball and was so pleased with the entire Rent the Runway experience! The dress arrived on time, fit great, and looked amazing! In a group of most black and white dresses, the red definitely made me stand out. Thanks to so many detailed reviews, I ended up with the perfect size and did not even consider the back-up size option I had requested. I am 5'9" and the dress just skimmed the floor with low heels. This dress is amazingly comfortable and looks elegant without a fuss.

I generally wear a 4 in pants/skirts or a 6 in dresses. I wore the Medium of this dress. It was comfortable and fit well throughout. The dress had enough cling and structure that it provided sufficient support in the bust. All of the other reviews were from much more petite women, so I was pleased to find that the dress was also long enough on me despite my height.

This dress is amazing! I was a bit unsure how I felt about it before it arrived, thinking it might be too plain, but I was wrong. It is gorgeous on and the color is so pretty. I am about 5'9 and it hit just below the knee (something to be aware of if you are on the shorter side). The material is very thick keeps you sucked in! I would say it runs true to size, but it is very form fitting.

I rented this dress for an out of town wedding at a country club. I ordered my typical size 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the 4. The 2 fit everywhere, but once the zipper got to the rib cage, it wouldn't zip all the way up. The 4 fit everywhere but in the chest (I have NO boobs). It was a little gappy, but I am sure I was the only one that really noticed.  Like other "reviewers" I received compliments all night from complete strangers! Since this dress is a little "a-line" I opted for more of a "vintage" look. I paired it with a barrette and a side part, big studs and a simple crystal necklace. I think less is more with this dress. Let the dress do that talking! Sad to return it, but looking forward to my next RTR experience!!
The cut out were high enough to wear a controlled underwear.  However the placement of the sequins on the edges scratched  my skin making it a little uncomfortable.

Waist was a little tight and the dress was about two inches too long (I'm also very short) but this did not take away from the dress. It's absolutely beautiful, the material is thick and of good quality. Form fitting in all the right places. 
Would definitely recommend this dress to others. Wish I could have kept it!

This dress was great for a fall wedding! The tulip shape made it a great dress for a long night, it never felt tight around the middle. I also love anything that has pockets so this dress was amazing. I would absolutely rent again in a heartbeat, nothing but compliments all night. Slightly tight around the arms, but I had worn a smaller size for the chest and waist, so it wasn't surprising - and ultimately was not uncomfortable. Highly recommend!

This is the second Saloni dress that I've rented and the designer really is amazing imo. The fit is fantastic! Very flattering. Plenty of room in the chest and hugs the curves with beautifully soft fabrics (i.e. not stretchy spandexy stuff).
Dress was very comfortable, fit well, received many compliments.

I am small... shoulders, bust, arms, with lanky proportions. The 2R fit like a glove. I wore a bra, but I did not need to- The bra did poke a bit through the cutout, but it was a matter of a simple slight adjustment every so often. 

I paired it with yellow canvas, ankle-strap kitten heels and a burlap clutch, with minimal accessories (just a gold watch) the jump-suit, itself, was the statement piece. The culotte fell proportionally mid-calf. 

 I always love the stuff from RTR, but I honestly want to buy this piece and wear it all the time. You will not be disappointed.

Cute and summery Equipment silk blouse. I found that it fit me a little bigger than the other Equipment shirts I've ordered in size S. The white is pretty sheer, so you need to wear something under it for work. The fabric wrinkles if you so much as look at it funny, but that's to be expected. I received lots of compliments, but probably won't rent again due to sheerness/size.
Definitely glad I read the comments and got my regular size and a smaller size. Ended up using the smaller size, which was a pleasant surprise. Very comfortable. Easy elegance.
Wore this dress to a networking event and an interview.  Worked perfect for both.  Very flattering without being too tight.

I didnt pick this dress. The dress I pciked was ruined by the person who had it before me. So RTR stylist picked this and sent it to me. I tried it on and it wasnt really my style and very tight in the chest. Such is life with size d boobs !. I wore another dress to the church, but when my mom saw this she insisted I wear to the reception. Warning this is VERY LONG. I had 3 1/2 inch heel and am 5'4 and it still drug on the gound. Color is great. very flowy hides belly and hips. if you have a larger chest consider sizing up.

This dress fit very well. It was form fitting, but not too tight by any means. The material was high quality and not thin. It is the perfect dress to wear to a fall wedding and the dress I received appeared to be brand new. I would recommend renting this dress, it's amazing.

I rented this dress for a formal wedding and it was perfect. I ordered a 0 and 2. Being semi flat chested I was worried the dress would be to heavy and pull down. The 2 fit perfectly. Loved wearing the dress. It was absolutely stunning.

wore this to a Las Vegas wedding vow renewal. The dress is gorgeous, i got a ton of compliments. The only downside is the armpits + sequins situation got really uncomfortable after a few hours. There was chafing. But also, cleavage!
Need a safety pin for the bust.
Fantastic dress, just need to order a size 10 as the size 6 was just too small.
Big on the top, but still didn't need to wear a bra. I have a shorter torso so the shoulders kept slipping off. Overall pretty dress.

Such a pretty and classy dress.  It is very true to size and wasn't too big or too tight.  I would size up for the back up size, because the fabric does not have stretch.  It is also a little fitted in the bust, so I would keep that in mind as well, and size up for this reason.  The dress fits nice and loose in the hips.  A standard bra is perfect with this dress
This dress does run small - I typically wear a two or a four but after reading past reviews, I ordered a six and glad that I did.!
Fit was great. Material is thin so it stretches a little. I will definitely rent again.

I always wear black to weddings but I wanted to try something different. This was dark enough to hide body flaws but looked great and really stood out in a good way. I was able to wear a regular bra with it which I love because I have a larger top area. I would definitely recommend this!!!!
The dress was great, again, the length is a little long, because I am short. But it fit well in all the right places. It was form fitting and flattering. The cutout was unique, but still classy.
This dress is gorgeous! I loved it so much, but I ended up wearing my other option, because this dress was a little too fancy for my birthday dinner. I will rent it again!

I ordered a S and M fully expecting to wear the M since I'm about a size 8 (sometimes 6 in dresses). The M fit well but was  a bit loose and my husband loved the more snug S much more! The dress was very comfortable and I received SO many compliments the entire night. I felt like a shiny disco ball!

Don't mind my grumpy face in the pics, haha! I really did like the dress! But, I'll get the "bummers" out there first, in case any of these are deal-breakers for you! There was definitely extra room in the waist and bust, even though I am on the "heavier" end of my typical weight. I fear that it made me look a little flat-chested. My husband commented that he didn't like the pink in the dress- that it just looked like a stain from a distance, and I agree. Lastly, the black piping is a real magnet for deoderant stains. The dress arrived with some residual marks, but I just spot cleaned it and wore. No harm, no foul. Now, for the good stuff. This dress is quite easy to wear. Even though it's a slight racer-back, there are little clips in the dress to hold your bra straps in place. I wore it to a work dinner for the hubby and then to work with a cardi the next day. The print seemed more vibrant to me in person. See photos. Thanks for another good rental, RTR!

the white part of the dress isn't nearly as white anymore, which understandably happens over time, but the dress is still nice. the fit is great and even at 5'3", the hem hit above my knees. the design on the black portion actually made it a bit more slimming. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and found the 4 to be a great fit. it was fitted, but not to tight to wear for a sit down meal. overall, nice fun dress. only reason i took off a star was because the white was just too worn looking. i wore it with pasties and it looked much better than if i wore a regular bra. if you're not sure about your size i wld go up a size

I loved the fit of this jacket.  It was  perfect boxy cool cut and it held it shape great, wore effortlessly just like the model.

The color was a little brighter than I thought it would be and the print was a little hard to look at if you stared too long (like when trying to match it).  The first wear I wore it with a black pencil skirt and turtle neck and felt like a modern take on a pink lady.

The fit was perfect. There's a little stretch to the fabric which made it both flattering and comfortable. I'm 5'4" and wore about 3" heels and it dragged a little on the ground, but in a pretty way. RTR sent me dress tape which helped hold the dress up because the fabric was a little heavy.

I'm on the taller side (almost 5'9"), so the waist hit too high and the pants gave me a slight wedgie.  Bummer, because I really liked the look and every other aspect of the fit!  Taller ladies, unless you have a short torso, beware the sizing....

I rented this as a bridesmaid dress for my sister's wedding.  Having had a baby 7 months ago I was nervous about what size to get so I ordered a 4 and a 6.  I wore the 4 with no problem and honestly could have gone with the 2R because the dress has so much stretch to it.  All of the bridesmaids had different body types and yet we all looked great! Guests could not believe we had rented these dresses! The only thing I didn't love was the way the dress gathers in the midsection it made us look like we had more of a belly Than we did in photos.  However, in person it was much better and the way it hugged every other curve was very flattering.    I wish I could have kept this dress!

I wore this to a black tie wedding. Loved loved but ran small. I normally wear a 4 and I ordered a 6 and an 8. I could have worn the 8 but since I'm 5'9 I think the 8 hit in a more flattering spot at the cut out. I wore low shoes and the R was perfect. If I wore higher heels, I would have gotten the L. I would definitely recommend to someone who wants a unique black tie wedding dress.
Fit perfectly, and great length for a wedding.
Was 4 months pregnant and this dress didn't show it all.  Was easy to wear, with a regular bra and nice and warm for a winter wedding.

This dress was perfect for the afternoon-into-evening wedding of my new brother and sister-in-law this past June. Since the back is out I brought a shawl for the church ceremony. But overall it was comfortable, flattering and festive!

This was my first experience with Rent the Runway and I can't wait to try it again!  Easy and fun!!!   The dress was beautiful!  If you are petite, the "cut out" seems larger (shows more skin) and sits lower than I expected!  Other than that, the dress fit true to size and excellent quality!

My daughter wore this for her sister's pre-wedding rehearsal reception, outdoors in wine country in California in the evening. It was really beautiful on her, though she's 17 and was a little uncomfortable with how low the sides went (underarm), but never had any problems with it.  Got lots of compliments!

This dress was another Rent the Runway win. Many compliments received, and I felt so comfortable and cute in this dress. It was a great maxi, different from any that I own myself, which is why I rent from Rent the Runway in the first place. The colors were bright and vibrant, and there were some blues and greys that you can't even see online in the dress. It was definitely me.

The fit was pretty perfect. A nice empire waist and flowing skirt that helped keep me cool. I was going out with friends for a nice dinner, and it was the perfect dress. The only problem was, as others mention, it is very long. I am not a short girl, and I wore a wedge sandal and it was still grazing the ground. Otherwise, perfect.

I'm 5'8 and got a long, with a 2" heel it was just long enough. I also found the hip area slightly clingy. It hung nicely except for the lower stomach/hip area so Spanx were needed! Other reviews had said the fabric was thick and didn't cling anywhere, unfortunately for me I thought it was a little revealing in the area but the next size up (4) was too large in the back and top.

The dress is incredibly tight, so be careful to go a size up or wear seamless underwear.  Otherwise, the dress is very comfortable and the slit is sexy without being so high that it risks scandalous flashing.
May order it again for another event
Fit tight on the bottom, loose on the top, but ended up working out really well
I wore this top to work with navy culottes and red heels.  Compliments all day and I felt great wearing it.  I was tempted to keep it at such a great price point!
would rent this again in a heart beat.  got so many compliments.
Beautiful piece paired with heels and leg shimmer. Will rent again, and probably end up buying.
Could be dressed up or down. Nice material.

The material on the dress was pretty stretchy so although I am normally a true 4 the size 2 fit like a glove. (Would order a size down) It also has a built in bra which was great! If you are over 5'8" I would definitely recommend getting the long - mine was the perfect length worn with 3 inch heels.

Rented for a wedding bc I love Elizabeth and James and I was so happy with this dress. Got endless compliments and I felt comfortable all night long. And the red is gorgeous. I had people asking about "the girl in the red dress".
We had our 2 year old with us so it's even easy to maneuver around running after a toddler.  I normally wear a 4 but went with the 6r in this one. The 4 fit but was very snug.
Tight dress; I'm usually a 2, but I'm glad I ordered the size up.

I wore this dress for a Valentine's Day date with my husband. Although I was probably overdressed for the evening, I felt wonderful. It was a bit snug in the chest area and I'm a B, but otherwise it was very comfortable. It's understated but glamorous.

The dress fit my figure perfectly and I got so many compliments on it too! The material is a bit heavier and a little shiny (almost taffeta like) but still classy and not cheap looking. I would highly recommend this dress to any of my friends!

I gave it 3 stars because of the fit. It was snug along the midsection, but extremely baggy in the back and chest. I think this dress is designed for someone who is more busty than average for their size, as there is still a fair amount of excess fabric even with a push-up bra, and I am only barely a pear shape by a few inches, so I don't have a dramatic proportion difference between my hips and bust. Sitting makes the bagginess even worse. However, despite the strange bagginess, it was still strangely tight on the shoulders when driving, typing, reaching, etc. The back panel is not nearly as sheer as I thought it would be based on the pictures. It looks like it was a mistake instead of intentional. However, it did make my body look amazing when standing, and it is a cute dress. I love how the skirt fits (right above knee for me) and how flowy it is. I didn't feel hot or constricted all day even though the midsection was tight. Overall, it was flattering, but it had strange fit details.

LOVED this dress! I'm 5'4" and read several reviews about the length being a tad short so I decided on a 0 Regular dress, but they were out of stock until July, so I figured I could get the 0 Petite and just find a pair of cool flats. It fit perfectly, length and all. I definitely couldn't have worn heels, though for our photo session, heels would have been a pain anyway. The dress is so sparkly and my photographers couldn't get enough of it. We were going for an "Old Hollywood Glamour" type of session and this dress definitely fit the bill. I wish I would have worn spanx or something though, because it does cling to your body and shows any excess weight. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone wanting to make a show stopping appearance! :)
Amazing fit! Brand new, still has the tag on it! I love theory, makes you feel like a million dollars without looking like your trying. I rented to wear for Wedding Venue appointments.

So I am normally between a 0 and 2, but got this dress in a 2R and 4R. The 2 was not available, so I tried on the 4 and to be honest I could have gotten away with it. The only problem is that for someone my height, even the regular length is kind of long. But that's nothing high heels and some fashion tape can't fix.  I will say that I probably could have easily worn a 2 as well considering how stretchy the fabric is. NOTE that the back is open and dips low and has a stretchy string that zig zags across your back and gives it a modern look (the lowest point of the open back almost went to my panty line but i have a short mid-section). So you cannot wear a bra with this dress (only sticky bra, petals, or nothing). It was very elegant and the back was a sexy little touch so not the most conservative style dress with that feature, but def chic. OVERALL LOVED IT! RENT IT!
Beautiful vest , heavy fabric , quality looks expensive. It runs a bit big, I got many compliment...I Love IT  !
Beautiful dress, true to size, perfect length with 3" heels. Absolutely no complaints.  Felt so beautiful!

I rented this dress for our engagement session in Shenandoah National Park.  I used my Unlimited plan, so I was limited on sizes.  Ideally I wanted a 4L, but the only sizes available were: 4R, 6R, and 2L.  I took a gamble and picked the 2L - and it was perfection!  A larger size would have been too big on my chest.  The material is stretchy and so comfortable, and the flare at the bottom is gorgeous.  I did not wear a bra - I would have worn a nubra if I'd had more time to get ready (it was 38 degrees out, and we were moving fast).  Also, I wore tights under it, and I was really disappointed that they were visible through the low-cut back of the dress.  Everyone thought it was part of the dress, but I was disappointed when I saw the pictures.  Plan better than I did!  And rent this dress!
I usually wear a 2, but it was a little tight in the waist and hard to zip up so I went with the 4.  Def glad I got two sizes!
Definitely runs to the small side in the waist, but the length is great for tall people!

Beautiful dress! Fitted from the top to waist. Perfect length for me, as I was wearing a 3.5 inch heel. I would say it stayed in place well the whole evening, aside from having to adjust it up a little after lots of movement, but that's the case with most strapless dresses. Highly recommend it for those looking for a bright color to wear.

I rented this dress for my bridal shower. It has a very structured bodess and it's quite short. However I just wore a little slip with the dress and felt fine. The pattern of the lace and the fit is truly unique and I would highly reccomend this dress to anyone. It does run a bit small so I would size up.
Fit perfectly, and I have trouble with jumpsuits because I have a longer torso and I'm 5'8". I wish I could own this jumpsuit, I loved wearing it!!
Loved this dress. I was concerned that it was going to be too hot because of the material. However, it was perfect for work where I am always cold! It was the best of both worlds.

This was my second time wearing this dress. I wore it to a holiday party last year and loved it so much, I re-rented it for a friend's wedding. It's comfortable, fits great, and I love the cutout detail. The fabric is just the right amount of stretch, and feels very high quality.
The fit was great and true to size. The only con is the open back can make it hard to move around. I would suggest using fashion tape.

Wore this for a formal NYE event held at Crystal Bridges Museum.  Great dress! So comfortable...danced all night long and got so many compliments.  I am 5'6 and wore flats so I can dance...because of the flats there was a bit of a "train" on the dress.  I wore one of those sticky backless underwire bras that worked with the dress.  Ladies if you are on the smaller cup side, you may not need to wear a bra at all as the dress does really support the chest.
The neckline is very flattering.  The fabric is very thick.

The dress fit perfectly and is made of very comfortable and moveable material. The gold trim is the perfect accent. I had to pair it with black tights and a sweater and it was still elegant. I want to keep it!

Based on previous reviews I ordered my typical size (2R). It fit pretty well all around, however the top was a little loose and I constantly was pulling it up all night. Other reviews had said the top was tight, and I do not have a small chest. I wore a strapless bra which added extra padding, and it was still loose. It felt like it got looser as the night went on as well. I potentially just needed a 0R, but that was surprising given reviews and recommendation to size up vs. down. Pretty dress, and I received many compliments, but it was distracting all night.

I had to return the dress, due to it being the color of the wedding party, so I did not get to wear it.  I did put it on though and all the detail from the zipper pull to the fun hem line and the fabulous material gives this dress an A+ in my book.  I will re-rent for another occasion.  I will however rent the 2  the 0 I did get zipped but too snug around the waist for comfort.

It was a bit snug on my arms, and the back was just low enough that my bra kept popping out. I did get lots of compliments, and liked that it was fun. It was a bit shorter than what I normally wear, but other than that a very fun dress!

I wore this dress for a wedding and it was absolutely perfect.  Besides the fact that it looks great, it was incredibly comfortable.  I'm always concerned about bust-fit, but this was great.  If I stretched in certain ways, I did feel that it got a bit tight in the bust area, but otherwise it fit fantastically.
Got this dress after my original dress didn't fit for a black tie event, and it was amazing. Its comfortable, has pockets, and I received nothing but compliments about it.

I ordered the 4L and the 6L. I knew they would both be a little long, but I like the way the dress pools on the ground. I wore flats. I went with the size 6 because the 4 was a little tight. This was a work function and I didn't think the tighter dress looked appropriate.
Perfect for 5'7 or taller.
I rented this for our Thanksgiving dinner. It was pretty large but I expected it to be oversized. I loved, I felt so cozy & received tons of compliments! Definitely wanted to buy :)

I thought I would wear this one, but my 16 year-old stylist thought the fabric was too heavy for spring.  That being said, I've rented and worn it before.  I think the fit is forgiving for someone with my bodytype and decidedly glam. The fabric IS heavy though. Forget about wearing a bra, the back is just too low, but if you're not super- busty you should be able to go braless.  It was a close second with another dress.  I rented both the black and the navy blue and the latter is a nice alternative. The petite sizes weren't available and the 8R just skimmed the ground in back with a 3 inch heel.

The dress was awesome. It ran a bit large, as I am a pretty true size 6 and it was a little bit roomy. Such a great party dress. I looked great but was comfortable enough to be able to dance. Another guest at the wedding rented the same dress and we were #twinning all night long.

I did not end up wearing this dress because my husband and girlfriend advised my other option was better suited for the wedding we were attending. It was an indoor wedding at the Ritz Hotel in a ballroom. This dress would have been more appropriate for a garden wedding. 

The fit was great though and I hope to have a garden wedding to attend in the future so I can rent again.

I love the color (it's royal blue, not navy) and the material is stretchy and has a nice weight to it so that you don't need much for shapewear. However, I am a C cup and it was really revealing.  Too much for a wedding. Fashion tape worked great and held well to the fabric.  I taped the shoulder straps too so that they wouldn't slip.  I am 5'8 and wore a 3 inch heel. The 4L was the perfect length, but if I had worn a 2 inch heel it would have been dragging.

- The dress was perfect for the steamy August weather. It was heavy enough so that I didn't need a slip, but not so heavy that I was hot. 
- The zipper was difficult to zip, but a quick swipe of pencil lead on the zipper's teeth fixed that problem. 
- The dress was a tad too small in the bust for me, but a larger size would have resulted in too much volume at the waist. I opted for a better fit at the waist than the bust.
Dress was form fitting but hugged curves, was not tight.

Super fun dress, great for dancing. Tough from a bra perspective because the back is so low - I ended up buying a stick-on Nubra which worked perfectly. Waist is fitted and bodice is roomy especially without a bra.

This dress was perfect for the summer wedding I attended! I ordered the size 6 and 8, but I have a very short torso and the size 8 provided me with a little extra length there. I usually wear a size 6, so I feel like it ran a little small, but I tend to wear a different size depending on the brand so I would say depending on your body type to either size up or stay true to your size. I loved the length of the dress, it was so classy. The tulle underneath the skirt makes it really flare out and gives the dress such a cute shape. I would recommend this dress to anybody! P.S. ignore the boots I'm wearing!
Great length.  Top quality fabric.  Looks good with nude bra or black bra.

I wish I had a photo of this! I wore it for a weekend away in Baltimore and it went so seamlessly from day to night and was comfortable, stylish, and understated. The skirt has a lovely feel to it, and the fabric was great. It was so versatile I really felt sad sending it back! This really was one of my favorite rentals ever- it made my outfit feel as fun and special as our getaway. I paired it with maroon tights, vintage boots, and hoop earrings and felt like a million bucks.

Really adorable LBD. I rented this for a Christmas party and it was the perfect style for the event. I didn't want to be too dressy and this was perfect. The lace is really nice and the back is super cute. I wore a regular black bra (not the one in the picture) and placed it in line with one of the buttons. It wasn't very noticeable and the little bit that did show, didn't bother me. Something to note, if you are looking to wear spanx or some kind of shapewear, the open back will limit what can be worn. I wore with black tights because it was an outdoor event and a colder evening.
The dress fit well. It is very low cut, but the length is very appropriate. I'm a pretty tiny girl and the extra small was almost too big for me.

The dress I rented was too small so I chose this one last minute.  It wasn't quite as formal as I would have liked but I loved the color and it fit great!  The only issue I had was the chairs we sat on has slits so the sequins kept catching.

Wore this to a formal event where almost everyone had on sequins, but this dress still stood out and I received many compliments. It's a beautiful cut, and the slit makes it sexy without being too much. I would absolutely rent this again, in blue or another color. I wish I owned it! I felt like a movie star or a princess (I have work other dresses by the same designer and this one is my favorite!). Length was a tiny bit too long, even with heels, but other than that it could not have been any better.

I chose the large, as it was a work event and I thought the medium would be too short, and fitted.  However, I would have preferred to wear the medium for an event other that work related.  Beautiful dress.  Received comments all evening and into the next day.  The dress was beginning to show some wear, but I would rent it again in a heartbeat.

The dress is the perfect shade of red. It was a bit more low-cut than I was expecting, but wasn't too revealing. I usually need dresses taken up in the shoulders, but this was perfect and the straps stayed in place all night. I am just over 5'5 and wore 3.5' inch heels, the long grazed the floor just the right amount. I'd definitely recommend this dress!

I loved this dress, but it definitely required safety pins! I have DDs and this dress is extremely low cut (even when you try to wrap it tight), also due to the back, you can't wear a bra. I was able to get away with it once I pinned the front. I also needed to pin the slit since it very easily flies open. I wore to a bridal shower and received a lot of compliments. It's very flattering!

Flawless experience with this first time rental.  Arrived on time, fit perfectly, easy to return.  Well made dress with beautiful seams.  Underneath is a jersey type stretchy layer that made this dress so comfortable.  Very cute flair at the bottom.  Being 5'2" I was concerned would be a little long on me, but fell nicely above my knee.

I rented this for a bachelorette party. I was in between sizes... the XS was a little tight on the top and created that ugly armpit fat, but the S was too loose on the bottom and made me look bigger. I went with the XS and dealt with it being a little snug on top. Not for girls with a big bust.
Nice material.  I wore the 4R and am 5'4". It was the Perfect length with a medium heel.

This dress was perfect.  The shape of it made my body look so good.  The top was also stretchy which was nice and make it easy to move around. I wore it to a party and then to work so it's versatile.  Definitely would rent again.

The fit was great, I'm glad I ordered an extra size for free, because the "stylist" told me to order the 2R for my measurements, but the OR actually ended up fitting much better. It is a lot more vibrant in person than in the photos on this site, in a good way! It also was very flowy and comfortable. The only problem was that I consider myself taller and it was nearly too long after I took my heels off to dance. Otherwise- so great!
This dress is just gorgeous and I will rent it again. It is just stunning.

Loved this dress, and wish it lived in my closet. Was super soft and swingy fabric. Definitely runs really large. The bell sleeves were a fun touch and I liked the flattering X strap across the back. Received multiple compliments while out to dinner for my husband's birthday. Wish I had somewhere else to go in it before returning!

this blouse was perfection. it was flattering and very polished. i wore this to the office with slacks and also wore this with jeans to host a gathering at the house. the key hole does come a bit low but once the bow is tied, it's covered. i really loved this and would rent again.

This dress was a major hit !!  People asking all night where I "bought" it.  The dress def runs small, so size up.  Otherwise, the dress was pretty comfortable although I did find myself tugging at the top here and there.  Will def be renting this one again !

Loved this dress! I got it as a back-up dress, as my original didn't send. I'm so glad I did! The dress fit perfect - with a little bit of room to spare. I did have a 0, also, but did not try it on. I liked having a little bit of room to move in this dress. It is a little on the heavier side, which was great with the lower temperatures (I wore it mid-November). I stand about 5'6", and wore a 1" heal, and the dress just brushed the floor.
a nice blouse for work or you can dress it down with jeans.
Wore this dress for my Bridal Shower. Wonderful fit if you've got curves, definitely some stretch. Accentuates an hourglass shape nicely. Would rent again!

The dress was pretty comfortable - I had it on for 12 hours and the sequins didn't start bothering my arms until about hour 10. It is a little tighter than I anticipated. It was nice - but I don't think I'd rent it again.
Loved this dress! The material was great for a fall wedding. I got several compliments on the scoop neck back and the classy look of the dress. Great for dancing, too!

I loved this gown.  It was the perfect dress to wear for the presidential inauguration.  The material was great but I wish I had ordered a size smaller because it was way too big on me.  I also could've used an extra inch or two on my heels because it was a bit long.  Still, great dress and I highly recommend it for anyone going to a formal affair.

Color is different from what I expected from the computer screen. I expected pastel peach color but the actual color was hellokitty pink. Personally , V neck depth was too much for me. Dress length is a bit weird... it covers my knee but no vent at the back so it was hard to walk.
Beautiful dress, color and details. The fabric feels amazing and it fits fantastic! The only problem I see is that is too long for someone my size. Otherwise...beautiful!

I had rented 2 RTR dresses, and ultimately, chose to wear the other dress. Don't get me wrong. This is a pretty dress in person, but the material was heavy. I was attending a wedding being held in warm weather, and I knew I would get hot if I wore this dress. It's a pretty color. I loved the skirt, and I loved how it had pockets.

I loved this dress. It is the best dress if you are trying to hide a tummy.  I could have been pregnant under this dress and no one would have known!  I wore it out on a Saturday to the movies with my kids and husband, and to lunch later. I wore with my Olukai flip flops for a casual vibe. Love the hemlines and yes, watch the wind or you will be flashing your undies. I had to hold it down during windy moments while walking to the car.
Fit was great. The back does run a bit long so make sure to wear heels. I am 5' and wore heels and it still dragged just a bit.
There were no cons !

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner, and I was constantly getting compliments from everyone. I'm a 32 DD, and from the comments about ordering up for your chest, I thought I was going to need a size 10. I usually wear 8/10, and the 8 was even a little loose at the top. Pair the dress with a nice skinny belt to cinch in the waist. Great dress overall. Oh and of course the pockets were a wonderful touch.

This dress is a gorgeous green.  The zipper was a little difficult to manipulate around the rouche part of the dress in the midsection, but other than that, it was easy to wear. I'm 5'7" and the regular length was long enough for the dress to just barely stay off the floor in 4 inch heels.

I got the 10 and 8 as a back up because I have recently lost weight and the 8 fit perfectly. It was incredibly comfortable (no spanx necessary) but definitely is long. I am 5'3 so the front hit below the knee and the back was on the ground. I wore 3 inch heels.

The dress is gorgeous and all the reviews I read before renting this dress were correct. It seems gold in photographs, but up close and in person it has a more copper color to it. It sparkles in different types of light and literally made me feel like I was the only one in a room. It gives you confidence for sure. This dress hugged to my body like a glove. It was super comfortable. I invested in a sticky bra (which I recommend) because this dress doesn't have a back. Unlike many reviews I read, I never had my hair stick to the sequins. I really didn't have any problems with this dress. If you are tall, definitely get the long option! I wore 4" heels and found the long to be a perfect height. Also, rent the runway is awesome. My dress came on time and was super easy to return. Everything about my experience and this dress was perfect. I'd rent this dress again and again!
I loved this dress! Very unique. I wore the small, it was a little tight but not uncomfortable because the fabric had some stretch. Highly recommend!
This dress is great - it doesn't wrinkle, has stretch to make any and all activities comfortable, and all while you look colorful and cool in a funky patterned, non-boring dress.
It was super comfortable and the color was great. I just had a baby and it hid all my problem areas. I ended up wearing a different dress but it was hard to choose!

I previously rented this dress in the apricot color, which was really more of an orangey coral. It fit great and I loved wearing that one. I didn't end up wearing this blue one because I found the blue color to be a bit too bright for my taste.
Wore this fab dress for night #1 of a bachelorette party in Newport! Makes a short girl feel tall!! FAB FIT!

Rented this for a college graduation and it worked out great for the occasion! I am a size 6 and ordered a small and medium. There is no give to the material so the small definitely wouldn't work. The medium was perfect but it was very tight on the hips. Sitting down was a little uncomfortable and I always had to make sure I was being conscious about it riding up! Overall I received tons of compliments and I would order it again for sure!

I initially rented this for my office Christmas party, but the amount of cleavage showing left nothing to the imagination, so I could not wear it to the office.  I did however have an annual Christmas party the following evening and wore it there, with a decorative lace camisole under it and it worked out perfectly.  I absolutely LOVED the pockets for holding the cell phone and lipstick.

I loved this dress, it fit so well and was so flattering. My one complaint would be the color. In person this dress is like light blue with a hint of green but photographs as navy blue. Plan to use a black matte shoe with this dress as it is impossible to color match
It was true to size and with three inch heels just touched the ground.
This dress is super sexy and hugs in all the right places. My back side looked so good in this dress. In love with this dress and will probably rent this one again. <3 Elizabeth & James.

A little short for taller girls (I'm 6 foot) and a little snug through the hips and butt ...so if you're curvy, I would recommend sizing up. The fabric is thick and doesn't stretch. I normally wear an 8 for Milly clothing, but I got a 10 and it was still a little snug (but totally wearable.) ...very classic New England summer feel!

This is a fantastic dress for a night out.  It is sexy while not being over the top.  The fit is very body con and the bare shoulders and back are very sexy, while the midi length and mock turtleneck keep it from being over the top.  Fit was true to size and I felt great in it.  Definitely recommend it!
Amazing all around- true to size, fit like a glove and PERFECT for a petite girl like myself! Definitely would rent again.

This dress was the talk of the night.  Guest, young and old, came up to compliment me and this amazing dress.  Tasteful, yet sexy, the unexpected open back turns heads while still making you feel classy.  I paired this with a modern structural necklace and hollywood side-swept waves to create an effortlessly chic look.
Wear this with black jeans and T with a large necklace.  This soft jacket dresses up and provides an interesting color accent.  Will wear to work next week with black skirt and top.
Fits true to size.

I find most designer sizes run a bit small, especially DVM although it is more true to size than others.  A little tape at the top to avoid too much cleavage for work was necessary, but overall a perfect and comfortable dress.

The dress was amazing it fits really well in the body..snug but not too tight. I would probably have the same criticisms as other folks: 

1. Oddly enough even with a full bust the straps on top where to big....fashion tape was a must. 

2. If you've got a full bust...you've got to love the ladies to where this gown. Be prepared to show a little flesh. 

3. Get the long if you resemble anything near 5' 5" and/ or if you have curves. I originally purchased the regular then went back and read the reviews again and called to have it switched...best decision ever...given the heels I was wearing (approx 2.5") the regular would have been too short.

Overall, fantastic dress easy to dance and move in and a show stopper...highly recommend!

This was a really nice dress. It was comfortable, would fit anyone, and looked great. The only issue was that it was stretched out around the arm holes by the bust but not very noticeable. I actually decided to buy the dress after wearing it out.

As mentioned in other comments I read, the straps do not really sit well, but it was not a huge inconvenience and was still wearable. I am petite so suggest wearing high heels for those on the shorter side. Overall, a beautiful dress and wish I could wear it again, but I already took too many pictures in it because it was that gorgeous.

I absolutely loved this romper! The fit and color were perfect, and I received so many compliments. The color really pops in photos and I stood out from the normal navy and black fall wedding colors. I would rent this again in a heart beat!

This was my first Rent the Runway experience and it will definitely not be my last! The dress came on time and was in great condition. I was also very pleased with the fit. I did take the recommendation from others to buy fashion tape for the back and that was DEFINITELY a key factor for the perfect fit. I received compliments on the dress ALLLLL night and was considering even purchasing the dress but I think I'll just save the dough and put it towards more Rent the Runways dresses in the future :)
I still wore it though because it's great!
Color was a very nice shade of bright red and the fabric was light and soft.

Stretchy, forgiving material. Beautiful, flattering cut and length! Really accentuates a woman's body and curves. I normally don't like body hugging dresses, but felt great in this dress! Didn't want to send it back!

I haven't worn this out yet, but I tried it on. True to size, but if you are busty like me (DD+) consider sizing up for more room in the bust. 
I think its going to be fun to wear, but the closures are with hook clasps on the inner edge of the coat and they are starting to pull off (especially at the bust line) - also, it doesn't seem to close all the way down. Though I believe this to be a warm coat, because of these issues I'm thinking it will be fun to wear but maybe not the most practical thing on a cold day.

Loved this dress, I felt both trendy and classic in this gorgeous dress. The dress also moved super well for dancing the night away, had good stretch to it and the bottom twirled really well, if you're in to that. Also, for the ladies with hips and a bum, mine looked freaking awesome in this dress. It was a little tough to decide between the 6 and 8, 8 was a little more roomy around my hips but the top was just too big for a 34B and bottom of the 6 worked, esp with some spanx stockings for the ceremony. The cut out looked fab and despite the stretch to the dress, didn't make anything pooch out. The navy was really lovely and the inside lining was a brighter blue that was a nice highlight but certainly not distracting.

The dress was absolutely beautiful highly recommended. I had a problem where I couldn't wear the dress because  for some reason there was a safety pin holding up the chest area! But I was really excited to wear the dress :( highly recommended dress! And it would look good on any skin tone and body.

The dress fit true to size and the length was right at the floor with 3 in heels.  It was not tight at the bust or waist but fit like a glove.  It was very comfortable and easy to walk, sit and dance in.  Wore it was regular bra which is great!  I wore this to an industry black tie award ceremony with co workers so it was important to me that I had something on the modest side in terms of skin showing, slits, deep v's etc.  This dress hit the exact right note without looking matronly.  I got a ton of compliments while walking in the hotel, in the elevator, as well as from people at the event.
This dress was perfect for the formal dinner I attended. The fit was perfect and the shape was great, hugged all the right places.

I am usually a 4 and the dress fit perfectly.  I would say maybe size up if you have big boobs.  I'm tall and the dress wasn't too short which is great.  Light enough fabric for the spring color of the dress.  Would rent again!
I would suggest sizing up for this dress as the waist was very tight with the boning. It was a very fun and flirty dress. The top felt very comfortable for me and the length was just above the knee.

Normally I have a tough time finding a dress that looks good as well as fits in the bust department, but this dress was really perfect for that! The dress was a little shorter than I realized it would be, so I had to wear sandals but hey - that just made the night all the more comfortable! Other that that, the dress was absolutely stunning and flawless.

Unique jumpsuit! I love everything about this piece. It’s work/date night appropriate, and is completely fitted. If you have fuller hips, I’d recommend sizing up as it doesn’t stretch, and it is also ideal for cups A through C as it does run a little bit smaller in that area. Overall it is a clean cut jumpsuit and it is super comfy!

I had ordered a size 4R and a 6R as my backup. The fit of the size 4 dress was perfect but it was actually a long not a regular in length so there was an extra 3 inches of fabric at the bottom of the dress. Thankfully the 6 was actually a regular in length so I wore that since it really felt like the difference was just more room in the top of the dress. I safety pinned the top together because it was very revealing for the event I was wearing the dress to. I wore a 1 inch heal shoe and with me being 5'5" that was perfect for the dress to hit at the floor yet I didn't have to hold it when I was walking around.

This was my first experience with RTR. The dress I originally ordered (made by the same designer)  arrived with a tear in the lace. I was nervous because my event was less than a day away! I called customer service and they were extremely accommodating. They didn't have the dress I originally ordered in my size, so they asked me to choose another. I was unsure between two colors and they decided to overnight both!  I can't say enough good things about this company. They are amazing!
This dress arrived the next morning (9 am!) and the second I tried it on, my kids and I LOVED it. It was adorable! 
The amount of attention this dress received at my event was incredible! I had random people asking me all night about it and telling me how much they loved it. I can't even count how many compliments I received. The color is gorgeous - more of a teal than a softer baby blue that the pic of the model portrays. It was also extremely comfortable. I wore spanx but I could have gotten away with none. It hid my tummy and was very figure flattering. The lace cap sleeves were great and the cut of the front was very feminine without being too revealing. Length was great for me. 
The only con for me is that I'm afraid I'll never be able to duplicate how great I felt in this dress. I will definitely rent this again or try another color in the same style. I was sad to return this.
Loved this dress. The top stayed up nicely, despite being strapless. It was very long on me, hitting just above the ankles. But that's usually the case with tea length dresses on my petite frame.
Fit was large in the bust, had to pin it up. Overall a nice dress, not a show stopper. Probably won't rent again.

This dress was perfect for a NYE wedding! The fit was true to size and hugged my body in all the right places. The cut of the dress highlights your natural waist nicely! Only issue I had was that, despite a perfect fit everwhere else, the straps slipped down all night. This may not happen for women of different heights or proportions. Overall, lots of complements, beautiful dress!!
LOVED this and had non-stop compliments all night. I wore with a white blazer with black piping.
Too big

I wore this to Rosh Hashanah services and received many compliments.  The dress is lightweight, yet substantial.  It has a slight pleated skirt and the details are gorgeous.  I'm tempted to buy this one!
It was a little stretched out (the S was a bit big on me and I normally wear a M). The sequins are amazing and it is SO cute!
Really wish it worked. I only got it in an 8, should have done a 6 as it was a little too roomy in an unflattering way on my legs. Did not end up wearing. Loved the color and sleeves.
I LOVED this dress, however the midsection was tight and the zipper had a difficult time going over this part of the dress.  I ended up not wearing it because I didn't want to break the zipper!

This dress was lovely and flattering, and invited several compliments.  It felt luxurious to wear as the lace is thick and beautiful, and the nude lining is satiny and feminine.  It's also a lovely, eye-catching color in person.  

Regarding fit, it was a teensy bit tight through the shoulders, but nothing too uncomfortable.  My 36DD's fit in the 12 just fine!
