This dress is lovely.  It is very flattering, but stays classy with its longer length and cap sleeves.  It is super comfortable and the material is thick so no worries about undergarment lines, etc.
Runs large.  I am a size 10-12 and the small still has a loose fit on me.
Extremely comfortable and stretchy! The length hits the calf on shorter/petite girls. Overall very flattering.

The dress fit perfectly in an XS. I am normally a S in dresses from RTR. It was the perfect dress for a traditional Southern dinner with friends in Charleston, SC celebrating my fiancee's 30th birthday and our engagement!

I rented this for my anniversary date for winter time. The fit was awkward on my body, but I still wore it. I borrowed a smaller size as well, but went with the original small. The extra small was awkward for the mid section. Other than the awkward fit, it was a comfy dress to wear.
Great fit and held in all problem areas. Accidentally ordered a L, but the extra length was a plus.

I absolutely loved everything about this dress. Being larger in the bust I'm always on the hunt for strapless dresses that have a good fit. This dress gave me just that and the sleeves stayed in place the entire night. I am 10 months post baby so I still felt like my baby belly was visible because the dress is definitely very fitted. The girls were on display but I was able to get away without wearing a bra which is always an epic win for me haha. First time renting from the site and I will definitely do it again.
Fits true to size, beautiful, nice fabric

Loved this dress!  Such fun colors, easy to match a blazer with.  Wore this to work.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was because the dress was cut a little low so I was spent a lot of time worrying about whether it was showing too much cleavage for work.  Also, there's no slit in the skirt so it makes it a little tight to walk in flats.  I wish I owned this dress though!

I loved this dress!! Gorgeous color, flattering fit ( although it would probably look even better on someone who's not an A cup)...I received a lot of compliments all night. I rented it for a very formal wedding, definitely felt well dressed for the occasion. My experience with Rent the Runway has been very positive, I had a little issue with the other dress which  I rented just in case ( the zipper got stuck),but it was resolved by their customer service team in a timely and professional manner. Awesome dress and awesome customer service.
The XS fit perfectly and was extremely comfortable. It has pockets which is great and arrived in excellent condition! I would definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. I got so man compliments. I loved the slit, it was high enough to give the dress a little extra something. but not too high that I couldn't wear a spanx had I needed one. My  only real issue with this dress is that i had to size up because it runs small on the chest. the 6 fit perfectly everywhere, but it was a little too tight on the chest; even the 8 didn't give it all that much wiggle room, but the bunching in the picture is from the dress being too big on the torso/hip area. Overall, i felt super sexy and it was easy to dance in. May rent the mauve for my law school graduation.

This dress looked awesome! This was for a work party so I wanted to make sure I stayed pretty conservative. Shoshanna dresses fit me the best. I am 5'7 and 150 and small chested! Definitely recommend.
I got so many compliments on this dress!  The print is unique.  It fit like a glove and was very comfortable.
Overall great dress. Ordered 2 sizes. Wanted a 2L instead of the 4L. But 4L allowed for wiggle room. The 2R was short with heels so keep that in mind

This dress is absolutely amazing! It is the perfect amount of sexy and classy. I ended up wearing the smaller size because I have a smaller ribcage and bust and didn't want it to fall down. I would recommend girls with smaller busts do the same. Other than some slight adjusting this dress was perfect! I did not want to return it!!
This dress was prefect. It hid my flabby arms (even though the sleeves were a tab bit too tight). The color and detail was beautiful and I love that it made my waist look small.

The fit was true to size, but be aware it is a very fitted dress.  Was super fun to wear and loved the accessories that I ordered as well.  The slip was a special addition and where ever I went I received compliments.  I would order this dress again with out hesitation.  

If you decide on this dress option you will not be disappointed!

I rented this dress for my sister-in-laws wedding. It was beautiful! So many compliments! It's formal enough for a wedding but the fabric (almost like a cotton feel) made it feel a little more casual and it didn't take away from the bridal party's look.

I'm 5'4", 34B and 122 pounds and typically wear a size 2. I rented both the XS and the S in this dress and ended up wearing the small. The XS fit perfectly, but because the front panel is see-through my chest was squished together and created way too much cleavage for my taste. The S was a little big but looked more tasteful from the front. I would advise going a size up as your backup. Definitely get petals! I didn't and you really can't wear a strapless bra with this dress. I ended up taping my chest. This dress was long but I wore 3" heels and it worked out perfectly.

Loved the color and this dress.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the nude mesh around the waist will wrinkle and twist and bunch. I kept trying to pull it taut so it didn't look funny.  Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
Nice heavy fabric, good fit and flow. Good with tights or heels

RTR selected this dress for me because my original first selection was sent back late--and boy am I happy I got this dress.  If you have a more narrow figure with a tight mid-section and back this dress will look amazing on.  I received tons of complements and absolutely love this dress.

This dress fit perfectly, except the straps are far too long. I was too afraid to pin them so I ended up taping them and it didn't work very well. It would probably be well suited for someone with a bigger chest so you wouldn't have to adjust the straps

The fabric on this dress is beautiful, wonderful feel and color. The top of the dress runs tight so probably not the best for a large chest or order up. The long is SUPER long (I'm 5'7") but I was able to make it work with the suggestion of my husband by tucking the extra fabric under the waste band. By doing so it added some pleats in the waste/hip area allowing an extra bit of camouflage in the area which was nice. One of my favorite rentals to date.
It fit well on my athletic built body (but not necessarily skinny). Fabric started to rub after a while but I was dancing a lot. Worked great for my sophomore prom.
The fabric is a bit stiff and folds across the middle, so I would recommend shapewear. All in all, this was a great dress, and looked super cute in photos.

This was a bit of a stretch for me - almost too fashion forward but I gave it a try. It was super flattering, but I probably won't rent it again. The fabric is tough to iron/steam, and it also doesn't lay very nice.

I loved this dress. I usually can switch between a 2 and a 4 in dresses, and the 4 fit me perfect. The fabric is light and breathable, and the rouching and the pattern hide any problem areas. It was very comfortable, photographed well, and didn't keep me from dancing! The off shoulder is also so on-trend right now! Loved this dress and wish they made it in different colors/patterns because I would definitely rent again!
It was a little shorter than I expected, and I am pretty short myself, so I wouldn't really be able to wear this if I was a couple inches taller.
The dress is tight fitting and true to size. It didn't do great things for me stomach area, but I would recommend spanx underneath.
I loved the dramatic bust line. I love mesh long sleeves because they are slimming and dramatic. Deep plunge and my 36C bust required fashion tape but it was jaw dropping and memorable for the event.

I almost didn't get to wear this dress because it arrived a day late. Thankfully it showed up just in time and fit like a glove! This dress is absolutely stunning and really does show off and flatter curves. I ordered the 0R and 0L. I am 5'6 and with 3 inch heels the Regular was perfect. As others have mentioned the bust was a little big but nothing terrible. I loved this dress and would definitely order it again!

I wore this dress to my stepsons wedding and received many compliments throughout the night.
At 5'4" and 115 pounds I usually wear a size 2 but wore the backup size 0.  The dress did stretch throughout the night around the shoulders.  I would recommend you wear this stunning dress but do size down.

I wasn't sure what size to order since I just had a baby and don't quite have my body back. I ended up wearing the 4 and it fit great. It was awesome for hiding what's left of my baby belly. I felt super confident in the dress and would absolutely rent it again. Loved it!

I ordered the size 8 and 10 in this dress, not knowing which might look more flattering, although I tend to wear a size 10 more often.  For this dress, I tried the 8 on at first.  I had read certain reviews indicating that the clasps at the bust were either problematic or missing, so I was excited to find that I had two functional clasps.  However, I did not realize that in addition to the wrap ties, there were two snap buttons near each of the ties.  I have a long torso, so these did not hit me at my waist, but rather pretty far up on my torso.  While I could button them, I was uncomfortable, so I tried the 10.  Unfortunately, while the snap buttons of the 10 worked, there were NO clasps at the bust, which made me uneasy.  Ultimately, I went with the 8, forgoing the snap buttons, and praying that the ties alone would suffice.  I don't think it looks terrible in the picture, but I was definitely nervous wearing this dress.

Amazing dress!! Loved the fit and feel. Very sheer though. I wore a nude strapless bra and slip underneath. Flattering fit, but also forgiving. Runs large (I never wear a size 2, but I did with this dress!). Quite long, so consider wearing heels (at least 3-4 inches). No complaints. Wish I could keep it!!

I am 5'9" and based on reviews, I ordered the 8L to wear and the 10L as the extra dress.  The 8L was a little tight and way too much cleavage for a work event, but the length was perfect.  I was kind of forced to wear the 10L, which still worked out great.  The fit of the dress was more comfortable, only thing was that you can tell someone altered the length of the dress.  It wasn't as long as I had hoped (but I'm picky!), it barely touched the floor on me and I was only in 2 inch heels.  If you are any taller than 5'9" and plan on wearing higher heels, I wouldn't recommend the 10L.
I wear a 32 B and felt like the top was a little large.  Also for the height was perfect with a heel.

This dress was absolutely stunning. I got so many compliments on it. It runs a bit large as I usually wear a 0 in dresses and the 2 fit very well (makes sense I guess sense it isn't offered in a 0). I wore it to a gala and thought it really stood out as most women were wearing black. This was my first time using renttherunway and I will definitely be doing it again!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous! The material is heavier than it looks in pictures, but I was still able to comfortably wear it to an outdoor wedding in Palm Springs (temp = 105 degrees). The bust and arms have a loose fit, but the rib cage area has zero give whatsoever. I couldn't get the top button buttoned to save my life, even though the dress fit perfectly everywhere else. I ended up tucking the top button back into itself on each side to create a little triangle cut out of skin, which was super cute. I actually liked that look better! If you don't want to end up going that route, I'd suggest sizing up, although I think if I had sized up the bust would have been way too big. I didn't need to wear a bra or nipple covers with this dress. I ordered a regular length so that I could wear it with flat sandals and the material just grazed the ground. If I had wanted to wear heels, I would have needed more length. I'm 5'6 with an athletic build.

I rented this for a girls night. The 0 looked amazing but was a bit tight, but the 2 was too big so I wore the 0. It was adorable for sure. I was worried it would be too long but it was the perfect length (I am 5'5"). The skirt was so fun and I didn't want to stop wearing it! The arm holes were a bit small for sure.
Great fit! I wore for my engagement photo session! Truly stunning gown! :)

This dress was so comfortable.  Loved the way the top fit, but the bottom was a bit tight, actually very tight, but when I put it on with all my undergarments, it worked!!! I loved the netting overlay (no one would ever know it was tight in the hips)....It was perfect for my sister's special birthday celebration!!! I recommend this dress!!

The dress was beautiful!  It was so comfortable and pretty easy to dance in, which I love.  It fit true to size and hugged all the right spots.  The wedding photographer even commented on how it was her favorite dress.

Wore this dress for my wedding rehearsal dinner.  I am 5'8" and about 135 lbs (slim but not fit/toned).  The 4 fit better in the body (I am small in the ribs and have wider hips) but the sleeves were too tight on my arms so I ended up wearing the 6, which fit pretty well also.  I think the dress was new and may not have been previously worn so the sleeves were still very tight and rigid.  I didn't end up wearing a bra (more because I was running late and had already gotten my arms into the sleeves) but definitely could have worn a strapless or stick-ons (def had the room) but braless was fine too.  I almost wasn't able to wear this dress because of the tight sleeves in both sizes but it worked out okay and they loosened up a bit throughout the night so I would just take that into consideration if thinking about renting it.  Otherwise, it's a great dress and I received a lot of compliments.  Not as shimmery as in the model pictures but fantastic pattern.  One last note, I didn't wear Spanx because the underneath material of the dress kept getting twisted due to the friction between materials as I moved and then all of the dress lines were off.  This also ended up being fine as well since there is a texture to the dress and the lines give you a great defined, flattering waistline.  More comfortable without the Spanx anyway!

Very cool dress! I loved the detail, the pattern, and the different styles across the top. Very different and fun! It ran true to size. I would recommend sizing down for backup as this dress was slightly big on me but still do-able. The fabric has no stretch but the fuller skirt allows room for comfortability. It’s is fitted at the natural waist. Great for any cup size and should be worn with a strapless bra. It was knee to tea length on me and I am 5’6”.  Overall, great eye-catching dress and would rent again!

I am usually a 6, but the dress runs small. The material is stretchy, so while I was able to fit into the 6, it was skin tight. The 8 worked perfectly, but the strap was a bit long, causing the bust to gap a bit. The slit was too high to wear my mid thigh spanx, but the material was thick enough to keep everything snug. I loved the dress and color, will definitely be renting again
Dress fits snug. Decorations around the bust line drew attention to that area. Decided not to wear as I wasn't comfortable in it.

This dress is super cute! I was between the 6 and the 8 and went with the 6 because the 8 wasn't available. It's tight in the bust and rib cage for me but still workable. Very comfy and versatile dress. Is a little long on me but I think heels will help the look.

Rented this for a debutante ball. It's stunning. I wear a zero, and the zero fit true to size although the arm holes were a little tight and started to bother me towards the end of the evening. I had no problem with the top itching, and I'm usually very sensitive to that. It's also long: I'm wearing 6" platforms under the dress and it's a touch long, but it worked. I got so many compliments on this dress! It really is a beautiful gown and well worth renting.
This dress is perfect for dancing and making a statement.  I was impressed with how nice my post-baby body looked.  It was very comfortable and not as short as I had feared.

This top is a silk plaid, not a woven, which was a surprise, but a good one.  I paired with leather leggings to elevate the look for work with booties and some copper accessories.  The length was perfect, just covering my butt, making it legging appropriate.  Gorgeous blouse for the fall and winder months.  Would love to rent again to style with white denim as picture for spring as well.

It runs a little small - I would normally wear a Medium in something like this and wore a Large. I knew that from reading other reviews though, so I had ordered the L and XL as my backup. Such a perfect dress for an indoor/outdoor wedding in the summer.

This was my first time renting from RTR and it was a breeze! I will definitely rent again. The dress definitely runs big.. normal sizes I probably would have had to get a 10R but was able to fit the 6R no problem. So glad I read the reviews before renting! The 8 fit but made my hips look HUGE and drug the ground a lot. The 6 was perfect even in length. I wasn't too thrilled about the color when I received it.... just not a good color for me but the dress was very pretty.

I ordered the 4R and 6R after reading the other reviews. It was a little bit long, but worked out with my 3.5/4" heels. I'm full-busted, but still have room in the 6R, and I couldn't get the fashion tape to cooperate. The waist was a little snug. If you're short-waisted with a full bust, go with the smaller size to help hold you in (top tends to be a little big and flop open). Not too heavy for a sequin gown, felt pretty good.

This fit a little big on me, but I have other Equipment tops and was expecting it! I wore it for all different occasions - paired with tailored pants and a blazer for work, with destroyed denim and some cool jewelry for dinner with friends. I am petite and wore it tucked in so that it wouldn't overwhelm my frame. This piece travels very well, which is something I always appreciate! It didn't wrinkle, even after a 12-hour workday!

It ended up being too formal for a couple friends over, so I wore just the spaghetti strap dress.  Because I'm short (5'1) I needed to cinch the waist to make it sit higher, but then it didn't look as elegant as the photo.  Wearing just the top and cut off jeans was cute for an evening bbq.

Could not wear the dress. I ordered for a bachelorette party in NOLA, and was unable to wear it because the waist was too large and bunched up every time I moved. Over all the dress is beautiful and sexy, but it only looked good if I stood very still. I have larger hips and bust, and it was fitted in those areas.
Color is a show stopper especially on tan skin.  A bit tight on a larger chest.
Little tight on the sleeves.
I wore it with nude flats and still got a ton of compliments! The coloring is a bit off compared to the photo, its a bit darker and muted in person, but still beautiful.
I felt so glamorous all night! I got so many complements that I "looked like I belonged on the red carpet" during my sorority formal in Savannah, GA.
Fit was perfect!

I ordered a size 4 (my true size) and a size 2 as backup (based on other reviewers suggestions).  Unfortunately, RTR was unable to ship my backup size, but they MORE than made up for it by sending, not one, but two back up dresses!  Their customer service is beyond measure...I cannot say enough!!  I ended up wearing the original dress in the size they were able to send (the size 4), mainly because the backup dresses were lighter in color, and I decided I preferred a dark color for this event.  It definitely fit well enough and was workable.  I received compliments and my husband thought I looked great (most important!), so I can't complain.  Up close, it was a little looser in the midsection and underarm areas than I would prefer (still wishing I could have tried the size 2), but with a dark dress for an evening holiday event, I can't really say it was noticeable.  I paired with the Mave Lariat Necklace by Gorjana Accessories, which we absolutely LOVED, and gold heels.
Not stretchy, more like a structured dress.
The sleeves for the size 8 which I normally am were too tight and I didn't want to be uncomfortable. Besides that the dress was perfect !
Loved it, lots of compliments. Accentuated all the right areas, easy to wear.  Know that the neckline is low, so requires a deep-cut bra.  Now trying to figure out where I can buy it!

Fit nicely. I worked VERY hard to make sure the collar/neck lace stood up straight-- lots of hair spray and flat ironing but it stayed up for most of the night! It comes in two parts, the lace overlay was a little lose in the 8 (which is what I wore) but in the 6 the slip was too small. I don't think it's a dress that's meant to be skintight anyways and it did end up being flattering. A little short when I sat down, and I'm only 5'5' so if you're tall beware!!
I feel like it ran a bit small. I wore it once and sent it back because it did not fit my chest right. I am a 34D and it was tight and stretched across the top.

Lovely dress!  I got many compliments on it.  Fit was true to size, maybe even slightly loose in the upper half.  Bottom skirt (under the peplum) was very fitted and I found it awkward at times to walk up and downstairs -- but overall a great rental.

I LOVED this dress so much, it fit perfectly and it was very comfortable. I have a very small waist and wide hips so i was worried this wouldn't fit quite right but it was not a problem. This was my backup dress actually, i ordered a 4 of another style and that didn't fit my hips so RTR overnighted me this one last minute. I ended up wearing the 4R (i am usually a 4). Even though i am 5'8 and wore 4inch heels the dress was the perfect length, so if you are shorter i would suggest going with the regular. 

The only downsides are that you can't raise your arms too much but that did not prevent me from dancing all night, it was still very comfortable.  The fabric is thick too so i got a little hot at times but it was a cold day out so it didn't bother me. 

The color is VERY bright so be prepared to stand out. I got compliments all night, and would definitely wear it again! However, I got a little hesitant at first since everyone else at the event was wearing black and I was in bright pink.
Fit to size, no give if you plan to eat/drink a lot, but overall really great and beautiful dress. Got lots of compliments.

The dress fit fine. I appreciated the adjustable straps and the cuts out hit me nicely. But the colors were not as bright as I was expecting.  Ended up not wearing out as it just wasn't as cheerful a dress as I was expecting.
the color is bright but looks very nice in person. loved the fit and worked well with a strapless bra

This dress is figure-flattering and very comfortable. The cutouts make this dress feel sexy, but the longer length and conservative neckline made it an appropriate choice for my friend's wedding. I felt amazing and received so many compliments .
Luxurious, heavy fabric but wasn't too hot for an unusually warm September wedding. V neck wasn't too deep and I felt the overall cut was very flattering

I wore this dress for my sister's bachelorette party because I was looking for something pretty and fun, yet more on the casual side. I had to wear the bigger size because the dress runs tight in the leg/hip area (and being a pear shape, this is my largest area). Since I wore the bigger size, the top of the dress was a little baggy but I just safety-pinned it (as I've done with many dresses). It was very comfy to wear to dinner and for a night that mostly involved sitting. The only downside is that the skirt part rode up a lot when I sat down. I also had to wear Spanx with this, since the fabric on the lower half of the dress fit pretty snug.

I am 5'9", size 4 normally but I'm also 11 weeks pregnant. I wore this dress to a beach wedding in FL with flat sandals. The dress in a 4R is entirely too long for flats for someone up to 5'11". I think it could have worked with 3 1/2 heals, though. The top was a little snug but I like that for strapless dresses. I'm not sure if it would have worked if my "top" wasn't, ahem, a little bigger due to the pregnancy. It probably would have been falling off and I'm normally a 34D. So for the free extra size, I would size down.
Loved the feminine detailing on this dress and the print. I wore to work and received compliments all day.
very beautiful silhouette

This ended up being my back up to the back up dress...but by far my favorite RTR to date. The original dress I ordered didn't fit & was slightly damaged, and the backup dress was way too short, so RTR's amazing customer service sent me this one. It's way out of any price range I'd ever considered for a rental, but I absolutely loved it, and will be buying it when RTR is ready to sell. It was perfect for my office Christmas party this year...a little more substantial fabric, so I was warm enough, festive green color, and special without being inappropriate. I'm used to other women gushing, so that happening all night was no surprise, but I received multiple VERY appreciative compliments from the men all night as well. 
As far as the fit... I'm a little taller, so sometimes it's difficult to find dresses in a decent length, but this one was perfect. I guess you could say the fit is a little bit loose, but it's so well tailored that I thought it was perfect. Such a fun change not to have to tug, yank, and smooth all night long! I was able to wear a normal bra, which is always a plus. The fabric was heavier, with a very pleasant give to it - since it was not skin tight, I did not see any need for Spanx or shapewear - nothing negative showed. I loved that this dress was still flattering even though I have a smaller bust...I'm barely a B, but I thought this dress looked amazing. The great thing about this dress is that I believe it would compliment a wide range of bust sizes...there was plenty room for more, but it did not gape or look too big on me.
Thanks RTR!! Always a great experience.
Fit better than I thought it would, and not so tight that I was uncomfortable. Also, I was worried about wearing a long dress with my height, but the petite was perfect.

Loved this dress and the color. I got lots of compliments all night! I ordered the size 4 and 6 and went with the 6. The 6 was more comfortable and was more flattering. The top was a little big so I was able to wear a strapless bra.

This dress is gorgeous! It's definitely lighter than the model photo but I preferred it. E&J dresses are definitely snug so size up one size from normal. I'm 5'0" and the dress hit right at my knees. Perfect for my company's Derby party! I got compliments all night. I will definitely be renting again, hopefully in one of the other colors.

It was slightly large, wish I had the size 4 but it was my back up dress! I usually wear a size 6. 
It was very comfortable! I have a small bra cup size 36B and it fit slightly large but not too bad, a 4 would have been perfect. There are no cons to this dress! Loved it!

Super comfortable, slimming, easy to dance in.  Wore to a wedding.  Got tons of compliments.  The color is very vibrant "cobalt".  Looks even better in person.  Highly recommend this dress, would definitely rent again.  True to size.  Wore stick on front cups because of the cut out in the back.

This dress was comfortable and easy to travel with because it didn't need to be ironed. I typically wear a 4.  This was a snug 4.  The 6 was a better fit but ended up not being as flattering.  I'm 5'3" and found the length was a few inches above my knee.  It's a great dress that is understated yet still makes a statement.

I wore this for Pres Obama's 2013 Inauguration!  This dress has a  sassy, forever young look that is perfect for formal day-to-evening events.  Smooth seems and luxurious fabric makes the dress feel like it's from a top designer. Gold accessories make the dress pop!

This was my first choice to wear as a groomswoman in a friend's wedding. It fit perfectly and made me feel like a rock star. However, the material is very heavy, and because we had to spend a lot of time in hot, humid weather, I wore my second choice dress.
Pro is that no bra is needed!

Wore this to a wedding where bridesmaids were only required to wear the same color. It accentuated my body and i paired it with my own gold belt. Felt beautiful but it was a little bit more snug than I would have liked.

In a last minute pinch to find something to wear for my roommate's 21st birthday celebration. I quickly turned to RTR. This romper was the perfect combination of flirty and fun and garnered a lot of compliments! My only tip to rocking this look would be that I would highly recommend fashion tape for the deep v neckline.
The arms run a little small, the pockets were awesome and everything else was perfect! Such a comfortable dress

This dress was awesome!  I got tons of compliments all night, and it was so comfortable.  I wore a size down from my normal size because it was a bit stretchy and held me in nicely.  I recommend this dress.
I thought this ran large and looked a little frumpy. Also, the hems on the sleeves were all uneven, as if it had been dry-cleaned too many times

I was hoping from other reviews saying that this ran small that the 14 might fit me because it was the only option available. Unfortunately it was very big, I am usually a 10/12. It is also very heavy from all the sequins but it really is a great piece for a party or concert or birthday event on a cooler night.

This dress was great for wear at a formal Chicago wedding.  The material is stretchy, very thick with sheer black panels on the sides at the hips (unless you are wearing a body suit or something very full coverage, you most likely will not be able to wear underwear - the sheer extends on the sides from your low waist to almost below your bum.)  I ordered both the 8L and the 6L but opted for the 8L as I hate readjusting super tight dresses all night and wanted the slit to not be stretched across my leg.  Either size would have worked, your personal preference on how tight you prefer.  I wore the Stuart Weitzman Nudistsong heels and the dress just touched the ground so I definitely recommend the long if you're 5'6" or taller.  The top was a little loose but with good posture it was fine.  I didn't tape or wear a bra.  No mess, no fuss - highly recommend!!

Wore this for my wedding rehearsal dinner. The color is a pale pink and lace is very pretty. I received many compliments and felt so comfortable the entire night. I especially like the keyhole at the top of the dress, its contemporary yet classic at the same time! Would definitely rent again!!
Fits TTS . Material is rich but not too heavy. Length is perfect cocktail. My only con was having to send it back !
Excellent fit and comfortable! #hollywood #glam #wedding #performance #happy

I hate that I didn't get a better picture! I ordered a 4 and 6 in this dress and ended up with the 4. (I am small up top) The dress hugged nicely around my hips but not too much where I felt uncomfortable. The front has a little extra fabric so your midsection is "hidden" which I appreciated as a mom :) Length was perfect; my friend we were cruising with said she felt like I was a celebrity and she was my assistant lol. Husband LOVED it...I would rent this dress again!
Beautiful, well made dress. It is very flattering, though not forgiving at the natural waist. I wore it for a black tie wedding and received many compliments. An excellent, classic style.
wore to a NYE wedding, loved the color

I wore this cute and flirty dress to the wedding welcome dinner at a vineyard. Got tons of compliments. It was cold that evening so I paired it with a black leather jacket and it was perfect! REally cute, easy to wear and lots of fun!

This dress is beautiful!  Worn for a NY January wedding.  Very comfortable dress, easy to dance in, lace was not itchy as lace can sometimes be.  Lining was a great color.  I found the bust to be a little tight, wore a size 4.  I'm a  34C.  But overall the dress was perfect.  Dresses arrived on time, in excellent condition.

Ultimately I loved this dress. I'm very much pear-shaped so the size 6 top half was a little big and the bottom half a little snug- if I could take a size 4 top half and put it on a size 8 bottom half it would have been absolutely perfect! The fabric is nice and thick so no Spanx needed (which helped since the bottom was tight on me) and I wore a nude strapless bra. My husband, who usually doesn't "get" ruffles even liked the ruffle detail and thought the cut was super flattering. I got tons of compliments on social media when I posted this pic!

Rented this dress for a private school evening cocktail party.  I didn't end up wearing it, but could have.  It was what I was looking for - smart but not too sexy, well made, great fabric, great fit.  Needs a great necklace to give it a little life.  Would choose it again.

I rented this dress to wear as the only bridesmaid in a winter wedding.  It was so easy and comfortable!  I paired with opaque black tights and black patent leather mary janes (see first picture, though the final picture shows the fit better due to the lighter background).  I didn't worry for a second about wardrobe malfunctions.  The fabric is stretchy, so I suspect it would accommodate many body types.  The bride loved the color, and the rental price was GREAT compared to purchasing a bridesmaid dress.  Would definitely recommend this dress to a friend.
Dress fit great-- ran a little large in some areas, so I ended up wearing a 4 when I often wear a 6. Great coverage for my full bust! (Normally a 34D, currently a 34DD)
I rented the 4 and it fit perfectly!  I received many complements the entire evening!

The dress was a great length for work, received tons of compliments on it. The material was great and had a bit of stretch to it! My hips are much wider in comparison with my top, so my only problem was it was a bit tight on my hips. Overall, great dress!

I received so many compliments on this dress, it is beautiful and classic. I did size up, I am typically a 0 and I got 6 because I was concerned about the arms. The 6 was big on me, realistically I could have worn a 2 or 4. Size up and you'll be happy!
Easy to wear. The material is very light and cool for hot weather. Recommend!

This dress was the pefect fit. Typically, I wear a size 2 petite/short in pants and an XS/0 in dresses (if they aren't too tight). I'm pretty short and am a little thicker in my hips, so I decided to rent the 2 with a backup size of 0. Once I tried on the 0 I didn't even bother trying on the 2.. it was perfect! It hugged all the right spots and was not too short (because I have short legs)! I wore really high black heels. It is a thick material, which some said it wasn't easy to dance in. I was able to dance for hours and it was perfectly fine. I got so many compliments after posting a picture of us at the wedding. I definitely recommend! Perfect twist on a little black dress.

I am tall (5'10"), so drop waist dresses are always a good option.  I loved the black fabric, as it was comfortable and didn't show sweat -- great for a wedding outside in 95 degree heat when you are the reader!  I accessorized with a great necklace from RTR and it blamed it up.  I would def rent this again.

I loved wearing this dress! It was comfortable, light, and easy to dance in for a summer wedding. I received numerous compliments on it. You definitely cannot wear a bra because of the open back, which is a non-issue for me, but might affect some. I have long legs so I went with the size 4, which was perfect -- size 2 fit similarly, but was definitely shorter and had a tendency to ride up. Overall, I found the dress ran true to size and had just the right amount of sparkle. Oh, and I absolutely loved the back!
Fit great, received many compliments

Be prepared to show a LOT of cleavage, also make sure you have fashion tape to keep everything in place!
I am 5'3''/160lbs/36D. I usually wear a size 12 (and get a 14 as backup) The L fit me much better than the XL. I have a short torso and the XL was baggy on top, even with 36D. I was able to wear one of those plunge bras, but definitely needed fashion tape to keep the girls in place. This was very annoying when you had to go to the bathroom because then I had to unzip, take it all off and then re-tape myself back in. Other than that, the romper was very comfortable and not too short. However, if you are not comfortable showing cleavage, this is not the romper for you.

I wore this for a symphony fundraiser and received compliments from everyone the minute I walked in the door.  I was even approached by one of the musicians after the concert who said she saw my dress from stage and loved it.  In a room full of hundreds of beautifully dressed women, I'd say that was high praise.  Best of all it was one of the most comfortable dresses I have ever worn.  Great for and event where I was sitting most of the night.

As for size I think it runs big.  I usually wear and 8/10 depending on fit.  I probably could have worn a 6.  I could not wear a regular bra as the straps showed through the lace on the shoulders, but a strapless was fine and caused me no issues.

Finally if you ever doubted that RTR dresses are the latest in fashion....I saw the dress in Bergdorf's in NYC a month after my event -still full price!
Bold and sparkly! It was perfect for a new years party.  It is a little heavy from the beading but worth it to have the beading on front and back.

This dress gives off serious boho vibes. I felt so comfortable in this! This dress runs true to size and is great for any cup size. There is comfortable room for hips and curves, and the fabric is very stretchy. We recommend wearing a NuBra or no bra, since the straps are so skinny. Wear this to an outdoor party or a day at the park!
Loved this dress. Rented it for an end of summer Christening. Fit well, nice and long, had to pick it up to walk up/down stairs but I didn't mind (wore ML I'm 5'9). Material is light but not cheap.

I rented this dress for my bridal shower and I couldn't have been more pleased.  The dress fit perfectly and I received compliments all day!  This dress is so flattering!  The dress is comfortable and the colors are very vibrant.  When the dress arrived it had a few wrinkles but a steamer took care of that quickly.  The only negative part of the experience, was the fact that I didn't want to send this dress back!  I would definitely rent this dress again!

This is a very cute outfit! The only thing is that one must have a long torso for the back part to "straightened up". I took a pic of the back to see what that means. In any case, it was a unique pretty design and the material is well made. No bra needed as the back part is open but the material "protects" the front well. It' s like an eyelet (closer look at the pic). Got so many compliments in person and on-line!

This dress is even more stunning in person, the colors are beautiful, the deep V-neck was a little revealing but it fit great with a sticky bra. The size 2 was a little tight in the rib cage so I ended up wearing the 4, and I am 5'9 and was a little worried about the length but it ended up looking great. And it has pockets!! So happy with this rental, wish I could wear it to another event soon!
Many compliments! Comfortable with a good stretch and very flattering. Consider a smaller size and the long length.

Striking, colorful, form fitting, however it runs short, so tall girls beware as I spent a portion of the night making sure it wasn't riding up. That being said, the dress is beautiful. I wish I had a picture of the back to show how pretty the whole look is.
Can wear a little bigger (like I did) and go for the baggy look and it is super cute.

I wore this to my husband's company Christmas party. My backup size was the 6R, which I could've worn as well. I went with the 4R because it had less excess fabric and ruching, therefore more flattering. It was on the long side, I wore 4 inch heels. Received lots of compliments! My husband said I needed to buy the dress because it was timeless and he liked how it hugged my butt :) My only slight complaint was the lining across the neckline wanted to creep up. I used fashion tape but that didn't work well. It was Black lining so it just looked like it was part of the design. I would definitely rent this dress again. 4th time using RTR and I have been very happy each time!

Not a very flattering dress for my body type, which was hard to tell until I received it and tried it on.  I have a rather wide rib-cage, so the fitted waist was pretty tight across the bottom of my ribs, not uncomfortable but just didn't look right.  Also it was a little bit too long for me, even with the regular length, so I had to wear higher heels than I had planned.  I'm 5' 4.75'' and probably needed 3 in heels.  [Color is really emerald, not exactly like in my picture but more like the models picture.]  But service was GREAT, it arrived right on my door step on the day before the event, and all I had to do was drop it off at the UPS store next door to my office on Monday.  Super easy.  Will definitely try again with a different type of dress.
it was tight in the bust for me but still looked great!

The fit was snug but very comfortable. I'm typically a medium but the large was perfect. I did not wear a bra with this and it was find. The low v-neck meant that a normal v-neck was not possible. I'm short and the length hit a couple inches above the knee. Perfect for me.
Perfect dress for a wedding reception or rehearsal dinner. Hit a little lower than I expected (just below the knee instead of above), but it looked perfectly elegant with a pair of nude heels.

Very comfortable fabric and fit. I wanted to show the dress from the front and back. Also, wanted to share the color of the dress both indoor and outdoor. Beautiful color! Loved both slits in the front of the dress. Love the lace and the details in the back side. I would definitely recommend this dress. I am not very comfortable with my body shape/size right now so this was definitely a great dress that helped give me confidence. You know how it goes...be comfortable and confident in what you wear and it will show. Enjoy the dress!
loved!

I was a little worried about the fit because it runs small, but it was great! I typically wear a 4/6 and went with the 6 on this one. The fabric is thick and sucks you in. Perfect for bodies that are smaller on top with bigger hips. Wore this to a New Year's party and it was very comfortable!

Flattering, classy sparkly dress.  If anything, runs a little bit big.  Although it's low-cut, it didn't show too much cleavage - perfect for a fancy work event.  Was a little bit long on me (I'm 5'4") compared to the model.  Rouching material at the waist makes it very flattering.  I've rented quite a few RTR dresses now, and although this wasn't my favorite, it was a very pretty dress.

I really liked this dress.  It was not my favorite RtR, but it fit well and wore nicely throughout the night.  The material is thick and I didn't have any issues with the dress riding up while dancing.  There was not that much difference in size between the 2 and the 4. It looks very similar to the picture and the color is great.
Absolutely wonderful.  Classic and perfect for so many occasions.
This dress was so fab, I can't say enough good about it!  The peplum helps accentuate curves and the color is gorg.
I am 5"10" and could not wear the 4L even with flats - way too short.
This romper is amazing and so so flattering - I got so many compliments! I was debating between a size 2 and 4 but the 4 was perfect - the 2 would have been too tight at the waist.
This dress was so comfortable! Perfect for dancing all night long! Loved the royal blue color and the lace insets.
It was snug around the waist and top for a tailored fit.

I normally wear a small, but sized down to the extra small for this skirt, since the waist is elastic and stretchy. It's super comfortable and can be dressed up or down. The top layer is tulle, with a lace layer underneath. I'm short, so it was long on me...more like a midi skirt about halfway down my calves, but overall I loved it and would definitely rent again!

This dress is AMAZING!!!!  Couldn't stop getting compliments all night.  The cute and fabric are forgiving and flattering.  If you are short, the petite size just brushed the floor...great legnth.  I was worried about the color because some of the customer pictures make it look funky, but it is a beautiful emerald green.  Truly stunning!!!!  The style covers any problem areas and is SO FLATTERING.  As a busty girl, I get nervous wearing strapless but everything stayed in place and my girls actually looked amazing (you don't know me, but that was a huge win!). Also, super comfortable to wear.  I could wear it for hours, eat, dance...and it stayed it beautiful self.  Perfect for a formal event.

Felt great in this dress. The waist hit perfectly where I did not have to wear spanx and felt tiny all night.  I am 5'6 and wore flats and it just hit the floor. I wore tape on the inside and no bra and everything stayed in place, recomend to someone small chested. I at first looked past this dress but was so happy I tried on. WOULD DEFFFFF recomend!

I rented this dress as a back-up for a military event.  The dress was absolutely beautiful, but I ended up choosing the other dress because the zipper on this was very difficult to zip due to the fabric and ruching.  I was going to be getting ready on my own and didn't know if my date would be able to actually manage the zipper on his own... when I tried it on, it took me, my sister, and my mom to get it zipped (even though the size was perfect).

I wore this to a wedding in DC at the end of August and was very comfortable. I usually wear a 4 or 6 depending on the designer. I ended up fitting perfectly into the 6. Looked amazing with nude strappy heels. Bonus: There are full sized pockets. I was able to carry my phone around with me at the wedding and snap some pictures which was great. Only con I can think of is that I had to undo the hook and eye closure and zipper and then completely undress to use the bathroom. But it wasn't a big issue for me.

I loved the silhouette of this dress. I am very curvy -- 40 x 31 x 44.The dress skimmed over my hips and accentuated my waist beautifully. I just wish there was a bit more room in the bust, the waist of the 10 would have fit me even better.  I wear a 34G (UK sizing) - I wish RTR would have more options for bra size! The only thing I disliked about the design was the high neckline, which really accentuated my bust in an unnecessary and matronly way. I knew this was going to be an issue before I ordered it, but wanted it anyway because the design is so great. I wore a chunky necklace to distract from this. The quality of the dress and the beautiful fabric is just fabulous. I didn't want to take it off! Thank you, Rent the Runway!

I started looking for my prom dress a week before the prom. I didn't know what kind of dress I wanted but I knew that I didn't want an uncomfortable dress or strapless dress that I would have to be caring about the whole night. I do like prom dresses and this one was pretty comfy and nice. I received complements the whole night.

I wore this to a friend's wedding in Key West, FL at 28 weeks pregnant. The medium fit perfectly, gave me enough room for the belly because it did stretch a bit. Loved the length and the simple top. Made me look small which I loved!
Curve-hugging and very chic
The fabric is thicker which makes it feel like a truly well made dress. It's comfortable and great for a small waist.

very flattering. hits at the right place about the knee on an A-line and my ample chest was not bulging out of this dress in any way. the color is spectacular and it was comfortable. in my top three favorites I have every rented from here.

The minute I put this on- the compliments started flying! I wore this romper to a rehearsal dinner, then out for some drinks afterwards. I kept it casual with flats, but the lace is so pretty that it could easily be made more formal/fancy with the right accessories and heels. I felt really pretty and fun in this all night. My one complaint would be that it is a little tight in the bust and waist area. I saw a few reviews saying that it was too short, but I am 5'8" and I did not find it to be too short, but when it comes to rompers in general, I think it all depends on where your height is distributed, I have longer legs but a short torso. I would absolutely rent this romper again though, so cute!

The color was absolutely stunning, the fabric was beautiful, and the fit was great. I'm 5'4" and was able to wear flats with the regular length - it did brush the floor a bit but it definitely wasn't dragging. It was extremely flattering for someone like me who is not super tiny. I agree with other reviewers - the zipper was EXTREMELY difficult to zip up. It was a bit snug on the top, but I have a full chest so that's probably why, but it was by no means too tight or uncomfortable. All said and done, I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat and would recommend it to anyone else.

Definitely get one size up because it does ride up like everyone says, which wasn't too problematic. Overall I loved wearing this dress so much, I may have to rent it again for another event. The colors and back were absolute show stealers.

This dress flows so nicely and there is a slit in the front that perfectly opens up when you walk.  But when you're standing you don't see it, which is nice.  Received many compliments!  Something to note: if you're under 5'5"-5'7" you should order the petite.  The regular is VERY long.  I'm 5'3" and wore 5" heels that had a 1.5" platform and the 4R dress was still so long.  Thankfully I ordered the 6P and it just perfectly grazed the floor.  Definitely recommend!
I didn't wear this one, it was my second choice.  The zipper was getting stuck so I didn't want to chance it.

I am a standard size 6. Ordered a size 6 and a size 4 as my back up. Went with the 4 due to the "bunching up" around the torso of the size 6. The material is stretchy so the 4 fit perfectly. The fabric is comfortable, not scratchy at all. As all the other reviews stated you will need help with the zipper but who doesn't need help zipping up? It was a bit long for me even with a 4'" heel but I had ordered the hemming tape to adjust the dress just in case. I suggest you do the same and if you don't use it for the dress its a great item to have anyways!! The train was a lovely addition not too long but long enough to say "vavoom"!! Just Loved the dress and got compliments all night!!
Fit perfectly. Comfortable and had pockets, too! Colors are less bright than the photo; it's more navy and maroon than red and blue.

Loved this dress! I got it for my husband's work Christmas party and I'm so glad I did. I rented the S and M and ended up going with the M as it was just more comfortable. The only issue with the M was that it was a tiny bit big in the chest where the S was not. I got so many compliments on this dress all night. The length was perfect for me and would have been amazing with heels but it was snowing the night I wore it. I wore a sticky bra but really didn't need to, the material is super thick. You definitely can't wear a regular bra with it but could totally do an extender. The only thing to make note of is that the arms are a bit tight so be aware of that. It's also very thick and would not work for anywhere remotely warm.

I LOVED this dress. I wore it twice in one weekend, to a swanky dinner and then to dim sum and the movies. The dress is perfect for curvy women - v-neck, can wear with regular bra (although I went without - there was plenty of support), flared at the waist, and with POCKETS. My husband loved it, and I got several compliments. You may be able to size down for a backup. This is definitely one of my favorite RTR dresses, and that's saying a lot!

The dress is best for smaller busts. It is figure flattering and no need for Spanx as the bodice fits closely. I wish I had not gotten the long version as the long version is REALLY long. But it is comfortable, easy to wear and ultra-chic. Highly recommended.
I rented this for work, through my Unlimited subscription. It is such a fun blouse. I've actually worn it three times. It is both classy and fun.

We rented this dress for a styled bridal shoot and it worked great! The 8L and 10R were virtually the same size and, while the dress was a little tight in the bust, it bunched a bit in the back which surprised me. Overall, it was a wonderful, easy experience and we will definitely be using Rent The Runway again. Thanks so much!

This is very fitted at the waist (my waist is about 25 inches) and fit comfortably across chest and shoulders. Skirt was very flowy and comfortable. This just brushed the floor when I worse 2-inch heels so a good length.  This was not my original order (which was the same dress in red-- Ruby Red Gala Gown) but was shipped to me overnight and it was actually even better I think! The pink  was beautiful and has notes of purple and I got lots of compliments!

I rented this dress for a 2nd time because I love it BUT it was very stinky this last time! I opened the package a few hours before I was going to wear it out to my birthday dinner but it smelled terrible!! I fabreeezed it and wore it out but had to come home and change....
I almost passed on this dress because it didn't come in the long length, but tall gals- hooray for us, this will be long enough! Flattering fit and if you are feeling fat- this is perfect!
N/A

This dress made me feel so glamorous. It was flowy in all the right places, and I felt like it was flattering on my not so flat stomach. The straps were thick enough that I could wear a regular bra with a little double stick tape just in case. I ended up wearing the smaller size, mostly because the 10L was a little too long for me (I'm 5'6" and wore 5 inch heels).
The dress was the perfect size, the perfect length for my 3 in heels and I am 5'10"! Everything about this dress and process was amazingly wonderful!!
Love the simplicity of this dress..  easy to wear, great slim fit. It arrived a little wrinkled however... definitely needed an iron :(
I got a lot of compliments on this dress. I usually wear a size 4, but this dress fit best in a size 2. It was formal enough for a wedding, but comfortable and elegant. I highly recommend this!

I absolutely LOVED this gown!  It was the perfect blend of comfortable and sexy.  My event was at the end of February so the dress was perfect for a formal event in cold weather. The dress fit pretty true to size and hugged all the right places. Just a tip, there is this extra piece of fabric on the left hip that I didn't really understand. It didn't affect how I felt about the dress at all, but I never really saw it in any of the pictures. One of my favorite things about this gown is that it can either be dressed up with a statement necklace or left alone with simple earrings and strappy shoes. I'm not much of a jewelry person so I loved that I didn't have to worry about it. I'd definitely recommend this gown! It's stunning and received a ton of compliments!!

I LOVE this dress. If I could purchase it, I would. It's so comfortable, the fit was great, and it was so flattering.  I lost count as to how many compliments on the dress I received. It was perfect for the summer wedding. I read some reviews about it being too short but for my 5'1" frame, the length was perfect! I would rent this again & recommend it to others! This was my first RTR experience but definitely won't be my last!!

I'm usually a 0-2, but based on reviews I ordered 0R and 0P was backup just because I was worried about length of 0R. The 0P fit perfectly and length was perfect with 3.5 inch heels. the chest was a little bit big, but easily fixed with the right bra. Got compliments all night would definitely recommend for a formal event. Wore with the Kate Spade special occasions necklace and it matched perfectly.
Very slimming and comfortable! Loved it! It is a little long! So beware!
Although I could zip it up, I really needed a size up so I wore my other dress instead, but this is one I will rent again.  It looks exactly like the model and is very flattering.
This was great! I'm short, and the height was fine with heels. The color was so fun for a beach trip, I got so many compliments on it!

I wore the 2.  The zero would've been very small!  This dress looks much more black than in the photo.  It was comfortable and classy, though.  Just enough sparkle.  Not a head turner, but i felt nice wearing it.

This cute pleated dress is perfect for work or brunch! It runs true to size, but recommend going up a size for backup. This dress does not have much stretch and is fitted at the bust, best for A to C cup sizes (can be worn with a standard bra). Due to the heavier material it has no stretch and is very fitted at the natural waist and throughout the midsection. At 4'11", it hit right above my knee. Throw on a pair black shoes and you are good to go!

This dress was extremely comfortable, and I LOVED the pockets! I rented this for my birthday celebration, which was at a very casual wine bar, and it was perfect for the occassion. It was definitely not as coral as the picture makes it look, but wasn't necessarily highlighter pink - it was a happy medium. The slits at the top were not too much, and I was able to wear a regular nude bra, and you couldn't tell. I wore the same kind of shoes as shown in the picture, but you could easily pair it with wedges, or even flats, and it would work great for a wedding, party, anything! Would definitely rent again, or even buy.
It fit to snug on my hips and loose on top. I would not recommend for hippy girls. It was kind of form fitting in a weird way. Would look best on tall and slender IMO.

Loved the dress once I got the right size. originally ordered a 4 and 6... the 6 had no chance of zipping over my chest, and the regular length was above my ankles. Do not get a regular unless you are 5'3 TOPS.  The 8L fit perfectly (although there was some underboob action, it wasn't really visible).  It was really simple and elegant.  I wouldn't recommend it for anyone above a C/D bra cup, and I recommend going at least a size up unless you are an A cup. Sizing issues aside, it was an awesome dress.
Absolutely loved the dress, kept getting compliments all night. It fits very well and although it is tight, it holds everything in.

I saw some other people describing the dress as small, but this thing was RIDICULOUS. I ordered an 8, and I can normally wear a 6 or an 8 depending on the hips, but this one I couldn't even get my arms all the way through. Let's say I'm a standard 8, I'd venture the guess the "8" I rented would fit a size 2 or 0. It was super disappointing as this was the dress I wanted to wear for my birthday and ending up wearing an adidas tee shirt instead.

Fits well as the top is stretchy.  I put a black short blazer over it to wear it to work and that made it work nicely otherwise it would be a little unfinished.  The blue skirt is pretty striking and at 5'10", I could pull it off but it would be a little overbearing for someone who is 5'2" or 5'3".  The skirt fabric is very luxurious.

I wore this for dress for my bridal shower. The 2 was a little more snug on top than the 4, but I went ahead with the 2 since it fit much better at my waist.  The dress was very nice quality and made my waist look amazing.  I received a bunch of compliments on the dress!  It was my first time doing RTR, but because it was so easy to rent and return, I have already ordered another dress for a wedding I am going to.  :)

Based on other reviews, I ordered this for a work event and it did not disappoint.  The fit was snug on my bottom with the 8, so I went with the 10 because it was a work event, and I wanted to be less fitted around my behind.  I got lots of compliments and wore it with purple pumps.  The pockets were a great feature because I could keep my phone and business cards handy.

I wore this while vacationing in FL.  It was a perfect balance of the winter season but appropriate for dining by the beach.  I loved the print and added a splash of color by pairing it with a chunky blue necklace.

Love this dress.  I've worn Elizabeth & James before and know that they run a little tight, I'm normally a size 4 - so I got the 6 and it was perfect.  The material is thick and holds it shape nicely.  I wore a regular racerback bra with this dress and it was perfect.  Very happy with this!

I was sent this dress as a substitute because the dress I originally chose was not available.  This dress was fine and I did feel pretty in it, but it was just kind of boring. It is partially backless so you need to wear a backless bra (or no bra, potentially) with it. It's also kind of heavy  but that didn't bother me.  I think this is a good choice if you don't want to spend a lot of money but want to look glamorous, and I will say that I've gained some weight and this dress made me feel like I looked thin. I wore it with hot pink heels which jazzed it up a bit. I'm tall and this was a good length, I think it hit me just above my knee. So overall, nice dress but not a showstopper.

Dress was great. More comfortable (and not as constricting) as I envisioned. I felt like a disco ball! Would rent it again. The only thing was the stitching at the top was coming off - I used fashion tape to make it work best. Went braless and used tape too, just in case! Wore with black heels and studs.

Fit was a little small. I'm normally around a 6 but wore an 8. The dress fit beautifully though and was great for a wedding. Just a warning, I went to a summer wedding and it was pretty hot out. So if you sweat like me, you might sweat through the dress. Overall, incredibly happy with the decision.
The dress was great - waist detail runs a little tight compared to the bust area - but overall very comfortable and a wonderful dress!

This dress ran small. I ended up wearing no bra. I had no issue with the neckline. Arms fit fine and I have large size arms 11 “.  The medium just fit. You’ll need someone to zip you in! Pretty dress. Was fun for date night. I’m 5’8” 140, 38-28-37

I ordered the small and extra small, and had to go with XS because this ran huge. Even the XS fit baggy and not fitted - but slim enough where it was okay. I actually loved the dress, after I got over wondering if it looked like a potato sack. It was perfect for a work formal event, where I wanted to be less revealing, and the asymmetrical hem made it really stylish. I wore strappy black heels to dress it up and a big gold necklace.
It fit perfectly.
I'm petite (5'2") and with 4" heels the 2R was almost too long. But stunning. I received rave complements all evening. I'd happily own this dress to wear it again!

PROS: No one else had anything like it on.
CON: Like all the other reviews have stated, the top is big.

This dress was perfect for the vineyard wedding we attended.  Bright and colorful.  I added a gold plated belt to give it a little "umpf." (got it from jaideclothing.com, in case someone asks).  Other guests loved my look.  I received a number of compliments and I felt very confident.  I was kind of prepared for the peril of the big top after reading ALL previous reviews on this dress.  It did come with fashion tape, which I used all of it and a safety pin or two helped. I am a 34D so the top was not extremely baggy like some reviews, it just needed some tweaking so that I wouldn't flash other guests.  I wore a strapless bra, which in hindsight wish I had gotten a deep plunge bra with straps.  Just a preference...why wear strapless when I didn't have to?  I'm 5'6", the 4L was perfect. I've been wearing a 6 lately in my work clothes so I ordered a 6L as an alternate but the 4 was perfect. The band around the waist is not stretchy, so when zipping the back, that is the area where you need to tug a bit to get the zipper the rest of the way up. I wore 3.5 inch heels and the bottom swept the floor nicely.
Also rented the Alex Bittar Serpentine Cuff and the Lilly Pulitzer Elephant Clutch.  LOVED BOTH.
Also, I live in Louisiana but the event was in Virginia.  Given the 4 day rental window, I had the items shipped to my parents' house in VA, it arrived on Thursday as expected. Since mail doesn't run on Sunday, I shipped it out on Monday when I got back to La.  Easy peasy. My first time using RTR.  I will most DEFINITELY be back.  Mardi Gras season will be rolling around soon enough....so happy RTR exists!!!

Didn't end up wearing as I went with a more formal dress for my occasion, but it was a nice simple choice and fit well. Hit my knees (I'm 5'8'') and was a little revealing but luckily I am 36A so not too much on me. Bright color would be great for a spring/summer wedding.

Fit perfectly, true to size. I got the long and wore flats, it touched the floor but wearing wedges made the dress too short.  The color is beautiful and gives you lots of options to match jewelry and accessories! I received multiple compliments throughout the evening, great dress and won't be the last time I use Rent the Runway again, great experience!

The 4R (my normal size) fit like a glove, however, it was EXTREMELY SHORT!  I'm only 5'4 so the fact that it was at my ankles was shocking and there was no way I could wear heels.  It was rather disappointing.   Fortunately, I got the 6 as a backup and good thing, it was slightly longer, at least enough for heels but it was loose--fine enough.  The dress was beautiful but I noticed there was a bit of wear on it. The details on the dress were coming up and had a lot of frayed white tips.  On a black/gold dress it was noticeable up close.  It was beautiful, comfortable and simplistic but had some noticeable miles on it.

I have broader shoulders, so the 10 fit perfectly. The dress is such a pretty pink, and everyone loved the shoulder sparkles! Only complaint is that I wish it had pockets. Otherwise, would definitely recommend, and I was sad to return it!

I have worn this sweater numerous times since renting. It is very versatile and I have worn it casually with jeans and flats/flat boots and as a going out piece with black leather pants and heels. You can't wear a bra unless you want it to show in the back but the material is thick enough (at least for me) where the lack of a bra hasn't been an issue. If you aren't comfortable without some coverage then use a sticky bra!
the zippers make this special - I felt good wearing it with jeans.  something different

Really beautiful dress. I ordered 2 sizes and definitely needed the smaller size. It fits great and is incredibly flattering without being scandalous. The wider shoulder straps also add to the elegance of the gown. VERY SEQUINY though, not generally my thing but it is very beautiful...definitely a more 1920's kind of gown!

Thank God they didn't have my regular size and I took a chance with the size 6 because it fit perfectly. I wore this for three days straight and got so many compliments. The material is light but very beautiful. The detail is amazing. I'm definitely going to rent it again.
Felt great in this dress all night! Great for someone with a large chest. Could easily wear a bra with it too!

I thought the dress ran a little large - I am usually between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 was almost too large. Like others have said, the neoprene fabric is really fun and does not wrinkle! A small thing is the waistband is kind of itchy so I ended up wearing spanx as a protective layer. Overall, a GREAT dress.
The material is very nice which you don't always get with faux fur. The arms were long enough, even in a size medium!
beautiful dress with bright lovely colors perfect for pale skin.

The dress was very elegant and the color was  beautiful. It was kind of big on the top if you are small chested. So I would've like to see how a size 2 would have fit on me. But I  received so many compliments and would differently recommend this dress to a friend.

This dress was perfect! I was a little scared that a backup size was not available but the size 14 fit great.  I have pretty large hips so I'm always scared of that, but it was great and felt very comfy.  I got lots of complements on the lace!
Aside from the too-tiny buttons that were difficult to button, the jumpsuit was perfect and comfortable to were to a party. The fit in the armpit area "winged-out" a little, but still looked okay.

This dress was really cute and different from anything I've ever tried. Wore it with black tights for a night out with friends. No bra necessary, which was nice. I usually go with a 4/6 but really glad I sized up. I ended up wearing an 8 and it was still a little snug. If you have hips and thighs, size up for sure. I expected the fit to be a little off because of my height so the sleeves were a little long and the belt fell a little lower than waist level. Not my favorite rental but was not a total disappointment.

I had a laid back birthday party - outdoor dinner at a local pub. This dress was a great fit. I thought b/c of the shape of the dress I might need the small for width in the hips. But the extra small fit much better. The only thing I would have wanted changed was where the waist hit. It was a bit low compared to my natural waist. So the tie wasn't lined up with that seam. Super nit-picky, I know.
LOVED this dress!  Gorgeous color - I wore in the winter with over the knee boots and a leather jacket, but could easily be seasonless.  It def runs big.  I would suggest sizing down a size.
The top ran big so I had to pin it but the rest of the dress fit amazing! It hugged all my curves. The color of the dress and my skin tone POPPED!!!

Absolutely loved this dress! My husband could not saying how beautiful I looked! I typically wear a size 8, so that's what I ordered and it fit perfect. If you have more of a muscular build the arms will be a little snug but not unbearable.
Loved the dress and got so many compliments! Dress was definitely true to size and fit like a glove. The heavy material made it perfect for dancing. I would highly recommend!

This dress is perfect for the curvy girl. It hugs in all the right places, and is very flattering for girls (like me) with bigger thighs/butt, and chest. There is definitely room to go down a size if yoked wanting to look extra snatched, but the large worked perfectly for me. It was super comfortable, and I was able to dance all night without the dress riding up. Love this Badgley Mischka dress!

Super cozy and kept me warm while everyone else looked like they were freezing!  I wore with high-heeled, brown leather boots, which definitely completed the look, while also keeping me warm while walking home through a Chicago snowstorm!  Perfect way to celebrate the holiday!
Dress fit well - a little tight, but nothing too terrible. My bust was a little too much for this dress, but over all, lovely dress.
No give because of the material, so I went with the larger size.  Color and back are really special! Got lots of compliments!

I loved this dress. It was very flattering and classy. However it was VERY short. I actually had to put my jacket in my lap just to feel a little more covered. Maybe this was because I belted it? But it's definitely more flattering with a belt if you have hips larger than your top. Definitely order a size up. I'm normally a size 4 (34-26-38) but I ended up wearing a 6. Overall, a great dress.

The dress was stunning!  Very comfortable to sit and dance in, lots of stretch.  I felt like a million bucks and received lots of compliments.  I have a hard body type to dress but this dress was the perfect fit.  The dress is more of a rose gold than a yellow gold.  I suggest going with a nude shoe.  Very glamorous!

This dress fit me like a glove, is true to size, and the length was perfect for my petite frame. I liked how lightweight it was too. I love Nicole Miller dresses, and will definitely look to her again in the future. I didn't use my size 6 back-up, but it was a good choice since the 2 would have been too small. This was my first time with RTR and it was a success, so I'll be back.

I usually wear a size 4, but I read the reviews and went with the size 6, and it fit perfectly. I am 5'7" and I have more of an hourglass shape, so this dress was amazing; it hugged all the right places and I received so many compliments all day. This was great for a fall wedding.
Right around the arms, loose around the waist. Not comfortable for sitting

This dress originally was ordered in a six, and my backup was an 8. I was notified right away that the 8 was either damaged, or had been returned too late, and RTR would send me an alternative, but if I didn't like it, I could choose ANOTHER dress up to twice the value of the dress I originally ordered that would be overnighted to me for free. Their systems messed up in the end, and I ended up with two size 6 in this dress, an 8 in this dress, and 3 other dresses! This dress is amazing. It has pockets, it's comfortable, the skirt is very feminine, and it was perfect for my event. The only slight issue is the fabric is a little thin in front, and due to the scrappy back, I wore a sticky bra instead of a normal one, so that the straps didn't show. It worked out great!

I couldn't love this dress more and it was perfect for my brother-in-law's winter wedding. Pockets. Perfect tea length. Gorgeous colors. Fits true to size. Fabric and detail are even more gorgeous in person. I didn't mind this, however, if you're very uncomfortable with a low-cut front, this isn't a good option. While it was lower cut than I would wear on a normal day, it was still entirely classy and sophisticated.

Beautiful dress, but runs short! At 5'5", a regular length ended up being just about an inch too short for me to wear with low heels. The 2 generally fit well, although it was a bit large in the bust if you are on the small end. There was also more of a prominent mermaid shape to the dress than I was expecting. The dress I received also had issues with the hem hanging below the overlay in the front, possibly due to a tear. In the end, I didn't wear the dress to my event due to the length issue (there was no long available for the night I needed), but would have loved to had the length not been an issue.

This was my frat RTR experience and it was so easy and definitely worth it. I got so many compliments on this dress. I probably could have even gone with a size smaller but the 6 fit well. Great for girls with bigger butts ;)
This dress runs small - I probably should've gone one size up.  It is short and tight!  But the color is awesome and it was fun to wear!  It is thick so would be perfect for fall/winter weather!

I rented this dress for a black tie award ceremony two months after having my son. Since my bust is a couple sizes larger than my waist, I had to size up, but the dress didn't look too big. The dress was very flattering and I loved that I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress. Once again, I'm very pleased with RTR.

Stretchy material that looks flattering, as the material is also a bit thick. However, it is not a thick, woven fabric, but seems to have foam inside, which makes it more suitable as a warm-weather dress despite its appearance.
No cons. This dress is even more beautiful in person.
LOVED this dress.  But if you don't like attention...don't rent it.  Fortunately for me I don't mind it at :)

Unfortunately I rented this dress too late and only was able to order the bigger size. I'm normally between a 8-10 and the 10 was only available. As I desperately needed a dress I took a shot and it still looked great! It was slightly big but not obviously so. I was comfortable all night through dinner and dancing and got so many complements on the color!!! I even ran into a girl with the exact same dress which we immediately bonded over renting. I will probably not rent this dress again, but it was a great experience nonetheless.

Very cute easy to wear dress, but be sure to size down on this one! I read the reviews prior to renting & am very glad I did! I usually wear a 4 but ordered a 2 & 0 because of the reviews & the 0 ended up being the best fit. Beautiful party dress!

All of my sisters wore this for a wedding. We all have different body types, and the dress made EVERYONE look great. One sister is tall athletic, one is short and thin/straight & narrow (neither of them have much bust), and my older sister is curvy with a large busy.  The ruffles on this dress hid the wrong curves and hugged the right ones. It made both the athletic and thin sister look a little more curvy/busty, and the curvy/busty sister look a little more thin/refined. They all looked absolutely amazing. Awesome dress.
The dress fit nicely, true to size.  It was a lovely shade of navy, and the back detail made it unique.

Although I wore it with jeans, I kind of felt like a princess in this top. The way the sleeves fall and fly while you move give off a type of princess elegance. The top runs true to size but maybe size up if you have broader shoulders. Because it's off the shoulder, the neckline can be kind of fussy, sometimes riding up. This can also be worn for a more formal or professional look, pairing it with a nice skirt or pants.
Looks even better than the pictures, but definitely more of a rose gold in person. Very fun and flattering dress!

This dress was the perfect length and fit great up top. The dress hits the waist at the most flattering spot as well. I wore this for a formal gala and had fun in it all night. Really comfortable! I wore a stick on bra since the back is criss crossed. I'd definitely rent it again.

-First rental from RTR! This was a safe gamble since I had other dresses I could wear for my event. 
-I never even tried on the 6 because the 4 fit well, in spite of my full hips/thighs. I credit this to the fuller cut of the skirt. 
-The dress arrived in excellent condition and the lace is very beautiful. The dress is versatile for a host of events. 
-Most friends raved over the pockets and when I told them about RTR, they looked it up on their iphones then and there.
-Other renters have commented about the dress' shortness. On a petite person, it was a great length but it does ride high when seated, as renters have reported. I had a pashmina with me and draped it across my lap during the meal so nothing showed.
-I admit, I was sad to pack it up for return this morning but am excited to rent another dress for an occasion next month.
Flattering fit, just the right length with a 2 inch heel (I ordered the petite). I received compliments all night and continue to do get compliments when people see photos!
