The bottom half fit a little too loose which was weird since I have hips. But it looked great overall
really loved this dress. my husband always tells me to rent something else like this one for every even we attend!

I loved this dress.  I carry most of my weight in my gut but with this dress and one pair of Spanx, I was just fine.  This dress is extremely comfortable.  I was able to wear a regular bra without any issues.  The 12R fit fine but it was just too tight in the belly for me.  The dress fits loose in the shoulders and arms.  The only problem I had was the folded bits of fabric around the seem in the back of the dress.  This part like to pop out (where the tag is) and the wife had to keep tucking this back under.  This dress gives you an awesome mermaid/va-va-voom shape even if you weren't born with it.  Thick fabric - perfect for Fall & Winter.  Formal enough for a black tie event.
Did not wear it.  Size was true but too glitzy for me & it turned out that many guests were changing for the evening reception to long gowns. So I opted for a long evening dress I had.

I rented this for a birthday dinner at a rooftop restaurant. The material is super comfy and the pattern is fun and unique. The chest area can be a little snug, so I'd recommend going a size up for your back up vs a size down. I had fun wearing it and would highly recommend it!

This wasn't my first choice....but my first choice was unavailable, so I went with this one.  I'm glad I did!  I had strangers walk up to me and tell me that my dress was stunning.  This runs true to size to slightly large.  If you are above 5-7, you need to get the long.  The way this dress hangs and flows on your body is so flattering.  You just can't tell from the pictures.  It's awesome and if you're considering this even as your 2nd choice, you will not be disappointed.  Oh, and get the "mystery bling"  I am very glad I did...the earrings they sent me were AMAZING with this dress!  Perfect look, perfect night.

The dress was an amazing color and looked absolutely stunning. I felt so beautiful and I could dance in it all night which was great. I wanted a dress that covered the "pooch" area and this dress definitely did! I read in other reviews that the dress was very long and I am not really tall or that short so I didn't know whether to order a regular or a petite. I order both the 6R and the 6R. The 6P was the perfect fit! The 6R was way too long but the 6P was the perfect and I wore 4 inch heels and it was probably 1/2 of an inch off the ground, perfect for dancing. Online, you can't order a 6P and a 6R but I called and they let me order both. They were so nice! The entire system was so easy. I had the dress in my hands two days after I placed the order and returning was a breeze. I highly recommend it!!
I wore this to knock around on a Sunday afternoon and loved it. Such an easy piece for hanging out while not being too casual.
I rented this skirt for engagement photos and LOVED it!  I will definitely be renting it again!

It fit perfectly from the waist down, but was a little loose in the shoulder and chest area. The lining in the chest kept creeping up, so I had to adjust it frequently. The long was perfect for my height- 5'8" when wearing heels.
This was just the piece needed to add to my formal E-shoot. Both my photographer & fiancee loved the outfit.

I got a VIP invite at the last minute with only days to prepare for the Official Inaugural Ball for President Barack Obama's Official Inaugural Ball! I needed a FABULOUS dress QUICKLY & did not have time to shop appropriately to attend. RENT THE RUNWAY SAVED THE DAY! This AMAZING dress was perfect!!! Because it is slightly stretchy material it fit PERFECT like it was TAILORED for me! I loved the fact that it was a showstopper but was still modest with no cleavage showing nor a side split. I got compliments from celebs & politicians all night!! I am only 5'4" but the regular fit me fine but with platform 4 inch heels. It does run slightly short because normally a R gown would be WAY too long for me but this was perfect, even when I took my heels off it just barely grazed the ground. NOTE: You will need help with the zipper, there is no way you can zip it yourself...I mean I am really good when it comes to zippers but I am telling you...it's not possible. Lol! I was concerned if a 6 would fit because in fitted gowns I sometimes need an 8 or even a 10 because of my chest...but it was not too tight & fit perfectly. VERY flattering dress for most body types. :-) <3 <3 you will be the Belle of the Ball!

This dress was very flattering and stood out among the other dresses worn at the wedding. It was true to size, I decided to go with the larger (8) so it was a little loose while standing but provided  more room on the dance floor. This dress was somewhat restrictive while sitting down/dancing but overall I was happy with the outcome.  For reference, I am 5'8" 140 pounds and ordered a size 6 and 8.

I usually am an XS or a 0. I had to wear the small because it was so short. I could have worn the XS based on the arms and chest but it def was short. Loved it! Got lots of compliments and I stayed warm because it was an outside wedding. Maybe not an ideal dress if it would have been warmer.

This dress is amazing! Compliments all night and so comfortable to wear.  I am a 36DD but smaller in the hips and this fit the girls perfectly. I wore a strapless bra underneath and was comfortable all night. The length of the dress is classy but the slit is just enough to give it a little sex appeal. Will definitely rent again.

I wore this for my sons blessing and felt amazing! The color is more ivory then white. It is a thicker material so no worries about it being see through. It could be dressed up or more casual. Great dress!
The dress was a little bulky for my taste--it has a shape of its own, and that shape was too big/not super flattering on me.

I ended up wearing the 10 because it fit me more comfortably in the waist.  I'm rather straight (and not super small from chest to hips.  I loved the coverage of the dress, the fabric, and the pockets.  I got tons of compliments.  This dress was a win for me!

Quite possibly my favorite thing I've rented. This dress is a knockout, such a unique look, and MAN it made my figure look GOOD. Wore this to a casual block party with slip-on shoes and stood out in the best way. Could see this looking really cute with heels or wedges as well.

I love this dress and gave a lot of consideration to purchasing it.  The mesh detail in the bottom gives an otherwise plain black dress a little flair.  It was comfortable to wear, flattering without the need for shapewear, and perfectly appropriate for many occasions calling for cocktail attire.

Absolutely loved this dress! Received so many compliments and even a few random messages as to where I had gotten it! Reviews are correct that it runs a bit snug on top so I would order your usual and one size up ( I usually wear a 4 but chose the 6) - and long for tall gals! Otherwise so comfortable and elegant. Get it girl!
Fit was true to size and quite comfortable. I wore pretty high heels, which is a definite must for us shorties! The length was perfect with my heels, though. :)

Great new years dress! I'm 5'0 foot 116lbs , 34C and a medium fit nice. Large was too long and I think a small would have been too small for me. It hit midthigh so nice length, just wore tights bc it was cold out. Stretchy and comfy, but a little scratchy under armpits. Would wear again!
It is a challenge to zip... and a challenge to get it above breast - also stride is cut in 3/4 the slit isn't long enough
WONDERFUL!

I loved this dress! It was super elegant for a formal springtime evening wedding in NYC. I received a ton of compliments - a bonus at what was outright called a 'dress to impress' event. :) The material is a bit heavier than I was expecting but not so much so that it was wintery: it fell nicely and has good structure. The detail in the back is beautiful. I needed fashion tape to hold the front against my chest, and managed to wear this without a bra without looking too scandalous. Length-wise, it trailed a bit on the floor with 3" heels. The embroidery is coming apart a bit, so definitely be watchful of your jewelry vs. the fabric. Would recommend if you have a defined waist and a fuller chest (or are comfortable going bra-less/ with fashion tape).

I typically where a size 6/8 in most dresses, but Have consistently been a 10 in Elizabeth and James dresses. The length was perfect and the bright color was so fun. There's not a lot of wiggle room in the dress so it's definitely a much more fitted dress. Wore it to a summer wedding and received a ton of compliments.
Runs very large.  I normally wear a medium, but wished I'd gotten a small.
I'm glad that I read the previous reviews. The dress does run really small. I typically wear a 0 or a 2 but I had to wear a 4. It fit really well and I got compliments all evening. Great choice!

After reading all the reviews, I was sold and loved renting this as my first RTR dress! Everyone is right that the dress runs large, so take note ladies. Wore the XS, and it fit like a glove. I'm usually a small, or size 2-4. The dress is gorgeous and fun, but the sequins scratched the back of my legs and underneath my arms a bit. I also wished the back did not have the obvious black zipper line, and thought it takes a bit away from the overall look of the dress. Still, a fantastic choice for a bachelorette party, Vegas trip or anything requiring sparkles. Would highly recommend this dress!

This dress fit like a glove. AND it was perfect length. I am 5'11 flat footed and I wore 2.5 inch heels. It was perfect length. There is a trane which does get in the way a bit in crowds but its ok. Absolutely stunning. This was my first time to rent and I'll definitely be back!!
My 13th year old daughter used it for a neon yacht party.   The dress was a hit; she looked like a Barbie doll.   Not only is this dress elegant but short and sassy for someone of her age.

I wore this for a charity dinner. I loved the look of this dress. Full disclosure - Im 5'6 and it was SHORT. I pulled it down the entire night (but that is part of the look - Im just not used to wearing this quite so short so I was self conscious about it). The fabric is stiff and a bit thick so would probably be better for a winter or fall wear.
Great fit! Does run a touch big. usually wear an 18. Was able to wear the 16.

Gorgeous and sparkly dress!! Perfect for my bachelorette party. It was so comfortable (not itchy at all) and flattering. It's definitely low cut in the front; I ended up using a small safety pin to close it just slightly so I wouldn't feel over-exposed. I am normally size 14 in dresses, which is what I wore and it felt great; my backup was a 12 which was too tight on me (my MOH is modeling the backup dress in 2nd pic!).  Loved this dress and would definitely rent again!
Length was good for my height, 5'10".  I wasn't able to wear as it dug into my sides and created a roll. There is no stretch. The 6 was unavailable to ship.

This dress was perfect for the black tie optional benefit I attended. The dress worked for my larger bust and the body was very flattering. The material is thicker so although body-con it is still very flattering for those who still have a bit of a tummy- I wore spanx with mine just for added measure. The split at the leg helped this midi length not to shorten but elongate my length. Will definitely rent again for a wedding or formal event again.

The fit of the size 2 was great. I originally ordered the size 0. (I can fit in either a 0 or 2) Two days before the event, I was told that the size 0 was either damaged or not returned on time so RTR was unable to send me my first choice. They were nice enough to send me alternatives in case the size 2 wasn't right. It ended up working out just fine.

The dress is tight but the material does have some give. There is no zipper on this dress so you must step into or pull it over your head. I am a 34DD and no problem in the 40 while wearing a strapless bra. The color is fantastic- I got compliments all night

I loved this dress and so did my husband (and the lady at the table next to us). The fabric was thick and durable so some may not need spanx, but this mama did. The color is more garnet or burgundy than a true red, which I ended up liking more. I ended up wearing a 10, due to tightness in my chest and shoulders. The flare sleeve and ruffle hem were super fun and flirty, and the length was perfect, especially for someone who is self-conscious about her legs but wanted to look good for her baby daddy on his special day. I loved this dress and would rent it again!

Pros-great color, good length, fun dress
Cons-the back was lose I just used fashion tape to keep it down.

I absolutely love this dress! Everything about is exudes class, which was exactly the style I was going for. The bejeweled bodice is the right amount of modest without being completely covered. All night I was complimented on how the dress looked like it was made for me! It hugs in all of the right areas, hiding any trouble areas you may have. It was perfect for the professional pictures I had done on the beach and pier right before heading to my prom. Only small complaint I had was how they didn't offer the dress in 14L because the 14R was slightly short on me, especially with heels, but for prom it didn't matter anyways because every girl immediately takes off their shoes and dances for the whole night! RTR is possibly the best place for any special occasion as they are so helpful and have the best program. So disappointed I still don't have this beauty in my closet, but hopefully I will have a reason to rent it again!
The dress was TOO form fitting. It fit on the top, but was much too tight on my waist and thighs. I am usually a size 6 or 8 and should have ordered a large in this dress.
I am usually a small, but fit in the XS. The color popped, it held me in- sexy, but comfortable!

This dress was incredible! The material is thick and the dress is well constructed, so any midsection flaws are hidden. I've been a 6 in every RTR dress so far, but the 8 here was definitely the way to go. The arm/shoulder area as well as the midsection is tight so having a size up will definitely give you more wiggle room. I was so sad to return this and am already planning on renting it again for another occasion.
The dress is beautifully made and very flattering! I loved the length (since I am tall), the material was great, and I got compliments all night!

Great for big chested women with curves.  At the time I was 38DD, size 14, 5'3"&164 lbs.
Stretchy fabric and rouching at waist emphasize shape. Classy & sleek even for 54 year old.

The color of this dress was absolutely stunning. I really loved it. However, the fit was a little strange. The 2 was slightly too small in the hips but for perfect up too. I ended up wearing the 4 which then was a little big for my chest. Also, because I'm so short, the material bunched a little around my waist but adding a belt solved that. I wish it was a tad bit shorter on me but all in all I loved it!
For me this skirt hit lower on the waist than on the model which made it a bit longer so I was able to wear it to work

AMAZING coat!!  Incredibly warm!  Great color.   Clearly looked like a high quality coat and so trendy too!
Only con is that it is a heavy (weight) coat.  Luckily I needed to wear it and not carry it around.

Size: I'm usually a 4 or 6 in dresses, and the 6 was just right. I'm 5'10 and the 6L barely touched the floor with flats, so didn't wear the heels I'd planned (but ended up being more comfortable anyway!). 
Fabric/fit: No stretch to the fabric, but that said it's flattering to an hourglass figure (ie not too tight in the hips). Agree with the other reviewers that the neck clasp was a bit tight. 
Color: I found the color to be quite a bit more bright than I anticipated - would have preferred a paler pink to the neon barbie pink it ended up being.

This dress was extremely comfortable. It is not as big in the back as it appears on the model in the picture which i liked. It is a beautiful color. I paired it with a big gold hanging necklace and that was all it needed.

This dress made me feel confident, sexy, and glamorous! I received many compliments and a drunk stranger even told me I looked like a total fox. (Thanks, drunk guy!) I recommend this dress on the basis that it is GORGEOUS and exudes an air of class and elegance. And it has a cape!!!! All the beauty aside, it did take a lot to make this dress work. Here's what I have to say:
Color & Fabric: Stunning, true red; Thick luxe fabric with little stretch.
Length: Runs very long. I'm 5'3 and had to wear 5" platform heels. My husband did end up stepping on my cape a few times.
Fit: As others have described, the dress has an awkward fit: loose in the bust and tight in the hips. The 2R felt perfect around my midsection but the top sagged to the point where I kept having to push the shoulder up every few minutes. I also had to employ the use of a LOT of double sided tape and proper undergarments (ahem, Spanx). 
Bra worn: Strapless corset-type bra by Betsey Johnson. Purchased at Nordstrom and I fully recommend it! It lifted like a dream and was super comfortable to wear. A traditional strapless would work but I didn't feel it was flattering with how loose the dress is in the bust.
Other notes: Tape the hanger straps down into the dress. There's like a million of them and they love to peek out.

This dress is perfect for a wedding or other formal event. Warning: it runs SMALL! I normally wear size 2 in dresses and the medium fit perfectly. The buttons are a little tricky, but if you can enlist someone to help you get it on, it's fine. And worth it! I felt comfortable dancing and moving around, even though the thick material looks a little constricting. No bra necessary, as the strap material is thick and holds you in. This is probably my favorite dress I've ever worn - I loved it!

Ordered the 6,8 and ended up wearing 8 just so I would be able to sit down comfortably since it runs straight. Beautiful lace and pink color, but the neckline is really low, especially if you don't have a big chest. I had to use a low, plunge strapples and even then you could slightly see it.
I am 5'0 and the dress was a bit long so I wore 4'inch heels with it and it was fine.
I'm 5'7 and it was a bit above my knee-too long and too big. The print was loud.
Fits true to size and looks incredible!

This dress has the best color for a summer wedding! The electric blue really made me stand out. I wore the 2 and it was slightly big in the chest area (I am a 36B) but not terrible to the point where you are constantly pulling it up. I would definitely rent again!

I'm normally a 2 or 4 and should have gotten the 2. Still wore the 4 though because it was so easy to wear and accessorize - the print is is actually made up of hands holding flowers in nude and purple tones.  Overall fun shape and print when you need something casual and comfortable.
Fun flirty top,with interesting open underside of the arms. I'm 5'11 and it was definitely long enough. I got the 10 & 12 but the 12 fit so well I didn't even try on the 10.
I got so many compliments at work. The bell sleeves are so cute but can be a little long for someone who does not have the longest arms.

I rented this dress for a wedding and got a 2R and a 4R. I was worried it would be too long, but with 31/2 inch heels, the 4 fir great. The 2 was way too snug under the arms. This dress was comfortable and great to dance in! Loved it!
Long enough to wear flats with without dragging on the floor. Top has some ribbing on the sides which made the top a little snug. I am normally a 4-6 but went with the 6 because of the top.

I ordered this dress a little skeptical that it would work with my height and build but it worked perfectly. I 100% would suggest someone rent this dress, like the other reviews said, since it's lace there isn't much give but if you order the correct size it won't be uncomfortable or limiting. I didn't end up trying the 2 on but assume it would have been too large on top. It definitely felt true to size!

I really liked this dress. It fit my body type perfectly. I did add a black belt to help give me more of a waist, but the dress is already very elaborate that I didn't need much else. I was able to fit into the 0, but was worried I might rip the lace a little throughout the night so I decided to go with the 2 instead as it gave me more room to move around. I've seen some comments about the back of the dress, but it wasn't super low for me. I still went without a bra though it was easier and didn't worry about too much showing. As for the length, it hit right at my knees since I'm shorter than average, but looked nice with a pair of fancy heels. Highly recommend this dress!

Sizing: I can wear anywhere from a 10-16 depending on designer. I looked up the measurements for this designer and was between a 16 and 18 and ordered both sizes. The 16 was really quite large on me. I wanted to switch for the 12 and 14, but unfortunately they were out of stock and I had very little time before my events. Definitely size down.

Back: If you, like me, don't continue to scroll down through the pictures (I thought the main three photos were the only photos of the dress), you won't discover that the "W" sizes do NOT have the beautiful back cutout, which was the main reason I rented the dress. It was further misleading since RTR suggested I purchase the adhesive bra because of the cutout, and are now refusing to refund me for that. 

Pros: I did end up wearing the dress and, while I felt like it didn't fit great I did receive many compliments.

Loved this dress! Very comfortable, works with a strapless bra, and still shows off the back. I assume this runs a bit large, as I typically wear a small after having a baby, and the XS fit me with the Small being too big. I want to buy this dress!

Beautiful dress. Rented for a Gatsby-themed party. The dress was perfect - an homage to the theme without being a costume.  Dress has definitely been worn a few times. Had to cust some stray strings but otherwise was in good condition.
The color is absolutely amazing and the material/fabric is incredibly comfortable. Can't wear a bra though. I would purchase in a heartbeat.
Make sure the tie is included next time
Very nice fit, very comfy even though it does not look like it at first.

I cannot emphasize how fabulous this dress looks on a curvy, post baby body. People even asked if I'd lost weight!! (I mean...hopefully..) It's stretchy but also holds you in. I'm a size 10/12 and I'm wearing a 46 (US size 10). The boat neck is classy and the side ruffle is the perfect touch. My friend raves about Chiara Boni dresses and now I see why! It's expensive but absolutely worth the money. The color is a showstopper so wear it whenever you want to make a gorgeous confident impression.

It may have just been a bit big (I thought I might need the larger size rather than choosing the smaller size for my second dress) - and I should have gone for a smaller size, but the neckline flipped out a little bit- showing the white lining, but it was hardly noticeable.

It was a little large on me, but that may have been because I lost some weight recently. It's very comfortable and lightweight. I wore it to prom and danced in it all night, and it didn't smother me. Loved this dress! It made me feel beautiful and elegant.
Dress was long, but most are since I am pretty short. I had to wear very high heels to ensure I didn't trip over it
I usually wear size 4 (40) & although I said "runs small," perhaps it's better to say that it is form fitted. It looked terrific.
Wow!  This dress was adorable for a holiday brunch event.  I received so many compliments!  The pockets were a fun touch!

This is a lovely dress, and the color really pops.  Classic DVF wrap fit, I wore my usual 6 with a slip under.  I will say that the lace fabric seemed to accentuate imperfections - you could see my tights waistband easily even with a slip over.  If you are conscious about lumps or bumps around the tummy this may not be for you.

This dress is gorgeous!!  I rented it for my bridal shower.  I felt so beautiful and got tons of complements.  It is a very well made dress and just stunning in person!  The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because there is absolutely no room for flaws.  I normally bounce between a 0 and a 2, the 2 fit like a glove, but I definitely benefited from some Spanx to smooth everything out.

I rented this to wear to a wedding. I'm early in my second trimester of pregnancy. My pre-pregnancy size fit, although it was a tiny bit tight in the rib cage. I do not think this dress is overall bump-friendly, though, since the tight waist band goes too low for a pregnant belly. If I were much further along, it would not have fit. The biggest disappointment was the length, though. In a size 12R, the dress was about 3 inches too short for me at 5'8", even with flats. I would have gotten the long, but it wasn't available so I had to return this.
Perfect! low cut, very but it was the perfect fit!
Loved the dress,  but needed to wear spanx to be sure everything stayed in place

I am in love with this classy structured jumpsuit! It was the perfect length and although I fear some people might think the straps were a bit long, they were perfect for me. The material is thick enough that I didn't need to wear a bra (even though it's white) and unlike some jumpsuits, the pants didn't ride up or bunch in the front. I made sure to tan with St. Tropez and styled it with a middle part slick back ponytail and a red lip. This outfit was a true standout in a sea of dresses at my boyfriend's Fraternity Awards Show Party. Between him and I, we give it 4 thumbs up!
also a bit on the heavier side

Beautiful dress and came in perfect condition. Was really happy with the customer service and quality. 

The four fit me the best in they body, but the arms were way too tight (as other reviewers have noted). I felt as though I might rip the sleeves if I moved around to much so I opted for the six. 

While the six fit me best in the arms, it was loose in the body and chest, which I think made me look wider. Overall I got a lot of compliments and the dress photographed really well.
Usually I wear size small in dresses but for this dress I wore the extra small that fit perfect.

Loved the color of this dress- I knew the wedding color was "peach/coral" so I'd fit in with the color scheme without trying to look like I was a bridesmaid. Ordered a 2 and 4, and had to wear the 4 for length (I have a long torso and short legs, so it didn't LOOK short, but oh man... boyfriend aka best man and I made and set up cornhole at the venue, and the shorts I wore underneath were definitely necessary). I tucked the ribbons in the back because I felt ridiculous with a big ol' bow in the back. I have muscular arms but these were almost a little loose. Whole dress was actually on the loose side since I sized up... created a tummy in some photos, which I don't have... I didn't feel super confident but overall happy enough and would order again now that I understand how it fits me.

I usually wear a 2 so I found this true to size. My one gripe is there was a slight snag or seam out of line running down the front but once I left the house I forgot all about it. I received many compliments on the dress and color. Absolutely loved it and the gold/rhinestone hoop earrings I rented. Highly recommend this dress!
The dress runs true to size. I wore it work then dressed it up and wore out that night.....so comfy and well fitting.
Loved the lightweight material and forgiving style of this dress. I felt comfortable and beautiful all evening long.
I rented the 4 and 6 and ended up going with the 6 so it wasn't so skin tight. I usually wear a 4.

The dress draped very elegantly. The material was soft. I didn't need to wear a bra. The fit was perfect except the long is very long and I wish I had gotten the regular. I wore 2.5" heels and it was still too long. I would definitely rent the dress again.

Besides the fun of getting a fabulous designer dress in the mail, this was a great first experience with RTR! Got the dress a day before the event, and having ordered two sizes (one the just in case I didn't magically shrink a size ... ha ...), one fit just right. I felt extra special, and got TONS of compliments on how I looked! Will def use RTR again. Only drawback, one piece of boning was poking into my side, but it barely took away from my enjoyment wearing such a great, glam dress!

The zipper was very hard to zip and I had to have another person help me zip it up. Even on the size small which was too big for me, the zipper was very hard to close. The mesh side detailing is very hard to see but the dress itself is very flattering!
Comfortable

I received many compliments on this dress because of the color and cut. It was fun, flirty and still classy. It was easy to get around, dance, and run after two kids in this dress for a wedding. I didn't have a problem with the straps, but I didn't feel I fully filled out the chest area and I think my adhesive bra cups worked fine, I wasn't 100% confident in them working. Have a good low strapless or adhesive (or many options) on hand! I loved this dress so much, I'd buy it.

This was a great little romper; the difference in textures from the top and bottom was really unique. The only thing I wasn't a fan of was that it was a little short in the torso so if you have a longer middle, the romper is a little uncomfortable on the bottom. It also makes the shorts pretty short.
This dress is flattering to every body type. It ran true to size. I didn't have to wear a special bra.

As others have said, the fabric wrinkles very easily. I steamed my dress right before leaving the house and it was wrinkled as soon as I arrived. If this will bother you, I'd suggest a different dress. Again as others have said, I wore a size smaller than usual and it fit perfect. I attended a wedding at an arboretum and this dress was a perfect fit for the occasion. The fabric was light, which was great for a warm summer day!

no photo sadly.  I had it all planned great linen cement color slacks heels etc.. weather changed so I had to also and didn't snap a picture first.  the weather has not improved enough so I  returned it to RTR.  not layering friendly so requires nice weather.  I will reselect for a weekend away

Loved the dress! Very flattering, although I think one of mine was altered length-wise. No problem though because the 8 fit great! Form fitting, but very forgiving even if you aren't in the best shape ever!
Great structured top, beautiful details great for a summer work day!
So pretty and comfortable.  Can be dressed up or down.

The dress was true-to size and comfortable, particularly through the hips and mid-section.  The boning in the bodice did start to irritate later in the evening, after sitting for several hours during dinner but otherwise I have no complaints.  I wore 3 inch heels which put the length just above the tips of my peep toes, making walking in the long dress easy. I would definitely rent the dress again.

The dress fit well, though the lower back area and midsection wasn't quite as fitted as I hoped. You should definitely pair a belt with this gown- it breaks up the white with a subtle contrast, and enhances your silhouette. I opted for a more contrasted shoe as well with minimal jewelry and sleek chignon. Check out belts at White House/Black Market- they were the only store I found that had a wide variety of belts for gowns/dresses. 
It wrinkles very easily which is annoying. I had wondered why pics of previous renters were so wrinkly and now I understand- I steamed before leaving and was wrinkled after sitting at dinner. 
Overall, I loved this dress and was best dressed of the night. Would rent again!
I normally wear an 8 petite. This ran small and I wore a 10. Very comfortable to dance in and felt good to wear. Ruffle was fun and hit at the perfect height .

It is more of an off-white color than a true white. If you are tall like me (5'10"), it will be EXTREMELY short in the front. I couldn't lift my arms up without it coming dangerous close to being too far up! The dress is silk lined and felt very luxurious to wear and was warm as well. The size 0 was a bit large in the waist for me even though I usually wear that size. Overall, good rental, dress was in great shape.

Fit - a little tight. Had to go to XL. I normally wear L. 
Pro - Beautiful dress and design. Stunning. 
Cons- You have to wear an adhesive bra or wear your normal bra with an extension that ties around your mid-section.

I loved this dress! It was a little tight in the hips, so I wished I had gotten the 8 but the 6 fit ok. The material was heavy with a little stretch so the 6 was fine. I attended a gala with some work friends so it was just perfect for the event, classy with a little sexy. The ruffled slit was perfect!
I loved this dress! It made me feel fabulous and sexy. Very flattering, and I love the open back!

This coat is really nice! Great style. Clean and sophisticated lines. Flattering lightweight warmth! Received lots of compliments. My only complaint is that the color is much more faded in person. Instead of being a nice emerald green, the color was like a faded muted emerald. Still nice just surprised. Would recommend!

This was really the most gorgeous, most comfortable dress I've ever worn. It is a godsend for curvy women, accentuating all the right spots with its beautiful small waist and flared skirt. I was able to dance in it because of the soft, easy fabric. Had compliments from everyone at the wedding. I wore it the next day and the day after as well -- did not want to return it!
The fit was perfect in the waist and length, but you need to be "well endowed" to fill-out the chest. A great going out dress if that's what your aim is...it just wasn't mine!

My usual size (12 off the rack, but usually 14 for formal gowns) was sold out for the weekend, so I ordered only my backup. It was a little big, but I still loved it. I was in this dress from 2pm to 2am and it was so comfortable! The dress is very low cut so I definitely had to pin it to hide my bra. I am 5'6 and the length was perfect with flats (which was great for a Mardi Gras ball). If I had worn heels, the entire shoe would've shown. Also, I was concerned about the sequins rubbing against my arms but had no issues at all. I totally recommend!

Absolutely loved this dress! The stripes are bold and classy. If you have a wide rib cage I would size up, it was definitely snug in that area but made my waistline appear small, so it was great. The material was thick so it was great for an evening September wedding.

I usually wear a 4, I don't know what made me get the 6, but it fit wonderfully! I am a pear shaped with a  small waist and good size butt and it fit all my curves and was EXTREMELY comfortable! I wore it all night!
Favorite RTR so far. So many compliments! Perfect length with flats. I was comfortable all night.

Overall, I loved this dress! Perfect for our outdoor, laidback engagement party. I typically wear a 0 or 2. For this dress, even the 2 was a little tight in the bust. Length fell to around mid-calf. Arm holes are a bit awkward, so make sure to check that your bra doesnt show on the sides. White or nude undergarments are a must. Highly recommended.

I loved the bight color and lace detail.  It was very appropriate for an August wedding.  The only con is that I have a short-torso, so for similar body-styles, it might be a leeetle bunchy in the middle - which made the see-through center part of the dress hard to notice.  Kind of a shame to lose that detail.  The 0 was too tight however, so I couldn't wear that one.  Also I am pretty flat-chested so the bust was a little big - but that's nothing new for me.  Those are minor cons however - all in all it was a great dress.  I got lots of compliments on it!  I would recommend it!
True to size and very fitted in the mid section.  I'm 5'2 and it was longer than I had hoped on me, but nice for work.  Material is thick and very good quality.

I  am between a 6 and an 8, typically depending on the chest size. This was definitely low cut and tighter, but the 6 actually worked better than the 8, although I could wear both. I decided on the 6 for a sexier silhouette.  It hid flaws while accentuating curves, and I would recommend this to anyone looking to bring out the best in their body type. The color is brighter in person than in the picture and I think it would be stunning on most skin tones. I would absolutely recommend this dress to anyone looking to stand out from the sea of LBDs.

When I rented this dress I was scared that it might be too small because although I have a very small top, my hips and butt tend to be a tight fit. The 4r fit my perfectly but it would have been too short with heels. This dress is a gorgeous color and it sparkles perfectly.  Rent the runway was the best choice for my prom!

I felt awesome in this gown! It is very flattering and sexy, but is classy at the same time. This was actually a last minute replacement for the gown I had reserved- it was returned damaged and unable to be delivered. The only size left was the 40L. I normally would be a size 6/8, but decided to go for it after reading the reviews. Do not be afraid of sizing down if you are unsure of which to go with, I got the dress on fine. It was a bit snug and would have preferred a size up but, again, it was fine!  It's very stretchy and does not have a zipper. The length was good for me- I am 5'7" and wore 4" heels. So happy that everything worked out and I actually got a dress that I love more than the original!

This dress was true to size, although I could see how it would be tight in the bust for anyone with a larger chest size. The colors are bright and vibrant; and I love a dress with pockets! It is a lightweight fabric which was nice to wear on a Texas summer night!

The dress is very form fitting as is apparent from the picture. It's also a lot longer than I anticipated. It came probably 2-3 inches above my thigh rather than being as short as pictured. Similarly, the sleeves were a little long on me, and I'm a long person! The criss-cross stripes across the middle of the dress are actually more like satin than leather, which is what I had thought, and the mesh sides are way tinier than pictured. They were kind of an awkward size really because they didn't necessarily look on purpose. I have a bit of a tummy, so the dress's tight fit wasn't the most flattering, but since my husband said I looked good I went for it. I got a few compliments throughout the night but nothing earth shattering. I'd recommend this dress for someone with a lot of confidence and maybe a flatter stomach.

This jumpsuit is stunning. This was my first rental from RTR and I am officially hooked. I rented a 2 & 4 long and ended up wearing the 4. The top and straps in the back fit better in the 2, but was too short for me in the torso. So the 4 was a TAD loose but still loved it. I'm fairly tall (almost 5'10) and wore 4 inch heals and it was perfect. So be warned the longs are extremely long!! I wish I could have kept this jumpsuit, it really is beautiful and I received compliments all night long. In a jumpsuit you stand out from everyone in dresses at a wedding, but add the bright red and its one of a kind! I'm looking for an excuse to rent this one in black now. Highly recommend!
I rented this through RTR Unlimited and sent it back without wearing it.   I thought it would be a fun summer dress, but the material is very heavy. It was not suitable to wear to work.
I ordered this dress for NYE and loved it; however, it was big!!!  I am always a size ten, but I definitely could've been a size 8 in this dress.  Lots of sparkles and a cute fit otherwise though.

I rented this for a black tie wedding and ended up wearing another dress from RTR.  But, this one def would have been wonderful also.  I'm usually an 8/M in dresses and had to go down to a 6.  The long part of the dress flows so well when you move, it's just really nice.  The skirt part was a bit tight on me but not noticeable because of the long part.  I would think about renting this again because it's unique and flows really well.  I do have a longer torso and so the waist was a little too high, but that happens with a lot of dresses and it wasn't something that others would notice, just me.
Great top, flattering, really fun and beautiful. Very comfortable.

I wore this dress to a charity black-tie event and it was the perfect dress for me!  It does run small - I originally had the 10L (my normal dress size is between an 8 and 10) which was really tight. I called and they didn't have the 12L, but they did have the 14L. First - the 10L was barely long enough wearing flats (I'm 5'7"). The 14L was a little loose, but overall, it fit better and I was comfortable and didn't need any shape wear. I was able to wear heels (about 3.75") and it was just the right length. The built in bra was fantastic. It is fitted through the hip, which was great for me.  I loved the small train on it too, but I imagine some might find it irritating.  I would definitely rent this dress again!  Sorry about the blurry/dark pictures - no one there that night could figure out how to take a decent picture...
Loved this- the color, the fit, the cut...all around great jumper! I rented this for a birthday party that was cancelled, so added a blazer and it worked great for work! Lots of compliments.

I made the mistake of sizing up on this one. I am busty, so sometimes a size 6 is tight, so I opted to go for a size 8. This was a bit too big, but also less "blanket" like than I expected. Based on the pictures I thought it would be more sweater like and comfortable. This is very much more structured and a coat rather than an indoor friendly sweater/jacket.

Loved this dress from the second I put it on until the moment I took it off! Fit great and got tons of compliments all night. The dress did run a bit big in my smallest dress size, so used double sided tape to keep everything in place in the bust. I'm 5'9 and wore 4 inch heels and the hem on the long was about 1/2 inch too long, if I'd had time I would have gotten the free hemming in Henri Bendel the day before. All in all great first experience w/ RTR!
Absolutely loved the lace detail and color blocking. I received a ton of compliments and it really would be good for a ton of occasions. I highly recommend this dress if you're thinking about it!
Fabric feels like scuba gear. The length is a little long, but because of the fabric the skirt rides up a little when you walk.

I rented this dress for a wedding and received tons of compliments!! The picture on the model doesn't do the dress justice. The royal blue color is gorgeous and brought out my blue eyes. My ONLY complaint is the dress was a little long...maybe just longer than I'm used to wearing for being short (5'4''). Overall, I loved the fit and color. The open back is flattering as well. I wasn't able to wear a bra, but the dress was fitted enough it still looked good.

Definitely did not expect the dress to look like it does.  It has some weird crochet/lace details, the fabric is REALLY HEAVY and is shimmery, and the light part at the very top is actually light blue, not white/gray, which I wasn't expecting.  This would be cute for a winter office party or something, but definitely not a late summer work dress...

i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and the small fit me well. the cutouts were great and i loved the neon stripe down the dress. i'm only 5'3" but even with 4.7 inch heels the dress was still touching the ground. i didn't wear a bra with this and didn't need to, but pasties are a must. the inner lining stopped around mid thigh for me, so just be aware of that when sitting, but otherwise great dress!
The dress flairs slightly at the bottom, it would have been more flattering if it hung a little straighter.  It looked nice, just not exactly as I would have liked.

I loved the plum color of this dress and the cute tea length. The length was perfect on me at 5'5". This dress is great for any season and can be worn to a number of occasions. It would pair really well with a simple necklace or a more intricate bracelet and earrings. The dress looks conservative, but the form fitting fabric shows off your curves well.
Great simple black dress, the lace is pretty and feminine.
Its so perfect i want to buy it, fabric is so soft and great for a beach vacation! Length was a little too long if you're planing on wearing flats. I received lots of compliments.
Perfect fit. Hugged/clung to my body. Beautiful and brilliant colors.

This dress is beautiful. I ended up not wearing it as my other dress (first choice) worked perfectly. The length was a little bit too long for me, just below knees. I am 5-5 and typically do well with the length.  It is gorgeous.

The dress was longer than I expected - I'm 5'9" and it hit much lower on my leg than on the model. The fabric is also thick and has a lot of volume, so at first it was a bit overwhelming. It looked better once I had heels on, and I did get stopped and complimented on it by another guest. The skirt has a lot of volume, and creates a great shape.

Liked this dress so much that I wore it with heels and dressy jewelry to a wedding and then sandals and casual jewelry to a graduation party.  I wore a racerback bra and didn't have to worry about panty lines.  The dress was very flattering, loose and easy to wear in the heat or dancing.
The dress was a little worn, but I received compliments all night. Overall, a really fun, flirty, twirly dress to wear to dance the night away!
Such a comfortable dress. I wore this for a vocal performance so it simply completed the elegance of the event without taking away from the performance.
A little overpriced. Had to wrap halter straps around each other a couple of times to make it fit. The dress ran a bit large.

Not a huge fan of this dress - had huge potential but ended up looking rather frumpy. The 4 (my usual size) was really large and did not lay flat - making the folds/pleats looks really strange. I reccomend trying a size down because this doesn't look good if it's too big.

I was surprised at how long this dress was for being a regular length! It worked perfect with the flat sandals I wore since the wedding was on the beach. The bottom is sheer which is a nice touch for late summer.
Sorry I don't have any pictures of this one.  It was a gorgeous dress sent to me after my original didn't fit, and I couldn't have been happier.  :-)
It didn't have a lot of stretch so I could see the zipper getting ripped easily.

An eyecatching dress, indeed! Lots of compliments, and overall, I was very pleased with this rental. Two things:
1. Be forewarned, this dress is WAY more gold than the silver/bronze-y look in the model pictures. It's still beautiful, I was just surprised.
2. This dress is unforgiving. Be at peace with your midriff and upper arm gods, because this dress will definitely highlight both.
got a size small as my back up size i usually wear a medium. Thankfully I did because the medium was a little big on me.
This romper is adorable and so comfortable! I wore for my sister's bachelorette party that was on a pedal bar. I got tons of compliments and felt great!

This dress was perfect!! I NEVER wear dresses and I hate dressing up!!! I went back and forth on which dress it pick and which size to get! I was hesitant in renting a dress because I have put on some weight and since I don't ever dress up, I really didn't know what size to get!! Needless to say, I am so happy I rented it! The dress was beautiful and I received so many compliments!! When I told people I rented it, they were in SHOCK!! Amazing dress! If I ever need to get fancy again, I know where to go!!
The fit was great! I didn't have any issues with the clasp as others mentioned. It is a bit tight across the chest so probably not for the very busty.
I wore this for a winter bridal shower I was hosting. I adored the fit, it was easy to move around in, and looked incredible. I would highly recommend

Dress was gorgeous.  Beautiful lace and great color.  The length was perfect for my petite figure, did not rise up too high when sitting and didn't appear to be to long when I was standing.  Would love to rent this particular dress again for another occasion sometime.
Very nice dress, it fit beautifully and the red was perfect.

This is a wonderful dress for petite girls. It has structure and stretch and allows your figure to show but not too much. I wore 4" heels and the dress just reached the floor. I received compliments all night! Thank you RTR.

It's a beautiful dress, but I have a larger bust size.  The top of the pleated part of the dress cut me right in the middle of my bust which didn't look good on me.  The dress was beautiful, just not for my shape.

The bodice was quite snug, which would make it possible to go without a bra. The neckline is quite low cut. The material is thick and heavy, which feels expensive. Deep pockets were great. It was a little longer on me that I would have liked. I'm 5'5" and the 6 came well below my knees, but overall it was a very beautiful dress.
Fit like a glove !!!
Fun, easy to wear, very flattering -- I loved it! The color is unique and the length is fun but not too short. Just make sure you don't get your cape caught on door knobs, etc.
Super flattering, nice thick material, unique uneven ruffle at hemline

I rented this for a bachelorette party. I felt slightly overdressed but it was so comfortable and extremely flattering; I received many compliments throughout the night. The material is slightly heavier but I didn't notice once I had the dress on.

Fit was great. Front is very minimal which I loved. Open back added something a little extra special to the look - it's a single piece across with two hanging drapes for cover.  I wanted to keep it a bit more casual so I wound up wrapping the two draped pieces into a bow which covered the back a bit more. Looked just as great! What appears to be "skin" down the side of the jumpsuit is actually black lace over nude fabric - was a little worried from the model photos but it looks great in person.

I was a little nervous about wearing this dress because of the sheer bits of fabric around the midsection and arms, but as soon as I put it on I was obsessed! I definitely wore spans underneath but didn't have any issue with them poking out at the waist band. Like other reviews said, the arms were a bit long but I just tucked them under and it was fine. I would absolutely rent this again!

I LOVE this rental and don't know if I can bare to part with it (thank goodness for unlimited)! I wore it to work with black patent heels (not the nude ones pictured) and got so many compliments on the dress. I ordered the XS only because the S wasn't available and I am so glad I did. I usually wear a 4-6 (as of late, a 6) and the XS is still a little big. I recently gained a couple of pounds (129) and was worried, but it ended up working fine.  it was very loose and comfortable, not in an unflattering way. Love this dress and good for the petite, may be a little short for the taller girls.

Hard to zipper over the middle seam, even on the larger size and even when on the hanger. Lots of cleavage and I needed to wear a converter to make the back lower. Perfect height for my 2.5/3" heels and I'm 5'4". Sequins left a bit of an imprint on my back.

I'm busty and carrying a little extra weight in my midsection right now.  I wore a SMALL.  Dress was comfortable and hid my tummy.  I was able to get away with a little Hollywood tape to keep the buttons from pulling at the bust, but probably could have worn a camisole or decorative bra and been okay too.  Traveled well.

Shockingly one of my favorite things I have ever had on RTR. Incredibly flattering and sophisticated. This dress is made of a very thick material, but has a great stretch. The color is rich and I received lots of complements. I wore it to work, Thanksgiving and a casual dinner party. Highly recommended!

It fit like a glove but I would recommend getting a size up. I wore with spanx and a sticky bra underneath. Having a bra made my bust seem a lot bigger but it can be worn without. I wore three inch heels and the back of the dress still touched the floor. Very fun to wear and hugs you in all the right places.

I ordered this dress in a size 2, as it was the only size available for the date I needed it, but  it fit great! I usually wear a size 4, so I would definitely suggest sizing down. It was a gorgeous red dress, great fabric, and perfect for a work party. The slight high-low feature of the dress definitely makes it stand out!
I'm 5'2 and this was a great length for me.
This dress fit like a glove and I didn't have to tug at it all night even though its strapless. I am small and wear like an xs/00/0 and this dress was form fitting and comfortable.
Slim fit, very attractive dress.

As soon as I stepped out of the car I got a compliment on this dress. It was very flattering especially if you have slimmer legs because it is baggy. I was planning on wearing a thin high waist belt but decided against it after trying it on, looked too 2006. I ended up just tucking it up inside the front of my bra which looked amazing! It gave the definition the dress needed to not look too baggy. I would recommend for maternity.

Very cute dress! I wore to a work meeting & then wore with tights and booties out to dinner.  Was perfect for both.  Is UK size, so runs a little small.  10 fit perfect, and I'm generally an 8.  The waist doesn't have any stretch in it whatsoever, so if you are questioning that part, perhaps size up.

This dress was absolutely stunning. It was long enough for me, I am 6'3. The fabric makes this topic very appealing and comfortable. The slit on the side is very flattering. The zipper is easy to zip up. It also pairs well with any kind of jewelry. I wore a normal bra with it comfortably.

This dress looked AWESOME due to the stretchy fabric (great for hourglass shapes!) and ability to wear it with a standard bra. Very comfortable to dance in and I think the length and color tone down the boob presentation! I wanted to leave a note for tall ladies - I'm 5'11", measurements 36-26-38. I got this dress in a 6L and 8L and ended up wearing the 6L with flats. The 8L was longer but slightly less flattering since it was too big around the waist. The 6L felt long enough when I pulled it down (looked fine in pictures) but if I walked around it would ride up to show my shoes. This didn't bother me but depends on your comfort level. I would not have worn it with heels.

This dress is tight, short, and sexy! Great for a bachelorette party! It does ride up a bit with dancing and walking, so keep that in mind. I am big busted and was able to wear a normal bra (wahoo!). It shows a little cleavage without making you feel self conscious that the girls are going to fall out. Great dress!
Wore 1.5 inch heels with the dress and it was the perfect length.

This was a really cute everyday dress - whimsical print & not too short to wear to work for me (5'7").  The chest was way too small though (32/34D), despite the waist being quite loose.  There's no give at all in the fabric - it didn't zip up all the way and was really flattening in an unflattering way to the extent that it did.  I'm usually between a 2 and a 4 and rented the 40 - may try again with the 42 another time.  Seems like it would work TTS for a pear shape, but if you're larger in the bust I'd size up.

Loved this dress and was complimented all night. The fit was great. The top is a little snug so if you have a large chest you may want to go a size up. Also the back of the dress does raise so be careful when sitting or bending over.

I rented this dress for a wedding, it was fantastic! I was worried I'd need to figure out what kind of bra to wear -- I didn't end up needing to wear one at all. It ran a little bit big in the waist on me, I ordered sizes 6 and 8, wore the 6, but may have been been better suited for a 4. Regardless I felt great about the fit! Easy to dance in, great length. Got a ton of compliments, and definitely recruited a few new RTR customers at the same time :) Will definitely rent this dress again.
Wore this on a bachelorette party and it was perfect - comfortable enough for dancing. It ran small and obviously short on me since I'm tall- but it was still comfortable and cute.
Easy to dress up or down. I wore it with a black button-up, as pictured, to dress it down, to an outdoor "dressy casual" dinner.  It was perfect.

I wanted to wear completely flat sandals to my formal event, so I was looking for a long dress that would come down to the floor and cover my feet. I am 5'7, and the 2L was the PERFECT length. In my flats, the dress touched the floor in the front, and was a tad bit longer in the back, and you could not see my feet at all. Obviously, if you are taller than 5'7 and want to wear heels - this is not the dress for you. 

The dress runs very true to size and has a bit of stretch, and I would suggest going a size down for a back-up. I normally wear 0-2/XS-S tops, and I felt like this dress in size 0 would have fit as well, and the 4 would've been too big.

I wore the 10 L for the length. It fit a little big though. But the 8L wasn't quite long enough for my shoes. The 8 actually fit me better but I went with the 10 so I could wear the right shoes. Also I had to wear a padded bra. I didn't quite fill out the top. Overall the gown was really very pretty and perfect for a winter black tie wedding.

I wore this gown to my first Opera Opening Night as part of the staff. I needed a dress that stayed true to my age, body type, and style but was also conservative enough for a work event. I felt absolutely beautiful in this gown! It is not my usual first choice of color and style but I think it perfectly fit the profile of the evening. 
PRO's: I think the style and cut of the dress is flattering for every body type. There are ways around the low cut if you have a full bust; in my case I had to use 2 safety pins and some Hollywood tape to make sure that only the right amount of skin was showing. Normally, I would have probably used 1 safety pin and tape but I needed to remain a bit more conservative for this event. The length is as I expected it to be (everything is always long on me anyway). 
CON's: The only thing that I have to mention is for ladies like me, who have curvy hips. The slip on the dress stretches but is not relative to the chiffon overlay. So, in my case, I would have been a Size 4 were it not for the tightness of the slip. Even the 6 was a little snug. There is a stark contrast between the two layers of the dress, which may be deceiving for some when looking at pictures. The dress looks flowy but the slip will not be. I cannot really say anything negative about this dress, just a warning for fellow curvy girls.
In general, this was my first experience renting from RTR and I was very nervous because I am not a one size girl. I can vary from size 2-8 depending on the dress, designer, style, fabric, etc... I am 100% satisfied with the experience and will be renting again soon. THANKS RTR!!
Classic, simple fit. Comfortable but a little bit tight in the bust, halter.

This dress fits great.  It's not too short to wear to work....however, by the end of the day I was a wrinkled mess.  I was actually wrinkled by the time I arrived at my office in the morning from my seat belt and sitting in the car.  If you don't have to sit a lot, this maybe a good fit.

This dress fit like my go-to favorites: the waist band was at the perfect height, I could wear a regular bra, the fabric had enough stretch so that I wasn't dying after dinner, and the slip didn't bunch up against the tights I was wearing. There is a bit of cleavage with this dress, but I was totally fine with it. I didn't have to adjust it at all. I felt great in it and would definitely recommend.

This dress definitely makes you stand out in a crowd. I wore this event to my school's alumni event. I usually wear 14-16, so I sized up to 18 after reading the reviews. SIZE UP! even if you think that the small one will fit. I have a large bust and curves and the 16 fit, but the 18 felt more comfortable. The dress is a bit short, but not in a scandalous way. Overall a great dress!

This dress is to die for! I literally gasped when I took it out of its packaging. But this dress is very short in the torso. I couldn't wear it for that reason. However, if you have a regular or short torso, this dress would work for you!
You can wear this with ANYTHING! It is so chic and comfortable, and fashionable. I loved the leather and the fit was great.

This is a beautiful dress, but as others have said, it is oddly loose in the hips/lower back area. Everywhere else it was form fitting and wonderful, but it did have an unattractive backside because of the extra fabric. Probably better for an hourglass figure than for an athletic build.

The dress fit well and got lots of compliments.  It was light weight and comfortable, which was nice for an outdoor wedding in Texas.  The only issue I had was the clasp on both dresses was broken (The thread loop disconnected on one end). Luckily, I noticed the clasp and wad able to sew in a more sturdy snap.

I really love a horizontal navy stripe anything - I'm obsessed with boatneck navy stripe tops so I expected this one to be a keeper. And the dress design did not disappoint - it looks great on, very comfortable and fits nicely at the top. It has a cute boatneck & deep back. The "scuba" type material is relatively lightweight.  It has a zipper so you don't have to squirm in or out. Unlike some other reviewers, this did not "hug my curves" - for me the lower half was too baggy - and looking at the model picture now, it looks like it was intended to come out away from the body below the waist. So super like, but not love or I would have bought it and had it tailored.
Lovely dress that I rented for our engagement photos! It's absolutely gorgeous and I'll rent it again.
This dress was tighter and shorter than I really anticipated, but not uncomfortably so. It fit like it was made for me and was perfect for a night out.

Awesome fit! The length, the bust, just everything about this dress was great. I was comfortable in it the whole night - sometimes dresses get a little tight after dinner, ha! I ordered a size 4 and 6, ended up wearing the 4. Also, as other reviews stated the slip ran a little large, but when my dress arrived there was only 1 slip anyway, which fit perfectly. I wore this dress along with nude pumps, but black would have looked great as well. I was going to add a belt like others, but decided against it because the dress really didn't need anything else.

I attended a fundraising gala in this beautiful fuchsia/magenta dress (Note: it is not pink). I received many compliments. 
I paired with earrings but I might have gone with a statement necklace or cuff bracelet instead! What a versatile dress. Lovely way to show off your back and arms! Make sure to wear a backless bra. The hanger straps do come up. I tried fashion tape but it shows through the fabric. Still, I would definitely rent again!
too boxy and too blousy in the sleeves.

The color was perfect for a holiday wedding- very festive.  I felt great in the dress, it was figure flattering without being too tight.

Fit- My measurements are 36-28-39.  This dress fit nicely up top but was a bit snug around the hips.  If it had been any tighter I would have had to find something else to wear.  Also, the keyhole was low enough where I couldn't wear a bra with it, fine for me as a B-cup, but if you are larger, I would recommend using a specialty bra for low back dresses or finding another dress.  

The lace on was a little worn looking, but it was only noticeable to me.

This dress absolutely rocks! It is made of thick fabric, and the cut is so flattering. But most importantly, it has pockets! Like a few other reviewers mentioned, there is definitely extra room in the chest (for reference, I am about 5'4" 120lbs and a 32D). The dress was a good length, though on the shorter side. The colors are absolutely beautiful, and this was one of my favorite rentals to date! If I had to pick one downside, it would be that the skirt part would poof out when I sat down and I would have to smooth it out once I stood back up.
Dress runs much smaller then your typical dress size. Wore a 6 and fit perfectly. Regular length was fine with 4 inch heels (I'm 5'6)

Went to Miami with some girlfriends and wore this for a fancy night out. I'm almost 5'8" and about 135-140 lbs and my normal Medium fit me perfectly. I have had kids, so I like that it showed some midriff (but not LOWER midriff!) adding the peekaboo appeal! I am a pretty slender build, so I would say that this is probably NOT a dress for someone who is well-endowed in the butt area. It fit me well but I don't think it would be as comfortable for someone with a bit of a booty, because there is zero stretch to the material. Was able to wear a regular strapless bra with it, and received lots of compliments. Would rent again!
Adorable skirt, good fit. Looked great with a cropped tank or a tucked in top. Loved. Dressy but professional, with a little "wow" factor.

I wish I owned this dress! Super comfortable. The color is the most amazing shade of red (not too bright, not too dull). The only downside for me was the length, but I am 5'1 so that wasn't a real surprise. That being said, super easy to pick up the back of the dress when I was walking. So many compliments all night long!
Dress was comfortable and elegant.  perfect for a formal business event.  Loved the back!!  So many compliments.

Thicker good quality material - very flattering over tummy and butt! Received alot of compliments - the navy is a darker navy. The cutout has a light mesh over it making a trendy look more classic. I'm 5'2 and wore 4 inch heels and the length was perfect, just grazing the ground. I would absolutely rent this dress again, probably my favorite so far.
Nicole Miller knows how to make a girl feel sexy and comfortable!! I rented this for my best friend's bachelorette and it was sheer perfection! I felt sexy and comfortable all night long.

This was a good dress for work and I got lots of complements. The fabric is super soft and comfortable. I read the other reviews and saw the fabric was not giving in the hips so I up sized to a 6 because I have hips and it fit great. The dress was very flattering from the back as well and a bit sexy. Its and attention graber with the flowing nature of the fabric
It fits like a glove, true to size, very comfortable

I loved the high neckline and sleeves on this dress because I have a few tattoos and I needed to cover them for a very conservative wedding. This dress did all that and more! I received so many compliments throughout the night. The dress does run a bit small, I'm usually a 16/18 thankfully I got an 18 and a 20 for my backup. Ended up wearing the 20, though it was still a little snug--but not uncomfortable at all! The ends of the lace on this dress need some touching up, but for this price, it's so worth it! Will definitely use this service again.

Beautiful color, pretty standard fit (I'm usually a 6 or an 8 in dresses and went with the 6 here), though I wished I'd ordered the 6L.  I'm 5'7"-5'8" with long-ish legs and the 6R grazed the tops of my toes when wearing flats; couldn't wear it with heels.

The dress was really flattering, and perfect for a rainy day touring wineries in Napa. I had to add tights and a jacket (it was pretty chilly) but the dress would have been great on its own too. Highly recommend.
It was surprisingly large, especially at the middle. However, the cut and fabric were really nice, so I've now ordered in a smaller size which I'm really hoping will fit!

A few friends had a fancy cocktail party and surprised everyone by getting married - I knew this would be formal cocktail attire and this dress was PERFECT! I'm 5'7, about 145lbs, straight & narrow and the dress fit almost perfectly - I will say the lace in the arms has ZERO give and was slightly uncomfortable when hugging people, but you couldn't tell just by looking at it. Love this dress, definitely willing to rent again. I got compliments all night long!

Fit was very flattering and also seems like it would be forgiving on larger frames too.  It's pretty short but the high neck helps it to still feel very elegant and classy.  Note that you actually need to tie the bows at the bottom of the sleeves before you put the dress on, and make sure you tie them tightly or they can come undone.

I have a small chest, but larger hips and shoulders, so this dress was great for my frame. I had to wear the 0R for it to stay up as the 2R was way too loose on top. It was tight to get zipped, but still very comfortable. I love that it had pockets as my phone didn't fit in my tiny purse, but fit unnoticed in my pocket. It was a great color and I got compliments all night.

This dress was surprisingly flexible for work (throw on a black blazer) and evening. The color is intense and eye-catching, works greats with black stockings and angle boots. The racer back is a sexy touch. Fabric is stretchy but holds up to structure, so it helps create that flat stomach look. Runs slightly small, so I went one size up, especially since I was wearing it to work in the daytime.

The wedding I attended was in Colorado in September (cold at night) so the sleeves were clutch! I ordered the S and the XS; I wore the XS because I thought it most flattered my hourglass shape. The body-con silhouette is super sexy, loved the sequin pattern and rose-gold color.  PROS: comfortable, not itchy, did not ride up while dancing, eye catching, and the hem hit me perfectly at mid-thigh (I'm 5'3").  CONS: none! Although I should note that on occasion the sequins on the sleeves caught on the sequins on the dress body. Also, I needed my husband to help me take the dress off - physically couldn't do it myself!  ;)
Comfortable, easy top that was cute for fall everyday.   I could have sized down to a small.
I rented this for a corporate gala in the Caribbean.   It runs a bit snug in the chest and I'm a B cup- so it was perfect.  So for the C cup ladies - I'd go up a size.

Love! This is the perfect Sea Foam/Teal/Mint Color. It is about knee length, maybe it bit higher, but not much. And, hello, pocket! Gotta love a good pocket. I'd say go with the strapless bra here - it would be a pain to constantly line up the straps of your bra with that of the dress all night. This classic fit and flare style is good for all body shapes, even small baby bumps! The waist is fitted at the natural waist and flares out from there, so its super comfortable. Pair with some fun  sunnies and a top knot!

I rented this dress to be a bridesmaid in an upscale backyard/bbq type wedding. The dress was beautiful, easy to wear and easy to dance in - I wore it with a pair of ankle boots since we were on a farm. I am 5'7 and with 2 inch heels the Regular length was perfect. I got a bunch of compliments from all the guests. I felt this dress was a bit loose - my upper body is a 4 and my lower body is a 6. I got the 6, and the neckline was a bit big because of the one shoulder and it drooped a bit. Nothing a little double sided tape and a bra didn't fix but as the night went on, it kept getting looser. The dress is very forgiving to your butt/hips area - so I would pick the size that fits your upper body/torso. All in all, it was a beautiful dress.

The stretchy cotton of this dress is super flattering and comfortable. Love the stripes and how they change direction with the ruching at the waist. I have worn it with nice black heels and a blazer for a formal client dinner as well as black sneakers and a jean jacket for brunch on a patio. I loved it so much I purchased it!

I usually wear a 10 to accommodate a larger bottom half.  Because this dress is full (but not too full), I was able to wear the 8.  The sequins are a bit scratchy under the arms, but it is a great, comfortable dress.

The jewel tone colors of this dress are so much prettier in person!  I wore this to a winter wedding and received many compliments about the color and pattern of this dress. I've rented a couple of other Slate & Willow dresses before, and they never disappoint.  I am usually between a 4 and a 6, and the size 4 fit perfectly.  I loved this dress so much that it was hard for me to return it!
This is a very conservative piece. Perfect for work but, as with many Shoshanna pieces, there are better fits for an hourglass shape.

The dress fit perfectly. I'm only 5'7'' and this dress just touched the floor. It hugged and draped in all the right spots and people kept complimenting on how beautiful I looked. I can't wait for the next event. I love this service.

The fabric definite hides the extra ounce of fat on my abdominal area.  The only thing is the upper part of the dress is cut bigger than I thought.  But I am petite.  It may fit other people better. Overall I like it a lot.

This dress was actually sent to me because my original dress size didn't ship because it was returned late or damaged. I wore it to a masquerade ball and got tons of compliments. I won best dressed out of about 200 people!

I love this dress!  The colors were as pictured, and the fit was pretty true to size.  Maybe a tad big, but  not baggy.  I am usually a 0 or 2, depending on the fit of the dress, and I wore a 0.  It was very comfortable all night long.  Love the fit and style of this dress!

The dress was beautiful and I instantly fell in love with it. The fit was great. The only issue that I found is that  you cannot wear platform wedges with it. I'm 5'5" and with flat sandals the dress fell right on the tops of my feet.  Unfortunately, for the event that I was attending, flat sandal just wouldn't do. I was unable to the dress.

I thought this was perfect and fit well. My only comment is the skirt is a bit shorter than I expected; I'm petite, so I figured it would be a tad long, but I was wrong! Nevertheless it looked cute, I was proud to wear it and I'd recommend it to anyone who doesn't mind showing a little leg.
fits true to size
I can't describe how sexy this dress made me feel.  It was just perfect for the event.  Super flattering and tons of compliments.  I would highly recommend this dress.

i'm usually btwn a 2 and 4 and usually a 4 in slate and willow but went down to a 2 based on reviews and was happy i did! this dress is great. perfect for the weekend. the dress hit a few inches below the knee and was perfect w wedges. very comfortable and airy. lined so none of my undergarments were visible. loved the pockets and eyelet details. extremely flattering. highly highly recommend!

This dress was amazing. A little too small for the chest area. I got a stick on bra but I am a nursing mom and it slid off during the evening. I would recommend not wearing a bra with this and just those nipple covers. Also, if you are a nursing mom like me definitely wear a shrug or cardigan over this. I was popping out all night! I wore body shaper panties underneath because my 9 months post partum tummy is still a problem area. I think it concealed everything pretty well. I would rent this again maybe after nursing. All in all a great fitting dress!

I somehow thought this dress would look great for my husband's upcoming company holiday party.  It is super sexy, very comfortable, very flattering in all the right places!  All the other positive reviews are on spot.  It's perfect for a bride after-party (as many other reviewers have done), or a summer formal party - even for New Year's Eve.  Will definitely rent again...for the right occasion. Kudos to RTR for exchanging the dress in time for the Christmas party.  Easy-peasy!
it was almost too short in the torso, so tall ladies beware... i received so many compliments. i wore with jeans and with nice clothing.
Everyone loved this dress. It did run small around the rib cage so I had to go a size up. Otherwise it fit very well.
This dress is very stretchy! The ruched side flatters the stomach area. It was extremely comfortable. This is absolutely my favorite RTR dress thus far. The 42 was the perfect fit.

The dress runs long. I am 5'7'' and wore 3 inch heels, and the dress was still hitting the floor. I HIGHLY recommend it. Super comfortable and flattering. I could imagine this dress looking stunning on an hourglass figure. I cannot compliment the dress enough...I will definitely rent it again for my next formal occasion.

I absolutely loved this dress. Very comfortable, perfect for warm weather, you can wear it very casual, you can wear it to a date, a pool party, etc. I think this dress is one of those that I could wear different ways to almost every occasion. I wore it to dinner to celebrate the hubby's birthday. I chose to wear a belt to make it a bit more form fitting. It gets shorter, but also sexier. It shows a lot of cleavage, so be prepared with double sided tape or clips or in my case, I just kept an eye on it because the fabric moves (We stayed at a resort and i didn't have time to buy tape.)  I am considering buying this dress in the future because I think I can have fun with it and I would definitely wear it a lot.
This dress was so much fun and easy to wear!  I rented it for a Gatsby-themed event and it was just right.  I would rent again for a fun, formal party.

This dress was very pretty and feminine. There is a slight sheen to the white fabric that makes it a little special but not too fancy. My only issue is with the lining. The white fabric on the outside has a bit of stretch but the lining has no give whatsoever. It fit well except around my bum which is not exceptionally large. I even tried with Spanx and it was a little better but then the lining kept riding up as I walked around my house. I didn't end up wearing it but envy the women with narrower builds who will be able to rock it. It should also be noted that it was pretty short! I'm 5'4 and it didn't touch the ground.

The dress fit very well and was true to size. I am 5'3" and the petite was perfect length with 3.5in heels! The outer layer of the dress was longer than the underneath slip so I had a hard time with the stairs, I kept stepping on the chiffon. It was a little bit more like a bridesmaid dress and I definitely wouldn't recommend for the summertime, but it did the trick for me!
This dress is lovely! It fit true to size and was very comfortable.

I recently had a baby so I wanted to find a dress that was forgiving to my figure but still fancy and flattering.  My company holds a formal awards party so this dress was perfect.  The length was great with a 3" heel and was very comfortable.  The only complaint I have is that the dress was very hard to zip.  It continued to get caught on the material where it changed direction around the band.  I was a little concerned that it wouldn't zip when I put it on for the night.
